As wise men throughout history said more than once: the more we know, the more we realize that we don't know.

<effect> A Genius Applicant is available on Earth.

column4: Nie ma to jak dobra zagadka!

column2: We should research the Dark Spectrometry technology to learn more about the Black Cubes.
column3: We should research the Dark Spectrometry technology to learn more about the Black Cubes.
column4: Aby dowiedzieć się więcej o czarnych kostkach, powinniśmy opracować technologię ciemnej spektrometrii.

column2: A peculiar black cube matrix has appeared near the Colony. We should send an Explorer to investigate.
column3: A peculiar black cube matrix has appeared near the Colony. We should send an Explorer to investigate.
column4: W pobliżu kolonii pojawił się układ dziwnych czarnych kostek. Powinniśmy wysłać eksploratora, aby to zbadać.

column2: An unknown black, previously undetected cube-shaped object
column3: An unknown black, previously undetected cube-shaped object
column4: Nieznany czarny, niewykryty wcześniej obiekt w kształcie sześcianu.

column2: Reportedly, a black cube has appeared within the extractor.
column3: Reportedly, a black cube has appeared within the extractor.
column4: Podobno w ekstraktorze pojawiła się czarna kostka.

column2: A Concrete Extractor went abruptly silent. Maintenance requests were met with nothing but static.
column3: A Concrete Extractor went abruptly silent. Maintenance requests were met with nothing but static.
column4: Pewien ekstraktor cementu nagle ucichł. Jedyną reakcją na polecenia konserwacji był szum zakłóceń.

column2:
This event was unlike any malfunction predicted in the security protocols. Orbital scans on the site revealed no evidence of the existence of the huge structure – only a black cube matrix centered on the spot where the extractor was supposed to be.

<effect>A Concrete Extractor has been destroyed by a Black Cube. An Anomaly has appeared on the site.
column3:
This event was unlike any malfunction predicted in the security protocols. Orbital scans on the site revealed no evidence of the existence of the huge structure – only a black cube matrix centered on the spot where the extractor was supposed to be.

<effect>A Concrete Extractor has been destroyed by a Black Cube. An Anomaly has appeared on the site.

column2: A Black Cube has led to the destruction of a Concrete Extractor. We should investigate the site with an Expedition.
column3: A Black Cube has led to the destruction of a Concrete Extractor. We should investigate the site with an Expedition.
column4: Jakaś czarna kostka spowodowała zniszczenie ekstraktora cementu. Musimy wysłać ekspedycję na miejsce katastrofy.

column2: Power of Three: A Black Cube Appears
column3: Power of Three: A Black Cube Appears
column4: Potęga trójki: Pojawia się czarna kostka

column2: A routine scan of the perimeter has detected an unidentified object within immediate proximity of the Colony. Data logs confirm it – it isn’t a glitch.
column3: A routine scan of the perimeter has detected an unidentified object within immediate proximity of the Colony. Data logs confirm it – it isn’t a glitch.
column4: Rutynowy skan okolicy wykrył jakiś niezidentyfikowany obiekt bardzo blisko kolonii. Rejestry danych potwierdzają - to nie jest zakłócenie.

column2:
The mysterious object appears to consist of pitch-black cubes arranged in a matrix. The cubes seemingly levitate above the ground without the aid of any support structure.

Preliminary image analysis remains inconclusive. An on-site investigation is required to assess the Anomaly. We advise caution.

<effect>A Black Cube has appeared seemingly out of nowhere. We have to investigate this Anomaly.
column3:
The mysterious object appears to consist of pitch-black cubes arranged in a matrix. The cubes seemingly levitate above the ground without the aid of any support structure.

Preliminary image analysis remains inconclusive. An on-site investigation is required to assess the Anomaly. We advise caution.

<effect>A Black Cube has appeared seemingly out of nowhere. We have to investigate this Anomaly.

column2: Power of Three: ...For, They Came in Numbers
column3: Power of Three: ...For, They Came in Numbers
column4: Potęga trójki: ...Albowiem liczba ich jest niezmierzona

column2: The mysterious cubes continue to appear across the colony. Mission Control advises all personnel to remain calm and stick to protocol.
column3: The mysterious cubes continue to appear across the colony. Mission Control advises all personnel to remain calm and stick to protocol.
column4: Tajemnicze sześcienne struktury nadal pojawiają się w różnych miejscach kolonii. Dowództwo zaleca całemu personelowi zachowanie spokoju i normalne pełnienie obowiązków.

column2:
The cube structures tend to emerge without warning, as unscientific as it may sound, out of thin air. Apart from their evident presence, so far the structures pose no threat to the Colony.

Until further investigation, the scientific board of Mission Control has decided to impose an information blackout on the matter to prevent the spread of panic and fear among the Colonists.
column3:
The cube structures tend to emerge without warning, as unscientific as it may sound, out of thin air. Apart from their evident presence, so far the structures pose no threat to the Colony.

Until further investigation, the scientific board of Mission Control has decided to impose an information blackout on the matter to prevent the spread of panic and fear among the Colonists.

column2: There is a certain sense of urgency to this, it seems.
column3: There is a certain sense of urgency to this, it seems.
column4: Zdaje się, że jest w tym coś naglącego.

column2: More than a hundred cubes have appeared. Their purpose and origin are still unknown.
column3: More than a hundred cubes have appeared. Their purpose and origin are still unknown.
column4: Pojawiło się już ponad sto kostek. Ich cel i pochodzenie pozostają nieznane.

column2: Power of Three: Making Sense of the Unknown
column3: Power of Three: Making Sense of the Unknown

column2: We can’t hide the truth from the public, not when the Colony’s being swarmed by black cubes.
column3: We can’t hide the truth from the public, not when the Colony’s being swarmed by black cubes.
column4: Całą kolonię opadł rój czarnych kostek i nie da się już utrzymać tego w tajemnicy przed ludźmi.

column2:
Without any credible explanation, the Colony was soon flooded with various rumors and interpretations of the mystery. What if they're bombs? Billions of tiny bombs? Or transport capsules maybe, with a mini robot inside. Or deadly hard drives. Or alien eggs? Or messages needing decoding. Or they're all parts of a bigger whole. Jigsaw puzzles that need to be put together.

The team at Mission Control is against trying to spread further misinformation and propaganda – partially because it would just add to the total confusion, but mainly because it would endanger the philosophical principles of our mission. We could only trust in our Colonists and hope for the best.
column3:
Without any credible explanation, the Colony was soon flooded with various rumors and interpretations of the mystery. What if they're bombs? Billions of tiny bombs? Or transport capsules maybe, with a mini robot inside. Or deadly hard drives. Or alien eggs? Or messages needing decoding. Or they're all parts of a bigger whole. Jigsaw puzzles that need to be put together.

The team at Mission Control is against trying to spread further misinformation and propaganda – partially because it would just add to the total confusion, but mainly because it would endanger the philosophical principles of our mission. We could only trust in our Colonists and hope for the best.

column2: We have to come up with something better.
column3: We have to come up with something better.

column2: On-site analysis of the unidentified structure only deepens the mystery. The evidence suggests that the cubes are clearly not a natural phenomenon.
column3: On-site analysis of the unidentified structure only deepens the mystery. The evidence suggests that the cubes are clearly not a natural phenomenon.
column4: Terenowa analiza niezidentyfikowanego obiektu jedynie zamąciła całą tajemnicę. Dowody sugerują, że kostki nie są żadnym zjawiskiem naturalnym.

column2:
The insides of the cubes as well as the physical forces behind their levitation remain an enigma. Individual cubes as well as their combined structure retain a perfect symmetry and any attempts to physically disturb their positions have failed.

What is even more puzzling is the analysis of the photonic spectroscopy of the cubes. They seem to emanate radiation of an unknown wavelength which excites the separation of electrons inside of the spectroscopic lens. While our science team refuses to jump to any conclusions, the Chief Engineer suggests that we should study the effect empirically on the Colony’s Solar Panels.

The science team requested permission to commence experimental research on the cubes' properties.

<effect>New research on the mystery of the Black Cubes is now available
column3:
The insides of the cubes as well as the physical forces behind their levitation remain an enigma. Individual cubes as well as their combined structure retain a perfect symmetry and any attempts to physically disturb their positions have failed.

What is even more puzzling is the analysis of the photonic spectroscopy of the cubes. They seem to emanate radiation of an unknown wavelength which excites the separation of electrons inside of the spectroscopic lens. While our science team refuses to jump to any conclusions, the Chief Engineer suggests that we should study the effect empirically on the Colony’s Solar Panels.

The science team requested permission to commence experimental research on the cubes' properties.

<effect>New research on the mystery of the Black Cubes is now available

column2: We should rearrange our research priorities.
column3: We should rearrange our research priorities.

column2: Primary analysis of the Black Cubes revealed no conclusive answers. The cubes may somehow affect our Solar Panels. New Breakthrough research is now available.
column3: Primary analysis of the Black Cubes revealed no conclusive answers. The cubes may somehow affect our Solar Panels. New Breakthrough research is now available.
column4: Podstawowa analiza czarnych kostek nie dała żadnych jednoznacznych odpowiedzi. Kostki mogą w jakiś sposób wpływać na nasze panele słoneczne. Dostępne jest nowe przełomowe badanie naukowe.

column2: Recent orbital scans revealed a sudden surge of energy on site. It’s now evident that the cubes pose a far greater threat than blocking our infrastructure plans.
column3: Recent orbital scans revealed a sudden surge of energy on site. It’s now evident that the cubes pose a far greater threat than blocking our infrastructure plans.
column4: Niedawne skany orbitalne ujawniły nagły skok energii w miejscu zdarzenia. Stało się oczywiste, że kostki zagrażają nam o wiele bardziej niż tylko zakłócając nasze plany zagospodarowania przestrzennego.

column2:
It appears the Black Cubes materialized inside the Extractor. We could only guess what happened to the building.

It seems any of the artifacts could materialize inside a structure, sending it into oblivion. We are now facing the potential threat of future human casualties.

Mission Control advises a top priority on the investigation of the disaster.

<effect>More buildings could collapse in the future. Preventive research is now available.
column3:
It appears the Black Cubes materialized inside the Extractor. We could only guess what happened to the building.

It seems any of the artifacts could materialize inside a structure, sending it into oblivion. We are now facing the potential threat of future human casualties.

Mission Control advises a top priority on the investigation of the disaster.

<effect>More buildings could collapse in the future. Preventive research is now available.

column2: A potential solution! This is great news.
column3: A potential solution! This is great news.

column2: We confirmed that the Extractor was destroyed by the Black Cubes. New preventive research is now available.
column3: We confirmed that the Extractor was destroyed by the Black Cubes. New preventive research is now available.
column4: Potwierdziliśmy, że ekstraktor został zniszczony przez czarne kostki. Dostępne są nowe zapobiegawcze badania naukowe.

column2: Power of Three: A Time For Speculation
column3: Power of Three: A Time For Speculation

column2: The latest research confirms that the cubes seem to be interfacing with each other. Almost like they’re forming some kind of device.
column3: The latest research confirms that the cubes seem to be interfacing with each other. Almost like they’re forming some kind of device.
column4: Najnowsze badania potwierdzają, że kostki w jakiś sposób łączą się ze sobą, zupełnie jakby tworzyły jakieś urządzenie!

column2:
The science team is divided in two camps: those who speculate it will amplify the cube signals allowing them to transmit through the reaches of space, and those who believe it could be some kind of weapon meant for destruction, not communication.

Outside the labs however, the cult of the Cubes has gained even more momentum. People are gathering to wait for what they think would be the coming of God to humanity’s second home.
column3:
The science team is divided in two camps: those who speculate it will amplify the cube signals allowing them to transmit through the reaches of space, and those who believe it could be some kind of weapon meant for destruction, not communication.

Outside the labs however, the cult of the Cubes has gained even more momentum. People are gathering to wait for what they think would be the coming of God to humanity’s second home.

column2: A culmination seems to be imminent, that’s for certain.
column3: A culmination seems to be imminent, that’s for certain.
column4: Punkt kulminacyjny jest coraz bliżej, to nie ulega wątpliwości.

column2: Power of Three: Solace in Science
We’ve applied the scientific method in every possible way to no avail. Time to try something else.
column3: We’ve applied the scientific method in every possible way to no avail. Time to try something else.
column4: Po bezowocnym zastosowaniu wszystkich możliwych metod naukowych przyszła pora na metody nienaukowe.

column2:
In a moment of brilliance, or possibly desperation, one of the physicists proposed they should try to crack open the structures.

The scientists moved the cube matrix inside a non-baryonic shell and proceeded to bombard a single cube with high-energy ions, a process known as sputtering. The results were immediate – the shell of the cube gave in, resulting in its rapid decomposition. The matrix itself reacted to the influence by rearranging itself into a solid structure made of the remaining cubes.

Though we have no explanation for the process, at least we have a way to deal with the cube matrices popping up everywhere. It appears that the exact solution rests on our reason and moderation.

<effect>Cubes can be stored in special sites or destroyed
column3:

The matrix itself reacted to the influence by rearranging itself into a solid structure made of the remaining cubes.

Though we have no explanation for the process, at least we have a way to deal with the cube matrices popping up everywhere. It appears that the exact solution rests on our reason and moderation.

<effect>Cubes can be stored in special sites or destroyed

column2: Piece by piece, we will unravel this enigma.
column3: Мы разгадаем гэту таямніцу частку за часткай.
column4: Rozwiążemy tę zagadkę krok po kroku.

column2: Dark Spectrometry research completed. We can now store and destroy the cubes.
column3: Дасьледаваньне цёмнай спэктраметрыі завершана. Цяпер мы можам захоўваць і зьнішчаць кубы.
column4: Ukończono badania ciemnej spektrometrii. Możemy teraz składować kostki w specjalnych miejscach lub je niszczyć.

column2: Power of Three: Embracing the Unknown
The mystery of the black cubes has consumed our Colonists completely. The reactions are as numerous as they are varied.
column3: Таямніца чорных кубоў цалкам паглынула нашых каляністаў. Рэакцыі шматлікія й разнастайныя.
column4: Zagadka czarnych kostek stała się prawdziwą obsesją kolonistów, wywołując najróżniejsze reakcje.

column2:
The Colonists have divided into factions centered around a certain hypothesis about the nature and purpose of the mysterious artifacts.

The excitement about the cubes is evident from the schedules of the weekly hearings in the Colony. The trivial themes such as the quality of the food and the requests for additional scientific funding had completely disappeared, replaced by requests for publicity for each faction’s viewpoint.

So far, there are three major camps. The moderate skeptics argue that the truth is hardly within our reach and cubes need to be preserved and stored for further research. The pessimistic ones insist on the destruction of all the cubes, seeing them as a deliberate threat. Then, there are those who hold the firm belief that the cubes are meant to be a gift to humanity from some unknown benevolent entity. They request the cubes to be transported inside the Domes and put on display for everyone to see.

<effect>Decoration Buildings made out of cubes can be constructed.
column3:
The Colonists have divided into factions centered around a certain hypothesis about the nature and purpose of the mysterious artifacts.

The pessimistic ones insist on the destruction of all the cubes, seeing them as a deliberate threat. Then, there are those who hold the firm belief that the cubes are meant to be a gift to humanity from some unknown benevolent entity. They request the cubes to be transported inside the Domes and put on display for everyone to see.

<effect>Decoration Buildings made out of cubes can be constructed.

column2: A gift or a Trojan horse, I wonder...
column3: Дзіўна... Ці падарунак, ці траянскі конь
column4: Ciekawe, czy to dar, czy koń trojański...

column2: Decorations can be created from the Black Cubes.
column3: З чорных кубоў можна ствараць ўпрыгажэньні.
column4: Można tworzyć dekoracje z czarnych kostek.

column2: We are attempting to make some sort of sense of the laws that govern the cubes’ behavior. But it’s like trying to find a needle in a haystack. In a pitch-black cave. While blindfolded.
column3: We are attempting to make some sort of sense of the laws that govern the cubes’ behavior. But it’s like trying to find a needle in a haystack. In a pitch-black cave. While blindfolded.
column4: Próba zrozumienia tajemniczych praw rządzących zachowaniami kostek przypomina szukanie czarnego kota w ciemnym pokoju... kiedy go tam nie ma.

column2:
Still, our scientists managed to define to some extent why the cubes sometimes materialize inside our buildings. It seems that some cryptic algorithm first sends a pulse of tachyons to the area where the cube will materialize. If the Cherenkov radiation measurements are within certain limits, the cube appears on the spot. Thus, the cubes avoid appearing inside rocks – indeed, none of our scans confirmed that any cube spawned inside of a high-density object.

Our structures tend to be much less dense than the monolithic Martian rocks. We can modify our sensor towers to create a fake Cherenkov Effect by bombarding the areas around our structures with particles which are harmless to our Colonists, but would still prevent the cubes from threatening our Colony.

<effect>Sensor Towers now protect nearby buildings from the Black Cubes
column3:

<effect>Вежы-сканэры now protect nearby buildings from the Black Cubes

column2: A small victory – our efforts continue.
column4: To małe zwycięstwo, ale nasze wysiłki nie ustają.

column2: S.H.E.P.I.D. research completed. Buildings within range of our Sensor Towers will be protected from the cubes.
column3: S.H.E.P.I.D. research completed. Buildings within range of our Вежы-сканэры will be protected from the cubes.
column4: Zakończono badania nad S.P.O.C.W. Budynki znajdujące się w zasięgu naszych wieżyczek detekcyjnych będą chronione przed kostkami.

column2: We should research the S.H.E.P.I.D. technology to protect the Colony structures from the Black Cubes.
column3: We should research the S.H.E.P.I.D. technology to protect the Colony structures from the Black Cubes.
column4: Powinniśmy opracować technologię S.P.O.C.W., aby ochronić konstrukcje naszej kolonii przed czarnymi kostkami.

column2: All cubes on Mars have started to pulsate, counting towards an unknown event.
column3: All cubes on Mars have started to pulsate, counting towards an unknown event.
column4: Wszystkie kostki na Marsie zaczęły pulsować, odliczając czas do nieznanego wydarzenia.

column2: Within the hour all the cubes across the Colony started emitting light pulses, sending a wave of panic across the Colony. Even here at Mission Control we found it hard not to worry.
column3: Within the hour all the cubes across the Colony started emitting light pulses, sending a wave of panic across the Colony. Even here at Mission Control we found it hard not to worry.
column4: W ciągu godziny wszystkie kostki w całej kolonii zaczęły emitować impulsy świetlne, powodując falę paniki wśród ludzi. Nawet nam w Dowództwie trudno się nie martwić.

column2:
The photovoltaic effect we observed earlier has completely disappeared. To make things worse, numerous glitches in the drone command software have our technicians scattering to extinguish fires all across the board. It seems that the pulses from the cubes are somehow interfering with the Drone uplink.

As reports are flowing in, we can clearly see a trend in the intensification of the light pulses. Is this some kind of countdown? And if so, to what?
column3:
The photovoltaic effect we observed earlier has completely disappeared. To make things worse, numerous glitches in the drone command software have our technicians scattering to extinguish fires all across the board. It seems that the pulses from the cubes are somehow interfering with the Drone uplink.

As reports are flowing in, we can clearly see a trend in the intensification of the light pulses. Is this some kind of countdown? And if so, to what?

column2: Just colonizing a new world isn’t interesting enough, it seems.
column3: Just colonizing a new world isn’t interesting enough, it seems.
column4: Zdaje się, że samo skolonizowanie nowego świata było za mało interesujące.

column2: Power of Three: Of Mice & Men
Our Colonists want decisive action in dealing with the cubes.
column3: Нашы каляністы хочуць рашучых дзеяньняў у дачыненьні да кубоў.
column4: Nasi koloniści żądają zdecydowanych działań w kwestii kostek!

column2: Some of them call for the immediate destruction of all the cubes while others still insist on storing and studying them – as far away from the Domes as possible. And yet, the number of eccentrics worshiping the cubes and erecting monuments with them has grown even larger. Could the cubes be affecting us like they influenced our drones?
column3: Some of them call for the immediate destruction of all the cubes while others still insist on storing and studying them – as far away from the Domes as possible. And yet, the number of eccentrics worshiping the cubes and erecting monuments with them has grown even larger. Could the cubes be affecting us like they influenced our drones?
column4: Część ludzi zażyczyła sobie natychmiastowego zniszczenia wszystkich kostek, podczas gdy inni wciąż nalegają na to, aby je zachować i zbadać - ale jak najdalej od kopuł. Natomiast liczba ekscentryków oddających cześć kostkom i wznoszących monumenty z kostek nawet wzrosła. Czyżby kostki wywierały na nas jakiś wpływ, tak jak na nasze drony?

column2: Looks like we're fighting the cubes for the control of our drones. And we are losing that battle.
column3: Looks like we're fighting the cubes for the control of our drones. And we are losing that battle.
column4: Zdaje się, że walczymy z kostkami o kontrolę nad naszymi dronami. I przegrywamy.

column2:
Between their usual command cycles, the drones have begun carrying cubes to a specific location and seem to be constructing a strange structure.

Diagnostics on the drone software and hardware reveal no clues for any reprogramming. All of our attempts to gather information about the purpose of this operation have failed.

Mission Control advises all personnel to brace for the unknown.

<effect>Some Drones are constructing a mystery building with the cubes.
column3:
Between their usual command cycles, the drones have begun carrying cubes to a specific location and seem to be constructing a strange structure.

Diagnostics on the drone software and hardware reveal no clues for any reprogramming. All of our attempts to gather information about the purpose of this operation have failed.

Mission Control advises all personnel to brace for the unknown.

<effect>Some Drones are constructing a mystery building with the cubes.

column2: At least our Drones aren't attacking us yet.
column3: Прынамсі нашыя дроны не атакуюць нас, пакуль.
column4: Przynajmniej drony jeszcze nas nie atakują.

column2: Affected Drones are building something of alien design.
column4: Drony, które uległy wpływowi kostek, budują jakąś obcą konstrukcję.

column2: Drones influenced by the cubes have started the construction of a Mega Monolith.
column3: Drones influenced by the cubes have started the construction of a Mega Monolith.
column4: Drony, które uległy wpływowi kostek, przystąpiły do budowy megamonolitu.

column2: Once completed, the monument emitted a pulse of all-encompassing energy and we all experienced a single collective dream! Or memory?
column3: Once completed, the monument emitted a pulse of all-encompassing energy and we all experienced a single collective dream! Or memory?
column4: Ukończony pomnik wyemitował impuls wszechogarniającej energii i wszystkich nas nawiedził jeden zbiorowy sen! A może to było wspomnienie?

column2:
Eons ago, while Earth was still a molten world, Mars had already been a teeming, living world covered by oceans and forests. This long-forgotten Mars was the home for a sentient race which quickly mastered their primitive urges and reached technological peaks yet to be conquered by humankind.

We witnessed the astonishing evolution of the Ancients and the countless metamorphoses they experienced until they reached a state of existence which allowed them to transcend the boundaries of the material form. Without worrying about resources or lifespan, they traversed the universe, leaving their home behind. But they have not forgotten it.

The robust Black Cubes lay in wait on the Red Planet for a meeting of the minds. Our actions here were detected by the semi-sentient algorithm which controlled the cubes and triggered the message left by the Ancients. Some of the accounts given by our personnel describe being talked to in a language both familiar and thoroughly alien, while others describe being shown images most vivid and influencing. Some would even account for experiencing a sort of judgment. The essence of the information was, however, without exception, the same.
column3:
Eons ago, while Earth was still a molten world, Mars had already been a teeming, living world covered by oceans and forests. This long-forgotten Mars was the home for a sentient race which quickly mastered their primitive urges and reached technological peaks yet to be conquered by humankind.

We witnessed the astonishing evolution of the Ancients and the countless metamorphoses they experienced until they reached a state of existence which allowed them to transcend the boundaries of the material form. Without worrying about resources or lifespan, they traversed the universe, leaving their home behind. But they have not forgotten it.

The robust Black Cubes lay in wait on the Red Planet for a meeting of the minds. Our actions here were detected by the semi-sentient algorithm which controlled the cubes and triggered the message left by the Ancients. Some of the accounts given by our personnel describe being talked to in a language both familiar and thoroughly alien, while others describe being shown images most vivid and influencing. Some would even account for experiencing a sort of judgment. The essence of the information was, however, without exception, the same.

column2: The Ancients were pleased to see we had reacted with restraint and curiosity, trying to understand the unknown phenomenon instead of fearing it.
column3: The Ancients were pleased to see we had reacted with restraint and curiosity, trying to understand the unknown phenomenon instead of fearing it.
column4: Pradawni z zadowoleniem przyjęli naszą powściągliwą reakcję, dążenie do zrozumienia nieznanego zjawiska zamiast powitania go strachem.

column2: Judging from their own history, they assume this was not necessarily an easy thing to do. They recall the fondest epochs of their history, where such strivings were predominant amongst them. Proud and nostalgic, they offer us a gift. Gained a new Technology,
column3: Judging from their own history, they assume this was not necessarily an easy thing to do. They recall the fondest epochs of their history, where such strivings were predominant amongst them. Proud and nostalgic, they offer us a gift. Gained a new Technology,

column2: We communed with the Ancients in our collective dream. They were impressed by our curiosity.
column3: We communed with the Ancients in our collective dream. They were impressed by our curiosity.
column4: Poprzez zbiorowy sen zjednoczyliśmy się z Pradawnymi. Nasza ciekawość im zaimponowała.

column2: The Ancients were set back by the hostile reaction we had towards their messengers – the cubes.
column3: The Ancients were set back by the hostile reaction we had towards their messengers – the cubes.
column4: Nasza wroga reakcja wobec ich posłańców – kostek – wywołała zniechęcenie Pradawnych.

column2: Ultimately they expressed understanding, noting that there were times in their own long history, dark times when they had the same hostile response towards the unknown. They hope that with time and maturity we will come to embrace the idea that while the universe is a dangerous place, not everything is a threat and there are also wonders to be discovered. All Black Cubes have disappeared Gained a new Technology,
column3: Ultimately they expressed understanding, noting that there were times in their own long history, dark times when they had the same hostile response towards the unknown. They hope that with time and maturity we will come to embrace the idea that while the universe is a dangerous place, not everything is a threat and there are also wonders to be discovered. All Black Cubes have disappeared Gained a new Technology,

column2: We communed with the Ancients in our collective dream. They were somewhat surprised by our hostility against the unknown.
column3: We communed with the Ancients in our collective dream. They were somewhat surprised by our hostility against the unknown.
column4: Poprzez zbiorowy sen zjednoczyliśmy się z Pradawnymi. Nasza wrogość wobec nieznanego trochę ich zaskoczyła.

column2: The Ancients were intrigued and quite surprised by our choice to indulge in creations of art with their cubes.
column3: The Ancients were intrigued and quite surprised by our choice to indulge in creations of art with their cubes.
column4: Pradawni byli zaintrygowani i dość zaskoczeni naszą decyzją o tworzeniu dzieł sztuki z ich kostek.

column2: Oblivious to the concept of higher powers, they seemed to see no other reason for our actions other than a pursuit of aesthetic decoration, one that seems to have eluded them as a possibility. Not quite sure what to make of this, they express hope we will retain our creativity as a race in the ages ahead. The monument collapsed into a pile of Black Cubes Gained a new Technology,
column3: Oblivious to the concept of higher powers, they seemed to see no other reason for our actions other than a pursuit of aesthetic decoration, one that seems to have eluded them as a possibility. Not quite sure what to make of this, they express hope we will retain our creativity as a race in the ages ahead. The monument collapsed into a pile of Black Cubes Gained a new Technology,

column2: It has been quite the ride.
column3: It has been quite the ride.

column2: We communed with the Ancients in a collective dream. They were impressed by our creativity.
column3: We communed with the Ancients in a collective dream. They were impressed by our creativity.
column4: Poprzez zbiorowy sen zjednoczyliśmy się z Pradawnymi. Nasza kreatywność im zaimponowała.

column2: Power of Three: Out of the Eons
column3: Power of Three: Out of the Eons
column4: Potęga trójki: Nie z naszych czasów

column2: The moment the last cube fit in the structure, we detected a single, intense beam of high-energy particles directed towards the cosmos. What could it mean?
column3: The moment the last cube fit in the structure, we detected a single, intense beam of high-energy particles directed towards the cosmos. What could it mean?
column4: W chwili, gdy ostatnia kostka trafiła na swoje miejsce w konstrukcji, wykryliśmy pojedynczą silną wiązkę wysokoenergetycznych cząstek, skierowaną w otchłań kosmosu. Co to może oznaczać?

column2:
Meanwhile, reports from all over the Colony indicate that all cubes have ceased their pulsating and reverted to their previous lifeless state. Many Colonists report to the medical facilities that they feel different states of depression – ranging from melancholy to outright despair. Could these events be attributed to the mysterious structure and the death of the cubes? We would never find out.

<effect>All Colonists suffer penalties to Morale.

Many Colonists report to the medical facilities that they feel different states of depression – ranging from melancholy to outright despair. Could these events be attributed to the mysterious structure and the death of the cubes? We would never find out.

column2: We didn't get to the bottom of the mystery of the Black Cubes. Perhaps more decisive action was needed.
column3: We didn't get to the bottom of the mystery of the Black Cubes. Perhaps more decisive action was needed.
column4: Nie rozgryźliśmy zagadki czarnych kostek. Być może potrzebne były bardziej zdecydowane działania.

column2: <red>The mystery of the Cubes remains unresolved</red>
column3: <red>The mystery of the Cubes remains unresolved</red>

column2: Power of Three: For the Generations to Witness
column3: Power of Three: For the Generations to Witness

column2:
It would be irresponsible to mismanage the situation and leave public opinion to sway back and forth on the matter.

With the current state of events we lack sufficient data to judge the purpose of the cubes. It could take years if not generations of scientific research to reach a conclusion on that subject. Until then, we will attempt to control the erratic spread of the cubes which hampers our resources and colonization operations by storing them away in a convenient manner.
column3:
It would be irresponsible to mismanage the situation and leave public opinion to sway back and forth on the matter.

With the current state of events we lack sufficient data to judge the purpose of the cubes. It could take years if not generations of scientific research to reach a conclusion on that subject. Until then, we will attempt to control the erratic spread of the cubes which hampers our resources and colonization operations by storing them away in a convenient manner.

column2: Only time will tell if we are right.
column3: Толькі час пакажа ці мае мы рацыю

column2: Power of Three: Might Makes Right
column4: Potęga trójki: Jak nie siłą, to młotkiem

column2: The primary goal of our mission is the permanent colonization of Mars. Any potential threat to humanity’s pioneers is to be eliminated.
column3: Галоўная мэта нашай місіі - калёнізацыя Марсу. Любая магчымая пагроза першапраходцам чалавецтву павінна быць ліквідавана.
column4: Głównym celem naszej misji jest trwała kolonizacja Marsa. Musimy zlikwidować każde możliwe zagrożenie dla ludzkich pionierów.

column2: We will attempt to remove all the cubes from our immediate area. A decision as serious as this required a consensus, which was reached through a vote at Mission Control. The public may deem this decision wrong, but we cannot place the fate of the entire Colony on our desire to wait it out. History had taught us that the inability to act often results in disaster. The destruction of cubes will proceed as planned.
column3: Мы паспрабуем пазбавіцца ад усіх кубоў з нашай тэрыторыі й побач. Такое сур'ёзнае рашэньне патрабавала згоджаньня, якое дасягнута ў выніку галасаваньня ў ЦКМ. Грамадства можа палічыць гэтае рашэньне памылковым, але мы не можам зьвязваць лёс усёй калёніі з жаданьнем яго чакаць. Гісторыя навучыла нас, што няздольнасьць дзейнічаць часта прыводзіць да катастрофы. Разбурэньне кубоў будзе ісьці як сплянавана.
column4: Spróbujemy usunąć kostki z terenu kolonii. Tak poważna decyzja wymaga ogólnej zgody, którą osiągnęliśmy przez głosowanie w Dowództwie. Opinia publiczna może uznać tę decyzję za błędną, ale nie możemy wystawiać na szwank losu całej kolonii tylko po to, by przeczekać kryzys. Historia nauczyła nas, że powstrzymywanie się od działania często prowadzi do katastrofy. Zniszczenie kostek nastąpi zgodnie z planem.

column2: Humanity will prevail, no matter the cost.
column4: Ludzkość będzie górą, niezależnie od kosztu.

column2: Power of Three: Cult of Tomorrow
The idea that we are not alone in the universe and could become part of a bigger whole has swept over the Colony.
column3: Ідэя, што мы не адны ў сусьвеце й можам стаць часткай большага й адзіннага ахапіла калёнію.
column4: Całą kolonię pochłonęła idea, że nie jesteśmy sami we Wszechświecie, a być może staniemy się elementem większej całości.

column2:
To disregard the desires of our Colonists would be a monstrous, autocratic act.

Mission Control has officially allowed the creation of a series of monuments dedicated to the Higher Truth proclaimed by some of our most active Colonists. We must look into ourselves and at our history as a species – denying the possibility that these people are right would mean that we are no better than the fanatics who burned visionaries at the pyres because of their beliefs.
column3:
Ігнараваць прагу нашых каляністаў было б жахлівым, аўтакратычным учынкам.

Камандаваньне афіцыйна дазволіла стварэньне сэрыі помнікаў, прысьвечаных Вышэйшай Ісьціне, абвешчанай некаторымі з нашых найбольш актыўных каляністаў. Мы павінны паглядзець на сябе й на сваю гісторыю як роду - адмаўленьне мажлівай рацыі гэтых людзей, азначала б, што мы не лепшыя за фанатыкаў, якія спальвалі празорцаў на вогнішчах з-за іх веру.

column2: It would be tyranny to forbid this.
The argument was that hindering the construction of the Mega-Monument would give us enough time to prepare for any possible risks. The argument was wrong.
column3: Довад, што перашкода будаўніцтву Мега-помніка дасьць нам дастаткова часу, каб падрыхтавацца да любых магчымых рызык, відавочна, быў памылковым.
column4: Szermowano dotąd argumentem, że utrudnienie budowy megamonumentu da nam czas, byśmy przygotowali się na możliwe zagrożenia. To nie był dobry argument.

column2:
The obscure algorithm or – perish the thought! - the intelligence directing the construction has commanded otherwise. Within mere hours, the super-structure dematerialized, decaying to its basic components, and reappeared, commanding our drones to proceed with its construction anew.

The creators of the structure definitely want us to finish their plan. The potential risk from yesterday has now become a tangible menace and I don't believe that anyone in the Colony lives under the illusion that it is avoidable.

<effect>All Colonists suffer Sanity loss due to the threatening behavior of the Mega-Monument Construction.
column3:
Незразумелы алгарытм ці... – згінь думка! - розум, кіраваўшы будаўніцтвам, загадаў інакш. На працягу ўсяго некалькіх гадзін супэрструктура зьнікла, распадаючыся на складнікі, і з'явілася ізноў, загадаўшы нашым дронам працягваць яе будаўніцтва нанова.

Стваральнікі канструкцыі безумоўна хочуць каб мы давялі іх плян да канца. Магчымая небясьпека ўчорашняга дню цяпер стала адчувальнай пагрозай, і я не веру, што хто-небудзь у калёніі жыве ў ілюзіі, што гэтага можна пазьбегнуць. 

<effect>Усе каляністы губляюць разважлівасьць з-за пагрозлівых паводзін будаўніцтву мэга-помніка.

column2: Ominous news. We must be ready for anything.
column3: Злавесныя навіны. Мы павінны быць падрыхтованы да ўсяго.
column4: To złowróżbne wieści. Musimy się przygotować na najgorsze.

column2: Meteors incoming from the Koronis asteroid cluster are about to intercept the Earth and Mars orbits.
column3: Метэоры, якія паступаюць ад кластару астэроідаў Караніса, зьбіраюцца перахапіць арбіты Зямлі й Марсу.
column4: Meteoryty z roju Koronidów wkrótce przetną orbitę Marsa i Ziemi.

column2: The Dredger that lands excavates something from the planet's surface. Sending an expedition crew to analyze this location will shed light on the Dredgers' behavior.
column3: Драгер, які прызямліўся, выкопвае нешта з паверхні плянеты. Адпраўка экіпажу экспэдыцыі для аналізу гэтага мейсцу пралье сьвятло на паводзіны Драгеру.
column4: Bagrownica, która wylądowała na powierzchni planety, a teraz coś wykopuje. Wysłanie ekspedycji, której celem będzie zbadanie miejsca wydarzenia, rzuci nieco światła na zachowanie bagrownicy.

column2: A Dredger excavated something at this position and then took off. Sending an expedition crew to analyze this location will shed light on the Dredger behavior.
column3: На гэтым мейсцы Драгер нешта раскапаў, а потым узьляцеў. Адпраўка экіпажу экспэдыцыі для аналізу гэтага мейсцу пралье сьвятло на паводзіны Драгеру.
column4: Bagrownica wykopała coś w miejscu swojego lądowania, a potem odleciała. Wysłanie ekspedycji, której celem będzie zbadanie miejsca wydarzenia, rzuci nieco światła na zachowanie bagrownicy.

column2: Send an expedition to observe and examine the landed Dredger to boost our Dredger Morhpology tech
column3: Адпраўце экспэдыцыю да агляду й дасьледваньня Драгеру, які прызямліўся, каб палепшыць тэхнолёгію Марфалёгія Драгераў
column4: Wyślij ekspedycję, której celem będzie obserwowanie i badanie bagrownicy, co przyspieszy badania technologii „Morfologia bagrownic”

column2: Mission Control, we’ve received the preliminary report from the landing site expedition. The RC Explorer is on-site, awaiting further orders.
column3: Камандаваньне, мы атрымалі папярэднюю справаздачу ад экспэдыцыі зь мейсцу пасадкі. РК Выведчык знаходзіцца на мейсцы й чакае на наступныя задачы.
column4: Dowództwo, otrzymaliśmy wstępny raport z ekspedycji na miejsce lądowania. Eksplorator sterowany czeka na dalsze polecenia.

column2:
From the spectroscopic data gathered from afar, we know that the object is covered in a robust crust of silicates and metal despite its organic appearance. The tentacle-like protrusions are inanimate and it seems they serve as support columns for the main structure. The operators reports no activity from the object except its continuous excavation – it is either inanimate or it pays no heed to our presence in the area.

The RC Explorer operator requests permission for close inspection on the object.
column3:
Са спэктраскапічных дадзеных, сабраных здалёк, мы ведаем, што аб'ект пакрыты трывалай карой зь сілікатаў і металу, нягледзячы на яго арганічны выгляд. Выступы, падобныя на шчупальцы, нежывыя і, здаецца, служаць апорнымі калонамі для галоўнай канструкцыі. Аператары не паведамляюць аб ніякай актыўнасьці з боку аб'екту, акрамя яго бесперапынных раскопак - ён альбо нежывы, альбо не зьвяртае ўвагі на нашу прысутнасьць у гэтым раёне.

Аператар РК Выведчыку запытвае дазвол на ўважлівы агляд аб'екту.

column2: Negative. The risk is too high.
The Explorer completed the close inspection of the Object without any major problems.
column3: Выведчык завяршыў пільны агляд аб'екту без асаблівых праблем.
column4: Eksplorator ukończył bliższe badanie obiektu bez problemów.

column2:
The rover ventured within mere meters of the Object and conducted a series of field tests and observations on it. We scanned it with radiological and spectroscopic equipment and extended a remote probe to its carapace, gathering tiny samples of its crust. Via its telescopic arm a camera and sonar were inserted within the Object, revealing a perplexing maze of cavities and corridors inside. A close inspection below the Object shows that it digs a hole beneath itself through a rotation of its frontal hull and extracts metal-rich ores, but its position above the ground level remains the same. The RC Explorer operators report no response from the Object during any of these operations.

The data we've gathered is already sent to our sponsor via encrypted transmission. We are sure the commission will value our efforts greatly.

<effect>You've gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding and <research(reg_param2)>.

<hint>The Object extracts resources from below the surface.
column3:
Марсаход наблізіўся на некалькі метраў да Аб'екту й правёў на ім серыю палявых выпрабаваньняў і назіраньняў. Мы адсканавалі яго з дапамогай радыялагічнагу й спэктраскапічнагу абсталяваньня й працягнулі дыстанцыйны зонд да яго панцыру, сабраўшы малюсенькія ўзоры яго кары. Праз яго тэлескапічную руку камера й гідралакатар былі ўстаўлены ўнутр аб'екту, адкрываючы заблытаны лабірынт паражнін і калідораў унутры. Пры ўважлівым разглядзе пад Аб'ектам бачна, што ён капае яму пад сабой дзякуючы кручэньню пярэдняй часткі корпусу й здабывае багатыя мэталамі руды, але яго становішча над узроўнем зямлі застаецца ранейшым. Аператары РК Выведчыку не паведамляюць аб адсутнасьці адказу ад аб'екту падчас любой з гэтых аперацый.

Дадзеныя, якія мы сабралі, ужо адпраўлены нашаму фундатару праз зашыфраваную перадачу. Мы ўпэўнены, што камісія высока ацэніць нашы намаганьні.

<effect>Вы атрымліваеце <funding(reg_param1)> фінансаваньня й <research(reg_param2)>.

<hint>Аб'ект здабывае рэсурсы з-пад паверхні.

column2: The Dredgers: The Belly of the Beast
We completed the close inspection of the Object, though the expedition rover’s malfunctions were a heavy price to pay.
column3: Мы завяршылі ўважлівы агляд Аб'екту, хаця няспраўнасьці экспэдыцыйнагу марсаходу прыйшліся дарагой цаной.
column4: Zakończyliśmy bliższe badanie obiektu, co kosztowało nas awarię łazika ekspedycyjnego.

column2:
The RC Explorer ventured within mere meters of the Object and conducted series of field tests and observations on it. The operators scanned the Object with radiological and spectroscopic equipment and extended a remote probe to its carapace, gathering tiny samples of its crust. When the RC Explorer approached the Object to perform closer interaction with it via the telescopic arms, the digging process of the Object caused a minor crust collapse and it nearly smashed the front of the rover’s hull. This didn't appear to be a deliberate attack but the damage is evident – it seems the Object possesses immense strength as well.

Despite our setbacks we gathered important data and have already sent it to our sponsor via encrypted transmission. We are sure the commission will value our efforts greatly.

<effect>You've gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding. The RC Explorer suffered a malfunction.

<hint>The Object extracted resources from below the surface.
column3:
РК Выведчык  наблізіўся на некалькі метраў да Аб'екту й правёў на ім серыю палявых выпрабаваньняў і назіраньняў. Аператары адсканавалі аб'ект з дапамогай радыялагічнагу й спэктраскапічнагу абсталяваньня й працягнулі дыстанцыйны зонд да яго панцыру, сабраўшы малюсенькія ўзоры яго кары. Калі РК Выведчык наблізіўся да аб'екту для бліжэйшага ўзаемадзеяньня з ім тэлескапічнымі рычагамі, працэс капаньня аб'екта прывёў да нязначнага калапсу кары, і ён ледзь не разбіў пярэднюю частку корпусу марсаходу. Здаецца, гэта не была наўмысная атака, але пашкоджаньні відавочныя - бачыцца, што Аб'ект таксама валодае велізарнай сілай.

Нягледзячы на нашы няўдачы, мы сабралі важныя дадзеныя й ўжо адправілі іх нашаму фундатару праз зашыфраваную перадачу. Мы ўпэўнены, што камісія высока ацэніць нашы намаганьні.

<effect>Вы атрымліваеце <funding(reg_param1)> фінансаваньня. РК Выведчык атрымаў няспраўнасьць.

<hint>Аб'ект здабывае рэсурсы з-пад паверхні.

column2: We knew the risks but it was worth it.
column3: Мы ведалі рызык, але яно таго вартае.

column2: We can try to inspect the Object more closely once we’ve properly evaluated the risks.
column3: Мы можам паспрабаваць аглядзець аб'ект больш уважліва, калі належным чынам зразумеем рызыку.
column4: Zapewne najlepiej będzie odłożyć bliższe badanie obiektu na czas, gdy poznamy już dokładniej możliwe zagrożenia.

column2:
The RC Explorer will be returning to base soon. Meanwhile, we will continue to gather visual and telemetry data on the object. The data we've gathered is already sent to our sponsor via encrypted transmission. We are sure the commission will value our efforts greatly.

<effect>You receive <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.

<hint>The Object extracted metals from below the surface.
column3:
РК Выведчык хутка вернецца на базу. Тым часам мы будзем працягваць збор візуальных і тэлеметрычных дадзеных аб'екту. Дадзеныя, якія мы сабралі, ужо адпраўлены нашаму фундатару праз зашыфраваную перадачу. Мы ўпэўнены, што камісія высока ацэніць нашы намаганьні.

<effect>Вы атрымліваеце <funding(reg_param1)> фінансаваньня.

<hint>Аб'ект здабываў мэталы з-пад паверхні.

column2: While the Object may have left Mars, it also left an indelible mark on our minds and on the face of the planet.
column3: Хаця аб'ект, магчыма, пакінуў Марс, ён таксама пакінуў незгладжальны след у нашай сьвядомасьці й на абліччы плянеты.
column4: Co prawda obiekt odleciał, ale jego obecność pozostawiła ślad w naszych umysłach, jak też na powierzchni planety.

column2:
The large hole left behind by the Object was the focus of the expedition, and the RC Explorer operators did their best to scavenge every bit of information left behind. With the help of the its telescopic arms and on-board spectroscopic equipment, the RC Explorer helped us find out that the hole was dug up on top of a subsurface resource deposit. The amount of discarded waste rock as well as the volume of the hole suggested that the Object sifted through the soil and took away only the usable bits. What the purpose of this was is unknown.

<hint>The Object extracted resources from below the surface and took off with them
column3:
Вялікая яма, выкапаная аб'ектам, была галоўнай мэтай нашай экспэдыцыі, і аператары РК Выведчыка зрабілі ўсё магчымае, каб сабраць кожную частку інфармацыі, якая засталася. Выкарыстоўваючы тэлескапічныя маніпулятары й бартавыя спэктраскопы, РК Выведчык дазволіў нам вызначыць, што адтуліна была выкапана над падземным радовішчам рэсурсаў. Колькасьць выкінутых пустой пароды, а таксама аб'ём адтуліны сьведчаць аб тым, што аб'ект прасейваў здабытую руду й браў з сабой толькі карысную частку. Але з якой мэтай ён гэта зрабіў - невядома. 

<hint> Аб'ект здабыў рэсурсы з-пад паверхні плянеты й уляцеў з імі.

column2: This only makes the mystery deeper.
Mission Control, we’ve got our first detailed analysis of a landed Dredger.
column3: Камандаваньне, у нас ёсьць першы дэталёвы аналіз Драгі.
column4: Dowództwo, mamy pierwszą szczegółową analizę bagrownicy.

column2:
The RC Explorer used molecular spectroscopy to scan the Rubidium-Strontium proportions on the outer shell of the Dredger and the results are astonishing! It seems that the outer shell of the Dredger is extremely new, as if it has been created years ago!

Some of our scientists proposed that the Dredgers must originate from our Solar System, unless they can traverse immense distances in a flash.

<effect>The Dredger Morphology technology cost is reduced by 50%.
column3: РК Выведчык спэктраскапічна дасьледаваў прапорцыі рубідыя й стронцыю ў вонкавым пакрыцьці Драгі й атрымаў дзіўныя вынікі! Абалонка Драгі выглядае зусім новай, быццам зроблена не больш за некалькі гад таму! Некаторыя з нашых навукоўцаў мяркуюць, што Драгеры павінны паходзіць з Сонечнай сістэмы, калі толькі яны ня могуць пераадольваць велізарныя адлегласбці ў імгненьне воку. Кошт тэнолёгіі Марфалёгія драгераў зьніжана на 50%.

column2: If this is true, how could we have missed them for so long?
column3: Калі гэта праўда, чаму мы не заўважылі іх раней?
column4: Jeśli to prawda, to dlaczego nie zauważyliśmy ich wcześniej?

column2: Mission Control, we’ve got RC Explorer operators reporting in from the Dredger analysis site.
column3: Камандаваньне, аператары РК Выведчыка адпраўляюць справаздачу зь мейсца абследаваньня Драгі.
column4: Dowództwo, operatorzy eksploratora sterowanego przesyłają raport z miejsca badania bagrownicy.

column2:
The expedition leader took the initiative to make physical contact with the landed Dredger. Risking it, he ordered the RC Explorer to approach the imposing alien object with a sampling tool and scrape off a portion of its outer hull, nervously anticipating a hostile reaction. The Dredger did nothing, so the RC Explorer ventured closer to it, taking more samples of its hull and probing its insides with various scanning equipment.

It is now evident that the outer shell of the Dredger consists of silicates and heavy inert metals with no traces of organic materials. The inner walls of the jet vents contain traces of burned alkaline metals. Some of our scientists propose that they are the fuel used to propel the Dredger during flight and take-off.

The object demonstrated no interest in the activities of the rover. The scientists speculate that it lacks any sort of sensors or processing power whatsoever.

<effect>The Dredger Morphology technology cost is reduced by 50%.
column3: Камандзір экспэдыцыі рызыкнуў уступіць у фізічны кантакт з Драгай. Грызаючы пазногці ў чаканьні варожай рэакцыі, ён загадаў РК Выведчык падысьці й саскрабці частку вонкавай абалонкі ўражлівага аб'екта з дапамогай зонду для ўзяцьця проб. Аднак Драга нічога не зрабіў, таму дасьледчык падышоў яшчэ бліжэй, узяўшы больш узораў і дасьледуючы ўнутранасьць аб'екта розным сканавальным абсталяваньнем. Цяпер відавочна, што зьнешняя абалонка Драгі складаецца зь сілікатаў і нерэактыўных цяжкіх мэталаў, без адбіткаў арганічных рэчываў. Унутраныя сьценкі вентыляцыйных каналаў ўтрымліваюць адбіткі гарэлых шчолачных мэталаў; некаторыя з нашых навукоўцаў мяркуюць, што яны былі палівам, якое выкарыстоўвалася Драгай падчас узлёту, пасадкі й палёту. Аб'ект не праявіў цікавасьці да дзейнасьці марсаходу. Навукоўцы мяркуюць, што ў яго няма датчыкаў і вылічальнай магутнасьці. Кошт тэнолёгіі Марфалёгія драгераў зьніжана на 50%.

column2: So we are talking about a machine or a very primitive organism? Maybe both?
column3: Дык гэта машына ці вельмі прымітыўны жывы арганізм? А можа, абодва?
column4: Chodzi zatem o maszynę czy bardzo prymitywny organizm żywy? A może o jedno i drugie?

column2: An RC Explorer has just completed analyzing a Dredger.

After our operators made their brave approach and even touched the previous Dredger, no one feels intimidated by the large alien landers. The RC Explorer operators have even begun nicknaming the Dredgers with cute names such as Big Betty. While this raises the morale of the Colony, the scientists are excited to work with the large inflow of samples and data.

<effect>The Dredger Morphology technology cost is reduced by 50%.
column3: Пасьля таго, як нашым аператарам удалося наблізіцца да папярэдняй Драгі й нават дакрануцца да яго, ніхто больш не адчувае страху пры выглядзе гэтых буйных Драгераў. Аператары РК Выведчыка нават даюць Драгам хатнія назвы, напрыклад, «Вужык-жужык». Гэта добра для маральнага духу калёніі, і навукоўцы з захапленнем паглыбляюцца ў багаты паток узораў і інфармацыі. Кошт тэнолёгіі Марфалёгія драгераў зьніжана на 50%.

column2: Name one Cthulhu just for me, OK?
column3: Назавіце аднаго "Ктулху", па маёй асабістай просьбе, добра?
column4: Nazwijcie jedną „Cthulhu”, na moją prywatną prośbę, OK?

column2: Our science team is busy with the scant remains of the destroyed Dredger.
column3: Навуковы аддзел вельмі заняты дасьледаваньнем рэшткаў разбуранай Драгі.
column4: Dział naukowy jest bardzo zajęty badaniem szczątków zniszczonej bagrownicy.

column2:
The spectacular explosion revealed that the Dredger lacks mechanical components, its warped internal components resembling organs more than devices. The mysteries behind such a technology have already inspired some of our greatest minds. The Head Scientist called this the project of the century and one can clearly hear the excitement in his voice.

<effect>The Dredger Wavelength Decoding technology cost is reduced by 50%.
column3:
Эфэктны выбух высьвятліў, што ў Драгера жадных механічных кампанентаў. Ягоны ўнутраны склад больш нагадвае органы за прылады. Таямніцы такой тэхнолёгіі ўжо натхнілі некаторых з нашых найвялікшых розумаў. Галоўны вучоны назваў гэты праэкт стагоддзя й у яго голасе добра чуваць хваляваньне.

<effect>Тэхнолёгія дакэдаваньня перадач Драгераў зьніжана на 50%.

column2: An RC Explorer just brought in materials salvaged from another destroyed Dredger.
column3: РК Выведчык прывёз матэрыялы сабраныя з зьнішчанага Драгера.
column4: Eksplorator sterowany przywiózł właśnie szczątki kolejnej zniszczonej bagrownicy.

column2:
More samples would allow our scientists to apply more aggressive experimentation and analytical methods, speeding up their work immensely.

<effect>The Dredger Wavelength Decoding technology cost is reduced by 50%.
column3:
Больш узораў дазволіць нашым навукоўцам выкарыстоўваць больш агрэсыўныя дасьледваньні й мэтады аналізу для спрытнай працы.

<effect>Тэхнолёгія дакэдаваньня перадач Драгераў зьніжана на 50%.

column2: Mission Control, we’re receiving a priority transmission from Earth.
column3: Камандаваньне, зь Зямлі паступая прыярытэтная перадача.
column4: Dowództwo, odbieramy z Ziemi przekaz o najwyższym priorytecie.

column2:
Several hours ago, the LINEAR and CSS programs detected an incoming cluster of meteorites from the asteroid belt. Their trajectories are likely to converge with the Martian orbit. Meteor impacts are likely to intensify during the course of the next few weeks.

<effect>Expect several Meteor Storms to hit Mars in the next <text_param1> Sols.
column3:
Некалькі гадзін таму, LINEAR і CSS праграмы выявілі ўваходнае навала метэарытаў з поясу астэроідаў. Іх траекторыі, верагодна, збліжаюцца з арбітай Марсу. Верагодна, на працягу наступных некалькіх тыдняў падзеньне метэораў узмоцніцца.

<effect>Чакайце, што праз <text_param1> Солаў на Марс абрынуцца некалькі мэтэорных бур.

column2: All personnel – keep calm and watch for meteors.
column3: Усяму персаналу - захоўваць спакой і сачыць за мэтэорамі.
column4: Do wszystkich - zachować spokój i uważać na meteory.

column2: Mission Control, we’ve got an update on the status of the meteor storms. And it’s not looking good.
column3: Камандаваньне, мы атрымалі новую інфармацыю аб стане мэтэорных штормаў. Яно выглядае ня добра.
column4: Dowództwo, mamy aktualizację w kwestii burz meteorytowych. Wiadomości nie są dobre.

column2:
The initial evaluation of the situation with the meteor clusters had been miscalculated. The scientists from the near-Earth object detection programs predict that a significant amount of the meteorite stream would fill the space between Mars and Earth. While the thick atmosphere of our home world would protect it from eventual impacts, the threat level for any spacecraft will be past tolerable. To address the new situation, Earth Control has canceled all space flights until further notice.

<effect>Rockets will not arrive until the situation with the meteor impacts is resolved. Inbound rockets will still land on Mars.
column3:
Першпачатковая ацэнка сітуацыі з наваламі адбылася памылковай. Навокоўцы праграм выяўленьня калязямных аб'ектаў прагназуюць, што значная кольскасьць мэтэарытнага патоку запоўніць прастору паміж Марсам і Зямлёй. У той час як густая атмасфэра роднага сьвету абароніць яго ад мачымых удараў, але ўзровень пагрозы для ксьмічных ракет будзе недапушчальным. Да вырашэньня адбыўшыйся выпадак, Кіраваньне Зямлі адмяніла ўсе касьмічныя палёты да наступных паведамленьняў.

<effect>Ракеты не прыбудуць пакуль акізія з мэтэорамі не будзе вырашына. Ракеты ў палёце даляцяць да Марсу.

column2: We must maintain strict regulations over our supplies until then.
column3: Датуль мы павінны выконваць строгія правілы для нашых паставак.
column4: Musimy więc wprowadzić politykę oszczędzania zasobów.

column2: Severe meteor activity is preventing interplanetary travel. Rockets cannot be requested from Earth.
column3: Моцная метэорная актыўнасьць перашкаджае міжплянетнай сувязі. Ракеты нельга запытваць зь Зямлі.
column4: Duża aktywność meteorytowa uniemożliwia podróże międzyplanetarne. Nie można wzywać rakiet z Ziemi.

column2: All stations on red alert! Unidentified object on course for direct impact!
column3: Чырвоная трывога ва ўсіх станцыях! Непазнаны аб'ект на кірунку прамога ўдару!
column4: Uwaga, wszystkie stanowiska! Zbliża się niezidentyfikowany obiekt na kursie kolizyjnym!

column2:
Mission Control, our sensors are detecting a large object incoming at high velocity. Judging by the data from our telemetry, its mass and speed are great enough to cause major damage on the surface. It would be wise to evacuate the area around the projected point of impact.

We could be wrong, but our initial visual readings on the object show that it has an unconventional form for a meteorite. Strange protrusions can be observed from the back of the object. Could this be something different than a meteor?

<effect>A major impact is expected to happen somewhere on Mars.
column3:
Камандаваньне, нашы датчыкі выявілі вялікі аб'ект набліжаюшчыйся з вялікай хуткасьцю. Гледзячы на дадзеныя нашай тэлеметрыі, ягоная маса й хуткасьць дастаткова вяліка, каб сур'ёзна пашкодзіць паверхню. Было бы разумна эвакуіраваць тэрыторыю вакол меркаванага пункта удару.

Мы можам памыляцца, але нашы першыя паказаньні выгляду сведчаць, што ён мае нетрадыцыйную форму для мэтэора. З тыльнага боку аб'екта магчыма назіраць дзіўныя выступы. Ці можа гэта іншае за мэтэор?

<effect>Чакаецца сур'ёзны удар дзесьці па Марсу.

column2: Stay focused and don’t jump to conclusions.
column3: Stay focused and don’t jump to conclusions.
column4: Trzeba zachować spokój i nie wyciągać pochopnych wniosków.

column2: Planetfall. We finally get a visual on the target as the dust settles. No one at Mission Control can believe their eyes.
column3: Planetfall. We finally get a visual on the target as the dust settles. No one at Mission Control can believe their eyes.
column4: Obiekt dotarł do powierzchni planety. Pył opadł i możemy teraz obejrzeć obiekt, ale nikt w Dowództwie nie może uwierzyć własnym oczom.

column2: We haven't seen anything like it – and it doesn't look like something man made. I don't want to overstate things, but this could be a First Contact situation.
column3: We haven't seen anything like it – and it doesn't look like something man made. I don't want to overstate things, but this could be a First Contact situation.
column4: Czegoś takiego jeszcze nie widzieliśmy. To nie wygląda jak obiekt wykonany ręką człowieka. Nie chcę przesadzać, ale być może czeka nas pierwszy kontakt.

column2: Let’s see what we can see.
column3: Let’s see what we can see.

column2: Mission Control, you’re not going to believe this – we couldn’t either. Whatever this thing is, it’s not a meteor.
column3: Mission Control, you’re not going to believe this – we couldn’t either. Whatever this thing is, it’s not a meteor.
column4: Dowództwo? Nie dacie nam wiary - zresztą my też nie możemy w to uwierzyć. Ten obiekt zdecydowanie nie jest meteorytem.

column2:
The object hit the surface without decelerating. We expected it to burst into pieces from the force of impact, but it seems it possesses immense structural integrity. The most astonishing thing is that it has moving parts. From what we have observed so far, it seems that it is trying to burrow below the crust of the planet.

It is now or never to take a closer look – should the risk be worth it.

<effect>An Anomaly at the landing site is available for analysis.
column3:
The object hit the surface without decelerating. We expected it to burst into pieces from the force of impact, but it seems it possesses immense structural integrity. The most astonishing thing is that it has moving parts. From what we have observed so far, it seems that it is trying to burrow below the crust of the planet.

It is now or never to take a closer look – should the risk be worth it.

<effect>An Anomaly at the landing site is available for analysis.

column2: Maintain safe distance and stand by for further orders.
column3: Maintain safe distance and stand by for further orders.
column4: Zachować bezpieczną odległość i czekać na dalsze rozkazy.

column2: A mysterious alien object has landed on Mars and is excavating resources. We have to send an Expedition to investigate it on site.
column3: A mysterious alien object has landed on Mars and is excavating resources. We have to send an Expedition to investigate it on site.
column4: Tajemniczy obcy obiekt wylądował na Marsie i wydobywa surowce. Musimy wysłać ekspedycję, by zbadać go na miejscu.

column2: Mission Control, the unidentified object has left Martian airspace and is now heading towards the asteroid belt.
column3: Mission Control, the unidentified object has left Martian airspace and is now heading towards the asteroid belt.
column4: Dowództwo? Niezidentyfikowany obiekt opuścił przestrzeń powietrzną Marsa i kieruje się ku pasowi asteroid.

column2:
As abruptly as it came, the object took off and accelerated extremely quickly. Our initial predictions that it would dig itself deeper in the crust have proven wrong. Instead, from our observation on the landing site, we can conclude that a large amount of Martian soil had been removed and taken away. What the goal and the purpose of this operation was is unknown.

<effect>The object has taken off.
column3:
As abruptly as it came, the object took off and accelerated extremely quickly. Our initial predictions that it would dig itself deeper in the crust have proven wrong. Instead, from our observation on the landing site, we can conclude that a large amount of Martian soil had been removed and taken away. What the goal and the purpose of this operation was is unknown.

<effect>The object has taken off.

column2: Watch the skies – something tells me there will be more of this.
column3: Watch the skies – something tells me there will be more of this.
column4: Obserwujcie niebo - coś mi mówi, że przybędzie ich więcej.

column2: The mysterious alien codenamed Dredger has taken off.
column3: The mysterious alien codenamed Dredger has taken off.
column4: Tajemniczy obiekt, który nazwaliśmy bagrownicą, odleciał.

column2: The Dredgers: They Will Be Back
column3: The Dredgers: They Will Be Back

column2: Mission Control! We’ve detected another incoming object.
column3: Mission Control! We’ve detected another incoming object.

column2:
The similarities with the first Object are obvious, but we cannot confirm the identity on the new one. Our scientists speculate that it would land in another mineral rich region. Our sponsor suggests that we maintain visual contact with the Object but keep our distance as its intentions or its defensive capabilities are unknown.

Our sponsor’s contacts on Earth rifled through any data for a mission launched by another competitor on Earth, but from what we have seen so far it wouldn’t be far-fetched to suggest that these Objects are of extraterrestrial origin.

By the way, the sponsor HQ dubbed the Object Dredger and they require us to maintain coherency in our documentation by using the same call-sign.

<effect>A new Dredger is about to land on Mars.
column3:
The similarities with the first Object are obvious, but we cannot confirm the identity on the new one. Our scientists speculate that it would land in another mineral rich region. Our sponsor suggests that we maintain visual contact with the Object but keep our distance as its intentions or its defensive capabilities are unknown.

Our sponsor’s contacts on Earth rifled through any data for a mission launched by another competitor on Earth, but from what we have seen so far it wouldn’t be far-fetched to suggest that these Objects are of extraterrestrial origin.

By the way, the sponsor HQ dubbed the Object Dredger and they require us to maintain coherency in our documentation by using the same call-sign.

<effect>A new Dredger is about to land on Mars.

column2: Whatever they call it, it’s still our problem.
column3: Whatever they call it, it’s still our problem.
column4: Nieważne, jak to nazwą, i tak zostaje to na naszej głowie.

column2: More Dredgers continue to land on Mars in search of resources.
column3: More Dredgers continue to land on Mars in search of resources.
column4: Na Marsie ląduje więcej bagrownic, poszukując surowców.

column2: Mission Control, the ban on space flights has been lifted.
column3: Mission Control, the ban on space flights has been lifted.
column4: Dowództwo, zakaz lotów międzyplanetarnych został cofnięty.

column2:
This happened after our sponsor's council reviewed our report on the Dredgers. With the current development, we know that more and more Dredgers land on Mars to extract large amounts of subsurface metals which, combined with the ban on space flights, would endanger the future of the Colony. Our observations on the Dredgers' flight trajectories indicate that they are heading exclusively to Mars and that the threat for interplanetary vessels has lessened, which was confirmed by the CSS and LINEAR.

<effect>Rockets can travel between Mars and Earth once more.
column3:
This happened after our sponsor's council reviewed our report on the Dredgers. With the current development, we know that more and more Dredgers land on Mars to extract large amounts of subsurface metals which, combined with the ban on space flights, would endanger the future of the Colony. Our observations on the Dredgers' flight trajectories indicate that they are heading exclusively to Mars and that the threat for interplanetary vessels has lessened, which was confirmed by the CSS and LINEAR.

<effect>Rockets can travel between Mars and Earth once more.

column2: The ban on interplanetary flights was lifted. We can now request help from Earth.
column3: The ban on interplanetary flights was lifted. We can now request help from Earth.
column4: Zakaz lotów międzyplanetarnych został zniesiony. Możemy wezwać pomoc z Ziemi.

column2: Sol after Sol, our scientists worked their fingers to the bone trying to find a solution to our incoming Dredger problem. No such luck.
column3: Сол after Сол, our scientists worked their fingers to the bone trying to find a solution to our incoming Dredger problem. No such luck.
column4: Sol po solu nasi naukowcy ciężko pracowali, aby znaleźć rozwiązanie naszych problemów z nadlatującymi bagrownicami, ale na próżno.

column2:
The problem is the lack of information – so far, we know very little about the nature of the Dredgers. To us they appear as inscrutable as natural events were to our forefathers. The science team requests more data on the objects and, if possible, a closer inspection of several different targets.

<effect>New Research available: Dredger Morphology

<hint>You can boost your Technology Research rate by analyzing landed Dredgers.
column3:
The problem is the lack of information – so far, we know very little about the nature of the Dredgers. To us they appear as inscrutable as natural events were to our forefathers. The science team requests more data on the objects and, if possible, a closer inspection of several different targets.

<effect>New Research available: Dredger Morphology

<hint>You can boost your Technology Research rate by analyzing landed Dredgers.

column2: Scientists are working on a project to analyze the structure of the Dredgers. Expeditions near landed Dredgers will help their effort.
column3: Scientists are working on a project to analyze the structure of the Dredgers. Expeditions near landed Dredgers will help their effort.
column4: Naukowcy pracują nad projektem dotyczącym badania budowy bagrownic. Wysyłanie ekspedycji do bagrownic, które wylądowały na planecie, wspomoże ich wysiłek.

column2: Mission Control, we've got an incoming message from our sponsor. An encrypted one.
column3: Mission Control, we've got an incoming message from our sponsor. An encrypted one.
column4: Dowództwo? Otrzymaliśmy zakodowaną wiadomość od naszego sponsora.

column2: The council of our sponsor has authorized us to use force when dealing with the Dredgers. They put the future of the Colony as the utmost priority.
column3: The council of our sponsor has authorized us to use force when dealing with the Dredgers. They put the future of the Colony as the utmost priority.
column4: Rada nadzorcza naszego sponsora upoważniła nas do użycia siły w kontaktach z bagrownicami. Przyszłość kolonii jest najważniejsza.

column2: It’s comforting to know that our actions have political backing.
column3: It’s comforting to know that our actions have political backing.
column4: Dobrze wiedzieć, że nasze działania mają poparcie polityczne.

column2: A recent detailed analysis of the Dredgers revealed that they're sending signals towards the Koronis asteroid cluster.
column3: A recent detailed analysis of the Dredgers revealed that they're sending signals towards the Koronis asteroid cluster.
column4: Najnowsza analiza bagrownic wykryła, że emitują one jakieś sygnały w kierunku grupy asteroid Koronis.

column2:
This accidental discovery was made later rather than sooner, as the emissions are cleverly masked to resemble cosmic rays in their wavelength. It is apparent that the source of the landers is closer than we thought.

The science team immediately requested permission to “dissect” one of the Dredgers to get their hands on the mysterious device used to send these transmissions.

<effect>A new research is available – Dredger Wavelength Decoding.

<hint>Destroy Dredgers using Drones to reduce the cost of the technology.
column3:
This accidental discovery was made later rather than sooner, as the emissions are cleverly masked to resemble cosmic rays in their wavelength. It is apparent that the source of the landers is closer than we thought.

The science team immediately requested permission to “dissect” one of the Dredgers to get their hands on the mysterious device used to send these transmissions.

<effect>A new research is available – Dredger Wavelength Decoding.

<hint>Destroy Dredgers using Drones to reduce the cost of the technology.

column2: Time to stop whistling in the dark.
column3: Time to stop whistling in the dark.

column2: Scientists are working on a project to decode the communications used by the Dredgers. Expeditions to the locations of destroyed Dredgers will help their effort.
column3: Scientists are working on a project to decode the communications used by the Dredgers. Expeditions to the locations of destroyed Dredgers will help their effort.
column4: Naukowcy pracują nad rozszyfrowaniem przekazów wysyłanych przez bagrownice. Wysyłanie ekspedycji do zniszczonych bagrownic wspomoże ich wysiłek.

column2: The aliens didn't try to destroy our cities. Then again, they didn't try to contact us, either.
column3: The aliens didn't try to destroy our cities. Then again, they didn't try to contact us, either.
column4: No cóż, kosmici przybyli i nie zniszczyli naszych miast, ale nie próbowali się też z nami kontaktować.

column2:
Still, what started out as a single contact quickly grew into series of regular visits. Even when our “guests” are not blaster-toting gray men, they cause damage to our Colony in subtle and cruel ways. As more and more Dredgers continue to land on the surface, the future of the Colony could be threatened by the lack of sufficient metallic resources. It is a sad conclusion, but our first contact with alien life could turn into a race for survival.

Our scientists suggest that with the current rate of landings the amount of metals in our sector will be depleted within three years – and some of the most pessimistic of our colleagues believe that the trend is for the landings to become more frequent. This would be a terrible prospect.
column3:
Still, what started out as a single contact quickly grew into series of regular visits. Even when our “guests” are not blaster-toting gray men, they cause damage to our Colony in subtle and cruel ways. As more and more Dredgers continue to land on the surface, the future of the Colony could be threatened by the lack of sufficient metallic resources. It is a sad conclusion, but our first contact with alien life could turn into a race for survival.

Our scientists suggest that with the current rate of landings the amount of metals in our sector will be depleted within three years – and some of the most pessimistic of our colleagues believe that the trend is for the landings to become more frequent. This would be a terrible prospect.

column2: Arrange a team meeting – we have to work out a solution.
column3: Arrange a team meeting – we have to work out a solution.
column4: Zwołajcie zebranie - musimy wymyślić jakiś sposób.

column2: We've got another problem on the horizon. A potentially devastating one.
column3: We've got another problem on the horizon. A potentially devastating one.
column4: Na horyzoncie pojawił się kolejny problem o potencjalnie niszczycielskich skutkach.

column2:
A famous leaks site has just released leaked logs and reports from our Colony. They concentrate exclusively on the Dredgers and elaborate on the evidence that we have contacted an alien civilization.

Our sponsors were probably foolish enough to believe that a secret can remain hidden from the public in the Age of Information. The uproar is tremendous and the UN calls for an emergency press conference. The monitoring council of our sponsor was insistent on our participation in the event. It will be held via the interplanetary network. We’ll be the center of attention. The time-lag will give us fifteen minutes between questions to think of the best way to answer.

There is no reason to hide the truth now.
column3:
A famous leaks site has just released leaked logs and reports from our Colony. They concentrate exclusively on the Dredgers and elaborate on the evidence that we have contacted an alien civilization.

Our sponsors were probably foolish enough to believe that a secret can remain hidden from the public in the Age of Information. The uproar is tremendous and the UN calls for an emergency press conference. The monitoring council of our sponsor was insistent on our participation in the event. It will be held via the interplanetary network. We’ll be the center of attention. The time-lag will give us fifteen minutes between questions to think of the best way to answer.

There is no reason to hide the truth now.

column2: A hearing on the Dredgers matters and a press conference at the United Nations Assembly will be held soon.
column3: A hearing on the Dredgers matters and a press conference at the United Nations Assembly will be held soon.
