column4: Wkrótce odbędzie się publiczne przesłuchanie w związku z bagrownicami oraz konferencja prasowa w Zgromadzeniu Ogólnym Organizacji Narodów Zjednoczonych.

column2: The conference at the United Nations is about to begin. We’ll be transcribing the communication on the fly, give or take five minutes or so.
column3: The conference at the United Nations is about to begin. We’ll be transcribing the communication on the fly, give or take five minutes or so.
column4: Za chwilę rozpocznie się konferencja prasowa w ONZ. Zapewnimy bezpośrednią transkrypcję rozmów, z opóźnieniem plus-minus pięć do dziesięciu minut.

column2:
Mr. President; Mr. Secretary General; fellow delegates; ladies and gentlemen:

For many centuries, humans have speculated that, in the great expanse of the universe, there should be life. Humanity never dismissed their hope for contact and so, even before we could reach for the stars, we built machines to probe the space for signs of the existence of others. Until recently, our attempts were met with silence and we had to rely only on our unshakable belief. But today we have proof. We are not alone.

Allow me to introduce you to the Commander of Mars Alpha, our first Colony on the Red Planet, who will personally address your questions.
column3:
Mr. President; Mr. Secretary General; fellow delegates; ladies and gentlemen:

For many centuries, humans have speculated that, in the great expanse of the universe, there should be life. Humanity never dismissed their hope for contact and so, even before we could reach for the stars, we built machines to probe the space for signs of the existence of others. Until recently, our attempts were met with silence and we had to rely only on our unshakable belief. But today we have proof. We are not alone.

Allow me to introduce you to the Commander of Mars Alpha, our first Colony on the Red Planet, who will personally address your questions.

column2: We can’t speak to contact or conflict, but rather about unforeseen competition...
column3: We can’t speak to contact or conflict, but rather about unforeseen competition...
column4: Nie można tu mówić o kontakcie, ani o konflikcie - to raczej nieprzewidziana rywalizacja...

column2: To talk about making contact with a sentient race is rather premature...
column3: To talk about making contact with a sentient race is rather premature...
column4: Przedwcześnie byłoby mówić dziś o kontakcie...

column2: The Dredgers: Press Conference: The Race is On
column3: The Dredgers: Press Conference: The Race is On

column2: What we can confirm is that the automated vessels we encountered were of unknown origin.
column3: What we can confirm is that the automated vessels we encountered were of unknown origin.
column4: Możemy potwierdzić, że napotkaliśmy kilka zautomatyzowanych pojazdów nieznanego pochodzenia.

column2:
The vessels dismissed all of our attempts to communicate and proceeded with their only mission – to consume and transport resources from the surface of Mars. In another time we would address their activity with affectionate curiosity and excitement, but in the light of our current situation, this has caused great distress and concern in all personnel of Mars Alpha. Without bothering you with the tiresome technical details, the extraction and utilization of Martian resources is crucial to the success of Mars Alpha and our ability to settle in the Solar System.

Our Colony's safety and viability is our utmost priority. This is why I’ve personally supervised operations to deny the alien vessels the opportunity to extract and steal away the metal deposits crucial to our survival. I would ask those who might raise questions on the measure of our reaction – what do you call a neighbor who deliberately tries to stall your attempts to lead a better life?
column3:
The vessels dismissed all of our attempts to communicate and proceeded with their only mission – to consume and transport resources from the surface of Mars. In another time we would address their activity with affectionate curiosity and excitement, but in the light of our current situation, this has caused great distress and concern in all personnel of Mars Alpha. Without bothering you with the tiresome technical details, the extraction and utilization of Martian resources is crucial to the success of Mars Alpha and our ability to settle in the Solar System.

Our Colony's safety and viability is our utmost priority. This is why I’ve personally supervised operations to deny the alien vessels the opportunity to extract and steal away the metal deposits crucial to our survival. I would ask those who might raise questions on the measure of our reaction – what do you call a neighbor who deliberately tries to stall your attempts to lead a better life?

column2: The Dredgers: Press Conference: Contact Denied
column3: The Dredgers: Press Conference: Contact Denied

column2: Humanity’s imagination has always portrayed contact with an alien species as either a precursor to military conflict or a chance for peaceful exchange of culture and ideas.
column3: Humanity’s imagination has always portrayed contact with an alien species as either a precursor to military conflict or a chance for peaceful exchange of culture and ideas.
column4: Nasza wyobraźnia i dzieła fantastyczno-naukowe zawsze przedstawiały zakładany kontakt z obcym gatunkiem albo jako natychmiastowy konflikt, albo pokojową wymianę wiedzy i idei.

column2:
At their core of our expectations has always been a flawed assumption – that an alien race would be psychologically human.

The first contact, if one has the audacity to call it that way, was with a system of automated mining equipment. As disappointing as it may sound, the alien machines displayed an almost offensive disregard for our presence. So far they had followed their simple purpose – to extract resources from the surface of Mars. The nature and intentions of their creators remains a mystery and our best minds are working towards unveiling it.
column3:
At their core of our expectations has always been a flawed assumption – that an alien race would be psychologically human.

The first contact, if one has the audacity to call it that way, was with a system of automated mining equipment. As disappointing as it may sound, the alien machines displayed an almost offensive disregard for our presence. So far they had followed their simple purpose – to extract resources from the surface of Mars. The nature and intentions of their creators remains a mystery and our best minds are working towards unveiling it.

column2: The Dredgers: Press Conference - Hard Questions
After the applause dies down, the delegates proceed to question our sponsor’s committee as to the details of their encounter with the Dredgers.
column3: Па адпаведнай порцыі апладысьментаў дэлегаты пачалі распытваць наш камітэт фундатару пра сустрэчу з Драгерамі.
column4: Po stosownej dawce oklasków delegaci przystąpili do wypytywania komisji naszego sponsora o spotkanie z bagrownicami.

column2:
They handle most of the questions with ease and require little input from you. And then you are confronted with a direct question from one of the delegates.

“An anonymous yet reliable source disclosed to us that you ordered and succeeded in the deliberate destruction of at least one of the alien vessels. My country condemns any premature aggressive actions which could taint the reputation of humankind, especially when addressing such a delicate matter. What gave you the authority to act in such a risky manner without an official resolution from the Council of the United Nations?”
column3:
Члены камітэту зь лёгкасьцю вырашаюць большасьць пытаньняў і не патрабуюць ад вас асаблівага ўкладу. Пакуль вы нарэшце не атрымаеце прамое пытаньне ад аднаго з дэлегатаў.

«Ананімная, але надзейная крыніца паведаміла нам, што вы загадалі й пасьпяхова завяршылі зьнішчэньне як мінімум аднаго з іншаплянетных транспартных сродкаў. Мая краіна асуджае любыя заўчасныя агрэсіўныя дзеяньні, якія могуць запляміць рэпутацыю чалавецтва, асабліва ў такім далікатным пытаньні. Хто дазволіў вам дзейнічаць такім рызыкоўным чынам без афіцыйнай рэзалюцыі Рады бясьпекі ААН?»

column2: The prosperity of our Colony is our first and only concern...
column3: Наша адзіная задача - посьпех нашай калёніі...
column4: Naszym jedynym zadaniem jest powodzenie naszej kolonii...

column2: This is not an act of aggression but instead a step towards mutual understanding...
column3: Гэта не акт агрэсіі, а першы крок да разуменьня...
column4: To nie jest akt agresji, ale pierwszy krok ku porozumieniu...

column2: The Dredgers: Press Conference – United We Stand
column4: Bagrownice - Konferencja prasowa - w jedności siła

column2: Honorable delegates, we stand at the doorway to a new era, taking those first hesitant steps towards the stars beyond. Allowing fear and doubt to sway us from our path would fail not only Mars Alpha, but us as a species.
column3: Паважаныя дэлегаты, мы стаім на парозе новай эпохі. Мы толькі што зрабілі наш першы крок да зорак, і калі мы дазволім страху й сумневам прымусіць нас вярнуцца назад, мы падманем не толькі калонію Марса Альфа, але і ўсё чалавецтва.
column4: Szanowni delegaci, stoimy na progu nowej epoki. Właśnie uczyniliśmy pierwszy krok ku gwiazdom i jeśli pozwolimy, by strach i wątpliwości zmusiły nas do zawrócenia z tej drogi, zawiedziemy nie tylko kolonię Mars Alpha, ale i całą ludzkość.

column2:
For countless generations the human species had proven to possess the ability to adapt, survive and thrive. Let us not forget who we are.

The actions I ordered were not an act of war and aggression, but instead were means to secure the future of our initiative and fulfill a promise to all people on Earth. Dismantling several alien vessels is a fair price to pay for what's at stake today. And if the creators of these vessels see our actions as something more than doing the right thing, we will prove them wrong. For we do not desire to take what's not ours – we want to fulfill our destiny as a space-faring species.
column3:
На працягу незлічоных пакаленняў чалавечы рода дэманстраваў сваю здольнасьць адаптавацца, выжываць і квітнець. Давайце не забываць, хто мы ёсьць.

Дзеяньні, якія я загадаў, не былі актам вайны або агрэсіі, а толькі сродкам забесьбпячэньня прышласьці нашай ініцыятывы й выкананьня абяцаньня, якое мы далі ўсім людзям на Зямлі. Разбор некалькіх іншаплянетных машын - гэта справядлівая цана, улічваючы нашу стаўку. І калі стваральнікі гэтых машын думаюць, што мы робім нешта больш, чым проста робім правільныя рэчы, мы дакажам, што яны памыляюцца. Таму што мы ня хочам браць тое, што ня наша - мы хочам выканаць свой лёс, лёс роду, здольнага падарожнічаць па космасе.

column2:
You not only managed to persuade the public to support our efforts, but also inspired millions of people around the world who watched the live-stream.

Your influence will aid the Colony greatly.

<effect>The United Nations transferred resources to the Mars Alpha project. You've gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.
column3:
Вы не толькі здолелі пераканаць грамадскасьць падтрымаць вашы намаганьні, але й натхнілі мільёны людзей па ўсім сьвеце, якія глядзелі прамую трансьляцыю.

Ваш уплыў стане вялікай дапамогай для калёніі.

<effect>Арганізацыя Аб'яднаных Нацый ахвяравала рэсурсы на праэкт Марс Альфа. Вы атрымліваецце <funding(reg_param1)> фінансаваньня.

column2: I'm glad the UN understood the importance of our mission.
column3: Я рады, што ў ААН зразумелі важнасць нашай місіі.
column4: Cieszę się, że ONZ zrozumiała wagę naszej misji.

column2: The United Nations were persuaded to support the Colony with increased funding.
column3: Арганізацыю Аб'яднаных Нацый пераканалі падтрымаць калёнію дадатковым фінансаваньнем.
column4: Organizacja Narodów Zjednoczonych została przekonana do wsparcia kolonii dodatkowymi funduszami.

column2: Press Conference 2: A Bridge to Build

I would only take issue with half of the statement given by our honorable delegate. While we did indeed dismantle the vessel, I would hardly paint our intent as an expression of the darker side of human nature.
column3: Я толькі пацьвярджаю частку заявы, зробленай шаноўным дэлегатам - мы сапраўды разабралі іншаплянетны транспартны сродак, але нашы намеры былі далёкія ад цёмнага, разбуральнага боку чалавечай прыроды.
column4: Potwierdzam tylko część stwierdzenia szanownego delegata - istotnie rozmontowaliśmy pewien obcy pojazd, ale nasze intencje były dalekie od mroczniejszej, niszczycielskiej strony ludzkiej natury.

column2:
Our goal was to make sense of what's happening, of the nature of the alien vessels, which is one of the underlying principles of science.

Our efforts were not in vain. The greatest minds of Mars Alpha and Earth managed to make amazing progress. Dismantling the probe allowed us to make sense of the communications of the alien machines, maybe even the basis of the language of their creators, and not only that. The scientific knowledge we gained from this event will speed our way to the stars, where even more puzzling mysteries await those of us who have the bravery and integrity to face the unknown.
column3:
Нашай мэтай было ўцёміць што адбываецца й прыроду іншаплянетных апаратаў. Гэта адзін з асноўных прынцыпаў навукі.

Нашы намаганьні ня былі марнымі. Самыя яркія розумы праэкту Марс Альфа - і тыя, хто на Зямлі - дасягнулі дзіўнага прагрэсу. Разбор згаданага зонда дазволіў зразумець камунікацыю іншаплянетных машын, магчыма, нават асновы мовы іх стваральнікаў і шмат іншае. Навуковыя веды, якія мы атрымалі ў выніку гэтай дзейнасьці, паскораць наша падарожжа да зорак, дзе яшчэ больш дзіўныя загадкі чакаюць тых з нас, хто адважны й дастаткова рашучы, каб сутыкнуцца зь невядомым.

column2: The Dredgers: Press Conference – A Battle Well Fought
By the looks on the faces of the audience, your words have made a lasting mark.
column3: Вашы словы пакінулі незабыўнае ўражаньне на прысутных.
column4: Twoje słowa wywarły niezatarte wrażenie na słuchaczach.

column2:
You not only managed to persuade the public to support our efforts, but also inspired millions of people around the world who watched the live-stream.

Your influence will aid the Colony greatly.

<effect> Public opinion for Mars Alpha increased. Additional <reg_param1> Applicants are available.
column3:
Вы не толькі здолелі пераканаць грамадскасьць падтрымаць вашы намаганьні, але й натхнілі мільёны людзей па ўсім сьвеце, якія глядзелі прамую трансьляцыю.

Ваш уплыў стане вялікай дапамогай для калёніі.

<effect>Праект Марс Альфа выклікае шырокае захапленьне. Новыя <reg_param1> кандыдаты даступны.

column2: I feel like a rock star.
Millions of people on Earth were inspired by the press-conference and more and more Applicants are willing to colonize Mars.
column3: Прэс-канфэрэнцыя натхніла мільёны людзей на Зямлі. З'яўляюцца новыя кандыдаты для каланізацыі Марса.
column4: Miliony ludzi na Ziemi zainspirowały się konferencją prasową. Pojawiają się nowi ochotnicy do kolonizacji Marsa.

column2: Warning! We’ve got a red alert!

The scanners have gone crazy with the signatures of dozens of Dredgers heading our way. The Dredger transmissions repeat a signal we can interpret only as “urgency eat/dig”. On the screen they look like a swarm of locusts and we presume their goal is similar.
The mission sponsor has authorized a forceful response.

<effect>Multiple Dredgers detected! They will arrive within <text_param1> Sols.
column3:
Сканэры звар'яцелі - экраны ўсеяныя сігнатурамі дзясяткаў Драгераў, якія накіроўваюцца да нас. Паведамленьні ад земснарадаў паўтараюць адзін сігнал, які можна перавесьці толькі як «трэба капаць/есьці». На экране гэта падобна на зграю саранчы. Мы мяркуем, што ў іх падобная мэта.
Фундатар місіі дазволіў нам рэаргаваць сілай.

<effect>Выяўлена некалькі Драг! Яны прыбудуць праз <text_param1> Солаў.

column2: Multiple Dredgers are bound to land on Mars and harvest our resources!
column3: Шмат Драгераў плянуць сесьці на Марсе й здабыць нашы рэсурсы!
column4: W kierunku Marsa leci chmara bagrownic, aby wylądować i pożreć nasze surowce!

column2:
As sudden as they fell upon us, the alien vessels are taking off all at once. Our scientists are just starting to estimate the exact amount of precious resources that have been irreparably lost, but the preliminary reports are promising. We've survived!

Pleased with our performance, the monitoring council of our sponsor offered us their financial support as a stimulus.

<effect>You destroyed <reg_param1> Dredgers during the mass landing. Based on the Dredgers destroyed, the mission sponsor provided a bounty of <funding(reg_param2)> Funding.
column3:
Гэтак жа раптоўна, як яны абрынуліся на нас, іншаплянетныя караблі ўзлятаюць усе адразу. Нашы навукоўцы толькі пачынаюць падлічваць дакладную колькасьць каштоўных рэсурсаў, якія былі беззваротна страчаны, але папярэднія справаздачы шматабяцальны. Мы выжылі!

Задаволены нашымі посьпехамі, назіральная рада нашага фундатару прапанавала нам фінансавую падтрымку ў якасьці стымулу.

<effect>Вы зьнішчылі <reg_param1> Драгераў падчас масавай пасадкі. Улічваючы зьнішчаных Драгераў, фундатар місіі выдзяліў узнагароду ў памеры <funding(reg_param2)>.

column2: We’ll do it again if we have to!
column4: Zrobimy to ponownie, jeśli będziemy musieli!
Bagrownice - Ciemne niebo - odprawa po misji

column2: Mission Control, the Dredgers are retreating!

As sudden as they fell upon us, the alien vessels are taking off all at once. Our scientists estimate they extracted a significant amount of materials from below the surface. This is a serious threat to the viability of our Colony and the monitoring council of our sponsor took that in mind. They offered us a small sum as a disaster relief, but from the subtle remarks in their message we can tell they are not happy with the situation.

<effect>You've gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding as disaster relief.
column3:
As sudden as they fell upon us, the alien vessels are taking off all at once. Our scientists estimate they extracted a significant amount of materials from below the surface. This is a serious threat to the viability of our Colony and the monitoring council of our sponsor took that in mind. They offered us a small sum as a disaster relief, but from the subtle remarks in their message we can tell they are not happy with the situation.

<effect>You've gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding as disaster relief.

column2: We have survived the Dredger invasion. Teams are working on evaluating the damage.
column3: Мы перажылі нашэсьце Драгераў. Нашы тэхнічныя групы працуюць над ацэнкай шкоды.
column4: Przetrwaliśmy inwazję bagrownic. Zespoły techniczne pracują nad oceną szkód.

column2: Red alert! We have a massive object converging with Mars on a collision course!
column3: Чырвоная трывога! Гіганцкі аб'ект з'явіўся на курсе сутыкненьня з Марсам!
column4: Czerwony alarm! Pojawił się gigantyczny obiekt na kursie kolizyjnym z Marsem!

column2:
Our readings confirm that this is a Dredger, but its size... There is no mistake, unfortunately.

If we leave this massive Dredger unchecked, it could have a disastrous impact on our metal supply. On the other hand, our Tactical Advisor supposes that the arrival of this new Dredger may be caused by the threat our actions proved for the aliens' mining operations. At the end, the decision as to how we address the new situation was obvious.

Just when we thought we survived the worst...

<effect>A huge Dredger will land on Mars in <text_param1> Sols.

<hint>You can dismantle the incoming Dredger using Drones.
column3:
Our readings confirm that this is a Dredger, but its size... There is no mistake, unfortunately.

If we leave this massive Dredger unchecked, it could have a disastrous impact on our metal supply. On the other hand, our Tactical Advisor supposes that the arrival of this new Dredger may be caused by the threat our actions proved for the aliens' mining operations. At the end, the decision as to how we address the new situation was obvious.

Just when we thought we survived the worst...

<effect>A huge Dredger will land on Mars in <text_param1> Sols.

<hint>You can dismantle the incoming Dredger using Drones.

column2: A massive Dredger is inbound to land on Mars.
column4: Ogromna bagrownica kieruje się w stronę Marsa.

column2: The Dredgers – Conclusion: Fires of Tomorrow's Dawn
We all watched as the Dredger collapsed into a blazing inferno. A spectacular end. While some at Mission Control cheered, others simply stared, their concerns unvoiced.
column3: Усе назіраюць, як жахліва Драга распадаецца ў пякельным агні. Хтосьці ў камандзе рэагуе на гэты відовішчны канец воплескамі, хтосьці глядзіць на гэта моўчкі й заклапочана.
column4: Wszyscy patrzą, jak potworna bagrownica rozpada się w ogniach z piekła rodem. Część ludzi w Dowództwie reaguje na ten widowiskowy koniec wiwatami, inni patrzą nań milcząc, w zatroskaniu.

column2: The comm-feed from the dying Dredger report a singular message broadcast towards the Koronis cluster – “retreat”, “retreat”. Others may wonder, but you know deep inside that you beheaded the beast – the other Dredgers won't be coming back. Somehow you don't feel like the victor. You stand silent as you ask yourself one question – have you defeated a dangerous enemy or rebuffed a potential ally? Xeno-Extraction Technology is available for research with a 50% cost reduction. Gained a new technology,
column3: The comm-feed from the dying Dredger report a singular message broadcast towards the Koronis cluster – “retreat”, “retreat”. Others may wonder, but you know deep inside that you beheaded the beast – the other Dredgers won't be coming back. Somehow you don't feel like the victor. You stand silent as you ask yourself one question – have you defeated a dangerous enemy or rebuffed a potential ally? Ксэно-здабыча Technology is available for research with a 50% cost reduction. Gained a new technology,

column2: We have destroyed the massive Dredger and salvaged samples and information on its unique excavation methods – Xeno-Extraction Tech is now available. The alien vessels are gone forever.
column3: Мы зьнішчылі вялікую Драгу й атрымалі ўзоры й інфармацыю аб унікальных мэтадах здабычы Драг. Даступная тэхнолёгія «Ксэно-здабыча». Іншапланетныя машыны зьніклі назаўжды.
column4: Zniszczyliśmy wielką bagrownicę i zdobyliśmy próbki oraz informacje na temat unikatowych metod górniczych bagrownic. Dostępna jest technologia ksenoekstrakcji. Obce pojazdy znikły na zawsze.

column2: Standing in the shoulder-to-shoulder crush of Mission Control, the deep thrum of take-off is almost more felt than heard. It’s not long before the Dredger is a wink in the distance, massive payload and all.
column3: Глыбокі гул, які суправаджае ўзлёт, аказвае амаль адчувальнае ўздзеяньне на натоўп, які сабраўся ля Каманды. Нягледзячы на цяжкі груз, велізарна Драга хутка разганяецца й зьнікае з полю зроку.
column4: Głęboki huk towarzyszący startowi wywiera niemal namacalny wpływ na tłum zebrany w Dowództwie. Pomimo obciążenia wielkim ładunkiem ogromna bagrownica szybko przyspiesza i znika z naszych oczu.

column2: The cheerful chorus of the Dredger communications is too confusing to understand, but this is pointless as their behavior clearly marks their intentions. The visual feed on the Koronis cluster shows how thousands of bright dots light the sky as the swarm of Dredgers breaks its silence. The satellites track their movement as the swarm gathers around the massive Dredger and the alien vessels head towards the end of the Solar System. You failed to destroy the massive Dredger and the Colony will pay the price in the months to come, but maybe this is for the better. Maybe today humanity avoided retribution from the unknown creators of the Dredgers, or started on the path of cooperation, and maybe even friendship, when the next generations reach the stars. Xeno-Extraction Technology is available for research Gained a new technology,
column3: The cheerful chorus of the Dredger communications is too confusing to understand, but this is pointless as their behavior clearly marks their intentions. The visual feed on the Koronis cluster shows how thousands of bright dots light the sky as the swarm of Dredgers breaks its silence. The satellites track their movement as the swarm gathers around the massive Dredger and the alien vessels head towards the end of the Solar System. You failed to destroy the massive Dredger and the Colony will pay the price in the months to come, but maybe this is for the better. Maybe today humanity avoided retribution from the unknown creators of the Dredgers, or started on the path of cooperation, and maybe even friendship, when the next generations reach the stars. «Ксэно-здабыча» Technology is available for research Gained a new technology,

column2: The massive Dredger has taken off and converged with the alien fleet on a course leading far from the Solar System. They’ve left forever. We now have the Xeno-Extraction Tech project based on what we know about the Dredgers.
column3: Велізарна Драга адляцела й далучыўся да астатняй часткі іншапланетнага флёту, які затым узяў курс на ўскраіну Сонечнай сістэмы й пакінуў яе назаўжды. На аснове таго, што мы даведаліся пра земснарады, мы атрымалі доступ да тэхнолёгіі «Ксэно-здабыча».
column4: Ogromna bagrownica odleciała i połączyła się z resztą obcej floty, która obrała następnie kurs na rubieże Układu Słonecznego i opuściła go na zawsze. Na podstawie tego, co dowiedzieliśmy się o bagrownicach, uzyskaliśmy dostęp do projektu technologii ksenoekstrakcji.

column2: We’ve completed the final analysis of the Dredgers but, as is all too common with the mysteries we encounter, it raises more questions than it answers.
column3: Канчатковы аналіз Драг завершаны, але, як і ў выпадку з любой таямніцай, з якой сутыкаецца чалавецтва, адказ прыносіць новыя пытаньні.
column4: Końcowa analiza bagrownic została ukończona, ale tak jak w przypadku każdej tajemnicy, na jaką natknie się ludzkość, odpowiedź przynosi nowe pytania.

column2:
The scientists concluded that the organic appearance of the Dredgers is misleading. Even though their robust hulls are made to endure extreme impact forces, they are deprived of any sensors and react in no way to changes in their environment. Simply put, they are nothing more than extraction vehicles with simple programming.

Here comes the best part – the Dredgers are quite vulnerable! The alkaloid fuels they utilize for propulsion makes them highly volatile in oxygen-rich atmospheres. This is probably the reason why no Dredger landed on Earth so far.
It is a tough decision whether we should use force against the Dredgers.

<effect>You can now use Drones to destroy Dredgers
column3:
The scientists concluded that the organic appearance of the Dredgers is misleading. Even though their robust hulls are made to endure extreme impact forces, they are deprived of any sensors and react in no way to changes in their environment. Simply put, they are nothing more than extraction vehicles with simple programming.

Here comes the best part – the Dredgers are quite vulnerable! The alkaloid fuels they utilize for propulsion makes them highly volatile in oxygen-rich atmospheres. This is probably the reason why no Dredger landed on Earth so far.
It is a tough decision whether we should use force against the Dredgers.

<effect>You can now use Drones to destroy Dredgers

column2: Hostilities should be our last resort.
They came uninvited and I believe it is our right to defend what is ours.
column3: Яны прыйшлі без запрашэньня, і я лічу, што мы маем права абараняць тое, што наша.
column4: One przybyły tu nieproszone, a ja uważam, że mamy prawo bronić tego, co nasze.

column2: We have researched a way to destroy landed Dredgers by using Drones.
column3: Мы дасьледавалі спосаб зьнішчэньня Драгераў з дапамогай дронаў.
column4: Opracowaliśmy metodę niszczenia bagrownic na powierzchni Marsa za pomocą dronów.

column2: We’ve done it. Our science team has deciphered the so-called language of the Dredgers.
column3: Мы зрабілі гэта. Наша навуковая група расшыфравала так званую мову Драгераў.
column4: Udało się - zespół naukowy rozszyfrował „język” bagrownic.

column2:
Each transmission consists of several desynchronized threads – each of them sounds like cosmic static, but when combined in the right way they form a pattern which can be translated to binary.

The information transmitted by the Dredgers is surprisingly simple. They share data regarding plotted courses, the status of their excavations and the location of mineral-rich sites. We cannot identify the source in Koronis as the Dredgers do not use any call signs, but nevertheless we are able to intercept their transmissions and predict the sites of future landings.

<effect>Dredger landing sites will be marked on the map.
column3:
Each transmission consists of several desynchronized threads – each of them sounds like cosmic static, but when combined in the right way they form a pattern which can be translated to binary.

The information transmitted by the Dredgers is surprisingly simple. They share data regarding plotted courses, the status of their excavations and the location of mineral-rich sites. We cannot identify the source in Koronis as the Dredgers do not use any call signs, but nevertheless we are able to intercept their transmissions and predict the sites of future landings.

<effect>Dredger landing sites will be marked on the map.

column2: Inform me immediately if you intercept anything unusual.
column3: Калі вы перахопіце што-небудзь незвычайнае, неадкладна паведаміце мне.
column4: Jeśli przechwycicie coś niezwykłego, powiadomcie mnie natychmiast.

column2: We have researched a way to detect the future landing sites of Dredgers.
column3: Мы распрацавалі метад выяўленьня будучых мейсцаў пасадкі Драгераў.
column4: Opracowaliśmy metodę wykrywania przyszłych miejsc lądowania bagrownic.

column2: The Spheres just keep dividing. This level of technology… We can't even begin to comprehend it.
column3: Сфэры працягваюць дзяліцца. Тэхнолёгія, якую мы бачым, цалкам за межамі нашага разуменьня.
column4: Kule ciągle się rozdzielają. Technologia, którą obserwujemy, leży całkowicie poza naszym pojmowaniem.

column2: The new Sphere also exhibits the humming of the previous two and is also resonating with them and the atmosphere around it. We have adjusted the predicted trigger point of the unknown event, as now it is expected to come earlier due to the higher Sphere count. The good news is that the more there are, the more observation material is available for our scientists. We should be able to paint a general picture of their purpose after investing some time to research them. Purpose of the Spheres research available.
column3: The new Sphere also exhibits the humming of the previous two and is also resonating with them and the atmosphere around it. We have adjusted the predicted trigger point of the unknown event, as now it is expected to come earlier due to the higher Sphere count. The good news is that the more there are, the more observation material is available for our scientists. We should be able to paint a general picture of their purpose after investing some time to research them. Purpose of the Spheres research available.

column2: Can’t decide if this is good news or bad.
column3: Цяжка сказаць, добра гэта ці блага
column4: Trudno powiedzieć, czy to dobrze, czy źle

column2: The Colony is expecting some sort of artificial cold wave. How’s that even possible?
column3: Падобна на тое, што калёнію накрыла халодная хваля штучнага паходжаньня! Як гэта наогул магчыма?
column4: Wydaje się, że kolonię nawiedziła fala zimna sztucznego pochodzenia! Jak to w ogóle możliwe?

column2:
It is also confirmed that the Spheres are using their energies to maintain atmospheric stasis – in other words they have passed a critical point for their purpose. 

What or who needs to lower the atmospheric temperature of contemporary Mars is beyond any of us – yet it is most evident that the Spheres are effective at what they are doing. 

If we want to stop the change, we must find a breakthrough based on what we already know and learn how to control or cancel this process.

<effect> A prolonged, extremely strong Cold Wave has begun.
<effect> Xeno-Terraforming research available.
column3:
It is also confirmed that the Spheres are using their energies to maintain atmospheric stasis – in other words they have passed a critical point for their purpose. 

What or who needs to lower the atmospheric temperature of contemporary Mars is beyond any of us – yet it is most evident that the Spheres are effective at what they are doing. 

If we want to stop the change, we must find a breakthrough based on what we already know and learn how to control or cancel this process.

<effect> A prolonged, extremely strong Cold Wave has begun.
<effect> Xeno-Terraforming research available.

column2: This is now formally a fight for survival.
column3: Цяпер мы афіцыйна змагаемся за выжываньне.
column4: Teraz już oficjalnie walczymy o przetrwanie.

column2: We’ve dismantled the last Sphere, yet our unease with the alien technology still lingers.
column3: Апошня Сфэры была дэмантавана, засталася толькі трывога, выкліканая кантактам з іншаплянетнымі тэхнолёгіямі.
column4: Ostatnia Kula została zdemontowana, pozostał nam tylko niepokój spowodowany kontaktem z technologią kosmitów.

column2: Our scientists are confident that we have recorded and gathered all data necessary for making sense of this encounter in the coming decades. Also, they are confident that the Spheres themselves had overstayed their welcome. Keeping them around would have meant living with the ever present danger of re-activating the endless cold wave once more and caused harm to our Colony as they did before. And despite the risks, despite the purely pragmatic reasons for destroying all the Spheres, one can’t help but wonder how the generations to come will feel of this deed. Will we go down in history as cowards? Or maybe as too insensitive to the magnitude of the encounter, the very first non-man made technology ever found? When our scientists give up on trying to determine the origin of these Spheres, will textbooks mention that because of the rash actions and fears of the few pioneers that lived on Mars at the time, the riddle will never be solved? No more Spheres are left. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: Our scientists are confident that we have recorded and gathered all data necessary for making sense of this encounter in the coming decades. Also, they are confident that the Spheres themselves had overstayed their welcome. Keeping them around would have meant living with the ever present danger of re-activating the endless cold wave once more and caused harm to our Colony as they did before. And despite the risks, despite the purely pragmatic reasons for destroying all the Spheres, one can’t help but wonder how the generations to come will feel of this deed. Will we go down in history as cowards? Or maybe as too insensitive to the magnitude of the encounter, the very first non-man made technology ever found? When our scientists give up on trying to determine the origin of these Spheres, will textbooks mention that because of the rash actions and fears of the few pioneers that lived on Mars at the time, the riddle will never be solved? No more Spheres are left. Gained a new Technology, .

column2: We discovered a mysterious sphere half-buried in the red sands. Its origins and purpose remain unknown.
column3: Мы выявілі таямнічу сфэры, напалову закапаную ў пясок. Яе паходжаньне й прызначэньне застаюцца невядомымі.
column4: Odkryliśmy tajemniczą kulę na wpół zagrzebaną w piaskach. Jej pochodzenie i przeznaczenie pozostają nieznane.

column2: The ominous Sphere has burst from the ground and is floating in an unknown direction.
column3: Злавесна Сфэры вырываецца зь зямлі й ляціць у невядомым кірунку.
column4: Złowróżbna Kula wyprysnęła spod ziemi i leci w nieznanym kierunku.

column2: The Sphere has started draining energy from the ground and from our power grid.
column3: Сфэры пачаў чэрпаць энэргію зь зямлі й нашай энэргетычнай сеткі.
column4: Kula zaczęła czerpać energię z gruntu i naszej sieci energetycznej.

column2: The harmful energy-draining aura of the Sphere has affected nearby Colonists, damaging their health. Mission Control advises extreme caution near the alien objects.
column3: Шкодная энэргаспажывальная аўра Сфэры негатыўна адбілася на здароўі навакольных каляністаў. Камандаваньне раіць быць асабліва асьцярожнымі пры знаходжаньні паблізу староньніх прадметаў.
column4: Szkodliwa energochłonna aura Kuli wywarła zły wpływ na zdrowie przebywających w pobliżu kolonistów. Dowództwo zaleca daleko posuniętą ostrożność w okolicy obcych obiektów.

column2: The Sphere has used the energy it stored to create another copy of itself. Our scientists predict that the process will continue while also accelerating the coming of some related event.
column3: Сфэра выкарыстоўвае назапашаную энэргію, каб паўтарыць сябе. Нашы навукоўцы прагназуюць, што гэты працэс будзе працягвацца, адначасова паскараючы надыход падзеі.
column4: Kula wykorzystała zgromadzoną energię do powielenia się. Nasi naukowcy przewidują, że ten proces będzie trwać, przyspieszając równocześnie nadejście jakiegoś wydarzenia.

column2: The power decoys worked! A Sphere is now trapped in one of them. If everything works, it will remain there until we can sustain the power feed of the decoy.
column3: Энэргетычныя пасткі спрацавалі! У адной з іх нам удалося захапіць Сфэру. Калі ўсё пойдзе добра, ён застанецца ў пастцы, пакуль мы зможам сілкаваць вабік.
column4: Pułapki energetyczne zadziałały! Udało się nam schwytać Kulę w jedną z nich. Jeśli wszystko pójdzie dobrze, pozostanie w pułapce, jak długo będziemy mogli zasilać wabik.

column2: The Sphere obeyed our commands and has crash-landed on the surface. We can now safely harvest resources from the deposits left behind.
column3: The Sphere obeyed our commands and has crash-landed on the surface. We can now safely harvest resources from the deposits left behind.
column4: Kula wykonała nasze polecenia i rozbiła się na powierzchni. Teraz możemy bezpiecznie zebrać zasoby ze złóż, które pozostawiła po sobie.

column2: We have invented Power Decoys – buildings which should allow us to attract and trap a Sphere on a specific location.
column3: We have invented Power Decoys – buildings which should allow us to attract and trap a Sphere on a specific location.
column4: Wynaleźliśmy pułapki energetyczne - budynki, które umożliwią nam zwabienie Kuli w określone miejsce i unieruchomienie jej.

column2: The Spheres had started to terraform Mars, draining it of its energy and making it colder – a massive Cold Wave has began!
column3: The Spheres had started to terraform Mars, draining it of its energy and making it colder – a massive Cold Wave has began!
column4: Kule zaczęły terraformować Marsa, pobierając energię planety i ochładzając ją - rozpoczęła się wielka fala zimna!

column2: Success! We managed to disable all of the Spheres!
column3: Success! We managed to disable all of the Spheres!
column4: Sukces! Udało się unieszkodliwić wszystkie Kule!

column2: Sitting at your desk, a strange light appears in the corner of your vision. It pulsates and intensifies, bathing the room in a warm glow. It feels... Actually, it feels just about right.
column3: Sitting at your desk, a strange light appears in the corner of your vision. It pulsates and intensifies, bathing the room in a warm glow. It feels... Actually, it feels just about right.
column4: Siedzisz za swoim biurkiem, gdy w kąciku pola widzenia pojawia się dziwne światło. Zaczyna pulsować, nabiera mocy i wypełnia pomieszczenie ciepłymi kolorami. Wydaje się... całkiem na miejscu.

column2:
It is so unexpectedly pleasant that any fears of food or drug poisoning are quickly doused and forgotten. And then you hear the voices – people laughing, yelling, crying... speaking. The language is incomprehensible but you sense the presence of friendly and strangely familiar entities. The shimmering lights start forming patterns and sparks flash briefly, revealing scenes from another place.

You struggle to concentrate and maintain control and the mirage dissolves. You're left alone and confused in the command room.
column3:
It is so unexpectedly pleasant that any fears of food or drug poisoning are quickly doused and forgotten. And then you hear the voices – people laughing, yelling, crying... speaking. The language is incomprehensible but you sense the presence of friendly and strangely familiar entities. The shimmering lights start forming patterns and sparks flash briefly, revealing scenes from another place.

You struggle to concentrate and maintain control and the mirage dissolves. You're left alone and confused in the command room.

column2: You have witnessed bizarre hallucinations with no logical explanation.
column3: You have witnessed bizarre hallucinations with no logical explanation.
column4: Nawiedziły cię niesamowite zwidy pozbawione logicznego wytłumaczenia.

column2: And you’re not the only one who’s seen this odd mirage.
column3: And you’re not the only one who’s seen this odd mirage.
column4: Wygląda na to, że także inni ludzie poza tobą doświadczyli tych dziwnych miraży.

column2: “Multiple signals from the Colony are coming in and everyone at Mission Control is worried. People are falling asleep on the streets and at their work stations, some report vivid hallucinations. The affected Colonists express symptoms of high stress and have been put under medical supervision. We’ve also exchanged information with Earth Control but they report no activity on their end. It seems the event is localized on Mars.”
column3: “Multiple signals from the Colony are coming in and everyone at Mission Control is worried. People are falling asleep on the streets and at their work stations, some report vivid hallucinations. The affected Colonists express symptoms of high stress and have been put under medical supervision. We’ve also exchanged information with Earth Control but they report no activity on their end. It seems the event is localized on Mars.”
column4: „Z całej kolonii napływają liczne sygnały i wszyscy w Dowództwie są zmartwieni. Ludzie zasypiają na ulicach i w pracy, wielu zgłasza realistyczne halucynacje. Tacy koloniści wykazują objawy silnego stresu i musieliśmy umieścić ich pod obserwacją lekarską. Wymieniliśmy informacje z Dowództwem na Ziemi, ale tam nic podobnego się nie dzieje. Wygląda na to, że to zdarzenie skupia się na Marsie”.

column2: This mystery is only getting deeper.
column3: This mystery is only getting deeper.
column4: To wszystko robi się coraz bardziej zagadkowe.

column2: The mirages have affected others as well. Colonists experience visual hallucinations and some have entered a trance-like state.
column3: The mirages have affected others as well. Colonists experience visual hallucinations and some have entered a trance-like state.
column4: Miraże wpłynęły także na innych. Koloniści doświadczyli omamów wzrokowych, a niektórzy popadli w jakiś swoisty trans.

column2: It’s so much stronger this time - you manage to fight it for a minute or two before you sink into a hypnotic slumber.
column3: It’s so much stronger this time - you manage to fight it for a minute or two before you sink into a hypnotic slumber.
column4: Tym razem miraż jest o wiele silniejszy - walczysz przez kilka minut, ale potem zasypiasz hipnotycznym snem w swoim fotelu.

column2:
When you open your eyes, you find yourself hundreds of meters above the ground. The panic overtakes you and you wave your limbs frantically as you try to grasp something. Despite the fact that you aren't falling – a strong rope supports you near the trunk of a gigantic tree, taller than any skyscraper. You compose yourself just in time to hear your sister laughing way above you.

“What are you doing, Kal? Stop it, silly!” You hear her voice directly in your mind. The realization of where you are hits you with full force. You remember that your name is Kal. That you and your numerous Clan call this tree Home.

You take a deep breath and look at the horizon, the bright sun is almost completely covered by thick veil of red and orange.
column3:
When you open your eyes, you find yourself hundreds of meters above the ground. The panic overtakes you and you wave your limbs frantically as you try to grasp something. Despite the fact that you aren't falling – a strong rope supports you near the trunk of a gigantic tree, taller than any skyscraper. You compose yourself just in time to hear your sister laughing way above you.

“What are you doing, Kal? Stop it, silly!” You hear her voice directly in your mind. The realization of where you are hits you with full force. You remember that your name is Kal. That you and your numerous Clan call this tree Home.

You take a deep breath and look at the horizon, the bright sun is almost completely covered by thick veil of red and orange.

column2: Lea. Her name comes back to you as she looks toward the horizon, frowning.
column3: Lea. Her name comes back to you as she looks toward the horizon, frowning.
column4: Lea - przypominasz sobie jej imię - patrzy na horyzont i marszczy brwi.

column2:
“Kal, another dust storm is coming. Let's finish with these moss veins and get back inside.” You clench the rope with your six-digit, two-thumb hands and start climbing towards the last of the moss veins which keeps the bark of Home healthy and alive.

“This one is almost completely dry, too.” You speak out, which upsets your sister. You remember that speaking words instead of sending them had always been an expression of deep, uncontrollable feelings. “Only four dozen out of three hundred are still alive. I fear Home will not survive for much longer. Mother would be devastated.”

You both enter Home in grim silence. As you enter the dim-lit hollow, the mirage fades and you wake up in your chair.
column3:
“Kal, another dust storm is coming. Let's finish with these moss veins and get back inside.” You clench the rope with your six-digit, two-thumb hands and start climbing towards the last of the moss veins which keeps the bark of Home healthy and alive.

“This one is almost completely dry, too.” You speak out, which upsets your sister. You remember that speaking words instead of sending them had always been an expression of deep, uncontrollable feelings. “Only four dozen out of three hundred are still alive. I fear Home will not survive for much longer. Mother would be devastated.”

You both enter Home in grim silence. As you enter the dim-lit hollow, the mirage fades and you wake up in your chair.

column2: The shimmering lights sweep through the Colony, pulling Colonist after Colonist into ever deeper states of trance.
column3: The shimmering lights sweep through the Colony, pulling Colonist after Colonist into ever deeper states of trance.
column4: Migoczące światła nawiedzają coraz więcej kolonistów. Część ludzi popada w coraz głębszy trans.

column2:
The staff has dubbed the more susceptible ones “Dreamers,” as it seems that witnessing the mirage sends them into a deep hypnotic slumber where they experience intense emotions and physical strain. Attempts to wake up a Dreamer had proven disastrous – the Colonist screamed, fell into shock and had to be sedated to prevent a potential heart attack.

As you read this, you wonder when you would become one of these unfortunate souls, unable to take care of the Colony.
column3:
The staff has dubbed the more susceptible ones “Dreamers,” as it seems that witnessing the mirage sends them into a deep hypnotic slumber where they experience intense emotions and physical strain. Attempts to wake up a Dreamer had proven disastrous – the Colonist screamed, fell into shock and had to be sedated to prevent a potential heart attack.

As you read this, you wonder when you would become one of these unfortunate souls, unable to take care of the Colony.

column2: The mirages have intensified. Some Colonists have fallen deeper into the hallucinations than others. We have dubbed these people Dreamers.
column3: The mirages have intensified. Some Colonists have fallen deeper into the hallucinations than others. We have dubbed these people Dreamers.
column4: Miraże nasiliły się. Niektórzy koloniści zagłębili się w te halucynacje mocniej niż inni. Nazwaliśmy tych ludzi Śniącymi.

column2: One of Earth’s top scientists has a new and intriguing paper on the Dreams. An unorthodox one.
column3: One of Earth’s top scientists has a new and intriguing paper on the Dreams. An unorthodox one.
column4: Genialny naukowiec z Ziemi opublikował niedawno intrygujący i dość niekonwencjonalny artykuł na temat Śniących.

column2:
It supports the hypothesis that they experience real events rather than hallucinations or an imagined reality. The scientific community on Earth discarded the paper as rubbish and some have even condemned the author.

The Chief Scientist, however, believes the hypothesis could lead somewhere and wants to run MRI scans as they monitor the Dreamers, especially while they are in the trance, and analyze the data.

<effect>New research on the mystery of the Dreamers is now available.
column3:
It supports the hypothesis that they experience real events rather than hallucinations or an imagined reality. The scientific community on Earth discarded the paper as rubbish and some have even condemned the author.

The Chief Scientist, however, believes the hypothesis could lead somewhere and wants to run MRI scans as they monitor the Dreamers, especially while they are in the trance, and analyze the data.

<effect>New research on the mystery of the Dreamers is now available.

column2: We have devised a system to monitor the Dreamers. We should divert resources to Dream Simulation research to shed light on the mirages.
column3: We have devised a system to monitor the Dreamers. We should divert resources to Dream Simulation research to shed light on the mirages.
column4: Opracowaliśmy system monitorowania Śniących. Powinniśmy przeznaczyć dodatkowe środki na badania nad symulacją snu, by dowiedzieć się więcej o mirażach.

column2: You sit comfortably as the Mirage washes over you, taking you deeper into the trance. The next thing you know, you’re Kal once again.
column3: You sit comfortably as the Mirage washes over you, taking you deeper into the trance. The next thing you know, you’re Kal once again.
column4: Siedzisz wygodnie, gdy ogarnia cię miraż i wprowadza w trans, który przenosi cię do świata snu. W jednej chwili jesteś dowódcą kolonii, a w następnej ponownie wcielasz się w Kala.

column2:
You’re sitting in your spartan office, re-reading the letter you got from your Mother. Every letter of her handwriting bears the emotional imprint of grief and desperation and you fail to remain calm. She’s writing to ask for your help as a steward to Watcher Bor, a powerful representative of the Authority you've been serving almost a decade now. The dust storms and the drought have hit the Clan badly in the recent cycles, bringing the horrors of starvation upon them. The neighboring Clans have already given in to the merciless heat and fled to the cities, abandoning the empty dry husks of their Home Trees to rot in the sun.

You are afraid that you won't be of much help to your Clan. From what you’ve witnessed so far, you know well that the Authority is aware of the hardships the farming Clans are facing but denies the severity of the drought. Above all else, you fear the reaction of your master, yet your loyalty to your Mother leaves you with no other choice but to talk to him.
column3:
You’re sitting in your spartan office, re-reading the letter you got from your Mother. Every letter of her handwriting bears the emotional imprint of grief and desperation and you fail to remain calm. She’s writing to ask for your help as a steward to Watcher Bor, a powerful representative of the Authority you've been serving almost a decade now. The dust storms and the drought have hit the Clan badly in the recent cycles, bringing the horrors of starvation upon them. The neighboring Clans have already given in to the merciless heat and fled to the cities, abandoning the empty dry husks of their Home Trees to rot in the sun.

You are afraid that you won't be of much help to your Clan. From what you’ve witnessed so far, you know well that the Authority is aware of the hardships the farming Clans are facing but denies the severity of the drought. Above all else, you fear the reaction of your master, yet your loyalty to your Mother leaves you with no other choice but to talk to him.

column2: The Watcher senses your approach, turning to face you before you can so much as utter a word.
column3: The Watcher senses your approach, turning to face you before you can so much as utter a word.
column4: Obserwator telepatycznie wyczuwa, że nadchodzisz i odwraca się ku tobie, uprzedzając twoje słowa.

column2:
“Kal, I already know what’s bothering you. Or you presumed that such an obvious thought wouldn’t have surfaced? Of course not. Anyway, I strongly recommend you not to give way to such… lowly concerns. Kal, look at me. Do you truly believe the lies your Mother has fed into your heart? Do you believe that the Authority would allow their people to die in vain? These thoughts are forbidden and you know what the punishment is…”

You shiver when he mentions it. He smiles at your reaction.

“You have been such a good steward all these years, and I know that you would never betray my trust. This nonsense ends now. Do we have an agreement, Kal?”

You hear yourself whisper, “Yes, Watcher.”
column3:
“Kal, I already know what’s bothering you. Or you presumed that such an obvious thought wouldn’t have surfaced? Of course not. Anyway, I strongly recommend you not to give way to such… lowly concerns. Kal, look at me. Do you truly believe the lies your Mother has fed into your heart? Do you believe that the Authority would allow their people to die in vain? These thoughts are forbidden and you know what the punishment is…”

You shiver when he mentions it. He smiles at your reaction.

“You have been such a good steward all these years, and I know that you would never betray my trust. This nonsense ends now. Do we have an agreement, Kal?”

You hear yourself whisper, “Yes, Watcher.”

column2: Later that evening you stand next to the Watcher as he gives a speech before the Chamber of Labor.
column3: Later that evening you stand next to the Watcher as he gives a speech before the Chamber of Labor.
column4: Później tego popołudnia stoisz u boku obserwatora przemawiającego przed Izbą Pracy.

column2:
The event is purely for show, as is the enthusiasm with which the public applauds the Watcher’s last words. Not that they have any other option – any misdemeanor is an instant trip to the reeducation stations.

You can see some people in the crowd who are Clan representatives from the neighboring farms. Almost the entire region is gathered here. You have to show them the truth – that the Authority doesn't care about them, that they are alone. Maybe then it would make a change!
column3:
The event is purely for show, as is the enthusiasm with which the public applauds the Watcher’s last words. Not that they have any other option – any misdemeanor is an instant trip to the reeducation stations.

You can see some people in the crowd who are Clan representatives from the neighboring farms. Almost the entire region is gathered here. You have to show them the truth – that the Authority doesn't care about them, that they are alone. Maybe then it would make a change!

column2: You jump out in front and telepathically project the message.
column3: You jump out in front and telepathically project the message.
column4: Rzucasz się do przodu i wysyłasz telepatyczną wiadomość.

column2: You keep it to yourself and wait for a better time to act.
column3: You keep it to yourself and wait for a better time to act.
column4: Powstrzymujesz się i postanawiasz zaczekać z działaniem na lepszy moment.

column2: You have a moment in front of the crowd before reality crystallizes. Freezes. Shatters.
column3: You have a moment in front of the crowd before reality crystallizes. Freezes. Shatters.
column4: Gdy rzucasz się przed tłum, rzeczywistość na chwilę zamiera, po czym rozpada się na kawałki.

column2: You wake up abruptly, with the feeling that something is wrong. You don't remember it that way...
column3: You wake up abruptly, with the feeling that something is wrong. You don't remember it that way...
column4: Raptownie budzisz się, czując, że coś jest nie tak. To wydarzenie zapamiętałeś inaczej...

column2: “Patience is a virtue.” You can practically hear your Clan Mother saying it now.
column3: “Patience is a virtue.” You can practically hear your Clan Mother saying it now.
column4: Twoja klanowa matka zawsze powtarzała, że cierpliwość jest cnotą.

column2:
You keep your mouth shut and calm your thoughts, hoping that Bor is distracted enough by the conversations with the rich industrialists to not notice your momentary excitement. You know that your time will come soon – wasting the opportunity to help your Clan now wouldn't do any good.

You wake up in your room, back on Mars, with a feeling of purpose and relaxation.
column3:
You keep your mouth shut and calm your thoughts, hoping that Bor is distracted enough by the conversations with the rich industrialists to not notice your momentary excitement. You know that your time will come soon – wasting the opportunity to help your Clan now wouldn't do any good.

You wake up in your room, back on Mars, with a feeling of purpose and relaxation.

column2: Our scientists have proposed  that the intensity of the hallucinations is linked with the number of people who experience them.
column3: Our scientists have proposed  that the intensity of the hallucinations is linked with the number of people who experience them.
column4: Nasi naukowcy sugerują, że intensywność halucynacji zależy od liczby doświadczających ich osób.

column2: Kal. The note in your hand bears your name, its mysterious writer bidding you to visit them in the garden.
column3: Kal. The note in your hand bears your name, its mysterious writer bidding you to visit them in the garden.
column4: Z wiadomości, którą trzymasz w swoich dłoniach, wynika, że w ogrodzie czeka na ciebie - czyli Kala - tajemnicza osoba.

column2:
The sense of danger tingles in the back of your head, a keen tool you have developed over the years of climbing through the intrigue-filled political structure of the Authority. Your contacts wouldn’t be so enigmatic, but neither would be any assassins sent by your competitors to put an end to you. You admit to yourself that your curiosity is sparkled, but you take precautions and tuck in the small pistol in your robes before getting outside.

The night is very hot, even though it is winter. The weather these days had gone crazy and it has been both a blessing and a curse – it served your cause well, giving extra credibility to your mutinous words, but it also whispered the coming end for the last of the farming Clans and the cities overflowing with starving refugees. You sit by the orchards and prepare for a long wait.
column3:
The sense of danger tingles in the back of your head, a keen tool you have developed over the years of climbing through the intrigue-filled political structure of the Authority. Your contacts wouldn’t be so enigmatic, but neither would be any assassins sent by your competitors to put an end to you. You admit to yourself that your curiosity is sparkled, but you take precautions and tuck in the small pistol in your robes before getting outside.

The night is very hot, even though it is winter. The weather these days had gone crazy and it has been both a blessing and a curse – it served your cause well, giving extra credibility to your mutinous words, but it also whispered the coming end for the last of the farming Clans and the cities overflowing with starving refugees. You sit by the orchards and prepare for a long wait.

column2: Your eyes flutter open as you feel the presence of someone else there. A figure in the bushes. You can’t help but to gasp as they step into the dim glow of the streetlight.
column3: Your eyes flutter open as you feel the presence of someone else there. A figure in the bushes. You can’t help but to gasp as they step into the dim glow of the streetlight.
column4: Otwierasz oczy, wyczuwając w ogrodzie czyjąś obecność. W zaroślach czeka tajemnicza postać. Gdy w końcu staje w przygaszonym świetle ulicy, wstrzymujesz oddech.

column2:
“Lea...” Your breath stops in your throat, silencing your voice. You feel tears forming in the corners of your eyes. Your sister projects love and happiness over the telepathic link and sweeps her own tears away.

“Is it really you, Kal? I've missed you so much!”

“I'm so happy to see you! Where have you been? What happened to you?”

“I've been doing the same thing as you – trying to free us from the Authority. I've found out terrible secrets and the solution to our problems – but it's dangerous, even fatal. My comrades devised a cure.” She opens her palm – two vials of pale liquid lay there. “So I've come to you to take the cure with you. If I'm to die here today, I want to do so in your embrace, Kal. We are the only survivors of our Clan and I want to rest with my people.”

“What are you talking about, Lea? It doesn't make sense!”
column3:
“Lea...” Your breath stops in your throat, silencing your voice. You feel tears forming in the corners of your eyes. Your sister projects love and happiness over the telepathic link and sweeps her own tears away.

“Is it really you, Kal? I've missed you so much!”

“I'm so happy to see you! Where have you been? What happened to you?”

“I've been doing the same thing as you – trying to free us from the Authority. I've found out terrible secrets and the solution to our problems – but it's dangerous, even fatal. My comrades devised a cure.” She opens her palm – two vials of pale liquid lay there. “So I've come to you to take the cure with you. If I'm to die here today, I want to do so in your embrace, Kal. We are the only survivors of our Clan and I want to rest with my people.”

“What are you talking about, Lea? It doesn't make sense!”

column2: Lea sits down beside you, taking your hand.
column3: Lea sits down beside you, taking your hand.
column4: Lea siada obok ciebie i chwyta twoją dłoń.

column2:
“We have been deceived the whole time, Kal. The Clans exist for only a generation; our centuries-long traditions and culture are a lie. The people from the cities killed the land with their industry and their wars, so the Authority crafted us from flesh and blood to resettle the planet and work like slaves to feed the cities. But the drought proved stronger than they thought, so they are abandoning us. We are a failed project, Kal, but we are also living people and we refuse to let go and die.”

She pauses to catch her breath.

“The Authority couldn't release millions of people without a safety kill-switch. So they imprinted our genes with stronger telepathic abilities – so that they could read our minds and wipe us out with terrible weapons designed to kill only us. To be free, we must sever our telepathic link. This is what the cure does, but it kills one in three. It is crucial to set you free, Kal, because you're a Watcher. You can deceive the Authority about the people in this sector and allow us to spread the cure through the local Clans. Then we will have an army.”

You are unsure and confused. But Lea presses on.

“No time to think, Kal. Let's do it now – let's take the cure together.”
column3:
“We have been deceived the whole time, Kal. The Clans exist for only a generation; our centuries-long traditions and culture are a lie. The people from the cities killed the land with their industry and their wars, so the Authority crafted us from flesh and blood to resettle the planet and work like slaves to feed the cities. But the drought proved stronger than they thought, so they are abandoning us. We are a failed project, Kal, but we are also living people and we refuse to let go and die.”

She pauses to catch her breath.

“The Authority couldn't release millions of people without a safety kill-switch. So they imprinted our genes with stronger telepathic abilities – so that they could read our minds and wipe us out with terrible weapons designed to kill only us. To be free, we must sever our telepathic link. This is what the cure does, but it kills one in three. It is crucial to set you free, Kal, because you're a Watcher. You can deceive the Authority about the people in this sector and allow us to spread the cure through the local Clans. Then we will have an army.”

You are unsure and confused. But Lea presses on.

“No time to think, Kal. Let's do it now – let's take the cure together.”

column2: “We’ll take the cure together, Lea. I'm here with you, there's nothing to be afraid of.”
column3: “We’ll take the cure together, Lea. I'm here with you, there's nothing to be afraid of.”
column4: „Zażyjmy lekarstwo razem, Lea. Jestem przy tobie - nie ma się czego bać”.

column2: “No, Lea, let me be the only one to take the risk. I can't lose you now that I've just found you.”
column3: “No, Lea, let me be the only one to take the risk. I can't lose you now that I've just found you.”
column4: „Nie, Leo. Pozwól, że tylko ja zaryzykuję. Właśnie cię odnalazłem. Nie mogę cię stracić”.

column2: “I know people who will help us refine the cure and make it safer. No need to rush now.”
column3: “I know people who will help us refine the cure and make it safer. No need to rush now.”
column4: „Znam ludzi, którzy pomogą nam udoskonalić lek, by był bezpieczniejszy. Nie śpieszmy się”.

column2: The liquid in the vial tastes like nothing. Like death. You can feel your mouth forming the words.
column3: The liquid in the vial tastes like nothing. Like death. You can feel your mouth forming the words.
column4: Ciecz w fiolce jest pozbawiona smaku. „Zupełnie jak śmierć”, mówisz sobie.

column2:
Then oblivion comes. You fall unconscious, failing to witness the convulsions which shake your body. You wake up just before dawn. Lea lies still beside you. She's not breathing.

The rising sun mercilessly dries your bitter tears from the sand.

<effect>A Dreamer dies.
column3:
Then oblivion comes. You fall unconscious, failing to witness the convulsions which shake your body. You wake up just before dawn. Lea lies still beside you. She's not breathing.

The rising sun mercilessly dries your bitter tears from the sand.

<effect>A Dreamer dies.

column2: The liquid in the vial tastes like nothing. Like death. You can barely hear yourself say it before a wave of oblivion sweeps over you.
column3: The liquid in the vial tastes like nothing. Like death. You can barely hear yourself say it before a wave of oblivion sweeps over you.
column4: Ciecz w fiolce jest pozbawiona smaku. „Zupełnie jak śmierć”, mówisz sobie, po czym twój umysł ogarnia nicość.

column2:
You won't remember it, but your body shakes in painful convulsions in the hands of your loving sister who watches over you the entire night. You wake up just before dawn. When you open your eyes, you look into the smiling face of Lea.

“Welcome back, silly.”

<effect>Several Dreamers gain negative traits.
column3:
You won't remember it, but your body shakes in painful convulsions in the hands of your loving sister who watches over you the entire night. You wake up just before dawn. When you open your eyes, you look into the smiling face of Lea.

“Welcome back, silly.”

<effect>Several Dreamers gain negative traits.

column2: Finding your sister after all these years. The thought of losing her again is enough to break you.
column3: Finding your sister after all these years. The thought of losing her again is enough to break you.
column4: Niedawno odnalazłeś swoją siostrę po wielu latach poszukiwań i myśl o tym, że mógłbyś ją teraz stracić, jest nie do zniesienia.

column2:
Luckily, you know just the right disillusioned government biologists who would take great interest in the formula for the cure. You hide the vials under your robe and give Lea a hand. You sit down by a tree and talk for hours and hours until the sun dawns on the horizon. Then she kisses you farewell and vanishes in the waking city. You have the feeling that you will see her soon enough.

<effect>Additional Dreamers are created.
column3:
Luckily, you know just the right disillusioned government biologists who would take great interest in the formula for the cure. You hide the vials under your robe and give Lea a hand. You sit down by a tree and talk for hours and hours until the sun dawns on the horizon. Then she kisses you farewell and vanishes in the waking city. You have the feeling that you will see her soon enough.

<effect>Additional Dreamers are created.

column2: Our hypothesis on the effect of the number of Dreamers present in the Colony has been confirmed.
column3: Our hypothesis on the effect of the number of Dreamers present in the Colony has been confirmed.
column4: Nasza hipoteza dotycząca wpływu liczby Śniących obecnych w kolonii została potwierdzona.

column2: You wake up startled under your own bedsheets, the world outside pitch black. A disturbing dream, not that you remember much of it.
column3: You wake up startled under your own bedsheets, the world outside pitch black. A disturbing dream, not that you remember much of it.
column4: Budzisz się raptownie w swoim łóżku w środku nocy. Śniło ci się coś niepokojącego, lecz niewiele z tego zapamiętałeś.

column2:
For a moment you think there is another Mirage happening, but it’s no such thing. You clearly remember the voices who kept on repeating the same words over and over:

“Find us again, Kal! Don’t you remember us? Find us again, Kal…”

You cannot shake the feeling that there were voices of people from the Colony and some others who sounded strangely familiar.

<hint>Let more Dreamers experience the Mirages.

column2: The day is searing hot. You find refuge in the blessedly cool corridors of the Home Tree.
column3: The day is searing hot. You find refuge in the blessedly cool corridors of the Home Tree.
column4: Pośpiesznie wkraczasz do chłodnych korytarzy domowego drzewa, by ukryć się przed nieznośnym żarem słońca.

column2:
The doors behind you shut just as the shuttle takes off. No time to catch your breath as the gathering is about to begin.

Hundreds of people had come to the Red Valley Home Tree to answer your call. The conspiracy you’ve been gathering in the past year or so has grown to numbers which require the establishment of organization or at least a unified plan for the future. This is why you have ventured to the other side of the globe to contact local anti-Authority dissidents.

The things you have seen lifted the veil created by the misinformation and propaganda you had all been fed. You have seen cities overrun by disease and starvation, where angry mobs riot every day in a desperate attempt to avoid the inevitable. You have seen the barren landscapes of the planet, dotted by the ruins of cities and factories, where nothing lives and grows. The world is dying and you know this with all of your heart and mind.

column2: The waters of the deep ground reservoir are long gone, replaced now with the leaders of various resistance cells.
column3: The waters of the deep ground reservoir are long gone, replaced now with the leaders of various resistance cells.
column4: Przedstawiciele różnych komórek ruchu oporu zebrali się w wyschniętym zbiorniku na wodę znajdującym się głęboko pod powierzchnią ziemi.

column2:
They all await you to start the meeting and you don’t keep them in suspense. The horrible truth devours your heart and you have to share the burden with them, listen to their words and advice and set the course for the future.

You know the gathering wouldn’t be easy as the tensions had grown strong within the ranks of the resistance – Clansmen straying from city-dwellers and vice versa. Bad blood is running between the two groups, each viewing the other as something far too different to tolerate. You’re attributing much of this behavior to the recent effects of the Cure taken by your clansmen, which turned their world upside down. You hope they realize the vital role of the city dissidents – mostly scientists and thinkers – who bear skills and knowledge of which your people had been deprived on purpose.

You don’t have any intention to delay the meeting. You stand before the crowd and start to raise your voice. The murmur in the reservoir stops and everybody listens.
column3:

column2: You talk for what seems an eternity, hoping beyond hope that your words are enough to reach the hearts of your audience.
column3: You talk for what seems an eternity, hoping beyond hope that your words are enough to reach the hearts of your audience.
column4: Przemawiasz bardzo długo. Masz nadzieję, że twoje słowa są wystarczająco mocne, by trafić do serc słuchaczy.

column2:
You describe the pictures of the dying world and make sure they understand that the clock is ticking for all of you. You cannot wait for better times, but the raw military might of the Authority makes any attempt for direct confrontation a lost cause. After all, your people are farmers, not soldiers. One by one, the cell leaders speak their minds. The discussion is heated and continues until late in the night. You dismiss the gathering with the promise to continue tomorrow.

Later you’re lying in bed and the sleep is chased away by your heavy thoughts. You realize that your word weighs a lot and, whichever solution you support, it would probably be the course for the future. Some of the Clansmen propose that all must hide deep in the desert and live off the land the way you did before – but this would mean condemning millions of people in the city to a starving death. The scientists who perfected the Cure uphold the plan to introduce gene-altering chemicals into the food rations sent to the city – this will instill the truth directly into the minds of the people and cause them to rise. You insist on taking the most brave and noble path – to send agents to spread the word to the people of the city. This would be dangerous and even fatal should the Authority agents get their hands on you.

column2: Retreat to the desert and let the city-dwellers fend for themselves.
column3: Retreat to the desert and let the city-dwellers fend for themselves.
column4: Wycofajcie się na pustynię i zostawcie mieszkańców miasta samym sobie

column2: It’s either us or them – spread the Cure.
column3: It’s either us or them – spread the Cure.
column4: Zwyciężymy my albo oni - dodajcie do żywności chemikalia zmieniające pamięć
Wyślijcie do miast agentów głoszących prawdę

column2: Freed from the burden of servitude, the clansmen took to the depths of the desert. The citizens of Bedlam can lie in the bed they’ve made.
column3: Freed from the burden of servitude, the clansmen took to the depths of the desert. The citizens of Bedlam can lie in the bed they’ve made.
column4: Po zrzuceniu jarzma wolne klany wycofały się w głąb pustyni, pozostawiając mieszkańców Bedlam samym sobie.

column2:
Most of the intellectual dissidents abandon your cause, returning to their homes to continue the fight on their own. The new challenges strengthen your people but also planted the seed of doubt in the hearts of many, including yours. By day your resolve was growing stronger, until you finally decided to return to Bedlam and finish what you started. Some of your closest allies follow you – after all, Clansmen or not, all people deserved their place under the sun.

<effect>Several Dreamers gain new traits.

column2: You watched the first of those infected shipments leave the city, praying that all of this was for the best.
column3: You watched the first of those infected shipments leave the city, praying that all of this was for the best.
column4: Odkąd pierwsza dostawa skażonej żywności dotarła do miasta, masz nadzieję, że skutki podjętej przez ciebie decyzji okażą się korzystne.

column2:
The experts were sure that the information you were instilling into the brains of the people would help all of you to live together in harmony. The next generations could judge you harshly for the morality of your actions, or they could praise you for your bravery. You don’t care. The only thing that mattered for you was to lead the disgruntled population of Bedlam to the realization that hard times await all of you – and that none of you could trust the selfish leaders who led you to your doom on purpose.

<effect>Some Dreamers become Gurus.

column2: Inner Light: Dying of the Light
column3: Inner Light: Dying of the Light

column2: A belief forced down your throat is no belief at all.
column3: A belief forced down your throat is no belief at all.
column4: Ludzi nie można zmuszać, by w coś wierzyli, bo wymuszona w ten sposób wiara nie będzie prawdziwa.

column2:
You and anyone who follows you would be the prophets of a new age of freedom and personal responsibility. The Truth will be the highest virtue – no propaganda and no threats from government agents would stop it from spreading. Deep in your heart you know that this is the right course and that soon the citizens of Bedlam would follow you till the end. This is why you’re the first to volunteer to return to the city. Many follow you without hesitation.

<effect>More Dreamers appear.

column2: Dreamers have reported that they saw in their dreams the alien Kal giving a speech, and have followed the decision of the gathering, just as the Commander retold. It is apparent that all Dreamers have been witnessing events which had happened elsewhere.
column3: Dreamers have reported that they saw in their dreams the alien Kal giving a speech, and have followed the decision of the gathering, just as the Commander retold. It is apparent that all Dreamers have been witnessing events which had happened elsewhere.
column4: Śniący zgłaszają, że w swoich snach widzieli obcego o imieniu Kal, który do nich przemawiał, a następnie przyjęli decyzję zgromadzenia. Wszystko to zgadza się z raportem dowódcy. Najwyraźniej wszyscy Śniący byli świadkami wydarzeń toczących się w jakimś innym miejscu.

column2: Bedlam burns with the fires of the revolution.
column3: Bedlam burns with the fires of the revolution.

column2:
Over the course of weeks, the peaceful protests had sparked into riots and the inadequate attempts of the Authority to suppress them had caused violent surges from the crowd. Citizens from all ranks of society storm the barricades and burn down government buildings.
You walk undisturbed among the chaos. The people view you as a prophet of the end times. No one dares raise their hand against you. When the crowd sees you it parts to let you through. Everyone is waiting for the Truth to flow from your mouth.

You haven’t asked for this. You only hope that when the Authority in Bedlam is toppled, the people listen to you once more and prepare to face more difficult times ahead. This is what fills your mind as you walk the dusty, debris-covered streets.
