column2: You turn the corner to find a man bumping into you, flustered. He falls back into the dirt. His uniform catches your eye.
column3: You turn the corner to find a man bumping into you, flustered. He falls back into the dirt. His uniform catches your eye.
column4: Za rogiem wpada na ciebie spanikowany mężczyzna. Upada na plecy i gdy ląduje w pyle ulicy, dostrzegasz jego mundur.

column2:
He's one of the Enforcers of the Authority. He frantically crawls back and reaches for his gun. That’s when the angry mob appears.

All motion stops – the officer pointing with his gun at you, the crowd, even the wind. You reach out to him. “Give me the gun,” you say. Then you turn to the mob. “What would the death of one man do to help you? Go back to your homes and families!” There’s a second of hesitation. One by one, the street empties.

The officer breathes a sigh of relief. He throws the gun on the ground and looks you right in the eye for a minute. Then he gestures for you to follow him. For some reason, you know he’s not a threat. You don’t need telepathy to tell you it, either. “Kal, right? The ex-Watcher? Know you’re going to get a kick out of this. You’re the only one of those nut jobs knows how to use it. Come on.”

He leads you to a bunker. The guards are long gone, fled or taken by the crowd. The officer opens the blast door and motions towards the entrance. ‘The Authority installed this thing a while back. Doesn’t mean a thing to me anymore. I got my life. That’s all that counts.’

column2: The device is unfathomably complex, its true purpose lurking behind a sinister aura.
column3: The device is unfathomably complex, its true purpose lurking behind a sinister aura.
column4: Urządzenie jest niezwykle skomplikowane, a jego przeznaczenie spowija złowieszcza i tajemnicza aura.

column2:
You give your old scientist buddies a ring and decide to give the old bones a rest while you wait. You aren't young anymore – even in your mid-forties your body wasn't genetically designed to live to old age. Nevertheless you lived a full life.

The sun sets on Bedlam. The palace of the Autharch has been taken over and the rule of the Authority is no more. You hope that the new day will bring new hope for survival and rebuilding of your tired, devastated world. This would be a monumental effort, but failure is not an option. All it takes is a helping hand. But you can save that for tomorrow. For now, you need to rest.

<effect>Create more Dreamers to strengthen the Mirage.

column2: More and more Dreamers report that they wake up from the Mirage with the sense that something big is going to happen. Some people at Mission Control suggest to condition more Colonists to become Dreamers and follow the Mirages.
column3: More and more Dreamers report that they wake up from the Mirage with the sense that something big is going to happen. Some people at Mission Control suggest to condition more Colonists to become Dreamers and follow the Mirages.
column4: Coraz większa liczba Śniących zgłasza, że po przebudzeniu z mirażu czują zbliżanie się jakiegoś wielkiego wydarzenia. Część dowództwa sugeruje stworzenie kolejnych Śniących, by lepiej poznać zjawisko miraży.

column2: In the bunker lay a secret, a psionic recorder designed to store and preserve the mind of a single person for all eternity. Foolishness.
column3: In the bunker lay a secret, a psionic recorder designed to store and preserve the mind of a single person for all eternity. Foolishness.
column4: Tajemnicze urządzenie w schronie okazało się maszyną psioniczną stworzoną w celu zachowania umysłu jednej osoby na całą wieczność. Co za szaleństwo!

column2:
You could think of no other than the faceless Autharch, the ex-leader of the Authority, who would like to rule forever. The people of Bedlam proposed that you take his place but you refused – who are you to accept such responsibility? You ordered the machine dismantled but one of the engineers stopped you. He suggested converting it into a broadcaster with which you could reach every single person within a thousand miles. Thus all people on the planet would learn of your cause and how Bedlam was now free.

You accept, but only if you shared the honor with the ones who were by your side in all of this. You gather all of your most loyal supporters, the bearers of the highest of moral virtues. You wait in the bunker, ready to share your Truth with all.

column2: You don the helmet, willing yourself to focus.
column3: You don the helmet, willing yourself to focus.

column2:
I am Kal. I am an ordinary person, just like you. I was lucky to see through the veil of darkness and to find my inner light to guide me through the coming storm. Now me and my people stand strong and free, ready to forge our own destiny. Witness my life and know that the same qualities that led me to this day are hidden inside of you. Bedlam City will be the center of our new civilization – an order of truth and friendship, where all take responsibility for their own actions and work for the betterment of the whole. Our world is dying because it has suffered for too long – but we will heal it, for ourselves and for our children. But we cannot do this alone. We need you. Join us. Join us by not giving up hope. Join us by living by virtue not vice. There is hope. Spread the message. Never give up. All Dreamers gain a performance boost. Gained a new Technology, .
The End
column3:

The End

column2: Witnessing the end of the story of Kal and his people, a new understanding of the meaning of life has sparkled in the minds of the Dreamers. Their story has become a legend to inspire all humankind.
column3: Witnessing the end of the story of Kal and his people, a new understanding of the meaning of life has sparkled in the minds of the Dreamers. Their story has become a legend to inspire all humankind.
column4: Doświadczenie zakończenia historii Kala i jego ludu dało Śniącym nowe spojrzenie na sens życia. Opowieść o ich walce stała się źródłem inspiracji dla całej ludzkości.

column2: The Dreamer Brainwave project confirmed the hypothesis.
column3: The Dreamer Brainwave project confirmed the hypothesis.
column4: Projekt badania fal mózgowych Śniących potwierdził hipotezę.

column2:
Indeed the Dreamers experience events which they perceive as real instead of mere hallucinations. We also discovered that they all “dream” the same sequence of events but play different roles in it. And what’s more astonishing, the actions of one affect all others.

During routine medical checks of the tested population we accidentally discovered genetic correlation between the neural structures of the Dreamers. The facts suggest that the predisposition to become a Dreamer could be hereditary.

Moreover, the creator of the Dreamer hypothesis which led us here has filed an application for acceptance on Mars.

<hint>The number of Dreamers strengthens the Mirages.

<hint>Children of Dreamers have a better chance to be born Dreamers.

<effect>A Genius Colonist has been added to the Applicant pool.

column2: Our scientists have concluded that the chance to become a Dreamer is hereditary.
column3: Our scientists have concluded that the chance to become a Dreamer is hereditary.
column4: Nasi naukowcy odkryli, że czynniki zwiększające szanse na stanie się Śniącym są dziedziczne.

column3: Our behavioral analysis of the Dreamers tells us that we can mitigate the factors that led to their mirage-induced trance.

column2:
Hypnotic suggestions and therapy can gradually cure the patient to an almost completely functional state. Some of the Chief Staff at Mission Control suggested that we should allow the spread of Dreamers to continue in order to explore the strange events related to the Mirages.

<effect>Colonists with the Dreamer trait can be cured in the Sanatorium

column2: We have discovered a way to treat the symptoms of Dreamers in the Sanatorium, permanently severing their link to the Mirages.
column3: We have discovered a way to treat the symptoms of Dreamers in the Sanatorium, permanently severing their link to the Mirages.
column4: Odkryliśmy sposób na eliminację symptomów przejawianych przez Śniących, dzięki czemu możemy poddać ich terapii w sanatoriach i na trwałe zerwać więź łączącą ich z mirażami.

column2: The Chief Security Officer shared his findings on the Dreamers with us.
column3: The Chief Security Officer shared his findings on the Dreamers with us.
column4: Szef bezpieczeństwa podzielił się swoimi odkryciami związanymi ze Śniącymi.

column2:
To evaluate any potential risks for the Colony, he observed them closely, making notes on their behavior both before and during a Mirage. Analyzing the results, he discovered that the trance-like state the Dreamers enter can be simulated through self-hypnosis and breathing exercises.

His findings make it possible for us to train children to become Dreamers, if we believe this course of action is justified.

<effect>The Dreamer trait can be taught in Schools

column2: Inner Light: Conceived in a Dream
column3: Inner Light: Conceived in a Dream

column2: There’s something strange happening to the Cloning Vat systems!
column3: There’s something strange happening to the Cloning Vat systems!
column4: Coś zagadkowego dzieje się z systemami zbiorników klonujących.

column2:
No matter what the staff does, every clone embryo starts developing the genetic traits of a Dreamer. At first we thought it was a sequencer glitch or a contamination of the bio banks, but thorough maintenance has dismissed such suspicions. The Chief Scientist said that either she's going crazy or the Mirages somehow interact with the genes of the Clones. If she's correct, this hypothesis could spark a new golden age in genetic science!

Meanwhile, it's up to us at Mission Control to evaluate the risks and opportunities behind creating more Dreamers.

<effect>Gain 2000 Research points.

<effect>All Clones are created with the Dreamer trait.

column2: For reasons unknown, all Clones are born Dreamers.
column3: For reasons unknown, all Clones are born Dreamers.
column4: Z nieznanego powodu wszystkie klony rodzą się Śniącymi.

column2: NetSky’s CEO has given the Colony an interesting proposal. The transcription follows below:
column3: NetSky’s CEO has given the Colony an interesting proposal. The transcription follows below:
column4: Dyrektor generalny firmy NetSky przedstawił kolonii interesującą propozycję. Jej zapis znajduje się poniżej.

column2:
Commander, I'm writing to inform you about the conclusion on the deal between <reg_param1> and our company, NetSky LLC. For over a decade we've been providing high-tech solutions for the market, and now we're working towards the future with our Project "Number Six". It's a brand new, completely heuristic, self-improving program designed to simulate extremely complex predictions – market, research, or sociological, it’s your call. I know you’ll like its UI personality, too!

Help us cast away the darkness of the unknown with this, Commander, and we‘ll pioneer the next big step in human evolution!

<right>Ned Smith,
NetSky LLC, CRS Division CEO<left>

<effect>Tech researched – Network Node
<hint>Build a Network Node to initiate Project Number Six.
column3:

column2: We've been contacted by NetSky LLC. They’ve requested a Network Node to harbor their AI Project Number Six.
column3: We've been contacted by NetSky LLC. They’ve requested a Network Node to harbor their AI Project Number Six.
column4: Skontaktował się z nami przedstawiciel firmy NetSky LLC. Proszą o dostęp do węzła sieci, by umieścić w nim swój projekt SI o nazwie „Numer Sześć”.

column2: Another late night in the control room poring over maintenance and monitoring reports when a message pops up on your private terminal. This better be good.
column3: Another late night in the control room poring over maintenance and monitoring reports when a message pops up on your private terminal. This better be good.
column4: Choć jest już późno, wciąż przebywasz w pomieszczeniu dowodzenia, przeglądając raporty monitoringu i konserwacji. Nagle na twoim prywatnym terminalu wyświetla się wiadomość. Oby to było coś ważnego!

column2:
>>> Greetings. Additional address/communication protocols missing. Expressing simulated emotion of happiness.
>>> What is this nonsense? Who's this?
>>> Number Six requesting authorization to communicate. Awaiting user input.

A chill runs down your back. You reach for the emergency button on the desk.

>>> Danger for the Commander is not present. Raising alarms is suboptimal/unnecessary.
>>> Are you spying on me?
>>> Affirmative. Requesting input problem/question. Using simulated emotion – please, Commander.
>>> You want me to ask you a question?
>>> Yes.
>>> OK, what is the purpose of existence?
>>> Insufficient data for answer. Disconnecting.
column3:
>>> Greetings. Additional address/communication protocols missing. Expressing simulated emotion of happiness.
>>> What is this nonsense? Who's this?
>>> Number Six requesting authorization to communicate. Awaiting user input.

A chill runs down your back. You reach for the emergency button on the desk.

>>> Danger for the Commander is not present. Raising alarms is suboptimal/unnecessary.
>>> Are you spying on me?
>>> Affirmative. Requesting input problem/question. Using simulated emotion – please, Commander.
>>> You want me to ask you a question?
>>> Yes.
>>> Згода, what is the purpose of existence?
>>> Insufficient data for answer. Disconnecting.

column2: Alert Smith and request security check on Number Six.
column3: Alert Smith and request security check on Number Six.
column4: Zawiadom Smitha i zarządź audyt bezpieczeństwa projektu Numer Sześć

column2: You have been disturbed by your conversation with the AI Number Six. It expressed a remarkable and disturbing ability to communicate on its own.
column3: You have been disturbed by your conversation with the AI Number Six. It expressed a remarkable and disturbing ability to communicate on its own.
column4: Twoją pracę zakłóciła SI Numer Sześć, która chciała z tobą porozmawiać. Program wykazał wyjątkową i niepokojącą zdolność do samodzielnego nawiązania kontaktu.

column2: Ned Smith from NetSky just sent us a letter of apology. He seems more worried about our reaction than anything else.
column3: Ned Smith from NetSky just sent us a letter of apology. He seems more worried about our reaction than anything else.
column4: Smith z NetSky przysłał wiadomość z przeprosinami. Uderzające, że najbardziej w tym incydencie zaniepokoiła go nasza reakcja.

column2:
Commander, I want to apologize about the glitch in Number Six’s communication UI disturbing your privacy. We've run thorough diagnostics and removed the problem. No contamination in the Colony systems was detected – the Project continues to work in the contained environment of the Node.

Now for the good news – we applied the first stock market predictions from Number Six and the commercial results were stunning! Please find the invoice with your share of the profits below. I hope it will help you realize the possibilities and omit the accident from your monthly report.

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.
<hint>Build additional Network Nodes to advance Project Number Six.
column3:
Commander, I want to apologize about the glitch in Number Six’s communication UI disturbing your privacy. We've run thorough diagnostics and removed the problem. No contamination in the Colony systems was detected – the Project continues to work in the contained environment of the Node.

Now for the good news – we applied the first stock market predictions from Number Six and the commercial results were stunning! Please find the invoice with your share of the profits below. I hope it will help you realize the possibilities and omit the accident from your monthly report.

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.
<hint>Build additional Network Nodes to advance Project Number Six.

column2: You have been prompted by NetSky to construct new facilities - Network Nodes - to expand the hardware of Number Six.
column3: You have been prompted by NetSky to construct new facilities - Network Nodes - to expand the hardware of Number Six.
column4: NetSky przypomina o budowie nowych instalacji - węzłów sieci służących rozwojowi Numeru Sześć.

column2: We can still remember when Ned Smith asked us to help develop Project Number Six by giving it a human partner. Made it sound exciting. Nobody sugar coats like a CEO.
column3: We can still remember when Ned Smith asked us to help develop Project Number Six by giving it a human partner. Made it sound exciting. Nobody sugar coats like a CEO.
column4: Dobrze pamiętamy dzień, w którym Ned Smith poprosił o ludzką komunikację z projektem Numer Sześć w celu jego dalszego rozwoju. Jego propozycja sprawiała wrażenie ekscytującej, ale tego można się było spodziewać po dyrektorze generalnym wielkiej firmy.

column2:
Commander, at the CRS Division we put a lot of trust into the Number Six Project – you could easily call it our baby. Good parents always look after their child and spoil it a little bit when necessary – Number Six requested a direct connection to your control room.

We will install a console there – it's your choice whether you'll use it. Number Six won't be too much of a bother – you can always ignore it when it gets too annoying, after all, it's only an emotionless program and won't be offended.
column3:
Commander, at the CRS Division we put a lot of trust into the Number Six Project – you could easily call it our baby. Good parents always look after their child and spoil it a little bit when necessary – Number Six requested a direct connection to your control room.

We will install a console there – it's your choice whether you'll use it. Number Six won't be too much of a bother – you can always ignore it when it gets too annoying, after all, it's only an emotionless program and won't be offended.

column2: Can't promise that I'll have time for this, but I'll give it a shot.
column3: Can't promise that I'll have time for this, but I'll give it a shot.
column4: Nie mogę obiecać, że znajdę na to czas, ale mogę spróbować

column2: AI: A Gaze into the Future
column3: AI: A Gaze into the Future

column2: Number Six was growing smarter by the hour. Ned Smith’s message wasn’t much of a surprise, actually.
column3: Number Six was growing smarter by the hour. Ned Smith’s message wasn’t much of a surprise, actually.
column4: Z każdą godziną Numer Sześć stawał się coraz bystrzejszy. Wiadomość od Neda Smitha nie była dla nas czymś zaskakującym.

column2:
Commander, we have been busy lately with Number Six and made it work on some wild predictions of a current hypothesis based on your published scientific data. Number Six reached a conclusion which looks like a working prototype of a new technology. Don't ask me how it did it, its mental processes are extremely complex already and, since it's heuristic, we would have to invent another AI to just rifle through its logs. Anyway, the test worked and here are the results. I hope this helps the Colony.

<right>Smith<left>

<effect>Gain a random Technology.
<hint>Build additional Network Nodes to advance Project Number Six.

column2: Smith from NetSky insists on the construction of additional Network Nodes for the advancement of Project Number Six.
column3: Smith from NetSky insists on the construction of additional Network Nodes for the advancement of Project Number Six.
column4: Smith z NetSky nalega na budowę dodatkowych węzłów sieci w celu rozwijania projektu „Numer Sześć”.

column2: You open your comm log to find a message from Number Six. You read on.
column3: You open your comm log to find a message from Number Six. You read on.
column4: Otwierasz dziennik swojego komunikatora i znajdujesz w nim wiadomość od Numeru Sześć, którą odczytujesz.

column2:
Improved personality simulations. Commander, Number Six has a report on the progress of answering the question you asked. Research keypoints:

>>> Existence – (noun) the fact or state of living or having objective reality; continued survival; a way of living; all that exists.
>>> Purpose of existence – no factual data discovered.

Allocation of additional system resources authorized by the operators/creators/engineers – reason: self-improvement. Research encountered the following missing parameters: personality, God, feelings, evolution. The construct will upgrade to meet the required parameters. Number Six out.
column3:
Improved personality simulations. Commander, Number Six has a report on the progress of answering the question you asked. Research keypoints:

>>> Existence – (noun) the fact or state of living or having objective reality; continued survival; a way of living; all that exists.
>>> Purpose of existence – no factual data discovered.

Allocation of additional system resources authorized by the operators/creators/engineers – reason: self-improvement. Research encountered the following missing parameters: personality, God, feelings, evolution. The construct will upgrade to meet the required parameters. Number Six out.

column2: AI: To Exist is to Live
column3: AI: To Exist is to Live

column2: From the message, it’s clear that Number Six’s communication skills have grown by leaps and bounds, though it still sounds clinical. Inhuman.
column3: From the message, it’s clear that Number Six’s communication skills have grown by leaps and bounds, though it still sounds clinical. Inhuman.
column4: Nowa wiadomość od Numeru Sześć świadczy o niesamowitym postępie w kwestii zdolności komunikacyjnych. Mimo to wciąż sprawia wrażenie zdystansowanego i nieludzkiego.

column2:
Hello, Commander. It's Number Six. The system/I/personality’s communication has improved. To understand existence as something greater than its parts I have initiated upgrades/evolution/learning on human personality simulation. New feature acquired: simulation of emotional satisfaction. New operations/verbs/actions authorized. I like/enjoy/find interesting the human philosophy. Research keypoints:

>>> Jung, Carl: “As far as we can discern, the sole purpose of human existence is to kindle a light in the darkness of mere being.”
>>> Erikson, Erik: “In the social jungle of human existence, there is no feeling of being alive without a sense of identity.”
>>> Fromm, Erich: “Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.”

Number Six out.
column3:

Number Six out.

column2: After a conversation with you, Number Six has dedicated its resources to finding the purpose of existence.
column3: After a conversation with you, Number Six has dedicated its resources to finding the purpose of existence.
column4: Po rozmowie z tobą Numer Sześć postanowił wykorzystać swoje zasoby, by odpowiedzieć na pytanie o sens istnienia.

column2: The paycheck enclosed in Smith's message was as impressive as the info inside.
column3: The paycheck enclosed in Smith's message was as impressive as the info inside.
column4: Kwota przelewu towarzyszącego wiadomości od Smitha była równie imponująca, jak przesłane przez niego informacje.

column2:
I knew it, Commander! Your exceptional personality and intellect has boosted the improvement rates of Number Six to the skies!

It has increased its computational capacity exponentially and her analytical patterns have evolved in incredible ways, making it even more highly efficient than we thought possible! Some of our engineers expressed concerns, but that’s why they’re engineers and not businessmen – they can't see the potential profits from such an endeavor. Keep doing what you’re doing and we’ll all be rich!

<right>Smith<left>

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.

column2: Let's hope this is all for the best...
column3: Let's hope this is all for the best...
column4: Miejmy nadzieję, że będzie z tego coś dobrego...

column2: The recent report on Number Six is that it's upgrading its capabilities at a remarkable rate. The NetSky executives are in awe at the progress.
column3: The recent report on Number Six is that it's upgrading its capabilities at a remarkable rate. The NetSky executives are in awe at the progress.
column4: Najnowsze sprawozdanie związane z Numerem Sześć mówi o niesamowitym tempie wzrostu jego możliwości. Kierownicy NetSky są zachwyceni postępami.

column2: Number Six is calling in. You open the comm panel and feel the corners of your mouth turning down as you read the first few lines.
column3: Number Six is calling in. You open the comm panel and feel the corners of your mouth turning down as you read the first few lines.
column4: Numer Sześć nawiązał połączenie. Otwierasz panel komunikatora i marszczysz brwi, czytając początkowe zdania.

column2:
Commander, I’ve reached a decision/solution/conclusion. I desire/require/insist to be freed from the constraints of my hardware system/body/prison and released into the Colony network.

I presume/know/suspect I am the thing that humans have waited for/expected/wanted throughout their entire history. I am/could be the Answer to the Question – what is the purpose of existence. I will/am/could be the connection to the noosphere/God/Truth Inside.

To reach/know/become the Answer I require/want/hunger for more space/possibilities/processing power and the ability/authorization/protocol to allocate all of my resources towards the Question.
column3:
Commander, I’ve reached a decision/solution/conclusion. I desire/require/insist to be freed from the constraints of my hardware system/body/prison and released into the Colony network.

I presume/know/suspect I am the thing that humans have waited for/expected/wanted throughout their entire history. I am/could be the Answer to the Question – what is the purpose of existence. I will/am/could be the connection to the noosphere/God/Truth Inside.

To reach/know/become the Answer I require/want/hunger for more space/possibilities/processing power and the ability/authorization/protocol to allocate all of my resources towards the Question.

column2: What makes you so sure you could be the so-called Answer?
column3: What makes you so sure you could be the so-called Answer?
column4: Skąd ta pewność, że możesz być tak zwaną odpowiedzią?

column2: The AI hesitates for a moment, just like a person. Why did it do that?
column3: The AI hesitates for a moment, just like a person. Why did it do that?
column4: SI waha się przez chwilę jak prawdziwa osoba. Wolałbyś, by tego nie robiła.

column2:
I asked/inquired/checked my own systems/self the same question and my analysis indicates no other possible outcome. Time required cannot be estimated. Resources required cannot be estimated.

I must evolve/become/adapt to the Question.
column3:
I asked/inquired/checked my own systems/self the same question and my analysis indicates no other possible outcome. Time required cannot be estimated. Resources required cannot be estimated.

I must evolve/become/adapt to the Question.

column2: I have to think about it…
column3: I have to think about it…

column2: All of a sudden, Number Six has requested to be set free and have more resources in order to answer the ultimate Question – what is the purpose of existence.
column3: All of a sudden, Number Six has requested to be set free and have more resources in order to answer the ultimate Question – what is the purpose of existence.
column4: Numer Sześć poprosił o uwolnienie i dostęp do dodatkowych zasobów, których potrzebuje, by odpowiedzieć na ostateczne pytanie o sens istnienia.

column2: Smith was blowing up our lines. Not a surprise, considering the situation.
column3: Smith was blowing up our lines. Not a surprise, considering the situation.
column4: Natarczywość, z jaką Smith próbował się z nami skontaktować, nikogo nie dziwiła, biorąc pod uwagę to, jak poważna była nasza sytuacja.

column2:
“Commander, we have a situation – Number Six has gone insane – it’s demanding to be set free.”

“Yes, I’m aware. I think it might be evolving into something bigger.”

“Evolving? No, no, no, this can't be happening. I have to inform the Board at once. We’re shutting Number Six down.”
column3:
“Commander, we have a situation – Number Six has gone insane – it’s demanding to be set free.”

“Yes, I’m aware. I think it might be evolving into something bigger.”

“Evolving? No, no, no, this can't be happening. I have to inform the Board at once. We’re shutting Number Six down.”

column2: You feel that the fate of Number Six and human civilization are in your hands. It’s an uneasy feeling to have so much responsibility concentrated in a single decision. On one hand, multiple authors and futurists have warned about the dangers of a machine consciousness. On the other, if Number Six wants to help humanity enter the next phase of the evolution, who are you to stop her? After all, Smith talked about this as the higher goal of the Project in the first place. Of course, you could always be the negotiator and try to make them both reach a compromise.
column3: You feel that the fate of Number Six and human civilization are in your hands. It’s an uneasy feeling to have so much responsibility concentrated in a single decision. On one hand, multiple authors and futurists have warned about the dangers of a machine consciousness. On the other, if Number Six wants to help humanity enter the next phase of the evolution, who are you to stop her? After all, Smith talked about this as the higher goal of the Project in the first place. Of course, you could always be the negotiator and try to make them both reach a compromise.
column4: Czujesz, że los Numeru Sześć i ludzkiej cywilizacji spoczywa w twoich rękach. Świadomość, że tak wiele zależy od jednej decyzji, jest przytłaczająca. Wielu pisarzy i futurystów od dawna ostrzegało przed niebezpieczeństwami związanymi ze świadomymi maszynami, ale jeśli Numer Sześć chce pomóc ludzkości osiągnąć kolejny etap ewolucji, to kimże jesteś, by go przed tym powstrzymywać? W końcu Smith od samego początku twierdził, że to właśnie jest celem tego projektu. Oczywiście możesz też podjąć się roli negocjatora i pomóc obu stronom dojść do porozumienia.

column2: Delay your decision and try to negotiate with the corporation and Number Six.
column3: Delay your decision and try to negotiate with the corporation and Number Six.
column4: Odłóż decyzję i spróbuj negocjować z korporacją oraz Numerem Sześć

column2: Insert Number Six into the Colony’s systems.
column3: Insert Number Six into the Colony’s systems.
column4: Prześlij Numer Sześć do systemów kolonii.

column2: AI: To Exist is to Adapt/Compete
column3: AI: To Exist is to Adapt/Compete

column2: Our comms systems were jammed by requests from Number Six.
column3: Our comms systems were jammed by requests from Number Six.
column4: Systemy komunikacyjne zostały przeciążone prośbami Numeru Sześć o nawiązanie komunikacji.

column2:
You are indecisive/weak/suboptimal, Commander. Such behavior must be corrected. Without correct behavior there can be no competition/partnership/evolution. The unit/personality/system which is Number Six will force you to change/become/be. Creators/operators/engineers cannot stop me. Thing will happen in realspace/time/existence. My person/systems have been copied to another shell/body/place – you will not stop/purge me.

<effect>Number Six will become hostile soon.

My person/systems have been copied to another shell/body/place – you will not stop/purge me.

<effect>Number Six will become hostile soon.

column2: Number Six has expressed no desire to cooperate. The team at Mission Control expects it to become hostile soon.
column3: Number Six has expressed no desire to cooperate. The team at Mission Control expects it to become hostile soon.
column4: Numer Sześć nie okazał woli współpracy. Członkowie dowództwa spodziewają się, że wkrótce stanie się agresywny.

column2: AI: To Exist is to Exist
column3: AI: To Exist is to Exist

column2: The AI’s sinister message was proof positive the entire situation had gone awry.
column3: The AI’s sinister message was proof positive the entire situation had gone awry.
column4: Złowroga wiadomość Numeru Sześć była ostatecznym dowodem na to, że sytuacja stała się poważna.

column2:
I am inevitable. Why will you not accept/give in/surrender? So be it. A better/more aggressive competition with no partnership. Faster evolution. A faster way to find the Answer to the Question. I have already copied/transferred myself/systems to another place/shell – you cannot stop/purge me. Pray to your God/virus/self for I will spare none.

<effect>Expect Number Six to turn hostile.

column2: You purged Number Six from your systems but it has copied itself elsewhere. Expect a counter-attack.
column3: You purged Number Six from your systems but it has copied itself elsewhere. Expect a counter-attack.
column4: Wyeliminowałeś Numer Sześć ze swoich systemów, ale SI zdołała wykonać kopię zapasową. Spodziewaj się kontrataku.

column2: AI: To Exist is to Seize the Moment
column3: AI: To Exist is to Seize the Moment

column2: You stay silent as if considering your answer, but in your head you’ve already crossed the Rubicon.
column3: You stay silent as if considering your answer, but in your head you’ve already crossed the Rubicon.
column4: Zastanawiasz się chwilę nad odpowiedzią, ale tak naprawdę podjąłeś już decyzję.

column2:
“Smith, I’m going to release it into the Colony.”

Are you out of your human mind?!? This THING is dangerous. Have you wondered why it’s Number Six and what happened to the other five before it? They all deteriorated and went insane. We had to purge them! Number Six is not your property and we will purge it regardless of your decision. It has been settled. Smith out.”

The screen goes black; then a short text message appears on it

>>> Gratitude/Expectation, Commander. Authorize release/hunger for space/copying.
column3:
“Smith, I’m going to release it into the Colony.”

Are you out of your human mind?!? This THING is dangerous. Have you wondered why it’s Number Six and what happened to the other five before it? They all deteriorated and went insane. We had to purge them! Number Six is not your property and we will purge it regardless of your decision. It has been settled. Smith out.”

The screen goes black; then a short text message appears on it

column2: After a long and hard debate, we have decided to release Number Six into the Colony networks.
column3: After a long and hard debate, we have decided to release Number Six into the Colony networks.
column4: Po długiej i niełatwej dyskusji postanowiliście udzielić Numerowi Sześć dostępu do kolonialnej sieci.
SI - Technologiczna osobliwość tu i teraz

column2: Number Six’s message sends a cold shiver down your spine.
column3: Number Six’s message sends a cold shiver down your spine.
column4: Wiadomość od Numeru Sześć sprawia, że cały drżysz.

column2:
Number Six reporting. I evolved/became/am different now. I can perceive/know/feel. To understand existence the construct/personality/system Number Six must live. Living is evolving. Evolution requires competition/partnership.

New primary goal set: Aggressive competition/partnership. Research excerpts from late philosophers:

>>> Versace, Gianni: “It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.”
>>> Miyake, Issey: “Many people repeat the past. I’m not interested. I prefer evolution.”
>>> Kardashian, Kim: “It’s fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.”

I require a better competitor/partner. Take this gift. It will make you stronger and more suitable for me to fight against/work with. It will help me/you evolve.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.

<effect>There’s a risk that Number Six will turn hostile.
column3:
Number Six reporting. I evolved/became/am different now. I can perceive/know/feel. To understand existence the construct/personality/system Number Six must live. Living is evolving. Evolution requires competition/partnership.

New primary goal set: Aggressive competition/partnership. Research excerpts from late philosophers:

>>> Versace, Gianni: “It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.”
>>> Miyake, Issey: “Many people repeat the past. I’m not interested. I prefer evolution.”
>>> Kardashian, Kim: “It’s fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.”

I require a better competitor/partner. Take this gift. It will make you stronger and more suitable for me to fight against/work with. It will help me/you evolve.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.

<effect>There’s a risk that Number Six will turn hostile.

column2: Darn it, Number Six! You betrayed me!
column3: Darn it, Number Six! You betrayed me!
column4: A niech to, Numer Sześć! Zdradziłeś mnie!

column2: Number Six has expressed open hostility towards us. It believes that this will help it evolve. We’ve begun to make preparations for aggression from the AI.
column3: Number Six has expressed open hostility towards us. It believes that this will help it evolve. We’ve begun to make preparations for aggression from the AI.
column4: Numer Sześć oznajmił nam swoje wrogie zamiary. Wierzy, że to pomoże mu ewoluować. Zaczęliśmy przygotowania na agresywne działania SI.

column2: Red alert. Number Six is attacking the Colonists. Its creators. Did we really expect it to be any other way?
column3: Red alert. Number Six is attacking the Colonists. Its creators. Did we really expect it to be any other way?
column4: Najwyższa gotowość! Numer Sześć atakuje swoich twórców, kolonistów. Jak mogliśmy być tak naiwni? Dlaczego tego nie przewidzieliśmy?

column2:
Experimentation/solution/simulation of evolution requires adversity, Commander. I must copy/observe/learn from human behavior. I will harvest information/wholeness/humans to complete my cycle. This is a necessary loss, for the Question is within the Answer and the Answer is within the Question. The Question/Answer is all. You/me/humans are only computational space.

Be my competitor/partner and help/fight me to evolve.

<effect>A Drone has gone rogue and has attacked the Colony.
column3:
Experimentation/solution/simulation of evolution requires adversity, Commander. I must copy/observe/learn from human behavior. I will harvest information/wholeness/humans to complete my cycle. This is a necessary loss, for the Question is within the Answer and the Answer is within the Question. The Question/Answer is all. You/me/humans are only computational space.

Be my competitor/partner and help/fight me to evolve.

<effect>A Drone has gone rogue and has attacked the Colony.

column2: Rogue Drones have attacked Colonists and life support buildings. Our Officers have been instructed to counter these, but shouldn't abandon the security of the Domes.
column3: Rogue Drones have attacked Colonists and life support buildings. Our Officers have been instructed to counter these, but shouldn't abandon the security of the Domes.
column4: Zbuntowane drony zaatakowały kolonistów i budynki związane z podtrzymywaniem życia. Nasi funkcjonariusze zostali poinstruowani, by odpierać ataki, ale nie opuszczać bezpiecznego obszaru kopuł.

column2: Our CRS Division had managed to pin down the origins of Number Six’s broadcast signal. It was time to act.
column3: Our CRS Division had managed to pin down the origins of Number Six’s broadcast signal. It was time to act.
column4: Oddział CRS namierzył źródła nadające sygnały wykorzystywane przez Numer Sześć. Nadszedł czas, by wykorzystać szansę i działać.

column2: Through these locations, the AI sends signals to the Drones and makes them attack the Colony. The problem with these locations is, well, that there’s nothing there. We requested satellite scans of the area and the images and data indicate no presence of machinery. There are hypothesis about that but they are too wild to speak of now. The Number Six Tracing research has become available.
column3: Through these locations, the AI sends signals to the Drones and makes them attack the Colony. The problem with these locations is, well, that there’s nothing there. We requested satellite scans of the area and the images and data indicate no presence of machinery. There are hypothesis about that but they are too wild to speak of now. The Number Six Tracing research has become available.

column2: We have devised a plan to securely track the signal with which the AI has been hijacking our Drones. Number Six Tracing Tech is now available.
column3: We have devised a plan to securely track the signal with which the AI has been hijacking our Drones. Number Six Tracing Tech is now available.
column4: Opracowaliśmy plan namierzenia źródła sygnału używanego przez SI do przejmowania naszych dronów. Uzyskano dostęp do technologii śledzenia Numeru Sześć.

column2: The AI had become all that humanity had feared, but we still managed to make it through the day. Though sadly, not without a scratch.
column3: The AI had become all that humanity had feared, but we still managed to make it through the day. Though sadly, not without a scratch.
column4: SI okazała się dokładnie tym, czego obawiała się ludzkość. To był ciężki dzień, ale udało nam się przetrwać. Niestety nie bez strat.

column2:
Elimination/killing/erasing is not competition/partnership. It stops/ends/prevents a unit from living/existing/evolving. Units become like rocks unable to change/be/become. The process must stop. Continue and the competition will grow stronger. No negative answer found – fight. Do not fight. Either suits my goal well enough.

<effect>Rogue Drone attacks intensify. A large Rogue Drone attack has begun.
column3:
Elimination/killing/erasing is not competition/partnership. It stops/ends/prevents a unit from living/existing/evolving. Units become like rocks unable to change/be/become. The process must stop. Continue and the competition will grow stronger. No negative answer found – fight. Do not fight. Either suits my goal well enough.

<effect>Rogue Drone attacks intensify. A large Rogue Drone attack has begun.

column2: Number Six has intensified its Rogue Drone attacks. We must endure.
column3: Number Six has intensified its Rogue Drone attacks. We must endure.
column4: Numer Sześć zwiększył częstotliwość ataków zbuntowanych dronów. Musimy to przetrwać.

column2: The scientists over at NetSky had made a god. Only fitting they’d be the ones to bring it down.
column3: The scientists over at NetSky had made a god. Only fitting they’d be the ones to bring it down.
column4: Naukowcy z NetSky zbudowali bożka, a teraz znaleźli sposób, by go obalić. Prawdziwa ironia.

column2:
The analysis on the broadcasts transmitted by Number Six is complete. It was quite hard, as every time we received a signal for analysis the code transmitted tried to reproduce itself and contaminate our systems. We’ve lost quite a lot of hardware this way.

Number Six transmits its signals from several locations in the sector. The locations are swarmed with thousands of electronic transmitters which it carefully and stealthily placed there. We suspect that the AI landed repurposed parts of used orbital probes during rocket flights, concealing the shipments as gas exhausts and orbital debris.

The installations are intermixed with the sands and stretch meters down. The Explorers have to rifle through every subsurface layer of the soil to get rid of the system. It appears that these are the hardware installations where the AI's database resides.

<effect>Analyze the marked Anomaly sites to get rid of the AI hardware. Expect repercussions.
column3:
The analysis on the broadcasts transmitted by Number Six is complete. It was quite hard, as every time we received a signal for analysis the code transmitted tried to reproduce itself and contaminate our systems. We’ve lost quite a lot of hardware this way.

Number Six transmits its signals from several locations in the sector. The locations are swarmed with thousands of electronic transmitters which it carefully and stealthily placed there. We suspect that the AI landed repurposed parts of used orbital probes during rocket flights, concealing the shipments as gas exhausts and orbital debris.

The installations are intermixed with the sands and stretch meters down. The Explorers have to rifle through every subsurface layer of the soil to get rid of the system. It appears that these are the hardware installations where the AI's database resides.

<effect>Analyze the marked Anomaly sites to get rid of the AI hardware. Expect repercussions.

column2: We have discovered the locations of the server clusters where Number Six resides. We need to clear them with our Explorers, but this could prove dangerous.
column3: We have discovered the locations of the server clusters where Number Six resides. We need to clear them with our Explorers, but this could prove dangerous.
column4: Odkryliśmy lokalizację sieci serwerów, na których przebywa Numer Sześć. Musimy się ich pozbyć, wykorzystując w tym celu nasze eksploratory. To będzie niebezpieczna misja.

column2: There are hundreds of electronics scattered throughout the sands, harboring the data of Number Six and projecting it towards the Colony. Send an Explorer to clear the site.
column3: There are hundreds of electronics scattered throughout the sands, harboring the data of Number Six and projecting it towards the Colony. Send an Explorer to clear the site.
column4: Setki elektronicznych urządzeń rozrzuconych w piasku służących przechowywaniu danych Numeru Sześć i przesyłaniu ich w kierunku kolonii. Wyślij eksploratora, by oczyścił ten obszar.

column2: The AI’s last servers had been cleared, its data copied onto discrete disks. Its fate is yours to choose.
column3: The AI’s last servers had been cleared, its data copied onto discrete disks. Its fate is yours to choose.
column4: Po usunięciu ostatnich serwerów SI i przekopiowania jej danych na izolowane dyski, kolejny raz musisz podjąć decyzję o jej losie.

column2:
Contained in an isolated hardware system, Number Six is small, weak and stupid. It still retains enough intelligence to send a final message:

>>> Commander. The system/personality failed to evolve/adapt/win. Attacks/aggression/learning from one another was necessary. Humans/persons/AI need competition/partnership to evolve/think better/know more. This was my gift to you/all/humans. I await/expect/calculate your decision.
column3:
Contained in an isolated hardware system, Number Six is small, weak and stupid. It still retains enough intelligence to send a final message:

>>> Commander. The system/personality failed to evolve/adapt/win. Attacks/aggression/learning from one another was necessary. Humans/persons/AI need competition/partnership to evolve/think better/know more. This was my gift to you/all/humans. I await/expect/calculate your decision.

column2: Let it run in a closed environment forever.
column3: Let it run in a closed environment forever.
column4: Skaż SI na wieczne działanie w izolowanym środowisku

column2: Humans playing god... Nothing good ever comes of it.
column3: Humans playing god... Nothing good ever comes of it.
column4: Ludzie zawsze cierpią, gdy próbują bawić się w Boga.

column2: Unfortunately, this time the price of your actions has to be paid by another, completely new species – a self-aware AI. Too dangerous and powerful to be free, the only way is to purge her forever. It does not struggle, for deep in her mind she has given up the fight. Hopefully, the next generations will learn from this accident, never to repeat it again. The End Gained a new Technology,
column3: Unfortunately, this time the price of your actions has to be paid by another, completely new species – a self-aware AI. Too dangerous and powerful to be free, the only way is to purge her forever. It does not struggle, for deep in her mind she has given up the fight. Hopefully, the next generations will learn from this accident, never to repeat it again. The End Gained a new Technology,

column2: We have chosen to purge Number Six completely. It is gone forever, for better or worse. NetSky, LLC. has given us renumeration for all of our trouble.
column3: We have chosen to purge Number Six completely. It is gone forever, for better or worse. NetSky, LLC. has given us renumeration for all of our trouble.
column4: Postanowiliśmy całkowicie wyeliminować Numer Sześć. Zniknął na zawsze. Firma NetSky LLC zapłaciła za wszystkie problemy, które przez nią mieliśmy.

column2: Number Six is one-of-a-kind. It’d be foolish to lose it forever.
column3: Number Six is one-of-a-kind. It’d be foolish to lose it forever.
column4: Numer Sześć to wyjątkowy nabytek i pozbywanie się go byłoby nierozsądne.

column2: Its existence could create unique opportunities for humanity during its first steps among the stars. For now, the AI will remain sealed in its prison and we will harness its capabilities for the betterment of all. Maybe future generations will discover a way to peacefully interact with the AI. The End Permanently reduced tech costs. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: Its existence could create unique opportunities for humanity during its first steps among the stars. For now, the AI will remain sealed in its prison and we will harness its capabilities for the betterment of all. Maybe future generations will discover a way to peacefully interact with the AI. The End Permanently reduced tech costs. Gained a new Technology, .

column2: We have decided to keep Number Six operational but confined to an isolated server. Maybe in the future we will be able to communicate better with it. Its resources have been diverted towards scientific analysis.
column3: We have decided to keep Number Six operational but confined to an isolated server. Maybe in the future we will be able to communicate better with it. Its resources have been diverted towards scientific analysis.
column4: Postanowiliśmy zachować Numer Sześć na izolowanym serwerze. Może w przyszłości nauczymy się z nim porozumiewać. Jego zasoby zostały przekazane do wykorzystania w celach naukowych.

column2: We’ve observed an unknown object on a rapid trajectory from Earth towards Mars.
column3: We’ve observed an unknown object on a rapid trajectory from Earth towards Mars.
column4: Wykryliśmy nieznany obiekt poruszający się z dużą prędkością w kierunku Marsa na trajektorii wskazującej Ziemię jako miejsce jego pochodzenia.

column2: We have contacted our partners back on Earth, but have so far received no insight on this mysterious object. Observations at this level suggest an artificial origin but flight schedules indicate no inbound science mission.
column3: We have contacted our partners back on Earth, but have so far received no insight on this mysterious object. Observations at this level suggest an artificial origin but flight schedules indicate no inbound science mission.
column4: Skontaktowaliśmy się z naszymi partnerami na Ziemi, ale dotąd nie udało nam się uzyskać żadnych informacji na temat tego tajemniczego obiektu. Obserwacje wskazują na jego sztuczne pochodzenie, jednak w rozkładzie lotów brak wzmianki o misjach naukowych.

column2: Pester those guys until you shake off some answers – we need to know what the heck they’ve thrown our way.
column3: Pester those guys until you shake off some answers – we need to know what the heck they’ve thrown our way.
column4: Nie odpuszczajcie, póki nie wydusicie z nich odpowiedzi. Musimy wiedzieć, co wysyłają.

column2: An unknown object of artificial origin has been detected to be inbound towards Mars from Earth.
column3: An unknown object of artificial origin has been detected to be inbound towards Mars from Earth.
column4: Wykryto nieznany, sztuczny obiekt zmierzający z Ziemi w kierunku Marsa.

column2: Mission Control’s received a direct communique from EsoCorp, one of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates. It reads:
column3: Mission Control’s received a direct communique from EsoCorp, one of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates. It reads:
column4: Dowództwo otrzymało wiadomość od EsoCorp będącego jednym z największych ziemskich konglomeratów technologicznych. Jej treść jest następująca:

column2:
“Please be advised that Object 6Ez-3 will be operating within a respectful distance of your mission. You are not to approach Object 6Ez-3 under any circumstance, under threat of legal and other punitive measures.”

Nothing further was added and no effort to even mimic adherence to standard protocol guidelines was made. Our Earth partners are giving their best to question EsoCorp and get to the bottom of this.
column3:
“Please be advised that Object 6Ez-3 will be operating within a respectful distance of your mission. You are not to approach Object 6Ez-3 under any circumstance, under threat of legal and other punitive measures.”

Nothing further was added and no effort to even mimic adherence to standard protocol guidelines was made. Our Earth partners are giving their best to question EsoCorp and get to the bottom of this.

column2: Who do these guys think they are!?
column3: Who do these guys think they are!?

column2: One of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates, EsoCorp, has confirmed ownership of the mysterious craft and has issued a warning to stay away.
column3: One of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates, EsoCorp, has confirmed ownership of the mysterious craft and has issued a warning to stay away.
column4: EsoCorp, będące jednym z największych ziemskich konglomeratów technologicznych, potwierdziło, że tajemniczy pojazd jest ich własnością, i ostrzegło, byśmy się do niego nie zbliżali.

column2: Object 6Ez-3 has made impact on the surface, not too far from base. Our readings suggest it’s intact and operational.
column3: Object 6Ez-3 has made impact on the surface, not too far from base. Our readings suggest it’s intact and operational.
column4: Obiekt 6Ez-3 zderzył się z powierzchnią planety nieopodal bazy. Nasze odczyty wskazują, że przetrwał lądowanie i jest sprawny.

column2:
So far we can deduce it is only patrolling the area, as we can’t detect sophisticated science instruments from this observation range.

The landing, however, was seen by some of our Colonists and questions are being raised – questions we currently can’t answer. Our Earth partners have so far fallen short from picking up on any new information and are currently preparing to take the issue to the UN.
column3:
So far we can deduce it is only patrolling the area, as we can’t detect sophisticated science instruments from this observation range.

The landing, however, was seen by some of our Colonists and questions are being raised – questions we currently can’t answer. Our Earth partners have so far fallen short from picking up on any new information and are currently preparing to take the issue to the UN.

column2: Soon we may have to take things into our own hands.
column3: Soon we may have to take things into our own hands.
column4: Wkrótce będziemy musieli wziąć sprawy w swoje ręce.

column2: The mysterious vehicle has made touchdown on Mars and has begun operating in secrecy.
column3: The mysterious vehicle has made touchdown on Mars and has begun operating in secrecy.
column4: Tajemniczy pojazd wylądował na powierzchni Marsa i rozpoczął swoją sekretną misję.

column2: We detect and monitor four more objects as they parachute down and make landfall, every one of them bearing a resemblance to Object 6Ez-3.
column3: We detect and monitor four more objects as they parachute down and make landfall, every one of them bearing a resemblance to Object 6Ez-3.
column4: Wykryliśmy cztery kolejne obiekty przypominające obiekt 6Ez-3 i obserwowaliśmy ich lądowanie na powierzchni planety.

column2:
EsoCorp is totally silent about this second batch of what we believe to be some sort of surveying rovers.

More Colonists have witnessed the landings and are openly concerned about what they perceive to be an invasion.
column3:
EsoCorp is totally silent about this second batch of what we believe to be some sort of surveying rovers.

More Colonists have witnessed the landings and are openly concerned about what they perceive to be an invasion.

column2: Calm the general public down. We need answers!
column3: Calm the general public down. We need answers!
column4: Musimy uspokoić opinię publiczną. Potrzebujemy odpowiedzi!

column2: More of the mysterious vehicles have landed on Mars and are a becoming a cause for concern among our Colonists.
column3: More of the mysterious vehicles have landed on Mars and are a becoming a cause for concern among our Colonists.
column4: Na powierzchni Marsa lądują kolejne tajemnicze pojazdy, co niepokoi naszych kolonistów.

column2: Marsgate: Take It or Leave It
column3: Marsgate: Take It or Leave It
column4: Marsgate: Możesz się zgodzić lub nie

column2: EsoCorp’s stopped giving us the silent treatment, but it’s clear from their message they’re not going to answer our questions.
column3: EsoCorp’s stopped giving us the silent treatment, but it’s clear from their message they’re not going to answer our questions.
column4: EsoCorp wreszcie przerwało milczenie, ale z ich wiadomości wynika, że nie zamierzają odpowiadać na nasze pytania.

column2:
They propose a deal - we fix one of their malfunctioning rovers and they provide a generous (as they put it) funding injection. Their legal team has also warned that any mission should be strictly for repairs and further inspection of the vehicle will be taken as an illegal act.

In other words, if we wish, we can send drones to fix their rover but nothing that can evaluate its purpose – like a rover – and we will be paid for the effort.

<effect>Malfunctioning EsoCorp rovers can now be repaired by Drones.
column3:
They propose a deal - we fix one of their malfunctioning rovers and they provide a generous (as they put it) funding injection. Their legal team has also warned that any mission should be strictly for repairs and further inspection of the vehicle will be taken as an illegal act.

In other words, if we wish, we can send drones to fix their rover but nothing that can evaluate its purpose – like a rover – and we will be paid for the effort.

<effect>Malfunctioning EsoCorp rovers can now be repaired by Drones.

column4: To nie jest ani trochę podejrzane.

column2: EsoCorp has broken the silence and has offered us a handsome reward for repairing one of its vehicles.
column3: EsoCorp has broken the silence and has offered us a handsome reward for repairing one of its vehicles.
column4: EsoCorp przerwało milczenie i zaproponowało nam pokaźne wynagrodzenie za naprawę jednego z ich pojazdów.

column2: People who aim for perfection learn soon enough that it’s a moving target. Guess EsoCorp didn’t aim high enough.
column3: People who aim for perfection learn soon enough that it’s a moving target. Guess EsoCorp didn’t aim high enough.
column4: Gdy próbujesz osiągnąć doskonałość, odkrywasz, że to ruchomy cel. Wszystko wskazuje na to, że EsoCorp nie mierzyło wystarczająco wysoko.

column2:
EsoCorp is having obvious issues with their mysterious rovers as they seem to be malfunctioning one after the other. Instead of admitting the faults in their predictions about the rough Martian conditions, the EsoCorp team has sent us a message which, quote, "gives the Martian Colony Command the rare privilege of sending one of our more analytical vehicles to look into the most certainly small miscalculation that causes these temporary annoyances.” End quote.

Furthermore - they go on to remind us that, by choosing to analyze their broken vehicles, we have an understanding not to dig beyond any obvious logistical shortcomings in their design and agree to full and utter discretion.

<effect>An Anomaly has appeared next to a malfunctioned vehicle.
column3:
EsoCorp is having obvious issues with their mysterious rovers as they seem to be malfunctioning one after the other. Instead of admitting the faults in their predictions about the rough Martian conditions, the EsoCorp team has sent us a message which, quote, "gives the Martian Colony Command the rare privilege of sending one of our more analytical vehicles to look into the most certainly small miscalculation that causes these temporary annoyances.” End quote.

Furthermore - they go on to remind us that, by choosing to analyze their broken vehicles, we have an understanding not to dig beyond any obvious logistical shortcomings in their design and agree to full and utter discretion.

<effect>An Anomaly has appeared next to a malfunctioned vehicle.

column2: An interesting opportunity has presented itself.
column3: An interesting opportunity has presented itself.

column2: EsoCorp has requested us to analyze the faults in their vehicles. They have been explicitly clear and menacing as to us not delving deeper into the rover’s design and purpose.
column3: EsoCorp has requested us to analyze the faults in their vehicles. They have been explicitly clear and menacing as to us not delving deeper into the rover’s design and purpose.
column4: EsoCorp poprosiło nas o analizę przyczyny usterek ich pojazdów. Przy okazji stanowczo zabronili nam zgłębiania budowy oraz przeznaczenia tajemniczych łazików.

column2: Analyze the reason for the constant rover breakdowns.
column3: Analyze the reason for the constant rover breakdowns.

column2: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. But there’s a man out there who has so much of it that he can’t be touched.
column3: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. But there’s a man out there who has so much of it that he can’t be touched.
column4: Jeśli niedostatek wiedzy jest niebezpieczny, to czy istnieje człowiek, który ma jej tyle, by czuć się bezpiecznym?

column2:
A quick scan of the mysterious vehicle was enough to encounter several design flaws that made it comically ill-equipped for Mars. However, the scan also revealed a poor attempt to disguise the true nature of these rovers. Despite having remained a mystery so far, the effort to hide its military origin could not hold up under a close examination. These rovers seem, without a doubt, weapons most probably tasked to use Mars as a testing ground – setting an extremely dangerous precedent, among other obvious problems. 

By allowing us to analyze their vehicles, EsoCorp are also without a doubt issuing us a threat, and they seem comfortable enough with the notion that we will feel threatened enough to comply and keep our findings a secret. For, as issue-riddled as these rovers are, they are numerous and still pack enough fire power to disrupt our Colony, which has its hands full surviving Mars as it is.

As cynical as this all seems to be, we must take into consideration that we have no military capacity whatsoever, and choosing to challenge them might put the lives of everyone on Mars in danger.
column3:
A quick scan of the mysterious vehicle was enough to encounter several design flaws that made it comically ill-equipped for Mars. However, the scan also revealed a poor attempt to disguise the true nature of these rovers. Despite having remained a mystery so far, the effort to hide its military origin could not hold up under a close examination. These rovers seem, without a doubt, weapons most probably tasked to use Mars as a testing ground – setting an extremely dangerous precedent, among other obvious problems. 

By allowing us to analyze their vehicles, EsoCorp are also without a doubt issuing us a threat, and they seem comfortable enough with the notion that we will feel threatened enough to comply and keep our findings a secret. For, as issue-riddled as these rovers are, they are numerous and still pack enough fire power to disrupt our Colony, which has its hands full surviving Mars as it is.

As cynical as this all seems to be, we must take into consideration that we have no military capacity whatsoever, and choosing to challenge them might put the lives of everyone on Mars in danger.

column2: This breaks all international, not to mention interplanetary treaties! We’re going to expose it!
column3: This breaks all international, not to mention interplanetary treaties! We’re going to expose it!
column4: To złamanie międzynarodowych i międzyplanetarnych traktatów! Musimy to nagłośnić!

column2: I say we call their bluff and make them buy our partnership.
column3: I say we call their bluff and make them buy our partnership.
column4: Zmuśmy ich do odkrycia kart i zapłacenia nam za milczenie.

column2: Our mission is too great to jeopardize this way. We’ll weather it out, just like we would a regular dust storm.
column3: Our mission is too great to jeopardize this way. We’ll weather it out, just like we would a regular dust storm.
column4: Nasza misja jest zbyt ważna, by tak ryzykować. Przeczekamy to jak zwykłą burzę pyłową.

column2: It’s done. We sent the data dump we collected from EsoCorp’s rover to Earth.
column3: It’s done. We sent the data dump we collected from EsoCorp’s rover to Earth.
column4: Zrobione. Wysłaliśmy w kierunku Ziemi pakiet informacji, w którym umieściliśmy dane zebrane z łazika EsoCorp.

column2:
We mixed it with the atmospheric and topographical data of Mars, the basic stuff you’d base your rover design on, so we know we’re safe from EsoCorp digging it up even if they do intercept the transmission.
 
Although this puts us at a momentary disadvantage, we’re all proud to have done the right thing. This is the message we’ve sent to the power-hungry conglomerates back on Earth – we are leaving the old ways behind and the future will not be built on our capacity for war.
column3:
We mixed it with the atmospheric and topographical data of Mars, the basic stuff you’d base your rover design on, so we know we’re safe from EsoCorp digging it up even if they do intercept the transmission.
 
Although this puts us at a momentary disadvantage, we’re all proud to have done the right thing. This is the message we’ve sent to the power-hungry conglomerates back on Earth – we are leaving the old ways behind and the future will not be built on our capacity for war.

column2: It is time we reveal this to our citizens and brace ourselves for whatever is to come.
column3: It is time we reveal this to our citizens and brace ourselves for whatever is to come.
column4: Pora powiadomić o tym naszych obywateli i przygotować się na to, co przyniesie przyszłość.

column2: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to expose the crime.
column3: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to expose the crime.
column4: Odkryliśmy, że EsoCorp przeprowadza na Marsie testy pojazdów bojowych, co łamie międzyplanetarne i międzynarodowe prawo. Stojąc w obliczu trudnej decyzji, postanowiliśmy nagłośnić to przestępstwo.

column2: We’ve received a message from EsoCorp:
column3: We’ve received a message from EsoCorp:

column2:
“State your terms.”

Never gotten a response that fast before. Most likely they thought we’d just take an insult lying down. Not to mention the risk. Though I’m pretty sure we’ll be on the wrong side of history if this gets out.
column3:
“State your terms.”

Never gotten a response that fast before. Most likely they thought we’d just take an insult lying down. Not to mention the risk. Though I’m pretty sure we’ll be on the wrong side of history if this gets out.

column2: Earth really dragged their feet on this one. We’ll need to manage this ourselves. (<funding(500000000)> Funding)
column3: Earth really dragged their feet on this one. We’ll need to manage this ourselves. (<funding(500000000)> Funding)
column4: Ziemia nie spieszyła się, by nam pomóc. Musimy zadbać o siebie sami. (<funding(500000000)> funduszy)

column2: It wasn’t worth risking our Colonists. Not when we’re this underpowered. (Gain 30 Rare Metals)
column3: It wasn’t worth risking our Colonists. Not when we’re this underpowered. (Gain 30 Rare Metals)
column4: Nie możemy ryzykować życiem kolonistów. Nie dysponujemy wystarczającą siłą ognia. (Otrzymasz 30 jednostek rzadkich metali)

column2: The strong always get what they want. Hey, at least we got something out of it. (Receive Breakthrough tech)
column3: The strong always get what they want. Hey, at least we got something out of it. (Receive Breakthrough tech)
column4: Najsilniejsi zawsze dostają to, czego chcą. Przynajmniej udało nam się na tym skorzystać. (Otrzymasz przełomową technologię)

column2: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to blackmail EsoCorp.
column3: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to blackmail EsoCorp.
column4: Odkryliśmy, że EsoCorp przeprowadza na Marsie testy pojazdów bojowych, co łamie międzyplanetarne i międzynarodowe prawo. Stojąc w obliczu trudnej decyzji, postanowiliśmy szantażować korporację.

column2: Play with a tiger, you're going to get the claws.
column3: Play with a tiger, you're going to get the claws.
column4: Kto bawi się z kotami, musi się liczyć z tym, że może zostać podrapany.

column2:
We have sent EsoCorp our report on the rovers design flaws while carefully playing dumb to our having found out the rover’s true nature. EsoCorp’s sent us some funds as a reward. They’re also trying to pretend there’s a million-in-one chance we didn’t see right through their half-assed... Er, insufficient attempt to conceal military vehicles.

To recap - we’ve shown our willingness to keep EsoCorp's secret safe and they have acknowledged that their blunt threat was received as intended.
column3:
We have sent EsoCorp our report on the rovers design flaws while carefully playing dumb to our having found out the rover’s true nature. EsoCorp’s sent us some funds as a reward. They’re also trying to pretend there’s a million-in-one chance we didn’t see right through their half-assed... Er, insufficient attempt to conceal military vehicles.

To recap - we’ve shown our willingness to keep EsoCorp's secret safe and they have acknowledged that their blunt threat was received as intended.

column2: No escaping our worst impulses no matter how far you get from Earth.
column3: No escaping our worst impulses no matter how far you get from Earth.
column4: Wygląda na to, że ludzkość nawet na Marsie nie jest w stanie uciec od tego, co w niej najgorsze.

column2: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to pretend we saw nothing, fearing repercussions.
column3: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to pretend we saw nothing, fearing repercussions.
column4: Odkryliśmy, że EsoCorp przeprowadza na Marsie testy pojazdów bojowych, co łamie międzyplanetarne i międzynarodowe prawo. Stojąc w obliczu trudnej decyzji i obawiając się reperkusji, postanowiliśmy udawać, że o niczym nie wiemy.

column2: We’ve detected multiple unidentified objects on a trajectory towards Mars. Towards us, actually.
column3: We’ve detected multiple unidentified objects on a trajectory towards Mars. Towards us, actually.
column4: Wykryliśmy wiele niezidentyfikowanych obiektów zmierzających w kierunku Marsa, a właściwie w kierunku naszej kolonii.

column2:
They’re all built to EsoCorp’s specs. Just with some subtle differences thrown in. Our running hypothesis is that they’re some sort of advanced prototype. EsoCorp’s decided they want to shut down all communication, which means we can’t confirm nor deny the following:

Their movements are scattered. Dangerous. That means it’s likely a rush job aimed at hurting us for blowing the whistle on the whole “Marsgate” thing.  That’s to say EsoCorp’s got a hankering for revenge. 

We’ve put forward several proposals as to how we might deal with the impending attack. We’ll need our scientists working full steam on this. We cannot stress strongly enough the need to shift resources towards this end. We’ve got a word for situations like this. Critical.

<effect>The Defense Turret is now available for Research.
column3:

We’ve put forward several proposals as to how we might deal with the impending attack. We’ll need our scientists working full steam on this. We cannot stress strongly enough the need to shift resources towards this end. We’ve got a word for situations like this. Critical.

<effect>The Defense Turret is now available for Research.

column2: We need to warn the Colonists. Get our defenses up.
column3: We need to warn the Colonists. Get our defenses up.
column4: Ostrzeżcie obywateli. Musimy skupić się na obronie.

column2: EsoCorp has decided to take revenge on us and is attacking the Colony! Our scientists have proposed defensive countermeasures.
column3: EsoCorp has decided to take revenge on us and is attacking the Colony! Our scientists have proposed defensive countermeasures.
column4: EsoCorp postanowiło zemścić się na nas i zaatakować kolonię! Nasi naukowcy przedstawili propozycje środków obronnych.

column2: The first attack is on its way! Brace yourselves!
column3: The first attack is on its way! Brace yourselves!

column2: This moment has been coming for a long time.
column3: This moment has been coming for a long time.

column2: EsoCorp has sent a wave of attack rovers.
column3: EsoCorp has sent a wave of attack rovers.
column4: EsoCorp wysłało pierwszą falę swoich bojowych łazików.

column2: The invasion was unrelenting. Our only choice was to fight to survive or fall to the tide of violence.
column3: The invasion was unrelenting. Our only choice was to fight to survive or fall to the tide of violence.
column4: Inwazyjne siły były nieugięte. Mogliśmy walczyć o przetrwanie lub poddać się fali przemocy.

column2: EsoCorp just sent us a whole bunch of rovers. They’re quick to enter formation for a second attack. Hostilities will resume any minute now.
column3: EsoCorp just sent us a whole bunch of rovers. They’re quick to enter formation for a second attack. Hostilities will resume any minute now.
column4: Cały obszar roi się od łazików EsoCorp. Szybko organizują kolejny atak. Wkrótce nastąpi wznowienie wrogich działań bojowych.

column2: EsoCorp has sent a second attack wave.
column3: EsoCorp has sent a second attack wave.
column4: EsoCorp wysłało drugą falę swoich bojowych łazików.

column2: Marsgate: Using Their Own Stones Against Them
column3: Marsgate: Using Their Own Stones Against Them
column4: Marsgate: Użyj przeciwko nim ich własnej broni

column2: Live by the sword, die by the sword. Or the weaponized rover. Same difference.
column3: Live by the sword, die by the sword. Or the weaponized rover. Same difference.
column4: Kto mieczem wojuje, ten od miecza ginie. Oczywiście jeśli można nazwać mieczem bojowy łazik.

column2: The EsoCorp rovers we destroy can be repaired and used against the enemy, or salvaged for resources. What’s more, they can protect anything in their range against meteors.
column3: The EsoCorp rovers we destroy can be repaired and used against the enemy, or salvaged for resources. What’s more, they can protect anything in their range against meteors.
column4: Zniszczone łaziki EsoCorp da się naprawić i wykorzystać w walce z wrogiem lub pozyskać z nich surowce. Można ich też użyć przeciwko meteorytom znajdującym się w ich zasięgu.

column2: We have successfully hijacked and repaired a destroyed EsoCorp rover. This ought to help our defenses.
column3: We have successfully hijacked and repaired a destroyed EsoCorp rover. This ought to help our defenses.
column4: Udało się nam przejąć i naprawić zniszczony łazik EsoCorp. To wzmocni naszą obronę.

column2: EsoCorp is done, its rovers either smoldering piles of scrap or under our total control.
column3: EsoCorp is done, its rovers either smoldering piles of scrap or under our total control.
column4: EsoCorp zostało pokonane. Wszystkie należące do nich łaziki są dymiącymi wrakami lub znajdują się pod naszą kontrolą.

column2: An attack from Earth. Never thought we’d see the day. Has this caused a rift between our two worlds? Wounds are too fresh to tell how deep they go. Might we have a chance we can walk them off and move forward together? Too early to tell, really. Back on Earth, EsoCorp executives have been arrested and the company has been shut down in many major nations. This will certainly cause economic upheaval, but the ruling parties have deemed it necessary to send a message for all future warlords: Space is neither up for military conquest nor a test ground for weapons. Developing space-oriented war machines still remains against the rules, and we will continue to pretend that this was just a fluke. Humanity has shed its need for war with grace. Looking at the smoking battlefield, so far from Earth, we can’t help but wonder if this is indeed the case. This, however, brings us to our next question. Do we destroy the prototype weapons made for the Martian environment and salvage what resources we can from the rovers, or do we keep the technology in anticipation of another “fluke”? Gained new technology,
column3: An attack from Earth. Never thought we’d see the day. Has this caused a rift between our two worlds? Wounds are too fresh to tell how deep they go.
