Gained new technology,

column2: Put 6Ez-3 on display, destroy the rest.
column3: Put 6Ez-3 on display, destroy the rest.
column4: Wystawcie 6Ez-3 na widok publiczny, a resztę zniszczcie.

column2: We would be fools to be caught so defenseless once again.
column3: We would be fools to be caught so defenseless once again.
column4: Bylibyśmy głupcami, gdybyśmy znów dali się zaskoczyć bez jakiejkolwiek obrony.

column2: EsoCorp’s rovers have been neutralized. The Marsgate affair has ended as all EsoCorp executives have been arrested by the authorities on Earth.
column3: EsoCorp’s rovers have been neutralized. The Marsgate affair has ended as all EsoCorp executives have been arrested by the authorities on Earth.
column4: Łaziki EsoCorp zostały zneutralizowane. Afera Marsgate zakończyła się aresztowaniem wszystkich kierowników EsoCorp przez władze na Ziemi.

column2: We blew the whistle on EsoCorp’s dealings and every news agency on Earth sunk their teeth right in. This ought to be interesting.
column3: We blew the whistle on EsoCorp’s dealings and every news agency on Earth sunk their teeth right in. This ought to be interesting.
column4: Wszystkie kanały informacyjne na Ziemi rozgrzały do czerwoności ujawnione przez nas dane o działalności EsoCorp. To będzie interesujące.

column2:
Governments and international organizations are furious with EsoCorp’s subterfuge and forbidden military experiments and people were fast to dub the scandal “Marsgate”. As the blame game is unraveling, we can’t help but notice that all channels EsoCorp barely used to communicate with us have now been totally taken offline. Our sponsors from Earth are promising us compensation and guaranteeing protection from EsoCorp, but we fear they may not be able to help fast enough if EsoCorp decides to take revenge.

This being said, you will have to take part in an upcoming UN trial as the main witness to this whole gruesome affair.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.
column3:
Governments and international organizations are furious with EsoCorp’s subterfuge and forbidden military experiments and people were fast to dub the scandal “Marsgate”. As the blame game is unraveling, we can’t help but notice that all channels EsoCorp barely used to communicate with us have now been totally taken offline. Our sponsors from Earth are promising us compensation and guaranteeing protection from EsoCorp, but we fear they may not be able to help fast enough if EsoCorp decides to take revenge.

This being said, you will have to take part in an upcoming UN trial as the main witness to this whole gruesome affair.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.

column4: Nadszedł czas, by potwierdzić swoje słowa przed sądem.

column2: Marsgate has exploded. We are given a heads up that a UN trial will begin soon.
column3: Marsgate has exploded. We are given a heads up that a UN trial will begin soon.
column4: Afera Marsgate wybuchła. Powiadomiono nas, że ONZ wkrótce rozpocznie proces.

column2: Marsgate: The Trial of the Century
column3: Marsgate: The Trial of the Century

column2: The UN trial is about to start. You can guarantee they’re all hot under the collar.
column3: The UN trial is about to start. You can guarantee they’re all hot under the collar.
column4: Proces EsoCorp organizowany pod auspicjami ONZ-u wkrótce się rozpocznie. Robi się gorąco.

column2: The risk was great, but we did the right thing.
column3: The risk was great, but we did the right thing.
column4: Ryzyko było wielkie, ale postąpiliśmy słusznie.

column2:
EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. A harsh verdict today will stand as testament to humanity reaching the maturity needed to spread amidst the stars.

<effect><reg_param1> Applicants with rare traits are available on Earth
column3:
EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. A harsh verdict today will stand as testament to humanity reaching the maturity needed to spread amidst the stars.

<effect><reg_param1> Applicants with rare traits are available on Earth

column2: It was time for humanity to come to grips with the fact that violence only breeds more violence. And that’s exactly what we told them.
column3: It was time for humanity to come to grips with the fact that violence only breeds more violence. And that’s exactly what we told them.
column4: Ludzkość musi zdać sobie sprawę z tego, że przemoc i agresywna rywalizacja prowadzą jedynie do obopólnej zagłady. Więc jej to powiedzieliśmy.

column2:
We of Mars, who have denounced any militarization, have chosen to move on from the ways of the past and shape our new home into a place where military conflict is a thing of myth and legend. In doing so, we place our trust that this idea will resonate with all people back on Earth, our home world, and bring humanity not only to another planet, but to another level of evolution. Yet this incident has shown us that we may not do so without help from Mother Earth, and this trial today has renewed our hope that our vision for the future is not entirely wishful thinking.

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding
column3:

In doing so, we place our trust that this idea will resonate with all people back on Earth, our home world, and bring humanity not only to another planet, but to another level of evolution. Yet this incident has shown us that we may not do so without help from Mother Earth, and this trial today has renewed our hope that our vision for the future is not entirely wishful thinking.

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding

column2: The UN has praised and rewarded us for our brave and risky move to expose EsoCorp.
column3: The UN has praised and rewarded us for our brave and risky move to expose EsoCorp.
column4: ONZ pochwaliło nas i wynagrodziło za dzielne podjęcie ryzyka, by ujawnić nielegalną działalność EsoCorp.

column2: The cat’s out of the bag. One of our bolder Colonists took it upon himself to do what we couldn’t – expose EsoCorp and their dirty dealings on Mars.
column3: The cat’s out of the bag. One of our bolder Colonists took it upon himself to do what we couldn’t – expose EsoCorp and their dirty dealings on Mars.
column4: Zostaliśmy zdemaskowani! Jeden z naszych kolonistów uczynił to, czego my nie byliśmy w stanie zrobić - wyjawił prawdę o EsoCorp i ich nielegalnej działalności na Marsie.

column2:
The lengths he has taken to circumvent our detection not only by EsoCorp, but that of Mission Control as well, shows us painstakingly that we have failed him and probably many others like him. In their eyes we were playing for the other team. It puts us all to shame. Many citizens are showing their discontent with our Colony now that our own actions have been exposed, and back on Earth this whole ordeal is blowing up to mind boggling proportions. It has been dubbed “Marsgate” and we are accused of being compliant in the breaking of international and interplanetary treaties by the UN. 

Popular pressure has prompted that a trial start as quickly as possible. You will be required to defend our actions via satellite link.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.
column3:
The lengths he has taken to circumvent our detection not only by EsoCorp, but that of Mission Control as well, shows us painstakingly that we have failed him and probably many others like him. Popular pressure has prompted that a trial start as quickly as possible. You will be required to defend our actions via satellite link.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.

column2: We only wanted to protect them, right?
column3: We only wanted to protect them, right?
column4: Przecież chcieliśmy ich tylko chronić, czyż nie?

column2: Marsgate has exploded. One of our citizens has exposed EsoCorp and our involvement in the affair.
column3: Marsgate has exploded. One of our citizens has exposed EsoCorp and our involvement in the affair.
column4: Wybuchła afera Marsgate. Jeden z naszych obywateli zdemaskował EsoCorp i ujawnił nasz udział w ich nielegalnej działalności.

column2: The UN trial is about to start... I can already feel the water heating up.
column3: The UN trial is about to start... I can already feel the water heating up.
column4: Proces EsoCorp organizowany pod auspicjami ONZ-u wkrótce się rozpocznie. Spróbują pożreć nas żywcem.

column2:
Joining the legal proceedings against the entity known as EsoCorp by satellite link is the head of the Mars Colony Project as a representative of <reg_param1> and the main victim in “Marsgate” other than the total disregarding of international and interplanetary treaties. The treaties, which are in place to discourage the militarization of any human endeavors in space, are held to be of utter importance by all present parties, except the defendant, and thus the transgression is seen as most grievous. 

Because communication with Mars is not at its peak at this time and will take too long for a proper discussion, know that our sponsors have shared your overall stance on the whole affair. Still, as the final verdict draws near we have decided it best if you say in your own words the implications of EsoCorp’s secretive and illegal military testing operations on Mars.
column3:
Joining the legal proceedings against the entity known as EsoCorp by satellite link is the head of the Mars Colony Project as a representative of <reg_param1> and the main victim in “Marsgate” other than the total disregarding of international and interplanetary treaties. The treaties, which are in place to discourage the militarization of any human endeavors in space, are held to be of utter importance by all present parties, except the defendant, and thus the transgression is seen as most grievous. 

Because communication with Mars is not at its peak at this time and will take too long for a proper discussion, know that our sponsors have shared your overall stance on the whole affair. Still, as the final verdict draws near we have decided it best if you say in your own words the implications of EsoCorp’s secretive and illegal military testing operations on Mars.

column2: At the end of the day, it is Earth that has failed us by allowing this whole thing in the first place.
column3: At the end of the day, it is Earth that has failed us by allowing this whole thing in the first place.
column4: Ostatecznie to Ziemia nas zawiodła, pozwalając EsoCorp na nielegalną działalność.

column2: You want the truth? You can’t handle the truth!
column3: You want the truth? You can’t handle the truth!
column4: Chcecie prawdy? Nie jesteście w stanie znieść prawdy!

column2: A tough moment. We tried our best not to fan the flames.
column3: A tough moment. We tried our best not to fan the flames.
column4: To była trudna sytuacja i staraliśmy się wybrnąć z niej najlepiej, jak potrafiliśmy.

column2:
EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. We at Mission Control, on the other hand, are tasked with protecting the mission and the lives of all people taking part in it, so we did what we saw fit in order to see our duties are met. With guns pointing at our life support equipment and the closest help 3 million miles away, we were left with little choice and we stand by our decision. Why EsoCorp was able to send these rovers all the way to Mars without being detected from Earth is beyond us and we, the people of Mars, feel let down by Earth today.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.
column3:
EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. We at Mission Control, on the other hand, are tasked with protecting the mission and the lives of all people taking part in it, so we did what we saw fit in order to see our duties are met. With guns pointing at our life support equipment and the closest help 3 million miles away, we were left with little choice and we stand by our decision. Why EsoCorp was able to send these rovers all the way to Mars without being detected from Earth is beyond us and we, the people of Mars, feel let down by Earth today.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.

column2: Marsgate: What Can Change the Nature of Man?
column3: Marsgate: What Can Change the Nature of Man?
column4: Marsgate: Czego trzeba, by zmienić naturę człowieka?

column2: This was bound to happen. We gave them the whole truth and nothing but the truth, whether they wanted it or not.
column3: This was bound to happen. We gave them the whole truth and nothing but the truth, whether they wanted it or not.
column4: Nasze działanie było nieuchronną konsekwencją zaistniałej sytuacji. Przedstawiliśmy im prawdę i tylko prawdę, bez względu na to, czy im się to podobało, czy nie.

column2:
EsoCorp came to Mars with force, deployed in our vicinity, breaking every law and basically putting a gun to our heads. It was a classic story of the strong bullying the weak, or in this case, someone completely unprepared for such an event. In a way it was a stab in the back, as we idolized Earth as a source of safety while we had to wrestle with the unforgiving calamities of Mars. 

We did not like it, but we came to the realization that it was only a matter of time before this happened and that it was better to have a strong ally. We are pioneers on a new frontier, opening countless possibilities and space for humans to be, well, humans. If it was not EsoCorp today, it would have been someone else tomorrow, I assure you. And that someone else might have come at different circumstances and not offered us, albeit indirectly, a way to stay on their good side. At the end of day, we may have changed planets, but we are still humans, with all the blessings and curses this fact carries in itself.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.

column2: The UN has shown some understanding of the difficult situation we were put in but has fined the Colony nonetheless. The resulting loss of reputation diverted many Applicants from the project.
column3: The UN has shown some understanding of the difficult situation we were put in but has fined the Colony nonetheless. The resulting loss of reputation diverted many Applicants from the project.
column4: ONZ wyraziło zrozumienie dla trudnej sytuacji, w której się znaleźliśmy, ale i tak nałożyło na kolonię grzywnę. Utrata reputacji spowodowała znaczne zmniejszenie liczby ochotników pragnących wziąć udział w projekcie.

column2: Fight fire with fire! Well, rockets. You know what I mean.
column3: Fight fire with fire! Well, rockets. You know what I mean.

column2: We can now build laser-targeting missile defense systems. This will help us mount a defense against the incoming attacks.
column3: We can now build laser-targeting missile defense systems. This will help us mount a defense against the incoming attacks.
column4: Możemy budować rakietowe systemy obronne z naprowadzaniem laserowym. To pomoże nam bronić się przed nadchodzącymi atakami.

column2: This ought to give us a fighting chance.
column3: This ought to give us a fighting chance.
column4: To powinno dać nam szansę na obronę

column2: In an attempt to counter the attacks we designed missile turrets tasked with repulsing all incoming attacks.
column3: In an attempt to counter the attacks we designed missile turrets tasked with repulsing all incoming attacks.
column4: Próbując bronić się przed atakami, skonstruowaliśmy wieżyczki rakietowe do ostrzeliwania napastników.

column2: The Last War: Before The Storm
column3: The Last War: Before The Storm

column2: We have devastating news from Earth!
column3: We have devastating news from Earth!

column2:
A chain of attacks has reduced to ruins major temples and landmarks in Southeast Asia. Preliminary estimates put the body count in the hundreds. 

Despite the scale of the attacks, the perpetrators are believed to be terrorists of a new kind. So far no one has taken responsibility as tensions are high and the blame game is in full swing. 

There is still a lot of confusion. We will be following the events as they unfold.
column3:
A chain of attacks has reduced to ruins major temples and landmarks in Southeast Asia. Preliminary estimates put the body count in the hundreds. 

Despite the scale of the attacks, the perpetrators are believed to be terrorists of a new kind. So far no one has taken responsibility as tensions are high and the blame game is in full swing. 

There is still a lot of confusion. We will be following the events as they unfold.

column2: Disturbing news from Earth! Terrorist attacks have disturbed the relative peace Earth currently enjoys.
column3: Disturbing news from Earth! Terrorist attacks have disturbed the relative peace Earth currently enjoys.
column4: Niepokojące wiadomości z Ziemi! Seria ataków terrorystycznych zakłóciła względny spokój panujący dotąd na Ziemi.

column2: The Last War: As Tensions Rise
column3: The Last War: As Tensions Rise

column2: In the wake of the attacks in Asia, many dormant grievances between the nations affected have been reignited - some of which go far back in time.
column3: In the wake of the attacks in Asia, many dormant grievances between the nations affected have been reignited - some of which go far back in time.
column4: W obliczu fali ataków w Azji podsycono na powrót wiele uśpionych pretensji między zaatakowanymi państwami - niektóre z nich pochodzą sprzed paru wieków.

column2:
The UN has set out a tension meter as it warns that this situation has the potential to escalate into an all-out war if measures aren’t taken.
 
The goal of the meter is to try and give an objective representation of where things are now and to help us understand what works and what doesn’t. Everyone in the UN is asked to step in and do all they can to help calm the spirits.

So far we can see no adequate way to help from here.

<effect>You must find ways to keep the tension from reaching 100%. Upon bringing tensions down to 0% the conflicts on Earth will be successfully resolved. Tensions will rise up from events that happen on Earth and are out of your control.
column3:
The UN has set out a tension meter as it warns that this situation has the potential to escalate into an all-out war if measures aren’t taken.
 
The goal of the meter is to try and give an objective representation of where things are now and to help us understand what works and what doesn’t. Everyone in the UN is asked to step in and do all they can to help calm the spirits.

So far we can see no adequate way to help from here.

<effect>You must find ways to keep the tension from reaching 100%. Upon bringing tensions down to 0% the conflicts on Earth will be successfully resolved. Tensions will rise up from events that happen on Earth and are out of your control.

column2: We will be following the situation closely.
column3: We will be following the situation closely.

column2: The terrorist bombings are igniting tensions around the world. The UN has set out a tension meter and warns of a global conflict.
column3: The terrorist bombings are igniting tensions around the world. The UN has set out a tension meter and warns of a global conflict.
column4: Terrorystyczne zamachy bombowe budzą napięcie na całym świecie. ONZ stworzyła wskaźnik napięcia i ostrzega przed ogólnoświatowym konfliktem.

column2: Our sponsor has informed us that it's now playing a major role in peacekeeping efforts. They are also providing humanitarian aid to vast territories that are affected by the crisis.
column3: Our sponsor has informed us that it's now playing a major role in peacekeeping efforts. They are also providing humanitarian aid to vast territories that are affected by the crisis.
column4: Nasz sponsor powiadomił nas, że odgrywa istotną rolę w działaniach rozjemczych i w pomocy humanitarnej dla rozległych terenów dotkniętych kryzysem.

column2:
Millions have been displaced and food is of severe shortage. 

We have been given a heads up that resource supply from Earth will soon become unavailable for an unspecified amount of time. Now all eyes on Earth are on <reg_param1> and there are those who will benefit greatly by branding them hypocritical in their commitment and intentions - hampering all progress towards peace.  

<effect>Resupply with resources from Earth will be unavailable after 5 Sols. Take care to order any needed resources soon.
column3:
Millions have been displaced and food is of severe shortage. 

We have been given a heads up that resource supply from Earth will soon become unavailable for an unspecified amount of time. Now all eyes on Earth are on <reg_param1> and there are those who will benefit greatly by branding them hypocritical in their commitment and intentions - hampering all progress towards peace.  

<effect>Resupply with resources from Earth will be unavailable after 5 Sols. Take care to order any needed resources soon.

column2: We should brace ourselves for a tough time ahead.
column3: We should brace ourselves for a tough time ahead.
column4: Musimy przygotować się na ciężkie czasy.

column2: The supply embargo is now in effect.
column3: The supply embargo is now in effect.

column2:
We must make do with what we can obtain by ourselves for however long a period this turns out to be. 

<effect>Resupply with resources is now unavailable.
column3:
We must make do with what we can obtain by ourselves for however long a period this turns out to be. 

<effect>Resupply with resources is now unavailable.

column2: Supply resources from Earth have temporarily been stopped.
column3: Supply resources from Earth have temporarily been stopped.
column4: Dowóz zaopatrzenia z Ziemi został tymczasowo wstrzymany.

column2: With millions of refugees, and governments reluctant to take in any at all, a humanitarian crisis on an unprecedented scale has developed.
column3: With millions of refugees, and governments reluctant to take in any at all, a humanitarian crisis on an unprecedented scale has developed.
column4: Liczba uchodźców sięga milionów, ale niewiele rządów jest skłonnych ich przyjąć. Mamy więc do czynienia z kryzysem humanitarnym na bezprecedensową skalę.

column2:
Dug in our struggle to survive on Mars, we seem to have taken for granted that Earth - a place where there is enough of everything we need so desperately up here - is always there for us should we need it. Now that we have established a somewhat solid presence on Mars, and Earth seems to be in a dark place, it seems we may have the opportunity to return the favor.

<reg_param1> has sent a request that we start accepting refugees. They hope this drastic measure to get people to safety will highlight the absurdity of regional governments not taking in refugees and put pressure on them by their own populace.

<effect>20 Refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?
column3:
Dug in our struggle to survive on Mars, we seem to have taken for granted that Earth - a place where there is enough of everything we need so desperately up here - is always there for us should we need it. Now that we have established a somewhat solid presence on Mars, and Earth seems to be in a dark place, it seems we may have the opportunity to return the favor.

<reg_param1> has sent a request that we start accepting refugees. They hope this drastic measure to get people to safety will highlight the absurdity of regional governments not taking in refugees and put pressure on them by their own populace.

<effect>20 Refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?

column2: The Last War: It Has Begun
column3: The Last War: It Has Begun

column2: It has begun. The moment that seemed unthinkable less than a year ago.
column3: It has begun. The moment that seemed unthinkable less than a year ago.
column4: Zaczęło się. Nadeszła chwila, która jeszcze niedawno wydawała się nie do pomyślenia.

column2:
Regional conflicts have dragged the major powers on Earth to declare war on one another. Earth is now officially going through its Third World War. 

So far no nuclear weapons are reported to have been used, and we pray to whatever gods are listening up here on Mars, that none will be used. But somewhere in the now abandoned halls of the UN building in New York, the Doomsday Clock sits in the dark - with its warning having fallen on deaf ears and its hands perilously close to midnight.

<effect>All rockets are unavailable due to chaos on Earth.
column3:
Regional conflicts have dragged the major powers on Earth to declare war on one another. Earth is now officially going through its Third World War. 

So far no nuclear weapons are reported to have been used, and we pray to whatever gods are listening up here on Mars, that none will be used. But somewhere in the now abandoned halls of the UN building in New York, the Doomsday Clock sits in the dark - with its warning having fallen on deaf ears and its hands perilously close to midnight.

<effect>All rockets are unavailable due to chaos on Earth.

column4: Wojna... wojna nigdy się nie zmienia.

column2: Major powers declare war on one another - rockets are unavailable.
column3: Major powers declare war on one another - rockets are unavailable.
column4: Ziemskie mocarstwa wypowiedziały sobie wojnę - rakiety niedostępne.

column2: The Last War: Supply Line Back
column3: The Last War: Supply Line Back

column2: We have received some good news, for a change!
column3: We have received some good news, for a change!
column4: Dla odmiany otrzymaliśmy trochę dobrych wiadomości!

column2:
Among the chaos on Earth, our sponsor hasn't forgotten about us. They tell us that bad PR is the least of their concerns right now and we can once again request supply rockets from them. However, all resources are very scarce on Earth and will remain unavailable for us.

<effect>Rockets from Earth are available once again. Resources are still unavailable.
column3:
Among the chaos on Earth, our sponsor hasn't forgotten about us. They tell us that bad PR is the least of their concerns right now and we can once again request supply rockets from them. However, all resources are very scarce on Earth and will remain unavailable for us.

<effect>Rockets from Earth are available once again. Resources are still unavailable.

column2: I have mixed feelings about this.
column3: I have mixed feelings about this.

column2: Supply rockets are available once more, but not for resources.
column3: Supply rockets are available once more, but not for resources.
column4: Rakiety zaopatrzeniowe są znów dostępne, ale nie mogą transportować zasobów.

column2: The Last War: Feeding the Hand That Feeds
column3: The Last War: Feeding the Hand That Feeds

column2: It may seem that Earth has been engulfed with slowly spreading madness, but there are those who haven’t lost their minds to the war craze, and are actively working to restore peace.
column3: It may seem that Earth has been engulfed with slowly spreading madness, but there are those who haven’t lost their minds to the war craze, and are actively working to restore peace.
column4: Może się wydawać, że Ziemia pogrąża się z wolna w kompletnym szaleństwie, ale są tam jeszcze ludzie, którym szał wojenny nie odebrał rozumu. Właśnie oni pracują nad przywróceniem pokoju.

column2:
As major mining operations on Earth are easy targets for today’s weapons, <reg_param1> believes that a supply of Rare Metals from Mars will greatly help their peacekeeping efforts.

<effect>You can now send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.
column3:
As major mining operations on Earth are easy targets for today’s weapons, <reg_param1> believes that a supply of Rare Metals from Mars will greatly help their peacekeeping efforts.

<effect>You can now send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.

column2: Audit all our reserves and prepare for sending out supply missions to Earth!
column3: Audit all our reserves and prepare for sending out supply missions to Earth!
column4: Skontrolujcie nasze rezerwy i przygotujcie się do wysłania misji zaopatrzeniowych na Ziemię!

column2: Trade rockets for Rare Metals will arrive periodically to reduce War Tension.
column3: Trade rockets for Rare Metals will arrive periodically to reduce War Tension.
column4: Rakiety handlowe będą przylatywać okresowo po rzadkie metale, co zmniejszy napięcie wojenne.

column2: Our support for our sponsors has brought attention to us once more and now retaliation is imminent!
column3: Our support for our sponsors has brought attention to us once more and now retaliation is imminent!
column4: Nasze działania wspierające sponsorów ściągnęły na nas uwagę i uczyniły celem odwetu!

column2:
Several objects that were in unspecified orbits around the Sun and not far from Mars have suddenly changed trajectory and are heading our way. All gathered observations point towards old dormant weapons from the time before the space weapon bans came into power.

<effect>Our colony is being bombarded!
<hint>MDS Lasers can protect the surrounding area from bombardment
column3:
Several objects that were in unspecified orbits around the Sun and not far from Mars have suddenly changed trajectory and are heading our way. All gathered observations point towards old dormant weapons from the time before the space weapon bans came into power.

<effect>Our colony is being bombarded!
<hint>MDS Lasers can protect the surrounding area from bombardment

column2: The Last War: Embracing the Void
column3: The Last War: Embracing the Void

column2: From out here, Earth is indeed a pale blue dot. It seems so peaceful and tranquil, yet the harrowing stories of those who have witnessed the recent events there point to a reality which is anything but.
column3: From out here, Earth is indeed a pale blue dot. It seems so peaceful and tranquil, yet the harrowing stories of those who have witnessed the recent events there point to a reality which is anything but.
column4: Z tego miejsca Ziemia istotnie wydaje się bladoniebieską kropką. Wydaje się taka cicha i spokojna, choć straszliwe opowieści świadków ostatnich wydarzeń ukazują rzeczywistość jak najdalszą od tego wyobrażenia.

column2:
Millions of people want to flee Earth for the - what now looks like - relative safety of Mars. It is impossible to help them all, but we might endure the extra strain and save some more souls from the war and bring hope to all those we can’t.

<effect>Even more refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?
column3:
Millions of people want to flee Earth for the - what now looks like - relative safety of Mars. It is impossible to help them all, but we might endure the extra strain and save some more souls from the war and bring hope to all those we can’t.

<effect>Even more refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?

column2: Help as many as we can - then help more!
column3: Help as many as we can - then help more!
column4: Pomóżcie tylu ludziom, ilu zdołamy przyjąć - a potem pomóżcie następnym!

column2: We have been informed that even more refugees are being sent our way.
column3: We have been informed that even more refugees are being sent our way.
column4: Powiadomiono nas, że Ziemia wysłała na Marsa jeszcze więcej uchodźców.

column2:
One would argue this is an extreme and unpractical plan, not to mention the extra weight risks dooming the entire Mars project altogether. 

However, there are those who believe this is an effort to save as many people as possible from what some predict to be a war that ends humanity on Earth. 

<effect>Even more refugees want to come to Mars.
column3:
One would argue this is an extreme and unpractical plan, not to mention the extra weight risks dooming the entire Mars project altogether. 

However, there are those who believe this is an effort to save as many people as possible from what some predict to be a war that ends humanity on Earth. 

<effect>Even more refugees want to come to Mars.

column2: Refugees fleeing from the conflicts on Earth want to join our colony.
column3: Refugees fleeing from the conflicts on Earth want to join our colony.
column4: Uchodźcy uciekający przed wojną na Ziemi chcą zamieszkać w naszej kolonii.

column2: Even more refugees come to Mars.
column3: Even more refugees come to Mars.
column4: Jeszcze więcej uchodźców przybywa na Marsa.

column2: The Last War: The Grand Push
column3: The Last War: The Grand Push

column2: There seems to be little time to stop the war from reaching a point of no return, yet time is all we have.
column3: There seems to be little time to stop the war from reaching a point of no return, yet time is all we have.
column4: Zdaje się, że nie zostało wiele czasu na powstrzymanie ludzkości przed dotarciem do punktu bez powrotu, choć tylko czas nam pozostał.

column2:
After doing their best to avoid the war from happening, and ultimately failing to do so, <reg_param1> are now determined to see it through.

A final desperate push to complete several separate projects is underway. The projects aim at dramatically shifting the projected direction of the war and bringing everybody to the table to discuss ending it once and for all.

As the war has ravaged most of Earth's resource infrastructure, <reg_param1> is asking we contribute resources they are short on and urge haste, certain they do not need to explain why.

<effect>Supply the requested resources to decrease War Tension significantly. Be careful - the conflict on Earth is escalating and we have a limited time frame to resolve it.
column3:
After doing their best to avoid the war from happening, and ultimately failing to do so, <reg_param1> are now determined to see it through.

A final desperate push to complete several separate projects is underway. The projects aim at dramatically shifting the projected direction of the war and bringing everybody to the table to discuss ending it once and for all.

As the war has ravaged most of Earth's resource infrastructure, <reg_param1> is asking we contribute resources they are short on and urge haste, certain they do not need to explain why.

<effect>Supply the requested resources to decrease War Tension significantly. Be careful - the conflict on Earth is escalating and we have a limited time frame to resolve it.

column2: The future of Earth is pretty much in our hands now.
column3: The future of Earth is pretty much in our hands now.
column4: Przyszłość Ziemi jest teraz w naszych rękach.

column2: Tackling the everyday challenges of Mars is a handful on its own, but we mustn't forget that our home world is currently on the brink of annihilation.
column3: Tackling the everyday challenges of Mars is a handful on its own, but we mustn't forget that our home world is currently on the brink of annihilation.
column4: Radzenie sobie z codziennymi problemami na Marsie jest samo w sobie trudne, lecz nie wolno nam zapomnieć, że nasza ojczyzna jest na krawędzi zagłady.

column2:
The narrow window of time we have to act will soon close and the fate of Earth, with which our own fate is very much intertwined with, will be out of our hands.

We must send the requested supplies to Earth as soon as possible! If we do not act with all haste, there may be no living soul left to receive them very soon.
column3:
The narrow window of time we have to act will soon close and the fate of Earth, with which our own fate is very much intertwined with, will be out of our hands.

We must send the requested supplies to Earth as soon as possible! If we do not act with all haste, there may be no living soul left to receive them very soon.

column2: Tensions are rising at a rate faster than even the most pessimistic predictions.
column3: Tensions are rising at a rate faster than even the most pessimistic predictions.
column4: Napięcie rośnie szybciej, niż przepowiadały nawet najbardziej pesymistyczne prognozy.

column2: The UN has adopted the Doomsday Clock that the Bulletin of Atomic Scientists has used since the end of World War Two - to highlight how close humanity is to self-extinction. It is now set at Two Minutes to Midnight, a level at which it hasn’t been at since the early 21st century.
column3: The UN has adopted the Doomsday Clock that the Bulletin of Atomic Scientists has used since the end of World War Two - to highlight how close humanity is to self-extinction. It is now set at Two Minutes to Midnight, a level at which it hasn’t been at since the early 21st century.
column4: ONZ przejęła zegar zagłady, który Rada Fizyków Atomowych wykorzystywała od zakończenia II wojny światowej, aby wskazywać opinii publicznej, jak niewiele dzieli ludzkość od samozniszczenia. Aktualnie zegar wskazuje dwie minuty do północy - poziom, którego nie odnotowano od początków XXI wieku.

column2: Things are spiraling out of control.
column3: Things are spiraling out of control.

column2: We are officially One Minute to Midnight and most observers are bracing for a prolonged global war which now seems unavoidable.
column3: We are officially One Minute to Midnight and most observers are bracing for a prolonged global war which now seems unavoidable.
column4: Mamy oficjalnie minutę do północy i większość obserwatorów przygotowuje się już do długotrwałej ogólnoświatowej wojny, która wydaje się dziś nieunikniona.

column2: At this point hoping that no one resorts to weapons of mass destruction classifies you as an optimist.
column3: At this point hoping that no one resorts to weapons of mass destruction classifies you as an optimist.
column4: W tej chwili nadzieja, że nikt nie ucieknie się do użycia broni masowej zagłady, wydaje się nieuzasadnionym optymizmem.
Jak się znaleźliśmy w takiej sytuacji?

column2: The end of human civilization on Earth has never been closer.
column3: The end of human civilization on Earth has never been closer.
column4: Koniec ludzkości na Ziemi jeszcze nigdy nie był tak blisko.

column2:
We are 80% on track and are still going at full speed on this downhill race towards Armageddon. Right now it seems we might be Earth's only hope. 

We must step up our game and help our sponsor bring things to a conclusion in which the Earth is not scorched by a thousand nuclear detonations.

Make no mistake - although we live our lives on a different world, our fate is very closely tied to that of our mother planet.
column3:
We are 80% on track and are still going at full speed on this downhill race towards Armageddon. Right now it seems we might be Earth's only hope. 

We must step up our game and help our sponsor bring things to a conclusion in which the Earth is not scorched by a thousand nuclear detonations.

Make no mistake - although we live our lives on a different world, our fate is very closely tied to that of our mother planet.

column2: Could this really be the end?
column3: Could this really be the end?

column2: The Last War: The Day After Tomorrow
column3: The Last War: The Day After Tomorrow

column2: Silence… After a brief increase in brightness, everything has fallen silent.
column3: Silence… After a brief increase in brightness, everything has fallen silent.
column4: Cisza… Najpierw krótki rozbłysk, a potem wszystko ucichło.

column2:
We are scrambling to re-establish communications with Earth, but for the first time no one seems to be listening. Deep down, everyone knows that the unfathomable has happened. 

There is denial, there is depression, yet we all know… for the nature of the luminosity spike can be one thing and one thing only: utter nuclear devastation spread all over the globe.

We will keep on listening, maybe someday someone will talk back.

<effect>Earth was devastated by the war. Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
column3:
We are scrambling to re-establish communications with Earth, but for the first time no one seems to be listening. Deep down, everyone knows that the unfathomable has happened. 

There is denial, there is depression, yet we all know… for the nature of the luminosity spike can be one thing and one thing only: utter nuclear devastation spread all over the globe.

We will keep on listening, maybe someday someone will talk back.

<effect>Earth was devastated by the war. Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.

column2: Earth is devastated by the war. Contact with our home planet is lost.
column3: Earth is devastated by the war. Contact with our home planet is lost.
column4: Ziemia została spustoszona przez wojnę. Straciliśmy kontakt z naszą ojczystą planetą.

column2: The Last War: New World Order
column3: The Last War: New World Order

column2: Today we received the call we've been hoping for!
column3: Today we received the call we've been hoping for!
column4: Dziś odebraliśmy wezwanie, na które tak bardzo czekaliśmy!

column2:
There are humans left on Earth and they are reemerging to form a new society.

They inform us that things are very different now and Earth will never be the same again. Things are much more difficult; the environment is harsher and sunlight is scarcer; there is little resource to go around and most technological advancements have been lost to nuclear fire.

But they see this as a means of a new clean beginning and have expressed their desire to cooperate with us, this time as true equals.

<effect>Contact with Earth has been re-established. Rockets are available once again.
column3:
There are humans left on Earth and they are reemerging to form a new society.

They inform us that things are very different now and Earth will never be the same again. Things are much more difficult; the environment is harsher and sunlight is scarcer; there is little resource to go around and most technological advancements have been lost to nuclear fire.

But they see this as a means of a new clean beginning and have expressed their desire to cooperate with us, this time as true equals.

<effect>Contact with Earth has been re-established. Rockets are available once again.

column2: A new chapter for all of humanity begins.
column3: A new chapter for all of humanity begins.
column4: Rozpoczyna się nowy rozdział w historii ludzkości.

column2: A new society emerged from the ruins on Earth.
column3: A new society emerged from the ruins on Earth.
column4: Z ruin na Ziemi powstaje nowa społeczność.

column2: Only united can we hope to conquer the void. (constrain War Tension increase to <ChoiceA_Tension>%)
column3: Only united can we hope to conquer the void. (constrain War Tension increase to <ChoiceA_Tension>%)
column4: Tylko razem pokonamy kosmiczną pustkę. (Ogranicza wzrost napięcia wojennego do <ChoiceA_Tension>%)

column2: The Last War: Local Wars in the Third World
column3: The Last War: Local Wars in the Third World
column4: Ostatnia wojna: Lokalne wojenki w trzecim świecie

column2: The ripples made by the attacks on Earth have toppled governments and paved the way for opportunists to ride a wave of populist fury.
column3: The ripples made by the attacks on Earth have toppled governments and paved the way for opportunists to ride a wave of populist fury.
column4: Fale wzbudzone przez ataki na Ziemi obaliły wiele rządów i stworzyły okazję dla oportunistów, którzy mogą popłynąć z prądem obywatelskiego oburzenia.

column2:
Border skirmishes are slowly spilling into full scale invasions and the major powers are so far failing to instate a cease fire. The relative peace Earth has been enjoying for the past century now seems to have been a fragile facade, beneath which grudges and ambitions have been festering in wait for the right moment. 

The organization responsible has all but vanished after accomplishing more that it could have possibly hoped for. 

We, on the other hand, as a symbol of what humanity can achieve when working together and not by fighting between ourselves, are in a unique position to make a statement which may be of actual merit to the situation.
column3:
Border skirmishes are slowly spilling into full scale invasions and the major powers are so far failing to instate a cease fire. The relative peace Earth has been enjoying for the past century now seems to have been a fragile facade, beneath which grudges and ambitions have been festering in wait for the right moment. 

The organization responsible has all but vanished after accomplishing more that it could have possibly hoped for. 

We, on the other hand, as a symbol of what humanity can achieve when working together and not by fighting between ourselves, are in a unique position to make a statement which may be of actual merit to the situation.

column2: The Last War: Too Many Unnatural Deaths
column3: The Last War: Too Many Unnatural Deaths
column4: Ostatnia wojna - Za dużo zgonów z przyczyn nienaturalnych

column2: Be it from the extra influx of colonists, the shortage of help from Earth or other reasons all together, the number of recently perished colonists by unnatural causes is disturbing.
column3: Be it from the extra influx of colonists, the shortage of help from Earth or other reasons all together, the number of recently perished colonists by unnatural causes is disturbing.
column4: Liczba kolonistów zmarłych czy to wskutek napływu dodatkowych kolonistów, czy z braku pomocy z Ziemi, czy też z innych przyczyn, jest ostatnio niepokojąco wysoka.

column2:
People on Earth have been served a grim reminder that although far from the massive problems that they are experiencing right now, Mars is far from the safe heaven many have probably fooled themselves into believing.

<effect>Too many colonists have died recently from unnatural causes. The War Tension has increased.
column3:
People on Earth have been served a grim reminder that although far from the massive problems that they are experiencing right now, Mars is far from the safe heaven many have probably fooled themselves into believing.

<effect>Too many colonists have died recently from unnatural causes. The War Tension has increased.

column4: To smutny dzień dla całej ludzkości.

column2: Send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.
column3: Send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.
column4: Wysyłaj rzadkie metale na Ziemię, aby - zamiast otrzymywać fundusze - zmniejszyć napięcie wojenne. Rakiety będą regularnie przybywać po transporty.

column2: Submit to UN inspection. (-<ChoiceA_MoralePenalty> Morale to all colonists)
column3: Submit to UN inspection. (-<ChoiceA_MoralePenalty> Morale to all colonists)
column4: Zgódź się na dochodzenie ONZ. (-<ChoiceA_MoralePenalty> morale dla wszystkich kolonistów)

column2: The Last War: Closer to Home
column3: The Last War: Closer to Home

column2: A blatant lie is gaining traction on Earth.
column3: A blatant lie is gaining traction on Earth.
column4: Na Ziemi zyskuje posłuch jakieś bezczelne łgarstwo.

column2:
A faction in the wars on Earth, an alliance of several smaller states, has come out and outright accused <reg_param1> of using the Mars project as a backdrop for developing and testing forbidden weapons, which are then used on their people.   

The UN has requested that we allow a probe to be made so this nonsense is cleared, although we fear that instilling such doubts in our colonists may have an impact on morale as a whole.

What do we do?
column3:
A faction in the wars on Earth, an alliance of several smaller states, has come out and outright accused <reg_param1> of using the Mars project as a backdrop for developing and testing forbidden weapons, which are then used on their people.   

The UN has requested that we allow a probe to be made so this nonsense is cleared, although we fear that instilling such doubts in our colonists may have an impact on morale as a whole.

What do we do?

column2: I thought we lived in more enlightened times. (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column3: I thought we lived in more enlightened times. (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column4: Wydawało mi się, że żyjemy w bardziej oświeconych czasach. (+<Tension>% do napięcia wojennego)

column2: You do know this comet was predicted to come this close to Earth 50 years ago, right? (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column3: You do know this comet was predicted to come this close to Earth 50 years ago, right? (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column4: Ale wiecie, że już 50 lat temu przewidziano, że ta kometa zbliży się do Ziemi? (+<Tension>% do napięcia wojennego)

column2: Earth has changed a lot since we departed for Mars, and not for the better. (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column3: Earth has changed a lot since we departed for Mars, and not for the better. (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column4: Ziemia bardzo się zmieniła, odkąd wyruszyliśmy na Marsa - i to nie na lepsze. (+<Tension>% do napięcia wojennego)

column2: Of course it's an omen. How could it possibly be anything but? (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column3: Of course it's an omen. How could it possibly be anything but? (+<Tension>% War Tension)
column4: Oczywiście, że to jest znak. Czymże miałoby być? (+<Tension>% do napięcia wojennego)

column2: A comet suddenly lit up night skies above Earth, visible from all over the globe.
column3: A comet suddenly lit up night skies above Earth, visible from all over the globe.
column4: Jakaś kometa nagle rozświetliła nocne ziemskie niebo i jest widoczna na całym globie.

column2:
Although the comet is well known and talked about by most space agencies, in the current atmosphere on Earth people have little time for space news and have chosen to see an omen in it. 

Most interpretations have been that victory is imminent for the interpreter, but more alarmingly many believe this is a sign of the end times. 

Some have chosen to embrace it… risking this becoming a self-fulfilling prophecy.

We have to talk some sense into the Earthlings.
column3:
Although the comet is well known and talked about by most space agencies, in the current atmosphere on Earth people have little time for space news and have chosen to see an omen in it. 

Most interpretations have been that victory is imminent for the interpreter, but more alarmingly many believe this is a sign of the end times. 

Some have chosen to embrace it… risking this becoming a self-fulfilling prophecy.

We have to talk some sense into the Earthlings.

column4: <reg_param1> ginie z braku tlenu na orbicie.

column2: Export Rare Metals to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column3: Export Rare Metals to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column4: Eksportuj rzadkie metale na Ziemię, by zmniejszyć napięcie wojenne.

column2: Export Metals to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column3: Export Metals to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column4: Eksportuj metale na Ziemię, by zmniejszyć napięcie wojenne.

column2: Export Electronics to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column3: Export Electronics to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column4: Eksportuj artykuły elektroniczne na Ziemię, by zmniejszyć napięcie wojenne.

column2: Export Machine Parts to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column3: Export Machine Parts to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column4: Eksportuj części maszyn na Ziemię, by zmniejszyć napięcie wojenne.

column2: Export Food to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column3: Export Food to Earth and reduce War Tension.
column4: Eksportuj żywność na Ziemię, by zmniejszyć napięcie wojenne.

column2: Ceasefires are taking effect and armies are pulling back behind borders.
column3: Ceasefires are taking effect and armies are pulling back behind borders.
column4: Zawieszenie broni weszło w życie, armie wycofują się i gromadzą na granicach.

column2:
Mistrust and disbelief is rampant and while the guns are finally silent, the road to healing the wounds of war will be longer than anything Earth has ever experienced before. 

Millions have perished and those who survived will suffer a divide so huge, it seems impossible to fill. 

In what almost seems as an apathetic effort to move on, <reg_param1> has informed us that we are to continue the project and its business as usual – with the exception that now everything costs more after the devastation on Earth.

<effect>Resupply prices increased by 50% for the next 50 Sols.
column3:
Mistrust and disbelief is rampant and while the guns are finally silent, the road to healing the wounds of war will be longer than anything Earth has ever experienced before. 

Millions have perished and those who survived will suffer a divide so huge, it seems impossible to fill. 

In what almost seems as an apathetic effort to move on, <reg_param1> has informed us that we are to continue the project and its business as usual – with the exception that now everything costs more after the devastation on Earth.

<effect>Resupply prices increased by 50% for the next 50 Sols.

column2: Earth survived, but at what cost?
column3: Earth survived, but at what cost?
column4: Ziemia przetrwała, ale za jaką cenę?

column2: A ceasefire was signed, but Earth is caught in the grip of a new Cold War. All resupply prices have been increased.
column3: A ceasefire was signed, but Earth is caught in the grip of a new Cold War. All resupply prices have been increased.
column4: Podpisano zawieszenie broni, ale Ziemia znalazła się w kleszczach nowej zimnej wojny. Wszystkie ceny zaopatrzenia wzrosły.

column2: The war is over! Sound minds and human compassion emerged victorious.
column3: The war is over! Sound minds and human compassion emerged victorious.
column4: Koniec wojny! Oto zwycięstwo zdrowego rozsądku i współczucia.
Ostatnia wojna - Siły rozjemcze biorą górę!

column2: Hatred has lost! Sound minds and human compassion emerge victorious.
column3: Hatred has lost! Sound minds and human compassion emerge victorious.
column4: Nienawiść przegrała! Oto zwycięstwo zdrowego rozsądku i współczucia.

column2: The Drums of War have ceased their relentless beating and those who survived the wars are looking at the death and destruction it caused. Never has it been so obvious how little a spark can wipe out our race once and for all and this has reached the heart of every human soul on Earth. As the dead and fallen are being honored, pacts and treaties, forged with compassion and good will, are being signed all over the globe. Our colony on Mars and have been identified as champions of this peace. We have received the Honor of Hope and have become the symbol of humanity, closer to everyone’s hearts and minds than ever before. Every nation wishes to repay us in any way possible. A spike of applicants and a dramatic reduction in prices are the short term benefits we are promised to expect. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: The Drums of War have ceased their relentless beating and those who survived the wars are looking at the death and destruction it caused. Never has it been so obvious how little a spark can wipe out our race once and for all and this has reached the heart of every human soul on Earth. As the dead and fallen are being honored, pacts and treaties, forged with compassion and good will, are being signed all over the globe. Our colony on Mars and have been identified as champions of this peace. We have received the Honor of Hope and have become the symbol of humanity, closer to everyone’s hearts and minds than ever before. Every nation wishes to repay us in any way possible. A spike of applicants and a dramatic reduction in prices are the short term benefits we are promised to expect. Gained a new Technology, .

column2: We have received a disturbing medical report. A number of colonists have contracted an unknown disease.
column3: We have received a disturbing medical report. A number of colonists have contracted an unknown disease.
column4: Otrzymaliśmy niepokojący raport medyczny. Pewna liczba kolonistów zapadła na nieznaną chorobę.

column2:
The medical examination shows they all suffer from a form of hypercoagulation. Anti-coagulation medicines have been issued but the symptoms remain. Primary analysis of the patients’ blood samples hasn't found the cause behind the symptoms, but the level of damage to the erythrocytes leads to the workings of a virus-sized or smaller agent. We’re currently running a thorough check on the patients’ background information and behavior to find the source of the infection.

<effect>Several Colonists have gained the Infected trait.
column3:
The medical examination shows they all suffer from a form of hypercoagulation. Anti-coagulation medicines have been issued but the symptoms remain. Primary analysis of the patients’ blood samples hasn't found the cause behind the symptoms, but the level of damage to the erythrocytes leads to the workings of a virus-sized or smaller agent. We’re currently running a thorough check on the patients’ background information and behavior to find the source of the infection.

<effect>Several Colonists have gained the Infected trait.

column2: I’ll inform Earth Control to enact decontamination protocols on any cargo we send.
column3: I’ll inform Earth Control to enact decontamination protocols on any cargo we send.
column4: Powiadomię centralę na Ziemi o konieczności dokładnego odkażania wszystkich wysyłanych przez nas ładunków.

column2: Some Colonists have contracted a mysterious infection. It's spreading rapidly across the colony.
column3: Some Colonists have contracted a mysterious infection. It's spreading rapidly across the colony.
column4: Część kolonistów zapadła na tajemniczą chorobę, która szybko rozprzestrzenia się po kolonii.

column2: So far the bizarre nature of the infection has defeated all of our attempts to stop it. Yet time is growing short as more and more people are getting sick.
column3: So far the bizarre nature of the infection has defeated all of our attempts to stop it. Yet time is growing short as more and more people are getting sick.
column4: Jak dotąd dziwaczny charakter infekcji udaremnił wszystkie nasze próby powstrzymania choroby. A czasu mamy coraz mniej, bo coraz więcej ludzi zaczyna chorować.

column2: The challenge would be monumental as our researchers lack any epidemiological data on which to step up. The medical records we’ve gathered point out the symptoms, but the chemical structure of the agent is so alien that it cannot be compared to anything known to science. To make things worse, the nano-scale of the agent makes analysis even harder. Only by diverting enough resources to the task we can hope to make any breakthrough. The Wildfire Cure research has become available. Each newly constructed Medical Building will reduce the cost of the Wildfire Cure research by 5% (maximum 50%).
column3: The challenge would be monumental as our researchers lack any epidemiological data on which to step up. The medical records we’ve gathered point out the symptoms, but the chemical structure of the agent is so alien that it cannot be compared to anything known to science. To make things worse, the nano-scale of the agent makes analysis even harder. Only by diverting enough resources to the task we can hope to make any breakthrough. The Wildfire Cure research has become available. Each newly constructed Medical Building will reduce the cost of the Wildfire Cure research by 5% (maximum 50%).

column2: Our scientists have devised a complex plan to discover the cure for the Wildfire infection. It would be a monumental effort but we must prioritize the research to be able to find a solution to the growing crisis.
column3: Our scientists have devised a complex plan to discover the cure for the Wildfire infection. It would be a monumental effort but we must prioritize the research to be able to find a solution to the growing crisis.
column4: Nasi naukowcy opracowali skomplikowany plan pokonania zarazy zwanej gorączką ognistą. Wymaga on gigantycznego wysiłku, ale musimy poświęcić mu wszystkie prace badawcze, aby znaleźć rozwiązanie narastającego kryzysu.

column2: Constructing new Medical buildings which gather data about the infection could speed up the progress towards discovering the Wildfire Cure.
column3: Constructing new Medical buildings which gather data about the infection could speed up the progress towards discovering the Wildfire Cure.
column4: Wznoszenie nowych budynków medycznych, gromadzących informacje o epidemii, mogłoby przyspieszyć odkrycie leku na gorączkę ognistą.

column2: The Cure for Wildfire has been discovered! Conveniently spliced in modified mold cells, the cure can be grown on plant biomass. We have to produce it en masse!
column3: The Cure for Wildfire has been discovered! Conveniently spliced in modified mold cells, the cure can be grown on plant biomass. We have to produce it en masse!
column4: Odkryto lekarstwo na gorączkę ognistą! Środek zaradczy został dogodnie wszczepiony do genomu komórek pleśni i można go hodować na biomasie roślinnej. Musimy natychmiast zacząć masową produkcję!

column2: Tremendous news! The cure for the Wildfire disease has been discovered!
column3: Tremendous news! The cure for the Wildfire disease has been discovered!
column4: Fantastyczna wiadomość! Odkryto lekarstwo na gorączkę ognistą!

column2:
A genetically modified strain of the Martian Wildfire interfaces with the RNA of the virus and effectively stops it from coagulating the blood plasma of the host. The intake of only a small amount of the cure is enough to halt the development of the disease, even though it wouldn't repair the tissue damage suffered so far.

The scientists experimented with multiple growth mediums and discovered that the most effective way to proliferate the medicine is by introducing it in mold cells growing on potatoes. This is great news because we can provide enough biomass for the modified mold to grow and if we do it quickly, we can still stand a chance to end the suffering on Earth.

<effect>The Curetato Crop has become available. Harvesting it will produce Cure for the Wildfire infection, which in turn has to be exported to Earth to end the crisis.

<effect> Colonists with the Infected trait will be cured permanently after their first visit in a Medical Building.
column3:
A genetically modified strain of the Martian Wildfire interfaces with the RNA of the virus and effectively stops it from coagulating the blood plasma of the host. The intake of only a small amount of the cure is enough to halt the development of the disease, even though it wouldn't repair the tissue damage suffered so far.

The scientists experimented with multiple growth mediums and discovered that the most effective way to proliferate the medicine is by introducing it in mold cells growing on potatoes. This is great news because we can provide enough biomass for the modified mold to grow and if we do it quickly, we can still stand a chance to end the suffering on Earth.

<effect>The Curetato Crop has become available. Harvesting it will produce Cure for the Wildfire infection, which in turn has to be exported to Earth to end the crisis.

<effect> Colonists with the Infected trait will be cured permanently after their first visit in a Medical Building.

column2: Start the process immediately. Time is of the essence!
column3: Start the process immediately. Time is of the essence!
column4: Rozpocząć hodowlę natychmiast, liczy się każda sekunda!

column2: The faint distress signal led us to the burial site of a small satellite. It had fallen deep under the red sands and could have been there for an eternity.
column3: The faint distress signal led us to the burial site of a small satellite. It had fallen deep under the red sands and could have been there for an eternity.
column4: Słaby sygnał alarmowy doprowadził nas do miejsca spoczynku jakiegoś małego satelity. Leżał on zagrzebany głęboko pod czerwonymi piaskami i mógł tam już pozostać na zawsze.

column2: It’s strange that we couldn't find any information for the flight in the international records. No black box nor signatures can be seen except for a discolored logo, ‘Scoop XI’. Upon opening the hull we found all of the internal systems corroded away by time, with only a small capsule remaining. The biohazard sign on it only served to stir our curiosity, but a closer examination discovered that it has been breached. We assume that the biological material inside has been destroyed. We have ordered the Rover to store the salvage for further analysis.
column3: It’s strange that we couldn't find any information for the flight in the international records. No black box nor signatures can be seen except for a discolored logo, ‘Scoop XI’. Upon opening the hull we found all of the internal systems corroded away by time, with only a small capsule remaining. The biohazard sign on it only served to stir our curiosity, but a closer examination discovered that it has been breached. We assume that the biological material inside has been destroyed. We have ordered the Rover to store the salvage for further analysis.
column4: To dziwne, ale nie znaleźliśmy żadnych informacji o tym satelicie w międzynarodowych archiwach. Na miejscu katastrofy nie ma żadnej czarnej skrzynki, satelita nie ma żadnych oznaczeń poza wyblakłym logo „Scoop XI”. Po otwarciu satelity odkryliśmy, że aparatura w jego wnętrzu została zniszczona przez korozję i ocalała tylko jedna mała kapsuła. Widniejące na niej ostrzeżenie o zagrożeniu biologicznym tylko pobudziło naszą ciekawość, jednak dokładniejsze badanie wykazało, że kapsuła została wcześniej uszkodzona. Zakładamy, że znajdujący się w niej pierwotnie materiał biologiczny uległ zniszczeniu. Nakazaliśmy, aby łazik umieścił szczątki w magazynie do późniejszego zbadania.

column2: A curious find. Let’s hope the future will bring more answers than questions on that matter.
column3: A curious find. Let’s hope the future will bring more answers than questions on that matter.
column4: Intrygujące znalezisko. Miejmy nadzieję, że przyszłość przyniesie nam więcej odpowiedzi niż nowych pytań.

column2: We've just lost one of our scientific facilities in a disturbing set of events. We’re still investigating the cause of the disaster but there are clues which lead to unsettling conclusions.
column3: We've just lost one of our scientific facilities in a disturbing set of events. We’re still investigating the cause of the disaster but there are clues which lead to unsettling conclusions.
column4: W wyniku niepokojących wydarzeń właśnie utraciliśmy jeden z naszych obiektów naukowych. Wciąż badamy przyczyny katastrofy, ale dotychczasowe przesłanki prowadzą do niepokojących wniosków.

column2:
The security log shows that everything started with a malfunction in the storage unit where the analysis samples were stored. After that the internal systems of the laboratory began to rapidly fail one after another. Suspiciously, the damaged systems were all made of plastic and organic polymers, all corroded away within mere seconds.

Our operatives are puzzled with the cause of the chain reaction but the Chief Engineer has pointed out a fact which eluded our attention until now – the remains of the Scoop XI satellite were held in the storage unit of this facility. We didn't take any chances and ordered an emergency decontamination of the building. Let’s hope that whatever was in there has been destroyed.

<effect>A Laboratory has mysteriously malfunctioned.
column3:
The security log shows that everything started with a malfunction in the storage unit where the analysis samples were stored. After that the internal systems of the laboratory began to rapidly fail one after another. Suspiciously, the damaged systems were all made of plastic and organic polymers, all corroded away within mere seconds.

Our operatives are puzzled with the cause of the chain reaction but the Chief Engineer has pointed out a fact which eluded our attention until now – the remains of the Scoop XI satellite were held in the storage unit of this facility. We didn't take any chances and ordered an emergency decontamination of the building. Let’s hope that whatever was in there has been destroyed.

<effect>A Laboratory has mysteriously malfunctioned.

column2: Monitor the colony and report any related cases.
column3: Monitor the colony and report any related cases.
column4: Monitorować kolonię i donosić o wszystkich powiązanych problemach.

column2: We have to face it – we cannot stop the infection. No matter what we do it keeps spreading across the colony like a wildfire. Hence the name we've given it.
column3: We have to face it – we cannot stop the infection. No matter what we do it keeps spreading across the colony like a wildfire. Hence the name we've given it.
column4: Musimy przyznać, że nie potrafimy powstrzymać tej infekcji. Pomimo naszych wysiłków wciąż rozprzestrzenia się ona po kolonii niczym pożar. Dlatego nazwaliśmy ją gorączką ognistą.

column2: All attempts to isolate the sources have failed. We can assume that the virus is traveling all across our life support and maintenance circuits. The only way to stop it is to turn off all systems, but this would be a death sentence for the colonists. We've ran out of options.
column3: All attempts to isolate the sources have failed. We can assume that the virus is traveling all across our life support and maintenance circuits. The only way to stop it is to turn off all systems, but this would be a death sentence for the colonists. We've ran out of options.
column4: Wszystkie próby odizolowania źródeł infekcji zawiodły. Możemy założyć, że wirus przemieszcza się przewodami systemów konserwacyjnych i podtrzymywania życia. Jedyną możliwością zatrzymania go jest wyłączenie wszystkich systemów, ale oznaczałoby to wyrok śmierci dla kolonistów. Zabrakło nam pomysłów.

column2: Don't despair, we will find a solution!
column3: Don't despair, we will find a solution!

column2: The infection is spreading at alarming rate through the colony. The scientists have named it Wildfire after its virulence and infection pattern.
column3: The infection is spreading at alarming rate through the colony. The scientists have named it Wildfire after its virulence and infection pattern.
column4: Infekcja rozprzestrzenia się z alarmującą szybkością po całej kolonii. Z uwagi na zjadliwość i objawy naukowcy nazwali ją gorączką ognistą.

column2: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. It was on board a rocket which returned to Earth and somehow it breached through all decontamination measures.
column3: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. It was on board a rocket which returned to Earth and somehow it breached through all decontamination measures.
column4: Doszło do najgorszego – gorączka ognista dotarła na Ziemię. Wirus znajdował się na pokładzie rakiety, która wróciła na Ziemię. Jakimś cudem przetrwał wszystkie procedury odkażające.

column2:
The infected personnel at the landing site deteriorated within hours of contracting the infection and the medics couldn't help them. This doesn't match our medical records as Wildfire takes much more time to develop here, on Mars. We suspect a form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The rocket landing site has been placed under quarantine and the authorities have been informed. We can only pray that they manage to prevent the infection from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
column3:
The infected personnel at the landing site deteriorated within hours of contracting the infection and the medics couldn't help them. This doesn't match our medical records as Wildfire takes much more time to develop here, on Mars. We suspect a form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The rocket landing site has been placed under quarantine and the authorities have been informed. We can only pray that they manage to prevent the infection from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!

column2: One of our rockets has spread the Wildfire infection on Earth. It's spreading rapidly - we have to discover the Cure before the human population on Earth is obliterated!
column3: One of our rockets has spread the Wildfire infection on Earth. It's spreading rapidly - we have to discover the Cure before the human population on Earth is obliterated!
column4: Jedna z naszych rakiet zawlokła gorączkę ognistą na Ziemię. Choroba rozprzestrzenia się błyskawicznie - musimy odkryć lekarstwo, zanim ludzkość na Ziemi wymrze!

column2: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. We suspect this was caused by a recent meteor impact on Mars which lifted debris and showered them on the Blue Planet.
column3: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. We suspect this was caused by a recent meteor impact on Mars which lifted debris and showered them on the Blue Planet.
column4: Doszło do najgorszego – gorączka ognista dotarła na Ziemię. Podejrzewamy, że przyczyną jest niedawne uderzenie meteorytu w Marsa. Bolid wzbił kamienne okruchy, które po jakimś czasie spadły na Błękitną Planetę.

column2:
Several small settlements in different regions have been infected. The authorities report that the victims have deteriorated within mere hours, something which doesn't match our medical records. On Mars it takes Sols for the Wildfire to kill its host. We suspect some form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The infected areas have been placed under quarantine and we can only pray that the authorities manage to prevent the disease from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
column3:
Several small settlements in different regions have been infected. The authorities report that the victims have deteriorated within mere hours, something which doesn't match our medical records. On Mars it takes Sols for the Wildfire to kill its host. We suspect some form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The infected areas have been placed under quarantine and we can only pray that the authorities manage to prevent the disease from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!

column2: Martian meteors have spread the Wildfire infection on Earth! We must discover the Cure before the entire human population on Earth is obliterated!
column3: Martian meteors have spread the Wildfire infection on Earth! We must discover the Cure before the entire human population on Earth is obliterated!
column4: Marsjańskie meteoryty zawlokły gorączkę ognistą na Ziemię! Musimy odkryć lekarstwo, zanim ludzkość na Błękitnej Planecie wymrze!

column2: The Wildfire virus is spreading on Earth at an alarming rate, threatening entire populations all over the globe. The grim prediction is that soon the entire population of the planet will be affected.
column3: The Wildfire virus is spreading on Earth at an alarming rate, threatening entire populations all over the globe. The grim prediction is that soon the entire population of the planet will be affected.
column4: Wirus gorączki ognistej rozprzestrzenia się na Ziemi z alarmującą szybkością, zagrażając populacji na całym globie. Ponure prognozy mówią, że już wkrótce opanuje całą ludność planety.

column2:
Scientists on Earth are desperately trying to discover a solution, but so far in vain. The virulence of the local strain is so high that sampling and transporting infected material is a death sentence. The nanoscopic size of the agent makes containment equally hard - biological filters fail to stop it effectively, threatening the safety of any laboratory which attempts to study it. The only solution is to analyze the original strain - the one we have on Mars - in order to find the cure. Time is running short!

Meanwhile, Third World countries are in a state of panic as the Wildfire strikes the poorest communities. Waves of refugees flee the affected regions and many resource operations are simply abandoned by the scared personnel. The market feels the hunger for raw resources and multiple demands have been filed for imports from Mars.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Endemic state. Export prices have increased for the next <text_param1> Sols as the First World economies feel the hunger for resources.
column3:

column2: Grave news... We have to hurry!
column3: Grave news... We have to hurry!
column4: To przygnębiające wieści... Musimy się pospieszyć!

column2: The Wildfire infection is spreading uncontrollably on Earth. The Third World countries are hit harder due to their lack of resources to fight the disease effectively.
column3: The Wildfire infection is spreading uncontrollably on Earth. The Third World countries are hit harder due to their lack of resources to fight the disease effectively.
column4: Gorączka ognista rozprzestrzenia się na Ziemi w sposób niekontrolowany. Kraje Trzeciego Świata odczuwają cięższe skutki epidemii z uwagi na brak zasobów niezbędnych do skutecznego zwalczania choroby.

column2: Panic and desperation has spread across the population as waves of refugees flee the endemic zones.
column3: Panic and desperation has spread across the population as waves of refugees flee the endemic zones.

column2:
Wildfire has hit the Third World hard. The crisis can be felt across the developing countries and the First World as well. The chaos in the poorest countries resonates across the globe as the raw materials markets are plummeting. Entire resource operations in the Third World countries are abandoned as the workers flee the areas hit by the virus. People in the rich countries vocally support actions to relieve the struggling regions of the Earth and many companies divert resources for charity. Probably there’s still hope for humanity when so many of us refuse to ignore the tragedy of complete strangers.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Epidemic state. Applicant pool is depleted for the next <text_param1> Sols due to quarantine measures.
column3:
