<effect>Infection Level has reached the Epidemic state. Applicant pool is depleted for the next <text_param1> Sols due to quarantine measures.

column2: The Wildfire has infected the developed countries as well. Panic and desperation are spreading through the population!
column3: The Wildfire has infected the developed countries as well. Panic and desperation are spreading through the population!
column4: Gorączka ognista dotarła także do państw rozwiniętych. Wśród ludności szerzy się panika i rozpacz!

column2: A wave of despair sweeps across the globe as people witness the futility of all measures against Wildfire. Everyone feels that our time on Earth is running short.
column3: A wave of despair sweeps across the globe as people witness the futility of all measures against Wildfire. Everyone feels that our time on Earth is running short.
column4: Fala rozpaczy ogarnia cały glob, gdy ludzie widzą, jak bezskuteczne są wszelkie próby zwalczania gorączki ognistej. Wszyscy czują, że czas ludzi na Ziemi dobiega końca.

column2:
The tragedy in the Third World has struck some of the richer countries as well, as the Wildfire infection has spread across their populations. People stay inside, fearing for their lives. Refugee camps are filling to the brim as entire areas of the world have been depopulated. Despair has brought the worse in some of us and looters raid the stores in the cities while the police and the army are trying to quell the violent riots. The economies of the First World are failing due to the growing crisis and our Sponsor wasn't spared as well. I'm afraid we’re running out of time...

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Pandemic state. Next level - Extinction! All resupply costs are increased for the next <text_param1> Sols due to supply shortages.
column3:

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Pandemic state. Next level - Extinction! All resupply costs are increased for the next <text_param1> Sols due to supply shortages.

column2: The Wildfire has nearly destroyed the human civilization. Scattered pockets of survivors are still dwindling in remote areas of the world.
column3: The Wildfire has nearly destroyed the human civilization. Scattered pockets of survivors are still dwindling in remote areas of the world.
column4: Gorączka ognista prawie doszczętnie zniszczyła ludzką cywilizację. W odległych zakątkach świata wegetują rozproszone grupki ocalałych.

column2: Earth's population has been obliterated by the Wildfire infection. No traces of any human activity can be detected. We could be the only humans left out there...
column3: Earth's population has been obliterated by the Wildfire infection. No traces of any human activity can be detected. We could be the only humans left out there...
column4: Ziemska populacja została wyeliminowana przez gorączkę ognistą. Nie możemy wykryć żadnych śladów ludzkiej aktywności. Być może jesteśmy jedynymi ludźmi, którzy zostali przy życiu...

column2: Our sensors detect no signs of human activity on the surface of Earth. We must admit that the battle with the Wildfire infection is lost. Night falls over humankind.
column3: Our sensors detect no signs of human activity on the surface of Earth. We must admit that the battle with the Wildfire infection is lost. Night falls over humankind.
column4: Nasze czujniki nie wykrywają żadnych śladów ludzkiej aktywności na powierzchni Ziemi. Musimy przyznać, że bitwa z gorączką ognistą została przegrana. Noc ogarnęła całą ludzkość.

column2:
Earth has become an uninhabited mausoleum of our past greatness - the barren, lifeless husks of the once overcrowded megalopolises, the abandoned derelicts of our once great industrial might, the meadows where no children would ever play. The shroud of silence has covered the surface of the Earth and only the wind chimes through the ruins of our past, whispering stories no one is there to listen.

Is this the end? Is the Wildfire infection over, dead in its rampant destruction alongside its human hosts? Or would it mutate further, consuming all life on Earth? Only the children of our children will be able to answer these questions, watching from afar.

<effect>Earth population is devastated by the Wildfire infection! Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
column3:

<effect>Earth population is devastated by the Wildfire infection! Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.

column2: A dark day, but do not lose hope - while we stand, humanity is alive!
column3: A dark day, but do not lose hope - while we stand, humanity is alive!
column4: To ponury dzień, lecz nie traćmy nadziei - jeszcze ludzkość nie zginęła, póki my żyjemy!

column2: We've received a radio transmission! From Earth! We thought we were the last humans and now this! Amazing news!
column3: We've received a radio transmission! From Earth! We thought we were the last humans and now this! Amazing news!
column4: Odebraliśmy przekaz radiowy! Z Ziemi! Myśleliśmy, że jesteśmy ostatnimi ludźmi we Wszechświecie, a teraz to! Fantastycznie!

column2:
The survivors of the Wildfire gathered in remote places of the planet and inside protected facilities and began to re-emerge into the world when the signs of the infection began to vanish. They are unsure what happened with the disease, and so are we, but they claim that it appears gone. Earth is welcoming to humans once more!

The survivors have just began restarting abandoned factory complexes and power plants to fuel the industry needed to rebuild the civilization from the ruins. People move into the cities and repopulate the farming areas. The economy is starting to build up momentum – and they want us to become part of the exchange once more!

The survivors have their spirits high, but still the fear of the Wildfire lies in all of them – what if it comes back? This is the reason why they’ve requested us to send them as much of the Wildfire Cure as we can.

<effect>Communications with Earth have been re-established. Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants are available once more. Export prices are reduced for the next <text_param1> Sols while the economy is recovering.

<effect>Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to be loaded with Wildfire Cure. When they reach Earth you will be granted <funding(reg_param2)> Funding.

column2: A cargo rocket is on its way to gather the Wildfire cure. People on Earth depend on our efforts to create a steady supply chain for the cure.
column3: A cargo rocket is on its way to gather the Wildfire cure. People on Earth depend on our efforts to create a steady supply chain for the cure.
column4: W drodze z Ziemi jest rakieta towarowa, która ma zabrać lek na gorączkę ognistą. Los Ziemian zależy od naszego wysiłku włożonego w tworzenie stałego łańcucha zaopatrzeniowego dostarczającego to lekarstwo.

column2:
The amount of Wildfire Cure we have to return to Earth depends on the severity of the situation there. If the situation demands it, we should expect potential future requests for the cure.

<effect>Load Cargo Rockets with the Cure and Fuel and send them back to Earth until the Wildfire infection is completely eradicated.
column3:
The amount of Wildfire Cure we have to return to Earth depends on the severity of the situation there. If the situation demands it, we should expect potential future requests for the cure.

<effect>Load Cargo Rockets with the Cure and Fuel and send them back to Earth until the Wildfire infection is completely eradicated.

column2: The authorities on Earth have sent a Cargo Rocket to gather Wildfire Cure and return it to the struggling population on our homeworld.
column3: The authorities on Earth have sent a Cargo Rocket to gather Wildfire Cure and return it to the struggling population on our homeworld.
column4: Ziemskie władze wysłały rakietę towarową, aby zabrała lek na gorączkę ognistą i zawiozła go zmagającej się z chorobą ludności naszej ojczyzny.

column2: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to relief Earth from the Infection.
column3: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to relief Earth from the Infection.
column4: Uzupełnij paliwo i załaduj lek na gorączkę ognistą, aby uwolnić Ziemię od epidemii.

column2: Authorities all over the Earth report that no cases of the Wildfire infection have been detected. Earth is freed from the yoke of the worst pandemic in history.
column3: Authorities all over the Earth report that no cases of the Wildfire infection have been detected. Earth is freed from the yoke of the worst pandemic in history.
column4: Na całej Ziemi władze donoszą, że nie wykrywa się już nowych zakażeń gorączką ognistą. Ziemia jest wolna od najgorszej pandemii w jej dziejach.

column2: People all around the world celebrate, but the consequences of the Wildfire crisis remain. We have decades – maybe even centuries before us – to cope with the damages caused, with the fear and desperation which reverberate inside all of us. But we remain optimistic that, given time, people will return to their everyday lives. The Wildfire crisis has shown us how fragile we are, how the ivory towers we’ve built could crumble in mere days. Maybe it’s the perfect moment to step back and reconsider the way we lived our lives. To rebuild our civilization, but build it better than before. The Wildfire Cure remains our hot lead towards the way the disease worked. By studying it we will be able to delve in the mystery of its structure and origin, preparing for worse days ahead. The infection on Earth has been eradicated! All Infection Level effects have been removed. Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to load Wildfire Cure. Upon return, each rocket will grant you Funding. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: People all around the world celebrate, but the consequences of the Wildfire crisis remain. column2: The Wildfire infection has been eradicated on Earth! People all over the globe rejoice and praise your adequate actions!
column3: The Wildfire infection has been eradicated on Earth! People all over the globe rejoice and praise your adequate actions!
column4: Epidemia gorączki ognistej na Ziemi została zlikwidowana! Na całym globie ludzie cieszą się i wychwalają nasze postępowanie!

column2: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to sell to Earth and gain Funding.
column3: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to sell to Earth and gain Funding.
column4: Uzupełnij paliwo i załaduj lek na gorączkę ognistą, aby sprzedać go na Ziemi i uzyskać fundusze

column2: Our brave colonists waited for their brethren on Earth to be cured before they have received relief from the burden of the disease. The colonists would surely be happy to hear that the threat is eliminated – it will raise their spirits high!
column3: Our brave colonists waited for their brethren on Earth to be cured before they have received relief from the burden of the disease. The colonists would surely be happy to hear that the threat is eliminated – it will raise their spirits high!
column4: Nasi dzielni koloniści czekali z uwolnieniem się od brzemienia choroby, aż ich bracia na Ziemi zostaną uleczeni. Koloniści na pewno z radością przyjmą wiadomość, że zagrożenie zostało zlikwidowane – ich nastrój na pewno się poprawi!

column2: Today marks the moment when our colony is free from the threat of the Wildfire infection!
column3: Today marks the moment when our colony is free from the threat of the Wildfire infection!
column4: Nastał dziś dzień, w którym nasza kolonia uwolniła się od epidemii gorączki ognistej!

column2:
Our efficient medical program has managed to cure all cases of the Wildfire infection. Mars has become a much safer place. We informed Earth and after a careful selection and medical checks they are ready to launch an emergency flight with healthy survivors aboard.

These are ordinary people who survived the Wildfire crisis somehow and managed to get to safety. None of them has passed the initial training required for arriving on Mars so we expect them to have a hard time acclimating to the life in the colony. But at least they would be safe from harm with us.

<effect>A rocket with <text_param1> Refugees aboard is inbound to Mars.
column3:
Our efficient medical program has managed to cure all cases of the Wildfire infection. Mars has become a much safer place. We informed Earth and after a careful selection and medical checks they are ready to launch an emergency flight with healthy survivors aboard.

These are ordinary people who survived the Wildfire crisis somehow and managed to get to safety. None of them has passed the initial training required for arriving on Mars so we expect them to have a hard time acclimating to the life in the colony. But at least they would be safe from harm with us.

<effect>A rocket with <text_param1> Refugees aboard is inbound to Mars.

column2: We’ll make sure these poor souls get the best reception.
column3: We’ll make sure these poor souls get the best reception.

column2: Now that Mars has become a safe haven from the Wildfire infection the authorities on Earth have sent a rocket with non-infected refugees to be sheltered in your colony.
column3: Now that Mars has become a safe haven from the Wildfire infection the authorities on Earth have sent a rocket with non-infected refugees to be sheltered in your colony.
column4: Skoro Mars stał się bezpieczną kryjówką przed epidemią gorączki ognistej, władze ziemskie wysłały do naszej kolonii rakietę wiozącą zdrowych uchodźców.

column2: Refugees on board are fleeing the infected Earth.
column3: Refugees on board are fleeing the infected Earth.
column4: Uchodźcy na pokładzie rakiety uciekają przed epidemią szalejącą na Ziemi.

column2: Beyond Earth: Vision of the Future
“No, aliens did not build the pyramids – human beings built the pyramids with ingenuity and hard work.
column3: “Не, іншапланецяне не будавалі піраміды, а людзі з дапамогай вынаходлівасьці й цяжкай працы.
column4: – Nie, piramidy nie zostały zbudowane przez kosmitów; zbudowali je ludzie dzięki swej inteligencji i pracowitości.

column2:
And in this day and age, when we value the strength of a civilization not by its ability to wage war - but by its ability to prevent it, our hard work and cleverness have only one place left to take us – up.

Up towards the stars - above our superficial segregations and competing with ourselves. Up towards a united humanity spread out on many worlds… possibly even stars.  

I am more than certain that the last several thousand years of our history are but the bumpy road towards a version of humanity where there is no hunger, no war, no needless suffering and where the future holds nothing but opportunity and wonder.  And I also believe we are quite close to the end of this turbulent road. I make it my mission to help take us through this last stretch and today I announce my plan in investing the vast majority of my considerable fortune to this endeavor. “

Rede Goddenberry, one of the wealthiest and most powerful people on Earth, addresses the UN General Assembly
column3:
І ў наш час, калі мы цэнім моц цывілізацыі не за яе здольнасць весьці вайну, а за яе здольнасьць прадухіляць яе, нашай працавітасьці й кемлівасьці застаецца толькі адно - падняць нас уверх.

Уверх, да зорак, вышэй за нашы павярхоўныя сегрэгацыі й спаборніцтва з самімі сабой. Насустрач аб'яднанаму чалавецтву, раскіданаму па многіх сьветах... магчыма, нават зорках.

Я больш чым упэўнены, што апошнія некалькі тысяч гад нашай гісторыі - гэта толькі няроўная дарога да версіі чалавецтва, дзе няма голаду, вайны, непатрэбных пакут і дзе будучыня нясе толькі магчымасьці й цуды. І я таксама лічу, што мы даволі блізкія да канца гэтага турбулентнага шляху. Я лічу сваёй місіяй дапамагчы правесьці нас праз гэты апошні адцінак, і сёньня я аб'яўляю аб сваім плане ўкласьці большую частку майго значнага дастатку ў гэтую справу. “

Рэдэ Годдэнбэры, адзін з самых багатых і ўплывовых людзей на Зямлі, выступае перад Генеральнай Асамблеяй ААН

column2: Rede Goddenberry gives out a speech at the UN.
column3: Рэдэ Годдэнбэры выступае з прамовай у ААН.
column4: Rede Goddenberry wygłasza przemówienie w ONZ.

column2: Beyond Earth: A Deluded Old Billionaire
column4: Dalej niż Ziemia - Opętany stary miliarder

column2: Greetings from Earth! I’ve wanted an audience with the founders of the first human settlement away from our dear blue planet for ages now.
column3: Прывітаньне зь Зямлі! Я даўно прагнаў сустрэцца з заснавальнікамі першага чалавечага паселішча далёка ад нашай мілай блакітнай плянеты.
column4: Pozdrowienia z Ziemi! Od dawna chciałem pomówić z założycielami pierwszej ludzkiej osady poza naszą ukochaną niebieską planetą.

column2:
You see, in you I find kindred souls, souls who do not view my speech at the UN as the ramblings of a deluded old billionaire. I’m certain my vision resonates with all of you up there; after all - you are a part of it.

My Beyond Earth initiative is pushing several separate projects simultaneously - all aimed at bringing prosperity and peace to a human race spread across the Solar System.

One of the projects in question is currently in a ditch - the planning of a Moon base to mine Hydrogen 3, called Aldrin Base. I’m certain I don’t need to tell you what an abundance of the material would mean energy-wise. I’d kindly implore you, if your situation permits it of course, to contribute some research capacity and quite frankly know-how to the Beyond Earth initiative.

<effect>Beyond Earth Initiative tech unlocked. Research the tech to help the Aldrin Base project.
column3: Разумееце, у вас я знаходжу роднасныя душы, душы, якія не разглядаюць маю прамову ў ААН як блуканьне аблуднага старога мільярдэра. Я ўпэўнены, што маё бачаньне рэзаніруе з усімі вамі там. У рэшце рэшт - вы яго частка. Мая ініцыятыва «Па-за Зямлёй» адначасова прасоўвае некалькі асобных праэктаў - усе яны накіраваны на забесьпячэньне росквіту й міру чалавечай расы па ўсёй Сонечнай сістэме. Адзін з праэктаў, пра які ідзе гутарка, зараз знаходзіцца ў канаве - планаваньне базы на Месяцы для здабычы Вадароду-3 пад назвай "База Олдрын". Я ўпэўнены, што мне ня трэба распавядаць вам, што багацце матэрыялу будзе азначаць з пункту гледжаньня энэргіі. На ласку прашу вас, калі гэта дазваляе ваша сітуацыя, вядома, унесьці пэўны ўклад у дасьледаваньні й, шчыра кажучы, ноў-хаў ў Ініцыятыва «Па-за Заямлёй». Тэхнолёгія Ініцыятыва «Па-за Заямлёй» адкрыта. Дасьледуйце яе для дапамогі праэкту «базы Олдрын».

column2: Rede Goddenberry contacts the Mars colony with direct request for research contribution towards his Beyond Earth initiative.
column3: Rede Goddenberry contacts the Mars colony with direct request for research contribution towards his Beyond Earth initiative.
column4: Rede Goddenberry kontaktuje się z marsjańską kolonią i prosi naukowców o wsparcie inicjatywy „Dalej niż Ziemia”.

column2: The Beyond Earth initiative needs your help! And not with know-how this time around.
column3: The Beyond Earth initiative needs your help! And not with know-how this time around.
column4: Inicjatywa „Dalej niż Ziemia” potrzebuje twojej pomocy! I tym razem nie chodzi o wiedzę naukową.

column2:
Currently we are falling behind schedule at our Rubicon Station front - a deep-space shipyard tasked with expanding our space-faring capabilities - and would kindly request you to contribute Metals towards bringing the construction back on track.

We ran the numbers and have come to the conclusion that using Mars for firing raw materials towards our separate projects could prove far more effective than doing this from Earth and will speed up the whole process of bringing the project to fruition. 

A rocket to pick up the resources has been sent towards Mars. Every now and then more such rockets will arrive. If you have the materials to spare, please do!

<effect>A rocket requesting supplies for the Rubicon Station megaproject is headed towards Mars.
column3:

column2: Our contributions towards the Beyond Earth project have been received and we have Rede Goddenberry’s everlasting thanks – on behalf of humanity’s future.
column3: Our contributions towards the Beyond Earth project have been received and we have Rede Goddenberry’s everlasting thanks – on behalf of humanity’s future.
column4: Nasz wkład w realizację projektu „Dalej niż Ziemia” dotarł na miejsce i otrzymaliśmy gorące podziękowania od Rede’a Goddenberry’ego – w imieniu przyszłej ludzkości.

column2:
We are given a choice to contribute research to a project of our liking next, partially advancing progress on any of the following:

Aldrin Base - a settlement on the Moon to mine the Lunar soil for Hydrogen 3.

Port Vesta - a mining hub situated in the Asteroid Belt.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard in deep space.

And finally, Spring City - a farming hub on water-rich Ganymede.
column3:

column2: The Beyond Earth initiative needs more materials for the completion of its various projects.
column3: The Beyond Earth initiative needs more materials for the completion of its various projects.
column4: Inicjatywa „Dalej niż Ziemia” potrzebuje więcej materiałów do ukończenia różnych projektów.

column2:
We are being asked to pick a project we are willing to contribute resources to next. Each time we choose and send supplies towards a project it will advance a certain amount towards completion. The Beyond Earth projects are:

Aldrin Base - a Hydrogen 3 mining facility on the Moon tasked with powering up all of humanity’s activity in the entire Solar System.

Port Vesta - a mining operation in the Asteroid Belt guaranteeing humanity never wages war over resources again.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard situated in deep space tasked with considerably expanding humanity's space fleet construction capabilities.

Spring City - a farming settlement on Ganymede with the potential to feed humanity spread across an entire star system with capacity to spare.

column2: Aldrin Base has been completed! The Hydrogen 3 mining facility is fully functional and has begun exporting energy to Earth.
column3: Aldrin Base has been completed! The Hydrogen 3 mining facility is fully functional and has begun exporting energy to Earth.
column4: Baza Aldrin została ukończona! Instalacja wydobywająca wodór-3 działa pełną parą i zaczęła już wysyłać energię na Ziemię.

column2:
Earth celebrates a full independence of fossil fuel based energy sources and has a now virtually endless power supply coming from the Moon available for everyone. 

The technologies needed to transit power to far off posts like our colony is still a ways off, but we are given schematics to improve on our Fusion Reactors, based on the perfected design used at the Aldrin Base.

We have helped bring humanity closer to Rede Goddenberry’s utopic vision.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Fusion Reactors Power production.

column2: An extraordinary feat has been completed – an unparalleled  milestone in humanity’s history!
column3: An extraordinary feat has been completed – an unparalleled  milestone in humanity’s history!
column4: Dokonano niesamowitego wyczynu – to bezprecedensowe osiągnięcie w całej historii ludzkości!

column2:
Port Vesta has begun operations.

At the heart of the Asteroid Belt, the mining base is predicted to end poverty on Earth and bring an abundance of materials for all needs far and wide across the Solar System. 

The first shipments are already Earthbound, and while free and endless materials may await us in the future, for now we have been given the know-how to upgrade all of our extractors and make them more productive.

The megaproject envisioned by Rede Goddenberry has been completed.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Extractor production.
column3:

column2: What was until recently pure science fiction has now become a reality. Rubicon Station has been built and is already receiving its first permanent residents.
column3: What was until recently pure science fiction has now become a reality. Rubicon Station has been built and is already receiving its first permanent residents.
column4: Do tej pory była to czysta fantastyka naukowa, ale dziś - to rzeczywistość. Stacja Rubikon została ukończona i już przyjmuje pierwszych stałych mieszkańców.

column2:
A shipyard built in deep space, the Station is expected to grow humanity’s space faring capacity a thousandfold.

The unique location of the base is also perfect for fringe research purposes, boosting humanity’s understanding of the universe.

This project may have never been completed without our help and guidance.

Rede Goddenberry’s vision has become more real than ever.

<effect>Reduced cost of Physics and Engineering Techs by <reg_param1>%.

column2:
Many heated regions on Earth where hunger and strife are rampant will now be saved.

Our role in the realization of this project is far from overlooked and we have been sent new crops which are a extremely tough, healthy and nutritious to use on our own farms.

The Beyond Earth initiative brings humanity closer to a place where hunger and poverty will become nothing more than the woes of yesterday.

<effect>New Ganymede Rice hydroponic crop available.

column2: Beyond Earth: The Dream Lives On
column3: Beyond Earth: The Dream Lives On

column2: A time of change is befalling the human race – a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space faring humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair - the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who did not live to see how this vision uplifted the entire human race to conquer the Solar System with no reasons for strife and competition. May he rest in peace and forever be remembered a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .

column3: A new era for humanity has dawned!

column2: Rede Goddenberry's dream becomes reality with him still alive to witness it unfolding.
column3: Rede Goddenberry's dream becomes reality with him still alive to witness it unfolding.
column4: Marzenie Rede’a Goddenberry’ego staje się rzeczywistością, a on może zobaczyć to na własne oczy.

column2: We have received grave news from Earth. It seems Rede Goddenberry has fallen ill and doesn’t have much time left.
column3: We have received grave news from Earth. It seems Rede Goddenberry has fallen ill and doesn’t have much time left.
column4: Otrzymaliśmy smutną wiadomość z Ziemi. Rede Goddenberry poważnie zachorował i nie pozostało mu już wiele życia.

column2:
The billionaire has sent a special request out to us:

“It seems I can no longer hide the fact that I am and have been dying in these recent months. Although this may explain my push for haste in the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative to some, the reality is that it's badly needed with or without my condition in mind.

People are suffering and dying on Earth - in war, from diseases, from malnutrition. All of this is not necessary and my vision will remedy all of it, once complete.

So I convey this message to you, whom I have come to see as my closest partners in this endeavor: Please redouble your efforts, for it would please a dying old man greatly to see the plan bearing fruit before his death. But if not to warm my old heart, do it because you believe in what the initiative represents as I know you do.“
column3:
The billionaire has sent a special request out to us:

So I convey this message to you, whom I have come to see as my closest partners in this endeavor: Please redouble your efforts, for it would please a dying old man greatly to see the plan bearing fruit before his death. But if not to warm my old heart, do it because you believe in what the initiative represents as I know you do.“

column2: I am at loss for words.
column3: I am at loss for words.

column2: Rede Goddenberry reveals he is ill and dying.
column3: Rede Goddenberry reveals he is ill and dying.
column4: Rede Goddenberry ujawnia, że jest chory i umiera.

column2: Beyond Earth: Rede Goddenberry has passed away
column3: Beyond Earth: Rede Goddenberry has passed away
column4: Dalej niż Ziemia - Rede Goddenberry odszedł

column2: Today we received news of Rede Goddenberry’s passing. We are all deeply saddened by this loss.
column3: Today we received news of Rede Goddenberry’s passing. We are all deeply saddened by this loss.
column4: Dziś otrzymaliśmy wiadomość o odejściu pana Rede’a Goddenberry’ego. Jego śmierć wszystkich nas wielce zasmuciła.

column2:
But we are still inspired by his vision - a vision where humanity travels free amidst the worlds of a unified Solar System. 

Although Goddenberry’s death will dissuade many of his current partners to see the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative, we just may bring the plan to full or at least partial realization before other parties quit their involvement.
column3:
But we are still inspired by his vision - a vision where humanity travels free amidst the worlds of a unified Solar System. 

Although Goddenberry’s death will dissuade many of his current partners to see the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative, we just may bring the plan to full or at least partial realization before other parties quit their involvement.

column2: Beyond Earth: The Dream is Dead
column3: Beyond Earth: The Dream is Dead

column2: Following Rede Goddenberry’s death, all of his former partners from Beyond Earth have since abandoned the initiative.
column3: Following Rede Goddenberry’s death, all of his former partners from Beyond Earth have since abandoned the initiative.
column4: Po śmierci Rede’a Goddenberry’ego wszyscy jego dawni partnerzy uczestniczący w inicjatywie „Dalej niż Ziemia” zrezygnowali z jej kontynuowania.

column2:
We have failed to persuade them without the uniting effect of his utopic vision spearheaded by himself alone. 

The different gains in space exploration and asteroid mining will not simply disappear but are being bought off and pushed towards partial completion by various Earth-based corporations that will exploit them for personal profit and show no signs of desire to contribute to what was Rede Goddenberry’s vision of a united humanity.

In the end, history will remember him as an old eccentric billionaire who tried to swim upstream for humanity’s sake but ended up solidifying the rule of massive corporations that are more interested in profits than in an idealistic future.
column3:
We have failed to persuade them without the uniting effect of his utopic vision spearheaded by himself alone. 

The different gains in space exploration and asteroid mining will not simply disappear but are being bought off and pushed towards partial completion by various Earth-based corporations that will exploit them for personal profit and show no signs of desire to contribute to what was Rede Goddenberry’s vision of a united humanity.

In the end, history will remember him as an old eccentric billionaire who tried to swim upstream for humanity’s sake but ended up solidifying the rule of massive corporations that are more interested in profits than in an idealistic future.

column2: Rede Goddenberry's plan falls apart as previous partners leave the initiative after his passing.
column3: План Рэдэ Годдэнберры развальваецца, бо папярэднія партнёры пакідаюць ініцыятыву пасьля яго сьмерці.
column4: Plan Rede’a Goddenberry’ego spełzł na niczym, gdyż po jego śmierci dawni partnerzy wycofali się.

column2: There was a terrible accident at the Port Vesta project site.
column3: На пляцоўцы праэкту "Порт Вэста" адбылася жудасная аварыя.
column4: Na budowie Portu Westa doszło do strasznego wypadku.

column2:
A strong solar flare erupted without a sufficient head warning. There are 23 confirmed casualties.

The solar flare erupted during a short window of vulnerability, when Port Vesta had no operational means of shielding against such an event. If it had happened just a bit later, the defenses would've been operational.

Sadly the damage is massive in scale. The project suffered a major setback.
column3:
Моцная сонечная ўспышка ўспыхнула без належнага папярэджаньня. Пацверджаныя 23 ахвяры.

Сонечная ўспышка адбылася падчас кароткага перыяду небясьпекі, калі Порт Вэста не меў аператыўных сродкаў абароны ад такой падзеі. Калі б гэта адбылося крыху пазней, сістэмы абароны былі б спраўныя.

На жаль, маштабы шкоды велізарныя. Праэкт пацярпеў сур'ёзны правал.

column2: A tragedy indeed, but we will overcome this setback.
column3: Сапраўды трагедыя, але мы пераадолеем гэтую няўдачу.
column4: To prawdziwa tragedia, ale pokonamy tę przeszkodę.

column2: News of sabotage at the Aldrin Base mining facility on the Moon has just been made public. Luckily, there are no fatalities.
column3: Навіна аб дыверсіі на горназдабыўной базе Олдрын на Месяцы толькі што была абнародавана. На шчасце, абышлося без загінулых.
column4: Właśnie opublikowano wiadomości o sabotażu w księżycowej instalacji górniczej Baza Aldrin. Na szczęście nie było ofiar w ludziach.

column2:
The project has suffered a major setback. Below is Mr Goddenberry’s statement:

“What the Beyond Earth initiative is striving to ultimately achieve is change - change that will make inter-human rivalry a thing of the past. 

As with all change, there will be resistance. There are those who prosper from wars, from suffering. And they see a united humanity as a threat, for they will be left behind.

To them I have to say: the world is moving on. Try as you might, you have only slowed down an irreversible process.”
column3:
Праэкт пацярпеў сур'ёзны правал. Ніжэй прыводзіцца заява г-на  Годдэнберры:

“Да чаго ў канчатковым рахунку імкнецца ініцыятыва «Па-за Зямлёй» - гэта зьмены. Зьмены, якія зробяць міжасабовую канкурэнцыю ў мінулым.

Як і пад час любых зьмен, будзе супраціўленьне. Ёсьць тыя, хто квітнее на вайне й пакутах. І яны бачаць у аб'яднаным чалавецтве пагрозу, таму што застануцца ззаду.

Я павінен сказаць ім: свет рухаецца наперад. Як ні старайся, вы толькі запаволіце незваротны працэс.“

column2: A setback. We will overcome it!
column4: To tylko chwilowa przeszkoda. Pokonamy ją!

column3: Пераўтварыць <param1> пустой пароды ў карысныя матэрыялы
column4: Przetwórz <param1> odpadów skalnych na przydatne materiały.
Wydobądź w całości złoża podziemne (<param1>) do sola <param2>.

column2: Have a Dome with more than <param1> Colonists
column3: Мець купал з колькасьцю каляністаў больш за <param1>
column4: Miej kopułę zamieszkaną przez ponad <param1> kolonistów.
Miej następującą liczbę kopuł z iglicami – <param1>.

column2: Export <param1> Rare Metals by the end of Sol <param2>
column3: Экспартаваць рэдкіх мэталаў на <param1> па <param2> Сол
column4: Wyeksportuj <param1> rzadkich metali przed końcem sola <param2>.
Miej określoną liczbę ekstraktorów (<param1>) działających z wydajnością <param2>.
Miej określoną liczbę Założycieli (<param1>) z poziomem wygody <param2>.
Wytwórz <funding(param1)> w ciągu następującej liczby soli – <param2>.

column2: Have a Dome connected to <param1> other Domes
column3: Мець купал падлучаны да <param1> другіх купалаў
column4: Miej kopułę połączoną z następującą liczbą innych kopuł – <param1>.

column2: Land a Colonist on Mars by Sol <param1>
column3: Land a Colonist on Mars by Сол <param1>
column4: Sprowadź kolonistę na powierzchnię Marsa do sola <param1>.

column2: Have <param1> Martianborn Colonists by the end of Sol <param2>
column4: Miej określoną liczbę (<param1>) kolonistów-Marsjan przed końcem sola <param2>.

column2: Build a Machine Parts Factory, a Polymer Factory and an Electronics Factory
column3: Збудаваць Завод частак машын, Завод палімераў і Завод элэктронікі
column4: Zbuduj fabrykę części, fabrykę polimerów i fabrykę elektroniki.

column2: Refuel a rocket the same Sol it lands
column4: Zatankuj rakietę tego samego sola, w którym wylądowała.

column2: This in a golden opportunity for us to attract more applicants to join our cause.
column3: Гэта выдатная магчымасьць для нас прыцягнуць больш кандыдатаў далучыцца да нашай справы.
column4: To idealna okazja, by przyciągnąć więcej ochotników do idei kolonizacji Marsa.

column2: Our efforts and triumphs on Mars have not gone unnoticed back on Earth. A hit movie based on real events from the early days of the Martian colony just broke the all time box office record.
column3: Нашы намаганьні й перамогі на Марсе не засталіся незаўважанымі на Зямлі. Хіт, заснаваны на рэальных падзеях зь першых дзён марсіянскай калёніі, толькі што пабіў рэкорд па касавых зборах.
column4: Nasze wysiłki i sukcesy na Marsie nie przeszły niezauważone na Ziemi. Filmowy przebój oparty na prawdziwych wydarzeniach z początkowego okresu istnienia kolonii właśnie stał się najbardziej kasowym hitem wszech czasów.

column2: Attract as many new applicants as possible.
column3: Прывабіць як мага больш новых кандыдатаў.

column4: dodaje pewną liczbę ochotników (<specialists_applicants>) o różnych specjalizacjach.

column2: adds a Genius, a Celebrity and a Guru applicant
column3: дадае кандыдатаў: гэнія, знакамітасьць і гуру
column4: dodaje jednego ochotnika z iskrą geniuszu, jednego sławnego i jednego guru.

column2: We don't need more applicants, we will rely on our own Martianborn!
column3: Нам не патрэбны больш кандыдаты, мы будзем разлічваць на нашых марсіянароджаных!
column4: Nie potrzebujemy więcej ochotników, wystarczą nam ludzie urodzeni na Marsie!
premia do morale dla wszystkich kolonistów z cechą „Marsjanin”.

column2:
All Drone Hubs have ceased functioning! All Shuttle Hubs have malfunctioned! <funding(amount_1)> vanish from the colony's accounts in a blink of an eye and a Rocket is about to lift off without permission.

Amidst the chaos, a video message from a Genius Renegade force plays itself around the colony:

"So long, suckers! I suggest you get busy and bring your systems back online instead of devising ways to stop me. Trust me, you won't think of anything I haven't before you. Damn, I hate this place!"
column3:
Усе ЦК Дроназ спынілі працу! Усе ЦК Шатлаў пашкоджаны! <funding(amount_1)> зьніклі з рахунку калёніі ў імгненьні вока й ракета зьбіраецца ўзляцець без дазволу.

Сярод хаосу па калоніі гучыць відэазварот ад геніяльнага рэнэгата:

"Бывайце, ёлупні! Я раю вам заняцца працай і аднавіць свае сістэмы замест таго, каб шукаць спосабы спыніць мяне. Паверце мне, вы не прыдумаеце нічога, я ўсё прадумаў. Халера, я ненавіджу гэтае мейсца!"

column2: Alerts light up across the entire board. Systems fail across the colony.
column3: Абвесткі загараюцца па ўсёй дошцы. Сістэмы выходзяць з ладу па ўсёй калоніі.
column4: Na całej tablicy kontrolnej zapalają się sygnały alarmowe. Dochodzi do masowej awarii systemów w całej kolonii.

column2: Force lock the controls of the Rocket remotely.
column3: Прымусова заблакаваць элэменты кіраваньня ракетай дыстанцыйна.

column2: Try to reason with them and promise change.
column3: Паспрабуйце разважыць іх і паабяцайце перамены.
column4: Spróbuj zaapelować do zdrowego rozsądku i obiecaj zmiany.

column2: Threaten to write an op-ed that shapes <DisplayName> as a lowly villain.
column3: Пагражае напісаць артыкул, які фарміруе <DisplayName> як нізкага злыдня.
column4: Zagroź, że opublikujesz w sieci felieton, w którym <DisplayName> zostanie przedstawiony jako podły przestępca.

column2: Invent a competent lie about a Meteor Storm that will hamper the Rocket take-off.
column3: Прыдумайце пісьменную хлусню пра мэтэорны шторм, які перашкодзіць узлёту ракеты.
column4: Wymyśl wiarygodne kłamstwo o burzy meteorytowej, która uniemożliwia start rakiety.

column2: Contact Earth authorities and delegate the issue to them.
column3: Звяжыцеся з уладамі Зямлі й даручыце ім справу.
column4: Skontaktuj się z władzami na Ziemi i zrzuć problem na ich głowę.

column2: Try to cause a Rocket malfunction remotely.
Warn about possible dire consequences to Earth Ecology if the Rocket gets there.
column3: Папярэдзьце аб магчымых цяжкіх наступствах для экалёгіі Зямлі, калі ракета трапіць туды.
column4: Ostrzeż przed możliwymi ponurymi następstwami dla ziemskiego środowiska, jakie może spowodować wylądowanie rakiety.

column2: Tell <DisplayName> you have seen their medical records and they are unfit for a space trip at this time.
column3: Скажыце <DisplayName>, што вы бачылі іх медыцынскія запісы, і што яны зараз не гатовы да палётаў.
column4: Powiedz, że znasz raporty medyczne, według których <DisplayName> nie nadaje się w tej chwili do podróży kosmicznych.

column2: Threaten some friends of <DisplayName> on Mars and Earth.
column3: Пагражаць сябрам <DisplayName> на Марсе й Зямлі.
column4: Zagroź, że przyjaciele kolonisty <DisplayName> na Marsie i na Ziemi poniosą konsekwencje.
Spróbuj sprawić, że <DisplayName> doświadczy poczucia winy.

column2: Let them go and don't risk further damage.
column3: Адпусціце іх і не рызыкуйце большымі пашкодамі.
column4: Odpuść sobie i nie ryzykuj dalszych zniszczeń.

column2:
"You think I haven't taken all the necessary precautions? You think I've left things to chance? Boy, this hurts!

I intended to leave you some cash to spare but I think this insult deserves a response."

<effect>Further <funding(further_penalty)> was taken out of our accounts.
column3:
«Вы лічаце, што я не прыняў усіх неабходных мер засьцярогі? Вы думаеце, што я пакінуў усё на волю выпадку? Гэта балюча!

Я меў намер пакінуць вам грошы ў запас, але лічу, што гэтая абраза заслугоўвае адказу».

<effect>Дадатковае <funding(further_penalty)> было зьнята з нашых рахункаў.

column2: The Genius Renegade just laughs and adds:
column3: Геніяльны рэнэгат толькі смяецца й дадае:
column4: Renegat-geniusz tylko się śmieje i dodaje:

column2:
Damn... I... I did not think of this. Actually, I did, I just thought that... I give up. I'll behave."

<effect>Stolen funding was refunded.
column3:
Трасца... я... я не думаў аб гэтым. Насампрэч, я так, я проста думаў, што... Я здаюся. Я буду сябе паводзіць».

<effect>Скрадзенае фінансаваньне было вернута.

column2:
MOXIEs shut down during Dust Storms to prevent their dust filter from jamming up and damaging the unit. However, the filter on this one is completely clogged.

Oxygen production is vital for the colony but the filter repair will take <duration> hours. What should we do?
column3:
МЭРТы адключаюцца падчас пясчаных бур, каб прадухіліць засарэньне пылавога фільтра й пашкоджаньне прылады. Аднак фільтр на гэтым цалкам забіты.

Выпрацоўка тлёну жыцьцёва неабходна для калёніі, але рамонт зойме <duration> гадзін. Што нам рабіць?

column2: You tap the red light on the terminal with your finger. It should have turned green when the Dust Storm dissipated. Looks like a MOXIE unit is out of order.
column3: Вы націскаеце пальцам на чырвонае сьвятло на тэрмінале. Ён павінен быў стаць зялёным, калі пясчаная бура разьвеялася. Выглядае, што ўстаноўка МЭРТ не працуе.
column4: Stukasz palcem w czerwoną kontrolkę na pulpicie. Powinna zmienić kolor na zielony, gdy skończyła się burza pyłowa. Zdaje się, że jeden z MAGETLEN-ów przestał działać.

column2: the MOXIE will start working immediately but will request maintenance more often
column3: МЭРТ пачне працаваць неадкладна, але будзе патрабаваць тэхнічнае абслугоўваньне часцей
column4: MAGETLEN zacznie działać natychmiast, ale będzie częściej wymagać konserwacji.

column2: We can wait for the repairs.
MOXIE will not work for <duration> hours
column4: MAGETLEN nie będzie działać przez <duration> h.

column2: We can make a new filter.

MOXIEs use a form of electrolysis to produce Oxygen from carbon dioxide. However, the process requires relatively high (for Mars) temperatures.

It looks like a failure in one of our MOXIE units has highlighted a design flaw in the technology. We have to find a solution that works for all MOXIEs.
column3:
МЭРТ выкарыстоўвае форму элэктролізу для вылучэньня тлёну з вуглякіслага газу. Аднак працэс патрабуе адносна высокіх (для Марсу) тэмператур.

Падобна на тое, што збой у адным з нашых блокаў МЭРТ выявіў канструктыўную праблему ў тэхнолёгіі. Мы павінны знайсьці рашэньне, якое працуе для ўсіх МЭРТаў.

column2: As the frost outside settles, an urgent maintenance report flashes on your terminal. There’s a problem with a MOXIE unit.
column3: Калі на вуліцы марозна, на вашым тэрмінале узьнікае справаздача аб тэрміновым тэхнічным абслугоўваньні. Ёсьць праблема з блокам МЭРТ.
column4: Mróz na zewnątrz zelżał i na twoim terminalu pojawia się pilny raport konserwacyjny. Mamy problem z jednym z MAGETLEN-ów.
zużycie energii przez MAGETLEN-y wzrośnie o <power(increased_consumption)>.

column2: Improve the insulation of the MOXIEs.
Leave the MOXIEs as they are.
MOXIEs will require maintenance more often
Once again, a MOXIE unit has shut down and stopped producing Oxygen. Drones report that many of the internal parts of the MOXIE have suffered structural damage much earlier than expected.
column3: У чарговы раз адключылася ўстаноўка МЭРТ і перастала выпрацоўваць тлён. Дроны паведамляюць, што многія ўнутраныя часткі МЭРТ атрымалі структурныя пашкоджаньні значна раней, чым чакалася.
column4: Po raz kolejny jeden z MAGETLEN-ów przestał wytwarzać tlen i wyłączył się. Drony informują, że wiele elementów wewnętrznych urządzenia doznało uszkodzeń strukturalnych znacznie wcześniej, niż oczekiwano.

column2: A yellow light starts flashing on your terminal. Sure enough it is one of those damned MOXIE units again.
column3: На вашым тэрмінале пачынае міргаць жоўты індыкатар. Вядома, гэта зноў адзін з тых праклятых блокаў МЭРТ.
column4: Na twoim pulpicie zaczyna pulsować żółta kontrolka. To pewnie znowu jeden z tych cholernych MAGETLEN-ów.

column2: MOXIE cost increased by <metals(cost_increase)>, existing MOXIEs will need emergency maintenance
column3: Кошт МЭРТ павялічаны на <metals(cost_increase)>, існуючы МЭРТы патрабуюць тэрміновае абслугоўваньне
column4: budowa MAGETLEN-u będzie wymagać dodatkowo <metals(cost_increase)>, istniejące MAGETLEN-y będą potrzebować konserwacji awaryjnej.

column2: Reduce the pressure in the system.

column4: zmniejszenie produkcji tlenu przez MAGETLEN-y o <o2_production_reduction>%.

column2: Keep repairing the MOXIEs as problems occur.
column3: Па меры ўзьнікненьня праблем працягвайце рамантаваць МЭРТы.
column4: Naprawiajcie MAGETLEN-y, gdy pojawi się problem.
koszt konserwacji MAGETLEN-ów wzrasta na stałe o <metals(increased_maintenance)>.

column2:
The new MOXIE 2.0 design is finally ready and we have updated all current MOXIEs to the new specs. MOXIE 2.0 also has increased air production.

<effect>All negative effects on MOXIEs have been removed.
column3:
Новы МЭРТ 2.0 дызайн нарэшце гатовы, і мы абнавілі ўсе сучасныя МЭРТы да новых спэцыфікацый. МЭРТ 2.0 таксама павялічваецца выпрацоўка паветра.

<effect>Усе негатыўныя наступствы ў МЭРТаў былі выдалены.

column2:
The core principle of extracting Oxygen from Martian CO2 is sound. The current implementation of the technology leaves a lot to be desired. Our Scientists believe that with all the information we have learned so far we can design a better MOXIE.

<effect>”MOXIE 2.0” technology is now available for research.
column3:
Асноўны прынцып здабываньня тлёну з марсіянскага СО2 вядомы. Цяперашняя рэалізацыя тэхнолёгіі мае шмат чаго да паляпшэньня. Нашы навукоўцы лічаць, што з дапамогай усёй інфармацыі, якую мы даведаліся да гэтага часу, мы можам распрацаваць лепшы МЭРТ.

<effect>«МЭРТ 2.0» тэхнолёгія цяпер даступны да дасьледаваньня.

column2: The expert report on the failing MOXIEs is almost 300 pages long, finding multiple issues with their design.
column3: Экспэртная справаздача аб няспраўных МЭРТ налічвае амаль 300 старонак, знаходзячы мноства праблем з іх дызайнам.
column4: Raport ekspertów na temat MAGETLEN-ów ulegających awariom liczy prawie 300 stron i wskazuje liczne usterki projektowe.

column2: We seem to be missing some parts for our <DisplayName> prefab. Also there seem to be parts that don’t fit anywhere and the instructions are no help at all.
column3: We seem to be missing some parts for our <DisplayName> prefab. Also there seem to be parts that don’t fit anywhere and the instructions are no help at all.
column4: Zdaje się, że brakuje nam pewnych części prefabrykatu (<DisplayName>). Dostaliśmy też części, które do niczego nie pasują, a instrukcja nie jest zbyt pomocna.

column2: The drone attempts to put the square part into the round hole for the third consecutive time, determined to find a solution.
column3: The drone attempts to put the square part into the round hole for the third consecutive time, determined to find a solution.
column4: Już trzeci raz dron próbuje umieścić kwadratową część w okrągłym otworze, zdecydowany znaleźć jakieś rozwiązanie.

column2: Let’s try to jury rig something…
column3: Let’s try to jury rig something…

column2: chance to fix the building or lose the drone
column3: chance to fix the building or lose the drone
column4: istnieje szansa naprawienia budynku lub utraty drona.

column2:
Taking manual control over the drone, we were able to put together the building but there were some places we had to improvise.

<effect>The <DisplayName> has been constructed but it will require additional maintenance every time the building malfunctions.
column3:
Taking manual control over the drone, we were able to put together the building but there were some places we had to improvise.

<effect>The <DisplayName> has been constructed but it will require additional maintenance every time the building malfunctions.

column2: Well we had to use some of the parts from the drone itself but we were able to assemble the <DisplayName> prefab.
column3: Well we had to use some of the parts from the drone itself but we were able to assemble the <DisplayName> prefab.
column4: Musieliśmy wykorzystać trochę części z samego drona, ale udało się nam zmontować prefabrykat (<DisplayName>).

column2:
Taking manual control over the drone, we were able to assemble the <DisplayName> prefab but we are left with a lot of spare parts. Come to think of it I believe we can make another <DisplayName> with them.

<effect>The <DisplayName> has been constructed and we’ve gained another <DisplayName> prefab.
column3:
Taking manual control over the drone, we were able to assemble the <DisplayName> prefab but we are left with a lot of spare parts. Come to think of it I believe we can make another <DisplayName> with them.

<effect>The <DisplayName> has been constructed and we’ve gained another <DisplayName> prefab.

column2:
Ah, I see what the problem is. This is not a prefab for <DisplayName> - it’s a prefab for an Electronics Factory.

<effect>Construction of <DisplayName> has been canceled. A prefab for an Electronics Factory has been added.
column3:
Ah, I see what the problem is. This is not a prefab for <DisplayName> - it’s a prefab for an Завод электронікі.

<effect>Construction of <DisplayName> has been canceled. A prefab for an Завод электронікі has been added.

column2:
Our <DisplayName> Rocket seems to have suffered a malfunction in her fuel tank. There are worries that the Rocket won’t survive the landing sequence.

If the Rocket lands successfully we can fix the malfunction with some polymers.
column3:
Our <DisplayName> Rocket seems to have suffered a malfunction in her fuel tank. There are worries that the Rocket won’t survive the landing sequence.

If the Rocket lands successfully we can fix the malfunction with some polymers.

column2: The satellite camera shows the rocket you are trying to land in standard Mars orbit. A small jet of liquid is gushing out from the side.
column3: The satellite camera shows the rocket you are trying to land in standard Mars orbit. A small jet of liquid is gushing out from the side.
column4: Kamera jednego z satelitów pokazuje rakietę, która ma wkrótce lądować, na normalnej orbicie okołomarsjańskiej. Z burty pojazdu tryska cienki strumyk paliwa.

column2: Attempt the landing with full payload.
column3: Attempt the landing with full payload.

column2: chance that the rocket will explode
column3: chance that the rocket will explode

column2: Unfortunately the malfunction affected our rocket’s landing trajectory and threw her off course resulting in a crash landing. We have lost both the rocket and her cargo.
column3: Unfortunately the malfunction affected our rocket’s landing trajectory and threw her off course resulting in a crash landing. We have lost both the rocket and her cargo.
column4: Niestety awaria wpłynęła na trajektorię lotu rakiety i zepchnęła ją z kursu, przez co rakieta rozbiła się przy lądowaniu. Utraciliśmy zarówno rakietę, jak i jej ładunek.

column2: safe landing but cargo is lost
column3: safe landing but cargo is lost
column4: rakieta ląduje bezpiecznie, ale tracisz ładunek.

column2: Activate manual control, I can land this one safely.
column3: Activate manual control, I can land this one safely.
column4: Włączcie zdalne sterowanie, dam radę wylądować bezpiecznie.

column2: rocket will land safely with cargo
column3: rocket will land safely with cargo
column4: rakieta ląduje bez problemów wraz z ładunkiem.

column2: Following the hype the game has generated, we have been approached by a major video game publisher with an offer to buy out the rights for the game and sell it commercially.
column3: Following the hype the game has generated, we have been approached by a major video game publisher with an offer to buy out the rights for the game and sell it commercially.
column4: Gra wzbudziła wśród graczy tyle szumu, że zgłosił się do nas poważny wydawca gier wideo z propozycją kupna praw do gry i sprzedawania jej na wielką skalę.

column2: A Battle Royale VR game, created solely for recreational purposes by our VR Workshop team, has been leaked to Earth and is quickly becoming a smashing hit.
column3: A Battle Royale VR game, created solely for recreational purposes by our VR Workshop team, has been leaked to Earth and is quickly becoming a smashing hit.
column4: Gra wirtualnej rzeczywistości typu „Battle Royale”, stworzona dla celów rozrywkowych przez nasz zespół pracowni VR, wyciekła na Ziemię i błyskawicznie staje się wielkim przebojem.

column2: Sounds like a no-brainer - sell them the rights and get royalties every <sols(royalty_period)> Sols for the next <sols(royalty_duration)> Sols.
column3: Sounds like a no-brainer - sell them the rights and get royalties every <sols(royalty_period)> Sols for the next <sols(royalty_duration)> Sols.
column4: Nie ma co łamać głowy – sprzedajmy im te prawa i kasujmy tantiemy co <sols(royalty_period)> soli przez kolejne <sols(royalty_duration)> soli.

column2: The game was not made with profit in mind. We should formally release it for free.
column3: The game was not made with profit in mind. We should formally release it for free.
column4: Stworzyliśmy tę grę nie dla zysku. Powinniśmy formalnie wydać ją jako darmowy produkt.

column2: gain <applicants> Gamer applicants, Gamer colonists get large Morale boost
column3: gain <applicants> Gamer applicants, Gamer colonists get large Morale boost
column4: zdobywasz ochotników-graczy (<applicants>), koloniści-gracze otrzymują dużą premię do morale.

column2: lump sum in profits now and larger royalties every <sols(royalty_period)> Sols for the next <sols(royalty_duration)> Sols
column3: lump sum in profits now and larger royalties every <sols(royalty_period)> Sols for the next <sols(royalty_duration)> Sols
column4: godziwy zysk od razu i większe tantiemy co <sols(royalty_period)> soli przez pewną liczbę soli (<sols(royalty_duration)>).

column2:
Perhaps it all started on a slow news days, perhaps journalists on Earth are just bitter, but various prominent news networks all over the globe have been openly criticizing our mission and questioning every aspect of it – from its economic feasibility to its necessity for the future of the human race.

Our sponsor is deflecting blows left and right and has formally requested that we break our silence and hold a press conference.
column3:
Perhaps it all started on a slow news days, perhaps journalists on Earth are just bitter, but various prominent news networks all over the globe have been openly criticizing our mission and questioning every aspect of it – from its economic feasibility to its necessity for the future of the human race.

Our sponsor is deflecting blows left and right and has formally requested that we break our silence and hold a press conference.

column2: Our colony has come under media fire by a global news conglomerate.
column3: Our colony has come under media fire by a global news conglomerate.
column4: Nasza kolonia znalazła się pod medialnym ostrzałem ze strony globalnej korporacji informacyjnej.

column2: Yes, there are challenges to overcome, but humanity is ready for the ultimate test.
column3: Yes, there are challenges to overcome, but humanity is ready for the ultimate test.
column4: Tak, musimy stale pokonywać trudności, ale dzięki temu ludzkość będzie gotowa na każdą próbę.

column2: Your faith can move mountains and your doubt can create them.
column3: Your faith can move mountains and your doubt can create them.
column4: Wiara potrafi przenosić góry, a zwątpienie może je piętrzyć.

column2: As a great man once said, humans need to be a multiplanetary species.
column3: As a great man once said, humans need to be a multiplanetary species.
column4: Jak powiedział kiedyś pewien wielki człowiek, ludzkość musi się stać gatunkiem wieloplanetarnym.

column2: We would not grace them with a reply.
column3: We would not grace them with a reply.
column4: Nie będziemy zniżać się do odpowiadania na takie zarzuty.

column2:
People whisper with fear about an applicant who has been subjected to the Space Rehabilitation treatment and suffered a terrible fate, losing all memories and personality traits! Now the Applicants have started resigning from the program, which threatens our public face on Earth.

It is all a fabrication, but how can we convince the applicants?
column3:
People whisper with fear about an applicant who has been subjected to the Space Rehabilitation treatment and suffered a terrible fate, losing all memories and personality traits! Now the Applicants have started resigning from the program, which threatens our public face on Earth.

It is all a fabrication, but how can we convince the applicants?

column2: A dark rumor is spreading among the applicants who want to join our Colony on Mars.
column3: A dark rumor is spreading among the applicants who want to join our Colony on Mars.
column4: Wśród ochotników pragnących dołączyć do naszej kolonii na Marsie szerzy się ponura plotka.

column2: no Applicants leave the Applicants Pool, all Colonists lose <morale_lost> Morale for <sols(morale_down_sols)> Sols
column3: no Applicants leave the Applicants Pool, all Colonists lose <morale_lost> Morale for <sols(morale_down_sols)> Sols
column4: żaden ochotnik nie opuści puli, wszyscy koloniści tracą <morale_lost> do morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_down_sols)>).

column2: <applicants_lost> will leave but <paid_applicants> Applicants with Perks join the Applicants Pool
column3: <applicants_lost> will leave but <paid_applicants> Applicants with Perks join the Applicants Pool
column4: część ochotników (<applicants_lost>) zrezygnuje, ale w puli pojawią się ochotnicy z zaletami (<paid_applicants>).

column2: <applicants_lost> will leave but <idiots_gained> Applicants with Flaws will join the Applicants Pool
column3: <applicants_lost> will leave but <idiots_gained> Applicants with Flaws will join the Applicants Pool
column4: część ochotników (<applicants_lost>) zrezygnuje, ale w puli pojawią się ochotnicy z wadami (<idiots_gained>).

column2: <effect><DisplayName> has lost all traits and has gained the Perks Composed, Fit and Sexy.
column3: <effect><DisplayName> has lost all traits and has gained the Perks Composed, Fit and Sexy.
column4: <effect><DisplayName> traci wszystkie cechy i uzyskuje zalety „odporność psychiczna”, ”sprawność” i „seksowność”.

column2: A Colonist has somehow been completely changed overnight! Not just their personality, but also their looks and overall health!
column3: A Colonist has somehow been completely changed overnight! Not just their personality, but also their looks and overall health!
column4: Jeden z kolonistów jakimś cudem całkowicie się zmienił w ciągu nocy! Ma nie tylko inną osobowość, ale także wygląd i stan zdrowia!

column2: Get the research team working on this!
column3: Get the research team working on this!
column4: Niech zespół badawczy się tym zajmie!

column2: Acting quickly, you order the research team to examine the still confused Colonist.
column3: Acting quickly, you order the research team to examine the still confused Colonist.
column4: Reagujesz błyskawicznie i nakazujesz zespołowi badawczemu zbadanie wciąż zdezorientowanego kolonisty.

column2: <effect>Research the new tech “Anomalous Genome Resequencing” to discover the truth behind the rapid change of <DisplayName>.
column3: <effect>Research the new tech “Anomalous Genome Resequencing” to discover the truth behind the rapid change of <DisplayName>.
column4: <effect>Zbadaj nową technologię „Resekwencjonowanie anomalnego genomu”, aby odkryć, dlaczego <DisplayName> się zmienia.

column2: I will research the case myself.
column3: I will research the case myself.

column2: Acting quickly, you perform some unconventional tests on the still-confused Colonist.
column3: Acting quickly, you perform some unconventional tests on the still-confused Colonist.
column4: Reagujesz błyskawicznie i wykonujesz kilka niekonwencjonalnych testów na wciąż zdezorientowanym koloniście.

column2: <effect>Research the new tech “Anomalous Genome Resequencing” to discover the truth behind the rapid change of <DisplayName>. The new tech has gained 50% progress.
column3: <effect>Research the new tech “Anomalous Genome Resequencing” to discover the truth behind the rapid change of <DisplayName>. The new tech has gained 50% progress.
column4: <effect>Zbadaj nową technologię „Resekwencjonowanie anomalnego genomu”, aby odkryć, dlaczego <DisplayName> się zmienia. Nowa technologia uzyskała stan postępu badań 50%.

column2:
They have mutated and have changed their behavior, slowly melding our Colonists into a species of homogenous individuals.

Our research team has discovered the kill-switch mechanism to stop this. What are your orders?
column3:
They have mutated and have changed their behavior, slowly melding our Colonists into a species of homogenous individuals.

Our research team has discovered the kill-switch mechanism to stop this. What are your orders?

column2: We have discovered the reason behind the changes that affected our Colonist. Our Construction Nanites!
column3: We have discovered the reason behind the changes that affected our Colonist. Our Construction Nanites!
column4: Odkryliśmy przyczynę zmian u odmienionego kolonisty. To nasze nanity budowlane!

column2: Probably this is for the better...
column3: Probably this is for the better...

column2: <changed_amount> Colonists will be re-written before stopping the effects
column3: <changed_amount> Colonists will be re-written before stopping the effects
column4: Zanim nanity przestaną działać, pewna liczba kolonistów ulegnie jeszcze przemianie (<changed_amount>).

column2: We still have the key to stopping this before the Colonists begin to suspect a sinister plan on our side.
column3: We still have the key to stopping this before the Colonists begin to suspect a sinister plan on our side.
column4: Wciąż mamy możliwość zatrzymania tego procesu, zanim koloniści zaczną podejrzewać, że to jakiś nasz podstępny plan.

column2: The effects of the mutated nanites have become too widespread and people begin to worry.
column3: The effects of the mutated nanites have become too widespread and people begin to worry.
column4: Działalność zmutowanych nanitów stała się zbyt powszechna i ludzie zaczynają się martwić.

column2: the effect continue, all colonists lose <morale_down> for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column3: the effect continue, all colonists lose <morale_down> for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: przemiany trwają, wszyscy koloniści tracą <morale_down> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: I will give a motivational speech about the future of humankind.
column3: I will give a motivational speech about the future of humankind.
column4: Wygłoszę przemówienie motywacyjne o przyszłości ludzkości.

column2:
Again, they have lost all of their personality and have become more or less the same perfect individual.

<effect><changed_colonists> Colonists have lost their traits and have gained the Perks Composed, Fit and Sexy.
column3:
Again, they have lost all of their personality and have become more or less the same perfect individual.

column2: More Colonists have been completely re-written!
column3: More Colonists have been completely re-written!

column2:
With the downpour of new scientific data from Mars, our team made an unheard breakthrough in the field.

<effect>A new advanced technology has been revealed in the chosen field. The new technology costs less to research.
column3:
З паступленьнем новых навуковых дадзеных з Марсу наша каманда зрабіла нечуваны прарыў у гэтай галіне.

<effect>У абранай вобласьці адкрыта новая перадавая тэхнолёгія. Новая тэхнолёгія каштуе менш на дасьледаваньняў.

column2: Our scientific team on Earth has just made a daunting discovery!
column3: Наша навуковая група на Зямлі толькі што зрабіла жахлівае адкрыцьцё!
column4: Nasz zespół naukowy na Ziemi dokonał oszałamiającego odkrycia!

column2:
The ink has almost completely vanished, but with extra effort and creativity you manage to press through.

In the distant 1973 an isolated country made a secret landing on Mars in preparation for further colonization of the entire Solar system!

Led personally by the Great Leader Himself, their tireless engineers created many wonders of architecture and creativity. This deed was made possible only by the eternal wisdom and guidance of the Great Leader!
column3:
The ink has almost completely vanished, but with extra effort and creativity you manage to press through.

column2: The Other Side of the Sun

column3: While sifting through the red dust, our Drones discovered the remains of an old concrete bunker. The treasure inside is a folder of old documents.
column4: Przesiewając czerwony piasek, nasze drony odkryły pozostałości starego betonowego bunkra. W środku znaleziono plik starych dokumentów.
