reveals technologies in the Physics tree
It will carry an RC Transport rover on board, ready to be used immediately on arrival. Just give the call, Commander!
column3: It will carry an RC Transport rover on board, ready to be used immediately on arrival. Just give the call, Commander!
column4: Przywiezie ciężarówkę sterowaną, gotową do natychmiastowego użytku. Wystarczy, że dasz znać, Dowódco!

column2: The Mission HQ on Earth has decided to boost the expansion capabilities of the colony by providing a priority Supply Pod.
column3: The Mission HQ on Earth has decided to boost the expansion capabilities of the colony by providing a priority Supply Pod.
column4: Dowództwo Misji na Ziemi postanowiło wspomóc możliwości ekspansji kolonii, dostarczając priorytetowy zasobnik.

column2: Sure, we can use a new Transport!
column3: Sure, we can use a new Transport!

column2: Why not improve the Transport technology instead?
column3: Why not improve the Transport technology instead?
column4: A może lepiej ulepszyć technologię transportu?

column2: the tech Transport Optimization is researched
column3: the tech Transport Optimization is researched

column2:
The Extractor Amplification project has received a massive funding increase and a lot of scientific focus has been shifted towards it. The top brass wants you to begin installing the new upgrades as soon as possible.

<effect>The tech Extractor Amplification has been revealed and it costs <extractor_discount>% less.
column3:
The Extractor Amplification project has received a massive funding increase and a lot of scientific focus has been shifted towards it. The top brass wants you to begin installing the new upgrades as soon as possible.

<effect>The tech Extractor Amplification has been revealed and it costs <extractor_discount>% less.

column2: The Mission HQ on Earth has declared the effectiveness of our resource extraction as main priority.
column3: The Mission HQ on Earth has declared the effectiveness of our resource extraction as main priority.
column4: Dowództwo Misji na Ziemi ogłosiło, że wydajność wydobycia surowców na Marsie ma znaczenie priorytetowe.

column2: gain a Supply Pod with <drones> Drones and <polymers> Polymers
column3: gain a Supply Pod with <drones> Drones and <polymers> Polymers
column4: otrzymujesz zasobnik z <drones> dronami i <polymers> polimerami

column2: reveals the rest of the Amplification techs and they cost <others_discount>% less
column3: reveals the rest of the Amplification techs and they cost <others_discount>% less
column4: ujawnia pozostałe technologie wzmocnień i zmniejsza ich koszt o <others_discount>%

column2:
No matter how much you bang your head against the wall, the budget charts don’t start to make sense. We are severely overstretched. What are they thinking! Do they think colonizing Mars is a walk in the… then the call comes in.

The mission’s board has decided to bail us out after catching wind of your financial woes, and not a moment too soon.

You give out a sigh of relief.
column3:
No matter how much you bang your head against the wall, the budget charts don’t start to make sense. We are severely overstretched. What are they thinking! Do they think colonizing Mars is a walk in the… then the call comes in.

The mission’s board has decided to bail us out after catching wind of your financial woes, and not a moment too soon.

You give out a sigh of relief.

column2: Slash it... Spread it... Prioritize... Then start all over again.
column3: Slash it... Spread it... Prioritize... Then start all over again.
column4: Podziel... Rozdziel... Ustal priorytety... A potem od nowa.

column2: It is the lack of knowledge that burdens us more.
column3: It is the lack of knowledge that burdens us more.

column2: Threaten to submit report of gross failure unless further funding is secured.
column3: Threaten to submit report of gross failure unless further funding is secured.
column4: Zagroź, że jeśli nie otrzymacie dodatkowych funduszy, prześlesz raport o niewydolności finansowej.

column2:
Hard to believe that the bailout managed to steer things around so successfully. And judging by the message we received from the board, they may even be more surprised than we are.

Our sponsor clearly expresses happiness with how well their investment is paying off, clearly referencing our Rare Metals exports, and will now offer us a better export price as a show of trust.

<effect>Export price of Rare Metals increased by <price_increase>%
column3:
Hard to believe that the bailout managed to steer things around so successfully. And judging by the message we received from the board, they may even be more surprised than we are.

Our sponsor clearly expresses happiness with how well their investment is paying off, clearly referencing our Rare Metals exports, and will now offer us a better export price as a show of trust.

<effect>Export price of Rare Metals increased by <price_increase>%

column2: You run through the numbers again, then maybe one last time. Yes, things are finally looking up!
column3: You run through the numbers again, then maybe one last time. Yes, things are finally looking up!
column4: Szybko sumujesz liczby jeszcze raz, a potem sprawdzasz po raz ostatni. Tak, nareszcie jesteśmy na plusie!

column2: Best of Best, as the program is being called, wants your input on what specialization field they should concentrate their recruitment efforts.
column3: Best of Best, as the program is being called, wants your input on what specialization field they should concentrate their recruitment efforts.
column4: „Najlepsi z najlepszych” – jak nazywa się ten program – prosi o informacje, na jakiej dziedzinie powinni się skupić podczas poszukiwania specjalistów.

column2: With the early phase of our mission showing relative stability and gaining in popularity back on Earth, our sponsor feels we are in a good position to push forward a training program aimed at attracting the best applicants Earth has to offer.
column3: With the early phase of our mission showing relative stability and gaining in popularity back on Earth, our sponsor feels we are in a good position to push forward a training program aimed at attracting the best applicants Earth has to offer.
column4: Wstępna faza misji przebiega względnie stabilnie i zyskuje na popularności na Ziemi, więc nasz sponsor ma wrażenie, że są szanse na przepchnięcie programu szkoleniowego, którego celem byłoby przyciągnięcie najlepszych ochotników dostępnych na Ziemi.

column2: We will always need more Scientists.
column3: We will always need more Scientists.

column2: Qualified Geologists will be vital for resource extraction early on.
column3: Qualified Geologists will be vital for resource extraction early on.
column4: Od samego początku wykwalifikowani geolodzy są nieodzowni przy wydobyciu surowców.

column2: We need Botanists to secure the food production of the colony.
column3: We need Botanists to secure the food production of the colony.
column4: Potrzebujemy botaników, aby zapewnić produkcję żywności w kolonii.

column2: A productive mindset is more important then the exact specialization.
column3: A productive mindset is more important then the exact specialization.
column4: Produktywność jest ważniejsza niż konkretna specjalizacja.

column2: It looks like somebody has been keeping the best for last. The final three applications are very impressive. Too bad you have to narrow the list down to one.
column3: It looks like somebody has been keeping the best for last. The final three applications are very impressive. Too bad you have to narrow the list down to one.
column4: Wygląda na to, że ktoś zachował najlepsze na koniec. Trzej ostatni ochotnicy są imponujący. Szkoda, że możesz wybrać tylko jedną osobę.

column2: A new email pops up on your screen holding the final three applications from the training program.
column3: A new email pops up on your screen holding the final three applications from the training program.
column4: Na twoim ekranie pojawia się nowy e-mail, przedstawiający trzech ostatnich ochotników z programu szkoleniowego.

column2: We need the best and brightest!
column3: We need the best and brightest!

column2: We could use a spiritual leader.
column3: We could use a spiritual leader.

column2: We need someone who can grab the attention of influencers back on Earth.
column3: We need someone who can grab the attention of influencers back on Earth.
column4: Potrzebujemy kogoś, kto przyciągałby uwagę influencerów na Ziemi.

column2: Why choose, let's get all three of them on board!
column3: Why choose, let's get all three of them on board!
column4: Po co wybierać, niech cała trójka pakuje się do rakiety!
po jednym ochotniku z iskrą geniuszu, świętością i sławą

column2:
Quick troubleshooting reveals that a short-circuit has completely fried the board computer, leaving the Rocket in a damaged state.

You quickly notify the Sponsor of the potentially disastrous consequences of the failed rocket launch. Luckily, they lose no time in green lighting <freesupplypods> free Supply Pods and <funding(extrafunding)> in funding to help the mission through this situation.
column3:
Quick troubleshooting reveals that a short-circuit has completely fried the board computer, leaving the Rocket in a damaged state.

You quickly notify the Sponsor of the potentially disastrous consequences of the failed rocket launch. Luckily, they lose no time in green lighting <freesupplypods> free Supply Pods and <funding(extrafunding)> in funding to help the mission through this situation.

column2: The whole board flares up in red warning signs. Emergency rocket launch abort initiated!
column3: The whole board flares up in red warning signs. Emergency rocket launch abort initiated!
column4: Cały pulpit rozbłyskuje czerwonymi sygnałami alarmowymi. Nastąpiło awaryjne wstrzymanie startu!

column2:
In fact, we learned a lot about our Rockets during the repairs and a full review of the design has found several possible improvements to future designs that can reduce our production costs.

<effect>Rocket cost decreased by <rebate>%.
column3:
In fact, we learned a lot about our Rockets during the repairs and a full review of the design has found several possible improvements to future designs that can reduce our production costs.

<effect>Rocket cost decreased by <rebate>%.

column2: Rocket <DisplayName> has safely landed on Earth. The replacement of all onboard electronics has resolved the issue.
column3: Rocket <DisplayName> has safely landed on Earth. The replacement of all onboard electronics has resolved the issue.
column4: Rakieta <DisplayName> wylądowała bezpiecznie na Ziemi. Wymiana całej elektroniki pokładowej okazała się skutecznym rozwiązaniem.

column2:
The company behind the telescope, Lambda Industries, has partnered with our sponsor to share the financial burden of the deep space launch.

Our sponsor, not one to waste an opportunity to help their most ambitious project, says the splitting of the launch bill will basically pay for a single Supply Pod they can fill with cargo of our choosing.

What do we pick?
column3:
The company behind the telescope, Lambda Industries, has partnered with our sponsor to share the financial burden of the deep space launch.

Our sponsor, not one to waste an opportunity to help their most ambitious project, says the splitting of the launch bill will basically pay for a single Supply Pod they can fill with cargo of our choosing.

What do we pick?

column2: A new deep-space telescope will be launched to scan the cosmos from a point even further out than Mars.
column3: A new deep-space telescope will be launched to scan the cosmos from a point even further out than Mars.
column4: Planowane jest wystrzelenie nowego teleskopu kosmicznego, który będzie badać kosmos z punktu jeszcze bardziej oddalonego od Słońca niż Mars.

column2: We could use some help with sector scanning.
column3: We could use some help with sector scanning.
column4: Przydałoby się trochę pomocy ze skanowaniem sektorów.

column2: Some extra resources would be welcome.
column3: Some extra resources would be welcome.

column2: We can always find a use for an extra Transport.
column3: We can always find a use for an extra Transport.
column4: Zawsze przyda się nam dodatkowa ciężarówka.

column2: Lambda Industries is immensely satisfied with our helping hand in the data analysis and wish to repay us with a reward of our choosing.
column3: Lambda Industries is immensely satisfied with our helping hand in the data analysis and wish to repay us with a reward of our choosing.
column4: Firma Lambda Industries jest niezwykle zadowolona z naszej pomocy przy analizie danych i chce przekazać nam nagrodę, którą wybierzemy.

column2: We could use a helpful hand with our own research projects.
column3: We could use a helpful hand with our own research projects.
column4: Przydałaby się pomocna dłoń w naszych projektach badawczych.

column2: How about a discount on outsourcing projects.
column3: How about a discount on outsourcing projects.
column4: A może zniżka na pomoc zewnętrzną w badaniach.

column2:
What isn’t performing as well is the data analysis. The amount of information the telescope is sending towards Earth is mind boggling and they have issues processing all of it.

Lambda Industries is officially extending a request for help with some of the data analysis.

<goal>Research the Analyze Space Telescope Data tech to continue.
column3:
What isn’t performing as well is the data analysis. The amount of information the telescope is sending towards Earth is mind boggling and they have issues processing all of it.

Lambda Industries is officially extending a request for help with some of the data analysis.

<goal>Research the Analyze Space Telescope Data tech to continue.

column2: Lambda Industries’ deep space telescope is performing as planned.
column3: Lambda Industries’ deep space telescope is performing as planned.
column4: Teleskop kosmiczny Lambda Industries działa zgodnie z planem.

column2:
The rapid increase of cable faults ever since we turned on our first Stirling Generator connected to the grid, hints at some gross miscalculation stewing from the fringiness of it all.

Our scientists have laid down the research needed to be done to fill in the potholes in the original Stirling Generator designs.

Research the Stirling Generator Cable Faults tech to fix the issue. Until then, keep in mind that cable faults won't appear when Stirling Generators are turned off.
column3:
The rapid increase of cable faults ever since we turned on our first Генератар стырлінгу connected to the grid, hints at some gross miscalculation stewing from the fringiness of it all.

Our scientists have laid down the research needed to be done to fill in the potholes in the original Генератар стырлінгу designs.

Research the Генератар стырлінгу Cable Faults tech to fix the issue. Until then, keep in mind that cable faults won't appear when Генератар стырлінгуs are turned off.

column2: Testing fringe technology in a fringe environment is always unpredictable.
column3: Testing fringe technology in a fringe environment is always unpredictable.
column4: Testowanie nowatorskiej technologii w ekstremalnym środowisku zawsze daje nieprzewidywalne skutki.

column2:
After doing extended research on the subject, we not only removed said problems but we actually increased the power efficiency of our Stirling Generators.

<effect>Stirling Generators produce <power_boost>% more power.
column3:
After doing extended research on the subject, we not only removed said problems but we actually increased the power efficiency of our Генератар стырлінгуs.

<effect>Генератар стырлінгуs produce <power_boost>% more power.

column2: Ultimately the issues caused by the Stirling Generator turned out to be connectivity problems.
column3: Ultimately the issues caused by the Генератар стырлінгу turned out to be connectivity problems.
column4: Ostatecznie przyczyną awarii powodowanych przez generatory Stirlinga okazały się problemy z połączeniem.

column2:
The pod cannot be identified, as its hull is too burnt and its black box is missing. We discovered several blueprints of unknown purpose inside.

Your team stares at the strange designs and is trying to make sense of them, you decide to join in. Hmm, clearly the part designated as 01-K64 goes into the power couplings here and – eureka! You know what this is!
column3:
Капуслу немагчыма распазнаць, бо яе корпус занадта абгарэлы, а чорная скрыня адсутнічае. Мы выявілі ўнутры некалькі чарцяжоў невядомага прызначэньня.

Ваша каманда глядзіць на дзіўныя канструкцыі й спрабуе зразумець іх, вы вырашылі далучыцца. Хм, ясна, што дэталь, пазначаная як 01-K64, уключана тут у раз'ёмы харчаваньня й - эўрыка! Вы ведаеце, што гэта такое!

column2: While digging in the dirt, a Drone has stumbled upon a crashed supply pod, almost entirely buried below the red sand.
column3: Капаючыся ў зямлі, дрон натыкнуўся на разбітую капсулу запасаў, амаль цалкам пахаваную пад чырвоным пяском.
column4: Przekopując się przez marsjański grunt, jeden z dronów natknął się na rozbity zasobnik, prawie całkowicie zasypany czerwonym piaskiem.

column2:
As a means to propel their ambitions into the new field, they have made a Drone prototype, similar to the ones we use here on Mars. 

And what better location to showcase the feasibility of their Drones than the surface of another planet? If we accept their offer they will provide us with a free batch of <number_of_drones> drones delivered via a Supply Pod.
column3:
As a means to propel their ambitions into the new field, they have made a Drone prototype, similar to the ones we use here on Mars. 

And what better location to showcase the feasibility of their Drones than the surface of another planet? If we accept their offer they will provide us with a free batch of <number_of_drones> drones delivered via a Supply Pod.

column2: Alpenglow Robotix, a cutting edge tech company specializing in military and medical automation, are pushing to expand their resume with robotics as well.
column3: Alpenglow Robotix, a cutting edge tech company specializing in military and medical automation, are pushing to expand their resume with robotics as well.
column4: Firma Alpenglow Robotix, czołowy przedstawiciel branży automatyki wojskowej i medycznej, pragnie poszerzyć swoją ofertę o produkty z dziedziny robotyki.

column2: Accept -  we could always use more Drones!
column3: Accept -  we could always use more Drones!
column4: Wyraź zgodę – zawsze się nam przyda więcej dronów!

column2: <number_of_drones> new drones will arrive in a Supply Pod
column3: <number_of_drones> new drones will arrive in a Supply Pod

column2: Reject - there are risks associated with introducing foreign tech in the colony.
column3: Reject - there are risks associated with introducing foreign tech in the colony.
column4: Odmów – wprowadzanie obcej technologii do kolonii to zbyt duże ryzyko.

column2: Twice the drones, double the gain!
column3: Twice the drones, double the gain!
column4: Dwa razy więcej dronów to podwójna korzyść!

column2: Two Supply Pods with <number_of_drones> drones each
column3: Two Supply Pods with <number_of_drones> drones each

column2: Division by 0 error! A Drone has critically malfunctioned.
column3: Division by 0 error! A Drone has critically malfunctioned.
column4: Błąd dzielenia przez zero! Jeden z dronów doznał krytycznej awarii.

column2: Let’s hope they got it right this time. They have offered <number_of_drones> more Drones as compensation for our troubles.
column3: Let’s hope they got it right this time. They have offered <number_of_drones> more Drones as compensation for our troubles.
column4: Miejmy nadzieję, że tym razem się postarają. Zaproponowali jeszcze więcej dronów (<number_of_drones>) w ramach rekompensaty.

column2: A patch is ready to be downloaded from Alpenglow Robotix’s servers, carrying with it the promise of fixing the mess they brought upon us with the previous version of their Drones’ software.
column3: A patch is ready to be downloaded from Alpenglow Robotix’s servers, carrying with it the promise of fixing the mess they brought upon us with the previous version of their Drones’ software.
column4: Z serwerów firmy Alpenglow Robotix można pobrać aktualizację, która ma uporządkować bałagan spowodowany przez poprzednią wersję oprogramowania dronów.

column2: Goodbye and thanks for all the drones!
column3: Goodbye and thanks for all the drones!
column4: Do widzenia i dziękujemy za wszystkie drony!

column2: We prefer to get an RC Commander instead.
column3: We prefer to get an RC Commander instead.

column2: Supply pod with an RC Commander
column3: Supply pod with an RC Commander

column2: They should provide some financial compensation as well.
column3: They should provide some financial compensation as well.
column4: Powinni zapewnić jeszcze jakąś rekompensatę finansową.

column2:
We suspect that bad software from Alpenglow Robotix’s Drones has  propagated to all our Drone Controllers.

Alpenglow Robotix had dropped their usual smug attitude and are apologizing profusely. They assure us that they are fast at work to remedy this.
column3:
We suspect that bad software from Alpenglow Robotix’s Drones has  propagated to all our Drone Controllers.

Alpenglow Robotix had dropped their usual smug attitude and are apologizing profusely. They assure us that they are fast at work to remedy this.

column2: Our Drones have begun malfunctioning all around at a pace far from normal.
column3: Our Drones have begun malfunctioning all around at a pace far from normal.
column4: Nasze drony zaczynają ulegać awariom na prawo i lewo, w tempie dalekim od normalnego.

column2: Urge them to resolve the issues ASAP!
column3: Urge them to resolve the issues ASAP!
column4: Niech Alpenglow Robotix natychmiast coś z tym zrobi!

column2: Why wait, I know how to fix this.
column3: Why wait, I know how to fix this.
column4: Po co czekać – wiem, jak to naprawić.

column2: As all major software problems this one seems to have been caused by a typo.
column3: As all major software problems this one seems to have been caused by a typo.
column4: Podobnie jak większość dużych problemów z oprogramowaniem, i ten został spowodowany przez literówkę.

column2:
Sometimes small mistakes lead to big problems. You fix the typo and the division by 0 errors cease. How did this pass through QA at all?

<effect>Drones will no longer critically malfunction.
column3:
Sometimes small mistakes lead to big problems. You fix the typo and the division by 0 errors cease. How did this pass through QA at all?

<effect>Drones will no longer critically malfunction.

column2:
The data seems correct, but our equipment wasn't calibrated to detect the sites. You congratulate your colleague for the discovery and decide on a further course of action.

<effect>You have discovered several new deposits near the colony.
column3:
The data seems correct, but our equipment wasn't calibrated to detect the sites. You congratulate your colleague for the discovery and decide on a further course of action.

<effect>You have discovered several new deposits near the colony.

column2: One of our Scientists has just re-analyzed the scan data and found traces of resource deposits that you didn’t know existed.
column3: One of our Scientists has just re-analyzed the scan data and found traces of resource deposits that you didn’t know existed.
column4: Jeden z naszych naukowców przeanalizował powtórnie dane ze skanu i znalazł ślady złóż, o których nikt nie wiedział.

column2: gain discount on the Deep Scanning tech
column3: gain discount on the Глыбокае сканаваньне tech

column2: reveals Deep Water Extraction and Deep Metal Extraction tech
column3: Выяўляе тэналогіі Глыбакаводная здабыча ды Здабыча глыбокіх мэталаў
column4: ujawnia technologie „Eksploatacja głębinowa wody” i „Eksploatacja głębinowa metali”

column2: additional resources in all of the new deposits
column3: additional resources in all of the new deposits
column4: dodatkowe zasoby we wszystkich nowych złożach

column2:
It informs you that your old friend and teacher, Professor Richtmann, has just passed away. You often accompanied him on his trips and expeditions and discussed many aspects of science and philosophy together.

The strongbox contains his legacy, protected by a three-letter password and a short message in his handwriting: “You’ll know.”
column3:
It informs you that your old friend and teacher, Professor Richtmann, has just passed away. You often accompanied him on his trips and expeditions and discussed many aspects of science and philosophy together.

The strongbox contains his legacy, protected by a three-letter password and a short message in his handwriting: “You’ll know.”

column2: You have received a strange package with a letter attached. As you read the letter, your eyes fill with tears.
column3: You have received a strange package with a letter attached. As you read the letter, your eyes fill with tears.
column4: Otrzymujesz dziwną paczkę z dołączonym listem. Gdy go czytasz, wilgotnieją ci oczy.

column2:
“Transgenetics of Yeasts” was the last thing that kept the Professor awake late at night. He was working on the project in a complete secrecy and you doubt that anyone else than you and some others knew about it. And there it is, the complete theory ready to be applied in practice, in front of you, alongside his precious mascot – a cute little teddy bear.

<effect>The Breakthrough tech Superfungus has been revealed.

column2:
Two anomalous readings have been detected at the same time – one near your landing spot and one far away, in a different part of the Red Planet. One of your Scientists is looking at the data and asks you:

"What do you think we’re seeing here, Commander?"

You look at the analysis and immediately know the answer.

column2:
The folder implies that one of our mission imperatives is to setup the infrastructure and industry required to construct, operate and confirm the usefulness of an experimental device of epic proportions and wondrous effects. Constructing such a project on Earth is undesired, either because it poses too much danger, or because it cannot be hidden from prying eyes.

You read the title of the project again. Interesting...

column3: After the touchdown and the initial busy hours, you allow yourself a couple of hours to read the top-secret Big Red Folder which has been lying in your safe for a long time.

column2:
“Commander, we have an offer for you. Recently our organization has run into severe problems with one of our more delicate projects. We want you to take care of it.”

All in all, the mysterious man wants you to shelter a number of Clone applicants in your project, no questions asked, no answers given.
column3:
“Commander, we have an offer for you. Recently our organization has run into severe problems with one of our more delicate projects. We want you to take care of it.”

All in all, the mysterious man wants you to shelter a number of Clone applicants in your project, no questions asked, no answers given.

column2: The message screen is dark and only a vague silhouette of a bald man can be seen. The man speaks with a modulated voice.
column3: The message screen is dark and only a vague silhouette of a bald man can be seen. The man speaks with a modulated voice.
column4: Okno wiadomości pozostaje ciemne, widać tylko niewyraźną sylwetkę jakiegoś łysego mężczyzny, który odzywa się komputerowo zniekształconym głosem.
otrzymujesz <funding(money_reward)> i pewną liczbę sklonowanych strażników (<clone_applicants>)

column2: Accept and have a look at the medical data.
column3: Accept and have a look at the medical data.
column4: Wyraź zgodę i zerknij na dane medyczne.

column2:
If it was a bomb it would have exploded by now, so you decide to risk it. You open the package and find a couple of notes. The first one is a check for quite the sum. The other one is a letter.

"Commander, we're grateful for your aid in the past. But we cannot live peacefully. We were designed to fight, to conquer. And we will. Some day we could be enemies, but for now, while we're friends, accept our final gift. And from now on we're even."

<effect>All Officer Clones become Renegades. You have received <funding(final_gift)> Funding.
column3:
If it was a bomb it would have exploded by now, so you decide to risk it. You open the package and find a couple of notes. The first one is a check for quite the sum. The other one is a letter.

"Commander, we're grateful for your aid in the past. But we cannot live peacefully. We were designed to fight, to conquer. And we will. Some day we could be enemies, but for now, while we're friends, accept our final gift. And from now on we're even."

<effect>All Officer Clones become Renegades. You have received <funding(final_gift)> Funding.

column2: The imposing Clone intercepts you in the dark alley. He throws you a package and vanishes.
column3: The imposing Clone intercepts you in the dark alley. He throws you a package and vanishes.
column4: W ciemnym zaułku na twojej drodze staje jakiś klon imponującego wzrostu. Rzuca ci paczkę i znika.

column2: They want to outsource the R&D of their newest project “Prefab Compression” - a technology that could potentially allow us to transport prefabs of monumental buildings from Earth. They have a list of specific requirements which makes us the best candidate for this – our colony is remote, far from prying eyes, almost depopulated in case of nanite contamination and you would hardly break an agreement of confidentiality.
column3: They want to outsource the R&D of their newest project “Prefab Compression” - a technology that could potentially allow us to transport prefabs of monumental buildings from Earth. They have a list of specific requirements which makes us the best candidate for this – our colony is remote, far from prying eyes, almost depopulated in case of nanite contamination and you would hardly break an agreement of confidentiality.
column4: Firma chce zlecić ci prace badawczo-rozwojowe nad swoim najnowszym projektem, „Kompresją prefabrykatów” – technologią, która mogłaby umożliwić nam sprowadzanie prefabrykatów ogromnych budowli z Ziemi. Ma listę konkretnych wymagań, która wskazuje, że jesteśmy najlepszym kandydatem – nasza kolonia jest odległa, z dala od wścibskich oczu, prawie bezludna, co jest korzystne w razie skażenia nanitami, i trudno byłoby nam naruszyć wymóg poufności.

column2: One of the leading companies in the field of nanotechnology and miniaturization has made you an interesting offer.
column3: One of the leading companies in the field of nanotechnology and miniaturization has made you an interesting offer.
column4: Jedna z czołowych firm w branży nanotechnologii i miniaturyzacji złożyła ci interesującą propozycję.

column2: research the Prefab Compression Breakthrough tech

column2:

The top brass of our sponsor have just made the decision to sell the scientific data to third parties by setting up remote transmission facilities on Mars.
