The endless stream of scientific data flowing in from the Red Planet is too much to be handled even by the largest scientific organization alone. The top brass of our sponsor have just made the decision to sell the scientific data to third parties by setting up remote transmission facilities on Mars.

<effect>You have discovered the new Special Project: “Contract Exploration Access”. It can be completed multiple times to gain Funding.

column2: Earth HQ has just approved a new project to expand our Martian operations.
column3: Earth HQ has just approved a new project to expand our Martian operations.
column4: Ziemskie dowództwo misji zatwierdziło nowy projekt dotyczący rozszerzenia naszych działań na Marsie.

column2: While looking for the glitch, your data technicians discovered the possibility to boost the performance of the program by running secondary analytical trials, just this once.
column3: Пакуль шукаем глюк, вашыя спэцыялісты па апрацоўцы дадзеных выявілі магчымасьць палепшыць прадукцыйнасьць праграмы шляхам правядзеньня другасных аналітычных выпрабаваньняў толькі гэты раз.
column4: Poszukując źródła usterki twoi technicy odkryli możliwość zwiększenia wydajności programu przez uruchomienie dodatkowych procedur analitycznych – tylko raz.

column2: Our scientific analysis servers just crashed! We tried turning them off and on again, but the problem persisted after reboot.
column3: Нашы сэрвэры навуковага аналізу проста пайшлі з ладу! Мы паспрабавалі выключыць іх і зноў уключыць, але праблема ня зьнікла.
column4: Nasze serwery do analizy danych właśnie padły! Próbowaliśmy je wyłączyć i włączyć na nowo, ale problem utrzymuje się po restarcie.

column2: a random tech will be researched
reveals several techs in a random field
column3: адкрывае некалькі тэхнолёгій у выпадковых галінах
column4: ujawnia kilka technologii w losowo wybranej dziedzinie

column2: One of our buildings has stopped working - a <DisplayName>. It looks like the fine dust from the storm has filled away a key component of the power supply. The repair task is too complex for a drone.
column3: One of our buildings has stopped working - a <DisplayName>. It looks like the fine dust from the storm has filled away a key component of the power supply. The repair task is too complex for a drone.
column4: Jeden z naszych budynków – <DisplayName> – przestał działać. Wygląda na to, że drobne cząstki pyłu niesione przez burzę zapchały jakiś istotny element systemu zasilania. Naprawa jest zbyt skomplikowanym zadaniem dla drona.

column2: I don’t like dust. It’s coarse and rough and irritating… and it gets everywhere.
column3: I don’t like dust. It’s coarse and rough and irritating… and it gets everywhere.
column4: Nie lubię pyłu. Jest szorstki i drażniący. Wszędzie się wciska.

column2: A colonist braved the storm and managed to fix the broken component. Our <DisplayName> is now operational.
column3: A colonist braved the storm and managed to fix the broken component. Our <DisplayName> is now operational.
column4: Nasz kolonista przedarł się przez burzę i zdołał naprawić zepsutą część. <DisplayName> znowu działa.

column2: A colonist braved the storm and managed to fix the broken component. Our <DisplayName> is now operational. Regrettably, during the repairs the colonist's space suit was compromised and they didn't make it back.
column3: A colonist braved the storm and managed to fix the broken component. Our <DisplayName> is now operational. Regrettably, during the repairs the colonist's space suit was compromised and they didn't make it back.
column4: Nasz kolonista przedarł się przez burzę i zdołał naprawić zepsutą część. <DisplayName> znowu działa. Niestety w trakcie napraw kolonista uszkodził swój skafander i nie zdołał powrócić.

column2: We’ll fix it after the storm.
column3: We’ll fix it after the storm.

column2: Have the Drones replace the entire component.
column3: Have the Drones replace the entire component.

column2: Step aside, I know regular expressions!
column3: Step aside, I know regular expressions!

column2: use your expertise to fix <DisplayName> remotely
column3: use your expertise to fix <DisplayName> remotely
column4: wykorzystaj swoje doświadczenie, by naprawić budynek (<DisplayName>) zdalnie.

column2: The car is very well preserved, it seems it survived the crash of the cargo pod quite well. It was supposed to be in Earth’s orbit, and we don’t know how it got here, but it’s a valuable historical discovery nonetheless.
column3: The car is very well preserved, it seems it survived the crash of the cargo pod quite well. It was supposed to be in Earth’s orbit, and we don’t know how it got here, but it’s a valuable historical discovery nonetheless.
column4: Samochód jest doskonale zachowany. Przetrwał bez szwanku rozbicie się zasobnika na powierzchni Marsa. Powinien się znajdować na orbicie okołoziemskiej – nie wiemy, jak tu dotarł, ale i tak jest cenną historyczną pamiątką.

column2: The expedition team found... a car. It’s an amazing – and amusing – discovery!
column3: The expedition team found... a car. It’s an amazing – and amusing – discovery!
column4: Ekspedycja znalazła... samochód. To niesamowite, a zarazem samobieżne odkrycie!

column2: We've received orders to not open the trunk.
column3: We've received orders to not open the trunk.
column4: Otrzymaliśmy polecenie, by nie otwierać bagażnika.

column2: It’s no surprise that our Martian children behave differently, given the fact that they are raised and educated so differently than the children on Earth.
column3: It’s no surprise that our Martian children behave differently, given the fact that they are raised and educated so differently than the children on Earth.
column4: Nic dziwnego, że nasze marsjańskie dzieci zachowują się inaczej – przecież zostały wychowane i wykształcone w zupełnie inny sposób niż dzieci na Ziemi.

column2: Our children have become quite strange lately. Organizing in small, eccentric groups, they shun outsiders and immerse in their own distinctive sub-cultures of gestures, expressions and language.
column3: Our children have become quite strange lately. Organizing in small, eccentric groups, they shun outsiders and immerse in their own distinctive sub-cultures of gestures, expressions and language.
column4: Nasze dzieci stały się ostatnio dość dziwne. Organizują się w małe ekscentryczne grupki, unikają obcych i zanurzają się w odrębnej subkulturze własnych gestów, min i języka.

column2: Quite alarming. We must put an end to this, whether they like it or not!
column3: Quite alarming. We must put an end to this, whether they like it or not!
column4: To dość niepokojące. Musimy położyć temu kres, czy to się im spodoba, czy nie!

column2: The children aren’t exactly happy that their fun little games has been ended by the stern adults.
column3: The children aren’t exactly happy that their fun little games has been ended by the stern adults.
column4: Dzieci nie są szczególnie zadowolone z tego, że ponurzy wapniacy zmusili ich do zaprzestania tych niewinnych zabaw.

column2:
Without a center point, their eccentricity spins off intro various directions. Many Colonists see this as a bad move, and protest against it, while others approve of your actions.

<effect><conservatives> Colonists gain <morale_change> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, while <liberals> Colonists lose <morale_change> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
column3:
Without a center point, their eccentricity spins off intro various directions. Many Colonists see this as a bad move, and protest against it, while others approve of your actions.

<effect><conservatives> Colonists gain <morale_change> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, while <liberals> Colonists lose <morale_change> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.

column2: Intriguing! Let’s just sit back and watch the development.
column3: Intriguing! Let’s just sit back and watch the development.
column4: To intrygujące! Trzeba spokojnie obserwować przebieg wydarzeń.

column2: let the children do as they please
column3: let the children do as they please

column2: A great subject for research! But let the children do as they will.
column3: A great subject for research! But let the children do as they will.
column4: To wspaniały temat do badań! Pozwólmy dzieciom postępować tak, jak sobie życzą.

column2: unlock new tech, let the children do as they please
column3: unlock new tech, let the children do as they please
column4: odblokowano nową technologię, niech dzieci robią, co chcą.

column2: Encourage the diversification of the different groups.
column3: Encourage the diversification of the different groups.
column4: Zachęć do różnicowania się poszczególnych grup.

column2:
The newly-fledged youths show remarkable new qualities, inspiring even the older Martianborn to follow into their steps and reshaping the Martian culture. The children found comfort in their unique micro-societies, helping each other and tending to the emotional and intellectual needs and challenges of their peers. We could all learn from their behavior.

<effect>Martianborn will periodically gain <comfort_gain> Comfort.
column3:
The newly-fledged youths show remarkable new qualities, inspiring even the older Martianborn to follow into their steps and reshaping the Martian culture. The children found comfort in their unique micro-societies, helping each other and tending to the emotional and intellectual needs and challenges of their peers. We could all learn from their behavior.

<effect>Martianborn will periodically gain <comfort_gain> Comfort.

column2: The Martianborn children we observed have already stepped through into the difficult and exciting period of young adulthood, making their first uneasy steps among the Martian society.
column3: The Martianborn children we observed have already stepped through into the difficult and exciting period of young adulthood, making their first uneasy steps among the Martian society.
column4: Obserwowane przez nas dzieci urodzone na Marsie mają już za sobą trudny i ekscytujący pierwszy okres dorosłości, i stawiają pierwsze, niełatwe kroki w marsjańskim społeczeństwie.

column2:
The newly-fledged youths show remarkable new qualities, inspiring even the older Martianborn to follow into their steps and reshaping the Martian culture. You encouraged the children to pursue their imagination, the resulting new culture on Mars producing daring, artistic and creative people.

<effect>Martianborn will periodically gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_up_sols)> Sols.
column3:
The newly-fledged youths show remarkable new qualities, inspiring even the older Martianborn to follow into their steps and reshaping the Martian culture. You encouraged the children to pursue their imagination, the resulting new culture on Mars producing daring, artistic and creative people.

<effect>Martianborn will periodically gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_up_sols)> Sols.

column2: The Martianborn children we observed have already stepped through into the difficult and exciting period of young adulthood, making their first uneasy steps among the Martian society.
column3: The Martianborn children we observed have already stepped through into the difficult and exciting period of young adulthood, making their first uneasy steps among the Martian society.
column4: Obserwowane przez nas dzieci urodzone na Marsie mają już za sobą trudny i ekscytujący pierwszy okres dorosłości, i stawiają pierwsze, niełatwe kroki w marsjańskim społeczeństwie.

column2:
The signal has been traced to come from hundreds of light years away and while the civilization that transmitted it may no longer exist, there is little question to the validity of the signal itself.

We may send a signal of our own in their direction. It will travel for hundreds of years more but it will eventually reach whoever, if anyone, is still around there to listen to it. Using universal mathematical laws as means to communicate, we can only hope that who receives it will understand.

Writing the right opening sentence is said to be an art by itself. How will our message begin?
column3:
The signal has been traced to come from hundreds of light years away and while the civilization that transmitted it may no longer exist, there is little question to the validity of the signal itself.

We may send a signal of our own in their direction. It will travel for hundreds of years more but it will eventually reach whoever, if anyone, is still around there to listen to it. Using universal mathematical laws as means to communicate, we can only hope that who receives it will understand.

Writing the right opening sentence is said to be an art by itself. How will our message begin?

column2: A Long Time Ago, in a Galaxy Far Far Away...
column3: A Long Time Ago, in a Galaxy Far Far Away...
column4: Dawno, dawno temu, w odległej galaktyce...

column2: What news, Commander! Definitive evidence of intelligent beings is found within a signal caught by our Omega Telescope.
column3: What news, Commander! Definitive evidence of intelligent beings is found within a signal caught by our Амега тэлескоп.
column4: Co za wieści, dowódco! W sygnale zarejestrowanym przez nasz teleskop Omega wykryliśmy jednoznaczny dowód istnienia istot inteligentnych!

column2: No response is needed. We don’t know the nature of the listener on the other side and may doom the future of the human race.
column3: No response is needed. We don’t know the nature of the listener on the other side and may doom the future of the human race.
column4: Nie będziemy wysyłać odpowiedzi. Nie znamy natury istot, które wysłały odebrany przez nas sygnał. Być może ujawnienie się im będzie oznaczać zagładę ludzkości.

column2: morale boost for significant number of Colonists
column3: morale boost for significant number of Colonists
column4: premia do morale dla znacznej liczby kolonistów.

column2: inspire the colony to discover a new Breakthrough
column3: inspire the colony to discover a new Breakthrough
column4: zainspiruje kolonię do odkrycia nowej technologii przełomowej.

column2: "One day, we will meet in peace."
column3: "One day, we will meet in peace."

column2: "It is our hope to prosper in cooperation."
column3: "It is our hope to prosper in cooperation."
column4: „Mamy nadzieję, że będziemy współpracować dla obopólnej korzyści”.

column2:
Although there is little reason to believe there will be any dramatic benefit for the colony, the cure for cancer is a holy grail for the human civilization as a whole.

There is not a person on any world that is neutral to the cause.
column3:
Although there is little reason to believe there will be any dramatic benefit for the colony, the cure for cancer is a holy grail for the human civilization as a whole.

There is not a person on any world that is neutral to the cause.

column2: In pursuit of the technologies that allow us to exist on Mars, our advanced science practices have earned us an invitation to take part in a currently ongoing prestigious and noble science project dedicated to finding the cure for cancer.
column3: In pursuit of the technologies that allow us to exist on Mars, our advanced science practices have earned us an invitation to take part in a currently ongoing prestigious and noble science project dedicated to finding the cure for cancer.
column4: Dzięki naszej zaawansowanej działalności naukowej ukierunkowanej na poszukiwanie technologii, które umożliwią przetrwanie na Marsie, otrzymaliśmy zaproszenie do uczestnictwa w prestiżowym i szlachetnym projekcie naukowym poświęconym wynalezieniu lekarstwa na raka.

column2: If we have a shot at bringing this dragon down, then, by all means!
column3: If we have a shot at bringing this dragon down, then, by all means!
column4: Jeśli mamy okazję zniszczenia tego potwora, to do dzieła!

column2: I have already mapped the best way to approach the problem.
column3: I have already mapped the best way to approach the problem.
column4: Już opracowaliśmy optymalną strategię rozwiązania tego problemu.

column2: enables a new tech, increased success chance
column3: enables a new tech, increased success chance
column4: udostępnia nową technologię ze zwiększoną szansą powodzenia.

column2: We just can’t spare the research time.
column3: We just can’t spare the research time.
column4: Nie stać nas na poświęcenie czasu na te badania.

column2:
A battle in the war against cancer has been won! Humanity hasn't discovered the cure for the horrific disease yet, but we managed to make progress. Our colonists are proud that we were a part of this initiative.  

<effect>+<morale_boost> Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols
column3:
A battle in the war against cancer has been won! Humanity hasn't discovered the cure for the horrific disease yet, but we managed to make progress. Our colonists are proud that we were a part of this initiative.  

<effect>+<morale_boost> Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols

column2: Everyone on Mars is standing tall today, filled with great pride.
column3: Everyone on Mars is standing tall today, filled with great pride.
column4: Wszystkich ludzi na Marsie przepełnia dziś wielka duma.

column2:
A promising breakthrough has been made in the fight against cancer – in large part based on research done here, in our own Martian labs. While not entirely ridding us of cancer, the new drug will dramatically reduce the lethality of the horrific disease.

<DisplayName> has been nominated for a Nobel Prize in medical research, followed by a flood of donations and new applicants wanting to become part of our colony.

<effect>+<morale_boost> Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols; <applicants> Applicants; <funding(funding_reward)> Funding.
column3:
A promising breakthrough has been made in the fight against cancer – in large part based on research done here, in our own Martian labs. While not entirely ridding us of cancer, the new drug will dramatically reduce the lethality of the horrific disease.

<DisplayName> has been nominated for a Nobel Prize in medical research, followed by a flood of donations and new applicants wanting to become part of our colony.

<effect>+<morale_boost> Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols; <applicants> Applicants; <funding(funding_reward)> Funding.

column2: Everyone on Mars is standing tall today, filled with pride beyond expression.
column3: Everyone on Mars is standing tall today, filled with pride beyond expression.
column4: Wszystkich ludzi na Marsie przepełnia dziś niewyobrażalna duma.

column2:
<DisplayName> was ordered to repair a freight elevator. This Colonist's original approach to the problem included standing at the bottom of the elevator shaft and dislodging its steel cable without securing the counterweight on the other side.

The Martian gravity may be 38% of that of Earth, but 4 tons are still quite a lot.

<effect>A Metals Extractor has malfunctioned. An Idiot Colonist has died.
column3:
<DisplayName> was ordered to repair a freight elevator. This Colonist's original approach to the problem included standing at the bottom of the elevator shaft and dislodging its steel cable without securing the counterweight on the other side.

The Martian gravity may be 38% of that of Earth, but 4 tons are still quite a lot.

<effect>A Metals Extractor has malfunctioned. An Idiot Colonist has died.

column2: There was a bizarre accident in one of our Metals Extractors.
column3: There was a bizarre accident in one of our Metals Extractors.
column4: Doszło do nietypowego wypadku w jednym z naszych ekstraktorów metali.

column2: This is a tragic event. We should mourn this loss.
column3: This is a tragic event. We should mourn this loss.
column4: To tragedia. Będziemy opłakiwać tę stratę.

column2: If you can't be a good example, you'll just serve as a horrible warning.
column3: If you can't be a good example, you'll just serve as a horrible warning.
column4: Jeśli nie możesz być dobrym przykładem, możesz przynajmniej zostać straszliwą przestrogą.

column2: some Colonists lose Morale for 3 Sols
column3: some Colonists lose Morale for 3 Sols
column4: niektórzy koloniści tracą morale na 3 sole.

column2: We need to invest in building an idiot-proof environment.
column3: We need to invest in building an idiot-proof environment.
column4: Musimy zainwestować w idiotoodporne środowisko pracy.

column2: Idiot Colonists gain very high Morale
column3: Idiot Colonists gain very high Morale
column4: koloniści z cechą „głupota” uzyskują bardzo wysokie morale.

column2: Start a donations campaign in order to improve job safety.
column3: Start a donations campaign in order to improve job safety.
column4: Rozpocznij kampanię crowdfundingową mającą na celu poprawę bezpieczeństwa pracy.

column2:
A major flaw in our Wind Turbine design is now apparent. Their working is hampered by the gradual accumulation of fine Martian dust that is an inevitability on Mars. As a result all Wind Turbines are producing less power than we expected.

Mission control has suspended the further construction of Wind Turbines until we manage to come up with a lighter design and a better mechanism.

<goal>Research the “Wind Turbine Redesign” tech to solve the problem.
column3:
A major flaw in our Wind Turbine design is now apparent. Their working is hampered by the gradual accumulation of fine Martian dust that is an inevitability on Mars. As a result all Wind Turbines are producing less power than we expected.

Mission control has suspended the further construction of Wind Turbines until we manage to come up with a lighter design and a better mechanism.

<goal>Research the “Wind Turbine Redesign” tech to solve the problem.

column2: The wind turbine’s propeller barely rotates under the Martian wind. We have a problem.
column3: The wind turbine’s propeller barely rotates under the Martian wind. We have a problem.
column4: Śmigło jednej z turbin wiatrowych ledwo się obraca na marsjańskim wietrze. Mamy problem.

column2: Try to fix all existing Wind Turbines.
column3: Try to fix all existing Wind Turbines.
column4: Spróbujcie naprawić wszystkie istniejące turbiny wiatrowe.

column2: <machineparts(repair_cost)> emergency maintenance for turbines but they will return to full power production
column3: <machineparts(repair_cost)> emergency maintenance for turbines but they will return to full power production
column4: <machineparts(repair_cost)> na awaryjną konserwację turbin, które odzyskają pełną wydajność produkcji.

column2: Convince Mission control to provide an alternative power source.
column3: Convince Mission control to provide an alternative power source.
column4: Przekonaj dowództwo, by zapewniło kolonii alternatywne źródło energii.

column2: Some design problems are to be expected when dealing with a new planet.
column3: Some design problems are to be expected when dealing with a new planet.
column4: Gdy ma się do czynienia z nową planetą, trudno uniknąć błędów konstrukcyjnych.

column2:
The schematics for our Wind Turbines have been updated. The new design is so good that we expect to boost their production by <power_production_boost>%.

<effect>Construction ban of Wind Turbines has been lifted.
column3:
The schematics for our Wind Turbines have been updated. The new design is so good that we expect to boost their production by <power_production_boost>%.

<effect>Construction ban of Wind Turbines has been lifted.

column2: A brief, tired cheer emanates from the science team indicating they have finally found a solution.
column3: A brief, tired cheer emanates from the science team indicating they have finally found a solution.
column4: Zespół naukowy wydaje z siebie zmęczony, ale radosny zwycięski okrzyk, co wskazuje, że udało się w końcu znaleźć jakieś rozwiązanie.

column2:
A power surge has caused a massive failure in the heating system of dome <DisplayName>. Using backup heaters we can keep everybody warm enough but the dome’s power consumption has been increased by <power_increase_prc>%.

The Cold Wave will persist for several sols. If the power supply fails many colonists may freeze to death.
column3:
A power surge has caused a massive failure in the heating system of dome <DisplayName>. Using backup heaters we can keep everybody warm enough but the dome’s power consumption has been increased by <power_increase_prc>%.

The Cold Wave will persist for several sols. If the power supply fails many colonists may freeze to death.

column2: A blanket-clad colonist hands you a report, shivering from the cold. It is as you feared - all of the dome heaters have failed.
column3: A blanket-clad colonist hands you a report, shivering from the cold. It is as you feared - all of the dome heaters have failed.
column4: Otulony kocem i drżący z zimna kolonista podaje ci raport. Twoje obawy potwierdziły się – żaden z grzejników w kopule nie działa.

column2: Costs <machineparts(repair_cost)> but the Dome won’t consume extra power
column3: Costs <machineparts(repair_cost)> but the Dome won’t consume extra power
column4: będzie to kosztować <machineparts(repair_cost)>, ale kopuła przestanie zużywać dodatkową energię.

column2: We have trained for such situations. We will persevere!
column3: We have trained for such situations. We will persevere!
column4: Zostaliśmy przygotowani na takie sytuacje. Przetrwamy!

column2:
You finish the report on Dome <DisplayName> and the issue with the heaters assuring our sponsor that the problem has been fully resolved. It seems that the accident has energized the colonists.

<effect>Morale +<morale_bonus> for <sols(morale_bonus_sols)> Sols.
column3:
You finish the report on Dome <DisplayName> and the issue with the heaters assuring our sponsor that the problem has been fully resolved. It seems that the accident has energized the colonists.

<effect>Morale +<morale_bonus> for <sols(morale_bonus_sols)> Sols.

column2: As the frost outside melts, you can see that colonists are returning to their normal routines. The atmosphere is even a bit cheerful.
column3: As the frost outside melts, you can see that colonists are returning to their normal routines. The atmosphere is even a bit cheerful.
column4: Szron na kopule topnieje i widzisz, że koloniści wracają do normalnej pracy. Nastrój jest nawet trochę weselszy.
Kolejny dzień i kolejna katastrofa za nami!

column2: Tell colonists to take it easy for the next few days and to drink a lot of fluids.
column3: Tell colonists to take it easy for the next few days and to drink a lot of fluids.
column4: Powiedzcie kolonistom, żeby odpoczęli trochę przez kilka następnych dni i pili dużo płynów.

column2:
The issue with the heaters of Dome <DisplayName> has taken its toll on our colony. Those who survived must aim to do better when future challenges arise.

<effect>Several colonists have gained the Survivor trait.
column3:
The issue with the heaters of Dome <DisplayName> has taken its toll on our colony. Those who survived must aim to do better when future challenges arise.

<effect>Several colonists have gained the Survivor trait.

column2: As the frost outside melts, you hastily assemble your report listing the colonists that perished from the cold.
column3: As the frost outside melts, you hastily assemble your report listing the colonists that perished from the cold.
column4: Szron na kopule topnieje, a ty pospiesznie przygotowujesz listę kolonistów, którzy zmarli z powodu zimna.

column2: It’s always tough to lose friends and colleagues.
column3: It’s always tough to lose friends and colleagues.
column4: Zawsze ciężko się pogodzić ze stratą przyjaciół i krewnych.

column2: We all knew the risks when we decided to come to Mars. It is a harsh environment, but we will tame it.
column3: We all knew the risks when we decided to come to Mars. It is a harsh environment, but we will tame it.
column4: Wszyscy wiemy, że przybycie na Marsa oznaczało podjęcie ryzyka. To surowe miejsce, ale my je okiełznamy.

column2:
The dust storm has caused a giant crack in the glass of dome <DisplayName>. New leaks spring up constantly and our drones will struggle to fix all of them.

To fix the initial crack we’ll have to send colonists outside. However, this may be dangerous and it may be wise to first wait out the storm.
column3:
The dust storm has caused a giant crack in the glass of dome <DisplayName>. New leaks spring up constantly and our drones will struggle to fix all of them.

To fix the initial crack we’ll have to send colonists outside. However, this may be dangerous and it may be wise to first wait out the storm.

column2: Nervous colonists watch as a crack in the Dome slowly leaks out precious air into the Dust Storm outside.
column3: Nervous colonists watch as a crack in the Dome slowly leaks out precious air into the Dust Storm outside.
column4: Koloniści z niepokojem obserwują, jak przez pęknięcie w kopule cenne powietrze wycieka prosto w burzę pyłową.

column2: I need volunteers to go outside!
column3: I need volunteers to go outside!
column4: Potrzebuję ochotników, którzy wyjdą na zewnątrz!

column2: Colonists may perish but the leaks will be contained
column3: Colonists may perish but the leaks will be contained
column4: koloniści mogą zginąć, ale przeciek zostanie opanowany.

column2: Several brave souls risked their lives and went out into the dust storm. Using a special sealant they managed to stop the crack from spreading.
column3: Several brave souls risked their lives and went out into the dust storm. Using a special sealant they managed to stop the crack from spreading.
column4: Kilku dzielnych ludzi zaryzykowało życiem i wyszło na zewnątrz, w burzę pyłową. Za pomocą specjalnego szczeliwa zamknęli pęknięcie.

column2:
We are sad to report that we lost <killed_colonists> Colonists during the repairs. Let their sacrifice be an inspiration for us all.

<effect>New fractures will cease to occur in Dome “<DisplayName>”. Existing fractures will be fixed automatically by drones.
column3:
We are sad to report that we lost <killed_colonists> Colonists during the repairs. Let their sacrifice be an inspiration for us all.

<effect>New fractures will cease to occur in Dome “<DisplayName>”. Existing fractures will be fixed automatically by drones.

column2: We have to weather the storm for now.
column3: We have to weather the storm for now.

column2: Try to reduce the pressure differential.
column3: Try to reduce the pressure differential.

column2: delay repairs, leaks will happen less often
column3: delay repairs, leaks will happen less often
column4: opóźnienie napraw, przecieki będą występować rzadziej.

column2: Fellow Colonists, we have all trained for this. We will weather this storm.
column3: Fellow Colonists, we have all trained for this. We will weather this storm.
column4: Towarzysze koloniści, zostaliśmy przygotowani na takie sytuacje. Przetrwamy tę burzę.
opóźnienie napraw, koloniści uzyskują zdrowie psychiczne.

column2:
It is now safe to send a repair team to seal the crack in the dome and stop any further leaks. Do you have any special instructions?

<effect>New fractures will cease to occur due to the major crack in the dome. Existing fractures will be fixed by drones automatically.
column3:
It is now safe to send a repair team to seal the crack in the dome and stop any further leaks. Do you have any special instructions?

<effect>New fractures will cease to occur due to the major crack in the dome. Existing fractures will be fixed by drones automatically.

column2: The Dust Storm has settled but the damage to the Dome remains a constant threat to the Colonists.
column3: The Dust Storm has settled but the damage to the Dome remains a constant threat to the Colonists.
column4: Burza pyłowa uspokoiła się, ale uszkodzenia kopuły pozostają nieustannym zagrożeniem dla życia kolonistów.

column2: Double check everything and make sure all safety protocols are followed.
column3: Double check everything and make sure all safety protocols are followed.
column4: Sprawdźcie wszystko dwukrotnie i trzymajcie się ściśle zasad BHP.

column2: We need to fix the issue asap. Tell them to hurry up!
column3: We need to fix the issue asap. Tell them to hurry up!
column4: Musimy jak najszybciej naprawić uszkodzenie. Niech się pospieszą!

column2: repairs will take <reapair_time_fast> hours, additional damage may be caused
column3: repairs will take <reapair_time_fast> hours, additional damage may be caused
column4: naprawy potrwają <reapair_time_fast> h, może dojść do innych uszkodzeń.

column2: You observe as the repair team works on top of the Dome above your head. Suddenly a Colonist slips and tumbles down… Fortunately the safety rope stops his fall.
column3: You observe as the repair team works on top of the Dome above your head. Suddenly a Colonist slips and tumbles down… Fortunately the safety rope stops his fall.
column4: Patrzysz, jak zespół techniczny pracuje na szczycie kopuły wysoko nad twoją głową. Nagle jeden z kolonistów potyka się i turla w dół… Na szczęście lina zabezpieczająca zatrzymuje jego upadek.

column2:
Rushing to get the job done and seal the crack in the dome has resulted in several accidents and missteps.

<effect>The dome will need <electronics(penalty)> emergency maintenance
column3:
Rushing to get the job done and seal the crack in the dome has resulted in several accidents and missteps.

<effect>The dome will need <electronics(penalty)> emergency maintenance

column2:
The fault for the crack was in the design of our airlocks but the issue has been dealt with and repair teams are implementing the solution to all other domes.

One of our crafty colonists has found how to significantly improve the way we repair Dome leaks.

<effect>Repair cost of Dome leaks reduced by <cost_reduction>% permanently
column3:
The fault for the crack was in the design of our airlocks but the issue has been dealt with and repair teams are implementing the solution to all other domes.

One of our crafty colonists has found how to significantly improve the way we repair Dome leaks.

<effect>Repair cost of Dome leaks reduced by <cost_reduction>% permanently

column2: You smile as you read the latest report about the Dome damaged by the Dust Storm. Finally, something positive from this whole ordeal.
column3: You smile as you read the latest report about the Dome damaged by the Dust Storm. Finally, something positive from this whole ordeal.
column4: Lektura najnowszego raportu o kopule uszkodzonej przez burzę pyłową wywołuje twój uśmiech. Zatem wszystkie trudności przyniosły też korzystne skutki.

column2:
Project Morpheus is shaping to be too successful in what it does and many Colonists are losing interest in their non-virtual lives. 

This directly correlates with the decreasing levels of productivity among heavy users of Project Morpheus.  

<effect>Several colonists have received the Lazy trait
column3:
Праэкт Марфей is shaping to be too successful in what it does and many Colonists are losing interest in their non-virtual lives. 

This directly correlates with the decreasing levels of productivity among heavy users of Праэкт Марфей.  

<effect>Several colonists have received the Lazy trait

column2: Medical reports are beginning to reveal a worrisome trend among our Colonists.
column3: Medical reports are beginning to reveal a worrisome trend among our Colonists.
column4: Raporty medyczne zaczynają ukazywać niepokojący trend wśród kolonistów.

column2: This is disturbing, we have to stop Project Morpheus and reevaluate.
column3: This is disturbing, we have to stop Праэкт Марфей and reevaluate.
column4: To niedobrze, musimy wstrzymać działanie Projektu Morfeusz i przeanalizować sytuację.

column2: Project Morpheus is turned off for <sols(duration)> Sols, no more colonists will become Lazy
column3: Праэкт Марфей is turned off for <sols(duration)> Sols, no more colonists will become Lazy
column4: Projekt Morfeusz zostanie wyłączony na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration)>), koloniści nie będą już uzyskiwać cechy „lenistwo”.

column2: The positive effects overshadow the negative ones, keep it running!
column3: The positive effects overshadow the negative ones, keep it running!
column4: Pozytywny wpływ projektu przewyższa niekorzystne skutki, niech działa!

column2: more Colonists will become Lazy during the next <sols(duration)> Sols
column3: more Colonists will become Lazy during the next <sols(duration)> Sols
column4: w ciągu kilku następnych soli (<sols(duration)>) więcej kolonistów uzyska cechę „lenistwo”.

column2: I can see the underlying reasons for this phenomenon.
column3: I can see the underlying reasons for this phenomenon.
column4: Widzę, co kryje się u podstaw tego zjawiska.

column2: resolve the issue now, some Colonists receive a Morale boost
column3: resolve the issue now, some Colonists receive a Morale boost
column4: rozwiązuje problem natychmiast, część kolonistów otrzymuje premię do morale.

column2:
The fine Martian dust can be a serious health hazard. We thought that our airlock filters could handle it well enough but this particular Dust Storm got the better of them.

Some colonists have developed the Dust Sickness trait. They will take Health damage during Dust Storms even when inside the dome. 

Our medical staff strongly recommends that we discharge those affected with the Dust Sickness from work so they can better manage the ailment.
column3:
The fine Martian dust can be a serious health hazard. We thought that our airlock filters could handle it well enough but this particular Dust Storm got the better of them.

Some colonists have developed the Dust Sickness trait. They will take Health damage during Dust Storms even when inside the dome. 

Our medical staff strongly recommends that we discharge those affected with the Dust Sickness from work so they can better manage the ailment.

column2: The Colonist on the bed keeps coughing uncontrollably. It’s the third such case since the Dust Storm started.
column3: The Colonist on the bed keeps coughing uncontrollably. It’s the third such case since the Dust Storm started.
column4: Kolonista leżący na łóżku ciągle kaszle. To już trzeci taki przypadek od początku burzy pyłowej.

column2: Colonists suffering from the Dust Sickness shouldn’t work.
column3: Colonists suffering from the Dust Sickness shouldn’t work.
column4: Koloniści cierpiący na pylicę nie powinni pracować.

column2: We need everyone to pull their weight. They should continue to work.
column3: We need everyone to pull their weight. They should continue to work.
column4: Każdy musi dźwigać swoje brzemię. Niech pozostaną w pracy.

column2: We can alleviate the symptoms with allergy medication.
column3: We can alleviate the symptoms with allergy medication.
column4: Możemy złagodzić objawy za pomocą leków przeciwalergicznych.

column2: the Dust Sickness trait will not appear in the colony
column3: the Dust Sickness trait will not appear in the colony
column4: cecha „pylica” przestanie się pojawiać w kolonii.

column2:
One of our Scientists has come up with a paper that proposes two possible solutions to the Dust Sickness. The research may take a long time to complete but there are possible shortcuts.

<goal>Research the “Dust Sickness Cure” tech to cure all Colonists from the affliction
column3:
One of our Scientists has come up with a paper that proposes two possible solutions to the Dust Sickness. The research may take a long time to complete but there are possible shortcuts.

<goal>Research the “Dust Sickness Cure” tech to cure all Colonists from the affliction

column2: The Scientist coughs mid-sentence – a sign of the Dust Sickness – but his ideas make sense. Perhaps there is a way to cure this illness.
column3: The Scientist coughs mid-sentence – a sign of the Dust Sickness – but his ideas make sense. Perhaps there is a way to cure this illness.
column4: Naukowiec pokasłuje od czasu do czasu – to objaw pylicy – ale jego pomysły mają sens. Być może uda się nam znaleźć lekarstwo na tę chorobę.

column2: Subject dust sick Colonists to invasive tests.
column3: Subject dust sick Colonists to invasive tests.

column2: Our sponsor can connect us to some of the best medical minds in the world.
column3: Our sponsor can connect us to some of the best medical minds in the world.
column4: Nasz sponsor może zapewnić nam pomoc najlepszych specjalistów od medycyny na świecie.
Nie będziemy szli na żadne skróty!

column2:
Our sponsor is very happy with the result, noting that this is further proof of the colony’s viability.

<effect><sponsor_name> has provided us with <funding(sponsor_bonus)>
column3:
Our sponsor is very happy with the result, noting that this is further proof of the colony’s viability.

<effect><sponsor_name> has provided us with <funding(sponsor_bonus)>

column2: The medical report on your desk is very positive and concludes that the Dust Sickness issue has been resolved permanently.
column3: The medical report on your desk is very positive and concludes that the Dust Sickness issue has been resolved permanently.
column4: Raport medyczny, jaki trafił na twoje biurko, jest bardzo optymistyczny i stwierdza, że problem pylicy został raz na zawsze rozwiązany.

column2:
Complications from the Dust Sickness have resulted in several deaths. Unfortunately the only thing we can do for now is make sure we have enough medical facilities.

<effect><morale_penalty> Morale for <sols(morale_penalty_duration)> Sols
column3:
Complications from the Dust Sickness have resulted in several deaths. Unfortunately the only thing we can do for now is make sure we have enough medical facilities.

<effect><morale_penalty> Morale for <sols(morale_penalty_duration)> Sols

column2: The mood at the wake is somber and you can’t escape the accusatory looks from some colonists. The Dust Sickness has claimed another life.
column3: The mood at the wake is somber and you can’t escape the accusatory looks from some colonists. The Dust Sickness has claimed another life.
column4: Nastrój podczas stypy jest ponury i nie możesz nie zauważyć oskarżających spojrzeń niektórych kolonistów. Pylica uśmierciła kolejną ofiarę.

column2: We are all grieving for our lost comrades.
column3: We are all grieving for our lost comrades.

column2: A sad day but we have to look to the future.
column3: A sad day but we have to look to the future.
column4: To smutny dzień, ale musimy patrzeć w przyszłość.

column2: I will make sure that no colonists will ever suffer the same fate!
column3: I will make sure that no colonists will ever suffer the same fate!
column4: Zadbam o to, by żaden kolonista już nigdy w ten sposób nie ucierpiał!

column2: The sounds of the Dust Storm keep colonists awake at night. Combined with the gloomy sunless daytime sky the conditions have made all colonists weary and irritable.
column3: The sounds of the Dust Storm keep colonists awake at night. Combined with the gloomy sunless daytime sky the conditions have made all colonists weary and irritable.
column4: Odgłosy burzy pyłowej nie dają kolonistom spać po nocach. W połączeniu z ciemnością za dnia spowodowaną zasłonięciem Słońca przez pył sprawia to, że wszyscy koloniści są zmęczeni i łatwo się denerwują.

column2: The dome resonates with a quiet but never ending howl. You toss and turn in bed but sleep escapes you.
column3: The dome resonates with a quiet but never ending howl. You toss and turn in bed but sleep escapes you.
column4: Wokół kopuły rozbrzmiewa ciche, ale nieustanne wycie wiatru. Przewracasz się ciągle z boku na bok, ale nie możesz zasnąć.

column2: We can take it easy for a couple of days.
column3: We can take it easy for a couple of days.
column4: Bez trudności wytrzymamy to jeszcze przez kilka dni.

column2: <performance_penalty> worker Performance until the Dust Storm is over
column3: <performance_penalty> worker Performance until the Dust Storm is over
column4: <performance_penalty> do wydajności pracowników do końca burzy pyłowej.

column2: The colonists raise yet another toast with full glasses in hand. Even in the most desolate of worlds humans can rely on alcohol to escape their current worries.
column3: The colonists raise yet another toast with full glasses in hand. Even in the most desolate of worlds humans can rely on alcohol to escape their current worries.
column4: Koloniści unoszą pełne kieliszki w kolejnym toaście. Nawet w najbardziej samotnym świecie ludzie potrafią szukać ucieczki od zmartwień w alkoholu.

column2:
There was a serious discussion whether alcohol should be allowed in the first Martian colony or not. On the one hand culturally alcohol is widely accepted and considered a normal part of life. On the other alcohol has adverse effects on health and can lead to accidents. 

Ultimately it was allowed as it was believed that it can be helpful for colonists to feel more at home.

<effect> Several colonists have gained the Alcoholic trait.
column3:
There was a serious discussion whether alcohol should be allowed in the first Martian colony or not. On the one hand culturally alcohol is widely accepted and considered a normal part of life. On the other alcohol has adverse effects on health and can lead to accidents. 

Ultimately it was allowed as it was believed that it can be helpful for colonists to feel more at home.

<effect> Several colonists have gained the Alcoholic trait.

column2: Invest in improving communications with Earth.
column3: Invest in improving communications with Earth.
column4: Zainwestujmy w ulepszenie łączności z Ziemią.
wygoda budynków mieszkalnych wzrasta na stałe.

column2: You casually slump down in your favorite armchair and turn on the monitor to watch the latest episode of the trendiest TV show back on Earth.
column3: You casually slump down in your favorite armchair and turn on the monitor to watch the latest episode of the trendiest TV show back on Earth.
column4: Rozpierasz się wygodnie w swoim ulubionym fotelu i włączasz ekran, by obejrzeć najnowszy odcinek „Ojca Tadeusza” nadawany z Ziemi.

column2:
A delay of between 4 to 24 minutes for information traveling between Earth and Mars rules real-time communication right out. However, our new communication satellites guarantee that every colonist has free access to information from Earth at their leisure.

<effect>Service Comfort of residences increased permanently.
column3:
A delay of between 4 to 24 minutes for information traveling between Earth and Mars rules real-time communication right out. However, our new communication satellites guarantee that every colonist has free access to information from Earth at their leisure.

<effect>Service Comfort of residences increased permanently.

column2:
Even with the years of training back on Earth, nothing can quite prepare you for the feeling of isolation of living on a barren planet with only a small piece of glass between you and the raging elements outside.

<effect>Colonist work Performance has been restored.
column3:
Even with the years of training back on Earth, nothing can quite prepare you for the feeling of isolation of living on a barren planet with only a small piece of glass between you and the raging elements outside.

<effect>Colonist work Performance has been restored.

column2: As the Dust Storm clears, life in the Dome seems to be getting back on the right track.
column3: As the Dust Storm clears, life in the Dome seems to be getting back on the right track.
column4: Burza pyłowa ustaje i życie w kopułach wraca na zwykłe tory.

column2: The efficiency report from your <DisplayName> shows that production is way below the expected amount! Obviously, the workers trusted the application of Factory Automation too much to even bother doing their part.
column3: The efficiency report from your <DisplayName> shows that production is way below the expected amount! Obviously, the workers trusted the application of Factory Automation too much to even bother doing their part.
column4: <DisplayName> przesyła raport o wydajności, z którego wynika, że produkcja idzie o wiele gorzej, niż się spodziewano! Najwyraźniej robotnicy tak bardzo polegają na automatyzacji fabryk, że nie zawracają sobie głowy wykonywaniem swojej części pracy.

column2: Something doesn’t add up with the production data from one of your factories. When you ask the shift manager, your words are met with guilty silence.
column3: Something doesn’t add up with the production data from one of your factories. When you ask the shift manager, your words are met with guilty silence.
column4: Dane o wydajności produkcji z jednej fabryk sygnalizują jakieś problemy. Gdy prosisz na rozmowę kierownika zmiany, twoje pytanie powoduje milczenie pełne poczucia winy.

column2: Not acceptable! The Colony depends on everyone doing their part.
column3: Not acceptable! The Colony depends on everyone doing their part.
column4: To niedopuszczalne! Istnienie kolonii opiera się na tym, by każdy robił swoje.

column2: workers lose <comfort> Comfort and gain <morale> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column3: workers lose <comfort> Comfort and gain <morale> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: pracownicy tracą <comfort> wygody i otrzymują <morale> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: No harm done, we can overlook the accident.
column3: No harm done, we can overlook the accident.
column4: Nic wielkiego się nie stało, tym razem możemy przymknąć oko.

column2: risk the workers to become Lazy
column3: risk the workers to become Lazy
column4: istnieje ryzyko, że pracownicy uzyskają cechę „lenistwo”.

column2:
A list of absurd and highly unpractical, not to mention impossible, demands has been forwarded to you.

If you fail to comply, they shall declare the <DisplayName> Dome independent from the rest of our colony. How that will happen, as they will be very much so dependent on us for Oxygen, Water and Power - to say the least - is beyond you.
column3:
A list of absurd and highly unpractical, not to mention impossible, demands has been forwarded to you.

If you fail to comply, they shall declare the <DisplayName> Dome independent from the rest of our colony. How that will happen, as they will be very much so dependent on us for Oxygen, Water and Power - to say the least - is beyond you.

column2: Our Renegade issues have escalated within one of our Domes.
column3: Our Renegade issues have escalated within one of our Domes.
column4: W jednej z naszych kopuł pojawił się poważny problem z renegatami.

column2: They saw through your bluff so easily, as if refusing their demands was part of the plan.
column3: They saw through your bluff so easily, as if refusing their demands was part of the plan.
column4: Przejrzeli ten blef z taką łatwością, jakby twoja odmowa stanowiła część ich planu.

column2:
They declare the Dome independent.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!
column3:
They declare the Dome independent.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!

column2: Give them time, they'll come around.
column3: Give them time, they'll come around.
column4: Dajmy im trochę czasu, a odzyskają rozum.

column2: They declare the Dome to be an independent colony on Mars.
column3: They declare the Dome to be an independent colony on Mars.
column4: Ogłosili, że ich kopuła jest niepodległą kolonią na Marsie.

column2:
We have been stripped off all access to it.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!
column3:
We have been stripped off all access to it.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!

column2: Threaten to stop the power of their Dome.
column3: Threaten to stop the power of their Dome.

column2: "If you have fallen so low, then we are willing to risk it. This is the reason we are declaring independence to begin with."
column3: "If you have fallen so low, then we are willing to risk it. This is the reason we are declaring independence to begin with."
column4: „Skoro upadliście tak nisko, podejmiemy to ryzyko. Właśnie przez takie rzeczy chcemy być niepodlegli”.

column2:
We have been stripped off all access to the Dome.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!
column3:
We have been stripped off all access to the Dome.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!

column2: Starving, cold and lost, the Colonists from the rogue Dome wish to return to the colony.
column3: Starving, cold and lost, the Colonists from the rogue Dome wish to return to the colony.
column4: Wygłodzeni, zmarznięci i zagubieni koloniści z kopuły separatystów pragną wrócić na łono kolonii.

column2: No, I think you haven't tried hard enough. We will not accept you back in the colony.
column3: No, I think you haven't tried hard enough. We will not accept you back in the colony.
column4: Chyba jednak za mało się postaraliście. Nie przyjmiemy was z powrotem.

column2:
They promise never to do this again as they now realize the many difficulties that you face on a daily basis.

<effect>All colonists in the <Display_Name> Dome lose the renegade trait.
column3:
They promise never to do this again as they now realize the many difficulties that you face on a daily basis.

<effect>All colonists in the <Display_Name> Dome lose the renegade trait.

column2: The rogue Dome is begging us to rejoin the colony.
column3: The rogue Dome is begging us to rejoin the colony.
column4: Kopuła separatystów błaga nas o ponowne włączenie do kolonii.

column2:
Based on personal notes and research done by the scientist in question, strong arguments have been laid down why a practice of testing certain experimental techs on volunteers could present a serious boost to our science program. 

While the thesis is solid, the danger of lethal consequences for any volunteer is non-negligible. Traditionally, such experiments are never conducted on human subjects. Still - as the work puts it – maybe a new planet calls for a new mentality.
column3:
Based on personal notes and research done by the scientist in question, strong arguments have been laid down why a practice of testing certain experimental techs on volunteers could present a serious boost to our science program. 

While the thesis is solid, the danger of lethal consequences for any volunteer is non-negligible. Traditionally, such experiments are never conducted on human subjects. Still - as the work puts it – maybe a new planet calls for a new mentality.

column2: A peculiar thesis has been submitted by one of our scientists - anonymously.
column3: A peculiar thesis has been submitted by one of our scientists - anonymously.
column4: Jeden z naszych naukowców opublikował szczególną pracę naukową – anonimowo.

column2: Keeping our science one step ahead is our primary goal. Test the thesis.
column3: Keeping our science one step ahead is our primary goal. Test the thesis.
column4: Zapewnienie naszej kolonii szybkiego rozwoju naukowego to nasz główny cel. Przetestujcie to.

column2: Research will be boosted for the next 20 Sols
column3: Research will be boosted for the next 20 Sols
column4: badania naukowe będą przyspieszone przez 20 soli.

column2: Never approach me with such unethical suggestion again!
column3: Never approach me with such unethical suggestion again!
column4: Nic chcę więcej słyszeć tak nieetycznych sugestii!

column2:
However, they know full well they don't have any jurisdiction over us, making all this little more than wishful thinking on their part. 

How do we answer?
column3:
However, they know full well they don't have any jurisdiction over us, making all this little more than wishful thinking on their part. 

How do we answer?

column2: Amnesty International has learned of our practice to test dangerous research on volunteer colonists and has submitted a Cease and Desist order.
column3: Amnesty International has learned of our practice to test dangerous research on volunteer colonists and has submitted a Cease and Desist order.
column4: Organizacja Amnesty International dowiedziała się o naszych praktykach testowania niebezpiecznych technologii na ochotnikach i przesłała nam nakaz ich zaprzestania.

column2: We have forgotten ourselves. We went too far. This stops today!
column3: We have forgotten ourselves. We went too far. This stops today!
column4: Zapomnieliśmy się. Posunęliśmy się za daleko. Kończymy z tym od razu!

column2: A meaningless jab coming from a place where no one understands the problems we face on Mars. Carry on!
column3: A meaningless jab coming from a place where no one understands the problems we face on Mars. Carry on!
column4: To tylko pozbawione znaczenia marudzenie z miejsca, w którym nikt nie rozumie problemów, jakim musimy stawić czoła na Marsie. Kontynuować!

column2: <number_of_killed> colonists have died in research experiments
column3: <number_of_killed> colonists have died in research experiments
column4: Pewna liczba kolonistów zmarła wskutek eksperymentów (<number_of_killed>).

column2: <if(is_commander("rocketscientist"))>[<commander_profile>] Testing out the new engine will be a high-stake endeavor. Perhaps it would be wise to keep the payloads minimal until design kinks have been ironed out.
column3: <if(is_commander("rocketscientist"))>[<commander_profile>] Testing out the new engine will be a high-stake endeavor. Perhaps it would be wise to keep the payloads minimal until design kinks have been ironed out.
column4: <if(is_commander("rocketscientist"))>[<commander_profile>] Testowanie nowego silnika to przedsięwzięcie obarczone wysokim stopniem ryzyka. Najlepiej ograniczyć ładunek rakiety do minimum, co da nam czas na usunięcie wszystkich usterek projektu.

column2: A new rocket engine has been developed by our sponsor on Earth.  We have been offered the dubious honor of testing the first prototype.
column3: Наш фундатар на Зямлі распрацаваў новы ракетны рухавік. Нам прапанавалі сумненны гонар выпрабаваць першы прататып.
column4: Nasz ziemski sponsor zbudował silnik rakietowy nowego typu. Zaproponowano nam wątpliwy zaszczyt testowania pierwszego prototypu.

column2: Let me have a look at the blueprints
column4: A mogę najpierw zerknąć na plany?

column2: rocket travel time permanently decreased by <traveltime_decrease>%
column3: час палёту ракеты назаўжды скараціўся на <traveltime_decrease>%
column4: Czas przelotu rakiety zostaje skrócony na stałe o <traveltime_decrease>%.

column2: Luckily, the engine flaw was removed and the design has been updated to the new specs before any tragic accident took place.
column3: Luckily, the engine flaw was removed and the design has been updated to the new specs before any tragic accident took place.
column4: Na szczęście wada silnika została usunięta, a konstrukcja zmodyfikowana, zanim doszło do jakiegoś tragicznego wypadku.

column2:
Luckily, the engine flaw was removed and the design has been updated to the new specs before any tragic accident took place.

Your own technical expertise contributed to the discovery of the flaw. You shudder to think about what could've happened if another commander was in charge of the mission.
column3:
Luckily, the engine flaw was removed and the design has been updated to the new specs before any tragic accident took place.

Your own technical expertise contributed to the discovery of the flaw. You shudder to think about what could've happened if another commander was in charge of the mission.

column2: A critical design flaw has been discovered in the prototype rocket. How could they miss that?
column3: A critical design flaw has been discovered in the prototype rocket. How could they miss that?
column4: W prototypie rakiety odkryto poważną wadę konstrukcyjną. Jak mogli ją przegapić?

column2: Luckily, our rockets are safe now
column3: Luckily, our rockets are safe now
column4: Na szczęście nasze rakiety są już bezpieczne

column2:
Sadly, the prototype engine had a crucial flaw. Precautions have been taken so this won't happen again. Still, the Rocket and its entire payload have been destroyed.

<effect>Lose 1 Rocket, the payload has been destroyed.
column3:
Sadly, the prototype engine had a crucial flaw. Precautions have been taken so this won't happen again. Still, the Rocket and its entire payload have been destroyed.

<effect>Lose 1 Rocket, the payload has been destroyed.

column2: The rocket launch was a catastrophic failure! A seal in the booster ruptured allowing a jet of pressurized gas into the fuel chamber, ultimately causing a massive explosion!
column3: The rocket launch was a catastrophic failure! A seal in the booster ruptured allowing a jet of pressurized gas into the fuel chamber, ultimately causing a massive explosion!
column4: Pierwszy start okazał się katastrofalną porażką! Uszczelka w boosterze pękła, przez co strumień silnie sprężonego gazu dostał się do komory spalania, wywołując ogromną eksplozję!

column2: A tragic loss! The passengers will be commemorated as heroes.
column3: A tragic loss! The passengers will be commemorated as heroes.
column4: Cóż za tragiczna strata! Upamiętnimy pasażerów jako bohaterów.

column2: At least no human lives have been lost...
column3: At least no human lives have been lost...

column2: There are several other such items on various online auctions. And there are more than 100, 000 results for people who want to buy Martian rocks.
column3: There are several other such items on various online auctions. And there are more than 100, 000 results for people who want to buy Martian rocks.
column4: Na różnych serwisach aukcyjnych można znaleźć jeszcze kilka takich przedmiotów. I ponadto 100 000 ludzi chciałoby kupić marsjańskie skały.

column2: "Pristine Martian Rock, verified taken during a vacation on Mars, price $1 million." Amusing and surprisingly – already sold!
column3: "Pristine Martian Rock, verified taken during a vacation on Mars, price $1 million." Amusing and surprisingly – already sold!
column4: „Dziewicza skała marsjańska, z certyfikatem potwierdzającym, że została zabrana z Marsa podczas wyjazdu wakacyjnego. Cena – 1 milion dolarów”. Co zabawne – i zaskakujące – już sprzedana!

column2: Mars belongs to all humans! Free rocks for everyone!
column3: Mars belongs to all humans! Free rocks for everyone!
column4: Mars należy do wszystkich ludzi! Darmowe kamienie dla wszystkich!

column2: export Waste Rock for free, some Colonists become Enthusiasts
column3: export Waste Rock for free, some Colonists become Enthusiasts
column4: będziemy eksportować odpady skalne za darmo, niektórzy koloniści uzyskają cechę „entuzjazm”.

column2: Exports Waste Rock for free as souvenirs for people on Earth.
column3: Exports Waste Rock for free as souvenirs for people on Earth.
column4: Wywozi odpady skalne jako darmowe pamiątki dla mieszkańców Ziemi.

column2: We should totally export Martian rocks!
column3: We should totally export Martian rocks!
column4: Sprzedawanie marsjańskich kamieni to świetny interes!
będziemy eksportować odpady skalne za fundusze.

column2: Exports Waste Rock to sell as souvenirs to Earthlings.
column3: Exports Waste Rock to sell as souvenirs to Earthlings.
column4: Wywozi odpady skalne do sprzedaży Ziemianom jako pamiątki.

column2: Why ordinary rocks? Colonists can sign them and we can sell them as souvenirs!
column3: Why ordinary rocks? Colonists can sign them and we can sell them as souvenirs!
column4: Dlaczego zwykłe kamienie? Koloniści mogą składać na nich autografy i możemy sprzedawać je jako pamiątki!

column2: export Waste Rock for more Funding
column3: export Waste Rock for more Funding
column4: będziemy eksportować odpady skalne za więcej funduszy.

column2: Exports Waste Rock to sell as expensive souvenirs to Earthlings.
column3: Exports Waste Rock to sell as expensive souvenirs to Earthlings.
column4: Wywozi odpady skalne do sprzedaży zamożnym Ziemianom jako kosztowne pamiątki.

column2: Since the Sanity breakdown, the words of <DisplayName> no longer spread the good message. They have become something evil, sinister, making people believe in an ultimate darkness, an endless void and an abyss inside of their souls. The colony has never before experienced such a crisis of faith!
column3: Since the Sanity breakdown, the words of <DisplayName> no longer spread the good message. They have become something evil, sinister, making people believe in an ultimate darkness, an endless void and an abyss inside of their souls. The colony has never before experienced such a crisis of faith!
column4: Od załamania psychicznego <DisplayName> głosi słowa, które nie szerzą już dobrej nowiny. Rozbrzmiewa w nich coś niegodziwego, złowrogiego, powodując, że ludzie zaczynają oddawać religijną cześć najmroczniejszej ciemności, bezkresnej pustce i otchłani kryjącej się w ich duszach. Nigdy dotąd kolonia nie doświadczyła takiego kryzysu wiary!

column2: Something sinister happened in the mind and soul of one of our holiest of colonists who lost all faith.
column3: Something sinister happened in the mind and soul of one of our holiest of colonists who lost all faith.
column4: Coś strasznego stało się z umysłem i duszą jednego z naszych najświętszych kolonistów, który utracił wiarę.

column2: A Saint leaves the Colony, Morale penalty for all Colonists
column3: A Saint leaves the Colony, Morale penalty for all Colonists
column4: święty opuszcza kolonię, wszyscy koloniści otrzymują karę do morale.

column2:
Thinking it a mere joke, you read through it and find out that a colonist by the name of <DisplayName>, who is born on Mars and has never been to Space, is propagating the notion that Mars is indeed flat, along with other conspiracy theories which naturally accompany such an idea.

<DisplayName> has broken no laws thus far but perhaps something should be done.
column3:
Thinking it a mere joke, you read through it and find out that a colonist by the name of <DisplayName>, who is born on Mars and has never been to Space, is propagating the notion that Mars is indeed flat, along with other conspiracy theories which naturally accompany such an idea.

<DisplayName> has broken no laws thus far but perhaps something should be done.

column2: A message is forwarded to your inbox with the most curious title – Flat Mars Society.
column3: На ваш пашту прыйшло паведамленьне з самай цікавай назвай – Таварыства плоскага Марсу.
column4: W swojej skrzynce odbiorczej znajdujesz wiadomość o intrygującym nagłówku – Towarzystwo Płaskiego Marsa.

column2: I’m sure our colonists are reasonable enough not to board that wacky train.
column3: I’m sure our colonists are reasonable enough not to board that wacky train.
column4: Nasi koloniści są z pewnością zbyt rozsądni, by dać wiarę tym bredniom.
Przewracasz oczami i myślisz sobie „Ta, jasne”...

column2: Their plan involves some home-built craft that will take as many as <number_of_idiots> people high enough into the stratosphere to disprove that Mars is round once and for all. Needless to say, the craft looks incredibly dangerous and a far cry from having even the slimmest chance of success.
column3: Their plan involves some home-built craft that will take as many as <number_of_idiots> people high enough into the stratosphere to disprove that Mars is round once and for all. Needless to say, the craft looks incredibly dangerous and a far cry from having even the slimmest chance of success.
column4: Plan Towarzystwa zakłada wybudowanie chałupniczej rakiety, która wyniesie <number_of_idiots> ludzi na tyle wysoko nad powierzchnię Marsa, by raz na zawsze zdemaskować pogłoskę, że Czerwona Planeta jest okrągła. Oczywiście ta rakieta wygląda jak rupieć i w żadnym razie nie zapewnia nawet najmniejszych szans bezpiecznego przelotu.

column2: The head of the, now quite grown in numbers, Flat Mars Society has come up with a plan that will, quote - “bring down the veil of lies that the Martian government is feeding its colonists and will enlighten anyone who is willing to see past it!”
column3: The head of the, now quite grown in numbers, Flat Mars Society has come up with a plan that will, quote - “bring down the veil of lies that the Martian government is feeding its colonists and will enlighten anyone who is willing to see past it!”
column4: Prezes liczącego już sporo członków Towarzystwa Płaskiego Marsa ogłasza plan, który, cytuję, „zerwie z twarzy płaskiego Marsa zasłonę kłamstw wciskanych kolonistom przez marsjański rząd i oślepi światłem prawdy każdego, kto ujrzy prawdę”.

column2: This has gone on long enough. Ban the Flat Mars Society!
column3: This has gone on long enough. Ban the Flat Mars Society!
column4: To już zaszło za daleko. Zakazać Towarzystwa Płaskiego Marsa!
koloniści urodzeni na Marsie tracą morale.

column2: You know what, let them do it!
column3: You know what, let them do it!
column4: Wiecie co, a niech się zabiją!

column2: <DisplayName> has done enough harm, they may board the craft alone.
column3: <DisplayName> has done enough harm, they may board the craft alone.
column4: <DisplayName> czyni już dość szkód, niech sobie leci swoją rakietą. Ale bez towarzystwa.

column2: There are no survivors amidst the wreckage.
column3: There are no survivors amidst the wreckage.
column4: Wśród szczątków nie znaleziono żadnych ocalałych ludzi.

column2: The improvised aircraft lifts off with all the Flat Mars Society members onboard, rapidly loses speed and then quite expectedly comes down crashing.
column3: The improvised aircraft lifts off with all the Flat Mars Society members onboard, rapidly loses speed and then quite expectedly comes down crashing.
column4: Chałupniczej produkcji rakieta startuje ze wszystkimi członkami Towarzystwa Płaskiego Marsa na pokładzie, a potem nagle traci rozpęd i zgodnie z wcześniejszymi obawami rozbija się na powierzchni planety.

column2: Proclaim a day of mourning. Their misguided quest for the truth met a tragic end.
column3: Proclaim a day of mourning. Their misguided quest for the truth met a tragic end.
column4: Ogłoście dzień żałoby. Absurdalna pogoń za ułudą, którą uważali za prawdę, skończyła się tragicznie.

column2: I guess whoever designed the vehicle got their physics wrong.
column3: I guess whoever designed the vehicle got their physics wrong.
column4: Zdaje się, że projektant tego „statku kosmicznego” trochę pomylił się w obliczeniach.

column2: Were we wrong not to stop them? It is what they wished for.
column3: Were we wrong not to stop them? It is what they wished for.
column4: Czy popełniliśmy błąd, nie powstrzymując ich? Przecież sami tego chcieli.

column2: The improvised aircraft lifts off with the Flat Mars Society leader onboard, rapidly loses speed and then quite expectedly comes down crashing.
column3: The improvised aircraft lifts off with the Flat Mars Society leader onboard, rapidly loses speed and then quite expectedly comes down crashing.
column4: Chałupniczej produkcji rakieta startuje z prezesem Towarzystwa Płaskiego Marsa na pokładzie, a potem nagle traci rozpęd i zgodnie z wcześniejszymi obawami rozbija się na powierzchni planety.

column2: Think what you will, but in the end, you can’t really cherry-pick your physics.
column3: Think what you will, but in the end, you can’t really cherry-pick your physics.
column4: Myślcie sobie, co chcecie, ale prawdziwa fizyka jest tylko jedna.

column2: The flawed idea killed them as much as the flawed vehicle.
column3: The flawed idea killed them as much as the flawed vehicle.
column4: Powodem tej śmierci jest nie tylko absurdalny pojazd, ale i absurdalna idea.

column2:
Would you like a diet soda with your triple burger? For free! Your only obligation is to make the colonists eat (and supposedly enjoy) the branded meals.

<if(is_commander("oligarch"))>[<commander_profile>] Reading the fine print, the proposed contract excludes any demands for the quality of the served food.</if>
column3:
Would you like a diet soda with your triple burger? For free! Your only obligation is to make the colonists eat (and supposedly enjoy) the branded meals.

<if(is_commander("oligarch"))>[<commander_profile>] Reading the fine print, the proposed contract excludes any demands for the quality of the served food.</if>

column2: Two of the largest fast food chains have filed simultaneous requests to serve the colonists.
column3: Two of the largest fast food chains have filed simultaneous requests to serve the colonists.
column4: Dwa największe łańcuchy fast foodów równocześnie zgłosiły życzenie obsługiwania marsjańskich kolonistów.

column2: Mars food will always be Bio and Organic!
column3: Mars food will always be Bio and Organic!
column4: Marsjańskie jedzenie będzie zawsze ekologiczne i organiczne!

column2: Food service buildings grant more Comfort
column3: Food service buildings grant more Comfort
column4: budynki usługowe z żywnością dają więcej wygody.

column2: Give the permission to Burglar King.
column3: Give the permission to Burglar King.

column2: free construction of Food service buildings
column3: free construction of Food service buildings

column2: Let them compete, take bids from both!
column3: Let them compete, take bids from both!

column2:
No need to read the complaints. You’re looking at the cause right now. There’s a pile of Triple XL Mega-Veggie Burgers on your kitchen table. Untouched. From over a week. And they haven’t rotten. They also neither taste nor smell. You crave the days when you imbibed your tasteless half-liquid protein paste and were naive and happy.

But the contract is solid. What could be done, you wonder?
column3:
No need to read the complaints. You’re looking at the cause right now. There’s a pile of Triple XL Mega-Veggie Burgers on your kitchen table. Untouched. From over a week. And they haven’t rotten. They also neither taste nor smell. You crave the days when you imbibed your tasteless half-liquid protein paste and were naive and happy.

But the contract is solid. What could be done, you wonder?

column4: Wojna o jedzenie – bitwa pod żołądkiem

column2: The colonists are extremely unhappy with the quality of food. You have received tons of complaints. Who would have thought that inviting a fast food super-giant would cause super-trouble?
column3: The colonists are extremely unhappy with the quality of food. You have received tons of complaints. Who would have thought that inviting a fast food super-giant would cause super-trouble?
column4: Koloniści są bardzo niezadowoleni z jakości jedzenia. Otrzymujesz całe tony skarg. Kto by pomyślał, że zawarcie umowy z supergigantem fast foodów spowoduje superkłopoty?

column2: Pull some strings to set things right.
column3: Pull some strings to set things right.
column4: Pociągnij kilka sznurków, by naprostować sprawy.

column2: Sign a new contract with better terms.
column3: Sign a new contract with better terms.
column4: Podpisz nową umowę na lepszych warunkach.

column2: Gather activist support with an online campaign.
column3: Gather activist support with an online campaign.
column4: Zbierz poparcie aktywistów w kampanii sieciowej.

column2: Vegans lose Sanity and Health, restore Food service quality
column3: Vegans lose Sanity and Health, restore Food service quality
column4: Weganie utracą zdrowie psychiczne i fizyczne, ale dobra jakość żywności zostanie przywrócona.

column2: Our satellites have caught an unbelievable sight at this place: a human boy playing on the cold dead surface of Mars.
column3: Our satellites have caught an unbelievable sight at this place: a human boy playing on the cold dead surface of Mars.
column4: Nasze satelity zarejestrowały niewiarygodny widok – jakiś chłopiec bawi się na śmiertelnie zimnej powierzchni Marsa.

column2:
On some of them a naked boy can be seen, carelessly jumping around and playing on the very surface of Mars. There is no oxygen mask in view, nor any protection from the impossible Martian cold.

Physicists are baffled and wildly speculate about optical illusions, atmospheric anomalies and all kind of quantum physics mumbo-jumbo. The truth is, we can never know what this is until we send an expedition.

<effect>A Planetary Anomaly has appeared on the map.
column3:
On some of them a naked boy can be seen, carelessly jumping around and playing on the very surface of Mars. There is no oxygen mask in view, nor any protection from the impossible Martian cold.

Physicists are baffled and wildly speculate about optical illusions, atmospheric anomalies and all kind of quantum physics mumbo-jumbo. The truth is, we can never know what this is until we send an expedition.

<effect>A Planetary Anomaly has appeared on the map.

column2: One of our Sponsor's satellites have made some unbelievable photos on the surface of Mars.
column3: One of our Sponsor's satellites have made some unbelievable photos on the surface of Mars.
column4: Jeden z satelitów naszego sponsora wykonał kilka niewiarygodnych zdjęć powierzchni Marsa.

column2:
The medical team returned with a perfectly healthy boy, about 11 years old. DNA research confirmed he is 100% human and even revealed his origin: it is very probable he was conceived on the board of an early exploration rocket which was considered destroyed, and the crew was missing.

It is still a mystery how this boy survived on Mars without any protection. He doesn't speak any human language and only smiles and looks around with wide gleaming eyes. He doesn't seem to have ever met other humans before, so we'll need to teach him everything about our culture before we can ask any questions. 

<effect>The new Colonist Mike Martian has appeared.
column3:
The medical team returned with a perfectly healthy boy, about 11 years old. DNA research confirmed he is 100% human and even revealed his origin: it is very probable he was conceived on the board of an early exploration rocket which was considered destroyed, and the crew was missing.

It is still a mystery how this boy survived on Mars without any protection. He doesn't speak any human language and only smiles and looks around with wide gleaming eyes. He doesn't seem to have ever met other humans before, so we'll need to teach him everything about our culture before we can ask any questions. 

<effect>The new Colonist Mike Martian has appeared.

column2: Let him have a normal childhood. Treat him as any other Martianborn kid.
column3: Let him have a normal childhood. Treat him as any other Martianborn kid.
column4: Niech ma normalne dzieciństwo. Traktujmy go jak każde inne dziecko urodzone na Marsie.

column2: wait for the child to grow
column3: wait for the child to grow

column2:
Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts. 

There is much to be expected from such kid when he grows up.
column3:
Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts. 

There is much to be expected from such kid when he grows up.

column2: Become his tutor and help him unfold his potential.
column3: Become his tutor and help him unfold his potential.
column4: Zostań jego nauczycielem i pomóż mu rozwinąć pełnię możliwości.

column2: wait for the child to grow, while trying to learn something from him
column3: wait for the child to grow, while trying to learn something from him
column4: zaczekaj, aż chłopak dorośnie, próbując się czegoś nauczyć od niego

column2:
Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts.

However, you learn a lot from his weird perspective and gain ideas which change the very life on Mars.

<effect>A Breakthrough has been revealed.
