column2: Gain information using hypnosis and other scientific methods.
column3: Gain information using hypnosis and other scientific methods.
column4: Uzyskaj informacje za pomocą hipnozy i innych metod naukowych.

column2: unlock new techs, the child may be traumatized
column3: unlock new techs, the child may be traumatized
column4: odblokowuje nowe technologie, dziecko może doznać uszczerbku

column2:
A scientist leads Mike in the lab. Mike trustfully holds her by the hand, smiling wide and looking around with curiosity. She puts him on a bed and places electrodes on his head, strain gauges on his chest and an oximeter on his finger. Then she puts him under hypnosis and starts one of many sessions in which the boy throws himself from one side to another, and sometimes just stops and looks in the camera with wide empty eyes.

Then one day Mike just disappears. No one knows where he has gone, or how he vanished in thin air.
<effect>New Techs have been revealed.
column3:
A scientist leads Mike in the lab. Mike trustfully holds her by the hand, smiling wide and looking around with curiosity. She puts him on a bed and places electrodes on his head, strain gauges on his chest and an oximeter on his finger. Then she puts him under hypnosis and starts one of many sessions in which the boy throws himself from one side to another, and sometimes just stops and looks in the camera with wide empty eyes.

Then one day Mike just disappears. No one knows where he has gone, or how he vanished in thin air.
<effect>New Techs have been revealed.

column2:
A scientist leads Mike in the lab. Mike trustfully holds her by the hand, smiling wide and looking around with curiosity. She puts him on a bed and places electrodes on his head, strain gauges on his chest and an oximeter on his finger. Then she puts him under hypnosis and starts one of many sessions in which the boy only smiles at her with maddening patience.

<effect>A new Tech has been revealed.
column3:
A scientist leads Mike in the lab. Mike trustfully holds her by the hand, smiling wide and looking around with curiosity. She puts him on a bed and places electrodes on his head, strain gauges on his chest and an oximeter on his finger. Then she puts him under hypnosis and starts one of many sessions in which the boy only smiles at her with maddening patience.

<effect>A new Tech has been revealed.

column2: Send him to Earth. Let our Sponsor handle this.
column3: Send him to Earth. Let our Sponsor handle this.
column4: Wyślijcie go na Ziemię. Niech nasz sponsor się tym zajmie.

column2:
Your Sponsor team is intrigued with your discovery. When he grows up, Mike creates a turmoil back on Earth, introducing whole new concepts and thinking patterns. He even starts a new religion in an attempt to change the very basis of human nature. 

He never finds the time to visit his home planet Mars, but our sponsor occasionally sends us the news about him, along with reports about the science advancements they deem useful to us.
column3:
Your Sponsor team is intrigued with your discovery. When he grows up, Mike creates a turmoil back on Earth, introducing whole new concepts and thinking patterns. He even starts a new religion in an attempt to change the very basis of human nature. 

He never finds the time to visit his home planet Mars, but our sponsor occasionally sends us the news about him, along with reports about the science advancements they deem useful to us.

column2:
Mike, the person who has been found as a child roaming the Mars surface without any protective equipment, has grown into a young man. He has learned several languages, but he still claims he lacks the words needed to explain how he survived and what is his connection with some "old ones" he mentions every once and again. Some say he has been raised by aliens, but he disagrees. All the questions, he says, can be answered only in the tongue of the Old Ones, as the language shapes the thought and the thought can change space and time.

Eventually, Mike decided that the humankind is hopelessly confused and unhappy, and he tried to establish a new religion which would change the very human nature by teaching the language of the Old Ones. His cult which promotes social libertarianism and some non-mainstream family structures, quickly gathered followers in our colony.

Needless to say, these ideas put pressure on our community.
<effect>Some of our Colonists became Religious.
column3:

He has learned several languages, but he still claims he lacks the words needed to explain how he survived and what is his connection with some "old ones" he mentions every once and again. Some say he has been raised by aliens, but he disagrees. All the questions, he says, can be answered only in the tongue of the Old Ones, as the language shapes the thought and the thought can change space and time.

Eventually, Mike decided that the humankind is hopelessly confused and unhappy, and he tried to establish a new religion which would change the very human nature by teaching the language of the Old Ones. His cult which promotes social libertarianism and some non-mainstream family structures, quickly gathered followers in our colony.

Needless to say, these ideas put pressure on our community.
<effect>Some of our Colonists became Religious.

column2: Mike means only good. Let him do whatever he deems necessary.
column3: Mike means only good. Let him do whatever he deems necessary.
column4: Marek ma dobre intencje. Niech robi to, co uznaje za konieczne.

column2: many Religious Colonists lose Morale, a few become Saints
column3: many Religious Colonists lose Morale, a few become Saints
column4: wielu religijnych kolonistów traci morale, kilku zostaje świętymi

column2:
With your permission, Mike establishes the Church of Two Worlds as an official religion. This introduces immense social tension within our colony. Some insist that he and his people should be burned as witches, and others fiercely support him. However, the Old Ones' language really provides some unexplored psycho-kinetic abilities and even though modern science can't explain them, Mike and his people use their powers to help our community.

<effect><colonists_pissed_2>% of Religious Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(pissed_time)> Sols.
<new_saints> more Colonists have become Saints.

column2:
With your permission, Mike establishes the Church of Two Worlds as an official religion. The Old Ones' language really provides some unexplored psycho-kinetic abilities and even though modern science can't explain them, Mike and his people use their powers to help our community.

However, this introduces immense social tension within our colony. Some insist that he and his people should be burned as witches, and others fiercely support him. One day, a mob of angry and confused people attacks him at his house and Mike dies as a martyr. Strangely, the shock of what's done makes everybody sober down and the peace is finally restored.

<effect>Mike is dead.
<colonists_pissed_1>% of Religious Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(pissed_time)> Sols.

column2: Luckily for the victim, <DisplayName> botched the assault attempt and failed to cause any harm, but this doesn't mean that the incident should be ignored.
column3: Luckily for the victim, <DisplayName> botched the assault attempt and failed to cause any harm, but this doesn't mean that the incident should be ignored.
column4: Na szczęście dla ofiary <DisplayName> jest raczej niezgrabnym napastnikiem i nie powoduje żadnych obrażeń, ale to nie znaczy, że mamy zignorować ten wybryk.

column2: An Arcology resident has committed an armed assault against another Colonist! This is a rather strange case as nothing in the perpetrator’s file suggests a criminal intent.
column3: An Арколёгія resident has committed an armed assault against another Colonist! This is a rather strange case as nothing in the perpetrator’s file suggests a criminal intent.
column4: Pewien mieszkaniec arkologii napadł z bronią w ręku na innego kolonistę! To bardzo dziwny przypadek, ponieważ żadne informacje z akt sprawcy nie sugerują, że mógłby mieć przestępcze zamiary.

column2: Our security specialists questioned all people related to both the victim and the perpetrator, but all the evidence is inconclusive.
column3: Our security specialists questioned all people related to both the victim and the perpetrator, but all the evidence is inconclusive.
column4: Nasi specjaliści do spraw bezpieczeństwa przesłuchali wszystkie osoby mające jakiś związek z napastnikiem i ofiarą, ale zebrane dowody nie są jednoznaczne.

column2:
Indeed, the personal records of both Colonists suggest no relation between them. But some of the close friends and acquaintances of <DisplayName> who also happen to live in the same Arcology display an unusual animosity against the victim, justifying the actions of the perpetrator.

All in all, the Officers suggest that we release the perpetrator and place them under surveillance.
column3:
Indeed, the personal records of both Colonists suggest no relation between them. But some of the close friends and acquaintances of <DisplayName> who also happen to live in the same Арколёгія display an unusual animosity against the victim, justifying the actions of the perpetrator.

All in all, the Officers suggest that we release the perpetrator and place them under surveillance.

column2: After a long and tiresome session with the perpetrator, you’ve managed to raise even more questions.
column3: After a long and tiresome session with the perpetrator, you’ve managed to raise even more questions.
column4: Po długiej i męczącej rozmowie ze sprawcą napadu udało ci się jedynie zwiększyć liczbę pytań.

column2:
<DisplayName> has finally opened up and revealed a confused psyche. Prone to suggestions and self-doubt, the perpetrator seems too naive to perform such a crime alone. Furthermore, <DisplayName> hadn’t spoken to anyone at all about the affair – instead, all of a sudden, obsessive thoughts of harming the victim appeared.

Immersed in heavy thoughts, you release the perpetrator. You place them under surveillance, hoping to find out more.
column3:
<DisplayName> has finally opened up and revealed a confused psyche. Prone to suggestions and self-doubt, the perpetrator seems too naive to perform such a crime alone. Immersed in heavy thoughts, you release the perpetrator. You place them under surveillance, hoping to find out more.

column3: Go through their personal file again, there’s got to be something there!
column4: Przejrzyj jeszcze raz akta osobowe sprawcy, tam musi coś być!

column3: After hours of tedious rifling through the perpetrator’s personal file you fail to discover anything of value.

When a criminal mastermind, a true psychopath, like our Colonist <DisplayName> enters the close-knit society of the hive mind, the sheer will of the said individual could overpower the ones who are weak-willed and prone to suggestion. column3: The mysterious crime spree by Арколёгія residents has been solved. As with most complicated cases, the truth is hard to believe, but yet evident.

column3: Upgrade Hive Mind hardware in all Арколёгіі.
column4: Ulepszyć sprzęt „umysłu roju” we wszystkich arkologiach.

column2: all Arcologies enter maintenance for <electronics(shield_cost)> and gain <comfort_bonus> residence Comfort forever
column3: all Арколёгіі enter maintenance for <electronics(shield_cost)> and gain <comfort_bonus> residence Comfort forever

column2: Concentrate on boosting personal motivation in Arcologies.
column3: Concentrate on boosting personal motivation in Арколёгіі.
column4: Skoncentrujmy się na wspieraniu osobistej motywacji mieszkańców arkologii.

column2: All Arcology residents gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column3: All Арколёгія residents gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: wszyscy mieszkańcy arkologii otrzymują <morale_up> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: The temperatures have dropped to a new all-time low, well outside the operational range of our Power Accumulators. Existing batteries will shut down and stop working for the duration of the Cold Wave unless we do something quickly.
column3: The temperatures have dropped to a new all-time low, well outside the operational range of our Power Accumulators. Existing batteries will shut down and stop working for the duration of the Cold Wave unless we do something quickly.
column4: Temperatury spadły rekordowo nisko, daleko poza zakres roboczy naszych baterii energetycznych. Jeśli nie podejmiemy wkrótce jakichś działań, istniejące baterie wyłączą się zamarzać i przestaną działać na czas fali zimna.

column2: The morning is particularly chilly. Sipping your cup of tea, you survey the frozen landscape just in time to see the warning lights of several accumulators flash red.
column3: The morning is particularly chilly. Sipping your cup of tea, you survey the frozen landscape just in time to see the warning lights of several accumulators flash red.
column4: Dzisiejszy ranek jest szczególnie mroźny. Sącząc poranną herbatę, przemierzasz wzrokiem zamarznięty pejzaż w samą porę, by zauważyć, że światła ostrzegawcze kilku baterii pulsują czerwienią.

column2: Increase the voltage to heat the grid.
column3: Increase the voltage to heat the grid.
column4: Zwiększcie napięcie, aby ogrzać sieć energetyczną.

column2: each Accumulator will need <electronics(maintenance)> emergency maintenance
column3: each Accumulator will need <electronics(maintenance)> emergency maintenance
column4: każda bateria będzie potrzebować <electronics(maintenance)> na konserwację awaryjną.

column2: We can manage without our Power reserves for now.
column3: We can manage without our Power reserves for now.
column4: Na razie poradzimy sobie dzięki posiadanym rezerwom energetycznym.

column2: all Accumulators will stop working until the end of the Cold Wave
column3: all Accumulators will stop working until the end of the Cold Wave
column4: wszystkie baterie energetyczne przestaną działać do końca fali zimna.

column2:
We will definitely bring Mr. <DisplayName> to your attention, if only we could catch him sober enough...

Yet his still apparatus is an example for an amazingly simple and effective design. It’s a shame he didn’t focus these skills on his work.
column3:
We will definitely bring Mr. <DisplayName> to your attention, if only we could catch him sober enough...

Yet his still apparatus is an example for an amazingly simple and effective design. It’s a shame he didn’t focus these skills on his work.

column2: A Colonist has discovered a new way to use fungal waste by-products in order to create alcohol.
column3: A Colonist has discovered a new way to use fungal waste by-products in order to create alcohol.
column4: Jeden z kolonistów odkrył nowy sposób wykorzystania odpadów z uprawy grzybów i wyprodukował z nich napój alkoholowy.

column2: Destroy the still and forbid such experiments.
column3: Destroy the still and forbid such experiments.
column4: Zniszczyć destylarnię i zakazać takich eksperymentów.

column2: Does it have a good kick? People may enjoy some distraction.
column3: Does it have a good kick? People may enjoy some distraction.
column4: Daje dobrego kopa? Ludziom przyda się trochę rozrywki.

column2: Sounds cool. We should advertise this as a unique local beverage!
column3: Sounds cool. We should advertise this as a unique local beverage!
column4: To brzmi nieźle. Powinniśmy rozreklamować grzybówkę jako miejscowy specjał!

column2: This design can be improved. Mars deserves the first hangover-free alcohol!
column3: This design can be improved. Mars deserves the first hangover-free alcohol!
column4: Można ulepszyć ten proces. Mars zasługuje na pierwszy alkohol niepowodujący kaca!

column2:
The Colonist smiled shyly, hiccupped, and said: “Well, BUUURP, you need it r-right now?” Seems that your Colonists enjoy quite a bit the new Fungahol you allowed for production.

<effect>Alcoholic Colonists gain +50 Sanity and +10 Morale for 5 Sols.
column3:
The Colonist smiled shyly, hiccupped, and said: “Well, BUUURP, you need it r-right now?” Seems that your Colonists enjoy quite a bit the new Fungahol you allowed for production.

<effect>Alcoholic Colonists gain +50 Sanity and +10 Morale for 5 Sols.

column2: Today you met a Colonist on the street and asked about their name.
column3: Today you met a Colonist on the street and asked about their name.
column4: Spotykasz jakiegoś kolonistę na ulicy i pytasz go o nazwisko.

column2:
A short investigation into the matter has revealed that a Renegade Engineer has actively been sabotaging repair parts used in the maintenance of these factories.

Citing the bad conditions and contempt they feel for the leadership of the colony as reasons for their behavior, they thought that sabotaging the mission would somehow advance their cause.
column3:
A short investigation into the matter has revealed that a Renegade Engineer has actively been sabotaging repair parts used in the maintenance of these factories.

Citing the bad conditions and contempt they feel for the leadership of the colony as reasons for their behavior, they thought that sabotaging the mission would somehow advance their cause.

column2: Our factories have began eating up a lot of electricity.
column3: Our factories have began eating up a lot of electricity.
column4: Nasze fabryki zaczęły zużywać mnóstwo elektryczności.

column2: All Factories closed for repairs after sabotage.
column3: All Factories closed for repairs after sabotage.
column4: Wszystkie fabryki zamknięte w celu przeprowadzenia napraw po sabotażu.

column2:
The flourishing gardens mixed with the unavoidable exposure to particles of dust and radiation despite our best shielding efforts has helped certain bacteria that followed us on Mars to evolve in a completely new direction.

The new organism is harmless but standard decontamination protocols suggest that it should be removed.
column3:
The flourishing gardens mixed with the unavoidable exposure to particles of dust and radiation despite our best shielding efforts has helped certain bacteria that followed us on Mars to evolve in a completely new direction.

The new organism is harmless but standard decontamination protocols suggest that it should be removed.

column2: The unique mixture of habitat conditions within the Geoscape Dome has resulted in a new kind of bacterial life form evolving.
column3: The unique mixture of habitat conditions within the Купал Краеобразу has resulted in a new kind of bacterial life form evolving.
column4: Unikatowe warunki życia w kopule krajobrazowej doprowadziły do powstania nowej postaci życia bakteryjnego.

column2: Follow the protocol and sterilize the Geoscape Dome, perhaps there is an unseen danger there.
column3: Follow the protocol and sterilize the Купал Краеобразу, perhaps there is an unseen danger there.
column4: Postąpić zgodnie z procedurą i wysterylizować kopułę krajobrazową – być może istnieje jakieś zagrożenie, którego nie dostrzegamy.

column2: Colonists in the Geoscape Dome lose <comfort_loss> Comfort
column3: Colonists in the Купал Краеобразу lose <comfort_loss> Comfort

column2: Observe the life cycle of the organism in the Geoscape Dome ecosystem - this is a unique opportunity to learn!
column3: Observe the life cycle of the organism in the Купал Краеобразу ecosystem - this is a unique opportunity to learn!
column4: Obserwować cykl życiowy tego nowego organizmu – to niezwykła okazja do poszerzenia naszej wiedzy!

column2:

<effect>Geoscape Dome will be closed off for <sols(disable_duration)> Sols.
column3:
We are forced to evacuate all Colonists until the Dome has been sterilized.

<effect>Купал Краеобразу will be closed off for <sols(disable_duration)> Sols.

column2: Crucial life-support modules of the Dome are infected with the new bacteria discovered earlier, and their functionality hindered.
column3: Crucial life-support modules of the Dome are infected with the new bacteria discovered earlier, and their functionality hindered.
column4: Istotne moduły podtrzymywania życia w kopule zostały skażone przez niedawno odkryte nowe bakterie. Wydajność ich działania zmalała.

column2:
Our understanding of what is known as "accelerated evolution" has greatly increased and has shed light on many former mysteries within the field.

<effect>Gain <research(rp)>
column3:
Our understanding of what is known as "accelerated evolution" has greatly increased and has shed light on many former mysteries within the field.

<effect>Gain <research(rp)>

column2: Observing the new life within the Geoscape Dome has proven to be of great scientific value to us.
column3: Observing the new life within the Купал Краеобразу has proven to be of great scientific value to us.
column4: Obserwowanie nowego życia w kopule krajobrazowej okazało się bardzo cenne z naukowego punktu widzenia.

column2:
The formation hints of active lava flows during a time when they were considered to have been geologically dead for millions of years. 

Calls from geologists - both from Earth and Mars - to cease work of the Extractor until the formation is properly studied, are mounting.
column3:
The formation hints of active lava flows during a time when they were considered to have been geologically dead for millions of years. 

Calls from geologists - both from Earth and Mars - to cease work of the Extractor until the formation is properly studied, are mounting.

column2: The Excavator has unearthed a rare geological formation which challenges our understanding of Mars.
column3: The Экскаватар has unearthed a rare geological formation which challenges our understanding of Mars.
column4: Czerparka odsłoniła rzadką formację geologiczną, która stanowi zagadkę dla naszego rozumienia przemian Marsa.
Wyłączcie Czerparkę na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(disable_duration)>).

column2: Continue excavating - we need the resources.
column3: Continue excavating - we need the resources.

column2: Perhaps there is something more to be discovered there. Disable the Excavator for <sols(disable_duration)> Sols.
column3: Магчыма, там ёсць што яшчэ дасьледаваць. Экскаватар будзе адключаны на <sols(disable_duration)> Солы.
column4: Być może coś więcej czeka tam na odkrycie. Wyłączcie Czerparkę na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(disable_duration)>).

column2: Gained <research(reward_rp)>. The Excavator is back in operation.

A bomb has exploded in a Spacebar. There are casualties. 

In light of our recent Renegade problem, this brazen act of violence was the final drop as far as our otherwise peaceful Colonists are concerned.

Everyone is voicing their disdain with the Renegades and demands that we take action. Ruthless action.
column3:
A bomb has exploded in a Spacebar. There are casualties. 

In light of our recent Renegade problem, this brazen act of violence was the final drop as far as our otherwise peaceful Colonists are concerned.

Everyone is voicing their disdain with the Renegades and demands that we take action. Ruthless action.

column2: Renegades: The Grip of the Lawless
column3: Renegades: The Grip of the Lawless

column2: A war between two rival gangs of Renegades has taken a dark turn.
column3: A war between two rival gangs of Renegades has taken a dark turn.
column4: Wojna między dwoma rywalizującymi gangami renegatów przyjęła tragiczny obrót.

column2: So it has come to this - our first executions on another world. Humanity will never change.
column3: So it has come to this - our first executions on another world. Humanity will never change.
column4: Zatem do tego już przyszło – pierwsze egzekucje na innej planecie. Ludzkość się nigdy nie zmieni.

column2: Never! Mars shall not be sullied by capital punishment.
column3: Never! Mars shall not be sullied by capital punishment.
column4: Nigdy! Mars nie skala się stosowaniem kary śmierci.

column2: Renegades will be shipped off the colony
column3: Renegades will be shipped off the colony

column2:
<DisplayName> couldn’t bear any responsibility anymore and lost the motivation to go on. Their co-workers fear that their colleague could make some irreparable mistakes.

<effect>Colonist <DisplayName> is unable to work.
column3:
<DisplayName> couldn’t bear any responsibility anymore and lost the motivation to go on. Their co-workers fear that their colleague could make some irreparable mistakes.

<effect>Colonist <DisplayName> is unable to work.

column2: Sanity Breakdown - Hello Darkness, My Old Friend
column3: Sanity Breakdown - Hello Darkness, My Old Friend
column4: Załamanie psychiczne – witaj, ciemności, druhu mój

column2: A colonist has snapped, and after regaining consciousness, has plunged into the deepest depression.
column3: A colonist has snapped, and after regaining consciousness, has plunged into the deepest depression.
column4: Jeden z kolonistów doznał załamania nerwowego, a gdy odzyskał świadomość, pogrążył się w najgłębszej depresji.

column2: I would suggest seeking professional help.
column3: Я б параіў зьвярнуцца па дапамогу да спэцыяліста.

column2: Together we could find the answer why the previous self was unwanted.
column3: Together we could find the answer why the previous self was unwanted.
column4: Wspólnie znajdziemy odpowiedź na pytanie, dlaczego poprzednia osobowość stała się niepożądana.

column2: This is a sensitive subject that could stir some controversy in the colony.
column3: This is a sensitive subject that could stir some controversy in the colony.
column4: To delikatny temat, który może wzbudzić kontrowersje w kolonii.

column2: With the further expansion of the colony, there is a petition among our growing religious community to proclaim Mars a holy land.
column3: With the further expansion of the colony, there is a petition among our growing religious community to proclaim Mars a holy land.
column4: Wskutek dalszego rozwoju kolonii rosnąca społeczność religijnych kolonistów wystosowuje petycję o ogłoszenie Marsa ziemią świętą.

column2: all Religious get Morale boost, all other Colonists get Morale penalty
column3: all Religious get Morale boost, all other Colonists get Morale penalty
column4: wszyscy religijni koloniści otrzymają premię do morale, wszyscy pozostali koloniści otrzymają karę do morale.

column2: Mars is for all humans regardless of their beliefs.
column3: Mars is for all humans regardless of their beliefs.
column4: Mars jest dla wszystkich ludzi, o dowolnych poglądach.

column2: all Religious get Morale penalty, all other Colonists get Morale boost
column3: all Religious get Morale penalty, all other Colonists get Morale boost
column4: wszyscy religijni koloniści otrzymają karę do morale, wszyscy pozostali koloniści otrzymają premię do morale.

column2: We value all members of the human race equally.
column3: We value all members of the human race equally.
column4: Wszyscy ludzie są dla nas tak samo wartościowi.

column2: This is absurd! Religion has no place on Mars.
column3: This is absurd! Religion has no place on Mars.
column4: To jakiś absurd! Na Marsie nie ma miejsca dla religii.

column2: Comfort of all Religious Colonists is set to 0, non-Religious Colonists get Morale boost
column3: Comfort of all Religious Colonists is set to 0, non-Religious Colonists get Morale boost
column4: wygoda wszystkich religijnych kolonistów spadnie do 0, niereligijni koloniści otrzymają premię do morale.

column2:
With a homemade explosive in their possession and extremely stressed out, <DisplayName> has the following demands:

<funding(money)> to be transferred to an unknown account in crypto currency and a Rover with which to escape to some unknown destination.
column3:
With a homemade explosive in their possession and extremely stressed out, <DisplayName> has the following demands:

<funding(money)> to be transferred to an unknown account in crypto currency and a Rover with which to escape to some unknown destination.

column2: A crisis has arisen in one of our Casinos. A Renegade has taken hostages inside the building.
column3: A crisis has arisen in one of our Casinos. A Renegade has taken hostages inside the building.
column4: W jednym z naszych kasyn zaistniała sytuacja kryzysowa. Jakiś renegat wziął zakładników i zabarykadował się w budynku.

column2: An explosive will endanger the entire Dome. Give them what they want.
column3: An explosive will endanger the entire Dome. Give them what they want.
column4: Wybuch zagrozi całej kopule. Spełnijcie te żądania.

column2: We will not negotiate with terrorists. Denied!
column3: We will not negotiate with terrorists. Denied!

column2: Send the money but apprehend the suspect as they head towards the Rover.
column3: Send the money but apprehend the suspect as they head towards the Rover.
column4: Wyślijcie pieniądze, ale zatrzymajcie podejrzaną osobę, gdy będzie kierować się do łazika.

column2: The moment <DisplayName> realized you were not about to give them what they wanted, they detonated the bomb, taking many innocent lives with them.
column3: The moment <DisplayName> realized you were not about to give them what they wanted, they detonated the bomb, taking many innocent lives with them.
column4: Gdy tylko renegat (<DisplayName>) zorientował się, że nie mamy zamiaru spełnić żądań, zdetonował bombę, zabierając ze sobą na tamten świat wielu niewinnych ludzi.

column2: A blast echoes throughout the colony As the smoke clears it becomes apparent - nothing is left of the Casino and its immediate surroundings.
column3: A blast echoes throughout the colony As the smoke clears it becomes apparent - nothing is left of the Casino and its immediate surroundings.
column4: Wybuch rozbrzmiał w całej kolonii, a gdy rozwiał się czarny dym, stało się oczywiste, że po kasynie i jego otoczeniu zostało tylko rumowisko.

column2:
When <DisplayName> received a message confirming the payment, they took an improvised gun out of their pocket and committed suicide.

Why they did this and to whom the money was transferred may never be known.
column3:
When <DisplayName> received a message confirming the payment, they took an improvised gun out of their pocket and committed suicide.

Why they did this and to whom the money was transferred may never be known.

column2: You wired the money, prepared the Rover and then something strange happened.
column3: You wired the money, prepared the Rover and then something strange happened.
column4: Twoi podwładni przelali pieniądze i przygotowali łazik, a wtedy stało się coś dziwnego.

column2:
It turns out that even Mars is not beyond the reach of stock market hiccups on our mother planet.

<effect>The import price of <name> will be increased by <price_increase>% in <sols(delay)> Sols.
column3:
It turns out that even Mars is not beyond the reach of stock market hiccups on our mother planet.

<effect>The import price of <name> will be increased by <price_increase>% in <sols(delay)> Sols.

column2: Our sponsor informs us that due to changes in the economic conditions the import price of a key resource will soon be increased.
column3: Our sponsor informs us that due to changes in the economic conditions the import price of a key resource will soon be increased.
column4: Nasz sponsor informuje, że z powodu zmian warunków ekonomicznych cena importu jednego z kluczowych zasobów wkrótce wzrośnie.

column2: Yet Earth may be within our reach as well...
column3: Yet Earth may be within our reach as well...
column4: Jednak Ziemia również może być w naszym zasięgu...

column2: the price will be increased only by <price_increase_oligarch>%
column3: the price will be increased only by <price_increase_oligarch>%

column2: I will personally negotiate special terms.
column3: I will personally negotiate special terms.
column4: Osobiście wynegocjuję dla nas specjalne warunki.

column2: the price increase will happen in <sols(delay_politician)> Sols instead
column3: the price increase will happen in <sols(delay_politician)> Sols instead
column4: teraz ceny wzrosną za następującą liczbę soli – <sols(delay_politician)>.

column2: The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase_oligarch>%
column3: The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase_oligarch>%

column2: The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase>%
column3: The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase>%

column2:
Word is that they are about to unveil a new virtual reality tech called DreamWeb. If this new tech fad catches on, it could become bigger than anything that Microsoft or Apple had ever done!

One sympathizer of our colony shared this information with us fairly early on, giving us the opportunity to invest and make a lot of money. But make no mistake, at the end of the day this is all highly speculative. If DreamWeb tanks, we will almost certainly lose most of the invested funds.
column3:
Word is that they are about to unveil a new virtual reality tech called DreamWeb. If this new tech fad catches on, it could become bigger than anything that Microsoft or Apple had ever done!

One sympathizer of our colony shared this information with us fairly early on, giving us the opportunity to invest and make a lot of money. But make no mistake, at the end of the day this is all highly speculative. If DreamWeb tanks, we will almost certainly lose most of the invested funds.

column2: On Earth, a new company is making waves on the stock market.
column3: On Earth, a new company is making waves on the stock market.
column4: Pewna nowa firma na Ziemi spowodowała zawirowania na giełdzie.

column2: We are not in the gambling business. Pass.
column3: We are not in the gambling business. Pass.
column4: Nie zajmujemy się hazardem, tak że nie skorzystamy.

column2: Send this sympathizer a bottle of something nice and get Blue Sun's tech team on the comm. We'll ride the hype train with a product of our own.
column3: Send this sympathizer a bottle of something nice and get Blue Sun's tech team on the comm. We'll ride the hype train with a product of our own.
column4: Poślijcie temu sympatykowi butelkę czegoś smacznego i połączcie mnie z zespołem technologicznym „Błękitnego Słońca”. Wskoczymy do tego pociągu z entuzjazmem i sprzedamy własny produkt.

column2: While it is uncertain if DreamWeb will survive us piggybacking on their momentum, we are projected to make a solid <return>% return on our investment.
column3: While it is uncertain if DreamWeb will survive us piggybacking on their momentum, we are projected to make a solid <return>% return on our investment.
column4: Nie ma pewności, czy DreamWeb przetrwa naszą próbę podłączenia się do jego sukcesu, ale prognozy mówią, że powinniśmy otrzymać solidny <return>% zwrot inwestycji.

column2: Our product, The Dreamfarer, went public on the exact same day as DreamWeb and is riding hard on the hype that DreamWeb had generated.
column3: Our product, The Dreamfarer, went public on the exact same day as DreamWeb and is riding hard on the hype that DreamWeb had generated.
column4: Nasz produkt, nazwany Dreamfarer, wszedł na rynek dokładnie tego samego dnia, co DreamWeb, i znakomicie korzysta z hype'a wywołanego przez pierwotny system.

column2: Preliminary damage assessment suggests that we will lose <return>% of our investment.
column3: Preliminary damage assessment suggests that we will lose <return>% of our investment.
column4: Wstępna ocena szkód sugeruje, że utracimy <return>% zainwestowanych środków.

column2: The Stock Market has closed. Results are in. DreamWeb has flopped dramatically.
column3: The Stock Market has closed. Results are in. DreamWeb has flopped dramatically.
column4: Sesje giełdowe zakończyły się i dostaliśmy wyniki. DreamWeb to całkowita klapa.

column2: Still, we have doubled our investment! The Colony's financial future looks bright!
column3: Still, we have doubled our investment! The Colony's financial future looks bright!
column4: Ale udało się nam podwoić zainwestowane fundusze! Przyszłość finansowa kolonii wygląda świetnie!

column2: DreamWeb is holding pretty well on the Stock Market – yet not even close to the levels of success it was speculated to reach.
column3: DreamWeb is holding pretty well on the Stock Market – yet not even close to the levels of success it was speculated to reach.
column4: DreamWeb trzyma się na giełdzie całkiem dobrze – aczkolwiek nie zbliżył się nawet do poziomu, który podobno miał osiągnąć.

column2:
We stand to gain <return>% return on our initial investment. The colony's financial future looks brighter than it ever was!

DreamWeb's success enabled us with the opportunity to build a grand project based on the new technology here, on Mars.

<effect>You have received the Dream Reality tech.
column3:
We stand to gain <return>% return on our initial investment. The colony's financial future looks brighter than it ever was!

DreamWeb's success enabled us with the opportunity to build a grand project based on the new technology here, on Mars.

<effect>You have received the Рэальнасьць мары tech.

column2: The first few hours after DreamWeb went public were astonishing! The new tech fad has exceeded everyone's expectations and is a smashing hit.
column3: The first few hours after DreamWeb went public were astonishing! The new tech fad has exceeded everyone's expectations and is a smashing hit.
column4: Pierwsze kilka godzin po wprowadzeniu DreamWebu na rynek były fenomenalne! Nowy gadżet przekroczył powszechne oczekiwania i stał się wielkim hitem.

column2:
Even better, <DisplayName> turned out to be one of the more prominent vloggers out there. 

Judging by the 24 karat smile they sported when leaving the Casino, it's safe to say that our budding Martian tourism hit the jackpot as well.

<effect><tourists> Tourists have been added in the Applicant pool.
column3:
Even better, <DisplayName> turned out to be one of the more prominent vloggers out there. 

Judging by the 24 karat smile they sported when leaving the Casino, it's safe to say that our budding Martian tourism hit the jackpot as well.

<effect><tourists> Tourists have been added in the Applicant pool.

column2: A tourist from Earth has won the jackpot in one of our Casinos!
column3: A tourist from Earth has won the jackpot in one of our Casinos!
column4: Pewien turysta z Ziemi wygrał ogromną sumę w jednym z naszych kasyn!

column2:
<DisplayName> feels their time will come soon and wishes to die with their boots on – on one final adventure.

They will keep transmitting data of anything they stumble upon until the very end.
column3:
<DisplayName> feels their time will come soon and wishes to die with their boots on – on one final adventure.

They will keep transmitting data of anything they stumble upon until the very end.

column2: The last living Founder asks you for a shuttle with enabled manual controls and enough fuel to make it over the horizon.
column3: The last living Founder asks you for a shuttle with enabled manual controls and enough fuel to make it over the horizon.
column4: Ostatni żyjący Założyciel prosi cię o wahadłowiec ze sterowaniem ręcznym i zapasem paliwa wystarczającym na dotarcie za horyzont.

column2: How can I deny our great Founder? Permission granted!
column3: How can I deny our great Founder? Permission granted!
column4: Nie jestem w stanie odmówić bohaterom pionierskich czasów kolonii. Udzielam pozwolenia!

column2: lose a Shuttle and a Founder
column3: lose a Shuttle and a Founder
column4: utracisz jeden wahadłowiec i jednego Założyciela.

column2: "I am eternally grateful, Commander!", says the Founder.
column3: "I am eternally grateful, Commander!", says the Founder.
column4: „Ciesz się moją wdzięcznością po wsze czasy, dowódco!”, mówi Założyciel.

column2: "I feel there is one last adventure left for me. It has been more than a privilege!"
column3: "I feel there is one last adventure left for me. It has been more than a privilege!"
column4: „Czuję, że czeka mnie jeszcze jedna, ostatnia przygoda. Praca na rzecz naszej kolonii była dla mnie zaszczytem!”

column2: We have no shuttles to spare, I'm sure you will understand. You may go on foot, however.
column3: We have no shuttles to spare, I'm sure you will understand. You may go on foot, however.
column4: Nie mamy pod ręką wolnych wahadłowców, zapewne to zrozumiesz. Ale zawsze możesz wyruszyć na piechotę.

column2: Without the slightest change in expression the Founder nods.
column3: Without the slightest change in expression the Founder nods.
column4: Nie zmieniając wyrazu tworzy Założyciel kiwa głową.

column2: "It was a selfish request by my part. I shall head out now..."
column3: "It was a selfish request by my part. I shall head out now..."
column4: „To było samolubne życzenie. Ruszam od razu...”

column2: You've been through a lot. Enjoy the rest you've earned here with us. Permission denied.
column3: You've been through a lot. Enjoy the rest you've earned here with us. Permission denied.
column4: Przeszliście już wystarczająco dużo trudów. Ciesz się dobrze zasłużonym odpoczynkiem wśród nas. Odrzucam prośbę.

column2:
"This is my final transmission.

I want to say that it has been a wild ride and I can't think of a better life worth living. I am sending what data I gathered along the journey while I am still within communication range. I think you may find some of it very interesting.

It has been an honor, Commander.

<DisplayName> over and out!"

<effect>Gained Core Rare Metals Breakthrough tech
column3:
"This is my final transmission.

I want to say that it has been a wild ride and I can't think of a better life worth living. I am sending what data I gathered along the journey while I am still within communication range. I think you may find some of it very interesting.

It has been an honor, Commander.

<DisplayName> over and out!"

<effect>Gained Core Rare Metals Breakthrough tech

column2: A transmission from the last Founder arrives:
column3: A transmission from the last Founder arrives:

"This is my final transmission.

I want to say that it has been a wild ride and I can't think of a better life worth living. I am sending what data I gathered along the journey while I am still within communication range. I think you may find some of it very interesting.

column2: A transmission from the last Founder arrives:
column3: A transmission from the last Founder arrives:

column2: See you on the other side, my friend.
column3: See you on the other side, my friend.
column4: Do zobaczenia po drugiej stronie, przyjaciele.

column2: Thinking about the Colony until the very end. You are an inspiration to us all!
column3: Thinking about the Colony until the very end. You are an inspiration to us all!
column4: Myślisz o kolonii do samego końca. Jesteś wzorem dla nas wszystkich!

column2: Only through sheer luck the Rocket managed to make an emergency landing on a safe spot, but even now there are no signs that the engine could start working again.
column3: Only through sheer luck the Rocket managed to make an emergency landing on a safe spot, but even now there are no signs that the engine could start working again.
column4: Rakieta zdołała wylądować awaryjnie w bezpiecznym miejscu wyłącznie dzięki szczęściu, nic jednak nie wskazuje, że silnik mógłby zacząć znowu działać.

column2: During flight to the Anomaly site, the engine stalled and the Rocket began losing altitude.
column3: During flight to the Anomaly site, the engine stalled and the Rocket began losing altitude.
column4: Podczas lotu do anomalii doszło do awarii silnika i rakieta zaczęła tracić wysokość.

column2: Send three rescue supply pods with replacement parts.
column3: Send three rescue supply pods with replacement parts.
column4: Wyślijcie trzy zasobniki ratunkowe z częściami awaryjnymi.

column2: pay Funding, the expedition will be saved
column3: pay Funding, the expedition will be saved

column2: Send me the schematics, and put the expedition team on comm.
column3: Send me the schematics, and put the expedition team on comm.
column4: Prześlijcie mi plany silnika i połączcie z ekspedycją.

column2: Streaming the games to Mars is technically possible but will take bandwidth that we normally use for research data from Earth.
column3: Streaming the games to Mars is technically possible but will take bandwidth that we normally use for research data from Earth.
column4: Streamowanie zawodów na Marsa jest technicznie możliwe, ale zajmie pasmo wykorzystywane zwykle do przesyłania danych naukowych z Ziemi.

column2: The Olympics are about to begin on Earth and the excitement among the colonists is tangible.
column3: The Olympics are about to begin on Earth and the excitement among the colonists is tangible.
column4: Na Ziemi wkrótce rozpoczną się Igrzyska Olimpijskie i można wyraźnie wyczuć ekscytację wśród naszych kolonistów.

column2: Not watching the Olympics was never on the table. Do it!
column3: Not watching the Olympics was never on the table. Do it!
column4: Nie ma mowy, abyśmy mieli przegapić Igrzyska. Zróbcie to!

column2: all Colonists get Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(big_timeframe)> Sols
column3: all Colonists get Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(big_timeframe)> Sols
column4: wszyscy koloniści otrzymają premię do morale, pomoc badawcza z Ziemi zawieszona na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(big_timeframe)>).

column2: Our survival depends on getting research done as quickly as possible. Even the most eager sport fans will understand.
column3: Our survival depends on getting research done as quickly as possible. Even the most eager sport fans will understand.
column4: Nasze przetrwanie zależy od jak najsprawniejszego prowadzenia badań naukowych. Nawet najbardziej zagorzali kibice to zrozumieją.
wszyscy koloniści otrzymają karę do morale

column2: Some kind of compromise should be possible – broadcast the games for a few Sols.
column3: Some kind of compromise should be possible – broadcast the games for a few Sols.
column4: Zapewne uda się zorganizować jakiś kompromis – transmitujcie zawody przez kilka soli.

column2: all Colonists get Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(small_timeframe)> Sols
column3: all Colonists get Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(small_timeframe)> Sols
column4: wszyscy koloniści otrzymają premię do morale, pomoc badawcza z Ziemi zawieszona na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(small_timeframe)>).

column2: We’ll watch the games, alright – but with holograms!
column3: We’ll watch the games, alright – but with holograms!
column4: Jasne, że będziemy oglądać zawody – i to na hologramach!

column2: Colonists get large Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(big_timeframe)> Sols
column3: Colonists get large Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(big_timeframe)> Sols
column4: koloniści otrzymają dużą premię do morale, pomoc badawcza z Ziemi zawieszona na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(big_timeframe)>).

column2: It looks like our weather predictions were a little off. The Cold Wave will probably last a Sol more than we previously thought.
column3: It looks like our weather predictions were a little off. The Cold Wave will probably last a Сол more than we previously thought.
column4: Wygląda na to, że nasze prognozy pogody były nieco błędne. Fala zimna potrwa prawdopodobnie o jeden sol dłużej niż przewidywano.

column2: As you sip your hot Earl Gray tea, a weather update comes up on your monitor.
column3: As you sip your hot Earl Gray tea, a weather update comes up on your monitor.
column4: Sączysz gorącego Earl Graya ze swojej filiżanki, a na ekranie pojawiają się nowe informacje o pogodzie.

column2: Our first priority is to make sure our power generation is in working order.
column3: Our first priority is to make sure our power generation is in working order.
column4: Naszym głównym priorytetem jest zapewnienie prawidłowego działania urządzeń wytwarzających energię.

column2: all power producers receive a free maintenance check
column3: all power producers receive a free maintenance check
column4: wszystkie obiekty wytwarzające energię otrzymują darmową konserwację.

column2: This sounds like a good opportunity to run some survival drills.
column3: This sounds like a good opportunity to run some survival drills.
column4: To wygląda na dobrą okazję do przeprowadzenia nowych szkoleń ze sztuki przetrwania.

column2: several Colonists gain the Survivor trait
column3: several Colonists gain the Survivor trait

column2: The storage tanks are frozen, but I know a way to increase our Water production.
column3: The storage tanks are frozen, but I know a way to increase our Water production.
column4: Zbiorniki zamarzły, ale ja wiem, jak zwiększyć wydajność naszej produkcji wody.

column2: <water_boost>% Water production for the duration of the Cold Wave
column3: <water_boost>% Water production for the duration of the Cold Wave
column4: <water_boost>% do produkcji wody w trakcie fali zimna.

column2: Fellow Martians, we’ve gotten through worse before. Just do your duty and don’t panic!
column3: Fellow Martians, we’ve gotten through worse before. Just do your duty and don’t panic!
column4: Koledzy Marsjanie, przeżyliśmy już gorsze rzeczy. Wykonujcie swoje obowiązki i nie panikujcie!
<morale_bonus> do morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_bonus_duration)>).

column2:
New weather data has come and the situation is dire – the Cold Wave prediction has been extended by another 4 Sols.

Our Scientists have come up with a technology that will allow us to build Subsurface Heaters to heat our buildings and prevent them from freezing.
column3:
New weather data has come and the situation is dire – the Cold Wave prediction has been extended by another 4 Sols.

Our Scientists have come up with a technology that will allow us to build Subsurface Heaters to heat our buildings and prevent them from freezing.

column2: A team of Scientists argues over the satellite data as you quietly ponder the situation. It’s going to be a long winter.
column3: A team of Scientists argues over the satellite data as you quietly ponder the situation. It’s going to be a long winter.
column4: Zespół naukowców spiera się nad danymi satelitarnymi, a ty cicho dumasz nad sytuacją. To będzie długa zima.

column2: Gather our best minds. We should assemble some Heaters immediately.
column3: Gather our best minds. We should assemble some Heaters immediately.
column4: Zbierzcie najlepszych ludzi. Musimy natychmiast zmontować trochę grzejników.
Otrzymujesz następującą liczbę prefabrykatów podziemnych grzejników – <free_prefabs>.

column2: Ration Power and Water until this is over.
column3: Ration Power and Water until this is over.
column4: Wprowadźcie reglamentację energii i wody do czasu zakończenia fali zimna.

column2: <consumption_reduction>% Dome water and power consumption for the duration of the Cold Wave
column3: <consumption_reduction>% Dome water and power consumption for the duration of the Cold Wave
column4: Zużycie wody i energii w kopule zmniejsza się o <consumption_reduction>% na czas trwania fali zimna.

column2:
New weather data has come and the situation is dire – the Cold Wave prediction has been extended by another 4 Sols.

Will our Power and Water grids sustain us for that long?
column3:
New weather data has come and the situation is dire – the Cold Wave prediction has been extended by another 4 Sols.

Will our Power and Water grids sustain us for that long?

column2: A team of Scientists argues over the satellite data as you quietly ponder the situation. It’s going to be a long winter.
column3: A team of Scientists argues over the satellite data as you quietly ponder the situation. It’s going to be a long winter.
column4: Zespół naukowców spiera się nad danymi satelitarnymi, a ty cicho dumasz nad sytuacją. To będzie długa zima.

column2: Gather our best minds. We should assemble some Heaters immediately.
column3: Gather our best minds. We should assemble some Heaters immediately.
column4: Zbierzcie najlepszych ludzi. Musimy natychmiast zmontować trochę grzejników.
Otrzymujesz następującą liczbę prefabrykatów podziemnych grzejników – <free_prefabs>.

column2: Ration Power and Water until this is over.
column3: Ration Power and Water until this is over.
column4: Wprowadźcie reglamentację energii i wody do czasu zakończenia fali zimna.

column2: <consumption_reduction>% Dome water and power consumption for the duration of the Cold Wave
column3: <consumption_reduction>% Dome water and power consumption for the duration of the Cold Wave
column4: Zużycie wody i energii w kopule zmniejsza się o <consumption_reduction>% na czas trwania fali zimna.

column2:
We have survived the Cold Wave. People are celebrating in the streets. 

It was quite an ordeal but we've learned a lot about surviving in the cold. Some of our Engineers have come up with a way to improve our Subsurface Heaters.

<effect><morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_bonus_duration)> Sols. Subsurface Heaters power consumption halved.
column3:
We have survived the Cold Wave. People are celebrating in the streets. 

It was quite an ordeal but we've learned a lot about surviving in the cold. Some of our Engineers have come up with a way to improve our Subsurface Heaters.

<effect><morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_bonus_duration)> Sols. Subsurface Heaters power consumption halved.

column2: You never thought that you’d be so happy to see the red dust of Mars again. The long winter is over.
column3: You never thought that you’d be so happy to see the red dust of Mars again. The long winter is over.
column4: Któż by przypuszczał, że ponowny widok czerwonych marsjańskich piasków napełni człowieka taką radością. Długa zima się skończyła.

column2:
This damned long Cold Wave has everybody on edge. We have to do something about the Sanity of our colonists.

Note: All effects will last until the end of the Cold Wave.
column3:
This damned long Cold Wave has everybody on edge. We have to do something about the Sanity of our colonists.

Note: All effects will last until the end of the Cold Wave.

column2: Two Colonists bump into each other accidentally. A heated argument follows. It’s not the first one.
column3: Two Colonists bump into each other accidentally. A heated argument follows. It’s not the first one.
column4: Dwóch kolonistów wpadło na siebie przypadkiem. Wynikła z gorąca kłótnia. I to nie pierwszy taki przypadek.

column2: I know! Let’s organize a winter festival!
column3: I know! Let’s organize a winter festival!

column2: Warm food and a warm bed are the answer.
column3: Warm food and a warm bed are the answer.
column4: Gorące jedzenie i ciepłe łóżko – oto właściwa odpowiedź.

column2: Colonists will consume <food_increase>% more food and take less sanity damage from the disaster
column3: Colonists will consume <food_increase>% more food and take less sanity damage from the disaster
column4: Koloniści będą zużywać o <food_increase>% więcej żywności, a straty zdrowia psychicznego spowodowane przez klęskę żywiołową będą mniejsze.

column2: double Sanity restored from medical buildings
column3: double Sanity restored from medical buildings
column4: podwojenie zdrowia psychicznego przywracanego w budynkach medycznych.

column2: Spacebars and Casinos will restore <extra_sanity> Sanity on visit
column3: Spacebars and Casinos will restore <extra_sanity> Sanity on visit
column4: kosmobary i kasyna będą przywracać <extra_sanity> zdrowia psychicznego na wizytę.

column2:
After several hours, you receive a video message from the confused Genius <DisplayName>:

"I just need some more special bits. The nabblygarbling generator would soon be ready and I can finally gather all the scubblydubs! Here’s the list! Now, go, go, and bring them to me, quickly!"

A list of complex electronic components and machine parts follows.
column3:
After several hours, you receive a video message from the confused Genius <DisplayName>:

"I just need some more special bits. The nabblygarbling generator would soon be ready and I can finally gather all the scubblydubs! Here’s the list! Now, go, go, and bring them to me, quickly!"

A list of complex electronic components and machine parts follows.

column2: One of the colony’s most prominent thinkers has gone insane, locking themselves up at their home. The neighbors report sounds of metal clinging, machinery sounds and insane laughter.
column3: One of the colony’s most prominent thinkers has gone insane, locking themselves up at their home. The neighbors report sounds of metal clinging, machinery sounds and insane laughter.
column4: Jeden z najwybitniejszych myślicieli w kolonii oszalał i zamknął się w swoim mieszkaniu. Sąsiedzi mówią, że dochodzi stamtąd metaliczny szczęk, odgłos działającej maszynerii i obłąkany chichot.

column2: After some time the genius strides out with a proud smile. "Behold my creation!" Behind rolls a clunky jury-rigged Drone with an immense booster on its back.
column3: After some time the genius strides out with a proud smile. "Behold my creation!" Behind rolls a clunky jury-rigged Drone with an immense booster on its back.
column4: Po pewnym czasie geniusz wychodzi na świat z dumnym uśmiechem. „Patrzcie na moje dzieło!” Za nim toczy się prowizorycznie sklecony dron wyposażony w ogromny silnik rakietowy.

column2:
The moment its creator activates it, the Drone is carried into the air by its rocket booster, swirling uncontrollably. The invention smashes with force against the dome and cracks it.

"Minor setbacks make me hungry", <DisplayName> says, and walks away.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered and gained the Enthusiast trait. A Dome has suffered a fracture.
column3:
The moment its creator activates it, the Drone is carried into the air by its rocket booster, swirling uncontrollably. The invention smashes with force against the dome and cracks it.

"Minor setbacks make me hungry", <DisplayName> says, and walks away.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered and gained the Enthusiast trait. A Dome has suffered a fracture.

column2: After some time the genius strides out, followed by a strange procession of clunky, jury-rigged drones.
column3: After some time the genius strides out, followed by a strange procession of clunky, jury-rigged drones.
column4: Po jakimś czasie geniusz wychodzi na świat, prowadząc za sobą dziwaczną grupę prowizorycznie skleconych dronów.

column2:
As the strange machines try to follow their creator, many of them fall apart on the streets. Many colonists giggle and smile as they witness the procession.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_perfabs> Drone prefabs.
column3:
As the strange machines try to follow their creator, many of them fall apart on the streets. Many colonists giggle and smile as they witness the procession.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_perfabs> Drone prefabs.

column2: After some time, the genius is carried out of the residence atop a chair carried by a new, shiny-looking drone.
column3: After some time, the genius is carried out of the residence atop a chair carried by a new, shiny-looking drone.
column4: Po jakimś czasie geniusz opuszcza swoje mieszkanie, niesiony w fotelu przez nowego, lśniącego drona.

column2:
"Behold my creation! Don’t worry, it’s normal to be awed by my intellect!" And indeed, the new Drone has many augmentations that make its predecessors look clumsy and old.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_prefabs_low> Drone prefabs. All Drones move <speed_bonus>% faster.
column3:
"Behold my creation! Don’t worry, it’s normal to be awed by my intellect!" And indeed, the new Drone has many augmentations that make its predecessors look clumsy and old.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_prefabs_low> Drone prefabs. All Drones move <speed_bonus>% faster.

column2: The rescue team broke into the residence of the mad genius and were met with kicking and screaming. After the accident the genius has sworn a bloody vengeance upon you.
column3: The rescue team broke into the residence of the mad genius and were met with kicking and screaming. After the accident the genius has sworn a bloody vengeance upon you.
column4: Zespół ratunkowy włamuje się do mieszkania szalonego geniusza, gdzie witają go kopniaki i wrzaski. Gdy jest już po wszystkim, geniusz poprzysięga ci krwawą zemstę.

column2: <effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has become a Renegade. <colonists_injured> Colonists have lost <health_damage> Health
column3: <effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has become a Renegade. <colonists_injured> Colonists have lost <health_damage> Health
column4: <effect>Geniusz <DisplayName> staje się renegatem. Pewna liczba kolonistów (<colonists_injured>) traci <health_damage> zdrowia fizycznego.

column2: The mad genius didn’t resist and was taken away. Several hours later, under the intense care of your team, the dark episode was forgotten.
column3: The mad genius didn’t resist and was taken away. Several hours later, under the intense care of your team, the dark episode was forgotten.
column4: Szalony geniusz nie stawiał oporu i został zabrany do szpitala. Po kilku godzinach pobytu na oddziale intensywnej opieki cały mroczny epizod poszedł w zapomnienie.

column2: Leave them alone and hope for the best.
column3: Leave them alone and hope for the best.
column4: Zostawmy go w spokoju i miejmy nadzieję, że to się dobrze skończy.

column2: After a couple of hours, the insane genius came to reality – too proud to be ashamed, but nevertheless shaken by the experience.
column3: After a couple of hours, the insane genius came to reality – too proud to be ashamed, but nevertheless shaken by the experience.
column4: Po kilku godzinach szalony geniusz wrócił do rzeczywistości. Jest zbyt dumny, by się wstydzić, ale tym niemniej to doświadczenie nim wstrząsnęło.

column2: A bit later a rocket booster cracks the silence in the dome and something flies out of the window where the mad genius was hiding.
column3: A bit later a rocket booster cracks the silence in the dome and something flies out of the window where the mad genius was hiding.
column4: Jakiś czas potem ciszę przerywa dźwięk odpalanego silnika rakietowego i coś wylatuje przez okno mieszkania, w którym ukrywał się szalony geniusz.

column2:
The flying debris swirls in the air and smashes against the dome wall.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. A Dome has suffered a fracture.
column3:
The flying debris swirls in the air and smashes against the dome wall.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. A Dome has suffered a fracture.

column2: A bit later, the genius strides out with a proud smile, burnt hair and covered in grease head to toe.
column3: A bit later, the genius strides out with a proud smile, burnt hair and covered in grease head to toe.
column4: Trochę później geniusz wychodzi na świat z dumnym uśmiechem i nadpalonymi włosami, pokryty smarem od stóp do głów.

column2:
Behind rolls a clunky, jury-rigged drone, hailing its master with cheerful beeping.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_prefabs> Drone prefabs
column3:
Behind rolls a clunky, jury-rigged drone, hailing its master with cheerful beeping.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_prefabs> Drone prefabs

column2: If you agree to this proposal, it will most likely stir some passions among the participants.
column3: If you agree to this proposal, it will most likely stir some passions among the participants.
column4: Jeśli zgodzisz się na tę propozycję, zapewne wzbudzi to duże emocje wśród uczestników.

column2: Our Colonists have been watching various talent shows from Earth and are eager to organize a contest of our own.
column3: Our Colonists have been watching various talent shows from Earth and are eager to organize a contest of our own.
column4: Nasi koloniści oglądają różne ziemskie programy rozrywkowe zajmujące się poszukiwaniem talentów i pragną zorganizować własny taki konkurs.

column2: I see no benefits of such a contest. It would be just a needless distraction.
column3: I see no benefits of such a contest. It would be just a needless distraction.
column4: Nie rozumiem, jak moglibyśmy na tym skorzystać. To byłaby tylko zbędna rozrywka.

column2: Everyone is saddened by your decision.
column3: Everyone is saddened by your decision.

column2: What a splendid idea! Let's call it "A Game of Domes"!
column3: What a splendid idea! Let's call it "A Game of Domes"!
column4: Cóż za wspaniały pomysł! Nazwiemy go „Gra o triumf”!

column2: Residents of one Dome will get a Morale boost, the residents of the Dome that places last suffer a morale loss
column3: Residents of one Dome will get a Morale boost, the residents of the Dome that places last suffer a morale loss
column4: Mieszkańcy jednej kopuły otrzymają premię do morale, mieszkańcy kopuły, która była ostatnia, stracą morale.

column2: With the tournament's end the winner Dome celebrates while all others feel down.
column3: With the tournament's end the winner Dome celebrates while all others feel down.
column4: Po zakończeniu konkursu mieszkańcy kopuły, z której pochodzi zwycięzca, będą świętować, a pozostali będą mieć doła.

column2: <effect>Residents of the winner Dome receive a Morale boost while the last placed Dome suffers a morale penalty for its residents.
column3: <effect>Residents of the winner Dome receive a Morale boost while the last placed Dome suffers a morale penalty for its residents.
column4: <effect>Mieszkańcy kopuły, z której pochodzi zwycięzca, otrzymują premię do morale, natomiast mieszkańcy kopuły, która była ostatnia, tracą morale.

column2: Our Colonists have survived everything Mars could throw at them. I would say they have already proven their talents!
column3: Our Colonists have survived everything Mars could throw at them. I would say they have already proven their talents!
column4: Nasi koloniści przetrwali wszystko, czym Mars mógł ich uraczyć. Można by powiedzieć, że już udowodnili, iż posiadają różne talenty!

column2: Stream the competition to Earth and use the event to fund the colony.
column3: Stream the competition to Earth and use the event to fund the colony.
column4: Streamujmy te zawody na Ziemię i wykorzystajmy konkurs do zdobycia funduszy dla kolonii.

column2: Get Funding, residents of one Dome will get a large Morale boost, the last placed Dome's residents suffer a greater morale loss
column3: Get Funding, residents of one Dome will get a large Morale boost, the last placed Dome's residents suffer a greater morale loss
column4: Otrzymasz fundusze, mieszkańcy jednej kopuły otrzymają dużą premię do morale, mieszkańcy kopuły, która była ostatnia, tracą morale.

column2: The publicity around the event stirred strong passions all around the colony.
column3: The publicity around the event stirred strong passions all around the colony.
column4: Rozgłos wokół konkursu wzbudził silne emocje w całej kolonii.

column2: <effect>Winner Dome's residents gain a significant Morale boost while the last placed Dome suffers a morale penalty for its residents.
column3: <effect>Winner Dome's residents gain a significant Morale boost while the last placed Dome suffers a morale penalty for its residents.
column4: <effect>Mieszkańcy kopuły, z której pochodzi zwycięzca, otrzymują dużą premię do morale, natomiast mieszkańcy kopuły, która była ostatnia, tracą morale.

column2:
Minutes later a report comes in, detailing the considerable damage done to several buildings by a Marsquake.

The epicenter of the unlikely event was pinpointed to be beneath the Mohole Mine.

The fact that the most serious damage was done to buildings within the Mine’s vicinity also suggests that the Mohole Mine has caused the quake.
column3:
Minutes later a report comes in, detailing the considerable damage done to several buildings by a Marsquake.

The epicenter of the unlikely event was pinpointed to be beneath the Шахта Мохол.

The fact that the most serious damage was done to buildings within the Mine’s vicinity also suggests that the Шахта Мохол has caused the quake.

column2: Suddenly the ground starts to rumble and office supplies begin to fall all over your cabinet.
column3: Suddenly the ground starts to rumble and office supplies begin to fall all over your cabinet.
column4: Ni stąd, ni z owąd ziemia zaczyna się trząść, a materiały biurowe zaściełają całą podłogę twojego gabinetu.

column2: Shut down the Mohole Mine and use Concrete to stabilize the foundations.
column3: Shut down the Шахта Мохол and use Concrete to stabilize the foundations.
column4: Zamknąć kopalnię Moho i ustabilizować jej fundamenty za pomocą cementu.

column2: causing more Marsquakes during the next <sols(duration)> Sols
column3: causing more Marsquakes during the next <sols(duration)> Sols
column4: w ciągu pewnej liczby soli (<sols(duration)>) będą występować kolejne trzęsienia.

column2: Lend your expertise to improve the Mohole design and prevent further accidents.
column3: Lend your expertise to improve the Mohole design and prevent further accidents.
column4: Wykorzystaj swoją dogłębną wiedzę do ulepszenia konstrukcji kopalni Moho, co zapobiegnie dalszym takim incydentom.

column2: resolve the issue without further consequences
column3: resolve the issue without further consequences
column4: problem zostanie rozwiązany bez dalszych następstw.

column2:
As you go out, two Cargo Shuttles buzz near the Dome - one actually crashes and leaves a nasty crack.

Later you learn that Renegade colonists organized a race with people actually piloting the Shuttles. One of them died in the crash.

The other pilot somehow got away after leaving the shuttle. Rumor is a race tournament is about to begin and that will last around 10 sols.
column3:
As you go out, two Cargo Shuttles buzz near the Dome - one actually crashes and leaves a nasty crack.

Later you learn that Renegade colonists organized a race with people actually piloting the Shuttles. One of them died in the crash.

The other pilot somehow got away after leaving the shuttle. Rumor is a race tournament is about to begin and that will last around 10 sols.

column2: Busy at your office one day, you decide to take a walk and breath in some of the, well, less stale Dome air outside.
column3: Busy at your office one day, you decide to take a walk and breath in some of the, well, less stale Dome air outside.
column4: Czując znużenie papierkową robotą, postanawiasz wybrać się na przechadzkę i zaczerpnąć św... to jest, mniej zastałego powietrza z otwartej przestrzeni w kopule.

column2: Close all Shuttle Hubs for <sols(time_off)> Sols to improve security.
column3: Зачыніць all Shuttle Hubs for <sols(time_off)> Sols to improve security.
column4: Zamknąć wszystkie węzły wahadłowców na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(time_off)>), aby poprawić bezpieczeństwo.

column2: We need our Shuttles operating and can't afford to stop them now.
column3: We need our Shuttles operating and can't afford to stop them now.
column4: Nasze wahadłowce muszą działać – nie możemy sobie pozwolić na przestoje.
Kolejny wyścig wahadłowców i kolejna kraksa.

column2:
The piece impressed their peers so much that they talked the shy creator <DisplayName> into sharing more of their works. What they saw left little doubt in our minds that we have a prodigy on our hands.

Already making waves on the Earth art scene, offers for the originals are reaching mind-boggling sums.

Effect: <DisplayName> has become a Genius
column3:
The piece impressed their peers so much that they talked the shy creator <DisplayName> into sharing more of their works. What they saw left little doubt in our minds that we have a prodigy on our hands.

Already making waves on the Earth art scene, offers for the originals are reaching mind-boggling sums.

Effect: <DisplayName> has become a Genius

column2: A rather quiet employee at our Art Workshop blew everyone’s mind when they shared an original work.
column3: A rather quiet employee at our Art Workshop blew everyone’s mind when they shared an original work.
column4: Oryginalne dzieła jednego z raczej cichych adeptów naszej pracowni artystycznej budzą powszechny podziw.

column2: Share their work with the world. Let it be seen in galleries on Earth as well!
column3: Share their work with the world. Let it be seen in galleries on Earth as well!
column4: Podziel się tymi pracami z resztą świata. Niech będzie je można oglądać także w ziemskich galeriach!

column2: Sell the originals for the benefit of the colony.
column3: Sell the originals for the benefit of the colony.

column4: otrzymujesz fundusze przez pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration)>).

column2: Encourage <DisplayName> to experiment in other areas. Imagine the possibilities!
column3: Encourage <DisplayName> to experiment in other areas. Imagine the possibilities!
column4: Niech <DisplayName> eksperymentuje także w innych dziedzinach. Wyobraźcie sobie potencjalne arcydzieła!

column2:
The change of perspective their alternative world view brought to the labs has inspired advances in research areas previously thought as dead ends. 

<effect>Gain <research(granted_research)>
column3:
The change of perspective their alternative world view brought to the labs has inspired advances in research areas previously thought as dead ends. 

<effect>Gain <research(granted_research)>

column2: Our prodigy's talents proved to reach far beyond art masterpieces.
column3: Our prodigy's talents proved to reach far beyond art masterpieces.
column4: Talent naszego geniusza wykracza poza tworzenie dzieł sztuki.

column2: We have lost contact with one of our Rovers - <DisplayName>. We believe the problem was caused by the Dust Storm and hopefully we will be able to locate it easily once the storm is over.
column3: We have lost contact with one of our Rovers - <DisplayName>. We believe the problem was caused by the Dust Storm and hopefully we will be able to locate it easily once the storm is over.
column4: Utraciliśmy kontakt z jednym z naszych łazików (<DisplayName>). Sądzimy, że przyczyną problemu jest burza pyłowa, i mamy nadzieję, że zdołamy go odnaleźć, gdy się skończy.

column2: The monitor shows only static as the Rover’s GPS tracker shows an error message.
column3: The monitor shows only static as the Rover’s GPS tracker shows an error message.
column4: Monitory pokazują tylko zakłócenia, a lokalizator nadajnika GPS zainstalowanego na łaziku wyświetla komunikat o błędzie.

column2: We can't wait. Send out drones to search for the Rover.
column3: We can't wait. Send out drones to search for the Rover.
column4: Nie możemy czekać. Wyślijcie drony, by go poszukały.

column2: Send out shuttles to search for the Rover despite the Dust Storm.
column3: Send out shuttles to search for the Rover despite the Dust Storm.
column4: Wyślijcie wahadłowce, by go poszukały pomimo burzy.

column2: We can use our Sensor Towers to triangulate the signal.
column3: We can use our Вежы-сканэры to triangulate the signal.
column4: Możemy wykorzystać nasze wieżyczki detekcyjne do zlokalizowania go metodą triangulacji sygnału.

column2: No reason to worry. We can wait.
column3: No reason to worry. We can wait.
column4: Nie ma się co martwić. Możemy zaczekać.

column2:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
column3:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.

column2: The lights of a Drone illuminate the dust-covered missing Rover. Unfortunately other Drones have been damaged beyond repair during the search mission.
column3: The lights of a Drone illuminate the dust-covered missing Rover. Unfortunately other Drones have been damaged beyond repair during the search mission.
column4: Światła jednego z dronów oświetliły zasypany pyłem zaginiony łazik. Niestety pozostałe drony zostały poważnie uszkodzone podczas poszukiwań i nie nadają się do naprawy.

column2:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
column3:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.

column2: The spotlight locks on to the missing Rover as a shuttle orbits the location. The search mission was successful but several Shuttles were lost in the Dust Storm.
column3: The spotlight locks on to the missing Rover as a shuttle orbits the location. The search mission was successful but several Shuttles were lost in the Dust Storm.
column4: Wahadłowiec skupia światło szperacza na zaginionym łaziku, krążąc nad miejscem jego odnalezienia. Misja poszukiwawcza zakończyła się sukcesem, jednak kilka wahadłowców przepadło w burzy pyłowej.

column2:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
column3:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.

column2: The sensor log scrolls up the screen as our Sensor Towers try to lock on the missing Rover’s emergency beacon. Finally a hit!
column3: The sensor log scrolls up the screen as our Вежы-сканэры try to lock on the missing Rover’s emergency beacon. Finally a hit!
column4: Rejestr pracy czujników przewija się po ekranie, gdy nasze wieżyczki detekcyjne próbują namierzyć awaryjny sygnalizator zaginionego łazika. Wreszcie się udaje!

column2:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
column3:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.

column2: The satellite image shows our missing Rover, completely shut down and covered in a pile of red Martian dust.
column3: The satellite image shows our missing Rover, completely shut down and covered in a pile of red Martian dust.
column4: Obraz z satelity pokazuje naszego zaginionego łazika. Jest całkowicie wyłączony i zasypany stosem czerwonego marsjańskiego pyłu.

column2:
The Rover is up and running once more. Its sensors have captured a ton of data on the Dust Storms and the most extreme conditions of the Martian environment.

<effect>The Rover’s telemetry has granted us <research(research_points)>
column3:
The Rover is up and running once more. Its sensors have captured a ton of data on the Dust Storms and the most extreme conditions of the Martian environment.

<effect>The Rover’s telemetry has granted us <research(research_points)>

column2: As the repairs are completed, our Rover’s lights and telemetry spring to life.
column3: As the repairs are completed, our Rover’s lights and telemetry spring to life.
column4: Po zakończeniu napraw światła naszego łazika rozbłyskują na powrót i jego przyrządy ożywają.

column2:
"I want you to have something nice. Here’s the menu. No need to worry about the cost, okay?"
