<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] This is a classic case of personality disorder. He needs my help.</if>
column3:
"I want you to have something nice. Here’s the menu. No need to worry about the cost, okay?"

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] This is a classic case of personality disorder. He needs my help.</if>

column2: "I am the Devil, and I have a proposal you might find intriguing." This bizarre statement comes from a rather unremarkable Colonist with a mischievous smile on his face.
column3: "I am the Devil, and I have a proposal you might find intriguing." This bizarre statement comes from a rather unremarkable Colonist with a mischievous smile on his face.
column4: Niespodziewanie zjawia się przed tobą jakiś zupełnie przeciętny kolonista i z psotnym uśmiechem wygłasza zaskakujące słowa: „Jestem diabłem. Mam dla ciebie propozycję, która może cię zaciekawić”.

column2: I don’t have time for this!
column3: I don’t have time for this!
column4: Nie mam czasu na takie bzdury!

column2: "A once in a lifetime opportunity, and you’re so quick to throw it away", he nods in disapproval, then leaves your office.
column3: "A once in a lifetime opportunity, and you’re so quick to throw it away", he nods in disapproval, then leaves your office.
column4: „Okazja, jaka zdarza się raz w życiu, a ty ją tak łatwo odrzucasz!” Z dezaprobatą kręci głową, a potem opuszcza twój gabinet.

column2: Strangely, the cameras outside pick no trace of him, and the later check throughout the colony finds no trace of him.
column3: Strangely, the cameras outside pick no trace of him, and the later check throughout the colony finds no trace of him.
column4: Co dziwne, kamery monitoringu go nie nagrały, a później nie można znaleźć żadnych śladów po nim w całej kolonii.

column2: I will play your game, let’s see what you have to offer.
column3: I will play your game, let’s see what you have to offer.
column4: Zagram w twoją grę. Powiedz, co masz do zaoferowania.

column2: The strange man cries in anguish and rushes out of your office.
column3: The strange man cries in anguish and rushes out of your office.
column4: Dziwny człowiek krzyczy z bólu i wybiega pędem z twojego gabinetu.

column2: When you run a check on him, you find nothing in the colony records, and he is nowhere to be seen on the security cameras. Rather disturbing.
column3: When you run a check on him, you find nothing in the colony records, and he is nowhere to be seen on the security cameras. Rather disturbing.
column4: Sprawdzasz archiwa kolonii w poszukiwaniu jakichś informacji o nim, ale bezskutecznie. Kamery monitoringu go nie nagrały. To bardzo niepokojące.

column2: Color me intrigued, but let’s negotiate the terms.
column3: Color me intrigued, but let’s negotiate the terms.
column4: Uznaj, że mnie zaintrygowałeś, ale porozmawiajmy o warunkach.

column2: Very intriguing, let me call for my associates...
column3: Very intriguing, let me call for my associates...
column4: Bardzo intrygujące, pozwól, że zawołam swoich współpracowników...

column2: The security Officers apprehend the strange man.
column3: The security Officers apprehend the strange man.
column4: Funkcjonariusze służby bezpieczeństwa zatrzymują dziwnego człowieka.

column2: He walks out without struggle, but later you find out that his cell is empty. He is nowhere to be found across the colony.
column3: He walks out without struggle, but later you find out that his cell is empty. He is nowhere to be found across the colony.
column4: On idzie z nimi bez oporu, ale później okazuje się, że cela, w której go umieszczono, jest pusta. Nie można go znaleźć nigdzie w kolonii.

column2: He grins. "You know, I can’t grant you ‘world peace’ or ‘end hunger’, but the list is quite impressive, right?"
column3: He grins. "You know, I can’t grant you ‘world peace’ or ‘end hunger’, but the list is quite impressive, right?"
column4: Wyszczerza zęby w uśmiechu. „Wiesz, nie zdołam zaprowadzić powszechnego pokoju na świecie ani skończyć z głodem, ale to, co mogę zrobić, jest dość imponujące, prawda?”

column2:
He waves with a smile and leaves your office, without a trace.

<effect>Gain <funding(wealthfunding)>
column3:
He waves with a smile and leaves your office, without a trace.

<effect>Gain <funding(wealthfunding)>

column2:
He turns with a smile and leaves your office without a trace.

<effect>Several new underground deposits have been revealed
column3:
He turns with a smile and leaves your office without a trace.

<effect>Several new underground deposits have been revealed

column2:
"Your people experience quite the difficulties every day, but they are tough and would rather not talk about it. Here’s how to improve their lifestyle."

The list he gives you is impressive, and so easy to implement. As he handles it to you, he turns away and disappears without a trance.

<effect>Comfort in all residences improved by <happinesscomfort>
column3:
"Your people experience quite the difficulties every day, but they are tough and would rather not talk about it. Here’s how to improve their lifestyle."

The list he gives you is impressive, and so easy to implement. As he handles it to you, he turns away and disappears without a trance.

<effect>Comfort in all residences improved by <happinesscomfort>

column2:
"Yes, it’s unorthodox, but so is the mystery of science, is it not?" Then he leaves without a trace.

The Scientists are puzzled with his suggestions, but when they test run the new method, it provides astonishing results.
column3:
"Yes, it’s unorthodox, but so is the mystery of science, is it not?" Then he leaves without a trace.

The Scientists are puzzled with his suggestions, but when they test run the new method, it provides astonishing results.

column2: He pulls out a long list, scrambled on a piece of paper. "I could take you to a mountain and show you all the kingdoms of the world and their glory, but that's a bit outdated, isn't it? Why don't you just take two."
column3: He pulls out a long list, scrambled on a piece of paper. "I could take you to a mountain and show you all the kingdoms of the world and their glory, but that's a bit outdated, isn't it? Why don't you just take two."
column4: Wyjmuje długą listę nagryzmoloną na kartce papieru. „Mógłbym zabrać cię na szczyt góry i ukazać wszystkie królestwa świata w całej ich chwale, jednak to trochę staromodne, prawda? Może po prostu wybierz dwie rzeczy”.

column2: "The choice of kings! Here’s how you could apply for additional funding. It’s a bureaucratic nightmare and it’s no wonder you missed it, but with my suggestions you will surely get what you need."
column3: "The choice of kings! Here’s how you could apply for additional funding. It’s a bureaucratic nightmare and it’s no wonder you missed it, but with my suggestions you will surely get what you need."
column4: „Wybór godny króla! Już mówię, jak możesz wystąpić o dodatkowe fundusze. To prawdziwy biurokratyczny koszmar i nic dziwnego, że nie skorzystaliście z tej okazji, ale dzięki moim wskazówkom na pewno się wam uda”.

column2: "Give me a lever, eh? If you have ran a secondary diagnostics on your scanners, you would have found this data yourself. Here, you can see obvious chemical traces. I’d check them if I were you."
column3: "Give me a lever, eh? If you have ran a secondary diagnostics on your scanners, you would have found this data yourself. Here, you can see obvious chemical traces. I’d check them if I were you."
column4: „Daj mi punkt oparcia, co? Gdybyście przeprowadzili dodatkową diagnostykę swoich skanerów, sami byście znaleźli te dane. Proszę, tu widać oczywisty chemiczny trop. Na waszym miejscu bym go sprawdził”.

column2: <effect>Several new underground deposits have been revealed
column3: <effect>Several new underground deposits have been revealed

column2: "A true leader! I wasn’t wrong about you, Commander!"
column3: "A true leader! I wasn’t wrong about you, Commander!"
column4: „Jesteś prawdziwym przywódcą! Nie pomyliłem się co do ciebie”!

column2:
"Your people experience quite the difficulties every day, but they are tough and would rather not talk about it. I heard this and that, so here’s how to improve their lifestyle."

The list he gives you is impressive, and so easy to implement.

<effect>Comfort in all residences improved by <happinesscomfort>
column3:
"Your people experience quite the difficulties every day, but they are tough and would rather not talk about it. I heard this and that, so here’s how to improve their lifestyle."

The list he gives you is impressive, and so easy to implement.

<effect>Comfort in all residences improved by <happinesscomfort>

column2: "Great choice! Here’s how to improve your analytical methods."
column3: "Great choice! Here’s how to improve your analytical methods."
column4: „Znakomity wybór! Już mówię, jak można ulepszyć wasze metody badawcze”.

column2:
"Yes, it’s unorthodox, but so is the mystery of science, is it not?"

The Scientists are puzzled with his suggestions, but when they test run the new method, it provides astonishing results.
column3:
"Yes, it’s unorthodox, but so is the mystery of science, is it not?"

The Scientists are puzzled with his suggestions, but when they test run the new method, it provides astonishing results.

column2: On a second thought, I’d rather not.
column3: On a second thought, I’d rather not.

column2: "You seemed a person who knows better." He walks out of your office. When the door closes, he is nowhere to be found.
column3: "You seemed a person who knows better." He walks out of your office. When the door closes, he is nowhere to be found.
column4: „A myślałem, że to zrozumiesz”. Wychodzi z twojego gabinetu. Odkąd zamknęły się za nim drzwi, nigdzie nie można go znaleźć.

column2:
The Devil is sitting in your chair, with his feet on your desk and the naughtiest smile on his face. He looks you straight into the eye and you feel a cold creep up your spine.

"I'm a nice devil and I will want but a small price in return for my favors. Just the souls of some of your people. Come on, so many leaders over the years had done this choice with ease, what's so hard about it?"
column3:
The Devil is sitting in your chair, with his feet on your desk and the naughtiest smile on his face. He looks you straight into the eye and you feel a cold creep up your spine.

"I'm a nice devil and I will want but a small price in return for my favors. Just the souls of some of your people. Come on, so many leaders over the years had done this choice with ease, what's so hard about it?"

column2: "We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay the price!"
column3: "We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay the price!"
column4: „Zawarliśmy umowę, pamiętasz? Pewnie, że tak, jesteś inteligentnym człowiekiem! Pora zapłacić za usługę!”

column2:
The Devil is sitting in your chair, with his feet on your desk and the naughtiest smile on his face. He looks you straight into the eye and you feel a cold creep up your spine.

"I'm a nice devil and I will want but a small price in return for my favors. Just the souls of some of your people. Come on, so many leaders over the years had done this choice with ease, what's so hard about it?"
column3:
The Devil is sitting in your chair, with his feet on your desk and the naughtiest smile on his face. He looks you straight into the eye and you feel a cold creep up your spine.

"I'm a nice devil and I will want but a small price in return for my favors. Just the souls of some of your people. Come on, so many leaders over the years had done this choice with ease, what's so hard about it?"

column2: "We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay your check!"
column3: "We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay your check!"
column4: „Zawarliśmy umowę, pamiętasz? Pewnie, że tak, jesteś inteligentnym człowiekiem! Pora pokryć koszta!”

column2: "Oh, a sudden change of heart? No worries, I would claim these souls myself!"
column3: "Oh, a sudden change of heart? No worries, I would claim these souls myself!"
column4: „Och, nagła zmiana zdania? Nie ma sprawy, sam sobie wezmę te dusze!”

column2:
His laughter hasn't even faded away and the sky is cracked by a large meteor that hits near the colony. Then they begin to fall, one after another. So, that's his way of saying "goodbye"...

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started atop your colony!
column3:
His laughter hasn't even faded away and the sky is cracked by a large meteor that hits near the colony. Then they begin to fall, one after another. So, that's his way of saying "goodbye"...

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started atop your colony!

column2: "Good, good! Let the others suffer, who cares?" He laughs maniacally and clicks his fingers.
column3: "Good, good! Let the others suffer, who cares?" He laughs maniacally and clicks his fingers.
column4: „Dobrze, dobrze! Niech inni cierpią, kogo to obchodzi?” Diabeł śmieje się maniakalnie i pstryka palcami.

column2:
The comm channels in your office start ringing - multiple death reports from the colony. People have dropped as they walked and talked to others. Everyone is in shock. That's a lot of falsified reports you have to file in now, but people can't know how or why they died...

<effect><death_toll_colonists> Colonists have died.
column3:
The comm channels in your office start ringing - multiple death reports from the colony. People have dropped as they walked and talked to others. Everyone is in shock. That's a lot of falsified reports you have to file in now, but people can't know how or why they died...

<effect><death_toll_colonists> Colonists have died.

column2:
As the commander of the Colony, you have been awarded with a lifetime award for your achievements.

Speech, speech!
column3:
As the commander of the Colony, you have been awarded with a lifetime award for your achievements.

Speech, speech!

column2: Thanks to your ongoing efforts, humanity's foothold on Mars has been cemented.
column3: Thanks to your ongoing efforts, humanity's foothold on Mars has been cemented.
column4: Dzięki twoim nieustającym wysiłkom przyczółek ludzkości na Marsie został umocniony.

column2: This honor is not my own. All our brave colonists routinely risk their lives to make our dream a reality.
column3: This honor is not my own. All our brave colonists routinely risk their lives to make our dream a reality.
column4: Te zaszczyty należą się nie tylko mnie. Wszyscy dzielni koloniści ryzykują życiem każdego dnia, by urzeczywistnić nasze marzenia.

column2: Our success on Mars is a stepping stone on humanity's path towards the Cosmos!
column3: Our success on Mars is a stepping stone on humanity's path towards the Cosmos!
column4: Nasz sukces na Marsie to pierwszy krok na drodze ludzkości do podboju kosmosu!

column2: I hope we have the wisdom to avoid the mistakes of the past as we move forward.
column3: I hope we have the wisdom to avoid the mistakes of the past as we move forward.
column4: Mam nadzieję, że dysponujemy mądrością, która umożliwi nam uniknięcie błędów przeszłości na naszej drodze ku przyszłości.

column2: Human ingenuity knows no bounds. Colonizing Mars is our collective success as a species.
column3: Human ingenuity knows no bounds. Colonizing Mars is our collective success as a species.
column4: Ludzka pomysłowość nie zna granic. Skolonizowanie Marsa jest naszym zbiorowym sukcesem jako gatunku.

column2: Built in the human psyche is that no veil will be left unlifted, no secret will remain unknown.
column3: Built in the human psyche is that no veil will be left unlifted, no secret will remain unknown.
column4: Ludzka psychika ma wbudowane dążenie do uniesienia wszystkich zasłon i poznania wszystkich tajemnic.

column2:
The offer goes like this:

<funding(offered_funding)> in exchange for <base_price_reduction>% of all revenue earned from any Rare Metal exports we make in the future.
column3:
The offer goes like this:

<funding(offered_funding)> in exchange for <base_price_reduction>% of all revenue earned from any Rare Metal exports we make in the future.

column2: A multi-billionaire and entrepreneur from Earth has caught wind of our financial troubles and is willing to lend a helping hand. For a price, of course.
column3: A multi-billionaire and entrepreneur from Earth has caught wind of our financial troubles and is willing to lend a helping hand. For a price, of course.
column4: Pewien ziemski multimiliarder i przedsiębiorca usłyszał o naszych problemach finansowych i pragnie podać nam pomocną dłoń. Oczywiście – za pewną cenę.

column2: We are not in the position to bargain. Agree to their terms.
column3: We are not in the position to bargain. Agree to their terms.
column4: W naszym położeniu nie możemy się targować. Przyjmujemy jego warunki.

column2: Heh, I know them. We offer <oligarch_price_reduction>% commission and their secrets will remain such.
column3: Heh, I know them. We offer <oligarch_price_reduction>% commission and their secrets will remain such.
column4: Ha, znam to. Proponujemy <oligarch_price_reduction>% prowizji i niech jego sekret pozostanie sekretem.

column2: These vultures want to take advantage of us. Decline!
column3: These vultures want to take advantage of us. Decline!
column4: Ten sęp chce nas wykorzystać. Odmawiamy!

column2:
The increased exposure of cosmic radiation is the possible culprit responsible for these mutations. 

Sadly, the new fungi strain is not edible as it is highly toxic in its current state.
column3:
The increased exposure of cosmic radiation is the possible culprit responsible for these mutations. 

Sadly, the new fungi strain is not edible as it is highly toxic in its current state.

column2: A new species of fungi has been observed to grow amidst the regulated one we cultivate for food in our Fungal Farms.
column3: A new species of fungi has been observed to grow amidst the regulated one we cultivate for food in our Fungal Farms.
column4: Zaobserwowano pojawienie się nowego gatunku grzybów wśród zwykłej odmiany, którą hodujemy w naszych farmach grzybów.

column2: Clear it out and check that no contamination has spread.
column3: Clear it out and check that no contamination has spread.
column4: Wytępcie je i zadbajcie o to, by skażenie się nie rozprzestrzeniło.

column2: Fungal Farms will require emergency maintenance
column3: Fungal Farms will require emergency maintenance
column4: Farmy grzybów będą wymagać awaryjnej konserwacji.

column2: Attempt to isolate the toxins and cultivate an edible sort.
column3: Attempt to isolate the toxins and cultivate an edible sort.
column4: Spróbujcie wyizolować toksyny i wyhodować jadalną odmianę.

column2: disables all Fungal Farms for <sols(duration)> Sols
column3: disables all Fungal Farms for <sols(duration)> Sols
column4: wyłącza wszystkie farmy grzybów na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration)>).

column2: They claim that their attempts to create new genetically-imprinted talents were all for the better of humankind. The case is controversial, as you could have guessed.
column3: They claim that their attempts to create new genetically-imprinted talents were all for the better of humankind. The case is controversial, as you could have guessed.
column4: Twierdzą, że ich próby wytworzenia u ludzi nowych talentów wbudowanych w genom przysłużą się całej ludzkości. Jak łatwo zgadnąć, sprawa jest kontrowersyjna.

column2: We have caught a group of Biorobotics Workshop enthusiasts who experimented on themselves without permission!
column3: We have caught a group of Biorobotics Workshop enthusiasts who experimented on themselves without permission!
column4: Przyłapaliśmy grupę entuzjastów warsztatu biorobotów na eksperymentowaniu na sobie bez pozwolenia!

column2: One of the biotech enthusiasts who recently experimented with their genes has acquired a new Trait, but at a cost.
column3: One of the biotech enthusiasts who recently experimented with their genes has acquired a new Trait, but at a cost.
column4: Jeden z entuzjastów biotechnologii, którzy ostatnio eksperymentowali ze swoimi genami, uzyskał nową cechę, ale za pewną cenę.

column2:
<DisplayName> has uncovered a new Trait hidden in the human genome, but the other enthusiasts had suffered severe genetic malformations and their health is quickly deteriorating.

<effect>The Colonist <DisplayName> has become Guru Workaholic. <suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.
column3:
<DisplayName> has uncovered a new Trait hidden in the human genome, but the other enthusiasts had suffered severe genetic malformations and their health is quickly deteriorating.

<effect>The Colonist <DisplayName> has become Guru Workaholic. <suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.

column2: One of the biotech enthusiasts who recently experimented with their genes has acquired a new Trait, but at a cost.
column3: One of the biotech enthusiasts who recently experimented with their genes has acquired a new Trait, but at a cost.
column4: Jeden z entuzjastów biotechnologii, którzy ostatnio eksperymentowali ze swoimi genami, uzyskał nową cechę, ale za pewną cenę.

column2:
<DisplayName> has uncovered a new Trait hidden in the human genome, but the other enthusiasts had suffered severe genetic malformations and their health is quickly deteriorating.

<effect>The Colonist <DisplayName> has become Guru Enthusiast. <suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.
column3:
<DisplayName> has uncovered a new Trait hidden in the human genome, but the other enthusiasts had suffered severe genetic malformations and their health is quickly deteriorating.

<effect>The Colonist <DisplayName> has become Guru Enthusiast. <suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.

column2: The biotech enthusiasts who wanted to perform genetic experiments on themselves suffered genetic malformations.
column3: The biotech enthusiasts who wanted to perform genetic experiments on themselves suffered genetic malformations.
column4: Entuzjaści biotechnologii, którzy chcieli wykonywać eksperymenty genetyczne na sobie, doznali deformacji genetycznych.

column2:
Their health is quickly deteriorating and we fear the worst scenario.

<effect><suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.
column3:
Their health is quickly deteriorating and we fear the worst scenario.

<effect><suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.

column2: We will research their idea further!
column3: We will research their idea further!

column2: <DisplayName> keeps repeating these frustrating words. Over and over. Unrelenting, the biorobot roams the dome and pursues people, screaming after them. Some even fear a violent development.
column3: <DisplayName> keeps repeating these frustrating words. Over and over. Unrelenting, the biorobot roams the dome and pursues people, screaming after them. Some even fear a violent development.
column4: <DisplayName> w kółko powtarza te niepokojące słowa. Wciąż od początku. Niezmordowany biorobot krąży po kopule i ściga ludzi, wrzeszcząc za nimi. Niektórzy koloniści obawiają się, że to może skończyć się tragicznie.

column2: "We are the Blorg. Your biological and technological distinctiveness will be befriended by our own. Resistance is futile." Clearly, the poor biorobot has gone nuts.
column3: "We are the Blorg. Your biological and technological distinctiveness will be befriended by our own. Resistance is futile." Clearly, the poor biorobot has gone nuts.
column4: „Jesteśmy Blorg. Wasza biologiczna i techniczna odmienność zostanie przez nas wchłonięta. Opór jest bezcelowy”. Najwyraźniej biednemu biorobotowi poluzowały się jakieś śrubki.

column2: We all have bad moments, be it biorobot or human.
column3: We all have bad moments, be it biorobot or human.
column4: Każdy ma czasem zły dzień, czy to człowiek, czy biorobot.

column2: The biorobot is left unattended. Many colonists file in complaints, but all goes well when their annoying fellow comes back to reality.
column3: The biorobot is left unattended. Many colonists file in complaints, but all goes well when their annoying fellow comes back to reality.
column4: Pozostawiono biorobota w spokoju. Wielu kolonistów zgłosiło skargi, ale po jakimś czasie denerwujący osobnik wrócił do rzeczywistości i wszystko skończyło się dobrze.

column2:
While they admit that <DisplayName> was extremely annoying, the other biorobots in the colony feel grateful that one of their kind was treated like a person, and not a defect object, and was given a chance to find inner strength to get better.

<effect><DisplayName> has recovered. All Colonists lost <ranting_comfort_down> Comfort. All Biorobots gain <robot_morale_up> Morale for <sols(robot_morale_up_time)> Sols.
column3:
While they admit that <DisplayName> was extremely annoying, the other biorobots in the colony feel grateful that one of their kind was treated like a person, and not a defect object, and was given a chance to find inner strength to get better.

<effect><DisplayName> has recovered. All Colonists lost <ranting_comfort_down> Comfort. All Biorobots gain <robot_morale_up> Morale for <sols(robot_morale_up_time)> Sols.

column2: Biorobots were created to complement our weaknesses. Reprogram it!
column3: Biorobots were created to complement our weaknesses. Reprogram it!
column4: Bioroboty stworzono po to, by nie wykazywały ludzkich słabości. Przeprogramować go!

column2: The biorobot is apprehended and ran through the system, its memory checked and reset.
column3: The biorobot is apprehended and ran through the system, its memory checked and reset.
column4: Biorobot został zatrzymany i przetestowany, po czym zresetowano mu pamięć.

column2:
Biorobots around the colony admit this was the best decision, but still don’t feel comfortable as one of their kind has just been treated like an object, a tool so to say.

<effect><DisplayName> has lost all Traits. Biorobots lose <robot_morale_down> Morale for <sols(robot_morale_down_time)> Sols.
column3:
Biorobots around the colony admit this was the best decision, but still don’t feel comfortable as one of their kind has just been treated like an object, a tool so to say.

<effect><DisplayName> has lost all Traits. Biorobots lose <robot_morale_down> Morale for <sols(robot_morale_down_time)> Sols.

column2: We rubbed our eyes, but no, we weren’t seeing mirages. By some weird quirk of physics the tiny pond was there – right before our eyes! After the initial excitement has passed, we need to make an important decision.
column3: We rubbed our eyes, but no, we weren’t seeing mirages. By some weird quirk of physics the tiny pond was there – right before our eyes! After the initial excitement has passed, we need to make an important decision.
column4: Przecieramy oczy ze zdumienia, ale nie – to nie fatamorgana. Wskutek jakiegoś dziwnego kaprysu fizyki jeziorko rzeczywiście istnieje i jest tuż przed nami! Gdy początkowe emocje opadają, zaczynamy zastanawiać się nad istotną decyzją.

column2: No spectrographic traces of water could prepare us for the breath-taking sight. Amidst the red dunes a tiny pond of liquid water was shimmering under the bleak sun.
column3: No spectrographic traces of water could prepare us for the breath-taking sight. Amidst the red dunes a tiny pond of liquid water was shimmering under the bleak sun.
column4: Żadne spektrograficzne ślady wody nie mogły nas przygotować na ten widok, zaiste zapierający dech w piersiach. Wśród czerwonych wydm lśni w bladym słońcu jeziorko ciekłej wody.

column2: Extract the water and conduct research.
column3: Extract the water and conduct research.

column2: This confirms an old hypothesis of mine!
column3: This confirms an old hypothesis of mine!
column4: To potwierdza pewną moją starą hipotezę!

column2: Water Reclamation Spires will cost <water_spire_discount>% less
column3: Шпіль меліярацыі вады каштуе на <water_spire_discount>% менш
column4: Iglice oczyszczające wodę będą kosztować o <water_spire_discount>% mniej.

column2: Find a way to conduct research without harming the site!
column3: Find a way to conduct research without harming the site!
column4: Znajdźcie sposób przeprowadzenia badań, który nie zaszkodzi temu cudownemu miejscu!
<research(research_small)>, +<morale_up> do morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_up_duration)>).

column2:
A young renegade, <DisplayName>, has been killed by our security forces in a tragic sequence of events. 

The colony is shocked and many Colonists are coming forward with accusations of Security Officers using excessive force when confronting mere acts of vandalism.

The community, both Renegade and non-Renegade citizens, demand justice in the form of retaliatory actions against the Officers involved.
column3:
A young renegade, <DisplayName>, has been killed by our security forces in a tragic sequence of events. 

The colony is shocked and many Colonists are coming forward with accusations of Security Officers using excessive force when confronting mere acts of vandalism.

The community, both Renegade and non-Renegade citizens, demand justice in the form of retaliatory actions against the Officers involved.

column2: A tragedy has mired the colony today.
column3: A tragedy has mired the colony today.

column2: This kind of behavior doesn't suit their station. Punish the Officers.
column3: This kind of behavior doesn't suit their station. Punish the Officers.
column4: Takie zachowanie nie przystoi ich funkcji. Ukarać strażników.

column2: all workers in Security Stations lose Morale
column3: all workers in Security Stations lose Morale

column2: The Officers were doing their jobs. No punishment is necessary.
column3: The Officers were doing their jobs. No punishment is necessary.
column4: Strażnicy wykonywali swoją pracę. Karanie jest zbędne.

column2: Your answer was met with fury from the colonists.
column3: Your answer was met with fury from the colonists.

column2:
Violent protests and unflattering slurs could be heard for several more hours.

While we do not have precise numbers, its safe to say that our renegade population has increased.
column3:
Violent protests and unflattering slurs could be heard for several more hours.

While we do not have precise numbers, its safe to say that our renegade population has increased.

column2: Close all Security Stations for <sols(sols)> Sols for retraining. This must never happen again.
column3: Зачыніць all Security Stations for <sols(sols)> Sols for retraining. This must never happen again.
column4: Zamknijcie wszystkie posterunki na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(sols)>) w celu ponownego przeszkolenia personelu. To nie może się powtórzyć.

column2: The brilliant <name> admits feeling depressed and burned out lately. They are requesting some time off work, to meditate and seek inspiration in the red wastes outside the Dome.
column3: The brilliant <name> admits feeling depressed and burned out lately. They are requesting some time off work, to meditate and seek inspiration in the red wastes outside the Dome.
column4: <name> przyznaje, że ostatnio czuje jakieś przygnębienie i wypalenie. Życzy sobie urlopu, aby medytować i szukać życiowych inspiracji na czerwonych pustkowiach poza kopułą.

column2: One of our Genius Colonists has come up with an unusual request.
column3: One of our Genius Colonists has come up with an unusual request.
column4: Jeden z naszych geniuszy wystosował nietypową prośbę.

column2: A Genius is entitled to some eccentricity. Permission granted!
column3: A Genius is entitled to some eccentricity. Permission granted!
column4: Odrobina ekscentryczności przystoi geniuszowi. Udzielam zezwolenia!
<DisplayName> nie będzie pracować przez następującą liczbę soli – <sols(sols)>.

column2: They signed for this job. Permission denied!
column3: They signed for this job. Permission denied!
column4: Kto nie pracuje, ten nie je. Odmawiam!

column2: A Genius is one of our most valuable assets. They have my special dispensation to never work again.
column3: A Genius is one of our most valuable assets. They have my special dispensation to never work again.
column4: Geniusze należą do naszych najcenniejszych zasobów. Udzielam zezwolenia na całkowite zwolnienie z obowiązku pracy.
<DisplayName> przestanie się zaliczać do siły roboczej.

column2:
Short on breath and visibly excited, <DisplayName> explains their radical idea about an entirely new way to generate the power required by the Colony's growing need. The preliminary math checks out, but there is much research to be done before the concept is put in practice.

You remember that the Genius <DisplayName> had your special dispensation to stay out of the colony's work force. Perhaps this was exactly what they needed to come up with this brilliant idea.

<effect>Micro Fusion tech has been unlocked and its cost has been reduced by 50%.
column3:
Short on breath and visibly excited, <DisplayName> explains their radical idea about an entirely new way to generate the power required by the Colony's growing need. The preliminary math checks out, but there is much research to be done before the concept is put in practice.

You remember that the Genius <DisplayName> had your special dispensation to stay out of the colony's work force. Perhaps this was exactly what they needed to come up with this brilliant idea.

<effect>Мікра сынтэз tech has been unlocked and its cost has been reduced by 50%.

column2: A colonist bursts into your office. "Eureka! I've got it!"
column3: A colonist bursts into your office. "Eureka! I've got it!"
column4: Jakiś kolonista wpada do twojego gabinetu. „Eureka! Mam pomysł!”

column2: Small groups of people talk and laugh, while others dance to the groovy music. Someone sees you and the music stops abruptly. Everyone is looking slightly guilty.
column3: Невялікія групы людзей размаўляюць і сьмяюцца, а іншыя танчаць пад завадную музыку. Хтосьці бачыць вас, і музыка рэзка спыняецца. Усе выглядаюць крыху вінаватымі.
column4: Jakaś mała grupka ludzi rozmawia i śmieje się, podczas gdy inni tańczą przy rytmicznej muzyce. Ktoś cię zauważa i nagle wszystko cichnie. Wszyscy wyglądają, jakby trapiło ich lekkie poczucie winy.

column2: The door of the command room opens and you’re hit by the loud noise. A party!
column3: Дзьверы каманднага пакоя адчыняюцца, і вас ударае моцны шум. Вечарынка!
column4: Otwierasz drzwi kabiny dowodzenia i słyszysz głośny hałas. Impreza!

column2: I expect the maintenance and efficiency reports on my desk by 11:00 local time.
column3: Я чакаю справаздачы аб абслугоўваньні й эфектыўнасьці на маім стале а 11:00 па мясцовым часе.
column4: Oczekuję, że raporty na temat konserwacji i wydajności znajdą się na moim biurku o godzinie 11:00 czasu lokalnego.

column2: Recreation is important, but duties, especially the duties of Mission Control, must never be forgotten.
column3: Адпачынак важны, але ніколі нельга забываць пра абавязкі, асабліва ў Камандаваньні .
column4: Odprężenie jest ważne, ale nie wolno zapominać o obowiązkach – nie mogą tego robić zwłaszcza pracownicy Dowództwa.

column2:
Under your harsh gaze, the team cleans up the control room and attend their action stations. You take your seat – there’s work to do.

<effect>+<morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols for all Colonists
column3:
Пад вашым суровым позіркам каманда прыбірае дыспетчарскую й ідзе на свае працоўныя мейсцы. Сядайце, у нас ё справы.

<effect>+<morale_bonus> Маральнага духу на <sols(morale_duration)> Солаў для ўсіх каляністаў

column2: What is this, a party? Who gave you permission?
column4: Co to jest, impreza? Kto na to pozwolił?

column2: Your harsh words hit them like a scourge. But they were necessary.
column3: Your harsh words hit them like a scourge. But they were necessary.
column4: Twoje ostre słowa smagają ich niczym bat. Było to jednak konieczne.

column2:
Mars is like a death-trap, ready to snap shut when you least expect it. Your people need to learn that you will never compromise the safety and success of the colony.

<effect>+<morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols for all Colonists
column3:
Mars is like a death-trap, ready to snap shut when you least expect it. Your people need to learn that you will never compromise the safety and success of the colony.

<effect>+<morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols for all Colonists

column2: Smile and wave, then leave them have it their way.
column3: Усміхніцеся й памахайце рукой, а потым пакіньце іх.
column4: Uśmiechnij się i pomachaj. Niech kontynuują.

column2: The Mission Control team had a pretty rough time so far. They earned the right to vent off some steam.
column3: Каманда кіраваньня місіяй мела даволі цяжкі час. Яны заслужылі магчымасьць адпачыць.
column4: Zespół pracowników Dowództwa przeżył ostatnio wiele ciężkich chwili. Zasłużyli na kilka chwil odprężenia.

column2:
But you know that Mars is still out there, stalking for a good moment to strike at your colony and take its toll. You leave your people have fun, and you return to your personal control station. Someone has to be on vigil.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Comfort for all Colonists
column3:
But you know that Mars is still out there, stalking for a good moment to strike at your colony and take its toll. You leave your people have fun, and you return to your personal control station. Someone has to be on vigil.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Камфорт усіх каляністаў

column2: The secret booze stash is in this locker.
column3: The secret booze stash is in this locker.
column4: W tej szafce mam tajny barek na gorzałę.

column2: You have to admit, your team needed to vent off some steam.
column3: You have to admit, your team needed to vent off some steam.
column4: Musisz przyznać, że twój zespół potrzebuje chwili odprężenia.

column2:
You join the argument of the Engineers about some nuts and bolts, then discuss the hilariously-crafted fake hypothesis of the Scientists and even taste some of the allegedly "hangover-free" moonshine of the Botanists. Who knows, there might be a grain of truth there - next morning you wake up with a smile and a light heart.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Comfort for all Colonists
column3:
You join the argument of the Engineers about some nuts and bolts, then discuss the hilariously-crafted fake hypothesis of the Scientists and even taste some of the allegedly "hangover-free" moonshine of the Botanists. Who knows, there might be a grain of truth there - next morning you wake up with a smile and a light heart.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Камфорт усіх каляністаў

column2: How unprofessional! You call this dancing? Let me show you!
column3: Дылетанты! Вы клічыцце гэта танцамі? Глядзіце як трэба!
column4: Cóż za brak profesjonalizmu! To ma być taniec? Potrzymajcie mi piwo, to zademonstruję!

column2: You couldn’t remember the last time you had so much fun!
column3: Вы ня можаце ўспомніць, калі ў апошні раз вам было так весела!
column4: Już nie pamiętasz, kiedy była ostatnia okazja do tak dobrej zabawy!

column2:
And to be honest, when you wake up in the morning, you couldn’t remember what you did at the party last night. You take the headache as a positive sign while you’re trying to reach your action station. People that see you in the corridors give you warm smiles.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Comfort for all Colonists
column3:
Прачынаючыся раніцай, шчыра кажучы, вы ня можаце ўспомніць, што вы рабілі на вечарыне мінулай ноччу. Вы ўспрымаеце галаўны боль як позітыўны знак, калі спрабуеце дасягнуць сваёй станцыі. Людзі, якія бачаць вас у калідорах, цёпла ўсьміхаюцца вам.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Камфорт усіх каляністаў

column2:
You arrive at the scene just to see a chair flying out of the window, smashing right in front of the crowd of concerned citizens. You hear the hysterical cries from inside: "Leave me alone! I don’t need to see any of you!"

As you come closer, the crowd turns towards you.
column3:
You arrive at the scene just to see a chair flying out of the window, smashing right in front of the crowd of concerned citizens. You hear the hysterical cries from inside: "Leave me alone! I don’t need to see any of you!"

As you come closer, the crowd turns towards you.

column2: A Colonist has snapped. They demand more personal space and are barricaded inside their house until their demands are met.
column3: A Colonist has snapped. They demand more personal space and are barricaded inside their house until their demands are met.
column4: Jeden z kolonistów doznał załamania nerwowego. Chce mieć więcej przestrzeni osobistej i barykaduje się w swoim domu do chwili spełnienia tego żądania.

column2: He's right. We all need more personal space.
column3: He's right. We all need more personal space.
column4: Ma rację. Wszyscy potrzebujemy więcej przestrzeni osobistej.

column2: all residences will grant more Comfort, but provide less living space
column3: all residences will grant more Comfort, but provide less living space
column4: wszystkie budynki mieszkalne będą dawać więcej wygody, ale mniej przestrzeni mieszkalnej.

column2: Personal space is a luxury we cannot afford.
column3: Personal space is a luxury we cannot afford.
column4: Przestrzeń osobista jest luksusem, na który nas nie stać.

column2: No problems! We will just build more residences!
column3: No problems! We will just build more residences!
column4: Żaden problem! Po prostu wzniesiemy więcej budynków mieszkalnych!
koszt budynków mieszkalnych zostaje na stałe obniżony.

column2: We must harmonize the living environment!
column3: We must harmonize the living environment!

column2: Home Collective tech research cost is reduced
Stress on one of our power networks is causing a massive power surge. There’s a serious threat of overloading the entire network if we don’t do something quickly.
column3: Stress on one of our power networks is causing a massive power surge. There’s a serious threat of overloading the entire network if we don’t do something quickly.
column4: Nadmierne obciążenie naszej sieci energetycznej powoduje wielki udar energetyczny. Istnieje poważne ryzyko, że cała sieć ulegnie przeciążeniu, jeśli czegoś szybko nie zrobimy.

column2: A number of red lights go off as sparks start flying from the terminal that monitors our power networks.
column3: A number of red lights go off as sparks start flying from the terminal that monitors our power networks.
column4: Terminal monitoringu naszej sieci energetycznej zaczyna sypać iskrami. Zapala się na nim cała masa czerwonych światełek.

column2: Shut down <number_of_buildings> power producers for <sols(shutdown_duration)> Sols!
column3: Shut down <number_of_buildings> power producers for <sols(shutdown_duration)> Sols!
column4: Wyłączcie budynki produkujące energię (<number_of_buildings>) na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(shutdown_duration)>)!

column2: We have successfully rerouted power to Batteries. Although they were overloaded for a while, no accidents have occurred this time.
column3: We have successfully rerouted power to Batteries. Although they were overloaded for a while, no accidents have occurred this time.
column4: Udało się przekierować energię do baterii. Choć przez jakiś czas były przeciążone, obyło się bez wypadków.

column2: We rerouted the excess power to our Batteries. Unfortunately, several of them exploded, damaging the nearby buildings.
column3: We rerouted the excess power to our Batteries. Unfortunately, several of them exploded, damaging the nearby buildings.
column4: Przekierowaliśmy nadmiar energii do baterii. Niestety kilka z nich eksplodowało, uszkadzając pobliskie budynki.

column2: I know how to contain the surge!
column3: I know how to contain the surge!

column2: It worked! The power surge has been contained without any damage to our power network.
column3: It worked! The power surge has been contained without any damage to our power network.
column4: Udało się! Udar energetyczny został opanowany bez uszkodzeń w naszej sieci energetycznej.

column2:
It worked… well mostly. We sort of blew up some cables but the Drones will take care of that.

<effect><number_of_faults> cable faults have appeared.
column3:
It worked… well mostly. We sort of blew up some cables but the Drones will take care of that.

<effect><number_of_faults> cable faults have appeared.

column2:
Oops, your calculations were a little off. I guess you should’ve used metric.
 
<effect>Several power producers and consumers have broken down.
column3:
Oops, your calculations were a little off. I guess you should’ve used metric.
 
<effect>Several power producers and consumers have broken down.

column2: They have closed off several Infirmaries by threatening the personnel inside. All this to make their point, we can guess.
column3: They have closed off several Infirmaries by threatening the personnel inside. All this to make their point, we can guess.
column4: Odcięli kilka szpitalików i grożą personelowi zamkniętemu wewnątrz. Chyba chcą nam o czymś powiedzieć.

column3: Рэнэгаты: ахова здароўя, каму гэта цікава?
column4: Renegaci – opieko zdrowotna, ty jesteś jak zdrowie

column2: Renegade colonists are protesting against the allegedly bad health conditions in the colony.
column3: Renegade colonists are protesting against the allegedly bad health conditions in the colony.
column4: Renegaci protestują przeciwko rzekomo złemu działaniu opieki zdrowotnej w kolonii.

column2: Another day in life... on Mars.
column3: Яшчэ адзін дзень з жыцьця... на Марсе.
column4: Kolejny dzień z życia na Marsie.
Wszystkie szpitaliki będą nieczynne przez pewną liczbę soli (<sols(disabled_infirmaries)>).

column2: Send in officers to disperse the crowd.
column3: Send in officers to disperse the crowd.

column2: All Colonists lose Morale for <sols(penalty_duration)> Sols
