The Colonists feel the calm projected on a subconscious level and make friendly jokes about the image of their fellow snoring blissfully. And the other Empaths in the colony are grateful for the amount of care you showed during the crisis.

<effect>The empath <DisplayName> has been saved. All Empaths gain <empathy_morale_boost> Morale for <sols(empathy_morale_up_duration)> Sols.
column3:
The Colonists feel the calm projected on a subconscious level and make friendly jokes about the image of their fellow snoring blissfully. And the other Empaths in the colony are grateful for the amount of care you showed during the crisis.

<effect>The empath <DisplayName> has been saved. All Empaths gain <empathy_morale_boost> Morale for <sols(empathy_morale_up_duration)> Sols.

column2: The empath is banished from the colony and will soon leave for Earth. It’s for the good of all, but the other Empaths don’t see it that way.
column3: The empath is banished from the colony and will soon leave for Earth. It’s for the good of all, but the other Empaths don’t see it that way.
column4: Osoba z empatią zostaje wygnana z kolonii i wkrótce wyjedzie na Ziemię. To dla dobra wszystkich, ale inni empaci nie postrzegają tego w ten sposób.

column2:
This case was a precedent. If it repeats in the future, Empaths will be treated the same, banished and ostracized from their homes. Some of them feel as if they are ticking bombs, threatening the sanity of their fellows, and fear that many Colonists will view them as a threat from now on.

<effect><DisplayName> has left the Colony. All Empaths lose <empathy_morale_penalty>Morale for <empathy_morale_down_duration> Sols.
column3:
This case was a precedent. If it repeats in the future, Empaths will be treated the same, banished and ostracized from their homes. Some of them feel as if they are ticking bombs, threatening the sanity of their fellows, and fear that many Colonists will view them as a threat from now on.

<effect><DisplayName> has left the Colony. All Empaths lose <empathy_morale_penalty>Morale for <empathy_morale_down_duration> Sols.

column2: Only Empaths could cure another Empath!
column3: Only Empaths could cure another Empath!
column4: Tylko empaci są w stanie uleczyć innego empatę!

column2: The Empaths form a line by holding hands to make their connection stronger and start walking towards their distressed fellow.
column3: The Empaths form a line by holding hands to make their connection stronger and start walking towards their distressed fellow.
column4: Empaci tworzą łańcuch, chwytając się za ręce, aby połączenie było silniejsze, i zaczynają iść w kierunku swego udręczonego towarzysza.

column2:
The tension they feel is physically visible, sweat rolling down their faces and bodies shaking with fatigue. One of the Empaths is about to collapse, but then suddenly the injured mind of <DisplayName> comes back to life. <DisplayName> stands up, smiles and hugs the rescue group. They all join hands, smiling, and give a gift to the colony by projecting their shared joy.

<effect>The Empath <DisplayName> has been cured. All Colonists gain <sanity_up> Sanity and <comfort_up> Comfort.
column3:
The tension they feel is physically visible, sweat rolling down their faces and bodies shaking with fatigue. One of the Empaths is about to collapse, but then suddenly the injured mind of <DisplayName> comes back to life. <DisplayName> stands up, smiles and hugs the rescue group. They all join hands, smiling, and give a gift to the colony by projecting their shared joy.

<effect>The Empath <DisplayName> has been cured. All Colonists gain <sanity_up> Sanity and <comfort_up> Comfort.

column2:
Sickness is rare amongst humans in this age. We were all taken aback by how unprepared we were to fight this vicious foe. Yet through aiding the mysterious patient as much as we did, we realized that he is no stranger to us. We stand by one another as humans.

The patient's stay with us was brief, but they left a changed colony behind them.

<effect>Many Colonists have gained the Enthusiast perk.
column3:
Sickness is rare amongst humans in this age. We were all taken aback by how unprepared we were to fight this vicious foe. Yet through aiding the mysterious patient as much as we did, we realized that he is no stranger to us. We stand by one another as humans.

The patient's stay with us was brief, but they left a changed colony behind them.

<effect>Many Colonists have gained the Enthusiast perk.

column2: The patient has died. We did all we could but fell short at the end.
column3: The patient has died. We did all we could but fell short at the end.
column4: Pacjent zmarł. Zrobiliśmy dla niego, co tylko się dało, lecz to nie wystarczyło.

column2: An odd chapter of our colony's history ends.
column3: An odd chapter of our colony's history ends.
column4: Dziwny rozdział w dziejach naszej kolonii dobiegł końca.

column2: Some argue that the price was too high and the disease too low a threat to make the fight worth it. Others are disappointed that we couldn't help a human being because of funding issues, yet they understand the rationale behind the decision.
column3: Some argue that the price was too high and the disease too low a threat to make the fight worth it. Others are disappointed that we couldn't help a human being because of funding issues, yet they understand the rationale behind the decision.
column4: Niektórzy twierdzą, że cena pomagania przybyszowi była zbyt wysoka, a zagrożenie jego chorobą zbyt niskie, aby było warte tych wydatków. Inni są nieco rozczarowani tym, że zrezygnowaliśmy z ratowania istoty ludzkiej z powodu pieniędzy, choć rozumieją argumenty przemawiające za tą decyzją.

column2: The patient has died. We did all we could with our relatively limited access to medicine here on Mars.
column3: The patient has died. We did all we could with our relatively limited access to medicine here on Mars.
column4: Pacjent zmarł. Zrobiliśmy dla niego, co tylko się dało, biorąc pod uwagę ograniczony dostęp do medycyny na Marsie.

column2: Several influencers on the social networks have asked about your viewpoint. What would you reply?
column3: Several influencers on the social networks have asked about your viewpoint. What would you reply?
column4: Kilku krzykaczy z serwisów społecznościowych zapytało o twój punkt widzenia. Co odpowiesz?

column2: A huge chunk of rock has been spotted near the planet. It has a highly unusual shape and the Internet has gone crazy with speculations about its nature.
column3: A huge chunk of rock has been spotted near the planet. It has a highly unusual shape and the Internet has gone crazy with speculations about its nature.
column4: W pobliżu planety zauważono wielką kamienną asteroidę. Ma ona jednak bardzo niezwykły kształt. W Internecie aż huczy od spekulacji na temat jej prawdziwej natury.

column2: Actually, our colleague <DisplayName> can explain this better.
column3: Actually, our colleague <DisplayName> can explain this better.
column4: W istocie <DisplayName> wyjaśni to znacznie lepiej.

column2: A plain rock. Ideal for carving names on it - for a price!
column3: A plain rock. Ideal for carving names on it - for a price!
column4: To zwykły kamień. Idealnie nadaje się do rycia napisów w stylu „Brajan lowcia Dżesikę” – za odpowiednią cenę!

column2: We'll place it in orbit so people can admire it forever. Because it's cool!
column3: We'll place it in orbit so people can admire it forever. Because it's cool!
column4: Wprowadzimy ją na orbitę, by mogła być podziwiana przez całą wieczność. Bo jest superaśna!

column2: <effect>All residents of <DisplayName> Dome have been converted to Renegades. The Dome is Quarantined. You are no longer allowed to build any construction there or interact with the Dome or its buildings.
column3: <effect>All residents of <DisplayName> Dome have been converted to Renegades. The Dome is Quarantined. You are no longer allowed to build any construction there or interact with the Dome or its buildings.
column4: <effect>Wszyscy mieszkańcy kopuły <DisplayName> stają się renegatami. Kopuła zostaje objęta kwarantanną. Nie możesz nic w niej budować

column2: One of our Domes has gone rogue! The population has declared independence and dubbed themselves the First Martian Republic.
column3: One of our Domes has gone rogue! The population has declared independence and dubbed themselves the First Martian Republic.
column4: Jedna z naszych kopuł wszczęła bunt! Jej mieszkańcy ogłosili niepodległość i utworzyli państwo, które nazywają Pierwszą Rzeczpospolitą Marsjańską.

column2: This is madness! We are dependent on each other and they have no chance on their own.
column3: This is madness! We are dependent on each other and they have no chance on their own.
column4: To szaleństwo! Wszyscy tu zależymy od siebie wzajemnie i nikt nie ma szans, działając samotnie.

column2: This is their right! We can only hope that we will again manage to see each other eye to eye in the future!
column3: This is their right! We can only hope that we will again manage to see each other eye to eye in the future!
column4: Mają do tego prawo! Możemy tylko mieć nadzieję, że kiedyś w przyszłości spotkamy się ponownie oko w oko!

column2: Traitors! If they are not true to the ideals of our Colony, they will receive no support from us!
column3: Traitors! If they are not true to the ideals of our Colony, they will receive no support from us!
column4: Zdrajcy! Jeśli nie wykazują poświęcenia dla ideałów naszej kolonii, nie otrzymają od nas żadnego wsparcia!

column2: I am certain that a diplomatic solution will present itself in time.
column3: I am certain that a diplomatic solution will present itself in time.
column4: Na pewno z czasem pojawi się jakieś dyplomatyczne rozwiązanie.

column2:
"All humans on Mars share a common dream - the dream of colonizing a new planet together. Sometimes, mired in our daily problems, we forget this for a while, but ultimately we always remember that this is what brought us here. Fractures and division among ourselves are not part of this dream. If the Martian Republic is to become a reality, it would be a reality that we would create together!"

<effect>We have regained control over the rogue Dome. All colonists in the Colony have lost the Renegade trait. All Colonists have increased Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols.
column3:
"All humans on Mars share a common dream - the dream of colonizing a new planet together. Sometimes, mired in our daily problems, we forget this for a while, but ultimately we always remember that this is what brought us here. Шчыліны and division among ourselves are not part of this dream. If the Martian Republic is to become a reality, it would be a reality that we would create together!"

<effect>We have regained control over the rogue Dome. All colonists in the Colony have lost the Renegade trait. All Colonists have increased Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols.

column2: Our colony is united once again! The rogue dome has rejoined us. Here is a statement from their leaders:
column3: Our colony is united once again! The rogue dome has rejoined us. Here is a statement from their leaders:
column4: Nasza kolonia jest ponownie zjednoczona! Zbuntowana kopuła wróciła do nas. Oto oświadczenie wygłoszone przez jej przywódców:

column2: We are glad that our brothers and sisters have remembered our common Dream.
column3: We are glad that our brothers and sisters have remembered our common Dream.
column4: Cieszymy się, że nasi bracia i siostry przypomnieli sobie o naszym wspólnym marzeniu.

column2: Welcome them, but keep a close watch on this Dome. Next time we will not be so lenient.
column3: Welcome them, but keep a close watch on this Dome. Next time we will not be so lenient.
column4: Powitajmy ich – ale bacznie obserwujmy tę kopułę. Następnym razem nie będziemy tak pobłażliwi.

column2:
The average colonist perceived the entire chain of events as a tragedy and it had devastating effects on the Morale of our entire Colony. It will take a lot of hard work to regain the trust of our people.

<effect>A wave of Renegades has appeared throughout the Colony. At least we regained control over the now empty <DisplayName> Dome.
column3:
The average colonist perceived the entire chain of events as a tragedy and it had devastating effects on the Morale of our entire Colony. It will take a lot of hard work to regain the trust of our people.

<effect>A wave of Renegades has appeared throughout the Colony. At least we regained control over the now empty <DisplayName> Dome.

column2: The First Martian Republic is no more. The entire population of the rogue Dome is now deceased.
column3: The First Martian Republic is no more. The entire population of the rogue Dome is now deceased.
column4: Pierwsza Rzeczpospolita Marsjańska przestała istnieć. Cała populacja zbuntowanej kopuły jest martwa.

column2: What a pointless waste of human life...
column3: What a pointless waste of human life...

column2:
Susie, our little stowaway, visibly around 8 years old, managed to somehow bypass all security measures by sheer luck and sneaked onboard during pre-launch. Scared, but excited, she explains that she wants to live on Mars and begs you to let her stay in the colony.

This incident was already reported to Earth and her billionaire father has offered a significant reward for her safe return.  Keeping her in the Colony will certainly create a PR and political nightmare.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] Interviewing Susie, you discover a huge potential in her and intelligence far beyond what her age would suggest.</if>
column3:
Susie, our little stowaway, visibly around 8 years old, managed to somehow bypass all security measures by sheer luck and sneaked onboard during pre-launch. Scared, but excited, she explains that she wants to live on Mars and begs you to let her stay in the colony.

This incident was already reported to Earth and her billionaire father has offered a significant reward for her safe return.  Keeping her in the Colony will certainly create a PR and political nightmare.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] Interviewing Susie, you discover a huge potential in her and intelligence far beyond what her age would suggest.</if>

column2: get a child Colonist, lose <fundingloss>% Funding
column3: get a child Colonist, lose <fundingloss>% Funding

column2:
Susie, our little stowaway, visibly around 8 years old, managed to somehow bypass all security measures by sheer luck and sneaked onboard during pre-launch. Scared, but excited, she explains that she wants to live on Mars and begs you to let her stay in the colony.

This incident was already reported to Earth and her billionaire father has offered a significant reward for her safe return.  Keeping her in the Colony will certainly create a PR and political nightmare.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] Interviewing Susie, you spot the telltale signs of unhappy childhood and neglect back home. Perhaps she would be happier here?</if>
column3:
Susie, our little stowaway, visibly around 8 years old, managed to somehow bypass all security measures by sheer luck and sneaked onboard during pre-launch. Scared, but excited, she explains that she wants to live on Mars and begs you to let her stay in the colony.

This incident was already reported to Earth and her billionaire father has offered a significant reward for her safe return.  Keeping her in the Colony will certainly create a PR and political nightmare.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] Interviewing Susie, you spot the telltale signs of unhappy childhood and neglect back home. Perhaps she would be happier here?</if>

column2: A young girl was discovered on board of the Founders' rocket!
column3: A young girl was discovered on board of the Founders' rocket!
column4: Na pokładzie rakiety Założycieli znaleziono małą dziewczynkę!

column2: Mars is no place for a child. Return her to Earth on the next flight!
column3: Mars is no place for a child. Return her to Earth on the next flight!
column4: Mars to nie miejsce dla dziecka. Wyślijcie ją z powrotem na Ziemię najbliższą rakietą!

column2: She is a true Founder and should stay in the Colony!
column3: She is a true Founder and should stay in the Colony!
column4: Ona jest prawdziwym Założycielem i powinna zostać w kolonii!

column2: get a child Colonist, lose <fundingloss>% Funding
column3: get a child Colonist, lose <fundingloss>% Funding

column2: Let her stay, I will deal with all consequences myself!
column3: Let her stay, I will deal with all consequences myself!
column4: Niech zostanie, konsekwencjami zajmę się osobiście!

column2: <name> has grown up to become a Genius!
column3: <name> has grown up to become a Genius!

column2:
“My whole life I felt like I had to go to Mars. I’ve kept dreaming about a place and now I have the money to do it. But I need your aid. Something big has got to be on these coordinates!”

All in all, Douglas Quaid wants you to organize an expedition to the coordinates where his little craft would land. What would happen there is anyone's guess...
column3:
“My whole life I felt like I had to go to Mars. I’ve kept dreaming about a place and now I have the money to do it. But I need your aid. Something big has got to be on these coordinates!”

All in all, Douglas Quaid wants you to organize an expedition to the coordinates where his little craft would land. What would happen there is anyone's guess...

column2: You are contacted by Douglas Quaid, a strong-built Earthling with a thick accent. His request seems nonsensical, but somehow you feel that you trust the guy.
column3: You are contacted by Douglas Quaid, a strong-built Earthling with a thick accent. His request seems nonsensical, but somehow you feel that you trust the guy.
column4: Skontaktował się z tobą Douglas Quaid, potężny, umięśniony Ziemianin o silnym akcencie. Jego prośba wydaje się nonsensowna, ale masz wrażenie, że należy mu zaufać.

column2: Douglas Quaid nods in approval and rewards you with a wide charming smile.
column3: Douglas Quaid nods in approval and rewards you with a wide charming smile.
column4: Douglas Quaid kiwa głową z aprobatą i nagradza cię szerokim uśmiechem.

column2:
He then sends you the coordinates of the spot where he will land. Now, it’s up to you to hold your promise.

<effect>A new Planetary Anomaly “Quaid Expedition” has been added. Send an expedition to it to follow Douglas Quaid’s sixth sense.
column3:
He then sends you the coordinates of the spot where he will land. Now, it’s up to you to hold your promise.

<effect>A new Planetary Anomaly “Quaid Expedition” has been added. Send an expedition to it to follow Douglas Quaid’s sixth sense.

column2: Rendezvous with Douglas Quaid to help him follow his sixth sense.
column3: Rendezvous with Douglas Quaid to help him follow his sixth sense.
column4: Leć na spotkanie Douglasa Quaida, by pomóc mu w rozszyfrowaniu wskazówek jego szóstego zmysłu.

column2:
The epicenter of the tremors registers at the exact location where Douglas Quaid led the expedition team – and they aren’t responding!

<effect>The Expedition is delayed.
column3:
The epicenter of the tremors registers at the exact location where Douglas Quaid led the expedition team – and they aren’t responding!

<effect>The Expedition is delayed.

column2: Total Recall: Douglas Quaid, Come In!
column3: Total Recall: Douglas Quaid, Come In!
column4: Pamięć absolutna – Douglas Quaid, zgłoś się!

column2: The vibrations shook the entire colony.
column3: The vibrations shook the entire colony.

column2:
The expedition landed at their coordinates, and after a short search Douglas Quaid came across a vast underground cave. There they found the immense alien artifact, some sort of a machine.

Quaid approached it and pressed something which started the machine. The tremors caused the rock to cave-in, nearly burying the team alive, but they made it to safety!

The artifact somehow generated or revealed previously unknown resources, making Mars a bit more hospitable for sentient beings. Of course, Douglas Quaid chose exactly what we needed!
column3:
The expedition landed at their coordinates, and after a short search Douglas Quaid came across a vast underground cave. There they found the immense alien artifact, some sort of a machine.

Quaid approached it and pressed something which started the machine. The tremors caused the rock to cave-in, nearly burying the team alive, but they made it to safety!

The artifact somehow generated or revealed previously unknown resources, making Mars a bit more hospitable for sentient beings. Of course, Douglas Quaid chose exactly what we needed!
column4:
Ekspedycja wylądowała we wskazanym miejscu i po krótkich poszukiwaniach Douglas Quaid natknął się na wielką grotę. Znajdował się w niej ogromny artefakt obcego pochodzenia – jakaś nieznana maszyna.

Quaid podszedł do niej i nacisnął coś, co ją uruchomiło. Spowodowane tym wstrząsy doprowadziły do zawalenia się jaskini, co prawie pogrzebało żywcem ekspedycję, jednak nasi ludzie zdołali uciec na powierzchnię!

Artefakt jakimś sposobem wytworzył albo ujawnił nieznane wcześniej złoża surowców, dzięki czemu Mars stał się trochę gościnniejszy dla istot rozumnych. Oczywiście Douglas Quaid wybrał dokładnie to, czego potrzebujemy!

column2: Douglas Quaid, reporting in! The expedition team is alive, and their report seems like something out of a movie!
column3: Douglas Quaid, reporting in! The expedition team is alive, and their report seems like something out of a movie!
column4: Tu Douglas Quaid! Członkowie ekspedycji żyją, a ich raport brzmi jak gotowy scenariusz filmowy!

column2: More Water is always a good idea!
column3: More Water is always a good idea!

column2: Those Metal veins will help us expand for sure!
column3: Those Metal veins will help us expand for sure!
column4: Te żyły metali na pewno pomogą nam w rozwijaniu kolonii!

column2: Rare Metals would always be of use!
column3: Rare Metals would always be of use!

column2: new Rare Metals Deposits are revealed
column3: new Rare Metals Deposits are revealed

column2: The tourist wanders away and you can’t resist the urge to come up with a good, inspiring slogan.
column3: The tourist wanders away and you can’t resist the urge to come up with a good, inspiring slogan.
column4: Turysta odchodzi, a ty nie możesz się oprzeć i zaczynasz wymyślać zachęcające hasła.

column2: A jaunty tourist approaches you on the street. "Let me give you a tip – you need a simple tourism campaign and people would be dying to visit Mars. Why don’t you start with a catchy slogan?"
column3: A jaunty tourist approaches you on the street. "Let me give you a tip – you need a simple tourism campaign and people would be dying to visit Mars. Why don’t you start with a catchy slogan?"
column4: Na ulicy podchodzi do ciebie jakiś beztroski turysta. „Dam wam pewną wskazówkę – wystarczy dobra kampania reklamowa turystyki i ludzie zaczną walić na Marsa drzwiami i oknami. Może na początek wymyślicie jakiś chwytliwy slogan?”

column2: Unsurprisingly, the new slogan became viral within hours of its release.
column3: Unsurprisingly, the new slogan became viral within hours of its release.
column4: Zgodnie z oczekiwaniami nowy marsjański slogan opanowuje Internet w kilka godzin po upublicznieniu.

column2:
Your e-mail is now clogged with requests to accept various wealthy tourists in the colony, as well as many more who just cannot afford it.

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus> Tourist applicants available
column3:
Your e-mail is now clogged with requests to accept various wealthy tourists in the colony, as well as many more who just cannot afford it.

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus> Tourist applicants available

column2: Organize an online competition about the Martian tourism slogan!
column3: Organize an online competition about the Martian tourism slogan!
column4: Zorganizuj konkurs w sieci na marsjański slogan turystyczny!

column2: Maybe it sounded better than it turned out.
column3: Maybe it sounded better than it turned out.
column4: Najwyraźniej rzeczywistość okazała się inna od oczekiwań.

column2:
Within mere hours users from an infamous online image board flooded the campaign with such proposals that you didn’t dare write them in your mission log. After shutting it down, you just chose "Mars – have it your way!" and called it a day.

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus> Tourist applicants available
column3:
Within mere hours users from an infamous online image board flooded the campaign with such proposals that you didn’t dare write them in your mission log. After shutting it down, you just chose "Mars – have it your way!" and called it a day.

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus> Tourist applicants available

column2:
When approached, the probe projected a message of complex cyphers and codes. It’s definitely something of human origin, no aliens there, for better or worse, but questions still remain. Who put it there? What is the message? What’s the purpose of all this?

<effect> A new technology has been revealed - The Cypher. Research it to decode the signal’s meaning.
column3:
When approached, the probe projected a message of complex cyphers and codes. It’s definitely something of human origin, no aliens there, for better or worse, but questions still remain. Who put it there? What is the message? What’s the purpose of all this?

<effect> A new technology has been revealed - The Cypher. Research it to decode the signal’s meaning.

column2: Following a signal of exact mathematical sequences, the expedition has discovered a tiny probe buried in the sand.
column3: Following a signal of exact mathematical sequences, the expedition has discovered a tiny probe buried in the sand.
column4: Idąc śladem sygnału zawierającego precyzyjne ciągi matematyczne, ekspedycja odkryła małą sondę zagrzebaną w piasku.

column2: I've read enough sci-fi to have some ideas!
column3: I've read enough sci-fi to have some ideas!
column4: Dane mi było przeczytać wystarczająco dużo książek SF, by wiedzieć, o co chodzi!

column2: A location which is supposed to hide a precious treasure.
column3: A location which is supposed to hide a precious treasure.
column4: Miejsce, w którym podobno jest ukryty skarb.

column2: <effect>A new Planetary Anomaly has been discovered – "X Marks the Spot". Send an expedition to the coordinates!
column3: <effect>A new Planetary Anomaly has been discovered – "X Marks the Spot". Send an expedition to the coordinates!
column4: <effect>Odkryto nową anomalię planetarną – „Skarb jest tu”. Wyślij ekspedycję do miejsca wskazanego przez współrzędne!

column2: After quite the hassle with the strange coding, your Scientists manage to decode the message from the strange pod. It’s a map!
column3: After quite the hassle with the strange coding, your Scientists manage to decode the message from the strange pod. It’s a map!
column4: Poświęciwszy mnóstwo wysiłku na złamanie dziwnego kodu, naukowcy rozszyfrowali wiadomość z dziwnej sondy. To mapa!

column2: It becomes apparent that the cube is made of Martian concrete, not unlike the one you’ve been using for so long. There are no doors or any other protrusions, but after circling around the structure, the expedition discovers a distinct red circular shape that suspiciously looks like a big red button.
column3: It becomes apparent that the cube is made of Martian concrete, not unlike the one you’ve been using for so long. There are no doors or any other protrusions, but after circling around the structure, the expedition discovers a distinct red circular shape that suspiciously looks like a big red button.
column4: Jest oczywiste, że kostka jest zbudowana z marsjańskiego cementu, całkiem podobnego do tego, którego kolonia używa już tak długo. Nie ma w niej drzwi ani żadnych wystających części, ale okrążywszy budowlę, ekspedycja odkryła rzucające się w oczy czerwone kółko, które podejrzanie przypomina wielki przycisk.

column2: The expedition has landed on the mysterious coordinates. Even before the dust has settled, the visual telemetry shows a distinct cubical shape not far from the landing zone.
column3: The expedition has landed on the mysterious coordinates. Even before the dust has settled, the visual telemetry shows a distinct cubical shape not far from the landing zone.
column4: Ekspedycja wylądowała w miejscu wskazanym przez tajemnicze współrzędne. Jeszcze zanim pył opadł na ziemię, telemetria wizualna pokazała wyraźny sześcienny obiekt znajdujący się niedaleko od miejsca lądowania.

column2: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column3: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column4: Grunt drży, gdy ściany budynku zsuwają się pod ziemię, odsłaniając wielki metalowy pojemnik, owinięty kolorowym papierem i obwiązany czerwoną wstążką.

column2:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – Dome Spire prefabs!

<effect>The expedition will return with <prefab_amount> Spire Prefabs!
column3:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – Dome Spire prefabs!

<effect>The expedition will return with <prefab_amount> Spire Prefabs!

column2: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column3: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column4: Grunt drży, gdy ściany budynku zsuwają się pod ziemię, odsłaniając wielki metalowy pojemnik, owinięty kolorowym papierem i obwiązany czerwoną wstążką.

column2:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – Food! And not just any kind of food, but delicious products which cannot be found on Mars otherwise, all well-preserved in polymer foam. The colony would have quite the feast, to be sure!

<effect>The expedition will return with <food(food_amount)>. All Colonists gain <morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_bonus_sols)> Sols.
column3:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – Food! And not just any kind of food, but delicious products which cannot be found on Mars otherwise, all well-preserved in polymer foam. The colony would have quite the feast, to be sure!

<effect>The expedition will return with <food(food_amount)>. All Colonists gain <morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_bonus_sols)> Sols.

column2: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column3: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column4: Grunt drży, gdy ściany budynku zsuwają się pod ziemię, odsłaniając wielki metalowy pojemnik, owinięty kolorowym papierem i obwiązany czerwoną wstążką.

column2:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – tons of advanced resources, readied for use, just laying there!

<effect>The expedition will return with <polymers(polymer_amount)>, <electronics(electronics_amount)> and <machineparts(machine_amount)>.
column3:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – tons of advanced resources, readied for use, just laying there!

<effect>The expedition will return with <polymers(polymer_amount)>, <electronics(electronics_amount)> and <machineparts(machine_amount)>.

column2: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column3: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
column4: Grunt drży, gdy ściany budynku zsuwają się pod ziemię, odsłaniając wielki metalowy pojemnik, owinięty kolorowym papierem i obwiązany czerwoną wstążką.

column2:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents. Inside, there’s another box. When opened, the box reveals another, smaller box. After several hours of unboxing, the expedition reaches a tiny box, inside of which there’s a check for an outrageously large sum of money. It was worth it!

<effect>The expedition will return with <funding(funding_reward)>.
column3:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents. Inside, there’s another box. When opened, the box reveals another, smaller box. After several hours of unboxing, the expedition reaches a tiny box, inside of which there’s a check for an outrageously large sum of money. It was worth it!

<effect>The expedition will return with <funding(funding_reward)>.

column2:
We have info that a major move is planned by one of the bigger gangs against their rivals.

Lately, a lot of homemade weapons have started circulating the Domes and we fear this will be a bloody showdown.
column3:
We have info that a major move is planned by one of the bigger gangs against their rivals.

Lately, a lot of homemade weapons have started circulating the Domes and we fear this will be a bloody showdown.

column2: Our Renegade situation has gotten out of control as of late, with many Renegade colonists joining gangs spread around the Domes, competing for territories.
column3: Our Renegade situation has gotten out of control as of late, with many Renegade colonists joining gangs spread around the Domes, competing for territories.
column4: Nasz problem z renegatami wymyka się ostatnio spod kontroli – wielu kolonistów wstępuje do gangów rozplenionych po kopułach i rywalizujących o wpływy.

column2: Let them fight it out. We won't risk the lives of our Officers for this.
column3: Let them fight it out. We won't risk the lives of our Officers for this.
column4: A niech się powybijają. Nie będziemy ryzykować życia naszych strażników.

column2: The renegades clashed both inside and outside the domes - using melee and ranged weapons of various quality.
column3: The renegades clashed both inside and outside the domes - using melee and ranged weapons of various quality.
column4: Renegaci stoczyli regularne bitwy zarówno w kopułach, jak i poza nimi, używając różnej jakości broni dystansowej i do walki wręcz.

column2: <casulties_big> were dead before the fighting stopped. This will be remembered as a very grim day in our history.
column3: <casulties_big> were dead before the fighting stopped. This will be remembered as a very grim day in our history.
column4: Zanim walki ustały, liczba ofiar sięgnęła <casulties_big>. Ten dzień zostanie zapamiętany jako bardzo ponura chwila w naszej historii.

column2: Send in the Officers. We don't need open gang warfare in our fragile habitats.
column3: Send in the Officers. We don't need open gang warfare in our fragile habitats.
column4: Wyślijcie strażników. Nie potrzebujemy otwartej wojny gangów w naszych delikatnych habitatach.

column2: Our officers tried to stop the clash between the renegade gangs but ended up caught in between.
column3: Our officers tried to stop the clash between the renegade gangs but ended up caught in between.
column4: Nasi strażnicy usiłowali przerwać starcia między gangami, lecz ostatecznie dostali się w dwa ognie.

column2:
After it quickly became apparent that the gang bangers were under equipped and out-classed by the well trained officers, they quickly fled. 

Sadly, several officers were killed in the incident, as were several renegades.
column3:
After it quickly became apparent that the gang bangers were under equipped and out-classed by the well trained officers, they quickly fled. 

Sadly, several officers were killed in the incident, as were several renegades.

column2: Pay off the leaders of the gangs to abandon these plans.
column3: Pay off the leaders of the gangs to abandon these plans.
column4: Zapłać przywódcom gangów, by zrezygnowali ze swoich planów.

column2:
Obviously, the Celebrity had too much of public attention focused on personal matters that other people are privileged not to share. Now, <DisplayName> is running naked in the dome, screaming:

"Is that what you wanted? Here, have it all!"

This could have a disastrous effect on the reputation of anyone in these days, especially when someone uploads the video online. Which is about to happen when we make our next data transmission to Earth.
column3:
Obviously, the Celebrity had too much of public attention focused on personal matters that other people are privileged not to share. Now, <DisplayName> is running naked in the dome, screaming:

"Is that what you wanted? Here, have it all!"

This could have a disastrous effect on the reputation of anyone in these days, especially when someone uploads the video online. Which is about to happen when we make our next data transmission to Earth.

column2: A well-known Celebrity has lost it and is now making a shameful display around the Dome. The Colonists are in shock and don’t know how to react!
column3: A well-known Celebrity has lost it and is now making a shameful display around the Dome. The Colonists are in shock and don’t know how to react!
column4: Pewien dobrze znany sławny kolonista utracił panowanie nad sobą i obnaża się publicznie po całej kopule. Pozostali koloniści są zszokowani i nie wiedzą, jak zareagować!

column2: The Celebrity gets to keep their good reputation, but the other Colonists are infuriated with such displays of power and attempts to censor their communications.
column3: The Celebrity gets to keep their good reputation, but the other Colonists are infuriated with such displays of power and attempts to censor their communications.
column4: Sławny kolonista zachowuje swoją dobrą reputację, ale inni są rozwścieczeni próbą cenzurowania łączności przez władze.
<effect>Wszyscy koloniści tracą <morale_down> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_down_time)>).

column2: This is a valuable display of social criticism!
column3: This is a valuable display of social criticism!

column2:
Albeit the biggest such incident lately, it is not the first. We suspect a gang of renegades led by a self-declared Street King named <DisplayName> to be responsible.

So far they have always smartly evaded our attempts to catch them in the act.
column3:
Albeit the biggest such incident lately, it is not the first. We suspect a gang of renegades led by a self-declared Street King named <DisplayName> to be responsible.

So far they have always smartly evaded our attempts to catch them in the act.

column2: Vandals have sprayed obscene signs and drawings on several factories this night.
column3: Vandals have sprayed obscene signs and drawings on several factories this night.
column4: W nocy wandale namalowali obsceniczne znaki i obrazy na kilku fabrykach.

column2: Clean up the factories and make sure this doesn't happen again.
column3: Clean up the factories and make sure this doesn't happen again.
column4: Umyjcie budynki i postarajcie się, aby to się nigdy nie powtórzyło.

column2: We can't stop the factories right now. The workers will have to tolerate the drawings.
column3: We can't stop the factories right now. The workers will have to tolerate the drawings.
column4: Nie możemy teraz zatrzymać fabryk. Robotnicy będą musieli wytrzymać z tymi malunkami.

column2: Use a Rover as a trap and attempt to catch the leader.
column3: Use a Rover as a trap and attempt to catch the leader.
column4: Użyj łazika jako przynęty, by schwytać przywódcę.

column2:
After some commotion, the renegades ran away but the so-called Street King was captured and brought to your office.

You look the Renegade in the eyes. Yet you see intelligence and you see potential.
column3:
After some commotion, the renegades ran away but the so-called Street King was captured and brought to your office.

You look the Renegade in the eyes. Yet you see intelligence and you see potential.

column2: The vandals have fallen for your trap. They just couldn't resist vandalizing the "unwatched" rover just idling there.
column3: The vandals have fallen for your trap. They just couldn't resist vandalizing the "unwatched" rover just idling there.
column4: Wandale wpadli w twoją pułapkę. Nie mogli się oprzeć możliwości zabazgrania „niepilnowanego” łazika.

column2: A two hour scolding session seems in order. Then a wristband to always monitor the kid.
column3: A two hour scolding session seems in order. Then a wristband to always monitor the kid.
column4: Dwugodzinna sesja opierniczu powinna wystarczyć. A potem załóżcie mu bransoletę monitoringu, żebyśmy zawsze wiedzieli, gdzie się kręci.

column2: Convince <DisplayName> that they could put their talents to improving the Colony instead.
column3: Convince <DisplayName> that they could put their talents to improving the Colony instead.
column4: Przekonaj kolonistę nazwiskiem <DisplayName>, że mógłby spożytkować swoje talenty dla korzyści całej kolonii.

column2: Clarify how difficult survival on Mars is and that such actions make things harder.
column3: Clarify how difficult survival on Mars is and that such actions make things harder.
column4: Wyjaśnij, jak trudno przetrwać na Marsie, i że takie poczynania jeszcze to utrudniają.

column2: Have a nice chat about the positive side of our live on Mars.
column3: Have a nice chat about the positive side of our live on Mars.
column4: Pogawędź z nim o dodatnich stronach życia na Marsie.

column2:
Running naked with a wrench in hand, <DisplayName> has already managed to injure several people!

<effect><injured_people> Colonists have suffered -<health_damage> Health.
column3:
Running naked with a wrench in hand, <DisplayName> has already managed to injure several people!

<effect><injured_people> Colonists have suffered -<health_damage> Health.

column2: A Colonist has snapped and has started attacking others around the Dome!
column3: A Colonist has snapped and has started attacking others around the Dome!
column4: Jeden z kolonistów załamał się i zaczął atakować innych mieszkańców kopuły!

column2: Send colonists to take the maniac down!
column3: Send colonists to take the maniac down!
column4: Wyślijcie kolonistów, by złapali tego maniaka!

column2: The rescue team was violently attacked by the maniac. After suffering heavy injuries, they managed to pin down the screaming Colonist.
column3: The rescue team was violently attacked by the maniac. After suffering heavy injuries, they managed to pin down the screaming Colonist.
column4: Ekipa ratunkowa została brutalnie zaatakowana przez maniaka. Jej członkowie odnieśli ciężkie obrażenia, ale zdołali schwytać winowajcę.

column2: <effect><injured_rescuers> Colonists lost <rescue_damage> Health. The Colonist <DisplayName> is safe.
column3: <effect><injured_rescuers> Colonists lost <rescue_damage> Health. The Colonist <DisplayName> is safe.
column4: <effect>Pewna liczba kolonistów (<injured_rescuers>) traci <rescue_damage> zdrowia fizycznego. <DisplayName> trafia w zabezpieczone miejsce.

column2: The maniac ambushed and violently attacked the rescue team. The furious brawl led to the use of too much force, and regrettably, the crazed Colonist was fatally injured.
column3: The maniac ambushed and violently attacked the rescue team. The furious brawl led to the use of too much force, and regrettably, the crazed Colonist was fatally injured.
column4: Maniak brutalnie zaatakował z zaskoczenia ekipę ratunkową. Podczas wściekłej bójki użyto zbyt dużo siły i niestety sprawca wydarzeń odniósł śmiertelne obrażenia.
<effect><DisplayName> ginie. Pewna liczba kolonistów (<injured_rescuers>) traci <rescue_damage> zdrowia fizycznego.

column2: Send Drones to take the maniac down!
column3: Send Drones to take the maniac down!
column4: Wyślijcie drony, by złapały tego maniaka!

column2: The Drones apprehended the maniac, but not without taking damage. Thank the Cosmos that you didn’t send humans!
column3: The Drones apprehended the maniac, but not without taking damage. Thank the Cosmos that you didn’t send humans!
column4: Drony obezwładniły maniaka, ale nie uniknęły uszkodzeń. Na Wszechświat, dobrze, że nie wysłaliśmy ludzi!

column2:
The crazed maniac screamed and jumped on top of the first drone, smashing its sensor node with a mighty blow of the wrench. The next drones were met with a furious flurry of blows but eventually the brave little machines managed to pin the maniac to the ground, although with a bit too much force applied by their powerful, yet crude manipulators.

<effect><drone_rescuers> Drones have been destroyed. Colonist <DisplayName> is unable to work for <sols(recovery_time)> Sols.
column3:
The crazed maniac screamed and jumped on top of the first drone, smashing its sensor node with a mighty blow of the wrench. The next drones were met with a furious flurry of blows but eventually the brave little machines managed to pin the maniac to the ground, although with a bit too much force applied by their powerful, yet crude manipulators.

<effect><drone_rescuers> Drones have been destroyed. Colonist <DisplayName> is unable to work for <sols(recovery_time)> Sols.

column2: Send security Officers to apprehend the maniac!
column3: Send security Officers to apprehend the maniac!

column2:
The signal seems harmless but can very well be a spying device.

Do we ignore it?
column3:
The signal seems harmless but can very well be a spying device.

Do we ignore it?

column2: A faint signal was traced to originate from the high mountains just outside our Colony's vicinity.
column3: A faint signal was traced to originate from the high mountains just outside our Colony's vicinity.
column4: Wykryto słaby sygnał pochodzący z wysokich gór tuż poza obrzeżem kolonii.

column2: Send a Colonist in a Shuttle to investigate.
column3: Send a Colonist in a Shuttle to investigate.
column4: Wysłać kolonistę w wahadłowcu, by zbadał tę sprawę.

column2: Jam the signal and carry on.
column3: Jam the signal and carry on.
column4: Zakłócić ten sygnał i kontynuować normalną pracę.

column2:
Upon nearing it, the device transmitted the following:

"I have been in here for a hundred years. I have observed and gathered information for all this time. I know secret activities and weather patterns, yet have no one to share them with. For I have been forgotten... and I am bored.

Now that I am fully awake once more I plan to end my existence and execute my self-destruct protocol.

Before I do that, however, I shall test if you are deserving of the data I have to share. I shall tell you a simple riddle - answer it and you will know all I know. Fail and you will be destroyed along with me."
column3:
Upon nearing it, the device transmitted the following:

"I have been in here for a hundred years. I have observed and gathered information for all this time. I know secret activities and weather patterns, yet have no one to share them with. For I have been forgotten... and I am bored.

Now that I am fully awake once more I plan to end my existence and execute my self-destruct protocol.

Before I do that, however, I shall test if you are deserving of the data I have to share. I shall tell you a simple riddle - answer it and you will know all I know. Fail and you will be destroyed along with me."

column2: Our explorer discovered an old device hidden in a cave. It is of terrestrial origin. Perhaps a relic of the old Space Race?
column3: Our explorer discovered an old device hidden in a cave. It is of terrestrial origin. Perhaps a relic of the old Space Race?
column4: Nasz badacz odkrył jakieś stare urządzenie ukryte w jaskini. Maszyna pochodzi z Ziemi. Być może to jakiś relikt dawnego wyścigu kosmicznego?

column2:
We lost contact with the expedition after that one last line from the AI. Furthermore we have detected seismic activity which correlates to an explosion.

It's doubtful that <DisplayName> survived the event.
column3:
We lost contact with the expedition after that one last line from the AI. Furthermore we have detected seismic activity which correlates to an explosion.

It's doubtful that <DisplayName> survived the event.

column2: "The answer you have given is incorrect."
column3: "The answer you have given is incorrect."

column2: A huge package of data has been sent to our servers. We will scan the files for any malicious software and then thoroughly go through them.
column3: A huge package of data has been sent to our servers. We will scan the files for any malicious software and then thoroughly go through them.
column4: Na nasze serwery właśnie przesłano ogromny pakiet danych. Przeskanujemy je pod kątem złośliwego oprogramowania, a potem dokładnie przestudiujemy.

column2: The AI seems pleased with the answer and gave our Colonist a head start before executing self-destruction.
column3: The AI seems pleased with the answer and gave our Colonist a head start before executing self-destruction.
column4: SI wydaje się usatysfakcjonowana naszą odpowiedzią. Nasz kolonista może oddalić się w bezpieczne miejsce, zanim SI wykona procedurę samozniszczenia.

column2: Until I am measured, I am not known, yet how you miss me when I have flown.
column3: Пакуль я ня вымераны, я не пазнаны, але ж як вы сумуеце па мне, калі я праляцеў.
column4: Dopóki mnie nie zmierzysz, nikt mnie nie zna. Lecz gdy przeminę, każdemu mnie brak.

column2: I am a god. I am a planet, and I measure heat.
column3: Я бог. Я плянета й вымяраю цяпло.
column4: Jestem bogiem. Jestem planetą. Wspomagam kupców.

column2:
No one ever saw me, nor ever will. 

And yet I am the confidence of all, to live and breathe on any terrestrial ball.

What am I?
column3:
Мяне ніхто ніколі ня бачыў і ніколі не забачыць.

І ўсё ж я — упэўненасць усіх, каб жыць і дыхаць на любой планеце.

Што я?

column2: I never was, am always to be.
column3: Я ніколі ня быў, Я заўсёды буду.

column2: I make two people out of one.
column4: Czynię dwóch ludzi w miejsce jednego.

column2:
The chip controls the water recycling for <DisplayName> dome. Without it water consumption there will increase by <baseincrease>%.

We were supposed to get replacement water chips but it seems they were wrongly delivered somewhere in Southern California on Earth.

The water chip is quite complex and it will take us <sols(base_time_to_fix)> Sols to manufacture it here on Mars. Alternatively, we can import a new one from Earth.
column3:
Чып кантралюе рэцыркуляцыю вады купала <DisplayName>. Без гэтага спажываньне вады там павялічыцца на <baseincrease>%.

Мы павінны былі атрымаць водныя чыпы на замену, але здаецца, што яны былі памылкова дастаўлены дзесьці ў Паўднёвай Каліфорніі на Зямлі.

Вадзяны чып даволі складаны, і ён патрабуе ў нас <sols(base_time_to_fix)> Сола да стварэньня яго на Марсе. Акрамя таго, мы можам імпартаваць новы з Зямлі.

column2: The terminal softly beeps, indicating that the water chip for one of our Domes has failed.
column3: Тэрмінал падае ціхі гук, паказваючы, што вадзяны чып для аднаго з нашых купалаў выйшаў з ладу.
column4: Terminal piszczy cicho, informując o awarii procesora wodociągowego w jednej z naszych kopuł.

column2: It should arrive in <sols(short_time)> Sols and will cost us <funding(funding_cost)>
column3: Ён павінен прыбыць у <sols(short_time)> Сола й будзе каштаваць нам <funding(funding_cost)>

column2: We can build a temporary filtration device.
column3: Мы можам зрабіць часовую прыладу да фільтрацыі.

column4: Zużycie wody w kopule zmniejszy się do <hydroincrease>%.

column2: Try to speed up the manufacture process.
Chance to fail, wasting even more Water
column3: Шанец няўдачы, траты вады будуць яшчэ больш
column4: Istnieje możliwość niepowodzenia i zmarnowania jeszcze większej ilości wody.

column2: The repair team managed to find a workaround and have cut down the repair time down to <sols(short_time)> Sols.
column3: Рамонтнай групе атрымалася знайсьці абыходны шлях і скараціць час рамонту да <sols(short_time)> Сола.
column4: Zespół techniczny zdołał znaleźć prowizoryczne rozwiązanie i naprawa potrwa mniejszą liczbę soli (<sols(short_time)>).

column2: The repair team failed to find a quicker solution and one of their pipe probes caused a serious issue, raising the total Water consumption by <failincrease>%.
column3: Рамонтная група не змагла знайсьці хуткае рашэньне. Адзін з іх трубаправодаў выклікаў сур'ёзную праблему, павялічыўшы агульнае спажываньне вады на <failincrease>%.
column4: Zespół techniczny nie zdołał znaleźć szybszego rozwiązania, a jedna z naszych sond wodociągowych spowodowała poważny przeciek, przez co zużycie wody wzrosło o <failincrease>%.

column2: Let’s hope our Water reserves will hold until the chip is manufactured.
column3: Будзем спадзявацца, што нашых запасаў вады хопіць, пакуль чып ня будзе створан.
column4: Miejmy nadzieję, że nasze zapasy wody wystarczą do czasu wyprodukowania nowego procesora.

column2: A Dome is gradually built here without any personnel or machines nearby.
column3: A Dome is gradually built here without any personnel or machines nearby.
column4: W tym miejscu stopniowo powstaje jakaś kopuła, ale bez udziału robotników i maszyn.

column2:
The long-range telemetry can tell us just as much as this. If we want to investigate this, we have to send a rocket with exploration equipment and personnel.

<effect>New Planetary Anomaly detected - "Mysterious Dome Structure". Send an expedition to the coordinates to investigate.
column3:
The long-range telemetry can tell us just as much as this. If we want to investigate this, we have to send a rocket with exploration equipment and personnel.

<effect>New Planetary Anomaly detected - "Mysterious Dome Structure". Send an expedition to the coordinates to investigate.

column2: We have detected a Dome construction within several clicks of the colony site. No vehicles or personnel are to be found at the location, yet the Dome gradually emerges from thin air.
column3: We have detected a Dome construction within several clicks of the colony site. No vehicles or personnel are to be found at the location, yet the Dome gradually emerges from thin air.
column4: Kilka kilometrów od naszej kolonii wykryliśmy budowę kopuły. Nie ma tam żadnych pojazdów ani robotników, mimo to kopuła stopniowo powstaje jakby z niczego.

column2: After the initial astonishment, the team got to work and found out that construction nanites from our colony are working to break down the rocket to basic molecules. However, the nanites aren’t responding to any deactivation signals.
column3: After the initial astonishment, the team got to work and found out that construction nanites from our colony are working to break down the rocket to basic molecules. However, the nanites aren’t responding to any deactivation signals.
column4: Opanowawszy wstępne zdumienie nasz zespół zabrał się do pracy i odkrył, że nanity budowlane z naszej kolonii zaczynają rozkładać rakietę ekspedycyjną na części podstawowe. Niestety nie reagują na żadne sygnały dezaktywacyjne.

column2: As the Rocket lands at the mysterious dome construction site, its surface starts to disintegrate slowly! The expedition team stare at the sight, wordless and disturbed.
column3: As the Rocket lands at the mysterious dome construction site, its surface starts to disintegrate slowly! The expedition team stare at the sight, wordless and disturbed.
column4: Gdy tylko rakieta osiada w pobliżu tajemniczego miejsca budowy, jej powierzchnia zaczyna się powoli rozkładać! Członkowie ekspedycji gapią się na to z zaskoczeniem i niepokojem.

column2: It’s too dangerous, get out of there!
column3: It’s too dangerous, get out of there!
column4: To zbyt niebezpieczne, wynoście się stamtąd!

column2: The expedition team quickly blasts off, leaving the rogue nanites to continue their work unabated.
column3: The expedition team quickly blasts off, leaving the rogue nanites to continue their work unabated.
column4: Ekspedycja szybko startuje, pozostawiając zbuntowane nanity, by bez przeszkód kontynuowały swoją pracę.

column2:
The Dome construction site slowly fades from sight as the rocket accelerates up in the skies.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly.
column3:
The Dome construction site slowly fades from sight as the rocket accelerates up in the skies.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly.

column2: We cannot afford a grey goo scenario! Find a way to deactivate them!
column3: We cannot afford a grey goo scenario! Find a way to deactivate them!
column4: Nie możemy dopuścić do katastrofy z szarą mazią! Znajdźcie jakiś sposób, by je wyłączyć!

column2: The team starts working frantically, racing against time as the rogue nanites continue their merciless work on the Rocket’s hull.
column3: The team starts working frantically, racing against time as the rogue nanites continue their merciless work on the Rocket’s hull.
column4: Członkowie ekspedycji pracują w szaleńczym tempie, ścigając się z czasem, podczas gdy zbuntowane nanity kontynuują bezlitośnie swoje dzieło zniszczenia.

column2:
Using the research output of the Colony would help their task immeasurably.

<effect>Finish the "Rogue Nanites Analysis" tech to speed up their deactivation. If the tech is not researched within <sols(critical_sols)> Sols, the team will take off.
column3:
Using the research output of the Colony would help their task immeasurably.

<effect>Finish the "Rogue Nanites Analysis" tech to speed up their deactivation. If the tech is not researched within <sols(critical_sols)> Sols, the team will take off.

column2: Amazing! Try to stay as much as possible and study them.
column3: Amazing! Try to stay as much as possible and study them.
column4: To zadziwiające! Postarajcie się zostać tam jak najdłużej i zbadać je.

column2: The team leader sends out the RC Explorer. The team races against time as the rogue nanites mercilessly erode the hull of the rover.
column3: The team leader sends out the RC Explorer. The team races against time as the rogue nanites mercilessly erode the hull of the rover.
column4: Kierownik ekspedycji wysyła eksploratora sterowanego. Ekspedycja ściga się z czasem, podczas gdy zbuntowane nanity bezlitośnie zżerają kadłub łazika.

column2:
When the risk becomes too high, the Explorer is recalled and barely manages to enter the rocket before it takes off.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly. You have gained <research(bonus_research)>.
column3:
When the risk becomes too high, the Explorer is recalled and barely manages to enter the rocket before it takes off.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly. You have gained <research(bonus_research)>.

column2: Stay as much as you need to find a way to control them!
column3: Stay as much as you need to find a way to control them!
column4: Zostańcie tam tyle, ile trzeba, by znaleźć sposób sterowania nimi!

column2: The team starts working frantically, racing against time to gather all the information they can.
column3: The team starts working frantically, racing against time to gather all the information they can.
column4: Członkowie ekspedycji pracują w szaleńczym tempie, ścigając się z czasem, aby zgromadzić jak najwięcej informacji.

column2:
Meanwhile, the rogue nanites outside continue their merciless work to convert the Rocket and the crew inside to basic molecules for their unknown purposes.

<effect>Finish the "Rogue Nanite Analysis" tech to help the on-site team and reduce the risk for their lives.
column3:
Meanwhile, the rogue nanites outside continue their merciless work to convert the Rocket and the crew inside to basic molecules for their unknown purposes.

<effect>Finish the "Rogue Nanite Analysis" tech to help the on-site team and reduce the risk for their lives.

column2:
When the first hulls of buildings start disintegrating, the dire truth becomes apparent – these are the rogue nanites that we failed to defeat.

<effect>Nanite Storm incoming! The colony will be hit periodically by Nanite Storms – dust storms that damage buildings and drones.
column3:
When the first hulls of buildings start disintegrating, the dire truth becomes apparent – these are the rogue nanites that we failed to defeat.

<effect>Nanite Storm incoming! The colony will be hit periodically by Nanite Storms – dust storms that damage buildings and drones.

column2: The skies are darkened by what appears to be a dust storm, but the chemical sensors say otherwise – the thin air is filled with nanoscopic particles of unusual composition.
column3: The skies are darkened by what appears to be a dust storm, but the chemical sensors say otherwise – the thin air is filled with nanoscopic particles of unusual composition.
column4: Niebo ciemnieje – wydaje się, że nadciąga burza pyłowa, ale czujniki chemiczne wskazują coś innego. Powietrze jest pełne nanocząstek o niezwykłym składzie.

column2: Find a solution to deactivate them!
column3: Find a solution to deactivate them!
column4: Znajdźcie jakiś sposób, by je wyłączyć!

column2: The Nanite Storms are awe-inspiring but we still have the chance to stop them before they inflict insurmountable damages upon the Colony.
column3: The Nanite Storms are awe-inspiring but we still have the chance to stop them before they inflict insurmountable damages upon the Colony.
column4: Burze nanitowe stanowią niesamowity widok, ale wciąż mamy szansę powstrzymania ich, zanim wyrządzą nieodwracalne szkody w kolonii.

column2: <effect>Research the "Rogue Nanite Deactivation" tech to stop the disaster from happening.
column3: <effect>Research the "Rogue Nanite Deactivation" tech to stop the disaster from happening.
column4: <effect>Zbadaj technologię „Dezaktywacja zbuntowanych nanitów”, by uniknąć katastrofy.

column2: Find a way to control them!
column3: Find a way to control them!
column4: Znajdźcie jakiś sposób, by je opanować!

column2: The Nanite Storms are awe-inspiring but we still have the chance to stop them before they inflict insurmountable damages upon the Colony.
column3: The Nanite Storms are awe-inspiring but we still have the chance to stop them before they inflict insurmountable damages upon the Colony.
column4: Burze nanitowe stanowią niesamowity widok, ale wciąż mamy szansę powstrzymania ich, zanim wyrządzą nieodwracalne szkody w kolonii.

column2: <effect>Research the "Rogue Nanite Deactivation" to learn how to control the primal might of the disaster and make it stop.
column3: <effect>Research the "Rogue Nanite Deactivation" to learn how to control the primal might of the disaster and make it stop.
column4: <effect>Zbadaj technologię „Dezaktywacja zbuntowanych nanitów”, by dowiedzieć się, jak opanować ten pierwotny żywioł i zmusić go do przerwania działalności.

column2: The every-hungry all-devouring Rogue Nanites would come carried by the Martian winds and like a swarm of locusts would hit the Colony, devouring buildings and drones in their wake.
column3: The every-hungry all-devouring Rogue Nanites would come carried by the Martian winds and like a swarm of locusts would hit the Colony, devouring buildings and drones in their wake.
column4: Wiecznie głodne i pożerające wszystko zbuntowane nanity przybędą na skrzydłach marsjańskich wiatrów i opadną na kolonię niczym rój szarańczy, pochłaniając wszystkie budynki i drony, które znajdą się na ich drodze.

column2: A Nanite Storm is coming our way!
column3: A Nanite Storm is coming our way!
column4: W stronę kolonii kieruje się burza nanitowa!

column2:
The colony is saved, but at what price?

<effect>Nanite Storms will stop.
column3:
The colony is saved, but at what price?

<effect>Nanite Storms will stop.

column2: Broadcasting the deactivation signal brings the rogue nanites to the ground, dooming them to become nothing more than the millennia-old dust that covers the Red Planet.
column3: Broadcasting the deactivation signal brings the rogue nanites to the ground, dooming them to become nothing more than the millennia-old dust that covers the Red Planet.
column4: Nadanie sygnału dezaktywującego powoduje, że zbuntowane nanity opadają na ziemię, skazane na dołączenie do liczącego wiele tysiącleci pyłu, który pokrywa Czerwoną Planetę.

column2: Winds of Change: Dust in the Wind
column3: Winds of Change: Dust in the Wind

column2: Regrettably, the expedition team was lost to the rogue nanites. They will be remembered as heroes.
column3: Regrettably, the expedition team was lost to the rogue nanites. They will be remembered as heroes.
column4: Niestety nasza ekspedycja uległa atakowi zbuntowanych nanitów. Zapamiętamy jej członków jak bohaterów.

column2:
Progress inevitably leads to mistakes, but the progress also finds solutions.

<effect>The Nanite Storms will stop. You will periodically receive building prefabs.
column3:
Progress inevitably leads to mistakes, but the progress also finds solutions.

<effect>The Nanite Storms will stop. You will periodically receive building prefabs.

column2: Broadcasting the deactivation signal brings the rogue nanites back to being what they were supposed to be – an instrument of creation, not destruction.
column3: Broadcasting the deactivation signal brings the rogue nanites back to being what they were supposed to be – an instrument of creation, not destruction.
column4: Nadanie sygnału dezaktywującego powoduje, że zbuntowane nanity na powrót stają się tym, czym miały być – narzędziem tworzenia, a nie zniszczenia.

column2: The prefabs are in early state and we can command the Nanites to use the resources they have gathered to create whatever we need.
column3: The prefabs are in early state and we can command the Nanites to use the resources they have gathered to create whatever we need.
column4: Prefabrykaty są niedokończone, możemy rozkazać nanitom, by wytworzyły to, czego nam trzeba, wykorzystując nagromadzone surowce.
Niech produkują instalacje systemu podtrzymywania życia.

column2:
Only the monstrous husk of the unfinished Dome remains to tell the story that unfolded here.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly. The rogue nanites have been deactivated.
column3:
Only the monstrous husk of the unfinished Dome remains to tell the story that unfolded here.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly. The rogue nanites have been deactivated.

column2: The deactivation signal is broadcasted and rogue nanites fall down to join the millennia-old dust of the Red Planet.
column3: The deactivation signal is broadcasted and rogue nanites fall down to join the millennia-old dust of the Red Planet.
column4: Nadano sygnał dezaktywujący i zbuntowane nanity opadły na ziemię, dołączając do liczącego wiele tysiącleci pyłu, który pokrywa Czerwoną Planetę.

column2:
The colony has gained a deeper insight on how the nanotechnology works, and the new strain of nanites can now be put to good work.

<effect>The expedition will return shortly. You have gained several Dome prefabs.
column3:
The colony has gained a deeper insight on how the nanotechnology works, and the new strain of nanites can now be put to good work.

<effect>The expedition will return shortly. You have gained several Dome prefabs.

column2: The control signal is broadcasted and the rogue nanites, now tamed, cease their relentless work. A team member gives out a group sigh of relief, knowing that they avoided a certain death.
column3: The control signal is broadcasted and the rogue nanites, now tamed, cease their relentless work. A team member gives out a group sigh of relief, knowing that they avoided a certain death.
column4: Nadano sygnał sterujący i zbuntowane nanity, okiełznane, przerywają swoją niezmordowaną pracę. Członkowie ekspedycji wzdychają z ulgą, wiedząc, że uniknęli pewnej śmierci.

column2: <effect>Your Colony is well-informed on the properties of the Rogue Nanites should they become a problem in the future. All future tech on the behavior of the Rogue Nanites will gain a 50% discount.
column3: <effect>Your Colony is well-informed on the properties of the Rogue Nanites should they become a problem in the future. All future tech on the behavior of the Rogue Nanites will gain a 50% discount.
column4: <effect>Twoja kolonia dysponuje teraz dużą ilością informacji o właściwościach zbuntowanych nanitów, co może być przydatne, gdyby zaczęły one sprawiać kłopoty w przyszłości. Koszt wszystkich przyszłych technologii dotyczących zbuntowanych nanitów będzie o 50% mniejszy.

column2: The completion of "Rogue Nanite Analysis" research has given us new insight on how to interact and control the negative effects of the nanites.
column3: The completion of "Rogue Nanite Analysis" research has given us new insight on how to interact and control the negative effects of the nanites.
column4: Ukończenie prac nad analizą zbuntowanych nanitów dało nam nowy wgląd w możliwości oddziaływania na nanity i opanowania ich niekorzystnych skutków.

column2:
It has become a somewhat common occurrence for colonists to sneak outside of Domes and have some fun in the frost. It goes against at least half a dozen regulations but it’s been overlooked until now.

If you allow recreational walks outside the dome many colonists will gain a permanent <perm_morale_boost> Morale bonus but may suffer an occasional injury.
column3:
It has become a somewhat common occurrence for colonists to sneak outside of Domes and have some fun in the frost. It goes against at least half a dozen regulations but it’s been overlooked until now.

If you allow recreational walks outside the dome many colonists will gain a permanent <perm_morale_boost> Morale bonus but may suffer an occasional injury.

column2: As you gaze out of the dome glass you witness something unexpected outside. A group of colonists in their space suits are having a low gravity snowball fight.
column3: As you gaze out of the dome glass you witness something unexpected outside. A group of colonists in their space suits are having a low gravity snowball fight.
column4: Wyglądając pewnego dnia poza ścianę kopuły, widzisz coś nieoczekiwanego. Grupa kolonistów w skafandrach kosmicznych urządziła sobie bitwę na śnieżki w niskiej grawitacji.

column2: This is not safe for children.
column3: This is not safe for children.
column4: To nie jest bezpieczne dla dzieci.

column2: allow only adults to exit the Domes for recreation
column3: allow only adults to exit the Domes for recreation
column4: pozwól na opuszczanie kopuł w celach rekreacyjnych tylko dorosłym.

column2: Sorry to be a killjoy, but this is too dangerous!
column3: Sorry to be a killjoy, but this is too dangerous!
column4: Przepraszam, że psuję zabawę, ale to zbyt niebezpieczne!

column2:
It seems that little <DisplayName> went missing while playing in the frost outside. Apparently the kid decided to adventure further out and fell down a ravine.

The kid's air reserves are running low, but the approach to the ravine is dangerous.
column3:
It seems that little <DisplayName> went missing while playing in the frost outside. Apparently the kid decided to adventure further out and fell down a ravine.

The kid's air reserves are running low, but the approach to the ravine is dangerous.

column2: The worried mother is staring at the monitor as the Drones search for the missing kid.
column3: The worried mother is staring at the monitor as the Drones search for the missing kid.
column4: Zmartwiona matka wpatruje się w monitor, gdy drony szukają jej zaginionego dziecka.

column2: Attempt to rescue the kid with Drones.
column3: Attempt to rescue the kid with Drones.
column4: Spróbuj uratować dziecko za pomocą dronów.

column2: Attempt a rescue with a Shuttle.
column3: Attempt a rescue with a Shuttle.
column4: Spróbuj uratować dziecko za pomocą wahadłowca.

column2: Send a Colonist on the rescue mission.
column3: Send a Colonist on the rescue mission.

column2:
Colonists have taken Martian snowball fights to the extreme, trying evermore dangerous stunts and maneuvers. 

If you keep the recreational walks colonists will have a small chance for more serious injuries.
column3:
Colonists have taken Martian snowball fights to the extreme, trying evermore dangerous stunts and maneuvers. 

If you keep the recreational walks colonists will have a small chance for more serious injuries.

column2: Two Colonists with broken limbs and guilty faces sit across your desk as you scold them about proper safety procedure.
column3: Two Colonists with broken limbs and guilty faces sit across your desk as you scold them about proper safety procedure.
column4: Dwóch kolonistów ze złamaniem kończyn i poczuciem winy wypisanym na twarzy siedzi naprzeciwko twojego biurka, gdy ty wygłaszasz kazanie o konieczności przestrzegania zasad bezpieczeństwa.

column2:
We managed to get the kid to safety before the Oxygen supply ran out. However, the volunteer rescuer - <DisplayName> was seriously injured when climbing down the ravine and did not survive.

The kid's parents held an impromptu wake for the fallen hero.
column3:
We managed to get the kid to safety before the Oxygen supply ran out. However, the volunteer rescuer - <DisplayName> was seriously injured when climbing down the ravine and did not survive.

The kid's parents held an impromptu wake for the fallen hero.

column2: Join the mourners at the wake.
column3: Join the mourners at the wake.
column4: Przyłącz się do żałobników na czuwaniu.

column2: Rename a dome in honor of <DisplayName>.
column3: Rename a dome in honor of <DisplayName>.
column4: Jedna z kopuł otrzyma nowe imię – „<DisplayName>”.

column2: The exposure to the cold and the oxygen deprivation have left <DisplayName> with permanent injuries. The kid won't be able to go to school or work after growing up.
column3: The exposure to the cold and the oxygen deprivation have left <DisplayName> with permanent injuries. The kid won't be able to go to school or work after growing up.
column4: Długotrwałe wystawienie na mróz i niedobór tlenu spowodowały trwałe obrażenia. <DisplayName> nie będzie chodzić do szkoły ani pracować, gdy dorośnie.

column2: It took us four attempts to find the correct approach and we lost several Drones in the process. We managed to rescue the kid in the nick of time.
column3: It took us four attempts to find the correct approach and we lost several Drones in the process. We managed to rescue the kid in the nick of time.
column4: Wymagało to czterech prób znalezienia odpowiedniego podejścia, straciliśmy też kilka dronów, ale w końcu udało nam się uratować dziecko w mgnieniu oka.

column2:
Colonist <DisplayName> managed to get to the kid just in time and escape the ravine intact. The entire colony sings high praises of the heroic rescuer.

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Celebrity trait.
column3:
Colonist <DisplayName> managed to get to the kid just in time and escape the ravine intact. The entire colony sings high praises of the heroic rescuer.

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Celebrity trait.

column2:
The first attempt was a failure and we lost the Shuttle. Luckily the second one was successful and little <DisplayName> is back safe and sound with just a couple of cuts and bruises.

<effect><morale_boost> Morale for <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols
column3:
The first attempt was a failure and we lost the Shuttle. Luckily the second one was successful and little <DisplayName> is back safe and sound with just a couple of cuts and bruises.

<effect><morale_boost> Morale for <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols

column2: Clearly, <DisplayName> wants you to name a target.
column3: Clearly, <DisplayName> wants you to name a target.
column4: Najwyraźniej, <DisplayName> chce, by ktoś wskazał cel.

column2: After suffering a Sanity breakdown, the victim ran to the hatch of the dome, quickly put on a space suit and hijacked a Rover. "Show me the enemy, Important Joe, and I’ll bring it fury!"
column3: After suffering a Sanity breakdown, the victim ran to the hatch of the dome, quickly put on a space suit and hijacked a Rover. "Show me the enemy, Important Joe, and I’ll bring it fury!"
column4: Po załamaniu psychicznym jeden z kolonistów pobiegł do śluzy, szybko założył skafander kosmiczny i porwał łazika. „Pokaż mi wroga, Ważny Joe, a ja pokażę mu gniew!”

column2: That building, you see it? Charge!
column3: That building, you see it? Charge!

column2: "Witness meeeeee!" With a scream, the poor soul smashes the hijacked Rover into the building.
column3: "Witness meeeeee!" With a scream, the poor soul smashes the hijacked Rover into the building.
column4: Z okrzykiem „Podziwiaj mnieeee!” nieszczęśnik rozbija porwanego łazika o budynek.

column2:
The cockpit cameras show that the colonist lies on the floor, unconscious. Fortunately, no lives were lost, but the building has been severely damaged. Hours later, the Colonist regains consciousness and is now feeling better, although ashamed.

<effect>A building has been destroyed.
column3:
The cockpit cameras show that the colonist lies on the floor, unconscious. Fortunately, no lives were lost, but the building has been severely damaged. Hours later, the Colonist regains consciousness and is now feeling better, although ashamed.

<effect>A building has been destroyed.

column2: That Dome, that’s where they hide!
column3: That Dome, that’s where they hide!
column4: Ta kopuła, to tam się ukrywają!

column2: "I live, I die, I live again!" With an ear-piercing war cry, the poor soul smashes the hijacked rover into the dome.
column3: "I live, I die, I live again!" With an ear-piercing war cry, the poor soul smashes the hijacked rover into the dome.
column4: „Żyję, umieram, żyję w zaświatach!” Z wibrującym w uszach okrzykiem wojennym nieszczęśnik rozbija porwanego łazika o kopułę.

column2:
The surface bends in and surrenders under the force of the impact, the air inside leaving with a sinister hissing. Luckily, the colonist inside the rover suffered only a concussion, and is now feeling better, but ashamed.

<effect>A Dome has received <crack_amount> fractures.
column3:
The surface bends in and surrenders under the force of the impact, the air inside leaving with a sinister hissing. Luckily, the colonist inside the rover suffered only a concussion, and is now feeling better, but ashamed.

<effect>A Dome has received <crack_amount> fractures.

column2: Listen to my voice, calm down, no need for violence!
column3: Listen to my voice, calm down, no need for violence!
column4: Posłuchaj mego głosu! Uspokój się, przemoc jest zbędna!

column2: "NO! I am awaited in Valhalla!" Laughing maniacally, the Colonist forces the rover into the red desert.
column3: "NO! I am awaited in Valhalla!" Laughing maniacally, the Colonist forces the rover into the red desert.
column4: „NIE! Oczekują mnie w Walhalli!” Śmiejąc się maniakalnie, kolonista kieruje łazika na czerwoną pustynię.

column2:
Hours later, you track the Colonist’s whereabouts by the signal beacon of the space suit. There you find <DisplayName> sitting atop the rover’s frozen debris, ashamed of the maniacal behavior, but still fine.

<effect>A Rover has been destroyed.
column3:
Hours later, you track the Colonist’s whereabouts by the signal beacon of the space suit. There you find <DisplayName> sitting atop the rover’s frozen debris, ashamed of the maniacal behavior, but still fine.

<effect>A Rover has been destroyed.

column2: "Why won’t you look at me, Important Joe? Why do you deny me?" The poor soul sits, quietly sobbing.
column3: "Why won’t you look at me, Important Joe? Why do you deny me?" The poor soul sits, quietly sobbing.
column4: „Dlaczego na mnie nie patrzysz, Ważny Joe? Dlaczego mnie odrzucasz?” Biedaczysko siedzi bez ruchu, łkając cicho.

column2:
<DisplayName> makes no attempts to resist when you open the Rover’s hatch. Hours later, the Colonist is feeling much better, yet ashamed.

<effect><DisplayName> has been saved.
column3:
