column2: The planet is near uninhabitable conditions once more!
column4: Planeta jest blisko powrotu do warunków uniemożliwiających zamieszkanie!

column2: Toxic Rains can now be expected
Crash ice asteroids on Mars' surface to improve the Water levels of the planet. This action may cause a Marsquake disaster.
column3: Разьбіць ледзяныя астэроіды аб паверхню Марсу, каб палепшыць узровень вады на планеце. . Гэта дзеяньне можа выклікаць марсатрус.
column4: Rozbijaj lodowe asteroidy na powierzchni Marsa, aby zwiększyć ilość wody na planecie. Ta czynność może spowodować klęskę żywiołową – trzęsienie Marsa.

column2: Trigger rainfalls, that improve local soil quality and help plant life.
column3: Выклікаюць ападкі, якія паляпшаюць якасьць мясцовай глебы й дапамагаюць жыцьцядзейнасьці расьлін.
column4: Wywołuj opady, które zwiększą miejscową jakość gleby i wspomogą rozwój roślin.

column2: Send a refurbished rocket to gather greenhouse gases from Earth's atmosphere and then dump them on Mars, improving the Atmosphere of the planet. This action may cause toxic rains that are harmful to soil quality and plant life.
column3: Адпраўце ракету, каб сабраць парніковыя газы з атмасферы Зямлі, а затым скінуць іх у атмасфэру Марсу, паляпшаючы яе. Гэта дзеяньне можа выклікаць таксічныя дажджы, якія шкодзяць якасьці глебы й жыцьцю расьлін.
column4: Wyślij przerobioną rakietę, aby zebrać gazy cieplarniane z ziemskiej atmosfery i wypuścić je na Marsie, co wzmocni atmosferę planety. Ta czynność może spowodować trujące deszcze szkodliwe dla jakości gleby i życia roślinnego.

column2: Launch a highly reflective surface to focus more sunlight on the surface of the planet, increasing the global Temperature and the power production of all Solar Panels.
column3: Запусьціце высокаадбівальнае паверхня, каб сфакусаваць больш сонечнага святла на плянету, павялічваючы глабальную Тэмпэратуру й вытворчасьць энэргіі ўсіх Сонечных панэляў.
column4: Wprowadź na orbitę powierzchnię silnie odbijającą światło, aby skupić więcej światła słonecznego na powierzchni planety, co zwiększy globalną temperaturę i wydajność działania wszystkich paneli słonecznych.

column2: Launch an artificial shield to improve the magnetic field of the planet, counteracting solar wind and decreasing the loss of Atmosphere. Consumes the used rocket.
column3: Запусьціце штучны шчыт, каб палепшыць магнітнае поле плянеты, процідзейнічаць сонечнаму ветру й памяньшыць страты атмасфэры. Ракета будзе страчана.
column4: Wystrzel sztuczną osłonę wzmacniającą pole magnetyczne planety, przeciwdziałającą wiatrowi słonecznemu i zmniejszającą utratę atmosfery. Użyta rakieta zostanie utracona.

column2: Nuke the Polar Caps, raising the Water levels and the Atmosphere of the planet. Stops all on-going Cold Waves but may cause a prolonged Dust Storm. Each successive nuking has less effect on the ocean levels and the atmosphere.
column3: Расплаўце палярныя шапкі, што падыме ўзровень вады й палепшыць атмасфэру плянеты. Спыняе ўсе халодныя хвалі, але можа выклікаць працяглую пясчаную буру. Кожны наступны ядзерны выбух менш уплывае на ўзровень акіяну й атмасфэры.
column4: Zbombarduj polarne czapy lodowe ładunkami nuklearnymi. Spowoduje to wzrost zawartości wody i atmosfery. Przerwie wszystkie trwające fale zimna, ale może spowodować długotrwałą burzę pyłową. Można wykonać wielokrotnie, ale każde kolejne bombardowanie ma coraz mniejszy wpływ na poziom oceanów i gęstość atmosfery.

column2: Transport a large payload of Seeds to spread cyanophytes, green algae, lichens and more complex vegetation on the surface of the planet.
column3: Перавязіце шмат насеньня, каб распаўсюдзіць цыянафіты, зялёныя водарасьці, лішайнікі й больш складаную расьліннасьць на паверхні плянеты.
column4: Przetransportuj duży ładunek nasion umożliwiający rozprzestrzenienie sinic, zielenic, porostów i bardziej złożonych roślin na powierzchni planety.

column2:
As the terraforming initiative progresses, some of the blights that were more or less a fact of life are bound to disappear - hopefully forever.

Unless we turn around our good progress, Cold Waves will no longer happen near our Colony.

Note: Non-recurring Cold Waves, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.
column3:
As the terraforming initiative progresses, some of the blights that were more or less a fact of life are bound to disappear - hopefully forever.

Unless we turn around our good progress, Cold Waves will no longer happen near our Colony.

Note: Non-recurring Cold Waves, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.

column2:
A much anticipated milestone in the improving of Atmospheric conditions has been reached.

The fears of a Dust Storm sweeping through our colony and causing the mayhem that goes hand in hand with the disaster is now behind our backs. 

Scientists warn, however, that if we fail to stay on track and reverse the progress that has been made, Dust Storms may make a comeback.

Note: Non-recurring Dust Storms, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.
column3:
A much anticipated milestone in the improving of Atmospheric conditions has been reached.

The fears of a Dust Storm sweeping through our colony and causing the mayhem that goes hand in hand with the disaster is now behind our backs. 

Scientists warn, however, that if we fail to stay on track and reverse the progress that has been made, Dust Storms may make a comeback.

Note: Non-recurring Dust Storms, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.

column2: With our Magnetic Field Generators stacking up, we can expect localized Marsquakes to start appearing from now on. The more Generators we construct, the more devastating these quakes will be.
column3: With our Генератар магнітычнага полю stacking up, we can expect localized Marsquakes to start appearing from now on. The more Generators we construct, the more devastating these quakes will be.
column4: Z uwagi na budowę kolejnych generatorów pola magnetycznego możemy się spodziewać miejscowych trzęsień Marsa. Im więcej generatorów uruchomimy, tym silniejsze będą wstrząsy.

column2:
With the gradual thickening of the Martian atmosphere, Meteor Storms have already become rarer and rarer. But today our scientists believe that a line has been passed, a line beyond which the calamity that were recurring Meteor Storms will not follow. 

Mars is changing, and changing for the better. With some luck, these changes are here to stay.

Note: Non-recurring Meteor Storms, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.
column3:
With the gradual thickening of the Martian atmosphere, Meteor Storms have already become rarer and rarer. But today our scientists believe that a line has been passed, a line beyond which the calamity that were recurring Meteor Storms will not follow. 

Mars is changing, and changing for the better. With some luck, these changes are here to stay.

Note: Non-recurring Meteor Storms, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.

column2:
The first pure rainfall is about to occur over our colony!

Rains will improve the Soil Quality and will help accelerate the forestation process of Mars. Artificial lakes will also fill during lengthy rainfalls. 

As the atmospheric conditions continue to improve, we may even see no more Toxic Rains, although we are not there yet. If atmospheric conditions worsen, however, pure rainfall may stop altogether.
column3:
The first pure rainfall is about to occur over our colony!

Rains will improve the Soil Quality and will help accelerate the forestation process of Mars. Artificial lakes will also fill during lengthy rainfalls. 

As the atmospheric conditions continue to improve, we may even see no more Toxic Rains, although we are not there yet. If atmospheric conditions worsen, however, pure rainfall may stop altogether.

column2:
Worsening atmospheric conditions on Mars will cause Toxic Rains instead of pure water rainfall.

Improving the atmospheric conditions will bring back rainfall with pure water.
column3:
Worsening atmospheric conditions on Mars will cause Toxic Rains instead of pure water rainfall.

Improving the atmospheric conditions will bring back rainfall with pure water.

column2:
Toxic Rains are poised to fall in the region, lowering the Soil Quality and killing off any vegetation more sophisticated than Lichens in affected areas. Vegetation growth will also be hampered during the disaster.

Toxic Pools can form and will render the terrain under them unusable until cleaned up by Drones.

As atmospheric conditions continue to improve, Toxic Rains will gradually give way to pure water ones.
column3:
Toxic Rains are poised to fall in the region, lowering the Soil Quality and killing off any vegetation more sophisticated than Lichens in affected areas. Vegetation growth will also be hampered during the disaster.

Toxic Pools can form and will render the terrain under them unusable until cleaned up by Drones.

As atmospheric conditions continue to improve, Toxic Rains will gradually give way to pure water ones.

column2:
The atmospheric conditions on Mars have reached levels finally free of toxicity and Toxic Rains will occur no more. 

If the terraforming effort continues in this direction, only pure rainfall will occur. However, should atmospheric conditions worsen, the blight that are Toxic Rains will return.
column3:
The atmospheric conditions on Mars have reached levels finally free of toxicity and Toxic Rains will occur no more. 

If the terraforming effort continues in this direction, only pure rainfall will occur. However, should atmospheric conditions worsen, the blight that are Toxic Rains will return.

column2: Since the Founders set foot on Mars, we have dreamt of a day we could tread freely upon the red sand. Today this dream has finally manifested onto reality. Go out fellow Martians, breath in the the Martian air and be proud! We are now able to open our Domes and rely on the Martian atmosphere alone to provide the oxygen and warmth we need to survive. Effect: If opened, Domes will no longer require an Oxygen supply and will become cheaper to build. However, if conditions worsen, we stand ready to seal them up again.
column3: Since the Founders set foot on Mars, we have dreamt of a day we could tread freely upon the red sand. Today this dream has finally manifested onto reality. Go out fellow Martians, breath in the the Martian air and be proud! We are now able to open our Domes and rely on the Martian atmosphere alone to provide the oxygen and warmth we need to survive. Effect: If opened, Domes will no longer require an Oxygen supply and will become cheaper to build. However, if conditions worsen, we stand ready to seal them up again.

column2:
Today the sun rose above a scene so spectacularly normal, that it was everything but. Blueish skies hanging above the arid, grassy fields of what might as well have been the great plains of Utah... But was actually here, on Mars!

Our restless efforts to purify the Martian atmosphere and make it suitable for humans have never achieved a more significant milestone. We are halfway there! But there is a lot of work remaining to be done.
column3:
Today the sun rose above a scene so spectacularly normal, that it was everything but. Blueish skies hanging above the arid, grassy fields of what might as well have been the great plains of Utah... But was actually here, on Mars!

Our restless efforts to purify the Martian atmosphere and make it suitable for humans have never achieved a more significant milestone. We are halfway there! But there is a lot of work remaining to be done.

column2: As the atmospheric conditions have worsened the skies above are no longer blue, giving way to the all too familiar red haze once more.
column3: Па пагаршжньню атмасфэры, блакітнае неба зьмяняецца занадта знаёмай чырвонай дымкай.
column4: Stan atmosfery pogorszył się i niebo przestało być niebieskie, ustępując na powrót znajomej pomarańczowej mgiełce.

column2:
Congratulations, you have successfully made the first step towards turning Mars into a lush green heaven! You have unlocked the Seeds resource that can be imported from Earth. 

Seeds are stored into specialized Storages and used by Forestation Plants and Open Farms for planting vegetation outside the Domes. Most plants require some terraforming progress to be made. Check out the Atmosphere, Temperature, surface Water and the Vegetation coverage in the Planetary View. Improving these terraforming parameters will improve the productivity of some buildings, decrease the severity of disasters and ultimately may render Mars lush, breathable and covered with liquid water.
column3:
Congratulations, you have successfully made the first step towards turning Mars into a lush green heaven! You have unlocked the Seeds resource that can be imported from Earth. 

Seeds are stored into specialized Storages and used by Forestation Plants and Open Farms for planting vegetation outside the Domes. Most plants require some terraforming progress to be made. Check out the Atmosphere, Temperature, surface Water and the Vegetation coverage in the Агляд плянеты. Improving these terraforming parameters will improve the productivity of some buildings, decrease the severity of disasters and ultimately may render Mars lush, breathable and covered with liquid water.

column2: The Atmosphere parameter represents the density and the composition of the Martian atmosphere. Above certain density, Atmosphere is gradually lost over time, due to the lack of a natural magnetic field on Mars. Atmosphere is increased by buildings in the Terraforming build menu and by completing Special Projects. The Atmosphere tooltip provides further information.
column3: The Atmosphere parameter represents the density and the composition of the Martian atmosphere. Above certain density, Atmosphere is gradually lost over time, due to the lack of a natural magnetic field on Mars. Atmosphere is increased by buildings in the Terraforming build menu and by completing Special Projects. The Atmosphere tooltip provides further information.

column2: Terraforming Buildings are now available. Construct them to consume Seeds, affect the local Soil Quality and vegetation and to increase the 4 global terraforming parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation. Check the Terraforming build menu section. Each building tooltip provides further information.
column3: Terraforming Buildings are now available. Construct them to consume Seeds, affect the local Soil Quality and vegetation and to increase the 4 global terraforming parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation. Check the Terraforming build menu section. Each building tooltip provides further information.

column2: To terraform Mars and create Earth-like environment for colonists, you have to gradually increase the 4 global terraforming parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation. Terraforming is a long process. Once complete, humans can start breathing outside domes. Start by researching a Terraforming technology when ready. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.
column3: Да тэрафармаваньня Марсу й стварэньня для каланістаў асяроддзя, падобнага на Зямлю, вы павінны паступова павялічваць 4 глабальныя параметры тэрафарміраваньня: Атмасфэру, Тэмпературу, Ваду й Расьліннасьць. Тэрафарміраваньне - працэс доўгі. Пасьля завяршэньня людзі могуць пачаць дыхаць па-за купаламі. Пачніце з вывучэньня Тэхналогій тэрафармаваньня, калі гатовы. Больш інфармацыі аб тэрафармаваньні даступная ў Энцыкляпедыі.

column2: Seeds are now available. Seeds are a new resource, which can improve local Soil Quality and the global Vegetation parameter. Import Seeds from Earth or grow them in Farms. Increase Soil Quality, Temperature and Water parameters to allow local vegetation to grow in your sector. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.
column3: Seeds are now available. Seeds are a new resource, which can improve local Soil Quality and the global Vegetation parameter. Import Seeds from Earth or grow them in Farms. Increase Soil Quality, Temperature and Water parameters to allow local vegetation to grow in your sector. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.

column2: New terraforming special projects are available on the Planetary View. They are marked in green. Completing them will advance our terraforming efforts. Send a Rocket on an expedition to complete a terraforming Special Project. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.
column3: New terraforming special projects are available on the Агляд плянеты. They are marked in green. Completing them will advance our terraforming efforts. Send a Rocket on an expedition to complete a terraforming Special Project. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.

column2: Temperature parameter represents the global surface temperature on Mars. Increased Temperature is required for liquid water, rains and local vegetation growth. Temperature is increased by buildings in the Terraforming build menu and by completing Special projects. The Temperature tooltip provides further information.
column3: Temperature parameter represents the global surface temperature on Mars. Increased Temperature is required for liquid water, rains and local vegetation growth. Temperature is increased by buildings in the Terraforming build menu and by completing Special projects. The Temperature tooltip provides further information.

column2: Vegetation parameter represents the spreading and diversity of vegetation and bacterial life on a planetary scale. Its improvement boosts local vegetation growth speed and spread. Vegetation is increased by working Forestation Plants and by completing Special Projects. The Vegetation tooltip provides further information.
column3: Vegetation parameter represents the spreading and diversity of vegetation and bacterial life on a planetary scale. Its improvement boosts local vegetation growth speed and spread. Vegetation is increased by working Forestation Plants and by completing Special Projects. The Vegetation tooltip provides further information.

column2: Water parameter represents the quality and volume of water on the Martian surface. Large enough quantities of liquid water will form planetary seas and oceans and affect Vegetation. Water is increased by evaporation from Lakes and by completing Special Projects. The Water tooltip provides further information.
column3: Water parameter represents the quality and volume of water on the Martian surface. Large enough quantities of liquid water will form planetary seas and oceans and affect Vegetation. Water is increased by evaporation from Lakes and by completing Special Projects. The Water tooltip provides further information.

column2: The temperatures on the Martian surface have dropped to freezing levels once more. Water will no longer remain liquid until we manage to bring temperatures back above freezing levels.
column3: The temperatures on the Martian surface have dropped to freezing levels once more. Water will no longer remain liquid until we manage to bring temperatures back above freezing levels.
column4: Temperatura na powierzchni Marsa znowu spadła poniżej temperatury krzepnięcia wody. Woda przejdzie w stan stały do czasu, kiedy uda się nam na powrót podnieść temperaturę.

column2:
With the warming of the atmosphere on Mars, water is now sustainable in its liquid form on the surface. 

We have indeed come a long way!
column3:
With the warming of the atmosphere on Mars, water is now sustainable in its liquid form on the surface. 

We have indeed come a long way!

column2:
With the use of special craft we pursued and deflected the asteroids off their trajectory with nothing more than slight bumps. Thus we have managed to gracefully steer large amounts of soon to be easily accessible water towards the surface of Mars.

In this game of space billiard though, there is always a chance that the ball will hit the wrong pocket. Be ready to deal with a Marsquake.
column3:
With the use of special craft we pursued and deflected the asteroids off their trajectory with nothing more than slight bumps. Thus we have managed to gracefully steer large amounts of soon to be easily accessible water towards the surface of Mars.

In this game of space billiard though, there is always a chance that the ball will hit the wrong pocket. Be ready to deal with a Marsquake.

column2: The capturing of Ice Asteroids has been successfully completed!
column3: The capturing of Ice Asteroids has been successfully completed!

column2:
Nothing happened for a short while but right as the spectators began feeling down, the wind brought the first drops of fresh water rain.

Rejoice!
column3:
Nothing happened for a short while but right as the spectators began feeling down, the wind brought the first drops of fresh water rain.

Rejoice!

column2: In a display reminiscent to formation flying shows back on Earth, special shuttles flew wave after wave in and out of the water vapor clouds above our colony.
column3: In a display reminiscent to formation flying shows back on Earth, special shuttles flew wave after wave in and out of the water vapor clouds above our colony.
column4: Specjalne wahadłowce, lecąc w ciasnym szyku jak podczas pokazów lotniczych na Ziemi, przelatują fala za falą przez chmury nad naszą kolonią.

column2:
But a large scale project has been completed today. Several hundred tons of rocks used to suck out and store Greenhouse gasses from the atmosphere on Earth have been delivered to the surface of Mars.

By crash-landing them all over the planet we have triggered a chemical reaction that dissolves the rocks and contributes towards thickening the Martian Atmosphere by unleashing the stored gasses.
column3:
But a large scale project has been completed today. Several hundred tons of rocks used to suck out and store Greenhouse gasses from the atmosphere on Earth have been delivered to the surface of Mars.

By crash-landing them all over the planet we have triggered a chemical reaction that dissolves the rocks and contributes towards thickening the Martian Atmosphere by unleashing the stored gasses.

column2: Just a few of the falling rocks, delivered by autonomous crafts from Earth, were visible to the naked eye.
column3: Just a few of the falling rocks, delivered by autonomous crafts from Earth, were visible to the naked eye.
column4: Gołym okiem było widać tylko kilka spadających głazów, dostarczonych przez bezzałogowe statki z Ziemi.

column2: As the Space Mirror moved into place and turned stray rays of the Sun towards us, a gleam of pride manifested on every observer's face at Mission Control.
column3: As the Space Mirror moved into place and turned stray rays of the Sun towards us, a gleam of pride manifested on every observer's face at Mission Control.
column4: Gdy lustro kosmiczne znalazło się na odpowiedniej orbicie i skierowało zbłąkane promienie Słońca w naszą stronę, twarze wszystkich obserwatorów w Dowództwie rozpromieniły się.

column2: The beauty of a space mirror can give pause to even the most seasoned astro-engineer.
column3: The beauty of a space mirror can give pause to even the most seasoned astro-engineer.
column4: Piękno lustra kosmicznego wywołuje chwilę refleksji nawet u najbardziej doświadczonego astroinżyniera.

column2:
After a few minutes of nerve-wrecking anticipation, waiting for the self-assessment protocols of the Sunshade to finish its thorough checkup, a green sign appeared. The Magnetic Shield is operational!

Then the cheers erupted and so did several bottles of champagne. We did it! Congratulations, citizens of Mars!
column3:
After a few minutes of nerve-wrecking anticipation, waiting for the self-assessment protocols of the Sunshade to finish its thorough checkup, a green sign appeared. The Magnetic Shield is operational!

Then the cheers erupted and so did several bottles of champagne. We did it! Congratulations, citizens of Mars!

column2: The Magnetic Shield settled in its orbit and slowly began expanding its sun-blocking appendages.
column3: The Magnetic Shield settled in its orbit and slowly began expanding its sun-blocking appendages.
column4: Osłona magnetyczna ustawiła się na orbicie i powoli rozwija swoje segmenty osłaniające przed wiatrem słonecznym.

column2:
The staggering number of thermonuclear devices had unleashed a monstrous amount of energy and in a matter of seconds changed the face of Mars forever.

A giant leap forward for the Terraforming of Mars had been made, yet a heavy silence fell in the room after the flashes dimmed down. We had witnessed a somber reminder of the destructive powers that humans possess.
column3:
The staggering number of thermonuclear devices had unleashed a monstrous amount of energy and in a matter of seconds changed the face of Mars forever.

A giant leap forward for the Terraforming of Mars had been made, yet a heavy silence fell in the room after the flashes dimmed down. We had witnessed a somber reminder of the destructive powers that humans possess.

column2: The warheads detonated in a magnificent display of light, brighter than a thousand suns.  We watched in awe from the safety of our labs.
column3: The warheads detonated in a magnificent display of light, brighter than a thousand suns.  We watched in awe from the safety of our labs.
column4: Głowice eksplodowały niczym pokaz gigantycznych fajerwerków, jaśniej od tysiąca słońc. Obserwowaliśmy to z bezpiecznego wnętrza naszych laboratoriów.

column2:
A rocket filled with billions of seeds emptied its storage unit in a well orchestrated chain of steps, spreading the seeds over a vast range of land.

Most of these seeds will take root and the resulting swath of green land will begin pumping out Oxygen into the fledgeling Martian atmosphere.
column3:
A rocket filled with billions of seeds emptied its storage unit in a well orchestrated chain of steps, spreading the seeds over a vast range of land.

Most of these seeds will take root and the resulting swath of green land will begin pumping out Oxygen into the fledgeling Martian atmosphere.

column2: Three, two, one... a collective gasp and then cheers. The Project was successful.
column3: Three, two, one... a collective gasp and then cheers. The Project was successful.
column4: Trzy, dwa, jeden... zbiorowe westchnienie, a potem wiwaty. Projekt zakończył się sukcesem.

column2:
If we send an Expedition Rocket to place some explosives, we can rig a small eruption which would benefit our terraforming effort.

Tectonic activity is extremely rare on Mars. We should expect trouble.
column3:
If we send an Expedition Rocket to place some explosives, we can rig a small eruption which would benefit our terraforming effort.

Tectonic activity is extremely rare on Mars. We should expect trouble.

column2: We have discovered a rare tectonic activity which may lead to a volcanic eruption... With a little help from us.
column3: We have discovered a rare tectonic activity which may lead to a volcanic eruption... With a little help from us.
column4: Wykryliśmy rzadki przypadek aktywności tektonicznej, która może przerodzić się w erupcję wulkaniczną... Przy naszej niewielkiej pomocy.

column2: Send a team of Geologists to blow it up!
column3: Send a team of Geologists to blow it up!
column4: Wyślijcie zespół geologów, aby wywołać erupcję!

column2: unlock an expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> which triggers a Marsquake
column3: unlock an expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> which triggers a Marsquake
column4: odblokowuje ekspedycję dającą <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> i <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>, która wywoła trzęsienie Marsa

column2: Send a Geologist team to trigger the tectonic activity into an eruption. We expect there is a high probability of a Marsquake.
column3: Send a Geologist team to trigger the tectonic activity into an eruption. We expect there is a high probability of a Marsquake.
column4: Wyślijcie zespół geologów, aby postarali się przetworzyć aktywność tektoniczną w erupcję. Szacujemy, że wysoce prawdopodobne jest trzęsienie Marsa.

column2: There is a way to do this remotely.
column3: There is a way to do this remotely.
column4: Istnieje sposób, by zrobić to na dystans.

column2: We have delivered a baby! A small volcano erupted on Mars.
column3: We have delivered a baby! A small volcano erupted on Mars.
column4: Wspomogliśmy poród! Na Marsie wypiętrzył się mały wulkan.

column2:
Thanks to your expertise in flying rockets and setting explosives - experience which is a mystery for all colonists, as you certainly know to keep your secrets safe - now we can congratulate ourselves with a tiny new volcano on a planet which was believed to be tectonically dead. Good job, Commander!  

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
A Marsquake has just started.
column3:
Thanks to your expertise in flying rockets and setting explosives - experience which is a mystery for all colonists, as you certainly know to keep your secrets safe - now we can congratulate ourselves with a tiny new volcano on a planet which was believed to be tectonically dead. Good job, Commander!  

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
A Marsquake has just started.

column2: I don't want to set the world on fire.
column3: I don't want to set the world on fire.

column2:
The rocket returned after successfully rigging the tectonic activity into a volcanic eruption. We were congratulating ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet, when the distant growl indicated the eruption.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
A Marsquake has just started.
column3:
The rocket returned after successfully rigging the tectonic activity into a volcanic eruption. We were congratulating ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet, when the distant growl indicated the eruption.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
A Marsquake has just started.

column2: We have delivered a baby! A small volcano erupted on Mars.
column3: We have delivered a baby! A small volcano erupted on Mars.
column4: Wspomogliśmy poród! Na Marsie wypiętrzył się mały wulkan.

column2: The salty waters are located underneath a mountain, but a well-equipped expedition can dig a gallery with metal supports in the main tunnel and place explosives. When triggered, the explosion would cut the face side of the mountain and open up path for the waters to pour in the giant crater nearby, creating a small sea of salty water.
column3: The salty waters are located underneath a mountain, but a well-equipped expedition can dig a gallery with metal supports in the main tunnel and place explosives. When triggered, the explosion would cut the face side of the mountain and open up path for the waters to pour in the giant crater nearby, creating a small sea of salty water.
column4: Słona bryja znajduje się pod jedną z gór, ale odpowiednio wyposażona ekspedycja może wykopać ukośny szyb z metalowymi stemplami i umieścić ładunki wybuchowe we właściwym miejscu. Po ich zdetonowaniu zbocze góry zostanie rozcięte, co otworzy drogę solance, która będzie mogła się wlać do pobliskiego wielkiego krateru i stworzyć słonowodne jezioro.

column2: Send an RC Commander to do the job.
column3: Send an RC Commander to do the job.
column4: Wyślijcie mobilną bazę, aby wykonała wymagane prace.

column2: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>, requires Metals
column3: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>, requires Metals

column2: Send an RC Commander to place explosives and release the salty underground waters.
column3: Send an RC Commander to place explosives and release the salty underground waters.
column4: Wyślij mobilną bazę, aby umieściła ładunki wybuchowe i uwolniła słone podziemne wody.

column2: I will lead a team to manually position the explosives.
column3: I will lead a team to manually position the explosives.
column4: Poprowadzę zespół i osobiście rozmieszczę ładunki.

column2: Send a team to place explosives and release the salty underground waters.
column3: Send a team to place explosives and release the salty underground waters.
column4: Wyślij zespół, aby umieścił ładunki wybuchowe i uwolnił słone wody podziemne.

column2: Why don't we just nuke it from space?
column3: Why don't we just nuke it from space?
column4: A może po prostu zbombardujemy to z kosmosu?

column2: Blowing up a mountain sounds too extreme. Permission denied!
column3: Blowing up a mountain sounds too extreme. Permission denied!
column4: Wysadzanie w powietrze góry wydaje się zbyt radykalne. Nie zezwalam!

column2:
The rocket returned after unleashing the salty underground waters. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
column3:
The rocket returned after unleashing the salty underground waters. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.

column2: We have run tests and it's amazing: this strain which botanists have given the pet name "Elsa", is able to withstand both very low and very high temperatures. Its amazing endurance will ensure its survival and hopefully benefit our terraforming effort.
column3: We have run tests and it's amazing: this strain which botanists have given the pet name "Elsa", is able to withstand both very low and very high temperatures. Its amazing endurance will ensure its survival and hopefully benefit our terraforming effort.
column4: Przeprowadziliśmy testy i to jest zadziwiające - szczep, który botanicy nazwali „Elsa„, jest w stanie wytrzymać zarówno bardzo niskie, jak i bardzo wysokie temperatury. Ta niesamowita odporność zapewnia mu przetrwanie i być może przyniesie korzyść naszym pracom nad terraformowaniem planety.

column2: We have discovered that a Bacteria culture we have brought to Mars has managed to perfectly adapt to its dry and cold environment.
column3: We have discovered that a Bacteria culture we have brought to Mars has managed to perfectly adapt to its dry and cold environment.
column4: Odkryliśmy, że pewna kultura bakterii, którą przywieźliśmy na Marsa, zdołała idealnie przystosować się do jego suchego i zimnego środowiska.

column2: Let it go! Send an RC Commander to release Elsa.
column3: Let it go! Send an RC Commander to release Elsa.
column4: Ona ma tę moc! Wyślijcie mobilną bazę, aby wypuścić Elsę.

column2: Send a rocket to spread Cold-Resistant Bacteria on the surface of Mars.
column3: Send a rocket to spread Cold-Resistant Bacteria on the surface of Mars.
column4: Wyślij rakietę, aby rozsypać bakterie odporne na zimno na powierzchni Marsa.

column2: Repurpose our Moisture Vaporators and use them to spread Elsa. Big summer blowout!
column3: Repurpose our Moisture Vaporators and use them to spread Elsa. Big summer blowout!
column4: Przeróbmy nasze oddzielacze wilgoci i wykorzystajmy je do rozpylania Elsy. Niech wiosna zakwitnie!

column2: postpone for 1 Sol and gain <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> for each working Moisture Vaporator
column3: postpone for 1 Сол and gain <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> for each working Moisture Vaporator
column4: po 1 solu otrzymujesz <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> za każdy działający oddzielacz wilgoci

column2: We can manage without Elsa. The cold never bothered me anyway.
column3: We can manage without Elsa. The cold never bothered me anyway.
column4: Damy sobie radę bez Elsy. Od lat coś w objęcia chłodu mnie pcha.

column2:
Elsa, the new species of Cold-Resistant Bacteria, has been spread on the surface of Mars and it quickly adapted to the environment.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
column3:
Elsa, the new species of Cold-Resistant Bacteria, has been spread on the surface of Mars and it quickly adapted to the environment.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.

column2:
We have successfully rigged our Moisture Vaporators to spread Elsa into the hostile environment of Mars!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> for each working Moisture Vaporator.
column3:
We have successfully rigged our Moisture Vaporators to spread Elsa into the hostile environment of Mars!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> for each working Moisture Vaporator.

column2: They all can come our way if we manage to redirect this comet to the surface of Mars. The easiest way to do this is to cause a detonation in space.
column3: They all can come our way if we manage to redirect this comet to the surface of Mars. The easiest way to do this is to cause a detonation in space.
column4: Mogą trafić do nas, jeśli tylko zdołamy skierować tę kometę ku powierzchni Marsa. Najłatwiejszym sposobem jest spowodowanie wybuchu na komecie.

column2: Carbon, Hydrogen, Oxygen, Nitrogen - the building blocks of life. Report says we have detected a comet that contains all of them.
column3: Carbon, Hydrogen, Oxygen, Nitrogen - the building blocks of life. Report says we have detected a comet that contains all of them.
column4: Węgiel, wodór, tlen, azot – cegiełki życia. W raporcie stwierdzono, że wykryliśmy kometę, która zawiera wszystkie te pierwiastki.

column2: Use drones to drill it, place fuel and detonate it.
column3: Use drones to drill it, place fuel and detonate it.
column4: Poślijcie drony, aby ją nawierciły, umieściły w niej paliwo i odpaliły je.

column2: Send a rocket over these coordinates to mount explosive charges and steer the Comet towards the Mars surface.
column3: Send a rocket over these coordinates to mount explosive charges and steer the Comet towards the Mars surface.
column4: Wyślij rakietę do wskazanych współrzędnych, zainstaluj ładunki wybuchowe i skieruj kometę ku powierzchni Marsa.

column2: Earth governments always wanted to do some strategic weapons precision testing in space.
column3: Earth governments always wanted to do some strategic weapons precision testing in space.
column4: Ziemskie rządy zawsze chciały przeprowadzić jakieś testy precyzji broni strategicznych w kosmosie.

column2: This comet may be a heavenly sign.
column3: This comet may be a heavenly sign.
column4: Ta kometa może być znakiem z niebios.

column2:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Comet to the surface of Mars. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>.
column3:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Comet to the surface of Mars. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>.

column2:
It is the core of a comet stripped of its icy tail, and yet analyses confirm it still holds a significant supply of frozen gases and water. In addition it flies so close that we need a single MDS Laser to take it down and release usable gases in the atmosphere.

The only issue with it is that it vaguely resembles the shape of a human skull and a vocal minority is convinced that shooting it would bring bad luck.
column3:
It is the core of a comet stripped of its icy tail, and yet analyses confirm it still holds a significant supply of frozen gases and water. In addition it flies so close that we need a single MDS Laser to take it down and release usable gases in the atmosphere.

The only issue with it is that it vaguely resembles the shape of a human skull and a vocal minority is convinced that shooting it would bring bad luck.

column2: We have calculated the trajectory of a very peculiarly-shaped asteroid.
column3: We have calculated the trajectory of a very peculiarly-shaped asteroid.
column4: Obliczyliśmy trajektorię asteroidy o bardzo nietypowym kształcie.

column2: Don't bother me with silly superstitions. Just shoot it.
column3: Don't bother me with silly superstitions. Just shoot it.
column4: Nie zawracajcie mi głowy durnymi przesądami, po prostu to zestrzelcie.

column2: gain <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>, all Idiot Colonists lose Morale
column3: gain <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>, all Idiot Colonists lose Morale
column4: otrzymujesz <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>, wszyscy koloniści z cechą „głupota” tracą morale

column2: We shall hold a special ceremony and consecrate the laser to destroy this devilry.
column3: We shall hold a special ceremony and consecrate the laser to destroy this devilry.
column4: Powinniśmy odprawić specjalną ceremonię i poświęcić laser, aby zniszczyć to diabelstwo.

column2: It is heading to Earth! It's our duty to save our home planet from the curse!
column3: It is heading to Earth! It's our duty to save our home planet from the curse!
column4: To kieruje się ku Ziemi! Mamy obowiązek ocalić naszą ojczystą planetę przed klątwą!

column2: I wish I lived in more enlightened times...
column3: I wish I lived in more enlightened times...
column4: Szkoda, że nie żyjemy w bardziej oświeconych czasach...

column2:
We have discovered a dark-colored species of Calothrix Parietina which has wonderful Cold tolerance and if spread wide enough, may produce Oxygen through photosynthesis and even absorb radiation and hasten the ice melting. 

The biologists argue how should we use it better. We'll also need a lot of food to prepare growing media which is to be distributed with the bacterial culture across the planet.
column3:
We have discovered a dark-colored species of Calothrix Parietina which has wonderful Cold tolerance and if spread wide enough, may produce Oxygen through photosynthesis and even absorb radiation and hasten the ice melting. 

The biologists argue how should we use it better. We'll also need a lot of food to prepare growing media which is to be distributed with the bacterial culture across the planet.

column2: A recent research paper discussed a species of Cyanobacteria which can be easily introduced to Mars.
column3: A recent research paper discussed a species of Cyanobacteria which can be easily introduced to Mars.
column4: Jeden z niedawno opublikowanych artykułów naukowych omawia pewien gatunek sinic, który można by łatwo wprowadzić na Marsa.

column2: Spread it only on frozen water deposits to speed up the warming of Mars.
column3: Spread it only on frozen water deposits to speed up the warming of Mars.
column4: Rozpylcie je tylko nad pokładami lodu, aby przyspieszyć ocieplanie Marsa.

column2: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> and <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>, requires Food
column3: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> and <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>, requires Food
column4: odblokowuje ekspedycję dającą <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> i <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>, wymaga żywności

column2: Send a rocket to spread cyanobacteria on frozen water deposits to speed up the warming of Mars.
column3: Send a rocket to spread cyanobacteria on frozen water deposits to speed up the warming of Mars.
column4: Wyślij rakietę, aby rozpyliła sinice nad pokładami lodu w celu przyspieszenia ocieplania Marsa.

column2: Spread it to places with more favorable conditions so it would produce more Oxygen.
column3: Spread it to places with more favorable conditions so it would produce more Oxygen.
column4: Rozpylcie je w korzystniejszych miejscach, aby wytwarzały więcej tlenu.

column2: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>,  requires Food
column3: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>,  requires Food

column2: Send a rocket to spread cyanobacteria on favorable places to speed up its Oxygen production.
column3: Send a rocket to spread cyanobacteria on favorable places to speed up its Oxygen production.
column4: Wyślij rakietę, aby rozpyliła sinice w korzystnych miejscach w celu przyspieszenia wytwarzania tlenu.

column2: We have people to feed, not some bacteria.
column3: We have people to feed, not some bacteria.
column4: Musimy nakarmić ludzi, a nie jakieś mikroby.

column2:
The new species of Cyanobacteria has been spread on the surface of Mars and for the joy of the team, it quickly adapted to the environment, effectively helping frozen waters to melt.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> and <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>.
column3:
The new species of Cyanobacteria has been spread on the surface of Mars and for the joy of the team, it quickly adapted to the environment, effectively helping frozen waters to melt.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> and <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>.

column2:
The new species of Cyanobacteria has been spread on the surface of Mars and for the joy of the team, it quickly adapted to the environment, effectively producing Oxygen.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>.
column3:
The new species of Cyanobacteria has been spread on the surface of Mars and for the joy of the team, it quickly adapted to the environment, effectively producing Oxygen.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>.

column2:
"Commander, during a standard sample control procedure we have isolated a microorganism which is definitely not from Earth. We haven't seen anything like this. The team managed to bring it out of its latent state and even registered cell division! They named it Kelvin. Isn't it cute?"

You see some intangible picture from an electronic microscope where a cell lazily divides in two. If this is what it looks, with the temperature increase we have probably revived something that once lived on Mars!
column3:
"Commander, during a standard sample control procedure we have isolated a microorganism which is definitely not from Earth. We haven't seen anything like this. The team managed to bring it out of its latent state and even registered cell division! They named it Kelvin. Isn't it cute?"

You see some intangible picture from an electronic microscope where a cell lazily divides in two. If this is what it looks, with the temperature increase we have probably revived something that once lived on Mars!

column2: We have discovered a multi-celled organism of extra-terrestrial origin.
column3: We have discovered a multi-celled organism of extra-terrestrial origin.
column4: Odkryliśmy wielokomórkowy organizm niepochodzący z Ziemi.

column2: We should create a Martian Park with original Mars life. What could go wrong?
column3: We should create a Martian Park with original Mars life. What could go wrong?
column4: Powinniśmy zbudować Park Marsjański prezentujący pierwotne życie Marsa. Co może pójść nie tak?

column2: Continue, but install HUGE flamethrowers in the room, as a precaution.
column3: Continue, but install HUGE flamethrowers in the room, as a precaution.
column4: Kontynuujcie badania, ale zainstalujcie w laboratorium WIELKIE miotacze ognia. Na wszelki wypadek.

column2: Mars is a human domain now. Destroy this organism and don't pursue this line of research.
column3: Mars is a human domain now. Destroy this organism and don't pursue this line of research.
column4: Mars należy teraz do człowieka. Zniszczcie to i nie badajcie dalej tego zagadnienia.

column2:
The native organism Kelvin we revived on Mars turned out to be a deadly monster. No one ever expected that to happen. It grew super fast to the size of a cat, but with tentacles; then it ate the cat of one of the scientists; then one of the scientists went looking for her cat and got eaten too, and then another one while looking for her...

In the end, the monster was heroically killed by the janitor who lost an arm, mounted a Drone claw in place of it and crafted a makeshift high voltage taser from the Drone battery. When security finally broke into the central room, they saw only the surviving janitor who was yelling "WHERE! WHERE IS THE NEXT LEVEL?!"

<effect>A Research Lab is destroyed and all workers are dead. A drone is destroyed and the Colonist <DisplayName> gains the Chronic Condition and Survivor Traits.
column3:
The native organism Kelvin we revived on Mars turned out to be a deadly monster. No one ever expected that to happen. It grew super fast to the size of a cat, but with tentacles; then it ate the cat of one of the scientists; then one of the scientists went looking for her cat and got eaten too, and then another one while looking for her...

In the end, the monster was heroically killed by the janitor who lost an arm, mounted a Drone claw in place of it and crafted a makeshift high voltage taser from the Drone battery. When security finally broke into the central room, they saw only the surviving janitor who was yelling "WHERE! WHERE IS THE NEXT LEVEL?!"

<effect>A Дасьледчая лабараторыя is destroyed and all workers are dead. A drone is destroyed and the Colonist <DisplayName> gains the Chronic Condition and Survivor Traits.

column2: Incinerate the monster's remains and reward the janitor.
column3: Incinerate the monster's remains and reward the janitor.
column4: Spalcie szczątki potwora i nagrodźcie portiera.

column2: Scoop the monster's remains. For science!
column3: Scoop the monster's remains. For science!
column4: Zgarnijcie szczątki potwora na szufelkę. Dla nauki!

column2: We need more of those monsters to build a Martian Park.
column3: We need more of those monsters to build a Martian Park.
column4: Potrzebujemy więcej takich potworów do Parku Marsjańskiego.

column2:
The native organism Kelvin we revived on Mars turned out to be a deadly monster. No one ever expected that to happen - except you, Commander!

The creature grew super fast to the size of a cat, but with tentacles, then it tried to break free by destroying the bulletproof glass of the lab case in which it was imprisoned. The heavy industrial flamers above were auto-activated and wreathed the creature in a ring of fire. It wasn't badly hurt, but in a violent burst of rage it has torn itself to pieces. 

Seems there is a perfectly good reason why Mars has become a wasteland planet.
column3:
The native organism Kelvin we revived on Mars turned out to be a deadly monster. No one ever expected that to happen - except you, Commander!

The creature grew super fast to the size of a cat, but with tentacles, then it tried to break free by destroying the bulletproof glass of the lab case in which it was imprisoned. The heavy industrial flamers above were auto-activated and wreathed the creature in a ring of fire. It wasn't badly hurt, but in a violent burst of rage it has torn itself to pieces. 

Seems there is a perfectly good reason why Mars has become a wasteland planet.

column2: Put the monster's remains on display.
column3: Put the monster's remains on display.

column2: research boost by 5% in the field of Biotech
column3: research boost by 5% in the field of Biotech
column4: przyspieszenie badań w dziedzinie biotechnologii o 5%

column2: Scrape off the monster's remains. For science!
column3: Scrape off the monster's remains. For science!
column4: Zgarnijcie szczątki potwora na szufelkę. Dla nauki!

column2: I will personally perform the dissection.
column3: I will personally perform the dissection.

column2: Monsters or not, they deserve to live! More of them should run free in the wild.
column3: Monsters or not, they deserve to live! More of them should run free in the wild.
column4: Potwory czy nie – one też zasługują na to, by żyć! Powinniśmy mieć ich więcej na wolności.

column2:
Who would expect that the native life forms we revived - the Kelvins, would be able to escape our custody and start to hunt humans!

<effect>Lately, there are a lot of casualties caused by them. For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed by Kelvins.
column3:
Who would expect that the native life forms we revived - the Kelvins, would be able to escape our custody and start to hunt humans!

<effect>Lately, there are a lot of casualties caused by them. For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed by Kelvins.

column2: Announce a hunting season to decrease the Kelvins' population.
column3: Announce a hunting season to decrease the Kelvins' population.
column4: Ogłoś sezon polowań na kelwiny w celu ograniczenia ich liczebności.

column2: The Kelvins have the right to live according to the laws of Nature.
column3: The Kelvins have the right to live according to the laws of Nature.
column4: Kelwiny mają prawo do życia zgodnie z prawami natury.

column2:
There are even more casualties caused by the native life forms we revived - the Kelvins. The little monsters use the Martian vegetation to hide and hunt humans.
However, there are a lot of reports of Kelvins which tend to attack each other or even themselves when under stress.

<effect>For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed by Kelvins.
column3:
There are even more casualties caused by the native life forms we revived - the Kelvins. The little monsters use the Martian vegetation to hide and hunt humans.
However, there are a lot of reports of Kelvins which tend to attack each other or even themselves when under stress.

<effect>For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed by Kelvins.

column2: Everyone remain calm! We have the situation under control.
column3: Everyone remain calm! We have the situation under control.
column4: Niech wszyscy zachowają spokój! Panujemy nad sytuacją.

column2: Announce a hunting season to decrease the Kelvins' population.
column3: Announce a hunting season to decrease the Kelvins' population.
column4: Ogłoś sezon polowań na kelwiny w celu ograniczenia ich liczebności.

column2: Hunting is cruel and unethical even in this extreme case.
column3: Hunting is cruel and unethical even in this extreme case.
column4: Polowanie jest okrutne i nieetyczne nawet w tak skrajnym przypadku.

column2: all Vegan Colonists gain Morale, some more people die
column3: all Vegan Colonists gain Morale, some more people die
column4: wszyscy koloniści-weganie zyskują morale, ginie jeszcze kilku ludzi

column2:
The native life forms we revived - the Kelvins, turned out to be a savage, bloodthirsty, and extremely stupid species. They acted with blind aggression towards everything - from people, to random rocks; from enemies, to mating partners. No wonder they didn't make it.

At least we have learned something from this calamity.

<effect>For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed; the Kelvins are now extinct. New Techs have been discovered.
column3:
The native life forms we revived - the Kelvins, turned out to be a savage, bloodthirsty, and extremely stupid species. They acted with blind aggression towards everything - from people, to random rocks; from enemies, to mating partners. No wonder they didn't make it.

At least we have learned something from this calamity.

<effect>For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed; the Kelvins are now extinct. New Techs have been discovered.

column2: You have to admit, the Kelvins were a sight to behold.
column3: You have to admit, the Kelvins were a sight to behold.
column4: Musicie przyznać, że kelwiny stanowiły imponujący widok.

column2: Mother Nature works in mysterious ways.
column3: Mother Nature works in mysterious ways.

column2:
One of the genetically revived monsters we accidentally released - a Kelvin, had bad luck today. It decided to attack Ms. <DisplayName> - a martial artist, survivalist and distant relative to the film star Nuck Chorris. According to some eyewitness reports, our girl managed to take manual control of a drone and in a glorious jousting ride, she used it to smash the monster against the dome wall. Others insist that she roundhouse kicked the monster against the wall.

<effect>A Dome is damaged. <DisplayName> became a Celebrity.
column3:
One of the genetically revived monsters we accidentally released - a Kelvin, had bad luck today. It decided to attack Ms. <DisplayName> - a martial artist, survivalist and distant relative to the film star Nuck Chorris. According to some eyewitness reports, our girl managed to take manual control of a drone and in a glorious jousting ride, she used it to smash the monster against the dome wall. Others insist that she roundhouse kicked the monster against the wall.

<effect>A Dome is damaged. <DisplayName> became a Celebrity.

column2: She rode a Drone to victory.
column3: She rode a Drone to victory.

column2: She did both at the same time, while knitting with titanium wire.
column3: She did both at the same time, while knitting with titanium wire.
column4: Zrobiła jedno i drugie równocześnie, przy okazji szydełkując szalik z drutu tytanowego.

column2:
If we manage to redirect it and take it down, it will provide plenty of frozen water to our terraforming effort. We can achieve this by mounting engines on the icy rock, and by guiding it to crash on Mars.

Giant asteroid crashing on a planet - what could go wrong?
column3:
If we manage to redirect it and take it down, it will provide plenty of frozen water to our terraforming effort. We can achieve this by mounting engines on the icy rock, and by guiding it to crash on Mars.

Giant asteroid crashing on a planet - what could go wrong?

column2: We have discovered a giant ice asteroid in close proximity.
column3: We have discovered a giant ice asteroid in close proximity.
column4: Odkryliśmy olbrzymią lodową asteroidę w pobliżu Marsa.

column2: Send drones to operate the engines and steer it on a collision course.
column3: Send drones to operate the engines and steer it on a collision course.
column4: Wyślijcie drony, by sterowały silnikami i skierowały asteroidę na kurs kolizyjny.

column3: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')> which will cause a Marsquake
column4: odblokowuje ekspedycję dającą <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>, która wywoła trzęsienie Marsa

column2: Send a drone-controlled rocket to mount engines on the Asteroid and splash it on Mars. We should expect a Marsquake when this happens.
column3: Send a drone-controlled rocket to mount engines on the Asteroid and splash it on Mars. We should expect a Marsquake when this happens.
column4: Wyślijcie rakietę sterowaną przez drony, aby zamontowały silniki na asteroidzie i spowodowały jej rozbicie na Marsie. Po uderzeniu możemy się spodziewać trzęsienia Marsa.

column2: Send drones and a team to extract them, then detonate in orbit.
column3: Send drones and a team to extract them, then detonate in orbit.
column4: Wyślijcie drony i zespół specjalistów, by je stamtąd zabrał, a potem spowodujcie detonację na orbicie.

column2: Send a team to mount engines on the Asteroid and detonate it in the atmosphere for a boost of evaporated gases and water.
column3: Send a team to mount engines on the Asteroid and detonate it in the atmosphere for a boost of evaporated gases and water.
column4: Wyślijcie zespół specjalistów, aby zamontowali silniki na asteroidzie i spowodowały jej detonację w atmosferze. Dzięki temu otrzymamy duży dopływ odparowanych gazów i wody.

column2: I will lead a team to mount the engines and crash it on the other side of Mars.
column3: I will lead a team to mount the engines and crash it on the other side of Mars.
column4: Osobiście poprowadzę zespół, który zamontuje silniki na asteroidzie i doprowadzi do jej rozbicia po drugiej stronie Marsa.

column2: Send a team to mount engines on the Asteroid, navigate and splash it on the other side of Mars.
column3: Send a team to mount engines on the Asteroid, navigate and splash it on the other side of Mars.
column4: Wyślijcie zespół specjalistów, aby zamontowali silniki na asteroidzie i doprowadzili do jej rozbicia po drugiej stronie Marsa.

column2: I don't want to put the colony at risk.
column3: I don't want to put the colony at risk.
column4: Nie będę narażać kolonii na zagrożenie.

column2:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Ice Asteroid to the surface of Mars. We were congratulating ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet, when the distant thunder indicated the impact.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>.
<drones_lost> Drones have been lost.
A Marsquake has just started.

The rocket returned after successfully detonating the Ice Asteroid. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

column2:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Ice Asteroid on a collision course on the other side of Mars. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo_small,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water_mid,'WaterTP')>.
column3:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Ice Asteroid on a collision course on the other side of Mars. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo_small,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water_mid,'WaterTP')>.

column2:
This bacteria strain has adapted to the climate of Mars and cheerfully replicates even in these harsh conditions. We only need to release it in the underground water system and distribute it in this way around the planet, so it can thrive in the ferric oxide rich waters of the Red Planet.

The problem is, someone has spread a rumor that this bacteria causes respiratory problems. This is nonsense, but people are worried.
column3:
This bacteria strain has adapted to the climate of Mars and cheerfully replicates even in these harsh conditions. We only need to release it in the underground water system and distribute it in this way around the planet, so it can thrive in the ferric oxide rich waters of the Red Planet.

The problem is, someone has spread a rumor that this bacteria causes respiratory problems. This is nonsense, but people are worried.

column2: In one of our oldest water tanks we have discovered a stable colony of iron-oxidizing bacteria.
column3: In one of our oldest water tanks we have discovered a stable colony of iron-oxidizing bacteria.
column4: W jednym z naszych najstarszych zbiorników wodnych odkryliśmy stabilną kolonię bakterii żelazowych.

column2: Ignore their concerns. Send a Geologist team to distribute the Bacteria.
column3: Ignore their concerns. Send a Geologist team to distribute the Bacteria.

column2:
Used rocket stages, dead satellites and all kind of debris – we have surely left our mark on Mars orbit as we have done with our own planet. Even though it can eventually endanger the space flights, all this stuff tends to burn into Mars' young atmosphere and help raise the temperature levels.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>.
column3:
Used rocket stages, dead satellites and all kind of debris – we have surely left our mark on Mars orbit as we have done with our own planet. Even though it can eventually endanger the space flights, all this stuff tends to burn into Mars' young atmosphere and help raise the temperature levels.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>.

column2: Everywhere we Humans go, for sure there is one thing we leave behind: junk.
column3: Everywhere we Humans go, for sure there is one thing we leave behind: junk.

column3: Looks more like a solution, not like a problem! Leave it be.

<effect>Fuel costs decreased back to normal.

column2:
Our space is a graveyard of old satellites, spare parts and all kinds of debris from the size of a snowflake, to the size of a small car. No wonder when the first rain of junk appeared, it looked like an asteroid bombardment.

This issue cannot wait any longer.

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started. Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>. Rocket Fuel costs further increased by <fuel_costs>.
An Expedition to reclaim resources and decrease Fuel costs has been unlocked.

Our space is a graveyard of old satellites, spare parts and all kinds of debris from the size of a snowflake, to the size of a small car. No wonder when the first rain of junk appeared, it looked like an asteroid bombardment.

column3: Waiting this long was a mistake.

column2: Disregard all complaints. Everything is going according to the plan.
column3: Disregard all complaints. Everything is going according to the plan.

column2:
There is some puzzling news from the power supply supervisor. Apparently, a half-melted toolbox full of screwdrivers has smashed into a Stirling Generator and has, well, screwed it. Who may have dropped a toolbox in space, is now the smaller issue.

<effect>A building is destroyed.
column3:
There is some puzzling news from the power supply supervisor. Apparently, a half-melted toolbox full of screwdrivers has smashed into a Генератар стырлінгу and has, well, screwed it. Who may have dropped a toolbox in space, is now the smaller issue.

<effect>A building is destroyed.

column3: Junk in Space: It's Raining Junk!
column4: Kosmiczne śmieci – złom leci nam na głowy!

column2:
A box of nails has rained down from the sky, red hot from the friction with the atmosphere, and has nailed hard one of our Atomic accumulators. 

The big question remains - who found any use for nails in outer space? And who would have thrown them out?

<effect>A building has exploded.

column2: Ivan, how many times have I told you...
column3: Ivan, how many times have I told you...
column4: Iwan, ile razy mam ci mówić...

column2: I'm still waiting for the hammer to fall.
column3: I'm still waiting for the hammer to fall.

column2:
Orbital control has warned you about a giant ball of garbage heading to our location. It looks like it has formed in our orbit, but that cannot explain the traces of organic matter. Some jokingly speculate it was launched from Earth as a desperate attempt to get rid of their own junk.

<effect>A Meteor Storm is on its way. You have 1 Sol to prepare and build more MDS Lasers to protect the colony.
column3:

column2: Garbage for some, treasure for others.
column3: Garbage for some, treasure for others.

column2: Garbage or not, depends on how you feel about it.
column3: Garbage or not, depends on how you feel about it.

column2: I have nothing to do with that, I swear.
column3: I have nothing to do with that, I swear.
column4: Nie mam z tym nic do czynienia, przysięgam.

column2:
A giant ball of garbage is about to splash on the surface and destroy the world as we know it! Luckily, we have lasers to blast it to smelly pieces. And what is considered junk on Earth, on Mars is useful fertilizer.

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started. Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')> for each working MDS Laser.

column2: This must be the smelliest object in the known universe!
column3: This must be the smelliest object in the known universe!
column4: To chyba najbardziej cuchnący obiekt w znanym Wszechświecie!

column2: We will survive this, or I'll eat my shorts.
column3: We will survive this, or I'll eat my shorts.
column4: Przetrwamy to, inaczej zjem własne spodnie.

column2:
The genius has gathered statistical data and discovered that the level of violent crimes at one of our Domes is much lower than the average. He wondered why, and just recently he studied the water sources on Mars and discovered something in the water at this Dome - a chemical compound which makes people more peaceful and cooperative.

More importantly, the genius managed to isolate the compound! We call it the "Water of Peace formula". With some technical help, we can produce and distribute it over the whole planet while we terraform it, or even to Earth. With the unstable political situation back on Earth, this may be the solution for world peace!
column3:
The genius has gathered statistical data and discovered that the level of violent crimes at one of our Domes is much lower than the average. He wondered why, and just recently he studied the water sources on Mars and discovered something in the water at this Dome - a chemical compound which makes people more peaceful and cooperative.

More importantly, the genius managed to isolate the compound! We call it the "Water of Peace formula". With some technical help, we can produce and distribute it over the whole planet while we terraform it, or even to Earth. With the unstable political situation back on Earth, this may be the solution for world peace!

column2: An enthusiastic colonist rushes into your office with a glorious idea.
column3: An enthusiastic colonist rushes into your office with a glorious idea.
column4: Jakiś rozentuzjazmowany kolonista wpada do twojego gabinetu ze wspaniałym pomysłem.

column2: This is a unique opportunity! Permission granted for production.
column3: This is a unique opportunity! Permission granted for production.
column4: To niezwykła okazja! Udzielam zezwolenia na produkcję.

column2: Influencing people like this sounds highly unethical. Permission denied.
column3: Influencing people like this sounds highly unethical. Permission denied.
column4: Manipulowanie ludźmi w ten sposób jest wysoce nieetyczne. Nie pozwalam.

column2: Let me see this diagram. Have you compared it to other statistics in the region?
column3: Let me see this diagram. Have you compared it to other statistics in the region?
column4: Pokaż mi ten wykres. A porównałeś z innymi statystykami dotyczącymi tej okolicy?

column2:
The Water of Peace formula discovered by our genius colonist <DisplayName> is surprisingly easy to reproduce and aside from making people nicer to each other, it slightly decreases the melting point of water, which may be enough to make a difference on planetary scale. We could easily incorporate it in our water supply and irrigation systems and spread its benefits throughout the planet, or bottle it and sell it to Earth.

We don't have the resources to do both.
column3:
The Water of Peace formula discovered by our genius colonist <DisplayName> is surprisingly easy to reproduce and aside from making people nicer to each other, it slightly decreases the melting point of water, which may be enough to make a difference on planetary scale. We could easily incorporate it in our water supply and irrigation systems and spread its benefits throughout the planet, or bottle it and sell it to Earth.

We don't have the resources to do both.

column2: Go on, spread it on Mars!
column3: Go on, spread it on Mars!

column2: Let's make some money of it. Patent it and sell it to Earth.
column3: Let's make some money of it. Patent it and sell it to Earth.
column4: Zaróbmy coś na tym. Opatentować i sprzedawać na Ziemi.
otrzymujesz <funding(funding_gain)> w ciągu 1 sola, nieznane następstwa

column2: Sounds too good to be true. We may need further research before we delve deeper.
column3: Sounds too good to be true. We may need further research before we delve deeper.
column4: To wszystko jest zbyt piękne, żeby było prawdziwe. Zanim pójdziemy dalej, potrzebujemy więcej badań.

column2: On second thought, we'd rather drop this project.
column3: Калі падумаць, лепш адмовімся ад гэтага праэкта.
column4: Po zastanowieniu... lepiej zarzućmy ten projekt.

column2:
Your security advisor comes to your office with a large folder in hand. She warns you about some suspicious activity they initially thought to be sabotage: chemical compounds missing from a lab, satellites redirected from a certain point on Mars... Turns out, our friend <DisplayName> who wanted to improve mankind with his pacifying Water of Peace, has taken things into his own hands.

<DisplayName> secretly produced a large quantity of the Water of Peace compound. The genius found a way to use water extractors for delivering it into the underground water system and even discovered that as a side effect, it slightly decreases the melting point of water, allowing for a terraforming benefit.
column3:
Your security advisor comes to your office with a large folder in hand. She warns you about some suspicious activity they initially thought to be sabotage: chemical compounds missing from a lab, satellites redirected from a certain point on Mars... Turns out, our friend <DisplayName> who wanted to improve mankind with his pacifying Water of Peace, has taken things into his own hands.

<DisplayName> secretly produced a large quantity of the Water of Peace compound. The genius found a way to use water extractors for delivering it into the underground water system and even discovered that as a side effect, it slightly decreases the melting point of water, allowing for a terraforming benefit.

column2: He seems really confident that it’ll work. Let's see how it unfolds.
column3: He seems really confident that it’ll work. Let's see how it unfolds.
column4: Wygląda na to, że on jest pewny skuteczności swojej substancji. Zobaczmy, jak się rozwinie sytuacja.

column2: Immediately put a stop to this unsanctioned activity!
column3: Immediately put a stop to this unsanctioned activity!

column2:
The research confirmed the claims of <DisplayName>, our genius. The Water of Peace really helps people soothe their emotions, reduce stress and aggression and be better people in general. When one compares renegade activity and crime rates in different domes and back on Earth, the Dome where the Water of Peace compound was discovered shines with much better numbers. 

Yet the comparison of different statistics shows an alarming trend. The rate of people with extraordinary low IQ in this Dome is unexpectedly high. There may be some connection, or this may be a random correlation.
column3:
The research confirmed the claims of <DisplayName>, our genius. The Water of Peace really helps people soothe their emotions, reduce stress and aggression and be better people in general. When one compares renegade activity and crime rates in different domes and back on Earth, the Dome where the Water of Peace compound was discovered shines with much better numbers. 

Yet the comparison of different statistics shows an alarming trend. The rate of people with extraordinary low IQ in this Dome is unexpectedly high. There may be some connection, or this may be a random correlation.

column2: It is a random correlation. Spread the Water of Peace and save the world!
column3: It is a random correlation. Spread the Water of Peace and save the world!
column4: To przypadkowa korelacja. Rozpowszechniajmy wodę pokoju i ocalmy świat!

column2: It is alarming. Put a stop to this project.
column3: It is alarming. Put a stop to this project.

column2:
"Commander, the operation went as planned. We produced vast quantities of the Water of Peace and placed them in them water extractors. When they workd, this water of Piece entered them undergraund deposits. It didnt work purfect as mars wata supply is veri lou but it stil afekted a lots of peoples. We fil gud as we never biin frends liek dis befor. All is wel comander no wore!!!!!""

It seems this Water of Peace reacted chemically with another element in the Martian waters and now not only affects the natural aggressiveness of human beings, but it also drastically reduces their overall intelligence. 

<effect><count_idiots> Colonists gain the Idiot and the Enthusiast traits. Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>. The genius loses Sanity.

column2:
Planetary scale temperature changes have created huge salty geysers from an underground brine deposit.

We can send digging and pumping equipment to speed up the process and turn these waters into a surface stream. It won't be easy nor pretty, but it's a start. 

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water_small,'WaterTP')>.
column3:
Planetary scale temperature changes have created huge salty geysers from an underground brine deposit.

We can send digging and pumping equipment to speed up the process and turn these waters into a surface stream. It won't be easy nor pretty, but it's a start. 

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water_small,'WaterTP')>.

column2:
It doesn't look like something which can be produced here on Mars, neither back on Earth. And when our scientists tried to cut a piece of it with a laser, things went really crazy. Apparently, any light projected through the pyramid comes back from one of its sides minutes or hours later, with an interval which differs according to the laser used. One thing is certain: this artifact has an alien origin.

We are confused with all of the proposed theories - starting from "a medium for contacting an alien civilization", to "compressed space which holds a whole universe". Of course, the old mantra about observation changing the observed object was also repeated. 

Scientists can talk like that for days, but someone has to make a decision and give some direction to their research.
column3:
It doesn't look like something which can be produced here on Mars, neither back on Earth. And when our scientists tried to cut a piece of it with a laser, things went really crazy. Apparently, any light projected through the pyramid comes back from one of its sides minutes or hours later, with an interval which differs according to the laser used. One thing is certain: this artifact has an alien origin.

We are confused with all of the proposed theories - starting from "a medium for contacting an alien civilization", to "compressed space which holds a whole universe". Of course, the old mantra about observation changing the observed object was also repeated. 

Scientists can talk like that for days, but someone has to make a decision and give some direction to their research.

column2: This is either a warning or some act of aggression. Be careful!
column3: This is either a warning or some act of aggression. Be careful!
column4: To albo ostrzeżenie, albo jakaś forma agresji. Bądźcie czujni!

column2:
The lead researcher investigating the alien Pyramid has come to your office with exciting news. When an ultraviolet laser at a  particular wavelength is directed at the object, the reaction interval is zero: in this case, the light comes out immediately, and it projects a 3D picture of geometrical proportions. The scientist managed to decrypt a simple message, and its rough meaning is in front of you in the form of text compiled by her.

YOU ARE 1. WE ARE 1. SUM IS MORE THAN 2.

As it seems, they have recognized us as another intelligent species which makes the Universe a less lonely place and probably opens the door to future cooperation.

We have no means to communicate with these creatures. We can only give them an answer with our actions, and hope all is settled.

YOU ARE 1. WE ARE 1. SUM IS MORE THAN 2.

As it seems, they have recognized us as another intelligent species which makes the Universe a less lonely place and probably opens the door to future cooperation.

We have no means to communicate with these creatures. We can only give them an answer with our actions, and hope all is settled.
