A more thorough examination revealed that they are showing the relative positions of the other crystals we haven’t yet powered up. As weird as it seems, we all get the impression that they urge us to complete the process for the rest of them.

<hint>Power-up all Alien Crystals to complete the mystery.

column2: I wonder what they are trying to show us.
column3: I wonder what they are trying to show us.

column2: Some of our team members suggest that we should power-up more Alien Crystals and observe their behavior.
column3: Some of our team members suggest that we should power-up more Alien Crystals and observe their behavior.
column4: Niektórzy członkowie naszej drużyny sugerują zasilenie większej liczby kosmicznych kryształów w celu obserwacji ich zachowania.

column2: Last night, nightmares plagued the colony. We all experienced an overwhelming feeling of loss and grief. Could this be related to the destruction of the crystals?
column3: Last night, nightmares plagued the colony. We all experienced an overwhelming feeling of loss and grief. Could this be related to the destruction of the crystals?
column4: Ostatniej nocy całą kolonię nawiedziły koszmary. Wszyscy doświadczyliśmy przytłaczającego poczucia straty i smutku. Czy może to być związane ze zniszczeniem kryształów?

column2:
At today’s briefing the Chief Scientist has presented us with her conclusion – our actions are to blame for the permanent change in the behavior of the crystals. Their energy signature has changed and they no longer emanate their gleeful auras. The Chief Scientist gave us the stare while we were reviewing the data.

The silence was broken by the Tactical Commander who dismissed the allegations. ‘How could you believe that some stones could possess intelligence and personality? They are simply exotic matter for us to harvest and exploit!’. We kept it professional and no argument was started, but many of us somehow knew that we have harmed living beings.

<hint>Destroy all Crystals to finish the Mystery.
column3:
At today’s briefing the Chief Scientist has presented us with her conclusion – our actions are to blame for the permanent change in the behavior of the crystals. Their energy signature has changed and they no longer emanate their gleeful auras. The Chief Scientist gave us the stare while we were reviewing the data.

The silence was broken by the Tactical Commander who dismissed the allegations. ‘How could you believe that some stones could possess intelligence and personality? They are simply exotic matter for us to harvest and exploit!’. We kept it professional and no argument was started, but many of us somehow knew that we have harmed living beings.

<hint>Destroy all Crystals to finish the Mystery.

column2: We will do whatever it takes to pave the way for the future generations on Mars.
column3: We will do whatever it takes to pave the way for the future generations on Mars.
column4: Nie cofniemy się przed niczym, aby wytyczyć drogę dla przyszłych pokoleń marsjańskich kolonistów.

column2: The continuous destruction of the alien crystals has led to some irreversible change in their shared behaviour. We can only continue to harvest them for the precious research information they provide.
column3: The continuous destruction of the alien crystals has led to some irreversible change in their shared behaviour. We can only continue to harvest them for the precious research information they provide.
column4: Nieustanne niszczenie kosmicznych kryształów spowodowało jakąś nieodwracalną zmianę w ich zachowaniu. Możemy już tylko dalej pozyskiwać z nich cenne informacje badawcze.

column2: Human nature is such that we have to learn how to live with the consequences of our irreversible actions. For we usually understand the beauty and the value of things only after we have destroyed them.
column3: Human nature is such that we have to learn how to live with the consequences of our irreversible actions. For we usually understand the beauty and the value of things only after we have destroyed them.
column4: Nieodłącznym elementem ludzkiej natury jest konieczność akceptowania konsekwencji naszych nieodwracalnych czynów. Albowiem piękno i wartość rzeczy zwykle rozumiemy dopiero po ich zniszczeniu.

column2:
One by one, the Alien Crystals perished under our rule. We perceived them as mere resources, as milestones on our path to master the Universe. Only until we have finally gathered all the pieces we were able to see the puzzle and understand the wrongness of our actions. The crystals weren’t singular entities but rather the different organs of an intelligent, thinking alien being.

For millennia the creature traveled through the vast expanse of space in its primal form - a swarm of meteor-like crystals. It fell on Mars and began its cocoon period, forming the outer shell of its parts from the fine dust and absorbing the bleak solar radiation. It probably felt hope when we arrived and started feeding it energy, but then we could only imagine its desperation when it realized we were killing it. It tried to warn us, to talk to us, to plead us, but we ignored it. Now it’s only a memory. And we ask ourselves, was it worth it?l
column3:
One by one, the Alien Crystals perished under our rule. We perceived them as mere resources, as milestones on our path to master the Universe. Only until we have finally gathered all the pieces we were able to see the puzzle and understand the wrongness of our actions. The crystals weren’t singular entities but rather the different organs of an intelligent, thinking alien being.

For millennia the creature traveled through the vast expanse of space in its primal form - a swarm of meteor-like crystals. It fell on Mars and began its cocoon period, forming the outer shell of its parts from the fine dust and absorbing the bleak solar radiation. It probably felt hope when we arrived and started feeding it energy, but then we could only imagine its desperation when it realized we were killing it. It tried to warn us, to talk to us, to plead us, but we ignored it. Now it’s only a memory. And we ask ourselves, was it worth it?l

column2: Regrets bring nothing constructive. We did what was needed to survive and thrive.
column3: Regrets bring nothing constructive. We did what was needed to survive and thrive.
column4: Żal nie jest konstruktywny. Zrobiliśmy to, co było niezbędne dla naszego przetrwania i rozkwitu.

column2: The last of the crystal entities has been destroyed. We feel richer in knowledge but deprived of some higher truth we could have witnessed. But the prosperity of humans on Mars has been secured thanks to our actions, and that’s what matters.
column3: The last of the crystal entities has been destroyed. We feel richer in knowledge but deprived of some higher truth we could have witnessed. But the prosperity of humans on Mars has been secured thanks to our actions, and that’s what matters.
column4: Ostatnia z krystalicznych istot została zniszczona. Wzbogaciliśmy swoją wiedzę, ale przeoczyliśmy jakąś głębszą prawdę, której mogliśmy doświadczyć. Jednak nasze działania przyczyniły się do rozkwitu ludzkości na Marsie, a to się liczy.

column2: We watched the transformation of the Alien Crystals in awe. They shed their shells and their beautiful energy forms converged into a single vortex high in the pale Martian skies. We all basked in their light and the joy which vibrantly emanated from them.
column3: We watched the transformation of the Alien Crystals in awe. They shed their shells and their beautiful energy forms converged into a single vortex high in the pale Martian skies. We all basked in their light and the joy which vibrantly emanated from them.
column4: Z zachwytem obserwowaliśmy przemianę kosmicznych kryształów. Zrzuciły one swoją powłokę, a ich piękne promienne postacie stopiły się w jeden wir, wysoko na bladym marsjańskim niebie. Skąpaliśmy się w ich żywym świetle i radości.

column2: We have unraveled another of the nature’s wondrous mysteries and the magnificent sight and the sense of accomplishment were worth all the effort. The crystals were the cocoon form of a single entity which lied dormant for millennia under the bleak sun on Mars. We fed it and nurtured it, giving it the energy it lacked on the Red Planet and it tried to repay us the favor. Now that its parts have all transformed and converged into a singular entity, it is ready to take back to the stars from where it came. We all know all of this because we feel its joy and can hear its song, deep into our minds. Farewell, cosmic traveler! And come back if you want to visit your old friends some day! A large amount of resources has been placed near the colony as a farewell gift. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: We have unraveled another of the nature’s wondrous mysteries and the magnificent sight and the sense of accomplishment were worth all the effort. The crystals were the cocoon form of a single entity which lied dormant for millennia under the bleak sun on Mars. We fed it and nurtured it, giving it the energy it lacked on the Red Planet and it tried to repay us the favor. Now that its parts have all transformed and converged into a singular entity, it is ready to take back to the stars from where it came. We all know all of this because we feel its joy and can hear its song, deep into our minds. Farewell, cosmic traveler! And come back if you want to visit your old friends some day! A large amount of resources has been placed near the colony as a farewell gift. Gained a new Technology, .

column2: We were truly blessed to witness such an awe-inspiring event!
column3: We were truly blessed to witness such an awe-inspiring event!
column4: Możliwość obserwacji tak zachwycającego wydarzenia to prawdziwe błogosławieństwo!

column2: By powering up all the crystals, we helped the alien creature which lied dormant and marooned on Mars complete the next phase of its life cycle. It has taken off to the stars, and we all know that our first contact with an alien race has earned us a friend.
column3: By powering up all the crystals, we helped the alien creature which lied dormant and marooned on Mars complete the next phase of its life cycle. It has taken off to the stars, and we all know that our first contact with an alien race has earned us a friend.
column4: Dostarczając wszystkim kryształom energię, pomogliśmy obcej istocie, która spoczywała w uśpieniu uwięziona na Marsie. Dzięki nam przeszła do następnej fazy rozwojowej i wyruszyła w kosmiczną podróż. A my wiemy, że dzięki pierwszemu kontaktowi z obcą cywilizacją zyskaliśmy przyjaciela.

column2: The destroyed crystal brings even more exotic matter for our scientists to analyze, but there's something else. A shared feeling of grief and loss takes over the colony the moment the crystal dissolves.
column3: The destroyed crystal brings even more exotic matter for our scientists to analyze, but there's something else. A shared feeling of grief and loss takes over the colony the moment the crystal dissolves.
column4: Zniszczony kryształ daje naszym naukowcom więcej egzotycznej materii do badań, ale nie tylko. W chwili, gdy kryształ się rozpada, całą kolonię ogarnia smutek i poczucie straty.

column2: The Chief Scientist with her inquisitive mind made the observation that the entire team feels the same, even those who aren't directly involved in the destruction of the crystal. She is sure that the crystals are begging us to stop hurting their brethren and that’s why she has filed a request to cease all operations on crystal salvaging. The Tactical Commander urges us to dismiss such claims as ‘ludicrous’ and to think about the scientific possibilities ahead of us.
column3: The Chief Scientist with her inquisitive mind made the observation that the entire team feels the same, even those who aren't directly involved in the destruction of the crystal. She is sure that the crystals are begging us to stop hurting their brethren and that’s why she has filed a request to cease all operations on crystal salvaging. The Tactical Commander urges us to dismiss such claims as ‘ludicrous’ and to think about the scientific possibilities ahead of us.
column4: Dzięki dociekliwemu umysłowi szefowa naukowców spostrzegła, że wszyscy w drużynie podzielają te same uczucia - także ci, którzy nie uczestniczyli bezpośrednio w zniszczeniu kryształu. Nasza uczona jest pewna, że kryształy błagają nas, abyśmy przestali krzywdzić ich braci, złożyła więc wniosek o przerwanie pozyskiwania ich na zasoby. Dowódca taktyczny nalega na odrzucenie tej propozycji jako absurdalnej i zwraca uwagę na możliwości badawcze, jakie daje zbieranie kryształów.

column2: The colony comes first, no matter what.
column3: The colony comes first, no matter what.
column4: Kolonia jest ważniejsza niż wszystko inne.

column2: The destruction of the alien crystal has earned us a lot of research data. This reveals the crystals’ tremendous scientific potential. But would it be a valid moral decision to place ourselves before the crystals?
column3: The destruction of the alien crystal has earned us a lot of research data. This reveals the crystals’ tremendous scientific potential. But would it be a valid moral decision to place ourselves before the crystals?
column4: Zniszczenie kosmicznego kryształu pozwoliło nam pozyskać mnóstwo danych badawczych, ujawniając ogromny potencjał naukowy tych obiektów. Czy jednak przedłożenie naszych interesów ponad obcą istotę może być moralnie uzasadnione?

column2: A sinkhole appeared overnight. It's more than 10 meters across and dangerously close by.
column3: A sinkhole appeared overnight. It's more than 10 meters across and dangerously close by.
column4: W nocy w powierzchni Marsa powstało zapadlisko. Jest niebezpiecznie blisko i ma ponad 10 metrów średnicy.

column2:
We should send an Explorer to assess the danger the sinkhole poses ASAP.

<effect>A new anomaly appears at the sinkhole site.
column3:
We should send an Explorer to assess the danger the sinkhole poses ASAP.

<effect>A new anomaly appears at the sinkhole site.

column2: A mysterious sinkhole on the surface of Mars.
column3: A mysterious sinkhole on the surface of Mars.
column4: Na powierzchni Marsa pojawiło się tajemnicze zapadlisko.

column2: A mysterious sinkhole has appeared on Mars. We should probably investigate it.
column3: A mysterious sinkhole has appeared on Mars. We should probably investigate it.
column4: Na Marsie pojawiło się tajemnicze zapadlisko. Chyba powinniśmy je zbadać.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: A Turn for the Positive
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: A Turn for the Positive

column2: We analyzed the sinkhole and deem it to be stable and not a safety concern.
column3: We analyzed the sinkhole and deem it to be stable and not a safety concern.
column4: Zbadaliśmy zapadlisko i uznaliśmy, że jest stabilne. Nie stanowi zagrożenia.

column2:
It is quite visible during the day and all vehicles have already added it to their navigation systems so they can easily avoid it.

The sinkhole exposed ancient lava tubes beneath the surface – rich in natural occurring polymers. This is truly a very interesting discovery we can exploit in several ways.
column3:
It is quite visible during the day and all vehicles have already added it to their navigation systems so they can easily avoid it.

The sinkhole exposed ancient lava tubes beneath the surface – rich in natural occurring polymers. This is truly a very interesting discovery we can exploit in several ways.

column2: We may learn a lot from this exposition. Leave it intact. (Gain <research(choice_param2)>)
column3: We may learn a lot from this exposition. Leave it intact. (Gain <research(choice_param2)>)
column4: Możemy się sporo dowiedzieć, badając tę odkrywkę. Nie ruszajcie jej. (Zdobywasz<research(choice_param2)>).

column2: The sinkhole turned out to be the entrance to ancient lava tubes below the surface of the planet.
column3: The sinkhole turned out to be the entrance to ancient lava tubes below the surface of the planet.
column4: Zapadlisko okazało się wejściem do starożytnych warstw geologicznych pod powierzchnią planety.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: Illuminating a Mystery
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: Illuminating a Mystery
column4: Ognie świętego Elma - Jasne jak słońce

column2: Vivid lights - hovering just slightly above the ground - were witnessed “roaming” around water containing structures for the better part of the Martian night.
column3: Vivid lights - hovering just slightly above the ground - were witnessed “roaming” around water containing structures for the better part of the Martian night.
column4: Zauważono, że przez dużą część marsjańskiej nocy wokół obiektów zawierających wodę pojawiają się jasne światełka unoszące się tuż nad ziemią.

column2:
We have limited surveillance footage that gives some credibility to the eye witnesses. 

Accounts like these are nothing new in general; the strain of the night shift is usually the culprit in such cases but the consistency and the sheer quantity of the reports make this one tough to dismiss.

Not to mention we seem to have unaccounted losses of water from our life support network.

<effect>Mysterious lights will appear at night and drain Water.
<hint>Turning off Water storages will protect our reserves, but not the rest of the Life Support grid.
column3:
We have limited surveillance footage that gives some credibility to the eye witnesses. 

Accounts like these are nothing new in general; the strain of the night shift is usually the culprit in such cases but the consistency and the sheer quantity of the reports make this one tough to dismiss.

Not to mention we seem to have unaccounted losses of water from our life support network.

<effect>Mysterious lights will appear at night and drain Water.
<hint>Turning off Water storages will protect our reserves, but not the rest of the Life Support grid.

column2: Unsettling. I doubt we have seen the last of this phenomenon.
column3: Unsettling. I doubt we have seen the last of this phenomenon.
column4: To niepokojące. Wątpię, aby miało się na tym skończyć.

column2: Mystery lights have began to appear near water-containing buildings at night and drain them.
column3: Mystery lights have began to appear near water-containing buildings at night and drain them.
column4: W pobliżu budynków zawierających wodę zaczęły pojawiać się w nocy tajemnicze światełka, które ją wykradają.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: Nights of Wonder
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: Nights of Wonder

column2: Ball lightning, St. Elmo’s Fire, or most probably something entirely different? Our citizens call them simply “wisps”.
column3: Ball lightning, St. Elmo’s Fire, or most probably something entirely different? Our citizens call them simply “wisps”.
column4: Piorun kulisty, ognie świętego Elma czy - jak przypuszczamy - coś zupełnie innego? Koloniści nazywają to po prostu „ognikami”.

column2:
They are fascinated with these strange lights, and who’s to blame them. They appear every night, “dance” around for a while and then go with the dawn - taking some of our precious water along and leaving us none the wiser. 

All in all, our scientists feel they have made enough observations and have data to work with towards solving this mystery, should we feel it takes priority.

<effect>St. Elmo’s Fire Research is available.
column3:
They are fascinated with these strange lights, and who’s to blame them. They appear every night, “dance” around for a while and then go with the dawn - taking some of our precious water along and leaving us none the wiser. 

All in all, our scientists feel they have made enough observations and have data to work with towards solving this mystery, should we feel it takes priority.

<effect>St. Elmo’s Fire Research is available.

column2: We will get to the bottom of this.
column3: We will get to the bottom of this.

column2: The St. Elmo’s Fire tech could reveal more about the strange events happening on Mars.
column3: The St. Elmo’s Fire tech could reveal more about the strange events happening on Mars.
column4: Technologia „Ognie świętego Elma” mogłaby ujawnić więcej wiadomości o ostatnich tajemniczych wydarzeniach na Marsie.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: Follow the Light
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: Follow the Light
column4: Ognie świętego Elma - Idź w stronę światła

column2: Observing at a distance won’t do when it comes to understanding the wisps. That much has become quite obvious by now.
column3: Observing at a distance won’t do when it comes to understanding the wisps. That much has become quite obvious by now.
column4: Stało się całkiem oczywiste, że obserwacje z dużej odległości nie wystarczą do zrozumienia ogników.

column2:
What has also become obvious is the strain on our water supply. Still, we know nothing of our thieves, save they originate from the sinkholes appearing all around.

Many feel that returning our Explorer for further analysis at a sinkhole site may be the only move we can currently make.

We have identified a sinkhole perfect for the task.

<hint>Send an Explorer to scan the anomaly at the chosen sinkhole site.
column3:
What has also become obvious is the strain on our water supply. Still, we know nothing of our thieves, save they originate from the sinkholes appearing all around.

Many feel that returning our Explorer for further analysis at a sinkhole site may be the only move we can currently make.

We have identified a sinkhole perfect for the task.

<hint>Send an Explorer to scan the anomaly at the chosen sinkhole site.

column2: We have to do risk management.
column3: We have to do risk management.

column2: This sinkhole is ideal for further analyzing.
column3: This sinkhole is ideal for further analyzing.
column4: To zapadlisko idealnie nadaje się do dokładniejszych badań.

column2: Sending an Explorer to the sinkhole near the colony would allow us to gain more intel on the nature of the wisps.
column3: Sending an Explorer to the sinkhole near the colony would allow us to gain more intel on the nature of the wisps.
column4: Wysłanie eksploratora do zapadliska w pobliżu kolonii umożliwi nam zdobycie dodatkowych informacji o naturze ogników.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: To Redefine Life
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: To Redefine Life
column4: Ognie świętego Elma - Nowa definicja życia

column2: Are wisps alive? Perhaps a non-carbon based life form? Are they intelligent?
column3: Are wisps alive? Perhaps a non-carbon based life form? Are they intelligent?
column4: Czy ogniki są żywe? Może są organizmami opierającymi się na innym pierwiastku niż węgiel? A czy są inteligentne?

column2:
So far what we know is that given water the wisps will use it to multiply, lighting up in certain areas and activating some vaguely understood mechanism which at face value resembles cell signaling – native to our current understanding of biological life. 

So they have processes for self-sustaining and cell signaling, albeit no actual cells, still two pillars of the definition of life as we employ it.

There is a discussion going on Mars. What comes out of it may cast a long shadow, far down the road head.
column3:
So far what we know is that given water the wisps will use it to multiply, lighting up in certain areas and activating some vaguely understood mechanism which at face value resembles cell signaling – native to our current understanding of biological life. 

So they have processes for self-sustaining and cell signaling, albeit no actual cells, still two pillars of the definition of life as we employ it.

There is a discussion going on Mars. What comes out of it may cast a long shadow, far down the road head.

column2: We are writing the textbooks on this one.
column3: We are writing the textbooks on this one.

column2: Recent findings about the wisps have given rise to the hypothesis that they may be a form of non-carbon based life. A discussion has began on how to treat the wisps going forward.
column3: Recent findings about the wisps have given rise to the hypothesis that they may be a form of non-carbon based life. A discussion has began on how to treat the wisps going forward.
column4: Ostatnie odkrycia dotyczące ogników dały podstawy dla hipotezy, że ogniki mogą być formą życia opierającego się na innym pierwiastku niż węgiel. Rozpoczęła się dyskusja o tym, jak należy odtąd traktować ogniki.

column2: Our scientists have come forward with an experiment hoping to improve our grasp of the wisp situation.
column3: Our scientists have come forward with an experiment hoping to improve our grasp of the wisp situation.
column4: Nasi naukowcy zaproponowali eksperyment, który zwiększy nasze zrozumienie kwestii ogników.

column2:
What the plan lacks in elegance it makes up with simplicity to execute. 

Dubbed "Experiment 03-K64", the plan is that we construct a massive water tank, concentrating an unprecedented amount of water in a very small area and basically to see how the wisps feel about it.

<goal>Construct a new Large Water Tank and fill it with water. Even if you already have a Large Water Tank you have to build a new one.
column3:
What the plan lacks in elegance it makes up with simplicity to execute. 

Dubbed "Experiment 03-K64", the plan is that we construct a massive water tank, concentrating an unprecedented amount of water in a very small area and basically to see how the wisps feel about it.

<goal>Construct a new Вялікі бак вады and fill it with water. Even if you already have a Вялікі бак вады you have to build a new one.

column2: Oh, I expected something more elaborate. Go ahead.
column3: Oh, I expected something more elaborate. Go ahead.
column4: Hmm... Wydawało mi się, że potrzebujemy czegoś bardziej wyrafinowanego. Do dzieła.

column2: Construct a new Large Water Tank and fill it with water in order to attract wisps and observe their behavior closely.
column3: Пабудуйце новы Вялікі бак вады і запоўніце яго вадой каб прывабіць аганькі да назіраньня за іх паводзінамі.
column4: Zbuduj dużą cysternę i napełnij ją wodą, aby przyciągnąć ogniki i obserwować ich zachowanie z bliska.

column2: In a vivid display of unearthly beauty, a surge in wisp activity far surpassing our most optimistic expectations played out before our eyes!
column3: In a vivid display of unearthly beauty, a surge in wisp activity far surpassing our most optimistic expectations played out before our eyes!
column4: Przed naszymi oczyma rozegrało się nieziemsko piękne, ożywione widowisko - fala aktywności ogników dalece przekraczająca najbardziej optymistyczne oczekiwania!

column2:
The water tank succeeded in attracting larger than ever numbers of wisps, bringing great amounts of knowledge with them. 

Ranging from the ability to determine the age of individual lights to finding behavioral patterns unique to some but absent in others, our scientists are eager to get to sorting through the treasure trove of data that was just made available for them.

<effect>Will of the Wisp tech is available.
column3:
The water tank succeeded in attracting larger than ever numbers of wisps, bringing great amounts of knowledge with them. 

Ranging from the ability to determine the age of individual lights to finding behavioral patterns unique to some but absent in others, our scientists are eager to get to sorting through the treasure trove of data that was just made available for them.

<effect>Will of the Wisp tech is available.

column2: The Large Water tank attracts multiple wisps.
column3: The Large Water tank attracts multiple wisps.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Light Traps
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Light Traps

column2: Our science team has been working tirelessly to design this new miracle of engineering – The Light Trap.
column3: Our science team has been working tirelessly to design this new miracle of engineering – The Light Trap.
column4: Nasz zespół naukowy pracuje niezmordowanie nad nowym cudem techniki - światłołapką.

column2:
The name, ironic as much as it is unimaginative, is meant to lure in the wisps with water the same way an actual light trap lures in insects with light, leaving them trapped inside.

Our scientists are quite eager to try out the prototype.

<goal>Construct a Light Trap.
column3:
The name, ironic as much as it is unimaginative, is meant to lure in the wisps with water the same way an actual light trap lures in insects with light, leaving them trapped inside.

Our scientists are quite eager to try out the prototype.

<goal>Construct a Light Trap.

column2: We should try this out at once!
column3: We should try this out at once!

column2: We should construct a Light Trap to try and capture a wisp for further analysis.
column3: We should construct a Light Trap to try and capture a wisp for further analysis.
column4: Powinniśmy zbudować światłołapkę, aby schwytać ognika i poddać go dalszej analizie.

column2: It works! The Light trap is able to lure and capture wisps within its vicinity.
column3: It works! The Light trap is able to lure and capture wisps within its vicinity.
column4: To działa! Światłołapka może wabić i chwytać latające w pobliżu ogniki.

column2:
The wisps radiate heat and are so luminous that our scientists can come up with easy methods of harnessing their energy.

While we should eventually decide on where we stand towards these lights being allowed to pursue their goals freely or not, for the time being – due to their mesmerizing beauty - we have allowed for captured wisps to be displayed in decorative lamps within our Domes for all to enjoy.

<effect>New decorative buildings available per 10 wisps captured.
column3:
The wisps radiate heat and are so luminous that our scientists can come up with easy methods of harnessing their energy.

While we should eventually decide on where we stand towards these lights being allowed to pursue their goals freely or not, for the time being – due to their mesmerizing beauty - we have allowed for captured wisps to be displayed in decorative lamps within our Domes for all to enjoy.

<effect>New decorative buildings available per 10 wisps captured.

column2: This will help brighten the mood in the colony.
column3: This will help brighten the mood in the colony.

column2: We managed to capture our first wisps! The Light Trap project was clearly a good idea!
column3: We managed to capture our first wisps! The Light Trap project was clearly a good idea!
column4: Udało się nam złapać pierwsze ogniki! Projekt światłołapki to naprawdę dobry pomysł!

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: Prisoners of Light
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: Prisoners of Light

column2: The Light Trap has succeeded flawlessly with its task to lure and hold wisps within its confines.
column3: The Light Trap has succeeded flawlessly with its task to lure and hold wisps within its confines.
column4: Światłołapka znakomicie spełnia swoje zadanie zwabienia i uwięzienia ogników.

column2:
Once the wisps were in custody, the philosophical conversation on how to treat the lights, as animate or inanimate entities, was revived.

The science community is split on moral grounds, should we confine the wisps and experiment on them to widen our knowledge of the universe, or should we strive for a more symbiotic existence in which we trade water for the electrical power which can be harnessed from them.
column3:
Once the wisps were in custody, the philosophical conversation on how to treat the lights, as animate or inanimate entities, was revived.

The science community is split on moral grounds, should we confine the wisps and experiment on them to widen our knowledge of the universe, or should we strive for a more symbiotic existence in which we trade water for the electrical power which can be harnessed from them.

column2: Experiment upon them. (Gain RP for every captured wisp)
column3: Experiment upon them. (Gain RP for every captured wisp)
column4: Poeksperymentujmy na nich (punkty badań za każdego złapanego ognika).

column2: In the wake of this beautiful and magnificent discovery of alien life, which is not carbon based, we have opted for a harmonious existence and declined to withhold the wisps from their needs.
column3: In the wake of this beautiful and magnificent discovery of alien life, which is not carbon based, we have opted for a harmonious existence and declined to withhold the wisps from their needs.
column4: W - nomen omen - świetle tego pięknego, wspaniałego odkrycia obcych istot żywych, opartych na pierwiastku innym niż węgiel, wybraliśmy harmonijne współistnienie i pozwolenie na to, by ogniki mogły zaspokajać swoje potrzeby.

column2: On the contrary, we will allow free access to our water supply and in return we will take advantage of their magnificent luminance to generate equally needed power. We have chosen the symbiotic way of existence with the wisps as a society. Eventually they will shed their secrets, but it is decided that shall come through observations and not experimentation on them in captivity. Wisps will continue appearing but will trade Water for Power. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: On the contrary, we will allow free access to our water supply and in return we will take advantage of their magnificent luminance to generate equally needed power. We have chosen the symbiotic way of existence with the wisps as a society. Eventually they will shed their secrets, but it is decided that shall come through observations and not experimentation on them in captivity. Wisps will continue appearing but will trade Water for Power. Gained a new Technology, .

column2: We welcome these fellow life forms.
column3: We welcome these fellow life forms.

column2: Symbiotic way of coexisting was deemed the best way to forward. We will be able to use the wisps to gain more energy for the colony as long as we feed them with water.
column3: Symbiotic way of coexisting was deemed the best way to forward. We will be able to use the wisps to gain more energy for the colony as long as we feed them with water.
column4: Symbioza z ognikami została uznana za najlepsze rozwiązanie. Będziemy mogli korzystać z energii wytwarzanej przez ogniki, jeśli tylko dostarczymy im wodę.

column2: With so many wisps in our custody, we see endless opportunities to expand our knowledge of an exotic life form.
column3: With so many wisps in our custody, we see endless opportunities to expand our knowledge of an exotic life form.
column4: Schwytaliśmy już tyle ogników, że możliwości poszerzenia naszej wiedzy na temat tych obcych organizmów wydają się nieograniczone.

column2: Our research however seems to weaken them and each individual fades away after a varying amount of experimentation done on them. We try our best to preserve the lights with free access to water – but they stop consuming it with time and simply wither away. The theory is, as they won’t be able to upkeep their population – after a while, the wisps will cease to appear. Until then, however, we will have learned a lot. Trapped Wisps will generate RP per killed wisp. Gained a new Technology, .
column3: Our research however seems to weaken them and each individual fades away after a varying amount of experimentation done on them. We try our best to preserve the lights with free access to water – but they stop consuming it with time and simply wither away. The theory is, as they won’t be able to upkeep their population – after a while, the wisps will cease to appear. Until then, however, we will have learned a lot. Trapped Wisps will generate RP per killed wisp. Gained a new Technology, .

column2: Gaining knowledge and halting the water losses was deemed best way ahead. Captured wisps will provide a valuable boost to our science program.
column3: Gaining knowledge and halting the water losses was deemed best way ahead. Captured wisps will provide a valuable boost to our science program.
column4: Zdobywanie wiedzy i położenie kresu ubytkom wody zostały uznane za najlepszy wybór. Schwytane ogniki będą cenną pomocą dla naszego programu badawczego.

column2: We captured and held the wisps prisoners. Subjected them to countless experiments and we know a lot more now.
column3: We captured and held the wisps prisoners. Subjected them to countless experiments and we know a lot more now.
column4: Schwytaliśmy i uwięziliśmy ogniki. Poddaliśmy je niezliczonym eksperymentom i teraz wiemy dużo więcej.

column2:
The Universe showed us life can come in many forms and although some would question if the wisps were truly alive - fact is they withered and faded the same way a wild beast withers in captivity.

Did they learn to avoid us or did we do irreversible damage to their population we may never know. Now only the sinkholes remain - dark and silent. Grotesque mementos of the time the Universe graced us with the wonder of the wisps.

<effect>No more wisps will appear on the surface of Mars.
column3:
The Universe showed us life can come in many forms and although some would question if the wisps were truly alive - fact is they withered and faded the same way a wild beast withers in captivity.

Did they learn to avoid us or did we do irreversible damage to their population we may never know. Now only the sinkholes remain - dark and silent. Grotesque mementos of the time the Universe graced us with the wonder of the wisps.

<effect>No more wisps will appear on the surface of Mars.

column2: We are left poorer without them. Farewell wisps.
column3: We are left poorer without them. Farewell wisps.
column4: Bez nich czujemy się ubożsi. Żegnajcie, ogniki.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: Getting Our Hands Dirty
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: Getting Our Hands Dirty
column4: Ognie świętego Elma - Trzeba pobrudzić sobie rączki

column2: Our Explorer is just above what we hypothesize to be an entry point to a vast complex made entirely out of ancient lava-tube tunnels.
column3: Our Explorer is just above what we hypothesize to be an entry point to a vast complex made entirely out of ancient lava-tube tunnels.
column4: Nasz eksplorator znajduje się nad czymś, co, jak przypuszczamy, jest wejściem do rozległego kompleksu tuneli w podziemnych warstwach skalnych.

column2:
This specific opening also happens to be perfectly fit for lowering the vehicle inside, hoping to track the whereabouts and behavior of the wisps during the day.

Take heed however, we have no idea what awaits inside and if we will be able to recover the Explorer once lowered. It may be a risk worth taking.
column3:
This specific opening also happens to be perfectly fit for lowering the vehicle inside, hoping to track the whereabouts and behavior of the wisps during the day.

Take heed however, we have no idea what awaits inside and if we will be able to recover the Explorer once lowered. It may be a risk worth taking.

column2: We must know, lower the Explorer!
column3: We must know, lower the Explorer!

column2: Our Explorer is too valuable to lose in this manner.
column3: Our Explorer is too valuable to lose in this manner.
column4: Nasz eksplorator jest zbyt cenny, aby tracić go w ten sposób.

column2: The Explorer descends down the sinkhole. It's risky but could be worth it if we can discover more about the Wisps.
column3: The Explorer descends down the sinkhole. It's risky but could be worth it if we can discover more about the Wisps.
column4: Eksplorator zostaje opuszczony do zapadliska. To ryzykowne, ale może się opłacić, jeśli dowiemy się czegoś więcej o ognikach.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Light At The End Of The Tunnel
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Light At The End Of The Tunnel
column4: Ognie świętego Elma - Światełko w tunelu

column2: We received a signal from our Explorer after hours of silence.  Massive amounts of data were transmitted before falling silent one final time.
column3: We received a signal from our Explorer after hours of silence.  Massive amounts of data were transmitted before falling silent one final time.
column4: Po wielu godzinach ciszy odebraliśmy sygnał naszego eksploratora. Pojazd przesłał nam ogromną ilość danych, a potem umilkł po raz drugi - tym razem ostatecznie.

column2:
The data it sent shows there are buried caverns filled with multitudes of wisps – most of which exhibit dormant behavior and so far do not react in any way to the presence of our vehicle.

Those which have been to the surface and have been near liquid water go through a process which results in several new wisps being “born” out of it. It is truly fascinating and we have never seen anything of the sort on Earth.

Sadly our engineers see no way of extracting the Explorer; still sacrificing it has given us priceless knowledge of a magnificent alien phenomenon.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.
column3:
The data it sent shows there are buried caverns filled with multitudes of wisps – most of which exhibit dormant behavior and so far do not react in any way to the presence of our vehicle.

Those which have been to the surface and have been near liquid water go through a process which results in several new wisps being “born” out of it. It is truly fascinating and we have never seen anything of the sort on Earth.

Sadly our engineers see no way of extracting the Explorer; still sacrificing it has given us priceless knowledge of a magnificent alien phenomenon.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.

column2: Amazing! Sacrificing it was not in vain.
column3: Amazing! Sacrificing it was not in vain.
column4: Niesamowite! Poświęcenie nie poszło na marne.

column2: The Explorer sends massive amounts of information before the signal dies. The vehicle is lost.
column3: The Explorer sends massive amounts of information before the signal dies. The vehicle is lost.
column4: Eksplorator przesyła ogromną ilość informacji, po czym przepada na zawsze.

column2: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Source of Life
column3: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Source of Life

column2: With hot plasma cores and using magnetic levitation to move around the surface effortlessly, the wisps still remain a mystery.
column3: With hot plasma cores and using magnetic levitation to move around the surface effortlessly, the wisps still remain a mystery.
column4: Wiemy już, że ogniki mają rdzenie z gorącej plazmy i poruszają się nad powierzchnią ziemi na zasadzie lewitacji magnetycznej, ale i tak pozostają zagadką.

column2:
What our scientists have confirmed, however, is that they do indeed move with a purpose - to suck out water from our reserves. 

Furthermore, the lights have telltale signs which enable us to recognize individuals among them. Observing these individuals we have noticed that the more water they obtain one night, the more individuals appear for the first time the next – pointing towards a hypothetical method of multiplication based on liquid water.
column3:
What our scientists have confirmed, however, is that they do indeed move with a purpose - to suck out water from our reserves. 

Furthermore, the lights have telltale signs which enable us to recognize individuals among them. Observing these individuals we have noticed that the more water they obtain one night, the more individuals appear for the first time the next – pointing towards a hypothetical method of multiplication based on liquid water.

column2: Well, we needed to know that for sure I guess.
column3: Well, we needed to know that for sure I guess.

column2: A new research confirmed that the lights actively seek out our water reserves in order to multiply through some vaguely understood mechanism.
column3: A new research confirmed that the lights actively seek out our water reserves in order to multiply through some vaguely understood mechanism.
column4: Nowe badania potwierdziły, że światełka aktywnie poszukują naszych zapasów wody, aby móc się rozmnażać dzięki jakiemuś słabo poznanemu mechanizmowi.

column2: All stations, red alert! Mission Control, an enormous alien object has just materialized near our colony’s perimeter! This thing is unbelievable, you have to see it yourself!
column3: All stations, red alert! Mission Control, an enormous alien object has just materialized near our colony’s perimeter! This thing is unbelievable, you have to see it yourself!
column4: Wszystkie stanowiska - czerwony alarm! Dowódco, jakiś wielki obcy obiekt właśnie zmaterializował się niedaleko naszej kolonii! To niewiarygodne, musicie to zobaczyć sami!

column2:
Our scanners cannot penetrate the outer shell of the megastructure. It didn’t attempt to communicate, either. It… just floats there, in the thin Martian air, like a menacing presence of an unknown threat.

<effect>An enormous alien megastructure has appeared above the colony.
column3:
Our scanners cannot penetrate the outer shell of the megastructure. It didn’t attempt to communicate, either. It… just floats there, in the thin Martian air, like a menacing presence of an unknown threat.

<effect>An enormous alien megastructure has appeared above the colony.

column2: Maintain vigil and inform me immediately if the situation changes.
column3: Maintain vigil and inform me immediately if the situation changes.
column4: Zachowajcie czujność i informujcie mnie natychmiast o wszelkich zmianach sytuacji.

column2: An enormous alien megastructure has appeared above the colony.
column3: An enormous alien megastructure has appeared above the colony.
column4: Nad kolonią pojawiła się olbrzymia obca megakonstrukcja.

column2: I need to talk to you, Commander. I think that something strange is going on with me… It’s the monolith. I feel its alien thoughts inside of my head. It speaks to me, I just don’t understand why but it has chosen me to be its speaker.
column3: I need to talk to you, Commander. I think that something strange is going on with me… It’s the monolith. I feel its alien thoughts inside of my head. It speaks to me, I just don’t understand why but it has chosen me to be its speaker.
column4: Muszę z tobą porozmawiać, dowódco. Sądzę, że dzieje się ze mną coś dziwnego… To ten monolit. Wyczuwam w głowie jego obce myśli. On do mnie przemawia, nie rozumiem tylko, dlaczego wybrał mnie na swego rzecznika.

column2: At first I thought I was going crazy, but the medics tell me that nothing’s wrong with me. Since the monolith appeared above us I have been dreaming dreams that aren’t mine. I see things that I cannot understand. And I feel that some strange truth is forming inside my mind, and it urges me to tell it to the world. I am afraid, but also excited, because I feel that this will be important.
column3: At first I thought I was going crazy, but the medics tell me that nothing’s wrong with me. Since the monolith appeared above us I have been dreaming dreams that aren’t mine. I see things that I cannot understand. And I feel that some strange truth is forming inside my mind, and it urges me to tell it to the world. I am afraid, but also excited, because I feel that this will be important.
column4: Początkowo myślałem, że wariuję, jednak lekarze powiedzieli, że wszystko ze mną w porządku. Odkąd ten monolit pojawił się ponad nami, miewam sny, które nie należą do mnie. Widzę rzeczy, których nie rozumiem. I mam wrażenie, że w moim umyśle kształtuje się jakaś dziwna prawda, która nagli mnie, by ją objawić światu. Boję się, ale czuję też podniecenie, bo przeczuwam, że będzie to ważne.

column2: It sounds crazy, but I want to believe...
column3: It sounds crazy, but I want to believe...
column4: Brzmi niedorzecznie, ale chcę ci wierzyć...

column2: The times of challenge are upon us. We are chosen to represent all humans and face the trials of the Monolith. If we prove worthy we will be rewarded. But if we fail...
column3: The times of challenge are upon us. We are chosen to represent all humans and face the trials of the Monolith. If we prove worthy we will be rewarded. But if we fail...
column4: Postawiono przed nami wyzwanie. Wybrano nas na przedstawicieli całej ludzkości, którzy będą musieli stawić czoła próbom zsyłanym przez monolit. Jeśli okażemy się tego warci, zostaniemy nagrodzeni. Lecz jeśli zawiedziemy...

column2:
Metatron, as the Monolith desires to be called, was created to visit and test intelligent species all over the galaxy. It will put us through trials and will make us realize whether we are worthy to take our place among the star-faring species. The stars are cold and bitter and many unknown opportunities and dangers await us there. We must prove that we can understand, that we can survive and thrive in any environment and situation.

Metatron doesn’t care if we want to be tested. It has simply come to announce the beginning of the trial so we can prepare. I’m afraid, Commander, but I’ll give anything to make it through this.

<goal>You will be put through a series of trials. Metatron will create waves of anomalies which will test your ingenuity and resolve. Adapt and survive!

<effect>Offerings are anomalies with limited duration. When analyzed, they will reward you for your efforts.
column3:
Metatron, as the Monolith desires to be called, was created to visit and test intelligent species all over the galaxy. It will put us through trials and will make us realize whether we are worthy to take our place among the star-faring species. The stars are cold and bitter and many unknown opportunities and dangers await us there. We must prove that we can understand, that we can survive and thrive in any environment and situation.

Metatron doesn’t care if we want to be tested. It has simply come to announce the beginning of the trial so we can prepare. I’m afraid, Commander, but I’ll give anything to make it through this.

<goal>You will be put through a series of trials. Metatron will create waves of anomalies which will test your ingenuity and resolve. Adapt and survive!

<effect>Offerings are anomalies with limited duration. When analyzed, they will reward you for your efforts.

column2: We have faced harder challenges. Haven’t we proven worthy enough?
column3: We have faced harder challenges. Haven’t we proven worthy enough?
column4: Stawialiśmy czoła trudniejszym wyzwaniom. Czy nie okazaliśmy się wystarczająco godni?

column2: The alien structure has spoken through the voice of one of our own, claiming to be called Metatron. It has issued us a challenge, regardless of whether we wish to participate. It wants us to start by analyzing timed anomalies to see whether we can express curiosity and perseverance.
column3: The alien structure has spoken through the voice of one of our own, claiming to be called Metatron. It has issued us a challenge, regardless of whether we wish to participate. It wants us to start by analyzing timed anomalies to see whether we can express curiosity and perseverance.
column4: Kosmiczny konstrukt przemówił przez jednego z naszych ludzi, każąc się nazywać Metatronem. Rzucił nam wyzwanie, nie licząc się z tym, czy chcemy je przyjąć. Chce, żebyśmy na początek zaczęli analizować anomalie o ograniczonym czasie istnienia, okazując w ten sposób ciekawość świata i wytrwałość.

column2: We have endured a lot more than Metatron expected from a young inexperienced species like ours. But endurance is not enough. It wants more – it wants us to grow, to become even better.
column3: We have endured a lot more than Metatron expected from a young inexperienced species like ours. But endurance is not enough. It wants more – it wants us to grow, to become even better.
column4: Znieśliśmy już dużo więcej, niż Metatron oczekiwał po takim młodym, niedoświadczonym gatunku. Ale wytrzymałość to nie wszystko. On chce czegoś więcej - chce, abyśmy urośli, stali się jeszcze lepsi.

column2:
Its final task for us is to make a mark of progress, an effigy of our readiness to evolve and an example for the rest of our species to follow. But if we fail to do this within a reasonable time, we would fail.

<effect>The Project Morpheus tech has become available.

<goal>Construct the Project Morpheus wonder within <reg_param1> Sols to successfully complete the Mystery.
column3:
Its final task for us is to make a mark of progress, an effigy of our readiness to evolve and an example for the rest of our species to follow. But if we fail to do this within a reasonable time, we would fail.

<effect>The Праэкт Марфей tech has become available.

<goal>Construct the Праэкт Марфей wonder within <reg_param1> Sols to successfully complete the Mystery.

column2: We managed to come this far, so it’s a possibility.
column3: We managed to come this far, so it’s a possibility.
column4: Skoro zdołaliśmy dotrzeć tak daleko, dokonamy i tego.

column2: Metatron has tasked us with constructing Project Morpheus in 20 Sols. It will be the testimony that we can be survivors and thrive in any environment.
column3: Metatron has tasked us with constructing Праэкт Марфей in 20 Sols. It will be the testimony that we can be survivors and thrive in any environment.
column4: Metatron polecił nam zbudowanie Projektu Morfeusz w 20 soli. Wykażemy w ten sposób, że potrafimy przetrwać i rozkwitnąć w każdym środowisku.

column2: Metatron gave us access to the knowledge of the stars and opportunities to grow and become stronger. But the peaceful times are over, it says, and now it will test our ability to adapt and survive.
column3: Metatron gave us access to the knowledge of the stars and opportunities to grow and become stronger. But the peaceful times are over, it says, and now it will test our ability to adapt and survive.
column4: Metatron udostępnił nam wiedzę o gwiazdach i możliwościach rozwoju, zyskania większej siły. Ale teraz mówi, że czasy pokoju dobiegły końca, i że podda próbie nasze zdolności do przystosowania się i przetrwania.

column2:
Metatron has evaluated our ways and has chosen the harshest adversity for us. The Ion Storms will descend upon our colony like a scourge and will deprive us of our greatest power – our technology, our machines which sustain our life.

‘Adapt, expand, evolve.’ These are its words.

<effect>Ion Storm Clouds target your colony and disable all out-dome buildings in their radius. Colonists and in-dome buildings are unaffected.

<hint>Create redundant systems to circumvent the Ion Storm Clouds.
column3:
Metatron has evaluated our ways and has chosen the harshest adversity for us. The Ion Storms will descend upon our colony like a scourge and will deprive us of our greatest power – our technology, our machines which sustain our life.

‘Adapt, expand, evolve.’ These are its words.

<effect>Ion Storm Clouds target your colony and disable all out-dome buildings in their radius. Colonists and in-dome buildings are unaffected.

<hint>Create redundant systems to circumvent the Ion Storm Clouds.

column2: We didn’t ask for this! But I guess we don’t have a choice...
column3: We didn’t ask for this! But I guess we don’t have a choice...
column4: Nie prosiliśmy o coś takiego! Ale chyba nie mamy wyboru...

column2: Metatron has started creating Ion Storms to put us on a harder challenge. We must watch for when they are about to strike and create redundant systems to circumvent their effect.
column3: Metatron has started creating Ion Storms to put us on a harder challenge. We must watch for when they are about to strike and create redundant systems to circumvent their effect.
column4: Metatron zaczął tworzyć burze jonowe, aby poddać nas cięższej próbie. Musimy uważać, gdzie i kiedy uderzą, i tworzyć systemy rezerwowe, aby równoważyć ich wpływ.

column2: Our scientists have observed Metatron’s behavior closely and believe they can predict the arrival of Ion Storms.
column3: Our scientists have observed Metatron’s behavior closely and believe they can predict the arrival of Ion Storms.
column4: Nasi naukowcy dokładnie obserwowali zachowanie Metatrona i uważają, że są w stanie prognozować nadejście burz jonowych.

column2:
Some of the scientists even suspect that the alien megastructure purposely gives us hints by changing its energy signature slightly before creating an Ion Storm. If they are right, then it seems we are looked upon like pupils by a stern tutor.

<effect>Ion Storm Prediction tech has become available.
column3:
Some of the scientists even suspect that the alien megastructure purposely gives us hints by changing its energy signature slightly before creating an Ion Storm. If they are right, then it seems we are looked upon like pupils by a stern tutor.

<effect>Ion Storm Prediction tech has become available.

column2: Our scientists have proposed a method to predict the behavior of the Ion Storms created by Metatron.
column3: Our scientists have proposed a method to predict the behavior of the Ion Storms created by Metatron.
column4: Nasi naukowcy zaproponowali metodę przewidywania zachowań burz jonowych tworzonych przez Metatrona.

column2: Revel in the passing of the great storm. Emerge victorious, remade and stronger. This is the gift of Metatron, the messenger.
column3: Revel in the passing of the great storm. Emerge victorious, remade and stronger. This is the gift of Metatron, the messenger.
column4: Rozkoszujcie się ta wielką burzą. Przetrwajcie ją zwycięsko, odnowieni i silniejsi. Oto dar Metatrona, posłańca.

column2:
The Messenger wishes to increase the strain on us even further. It is about to unleash a massive wave of Ion Storm Clouds. We, as always, have to endure it.

<effect>The next wave will send out a large number of Ion Storm Clouds.
column3:
The Messenger wishes to increase the strain on us even further. It is about to unleash a massive wave of Ion Storm Clouds. We, as always, have to endure it.

<effect>The next wave will send out a large number of Ion Storm Clouds.

column2: The messenger of the stars vanishes as abruptly as it had arrived. We are left alone, still shaken by the incredible events we’ve just survived. But the gift of Metatron burns deeply inside each and every one of us – the realization of our inner strength and incredible potential.
column3: The messenger of the stars vanishes as abruptly as it had arrived. We are left alone, still shaken by the incredible events we’ve just survived. But the gift of Metatron burns deeply inside each and every one of us – the realization of our inner strength and incredible potential.
column4: Posłaniec gwiazd znika równie nagle, jak się pojawił. Zostajemy sami, wciąż wstrząśnięci niezwykłymi wydarzeniami, które właśnie przeżyliśmy. Jednak dar Metatrona płonie głęboko w każdym z nas - poczucie wewnętrznej siły i niewiarygodnego potencjału.

column2: The alien megastructure is gone without an explanation for the goal of its mission – no more than it already told us. We are still clueless about the nature of the Cosmos that awaits us beyond the cradle of our solar system. Would it really be that deadly and unwelcoming as the megalith warned? What’s really out there? Probably this was just another devious trick of the artefact and its mysterious creators – to show us the potential for expansion and to plant the seed of curiosity inside of us. One could say that humankind didn’t need any of the challenges and gifts of Metatron, that we were strong and inquisitive enough on our own. But it’s true that now our craving for exploration and expansion has been fueled even more. You have completed Metatron’s challenges! The Mystery is over. Gained a new Technology,
column3: The alien megastructure is gone without an explanation for the goal of its mission – no more than it already told us. We are still clueless about the nature of the Cosmos that awaits us beyond the cradle of our solar system. Would it really be that deadly and unwelcoming as the megalith warned? What’s really out there? Probably this was just another devious trick of the artefact and its mysterious creators – to show us the potential for expansion and to plant the seed of curiosity inside of us. One could say that humankind didn’t need any of the challenges and gifts of Metatron, that we were strong and inquisitive enough on our own. But it’s true that now our craving for exploration and expansion has been fueled even more. You have completed Metatron’s challenges! The Mystery is over. Gained a new Technology,

column2: We have proven that the human race is worthy of taking its place among the stars! Metatron has disappeared, leaving us with our triumph.
column3: We have proven that the human race is worthy of taking its place among the stars! Metatron has disappeared, leaving us with our triumph.
column4: Dowiedliśmy, że ludzkość jest godna własnego miejsca wśród gwiazd! Metatron zniknął, a my możemy triumfować.

column2: As the final seconds of Metatron’s ultimatum pass, we’re expecting the sky to come crashing down on us. But nothing like this happens. The alien thing vanishes as abruptly as it had arrived. We’re left alone and undamaged. But deep inside of us we feel broken and humiliated.
column3: As the final seconds of Metatron’s ultimatum pass, we’re expecting the sky to come crashing down on us. But nothing like this happens. The alien thing vanishes as abruptly as it had arrived. We’re left alone and undamaged. But deep inside of us we feel broken and humiliated.
column4: Mijają ostatnie sekundy ultimatum Metatrona - spodziewamy się, że niebo spadnie nam na głowy. Ale nic takiego się nie dzieje. Obiekt z kosmosu znika równie nagle, jak się pojawił. Zostaliśmy sami i nie ponieśliśmy żadnych materialnych szkód. Czujemy się jednak wewnętrznie złamani i upokorzeni.

column2:
The apocalyptic scenarios we imagined didn’t come to bear. The alien megastructure is gone without condemning our inability to fulfill its tasks. We weren’t vanquished as part of some gigantic disaster, as it would happen with a failed experiment.

But we bear the mark of our failure. We know that we were tried and found wanting. Now, the stars would appear even more distant and somewhat unfriendly. Would our children’s children look at the dark skies and view them with regret and suspicion? Or were we simply given more time to complete the final challenge – to not give up and learn the harsh lesson, emerging stronger in the future?

<effect>You have failed Metatron’s challenges! The Mystery is over.
column3:
The apocalyptic scenarios we imagined didn’t come to bear. The alien megastructure is gone without condemning our inability to fulfill its tasks. We weren’t vanquished as part of some gigantic disaster, as it would happen with a failed experiment.

But we bear the mark of our failure. We know that we were tried and found wanting. Now, the stars would appear even more distant and somewhat unfriendly. Would our children’s children look at the dark skies and view them with regret and suspicion? Or were we simply given more time to complete the final challenge – to not give up and learn the harsh lesson, emerging stronger in the future?

<effect>You have failed Metatron’s challenges! The Mystery is over.

column2: We will prove the Universe wrong! We will prevail whatever challenge comes!
column3: We will prove the Universe wrong! We will prevail whatever challenge comes!
column4: Udowodnimy, że Wszechświat się myli! Pokonamy wszystkie trudności, jakie się pojawią!

column2: Metatron has deemed us unworthy of exploring the stars. The alien megastructure disappeared without causing any harm, apart from hurting our confidence.
column3: Metatron has deemed us unworthy of exploring the stars. The alien megastructure disappeared without causing any harm, apart from hurting our confidence.
column4: Metatron uznał nas za niegodnych wyruszenia ku gwiazdom. Obca megakonstrukcja znikła, nie powodując żadnych szkód poza zranieniem naszej dumy.

column2: Detecting the slight changes in Metatron's energy emissions could allow us to predict incoming Ion Storms.
column3: Detecting the slight changes in Metatron's energy emissions could allow us to predict incoming Ion Storms.
column4: Wykrywanie drobnych zmian w emisjach energetycznych Metatrona umożliwi nam przewidywanie nadejścia burz jonowych.

column2: Research project focusing on revealing the secrets of the energy manipulation properties of the mysterious Alien Crystals.
column3: Research project focusing on revealing the secrets of the energy manipulation properties of the mysterious Alien Crystals.
column4: Projekt badawczy skupiony na tajnikach manipulowania energią przez zagadkowe kosmiczne kryształy.

column2: An attempt to better understand the mysterious wisps, their method of propulsion and behavior- based on gathered observational data.
column3: An attempt to better understand the mysterious wisps, their method of propulsion and behavior- based on gathered observational data.
column4: Próba lepszego zrozumienia tajemniczych ogników, ich sposobu poruszania się i zachowań - oparta na zebranych danych obserwacyjnych.

column2: Knowing what drives the wisps our scientists want to design a method of capturing them for further analysis.
column3: Knowing what drives the wisps our scientists want to design a method of capturing them for further analysis.
column4: Nasi naukowcy wiedzą już, co stanowi źródło energii ogników. Chcą teraz stworzyć metodę chwytania ich na potrzeby dalszych badań.

column2: Three new mysteries introducing extraterrestrial entities and strange phenomena.
column3: Three new mysteries introducing extraterrestrial entities and strange phenomena.
column4: Trzy nowe tajemnice związane z istotami pozaziemskimi i dziwnymi zjawiskami.

column2: Generates Power. Increased production during Dust Storms and at high elevations.
column3: Вырабляе энэргію. Павелічэньне вытворчасьці падчас пясчаных бур і на вышынях.
column4: Wytwarza energię. Ma zwiększoną wydajność podczas burz pyłowych i w przypadku ustawienia na wzniesieniach.

column2:
Wind turbines generate electrical power from the Martian winds. The amount generated depends on how powerful the winds they are exposed to are, so proper positioning is essential as higher ground tends to be windier.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

While wind speeds on Mars are generally mild, they can reach incredible speeds during dust storms. Still, the thin Martian atmosphere dictates that the average wind turbine would need winds around six times more powerful than those on Earth to create the same amount of thrust.
 
This technological challenge to take advantage of what little wind there is on Mars was solved by opting for vertical axis wind turbines, which are capable of catching the wind from all directions, instead of simply horizontal.  The materials used are light enough to self-start on much weaker forces than those most commonly used on Earth.
column3:
Wind turbines generate electrical power from the Martian winds. The amount generated depends on how powerful the winds they are exposed to are, so proper positioning is essential as higher ground tends to be windier.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

While wind speeds on Mars are generally mild, they can reach incredible speeds during dust storms. Still, the thin Martian atmosphere dictates that the average wind turbine would need winds around six times more powerful than those on Earth to create the same amount of thrust.
 
This technological challenge to take advantage of what little wind there is on Mars was solved by opting for vertical axis wind turbines, which are capable of catching the wind from all directions, instead of simply horizontal.  The materials used are light enough to self-start on much weaker forces than those most commonly used on Earth.

column4: Wytwarza artykuły elektroniczne z rzadkich metali.

column2: Provides living space. Resting residents recover Comfort faster compared to other Residences.
column3: Забясьпечвае памяшканьні. Адпачывальнікі аднаўляюць камфорт хутчэй у параўнаньні з іншым жыльлём.
column4: Zapewnia dach nad głową. Odpoczywający mieszkańcy regenerują wygodę szybciej w porównaniu z innymi miejscami zamieszkania.

column2: Distributes hot meals and fresh produce. Consumes Food on each visit.

column2: Do you want to send a distress call?<newline><newline>This will reduce your standing with all Rival Colonies on Mars, as they decide whether or not to help. You won't be able to send a new distress call for the next <number> Sols
column3: Вы хочаце адправіць сігнал бедству?<newline><newline>Гэта паменшыць адносіны з усімі калёніямі на Марсе, калі яны вырашаць ці дапамагчы, ці не. Вы не зможаце зноў адпавіць сігнал бедству наступныя <number> Солы
column4: Czy chcesz wysłać wezwanie o pomoc?<newline><newline>Pogorszy to nastawienie do ciebie wszystkich rywalizujących kolonii na Marsie. Będą one musiały zdecydować, czy udzielić pomocy. Nie można będzie nadać następnego wezwania o pomoc przez następującą liczbę soli – <number>.

column2: Delivers cargo or Colonists to Mars. Commands nearby Drones. Contaminates nearby buildings with dust when landing and taking off. Requires Fuel for the return trip to Earth.
column3: Дастаўляе грузы або каляністаў на Марс. Кіруе дронамі. Забруджвае будынкі побач пры пасадцы й узлёце. Патрабуе Паліва для вяртаньня на Зямлю.
column4: Dostarczają na Marsa kolonistów lub ładunki. Sterują dronami znajdującymi się w pobliżu. Podczas startu i lądowania zanieczyszczają pyłem okoliczne budynki. Na podróż powrotną na Ziemię wymagają paliwa.

column2: Offers resources for export to other colonies on Mars. Rival colonies will send trade offers only if import and export resources are set. Accessible only for Rockets belonging to other colonies. Nearby buildings and vehicles are protected from dust during landings and takeoffs.
column3: Прапануе рэсурсы для экспарту ў іншыя калёніі на Марсе. Калоніі супраціўнікі будуць адпраўляць гандлёвыя прапановы толькі ў тым выпадку, калі ўстаноўлены імпартныя й экспартныя рэсурсы. Даступна толькі для ракет, якія належаць іншым калёніям. Будынкі й транспартныя сродкі побач абаронены ад пылу падчас пасадак і ўзлётаў Ракет.
column4: Umożliwia eksportowanie zasobów do innych kolonii na Marsie. Rywalizujące kolonie będą przysyłać propozycje handlowe tylko po wskazaniu oferowanych i pożądanych zasobów. Jest dostępne tylko dla rakiet pochodzących z innych kolonii. Chroni znajdujące się w pobliżu budynki i pojazdy przed pyłem podczas startów i lądowań.
