column2: Commander! You achieved all mission goals, regardless of the adversities you faced on Mars! A true pioneer - well done!
column3: Commander! You achieved all mission goals, regardless of the adversities you faced on Mars! A true pioneer - well done!
column4: Dowódco! Udało ci się osiągnąć wszystkie cele misji pomimo przeciwności, którym trzeba było stawić czoła na Marsie! Jesteś prawdziwym pionierem – dobra robota!

column2: As you know, the future of the team at Paradox Interactive is tightly related to your progress with the colonization of Mars. After refusing to announce the continuation of the Victoria franchise, we had to consider our options and moving permanently to Mars was the safest one. Thank you for making this possibility a certainty! Consider taking more goals for the next milestone to show us even more determination and support. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
column3: As you know, the future of the team at Paradox Interactive is tightly related to your progress with the colonization of Mars. After refusing to announce the continuation of the Victoria franchise, we had to consider our options and moving permanently to Mars was the safest one. Thank you for making this possibility a certainty! Consider taking more goals for the next milestone to show us even more determination and support. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:

column2: Thank you for completing your mission goals, Commander. Once again your submission documentation is up to par and we enjoyed reading through it. The team at Paradox Interactive HQ is grateful for your patience and determination.
column3: Thank you for completing your mission goals, Commander. Once again your submission documentation is up to par and we enjoyed reading through it. The team at Paradox Interactive HQ is grateful for your patience and determination.
column4: Dziękujemy za osiągnięcie celów misji, Dowódco. Po raz kolejny przesyłana przez ciebie dokumentacja spełnia wszelkie oczekiwania. Przeczytaliśmy ją z przyjemnością. Zespół kwatery głównej Paradox Interactive jest ci wdzięczny za cierpliwość i nieustępliwość.

column2: <DisplayName> is deeply in love with another Colonist they fear is out of their league. They wish to propose during a very romantic moment, one that involves a serious display of fireworks.
column3: <DisplayName> моцна закаханы, але баіцца, што не падыходзіць. Ёсьць жаданьне зрабіць прапанову падчас вельмі рамантычнага моманту, які прадугледжвае сур'ёзны феерверк.
column4: <DisplayName> kocha się do szaleństwa w kimś, o kim sądzi, że jest dużo wyższej klasy. Chce oświadczyć się w bardzo romantycznej chwili, podczas obfitego pokazu fajerwerków.

column2: A gloomy looking Colonist approaches you and shares something personal.
column3: Да вас падыходзіць сумны чалавек і дзеліцца нечым асабістым.
column4: Podchodzi do ciebie jakaś osoba o ponurej twarzy i zwierza ci się z pewnego osobistego problemu.

column2: I can't say no to a hopeless romantic. Let's have us some fireworks!
column3: Я не магу адмовіць такому рамантыку. Давайце зробім феерверк!
column4: Nie mogę odmówić romantykowi do szpiku kości. Będziemy puszczać fajerwerki!

column2: I will do anything for love but I won't do that.
column3: Я зраблю ўсё дзеля каханьня, але я не буду гэтага рабіць.
column4: Zrobiłbym wszystko dla miłości, ale nie to.

column2:
A race to cross the great Arcadian plains! With quite a motivating reward fund of <funding(reward)> - courtesy of said organizations. The plan is that every Mars mission commits one Explorer to the race.

All colonies must commit to the race for it to transpire at all. First one across gets all the funding.
column3:
A race to cross the great Arcadian plains! With quite a motivating reward fund of <funding(reward)> - courtesy of said organizations. The plan is that every Mars mission commits one Explorer to the race.

All colonies must commit to the race for it to transpire at all. First one across gets all the funding.

column2: In a bid to ease tensions between the separate colonies on Mars, several organizations on Earth have proposed a sporting event as a show of good faith and an outlet for our extreme competitiveness.
column3: In a bid to ease tensions between the separate colonies on Mars, several organizations on Earth have proposed a sporting event as a show of good faith and an outlet for our extreme competitiveness.
column4: Próbując złagodzić napięcia między różnymi koloniami na Marsie, kilka ziemskich instytucji zaproponowało zorganizowanie imprezy sportowej, która byłaby okazaniem dobrej woli, a zarazem ujściem dla skrajnych uczuć rywalizacyjnych.

column2: Well, why not? Prepare the Explorer! Name it Vigor!
column3: Well, why not? Prepare the Explorer! Name it Vigor!
column4: Cóż, dlaczego nie? Przygotujcie eksploratora! Nazwiemy go Zygzak!

column2: a shot at winning <funding(reward)>. Temporarily lose one RC Explorer.
column3: a shot at winning <funding(reward)>. Temporarily lose one RC Explorer.
column4: szansa wygrania <funding(reward)>. Tracisz na pewien czas jednego eksploratora sterowanego.

column2: I see no good faith to be had. Pass.
column3: I see no good faith to be had. Pass.
column4: Nie widzę w tym żadnej dobrej woli. Rezygnujemy.

column2: Forget good faith, maybe we can increase our odds somehow... prepare two Explorers!
column3: Forget good faith, maybe we can increase our odds somehow... prepare two Explorers!
column4: Dajcie sobie spokój z tą dobrą wolą, może w jakiś sposób zwiększymy nasze szanse?... Przygotujcie dwa eksploratory!

column2: temporarily lose two RC Explorers, better odds at winning. Chance to get caught.
column3: temporarily lose two RC Explorers, better odds at winning. Chance to get caught.
column4: tracisz na pewien czas dwa eksploratory sterowane, masz większe szanse na zwycięstwo. Ale ryzykujesz przyłapaniem.

column2:
As carefully as we tried to hide the second Explorer in the dusty plains of Arcadia, video footage emerged of it and we have been disqualified.

The odds of video surveillance recording at that exact location were so meager that we can't help but wonder if we were the only ones playing unfair.

Guess we'll never know.
column3:
As carefully as we tried to hide the second Explorer in the dusty plains of Arcadia, video footage emerged of it and we have been disqualified.

The odds of video surveillance recording at that exact location were so meager that we can't help but wonder if we were the only ones playing unfair.

Guess we'll never know.

column2: Turns out we underestimated our rivals and we were caught red handed in our attempt to rig the race.
column3: Turns out we underestimated our rivals and we were caught red handed in our attempt to rig the race.
column4: Okazało się, że nie doceniliśmy naszych rywali i zostaliśmy przyłapani na próbie wygrania wyścigu dzięki oszustwu.

column2: Disqualified from race. Explorers confiscated. Standing penalty with rivals.
column3: Disqualified from race. Explorers confiscated. Standing penalty with rivals.
column4: Dyskwalifikacja. Eksploratory zostały skonfiskowane. Otrzymujesz karę do nastawienia wszystkich rywali.

column2:
We did our best. Our Explorer was in top-notch condition and had seen modifications to lighten it up as much as possible. 

Still we came in at a distant second place to <DisplayName>.

Our Explorer will be returned to us via Supply Pod shortly.
column3:
We did our best. Our Explorer was in top-notch condition and had seen modifications to lighten it up as much as possible. 

Still we came in at a distant second place to <DisplayName>.

Our Explorer will be returned to us via Supply Pod shortly.

column2:
Our second Explorer, meant to give us a serious edge at winning the long distance Arcadia Cross race came in at second place despite the advantage!

There is no way <DisplayName> could have played fair! This is not mathematically or physically possible! But we can't prove a thing.

Our Explorers will return shortly.
column3:
Our second Explorer, meant to give us a serious edge at winning the long distance Arcadia Cross race came in at second place despite the advantage!

There is no way <DisplayName> could have played fair! This is not mathematically or physically possible! But we can't prove a thing.

Our Explorers will return shortly.

column2: This is impossible! Everything was thought of and executed perfectly!
column3: This is impossible! Everything was thought of and executed perfectly!
column4: To niemożliwe! Wszystko zostało idealnie obmyślone i wykonane!

column2:
As celebrations break out in our colony, something quite unexpected happened. All rival leaders called to personally congratulate you and after the brief conversations a feeling that maybe, just for a while, the rivalry could slow down.

Possibly just wishful thinking, but a nice thought nonetheless.
column3:
As celebrations break out in our colony, something quite unexpected happened. All rival leaders called to personally congratulate you and after the brief conversations a feeling that maybe, just for a while, the rivalry could slow down.

Possibly just wishful thinking, but a nice thought nonetheless.

column2: With hundreds of millions of viewers from Earth, and quite possibly every soul on Mars, the Arcadia Cross race came to a dramatic end - and our Explorer, Vigor, came out victorious.
column3: With hundreds of millions of viewers from Earth, and quite possibly every soul on Mars, the Arcadia Cross race came to a dramatic end - and our Explorer, Vigor, came out victorious.
column4: Na oczach setek milionów widzów z Ziemi i zapewne każdego żywego ducha na Marsie rajd arkadyjski dobiega dramatycznego końca – a nasz eksplorator, Zygzak, okazuje się zwycięzcą.

column2:
The meteor was detected quite late and <DisplayName>'s colony is helpless to do anything about it. 

We, on the other hand, are in a position to collide one of our Rockets with the meteor to deviate its course just enough so it misses the rival colony. 

This will, however, trigger a deadly meteor storm right above our colony from the debris of the blast.
column3:
Мэтэор быў выяшлены запозна й калёнія <DisplayName> ня можа нічога зрабіць. 

Мы, з другога боку, маем магчымасьць штурхнуць адну з нашых ракет з мэтэорам каб адхіліць яго з кірунку да калёніі супраціўніку. 

Аднак, гэта выкліча сьмяротную мэтэорную буру на нашу калёнію з-за аскепкаў штурху.

column2: A large meteor is on an impact course towards a rival colony.
column3: Вялізны мэтэор ляціць на калёнію супраціўніка.
column4: W kierunku rywalizującej kolonii leci wielki meteor.

column2: We can't stay idle and leave our fellow Martians to die. Fire the rocket!
column3: Мы не можам быць убаку й пакінуць нашых марсіян паміраць. Запусціць ракету!
column4: Nie możemy patrzeć bezczynnie, jak nasi towarzysze na Marsie giną. Wystrzelić tę rakietę!

column2: lose a Rocket and trigger a Meteor Storm. Save the Colony of <DisplayName>
column3: Страціць ракету й выклікаць мэтэорную буру. Выратаваць калёнію <DisplayName>
column4: stracisz rakietę i spowodujesz burzę meteorytową, ale uratujesz kolonię <DisplayName>.

column2: A rocket was quickly prepared and launched directly at the meteor.
column3: Ракета шыбка падрыхтавана й запушчана ў напрамку мэтэора.
column4: Rakieta została błyskawicznie przygotowana do startu i wystrzelona w kierunku meteoru.

column2:
The collision altered the course of the deadly meteor just enough so it collided in safe distance of the other colony.

Celebrations are due, but first we must brace for the meteor storm about to hit us.
column3:
Штурх зьмяніў кірунак сьмяротнага мэтэору дастаткова, каб ён упаў у бясьпечнай адлегласьці ад другой калёніі.

Ясчэ пасьвяткуем, але першпачаткова мы мусімы падрыхтавацца да мэтэорнай буры, што вось-вось абрынецца на нас.

column2: I am responsible for the lives of our colonists and can't put them in danger. I am sorry.
column3: Я адказны за усіх з нашай калёніі й не магу ставіць пад пагрозу іх. Мне шкада.
column4: Odpowiadam za życie naszych kolonistów i nie mogę ich narażać na niebezpieczeństwa. Przykro mi.

column2: the Colony of <DisplayName> will be destroyed
The window in which we could have acted to save the rival colony quickly passed.
column3: The window in which we could have acted to save the rival colony quickly passed.
column4: Okienko czasowe, w którym mogliśmy interweniować, by ocalić rywalizującą kolonię, szybko przeminęło.

column2:
Soon after a marsquake is detected. News of the complete destruction of <DisplayName>'s colony followed shortly.

Many lives were lost.
column3:
Soon after a marsquake is detected. News of the complete destruction of <DisplayName>'s colony followed shortly.

Many lives were lost.

column2: Following our heroic intervention which saved an entire rival colony, all other colonies are sending us gifts of good will.
column3: Following our heroic intervention which saved an entire rival colony, all other colonies are sending us gifts of good will.
column4: Po naszej bohaterskiej interwencji, która uratowała całą rywalizującą kolonię, wszystkie pozostałe kolonie przesyłają nam dary, by okazać swoją wdzięczność.

column2: get Supply Pods with advanced resources, standing boost with all Colonies
column3: get Supply Pods with advanced resources, standing boost with all Colonies
column4: otrzymujesz zasobniki z zaawansowanymi zasobami i premię do nastawienia u wszystkich kolonii.

column2:
Operating a stolen vehicle all the way from <DisplayName>'s colony to here, a young man by the name of Still Osbourne has made contact with us.

He wishes we grant him asylum and in return he will give us precious knowledge. 

Doing so will most definitely put a serious dent on our relations with our friends - <DisplayName>.
column3:
Operating a stolen vehicle all the way from <DisplayName>'s colony to here, a young man by the name of Still Osbourne has made contact with us.

He wishes we grant him asylum and in return he will give us precious knowledge. 

Doing so will most definitely put a serious dent on our relations with our friends - <DisplayName>.

column2: An awkward situation has made its way to our door step.
column3: An awkward situation has made its way to our door step.
column4: Doszło właśnie do pewnej niezręcznej sytuacji.

column2: Ignore the message, make sure no one knows about it.
column3: Ignore the message, make sure no one knows about it.
column4: Zignoruj wiadomość i zadbaj o to, by nikt się o tym nie dowiedział.

column2: Bring him in. Maybe he'll be worth some reward if returned.
column3: Bring him in. Maybe he'll be worth some reward if returned.
column4: Sprowadźcie go. Może dostaniemy nagrodę, jak go odeślemy tam, skąd przybył.

column2: morale penalty to colonists. <funding(buyout)> reward from friendly colony
column3: morale penalty to colonists. <funding(buyout)> reward from friendly colony
column4: kara do morale kolonistów. <funding(buyout)> nagrody od przyjaznej kolonii

column2: What could have made him take this perilous trip? Grant Still Osbourne asylum.
column3: What could have made him take this perilous trip? Grant Still Osbourne asylum.
column4: Co mogło go skłonić do wyruszenia w tak niebezpieczną podróż? Udzielmy Stillowi Osbourne’owi azylu.

column2: receive stolen tech from rival, severe standing penalty, colony morale boost
column3: receive stolen tech from rival, severe standing penalty, colony morale boost
column4: otrzymujesz technologię wykradzioną rywalowi, poważną karę do nastawienia i premię do morale kolonii

column2:
As it turned out, the package from the colony of <DisplayName> contains a huge pile of... let's call it "fertilizer". We may have really pissed those people, but this is a bad joke nevertheless.

What is your response to this provocation?
column3:
As it turned out, the package from the colony of <DisplayName> contains a huge pile of... let's call it "fertilizer". We may have really pissed those people, but this is a bad joke nevertheless.

What is your response to this provocation?

column2: A rival colony has sent a big package addressed to you, personally.
column3: A rival colony has sent a big package addressed to you, personally.
column4: Rywalizująca kolonia przesłała wielką paczkę zaadresowaną do ciebie osobiście.

column2: Start operation "Totally Not Dust Storm" - send it back and drop it over one of their Domes.
column3: Start operation "Totally Not Dust Storm" - send it back and drop it over one of their Domes.
column4: Rozpocząć operację „To nie jest burza PYŁOWA” - odeślijcie ten szajs, rozsypując go nad jedną z ich kopuł.
all Party Animal Colonists gain Morale

column2: Contact all colonies and make a stern statement.
column3: Contact all colonies and make a stern statement.
column4: Skontaktuj się z wszystkimi koloniami i wystosuj zdecydowane oświadczenie.

column2: Do nothing. Reacting to such a stupid joke would be beneath us.
column3: Do nothing. Reacting to such a stupid joke would be beneath us.
column4: Nie robimy nic. Reagowanie na taki głupi dowcip jest poniżej naszej godności.

column2:
Because the time frame in which the accidents happened was rather small, the ensuing quick investigation found software corruption in all of the involved Drones - corruption our engineers say can only happen if their system was hacked.

Although an obvious act of sabotage, we can't prove who is to blame precisely. What we can do is raise the issue to Earthly judicial bodies - which will probably hinder all of our rival's (not just the guilty one's) operations for a short while.
column3:
Паколькі прамежак часу, у які ўсё адбылося, быў даволі кароткім, наступнае хуткае расьсьледваньне выявіла пашкоджаньне праграмнага забеспячэньня ва ўсіх задзейнічаных Дронах. Ушкоджаньне, па словах нашых інжынэраў, можа адбыцца толькі ў тым выпадку, калі сістэму ўзламалі.

Нягледзячы на тое, што гэта відавочны дыверсійны акт, мы ня можам даказаць, хто менавіта вінаваты. Тое, што мы можам зрабіць, гэта падняць пытаньне ў зямныя судовыя органы - якія, верагодна, на кароткі час перашкодзяць усім апэрацыям нашых супраціўнікаў (ня толькі вінаватага).

column2: Several colonists were injured today, the severity of their injuries varying, in accidents that all involved Drones.
column3: Некалькі каляністаў атрымалі раненьні сёньня, ступень іх цяжкасьці была рознай, ва ўсіх выпадках зь удзелам дронаў.
column4: Kilku kolonistów odniosło dziś rany o różnej dotkliwości. Doszło do tego w wyniku serii wypadków z dronami.

column2: Of course we will ring the bell on this one. Inform the UN.
column3: Безумоўна, мы будзем трызвоніць аб гэтым. Інфармуем ААН.
column4: Oczywiście, że uderzymy na alarm. Powiadomcie ONZ.

column2: all rivals lose funding and standing with you
column3: Усе супраціўнікі страчваюць фінансаваньне й адносіны становяцца горш
column4: wszyscy rywale tracą fundusze i nastawienie do ciebie

column2: No one was killed, fortunately. Just make sure our Drones are better protected from now on.
column3: На шчасце ніхто не загінуў. Проста пераканайцеся, што з гэтага часу нашы Дроны лепш абаронены.
column4: Na szczęście nikt nie zginął. Zadbajcie tylko o to, by w przyszłości nasze drony miały lepsze zabezpieczenia.

column2:
Because they deduced the window of opportunity was sure to close fast, they inserted a Trojan Horse to look around and try and hinder whatever operations they could. 

While looking for a system weakness, our hackers stumbled upon very salacious information, which is sure to do serious PR damage to the colony of <DisplayName>.

Sharing the information will also make it quite hard to deny running spies on Mars on our part.
column3:
Паколькі яны палічылі, што акно магчымасьцяў хутка зачыніцца, яны ўсталявалі траянскага каня, каб азірнуцца й паспрабаваць перашкодзіць любым апэрацыям, якім маглі.

Шукаючы слабыя мейсцы ў сістэме, нашы хакеры налучыліся на вельмі непрыстойную інфармацыю, якая напэўна нанясе сур'ёзную піяр-шкоду калёніі <DisplayName>.

Абмен інфармацыяй таксама ўскладніць адмову ад шпіёнаў на Марсе з нашага боку.

column2: Our cyber security team has taken advantage of a gaping hole within one of our rivals’ network defenses.
column3: Наша каманда па кыбэрбясьпецы скарысталася дзіркай у сеткавай ахове аднаго з нашых супернікаў.
column4: Nasz zespół do spraw bezpieczeństwa cybernetycznego wykorzystał lukę w zabezpieczeniach sieciowych jednego z naszych rywali.

column2: No need, just hinder their production.
column3: Ня трэба, проста сапсуем іх вытворчасьць.
column4: Nie ma potrzeby, zakłóćcie tylko ich produkcję.
Podziel się ta historią z Ziemią.

column2: rival loses colonists and money, we lose standing with all rivals
column3: Супраціўнікі страчваюць каляністаў і грошы, мы сапсуем адносіны з усімі калёніямі
column4: rywal traci kolonistów i pieniądze, nastawienie wszystkich innych kolonii do ciebie pogarsza się

column2: Warn them – this could be embarrassing for us all.
column3: Папярэдзіць іх - гэта можа быць няёмка для ўсіх нас.
column4: Ostrzeżcie ich – to mogłoby się okazać kłopotliwe dla nas wszystkich.
otrzymujesz premię do nastawienia kolonii sponsora <DisplayName>

column2: Anyone up for some good old blackmailing?
column3: Хто-небудзь гатовы да старога добрага шантажу?

column4: otrzymujesz <funding(blackmail)> i tracisz nastawienie kolonii sponsora <DisplayName>

column2: The Rover is a testimony of a long-lost expedition at these coordinates. We still haven’t recovered any information from the black box. What do you suggest?
column3: The Rover is a testimony of a long-lost expedition at these coordinates. We still haven’t recovered any information from the black box. What do you suggest?
column4: Ten łazik to pozostałość po dawno zaginionej ekspedycji wysłanej w tę okolicę. Wciąż nie sprawdziliśmy, jakie informacje ma w swojej czarnej skrzynce. Co proponujesz?

column2: We have discovered a derelict Rover and recovered its intact black box.
column3: We have discovered a derelict Rover and recovered its intact black box.
column4: Odkryliśmy porzuconego łazika i odzyskaliśmy jego nietkniętą czarną skrzynkę.

column2: Salvage the data in the black box.
column3: Salvage the data in the black box.

column2: The Rover's black box contained an unknown virus!
column3: The Rover's black box contained an unknown virus!
column4: Czarna skrzynka łazika zawierała nieznanego wirusa!

column2:
We found this out the hard way - when the black box was connected to the Colony's computer systems to be decrypted, the virus infected them. We managed to quarantine it successfully, but not before it gained access to the Colony's financial accounts.

<effect>You have lost <funding_lost>% of your current Funding.
column3:
We found this out the hard way - when the black box was connected to the Colony's computer systems to be decrypted, the virus infected them. We managed to quarantine it successfully, but not before it gained access to the Colony's financial accounts.

<effect>You have lost <funding_lost>% of your current Funding.

column2: The Rover's black box contained invaluable research information which allowed us to discover a new Breakthrough!
column3: The Rover's black box contained invaluable research information which allowed us to discover a new Breakthrough!
column4: Czarna skrzynka łazika zawierała bezcenne dane badawcze, które umożliwiły nam odkrycie nowego przełomu!

column2: <effect> A new Breakthrough tech has become available.
column3: <effect> A new Breakthrough tech has become available.

column2: Take the Rover back to the Colony.
column3: Take the Rover back to the Colony.
column4: Sprowadźcie tego łazika z powrotem do kolonii.

column2: The moment the Rover is activated it goes berserk.
column3: The moment the Rover is activated it goes berserk.
column4: Łazik zaczyna szaleć natychmiast po uruchomieniu.

column2:
The vehicle drives through the expedition camp and smashes itself against the Rocket's hull. The damage is light, but it still would require on-site repairs.

<effect>The expedition is delayed.
column3:
The vehicle drives through the expedition camp and smashes itself against the Rocket's hull. The damage is light, but it still would require on-site repairs.

<effect>The expedition is delayed.

column2: The Rover is damaged beyond repair, but it has enough energy to open its hatch and let out a bunch of Drones which obediently enter our Rocket.
column3: The Rover is damaged beyond repair, but it has enough energy to open its hatch and let out a bunch of Drones which obediently enter our Rocket.
column4: Łazik jest zbyt mocno uszkodzony, by dało się go naprawić, ale ma dość energii, by otworzyć swój właz i wypuścić gromadę dronów, które posłusznie wjeżdżają do naszej rakiety.

column2: It seems that an unknown Colony had sent an ill-prepared expedition team to this location. Their equipment failed and they never managed to return to their home. We’ve identified the remains of several Colonists who lost their lives in the line of duty.
column3: It seems that an unknown Colony had sent an ill-prepared expedition team to this location. Their equipment failed and they never managed to return to their home. We’ve identified the remains of several Colonists who lost their lives in the line of duty.
column4: Wygląda na to, że jakaś nieznana kolonia wysłała tu źle przygotowaną ekspedycję. Sprzęt zawiódł i członkowie wyprawy nie zdołali wrócić do domu. Zidentyfikowaliśmy szczątki kilku kolonistów, którzy oddali życie służbie kolonii.

column2: We’ve discovered the crashed remains of another expedition.
column3: We’ve discovered the crashed remains of another expedition.

column2: Bury them, then salvage the useful equipment.
column3: Bury them, then salvage the useful equipment.
column4: Pochowajcie ich, a potem zabierzcie przydatne wyposażenie.
otrzymujesz <research(salvaged_data)> i pewną liczbę prefabrykatów dronów (<salvaged_drones>).

column2: Bring the remains here, we'll bury them with honors.
column3: Bring the remains here, we'll bury them with honors.
column4: Przywieźcie szczątki kolonistów do nas, urządzimy im zaszczytny pochówek.

column2: all Colonists gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_up_sols)> Sols
column3: all Colonists gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_up_sols)> Sols
column4: wszyscy koloniści otrzymują <morale_up> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_up_sols)>).

column2:
This points towards obvious acts of sabotage by some unknown actors.

Investigations are underway as we speak.
column3:
This points towards obvious acts of sabotage by some unknown actors.

Investigations are underway as we speak.

column2: Several factories have suffered malfunctions - all critical and all at the exact same time.
column3: Several factories have suffered malfunctions - all critical and all at the exact same time.
column4: Kilka fabryk doznało awarii – wszystkie są poważne i nastąpiły dokładnie w tym samym czasie.

column2: Even here, we are still at each other's throats.
column3: Even here, we are still at each other's throats.
column4: Nawet tu wciąż rzucamy się sobie do gardeł.

column2: I have the feeling that I know who did this. Investigate first, though.
column3: I have the feeling that I know who did this. Investigate first, though.
column4: Mam wrażenie, że wiem, kto to zrobił. Ale najpierw dochodzenie.

column2:
We believe <DisplayName> is behind these covert actions, based on intel shared by other rivals earlier. 

We currently have no way to strike back and our evidence won't hold, should we bring it to courts on Earth.
column3:
We believe <DisplayName> is behind these covert actions, based on intel shared by other rivals earlier. 

We currently have no way to strike back and our evidence won't hold, should we bring it to courts on Earth.

column2: More acts of sabotage – several buildings have sustained further damage.
column3: More acts of sabotage – several buildings have sustained further damage.
column4: Kolejne akty sabotażu – kilka budynków doznało dalszych uszkodzeń.

column2: Repair the damage. An opportunity will present itself.
column3: Repair the damage. An opportunity will present itself.
column4: Naprawcie uszkodzenia. Jeszcze będziemy mieli okazję do rewanżu.

column2:
To all except one - <DisplayName>’s.

Frustrated, as are we, by their recent activity on Mars, the  colonies propose an alliance aimed at crippling <DisplayName>’s mission.

A three step plan is laid out – signing on to it will require we share the considerable financial burden the retaliatory measures will bring.

The first step is aimed at supplies en-route to Mars while still in low Earth orbit. Strikes masked as unfortunate space debris collisions will suffocate their lifeline from Earth.
column3:
To all except one - <DisplayName>’s.

Frustrated, as are we, by their recent activity on Mars, the  colonies propose an alliance aimed at crippling <DisplayName>’s mission.

A three step plan is laid out – signing on to it will require we share the considerable financial burden the retaliatory measures will bring.

The first step is aimed at supplies en-route to Mars while still in low Earth orbit. Strikes masked as unfortunate space debris collisions will suffocate their lifeline from Earth.

column2: A message has been sent to all Martian Missions’ Commanders.
column3: A message has been sent to all Martian Missions’ Commanders.
column4: Dowódcy wszystkich kolonii marsjańskich otrzymali dziś wiadomość.
rozpoczynasz ofensywne tajne operacje przeciwko kolonii sponsora <DisplayName>

column2: We will upgrade our defenses against such activities without effectively going to war. Turn down the proposal.
column3: We will upgrade our defenses against such activities without effectively going to war. Turn down the proposal.
column4: Zamiast przystępować do wojny, ulepszymy naszą obronę przeciwko takim działaniom. Odrzucamy propozycję.

column2: I decline to descend into such barbarism. Ignore them until they see the error of their ways.
column3: I decline to descend into such barbarism. Ignore them until they see the error of their ways.
column4: Odmawiam zniżania się do takiego barbarzyństwa. Ignorujcie ich, aż dostrzegą swoje błędy.

column2: sabotages will continue for an unknown time period
column3: sabotages will continue for an unknown time period
column4: sabotaże będą następować nadal przez nieznany czas

column2:
<DisplayName>’s capacity has greatly shrunk and they have halted all offensive operations for the time being. 

The Second phase of the plan involves the artificial diverting of meteors towards their general location. One space mining company from Earth is well equipped to do so for the right price.
column3:
<DisplayName>’s capacity has greatly shrunk and they have halted all offensive operations for the time being. 

The Second phase of the plan involves the artificial diverting of meteors towards their general location. One space mining company from Earth is well equipped to do so for the right price.

column2: Our aggressive rival has already begun feeling the pain our combined efforts to cripple their supplies from Earth are inflicting.
column3: Our aggressive rival has already begun feeling the pain our combined efforts to cripple their supplies from Earth are inflicting.
column4: Nasz agresywny rywal zaczyna odczuwać wpływ naszych wspólnych wysiłków zakłócających jego zaopatrzenie z Ziemi.

column2: further damage to the colony of <DisplayName>
column3: further damage to the colony of <DisplayName>

column2: No, this is enough. Put a stop to the madness.
column3: No, this is enough. Put a stop to the madness.
column4: Nie, to wystarczy. Połóżmy kres temu szaleństwu.

column2: lose standing with all other colonies
column3: lose standing with all other colonies

column2:
Our joint efforts have effectively brought <DisplayName>’s colony to its knees and we doubt they will be able to muster up any malicious activity within the foreseeable future.

This being said, our allies are determined to see the plan through. 

The third phase awaits financial commitment. It involves knocking out their remaining power producers. This will put an end to <DisplayName>’s ambitions on Mars and will probably take many lives.
column3:
Our joint efforts have effectively brought <DisplayName>’s colony to its knees and we doubt they will be able to muster up any malicious activity within the foreseeable future.

This being said, our allies are determined to see the plan through. 

The third phase awaits financial commitment. It involves knocking out their remaining power producers. This will put an end to <DisplayName>’s ambitions on Mars and will probably take many lives.

column2: Phase 2 has crippled their industry and most of their life support.
column3: Phase 2 has crippled their industry and most of their life support.
column4: Faza 2 ograniczyła możliwości przemysłu rywala i zakłóciła działanie ich systemu podtrzymywania życia.

column2: destroy <DisplayName>'s colony, morale penalty to all colonists
column3: destroy <DisplayName>'s colony, morale penalty to all colonists
column4: kolonia sponsora <DisplayName> ulegnie zniszczeniu, kara do morale wszystkich kolonistów

column2: We will not take part in this.
column3: We will not take part in this.
column4: Nie będziemy brać udziału w czymś takim.

column2: destroy <DisplayName>'s colony, -35 standing with other colonies
column3: destroy <DisplayName>'s colony, -35 standing with other colonies
column4: kolonia sponsora <DisplayName> ulegnie zniszczeniu, nastawienie innych kolonii do ciebie pogarsza się o 35 punktów

column2: We have gone too far, we must stop this. We will pay to hinder offensive efforts!
column3: We have gone too far, we must stop this. We will pay to hinder offensive efforts!
column4: Posunęliśmy się za daleko, trzeba to przerwać. Zapłacimy za utrudnianie działań ofensywnych!

column2: save <DisplayName>'s colony, -50 standing with other colonies, morale boost to all colonists
column3: save <DisplayName>'s colony, -50 standing with other colonies, morale boost to all colonists
column4: kolonia sponsora <DisplayName> zostanie ocalona, nastawienie innych kolonii do ciebie pogarsza się o 50 punktów, premia do morale dla wszystkich kolonistów

column2: The agents of <DisplayName> sabotaged our Factories
column3: The agents of <DisplayName> sabotaged our Factories
column4: Agenci kolonii sponsora <DisplayName> dokonali sabotażu naszych fabryk

column2: <DisplayName> will no longer sabotage our buildings
column3: <DisplayName> will no longer sabotage our buildings
column4: Kolonia sponsora <DisplayName> przestanie sabotować nasze budynki

column2: We lost standing with our former allies
column3: We lost standing with our former allies

column2:
Several colonists have been killed.

Our experts have begun fixing the data block as we speak. However, preliminary analysis of the problem suggests it is sabotage from our rivals here on Mars.

Because of the technical difficulties we are experiencing, it will cost us further research to name the culprit.
column3:
Several colonists have been killed.

Our experts have begun fixing the data block as we speak. However, preliminary analysis of the problem suggests it is sabotage from our rivals here on Mars.

Because of the technical difficulties we are experiencing, it will cost us further research to name the culprit.

column2: Alert! Something is wrong. All data transfers from Earth have ceased after an explosion rocked our colony.
column3: Alert! Something is wrong. All data transfers from Earth have ceased after an explosion rocked our colony.
column4: Alarm! Coś jest nie tak. Wszystkie transfery danych z Ziemi urwały się po tym, jak naszą kolonią wstrząsnął jakiś wybuch.

column2: Just fix the problem. We cannot afford more research setbacks.
column3: Just fix the problem. We cannot afford more research setbacks.
column4: Po prostu naprawcie problem. Nie możemy sobie pozwolić na dalsze przestoje w badaniach.
brak badań zleconych i badań sponsora przez 5 soli

column2: Yes, fix the problem, but also find out who is responsible. We must know our enemies!
column3: Yes, fix the problem, but also find out who is responsible. We must know our enemies!
column4: Tak, naprawcie problem, ale ustalcie też, kto za to odpowiada. Musimy znać naszych wrogów!

column2: no Outsource/Sponsor research for 15 Sols. Discover the culprit
column3: no Outsource/Sponsor research for 15 Sols. Discover the culprit
column4: brak badań zleconych i badań sponsora przez 15 soli, odkrywasz winowajcę

column2:
With high confidence, our agents have reached the conclusion that <DisplayName> is to blame.

As things stand now, we have no way of retaliating. However, we have mustered up a long-term plan through which, should the opportunity ever arise, we may get payback for their reckless actions.
column3:
With high confidence, our agents have reached the conclusion that <DisplayName> is to blame.

As things stand now, we have no way of retaliating. However, we have mustered up a long-term plan through which, should the opportunity ever arise, we may get payback for their reckless actions.

column2: Commander, we know who our saboteurs were.
column3: Commander, we know who our saboteurs were.
column4: Dowódco, wiemy, kim byli nasi sabotażyści.

column2: We can't let this go unpunished. Set aside funds and wait for the perfect opportunity.
column3: We can't let this go unpunished. Set aside funds and wait for the perfect opportunity.
column4: Nie możemy puścić tego płazem. Zarezerwujmy fundusze i czekajmy na dobrą okazję.

column2: should the opportunity ever arise, and it may not, you will be able to exact revenge.
column3: should the opportunity ever arise, and it may not, you will be able to exact revenge.
column4: jeśli nadarzy się sposobność – a nie musi – będziesz w stanie zemścić się na sprawcach.

column2: We cannot concern ourselves with petty squabbles. Our mission is too important.
column3: We cannot concern ourselves with petty squabbles. Our mission is too important.
column4: Nie możemy tracić czasu na dziecinne intrygi. Nasza misja jest zbyt ważna.

column2:
A combination of circumstances has revealed a weakness in the colony of <DisplayName>.

We now have the opportunity to take revenge for the crime committed against us.

Note that the nature of this weakness means that we most probably will eliminate the presence of <DisplayName> on Mars and it will seem like a calculation error on their part which cannot be traced to us.

Truth be told, it really will be a calculation error on their part, just not the one which could reroute flammable chemicals to their oxygen supply, but the one which they made long ago when they chose to endanger our colonists.

We need your approval to go forward with the plan.
column3:
A combination of circumstances has revealed a weakness in the colony of <DisplayName>.

We now have the opportunity to take revenge for the crime committed against us.

Note that the nature of this weakness means that we most probably will eliminate the presence of <DisplayName> on Mars and it will seem like a calculation error on their part which cannot be traced to us.

Truth be told, it really will be a calculation error on their part, just not the one which could reroute flammable chemicals to their oxygen supply, but the one which they made long ago when they chose to endanger our colonists.

We need your approval to go forward with the plan.

column2: A long time ago, a crime was committed against our colony. It's payback time.
column3: A long time ago, a crime was committed against our colony. It's payback time.
column4: Dawno temu popełniono zbrodnię na naszej kolonii. Czas na rewanż.

column2: It was so long ago, and things are different now. Abort!
column3: It was so long ago, and things are different now. Abort!
column4: To było tak dawno temu. Teraz sprawy wyglądają inaczej. Przerwać akcję!

column2: We will never forget the lives they have taken from us. Go ahead!
column3: We will never forget the lives they have taken from us. Go ahead!
column4: Nigdy nie zapomnimy, że spowodowali śmierć naszych kolonistów. Wykonać!

column2: Many of the Martianborn from the colony of <DisplayName> want to visit the Earth. Yet their commander wouldn't spare a Rocket for leisure.
column3: Many of the Martianborn from the colony of <DisplayName> want to visit the Earth. Yet their commander wouldn't spare a Rocket for leisure.
column4: Wielu urodzonych na Marsie ludzi z kolonii <DisplayName> chce odwiedzić Ziemię. Niestety, ich dowódca nie może udostępnić rakiety do celów rozrywkowych.

column2: Some wealthy young Martians from another colony need a change of scenery.
column3: Some wealthy young Martians from another colony need a change of scenery.
column4: Kilku młodych bogatych Marsjan z innej kolonii potrzebuje zmiany otoczenia.

column2: If they have the money, we will gladly help them spend it.
column3: If they have the money, we will gladly help them spend it.
column4: Jeśli mają pieniądze, chętnie pomożemy im je wydać.

column2: Why travel to Earth? Persuade them to come to our colony and live a life of luxury!
column3: Why travel to Earth? Persuade them to come to our colony and live a life of luxury!
column4: Po co mają lecieć na Ziemię? Namówmy ich, aby przeprowadzili się do naszej kolonii i wiedli życie w luksusie!

column2: gain <workers_gain> Youth Whiner Martianborn Colonists and <applicants_gain_low> Tourist Applicants
column3: gain <workers_gain> Youth Whiner Martianborn Colonists and <applicants_gain_low> Tourist Applicants
column4: otrzymujesz <workers_gain> młodych kolonistów z cechami „marudność” i ”Marsjanin” oraz <applicants_gain_low> ochotników-turystów.

column2: I don't have time for babysitting.
column3: I don't have time for babysitting.
column4: Nie mam czasu, by ich niańczyć.

column2: The old gentleman's health isn't very good though. Some say he may not survive the journey from the colony of <DisplayName>.
column3: The old gentleman's health isn't very good though. Some say he may not survive the journey from the colony of <DisplayName>.
column4: Jednak starszy pan podupadł już na zdrowiu. Niektórzy twierdzą, że może nie przeżyć podróży z kolonii <DisplayName>.

column2: A senior professor from another colony wants to move to our wonderful home.
column3: A senior professor from another colony wants to move to our wonderful home.
column4: Sędziwy profesor z innej kolonii pragnie przeprowadzić się do naszego wspaniałego domu.

column2: He is welcome! I'll do everything in my power to ensure he arrives safe and sound.
column3: He is welcome! I'll do everything in my power to ensure he arrives safe and sound.
column4: Witamy go serdecznie! Zrobię wszystko, co w mojej mocy, by dotarł do nas cało i zdrowo.

column2: gain a Senior Genius Scientist with Chronic Condition
column3: gain a Senior Genius Scientist with Chronic Condition
column4: otrzymujesz naukowca w podeszłym wieku z iskrą geniuszu i stanem przewlekłym.

column2: I admire his works too much to be able to take this risk.
column3: I admire his works too much to be able to take this risk.
column4: Za bardzo podziwiam jego prace, by podjąć takie ryzyko.

column2:
The old professor who planned to live in our colony died peacefully in his sleep. The neighbor colony informed you that in his last will he gifted his last works to us. 

We have gained <research(research_genius)> Research.
column3:
The old professor who planned to live in our colony died peacefully in his sleep. The neighbor colony informed you that in his last will he gifted his last works to us. 

We have gained <research(research_genius)> Research.

column2: The people from the colony of <DisplayName> have forged strong bonds with our colonists. Some of them would like to live here, or at least come and go as they like.
column3: The people from the colony of <DisplayName> have forged strong bonds with our colonists. Some of them would like to live here, or at least come and go as they like.
column4: Ludzie z kolonii <DisplayName> wytworzyli silne więzi z naszymi kolonistami. Niektórzy z nich chcieliby u nas zamieszkać, a przynajmniej odwiedzać nas od czasu do czasu.

column2: The people from another colony requested permission to visit us.
column3: The people from another colony requested permission to visit us.
column4: Mieszkańcy innej kolonii proszą o pozwolenie na odwiedziny.
Mogą się do nas wprowadzić bez problemu!

column2: They are our friends! They are welcome to visit as they like.
column3: They are our friends! They are welcome to visit as they like.
column4: Są naszymi przyjaciółmi! Mogą nas odwiedzać, kiedy tylko zechcą.

column2: all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column3: all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: wszyscy koloniści otrzymują <morale_gain> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: Friends will be friends, but the colony's security comes first.
column3: Friends will be friends, but the colony's security comes first.
column4: Przyjaźń przyjaźnią, ale najważniejsze jest bezpieczeństwo kolonii.

column2: all Security Officers gain <morale_gain_high> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column3: all Security Officers gain <morale_gain_high> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: wszyscy funkcjonariusze bezpieczeństwa otrzymują <morale_gain_high> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: "We were here first!" They threaten to sabotage and destroy the useful resources on site rather than allow us to claim even a tiny portion of them.
column3: "We were here first!" They threaten to sabotage and destroy the useful resources on site rather than allow us to claim even a tiny portion of them.
column4: „My byliśmy tu pierwsi!” Rywale grożą sabotażem i zniszczeniem użytecznych zasobów znajdujących się w tym miejscu, nie chcąc, abyśmy cokolwiek z nich uszczknęli.

column2: The expedition encountered personnel from a rival Colony. The rivals are hostile and uncooperative, claiming they have exclusive rights on exploiting the Anomaly site.
column3: The expedition encountered personnel from a rival Colony. The rivals are hostile and uncooperative, claiming they have exclusive rights on exploiting the Anomaly site.
column4: Nasza ekspedycja napotkała członków jednej z rywalizujących kolonii. Są wrogo nastawieni i nieskłonni do współpracy, twierdząc, że mają wyłączne prawo do zbadania tej anomalii.

column2: Teach them a lesson – but be careful!
column3: Teach them a lesson – but be careful!

column2: After your decisive actions, the rival expedition quickly packs up and goes.
column3: After your decisive actions, the rival expedition quickly packs up and goes.
column4: Widząc zdecydowanie twoich ludzi, ekspedycja rywali szybko pakuje sprzęt i odjeżdża.

column2:
Advancing in a line towards the rivals, with tools risen up menacingly was enough for them to lose courage and beat it. Finally you can explore the riches of Mars.

<effect>The expedition will return with <metals(metals_gained)> and <polymers(polymers_gained)>.
column3:
Advancing in a line towards the rivals, with tools risen up menacingly was enough for them to lose courage and beat it. Finally you can explore the riches of Mars.

<effect>The expedition will return with <metals(metals_gained)> and <polymers(polymers_gained)>.

column2: The rivals turned out to be far more aggressive and determined than you thought. After a short brawl you are forced to retreat.
column3: The rivals turned out to be far more aggressive and determined than you thought. After a short brawl you are forced to retreat.
column4: Rywale okazali się o wiele bardziej agresywni i zdeterminowani, niż ci się wydawało. Po krótkiej bójce twoi ludzie zostali zmuszeni do odwrotu.

column2:
No serious damage was caused, but the repair and recovery time will surely allow the rival expedition to claim rights of the location.

<effect>The expedition will return with a delay.
column3:
No serious damage was caused, but the repair and recovery time will surely allow the rival expedition to claim rights of the location.

<effect>The expedition will return with a delay.

column2: the expedition returns, the anomaly is lost
column3: the expedition returns, the anomaly is lost

column4: Trzeba pociągnąć za kilka sznurków na Ziemi.

column2: The rival expedition receives new orders from their Commander, and after a couple of hours they pack up and leave.
column3: The rival expedition receives new orders from their Commander, and after a couple of hours they pack up and leave.
column4: Rywale otrzymują nowe rozkazy od swojego dowódcy. Po kilku godzinach pakują swój sprzęt i odjeżdżają.

column2:
Finally, you can explore the wonders of Mars hidden on the location.

<effect>You have gained <research(research_political)>.
column3:
Finally, you can explore the wonders of Mars hidden on the location.

<effect>You have gained <research(research_political)>.

column2:
The hassle was worth it, for the anomaly revealed unseen wonders of science and opened up a new path of thinking for your Scientists.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available.
column3:
The hassle was worth it, for the anomaly revealed unseen wonders of science and opened up a new path of thinking for your Scientists.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available.

column2:
Finally, you can explore the wonders of Mars hidden on the location.

<effect>You have gained <research(research_political2)>.
column3:
Finally, you can explore the wonders of Mars hidden on the location.

<effect>You have gained <research(research_political2)>.

column2: The rival expedition receives new orders from their Commander, and after a couple of hours they pack up and leave.
column3: The rival expedition receives new orders from their Commander, and after a couple of hours they pack up and leave.
column4: Rywale otrzymują nowe rozkazy od swojego dowódcy. Po kilku godzinach pakują swój sprzęt i odjeżdżają.

column2:
The hassle was worth it, for the anomaly revealed unseen wonders of science and opened up a new path of thinking for your scientists.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available.
column3:
The hassle was worth it, for the anomaly revealed unseen wonders of science and opened up a new path of thinking for your scientists.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available.

column2:
The colony of <DisplayName> plans to build a giant mobile colony which would slowly crawl towards resource sites, harvest them and move forward when they are depleted. Even crazier, they expect that others will follow their example and in time bigger colonies would assimilate the smaller ones.

One thing is certain: such ambitious goal cannot be accomplished in the next few hundred years.
column3:
The colony of <DisplayName> plans to build a giant mobile colony which would slowly crawl towards resource sites, harvest them and move forward when they are depleted. Even crazier, they expect that others will follow their example and in time bigger colonies would assimilate the smaller ones.

One thing is certain: such ambitious goal cannot be accomplished in the next few hundred years.

column2: Another colony has announced some insane theory about "Mobile Colonies" and “City Darwinism”.
column3: Another colony has announced some insane theory about "Mobile Colonies" and “City Darwinism”.
column4: Jedna z pozostałych kolonii ogłosiła szalony projekt „ruchomych kolonii”, opierający się na koncepcji ”ewolucji miast”.

column2: This is ridiculous! It just can’t work.
column3: This is ridiculous! It just can’t work.

column4: tracisz <workers_loss_high>% nerdów, otrzymujesz pewną liczbę hipisów (<workers_gain_low>).

column2: This is the future! We will consider starting such project.
column3: This is the future! We will consider starting such project.
column4: To przyszłość! Musimy się zastanowić, czy nie rozpocząć takiego projektu.
tracisz <workers_loss_high>% hipisów, otrzymujesz pewną liczbę nerdów (<workers_gain_low>).

column2: Don’t worry! We are secretly working on such project already.
column3: Don’t worry! We are secretly working on such project already.
column4: Spoko Maroko! My już w tajemnicy pracujemy nad takim projektem.
tracisz <workers_loss_high>% hipisów, otrzymujesz pewną liczbę nerdów z cechą „entuzjazm” (<workers_gain_high>).

column2:
Some are aimed at factory and extractor workers, claiming a culture of elitism that gives Scientists, Medics and the likes privileged status within the colony.

Others are meant to agitate the same Medics and Scientists, with some clips claiming that many of the unpopular decisions the leadership of the colony has made are because of pressure put on by the factory workers.
 
Until we get all our firewalls running again, we can block only a few of the channels. Some will have to remain online for a short duration during which they can and will be watched by many colonists.
column3:
Some are aimed at factory and extractor workers, claiming a culture of elitism that gives Scientists, Medics and the likes privileged status within the colony.

Others are meant to agitate the same Medics and Scientists, with some clips claiming that many of the unpopular decisions the leadership of the colony has made are because of pressure put on by the factory workers.
 
Until we get all our firewalls running again, we can block only a few of the channels. Some will have to remain online for a short duration during which they can and will be watched by many colonists.

column2: Commander, an unknown rival is streaming propaganda videos at us - videos aimed at inciting discord between several classes of colonists.
column3: Камандыр, невядомы канкурэнт трансліруе нам прапагандысцкія відэа, накіраваныя на распальваньне рознагалоссяў паміж некалькімі класамі каляністаў.
column4: Dowódco, nieznany rywal zasypuje nas propagandowymi filmikami, które mają na celu wywołanie niezgody między poszczególnymi klasami kolonistów.

column2: We can't afford to agitate the workers in factories and extractors.
column3: Мы ня можам дазволіць сабе агітаваць рабочых на заводах і экстрактарах.
column4: Nie możemy pozwolić na podburzanie robotników z fabryk i ekstraktorów.

column2: Medics and Scientists lose Morale for <sols(duration)> Sols
column3: Медыкі й навукоўцы страчваюць маральны настрой на <sols(duration)> Сола
column4: Lekarze i naukowcy tracą morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration)>).

column2: The Morale in our infirmaries and labs is a top priority.
column3: Маральны дух у нашых лазарэтах і лабараторыях з'яўляецца галоўным прыярытэтам.
column4: Morale w szpitalikach i laboratoriach jest najważniejsze.

column2: Geologists and Engineers lose Morale for <sols(duration)> Sols
column3: Геолагі й інжынэры страчваюць маральны настрой на <sols(duration)> Сола
column4: Geolodzy i technicy tracą morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration)>).

column2:
With so many devices found it is safe to assume that our rivals have stepped up their technological espionage game. 

Common sense dictates we close our Labs to sniff out all spy devices.
column3:
With so many devices found it is safe to assume that our rivals have stepped up their technological espionage game. 

Common sense dictates we close our Labs to sniff out all spy devices.

column2: Worried Scientists have found spying devices in not one, but three of our labs!
column3: Worried Scientists have found spying devices in not one, but three of our labs!
column4: Zmartwieni naukowcy znaleźli urządzenia szpiegowskie – i to nie w jednym, a w trzech z naszych laboratoriów!

column2: I've never been a fan of common sense. The labs continue to work while the cleaning takes place.
column3: I've never been a fan of common sense. The labs continue to work while the cleaning takes place.
column4: Zdrowy rozsądek nigdy do mnie nie przemawiał. Niech laboratoria działają dalej podczas oczyszczania z urządzeń szpiegowskich.

column2: output of research buildings set to <hinder>% for <sols(duration_work_and_clean)> Sols
column3: output of research buildings set to <hinder>% for <sols(duration_work_and_clean)> Sols
column4: wydajność budynków badawczych spada do <hinder>% na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration_work_and_clean)>).

column2: Close all labs down and rid them of these devices.
column3: Зачыніць all labs down and rid them of these devices.
column4: Zamknijcie wszystkie laboratoria w celu dokładnego „odpluskwienia”.
budynki badawcze zamknięte na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(duration__clean)>).

column2:
"Live music! Low-G dancing! Masked ball and romance! Come to the Colony of <DisplayName> and experience the greatest carnival beyond Earth! Let's make Mars the god of beauty!"

You look thoughtfully at the small crowd discussing the poster. People look excited.
column3:
"Live music! Low-G dancing! Masked ball and romance! Come to the Colony of <DisplayName> and experience the greatest carnival beyond Earth! Let's make Mars the god of beauty!"

You look thoughtfully at the small crowd discussing the poster. People look excited.

column2: Another Colony is planning a grand carnival, trying to attract our Tourists.
column3: Another Colony is planning a grand carnival, trying to attract our Tourists.
column4: Jedna z pozostałych kolonii planuje wielki karnawał, chcąc przyciągnąć naszych turystów.

column2: Move along, people! We have a planet to colonize.
column3: Move along, people! We have a planet to colonize.
column4: Do roboty, ludzie! Mamy tu planetę do skolonizowania.
tracisz <workers_loss>% graczy i <workers_loss>% hazardzistów, +25 do nastawienia.

column2: Nice carnival! It would be such a pity if something bad happened.
column3: Nice carnival! It would be such a pity if something bad happened.
column4: Śliczny karnawał! To byłaby wielka szkoda, gdyby w trakcie stało się coś złego.

column2: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
column3: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
column4: wszyscy koloniści tracą <morale_loss> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_loss_sols)>), –25 do nastawienia.

column2: Let's have a carnival of our own!
column3: Let's have a carnival of our own!

column2: Amateurs! We'll show them what a real Carnival looks like.
column3: Amateurs! We'll show them what a real Carnival looks like.
column4: Amatorzy! My im pokażemy, jak wygląda prawdziwy karnawał.

column2: gain <applicants_gain_high> Tourist Applicants and <applicants_gain_low> Sexy Applicants
column3: gain <applicants_gain_high> Tourist Applicants and <applicants_gain_low> Sexy Applicants

column2:
You find leaflets spread on the ground in one of your Domes. "Are you ambitious, intelligent, well educated?", says the leaflet. "Are you familiar with computer sciences, rocket science and two foreign languages? Do you have a doctor's degree? Are you a natural leader? If the answer is YES, then GET LOST! We're hiring unqualified workers!"

The colony of <DisplayName> offers generous payment and other benefits to any of your Colonists who would like to leave your colony and start working for them.
column3:
You find leaflets spread on the ground in one of your Domes. "Are you ambitious, intelligent, well educated?", says the leaflet. "Are you familiar with computer sciences, rocket science and two foreign languages? Do you have a doctor's degree? Are you a natural leader? If the answer is YES, then GET LOST! We're hiring unqualified workers!"

The colony of <DisplayName> offers generous payment and other benefits to any of your Colonists who would like to leave your colony and start working for them.

column2: Another Colony is trying to steal our workers.
column3: Another Colony is trying to steal our workers.
column4: Jedna z pozostałych kolonii próbuje podkradać nam pracowników.

column2: Everyone is free to pursue happiness for themselves and their family.
column3: Everyone is free to pursue happiness for themselves and their family.
column4: Każdy ma prawo dążyć do szczęścia własnego i swojej rodziny.
tracisz <workers_loss>% kolonistów bez specjalizacji, +25 do nastawienia.

column2: There is a special contractual clause that stops them from leaving.
column3: There is a special contractual clause that stops them from leaving.
column4: W umowie kolonisty jest specjalna klauzula zabraniająca zmiany kolonii.

column2: all Colonists without specialization lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
column3: all Colonists without specialization lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
column4: wszyscy koloniści bez specjalizacji tracą <morale_loss> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_loss_sols)>), –25 do nastawienia.

column2: Outbid the rivals. Money solves all problems.
column3: Outbid the rivals. Money solves all problems.
column4: Przelicytujcie rywali. Kasa jest dobra na wszystko.

column2: There is no honor among thieves.
column3: There is no honor among thieves.

column2:
A stolen Rover arrived from the infected colony of <DisplayName>. A colonist and a child in protective suits are holding hands in front of the airlock of one of your Domes. They look scared.

"Our colony is in chaos", they say. "Please let us in, or send help."
column3:
A stolen Rover arrived from the infected colony of <DisplayName>. A colonist and a child in protective suits are holding hands in front of the airlock of one of your Domes. They look scared.

"Our colony is in chaos", they say. "Please let us in, or send help."

column2: A virulent disease is spreading in another Colony.
column3: A virulent disease is spreading in another Colony.
column4: W innej kolonii wybuchła zabójcza epidemia.

column2: Send medical workers to help contain the outbreak.
column3: Send medical workers to help contain the outbreak.
column4: Wyślij lekarzy, by pomogli opanować epidemię.

column2: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
column3: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
column4: wszyscy koloniści tracą <morale_loss> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>), –25 do nastawienia.

column2: Accept some refugees under strict medical supervision.
column3: Accept some refugees under strict medical supervision.
column4: Przyjmij trochę uchodźców, ale otocz ich ścisłym nadzorem medycznym.

column2: gain <workers_gain_high> Colonists, 10% of all Colonists get Chronic Condition
column3: gain <workers_gain_high> Colonists, 10% of all Colonists get Chronic Condition
column4: otrzymujesz <workers_gain_high> kolonistów, 10% wszystkich kolonistów uzyskuje cechę „stan przewlekły”.

column2: Send Drones operated by our Medics.
column3: Send Drones operated by our Medics.
column4: Wyślij drony, którymi będą sterować nasi lekarze.

column2: lose 2 Drones and <workers_loss_low>% Medics, all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column3: lose 2 Drones and <workers_loss_low>% Medics, all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: tracisz 2 drony i <workers_loss_low>% lekarzy, wszyscy koloniści otrzymują <morale_gain> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: Send trained Officers to help restore order.
column3: Send trained Officers to help restore order.
column4: Wyślij przeszkolonych strażników, by pomogli przywrócić porządek.

column2:
Our Security Officers who were sent to help the infected colony have now returned home. They have passed all medical checks and it is confirmed they are not contaminated.

Only in their eyes and harsh faces you can see the horrors they have witnessed...
column3:
Our Security Officers who were sent to help the infected colony have now returned home. They have passed all medical checks and it is confirmed they are not contaminated.

Only in their eyes and harsh faces you can see the horrors they have witnessed...

column2:
You see the daily market stats and notice an alarming trend. The Colony of <DisplayName> has started a trade war with you, flooding the markets with Rare Metals, offered at a much lower price. 

Your trade agent from Earth is worried enough to make a direct call. The 14-minutes pause until each other's words are delivered gives you enough time to think on your marketing strategy.
column3:
You see the daily market stats and notice an alarming trend. The Colony of <DisplayName> has started a trade war with you, flooding the markets with Rare Metals, offered at a much lower price. 

Your trade agent from Earth is worried enough to make a direct call. The 14-minutes pause until each other's words are delivered gives you enough time to think on your marketing strategy.

column2: Another Colony is selling Rare Metals at a much lower price.
column3: Another Colony is selling Rare Metals at a much lower price.
column4: Jedna z pozostałych kolonii sprzedaje rzadkie metale za znacznie niższą cenę.

column2: They can't keep this up for long. We can wait.
column3: They can't keep this up for long. We can wait.
column4: Długo tak nie pociągną. Możemy zaczekać.

column2: Rare Metals price -25% for 20 Sols, +25 Standing

column3: Rare Metals price -25% and advanced resources price -20% for 20 Sols

column2: Isn't that cute! We can easily dump the prices even lower!
column3: Isn't that cute! We can easily dump the prices even lower!
column4: Czy to nie urocze! My możemy obniżyć cenę jeszcze bardziej!

column2: No problems! China's great market will buy anything we sell!
column3: No problems! China's great market will buy anything we sell!
column4: Żaden problem! Chiny i tak kupią wszystko, co wyprodukujemy!

column2:
Our strategy was super successful. Our rivals couldn't keep up and now we have the upper hand.

Rare Metals price +<price_increase_small>% for 10 Sols.
column3:
Our strategy was super successful. Our rivals couldn't keep up and now we have the upper hand.

Rare Metals price +<price_increase_small>% for 10 Sols.

column2: The markets have normalized and the prices of Rare Metals, Polymers, Machine Parts and Electronics are now as they were before the crisis.
column3: The markets have normalized and the prices of Rare Metals, Polymers, Machine Parts and Electronics are now as they were before the crisis.
column4: Rynki unormowały się i ceny rzadkich metali, polimerów, części maszyn i artykułów elektronicznych są znowu takie, jak przed kryzysem.

column2:
Starvation is a constant threat on this untamed planet. The colony of <DisplayName> was coping well for a while, but recent reports estimate they can't really handle their agriculture development. 

It's just a matter of time before things get out of hand.
column3:
Starvation is a constant threat on this untamed planet. The colony of <DisplayName> was coping well for a while, but recent reports estimate they can't really handle their agriculture development. 

It's just a matter of time before things get out of hand.

column2: Another Colony is having trouble growing their crops.
column3: Another Colony is having trouble growing their crops.
column4: Jedna z pozostałych kolonii ma problemy z uprawą żywności.

column2: Send some of our Botanists to help. Teach a man to fish...
column3: Send some of our Botanists to help. Teach a man to fish...
column4: Wyślijcie kilku naszych botaników, by im pomogli. Naucz człowieka łowić ryby...

column3: No one said that surviving Mars is easy. We can't spare these specialists.
column4: Nikt nie twierdził, że przetrwanie na Marsie jest łatwe. Nie stać nas na stratę specjalistów.

column4: wszyscy koloniści tracą <morale_loss> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>), –25 do nastawienia.

column2: Invite over some of them. We can feed everyone.
column3: Invite over some of them. We can feed everyone.
column4: Zaproście część z nich do nas. Wykarmimy wszystkich.

column4: Wyślijcie trochę naszych ludzi, aby nauczyli ich właściwego podejścia do roślin.

column3: lose <workers_loss>% Vegans, all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
column4: tracisz <workers_loss>% wegan, wszyscy koloniści otrzymują <morale_gain> morale na pewną liczbę soli (<sols(morale_sols)>).

column2: Feed the hungry and help those in trouble.
column3: Feed the hungry and help those in trouble.
column4: Nakarmcie głodnych i pomóżcie tym, którzy są w potrzebie.

column2:
"Come to watch the MarsCraft Tournament LIVE! The most immersive gaming experience in the Solar system awaits you! Sponsored by the colony of <DisplayName>."

This ad runs on some of the most renowned TV channels on Earth. Your secretary is in shock that there are people willing to travel to Mars in order to live watch some stupid game.
column3:
"Come to watch the MarsCraft Tournament LIVE! The most immersive gaming experience in the Solar system awaits you! Sponsored by the colony of <DisplayName>."

This ad runs on some of the most renowned TV channels on Earth. Your secretary is in shock that there are people willing to travel to Mars in order to live watch some stupid game.

column2: Surviving Mars is not a game!
column3: Surviving Mars is not a game!
column4: Przetrwanie na Marsie to nie gra!
tracisz <workers_loss>% kolonistów z zamiłowaniem do gier, +25 do nastawienia.

column3: We can make our own gaming tournament!

column3: We'll gather a team to participate and try to take the grand reward!
column4: Zbierzemy drużynę i wygramy główną nagrodę!

GG.

column3: We’ll make a Game Design Tournament instead!
column4: Urządzimy zamiast tego Turniej Pisania Gier!

column3: gain <workers_gain> Enthusiast Gamer Colonists, all Gamers gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols

column2: Let's see if they can compete with our low-G giant fighting robots competition!
column3: Let's see if they can compete with our low-G giant fighting robots competition!
column4: Zobaczymy, czy będą w stanie konkurować z naszym turniejem wielkich robotów walczących w obniżonej grawitacji!

column2: lose 3 Drones, gain <applicants_gain_high> Tourist and <applicants_gain_low> Engineer Enthusiast Applicants
column3: lose 3 Drones, gain <applicants_gain_high> Tourist and <applicants_gain_low> Engineer Enthusiast Applicants

column2:
"Dear Dr. Oddlove", says an email, redirected to you by a loyal Scientist. "We have built this amazing research facility of the future! The only thing it needs is the expertise of a renowned academic like you. We cordially invite you to join us and...."

Agents from the colony of <DisplayName> have contacted some of our leading scientists with offers to join them or at least sell out our research secrets.
column3:
"Dear Dr. Oddlove", says an email, redirected to you by a loyal Scientist. "We have built this amazing research facility of the future! The only thing it needs is the expertise of a renowned academic like you. We cordially invite you to join us and...."

Agents from the colony of <DisplayName> have contacted some of our leading scientists with offers to join them or at least sell out our research secrets.

column2: Another Colony is trying to steal our Scientists.
column3: Another Colony is trying to steal our Scientists.
column4: Jedna z pozostałych kolonii próbuje wykraść naszych naukowców.

column2: Okay, but there is a contractual penalty for failure to fulfill obligations.
column3: Okay, but there is a contractual penalty for failure to fulfill obligations.
column4: Dobrze, ale umowa kolonisty przewiduje kary finansowe za niespełnienie obowiązków.

column2: See the small print on this contract? They can't leave.
column3: See the small print on this contract? They can't leave.
column4: Widzicie ten akapit drobnym druczkiem? Oni nie mogą wyjechać.

column2: all Scientists lose <morale_loss> Morale for 10 Sols, -25 Standing
column3: all Scientists lose <morale_loss> Morale for 10 Sols, -25 Standing
column4: wszyscy naukowcy tracą <morale_loss> morale na 10 soli, –25 do nastawienia.

column2: Okay, but they must send back secret reports of their work. Mutually assured deception!
column3: Okay, but they must send back secret reports of their work. Mutually assured deception!
column4: Dobrze, ale muszą przesłać z powrotem tajne raporty o własnych pracach. Spróbujmy oszukać oszustów!

column2: lose <workers_bigloss>% Scientists, Research boost by 2% in a random field
column3: lose <workers_bigloss>% Scientists, Research boost by 2% in a random field
column4: tracisz <workers_bigloss>% naukowców, badania naukowe w wybranej losowo dziedzinie zostają przyspieszone o 2%.

column3: Send some of our Scientists as double agents.

column2: Our Officers should be able to pass as Scientists and steal their secrets.
column3: Our Officers should be able to pass as Scientists and steal their secrets.
column4: Nasi strażnicy pewnie będą w stanie udawać naukowców i wykraść tajemnice rywala.
