column3: lose <workers_loss>% Security Officers, Research boost by 3% in a random field
column4: tracisz <workers_loss>% funkcjonariuszy bezpieczeństwa, badania naukowe w wybranej losowo dziedzinie zostają przyspieszone o 3%.

column2:
This person from the colony of <DisplayName> claims to be a Messiah and a miracle-worker, gathering an increasing number of followers with each Dome visited.

Now this person decided to come to our colony and “convert it to the true faith”. The prophet wants your colonists to repent and change their wicked ways.
column3:
This person from the colony of <DisplayName> claims to be a Messiah and a miracle-worker, gathering an increasing number of followers with each Dome visited.

Now this person decided to come to our colony and “convert it to the true faith”. The prophet wants your colonists to repent and change their wicked ways.

column2: There is a religious prophet trying to convert our colonists to a new cult.
column3: There is a religious prophet trying to convert our colonists to a new cult.
column4: Pojawił się prorok religijny, który próbuje nawracać naszych kolonistów na nową wiarę.

column2: Our colony respects the freedom of religious views.
column3: Our colony respects the freedom of religious views.
column4: Nasza kolonia wyznaje swobodę przekonań religijnych.

column2: gain a Guru and <apostles_count> Religious Renegade Colonists, +25 Standing
column3: gain a Guru and <apostles_count> Religious Renegade Colonists, +25 Standing
column4: otrzymujesz jednego guru i <apostles_count> religijnych kolonistów-renegatów, +25 do nastawienia.

column2: You shall not pass! Access denied.
column3: You shall not pass! Access denied.
column4: Nie przejdziesz! Czarny ogień... Eee, tego, odmawiam wstępu.

column2: We will accept their teachings as our official religion.
column3: We will accept their teachings as our official religion.
column4: Przyjmiemy nauki mesjasza jako oficjalną religię naszej kolonii.

column2: <renegades_gain>% of all Religious become Renegades, gain a Guru and <apostles_count> Religious Colonists
column3: <renegades_gain>% of all Religious become Renegades, gain a Guru and <apostles_count> Religious Colonists
column4: <renegades_gain>% wszystkich religijnych kolonistów zostaje renegatami, otrzymujesz jednego guru i <apostles_count> religijnych kolonistów.
Nikt nie spodziewa się marsjańskiej inkwizycji!

column2: gain a Saint and two Religious Colonists
column3: gain a Saint and two Religious Colonists
column4: otrzymujesz jedną osobę z cechą „świętość” i dwóch religijnych kolonistów.

column2:
Communications with the rocket are purely on the machine level as attempts to establish contact with any potential crew have so far gone unanswered. As no one is making claim of ownership over the rocket and there are no visible insignia to identify its origin, we are in position to do as we wish.

Just a word of caution, in these competitive times, trickery and acts of sabotage are not above anyone - even here on Mars.
column3:
Сувязь з ракетай ажыццяўляецца выключна на машынным узроўні, паколькі спробы ўсталяваць кантакт з любым патэнцыйным экіпажам пакуль застаюцца без адказу. І паколькі ніхто не прэтэндуе на ўласнасьць ракеты, і няма бачных знакаў адрозьненьня, якія б ідэнтыфікавалі яе паходжаньне, мы мажом рабіць тое, што пажадаем.

Толькі малая увага, у гэты час конкурэнцыйны, хітрасьць ды сабатаж звычайнае з'ява, нават тут, на Марсе.

column2: A mystery Rocket has entered orbit and is signaling readiness to make touchdown.
column3: Таямнічая ракета выйшла на арбіту й сігналізуе аб гатоўнасьці да прызямленьня.
column4: Na orbitę Marsa weszła jakaś tajemnicza rakieta, która sygnalizuje gotowość do lądowania.

column2: There may be helpless crew members onboard. Land the rocket immediately!
column3: Там, на борце, магчыма знаходзяцца бездапаможныя члены экіпажу!
column4: Na pokładzie może być załoga potrzebująca pomocy. Niech lądują natychmiast!

column2: Observe the Rocket for a Sol or two and land it afterwards.
column3: Паназірайце за ракетай адзін-два Сола, пасля пасадзіце яе.
column4: Obserwujcie tę rakietę przez sola lub dwa, a potem niech ląduje.

column2: Remember Homer’s Iliad? We are not falling for this old trick. Ignore it.
column3: Памятаеце Іліяду Гамера? Мы ня трапім на гэты стары трук. Ігнаруйце гэта.
column4: Pamiętacie Iliadę Homera? Nie damy się zrobić, nomen omen, w konia. Zignorować.

column2:
The Rocket had ten passengers on board - all pronounced dead upon examination. 

Something had damaged the Rocket just as it entered Mars's orbit and before the last of them lost consciousness from oxygen loss, they managed to send a distress call - a call we sadly ignored.

<effect>All Colonists lose Morale.
column3:
На борце ракеты было дзесяць пасажыраў, усе яны загінулі пры аглядзе.

Нешта пашкодзіла Ракету, калі яна ўвайшла на арбіту Марсу, й перад тым, як апошні з іх страціў прытомнасьць ад нястачы тлёну, яны паспелі паслаць сігнал бедства - выклік, які мы, на жаль, праігнаравалі.

<effect>Усе каляністы страчваюць маральны дух.

column2: You finally land the mystery Rocket only to reveal a gruesome scene.
column3: Нарэшце вы прызямлілі таямнічую ракету толькі для таго
column4: W końcu zezwalasz tajemniczej rakiecie na lądowanie, ale po wejściu na jej pokład widzisz ponury obraz.

column2: I don't know what to say...

The Rocket is unmanned. There are plenty of food supplies onboard, all of which seem to sport an odd mutation.

Thorough examination of the supplies reveal a potent disease present, most probably meant to ruin our crops. Had we landed the Rocket sooner, we probably wouldn't have detected the corruption in time.

Nothing to identify the perpetrators of what was obviously a sabotage attempt can be found inside the Rocket.
column3:
Ракета беспілотная. На борце шмат харчовых запасаў, і ўсе яны маюць дзіўную мутацыю.

Дбайная праверка запасаў выявіла прысутнасьць моцнай хваробы, якая, хутчэй за ўсё, павінна сапсаваць наш ураджай. Калі б мы прызямлілі ракету раней, мы б, напэўна, своечасова ня выявілі псаваньне.

Нічога, што дазваляе ідэнтыфікаваць выканаўцаў відавочнай спробы сабатажу, унутры ракеты ня знойдзена.

column2: You land the mystery Rocket and send an investigation team.
column3: Вы прызямляеце таямнічую ракету й адпраўляеце следчую групу.
column4: Nakazujesz tajemniczej rakiecie lądowanie i wysyłasz zespół dochodzeniowy.

column2: Guess we dodged a bullet there.
column4: O mały włos, a byśmy oberwali.

column2:
As they enter the rocket they find ten passengers in helpless condition but still alive. You quickly organize a rescue effort and bring the colonists to your colony for care.

Later you learn that they were meant to reach a rival colony but had suffered technical difficulties during the trip. 

Out of gratitude the rescued passengers have decided to stay with us.
column3:
Уваходзячы ў ракету, яны знаходзяць дзесяць пасажыраў у бездапаможным стане, але ўсё яшчэ жывых. Вы хутка арганізуеце выратавальную апэрацыю й даставіце каляністаў у сваю калёнію да агляду.

Пазьней вы высьвятляяце, што яны павінны былі дабрацца да калёніі супраціўніку, але падчас палёту сутыкнуліся з тэхнічнымі складанасьцямі.

З падзякі выратаваныя пасажыры вырашылі застацца з намі.

column2: Immediately after landing the mystery Rocket you send a team to investigate.
column3: Адразу пасля пасадкі таямнічай ракеты вы адпраўляеце каманду да расьсьледваньня.
column4: Natychmiast po lądowaniu tajemniczej rakiety wysyłasz zespół dochodzeniowy.

column2: The more the merrier! Welcome to your new home!
column3: Больш - лепш! Вітаем вас у вашым новым доме!
column4: Im więcej, tym lepiej! Witajcie w nowym domu!

column2:
That's why everyone was so surprised to see blight affecting the crops.  The damage is extensive and will seriously lower performance of our food producing facilities until removed entirely.

After many hours of researching the nature of the mysterious plant disease its artificial nature became evident. This was nothing less than an act of sabotage against our colony.

Sadly, no clues pinpointing whom to put the blame on were found. We suspect some connection with the mysterious Rocket.

<effect>All Farms and Hydroponic Farms have lowered performance for <sols(duration)> Sols.
column3:
Вось чаму ўсе былі так здзіўлены, забачыўшы пашкоджаньне пасеваў. Шкода значная й сур'ёзна зьнізіць прадукцыйнасьць нашых прадпрыемстваў па вытворчасьці прадуктаў харчаваньня, пакуль яна ня будзе ліквідавана цалкам.

Пасля шматгадзіннага дасьледаваньня прыроды таямнічай хваробы расьлін стала відавочная яе штучная прырода. Гэта была няйначай як сабатаж супраць нашай калёніі.

На жаль, ніякіх падказак, на каго вінаваціць, ня знойдзена. Мы падазраем нейкую сувязь з таямнічай ракетай.

<effect>All Farms and Hydroponic Farms have lowered performance for <sols(duration)> Sols.

column2: Food is grown in a very strictly controlled environment on Mars.
column3: Food is grown in a very strictly controlled environment on Mars.
column4: Na Marsie żywność jest uprawiana w ściśle kontrolowanych warunkach.

column2: Landing the Rocket was a hasty decision that we will regret for a while.
column3: Landing the Rocket was a hasty decision that we will regret for a while.
column4: Zezwolenie na lądowanie tajemniczej rakiety było pospieszną decyzją, której pożałujemy.

column2: Since nobody has contacted us and the Rocket has no insignia and all we will take advantage of this fortunate occurrence.
column3: Так як ніхто не звязваўся з намі
column4: Skoro nikt nie zgłasza się jako właściciel rakiety i brak na niej oznakowania wskazującego pochodzenie, możemy skorzystać z tej pomyślnej okazji.

column2: The mystery Rocket has landed, and it was filled with precious resources.
column3: Таямнічая Ракета прызямлілася, і яна была напоўнена каштоўнымі рэсурсамі.
column4: Tajemnicza rakieta wylądowała. Była pełna cennych zasobów.

column2:
There are lots of food supplies inside, prepared and packaged for use on some Martian colony.

Experts examined the food and concluded everything to be in order. 

With nobody contacting us with claims over the rocket we will keep the supplies.
column3:
There are lots of food supplies inside, prepared and packaged for use on some Martian colony.

Experts examined the food and concluded everything to be in order. 

With nobody contacting us with claims over the rocket we will keep the supplies.

column2: You guide the Rocket's landing and send cautious investigators.
column3: You guide the Rocket's landing and send cautious investigators.
column4: Kierujesz lądowaniem rakiety, a potem wysyłasz ostrożnych zwiadowców.

column2: Lady luck has smiled on us today.
column3: Lady luck has smiled on us today.
column4: Bogini dobrego trafu się dziś do nas uśmiechnęła.

column2:
Looking over the basic parameters of the mission, which have been made public, you quickly come to the conclusion that their plans have significant flaws. 

From a position of experience you have a chance to influence how this new colony will fare.
column3:
Looking over the basic parameters of the mission, which have been made public, you quickly come to the conclusion that their plans have significant flaws. 

From a position of experience you have a chance to influence how this new colony will fare.

column2: Somewhat late into the space race, a new Mars mission has been announced out of the blue.
column3: Somewhat late into the space race, a new Mars mission has been announced out of the blue.
column4: Ni stąd, ni zowąd ogłoszono rozpoczęcie nowej misji marsjańskiej. Niezłe opóźnienie na starcie.

column2: They have no chance. Send a team of experts to help.
column3: They have no chance. Send a team of experts to help.
column4: Oni nie mają szans. Wyślijcie zespół ekspertów, aby im pomogli.

column2: send 10 experienced colonists to help the new colony out.
column3: send 10 experienced colonists to help the new colony out.
column4: wyślij 10 doświadczonych kolonistów, aby pomagali w budowie nowej kolonii.

column2: Wish them luck. They are going to need it.
column3: Wish them luck. They are going to need it.
column4: Życzmy im szczęścia. Przyda im się.

column2: the new colony fails to establish a solid foothold on Mars.
column3: the new colony fails to establish a solid foothold on Mars.
column4: nowa kolonia nie zdołała utworzyć stabilnego przyczółka na Marsie.

column2:
The colony of <DisplayName> has not forgotten the favor and today they send us gifts as a sign of gratitude.

Looking back, had we not sent the experienced colonists, which now occupy vital positions within their colony, they would have most certainly perished.
column3:
The colony of <DisplayName> has not forgotten the favor and today they send us gifts as a sign of gratitude.

Looking back, had we not sent the experienced colonists, which now occupy vital positions within their colony, they would have most certainly perished.

column2: Sometime ago, we helped a fledgling colony establish a foothold on Mars.
column3: Sometime ago, we helped a fledgling colony establish a foothold on Mars.
column4: Jakiś czas temu pomogliśmy nowej kolonii w zadomowieniu się na Marsie.

column2: This brings a tear to the eye.
column3: This brings a tear to the eye.

column2: we received several Supply Pods with gifts
column3: we received several Supply Pods with gifts

column2:
Spam mail being a rare curiosity on Mars (hoorah for the new world order) you suddenly get quite nervous but after reading through the first couple of mails you begin to calm down.

Some Scientists believe they are being followed wherever they go. They believe they will get kidnapped by rival agents because of the sensitive research they are working on. The scientists would like to boost security inside the domes as they feel the shadow actors will make their move within the next day or two.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] The large volume of complaints suggest there is a real cause for concern. </if>

<goal>If you accept, you must build <target> Security Stations within <sols(timeframe)> Sols.
column3:
Spam mail being a rare curiosity on Mars (hoorah for the new world order) you suddenly get quite nervous but after reading through the first couple of mails you begin to calm down.

Some Scientists believe they are being followed wherever they go. They believe they will get kidnapped by rival agents because of the sensitive research they are working on. The scientists would like to boost security inside the domes as they feel the shadow actors will make their move within the next day or two.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] The large volume of complaints suggest there is a real cause for concern. </if>

<goal>If you accept, you must build <target> Security Stations within <sols(timeframe)> Sols.

column2: Hard at work in your office, you decide to check your mail only to see that it has suddenly accumulated 200 unread messages.
column3: Hard at work in your office, you decide to check your mail only to see that it has suddenly accumulated 200 unread messages.
column4: Po długiej i ciężkiej pracy w swoim biurze robisz sobie przerwę na sprawdzenie poczty. Ze zdumieniem patrzysz na 200 nieprzeczytanych wiadomości.

column2: Our Scientists are overworked. Dismiss the issue.
column3: Our Scientists are overworked. Dismiss the issue.
column4: Nasi naukowcy są przepracowani. Zignorujmy ten problem.

column2: Better be safe than sorry. We should tighten up security.
column3: Better be safe than sorry. We should tighten up security.
column4: Lepiej dmuchać na zimne. Zaostrzymy środki bezpieczeństwa.

column2: The large volume of complaints suggests there is a real cause for concern.
column3: The large volume of complaints suggests there is a real cause for concern.
column4: Duża liczba skarg sugeruje, że istnieje rzeczywisty powód do zmartwień.

column2:
The news came today - <scientists> of our Scientists didn't show up for work at their respective shifts.

When their colleagues tried to contact them they didn't answer and their homes were vacant. No trace of a struggle or any shred of reason behind their disappearance can be found.

You sit at your desk, staring blankly at the wall. If only you had believed them...
column3:
The news came today - <scientists> of our Scientists didn't show up for work at their respective shifts.

When their colleagues tried to contact them they didn't answer and their homes were vacant. No trace of a struggle or any shred of reason behind their disappearance can be found.

You sit at your desk, staring blankly at the wall. If only you had believed them...

column2: Was there real reason for concern or where they just paranoid? That you may never know.
column3: Was there real reason for concern or where they just paranoid? That you may never know.
column4: Czy istniał jakiś rzeczywisty powód do zmartwień, czy to była tylko ich paranoja? Możemy nigdy nie poznać prawdy.

column2: Two whole Sols have passed and all our Scientists are safe and sound.
column3: Two whole Sols have passed and all our Scientists are safe and sound.
column4: Minęły już dwa całe sole i wszyscy nasi naukowcy są bezpieczni.

column2: At least things are back to as normal as they could be up here.
column3: At least things are back to as normal as they could be up here.
column4: Przynajmniej sytuacja wróciła do normy, jeśli to w ogóle tu możliwe.

column2:
Yet, our scientists are still here. Acting embarrassed, they say they no longer feel threatened. Maybe whoever was planning the abduction has changed their mind?

We may never know.
column3:
Yet, our scientists are still here. Acting embarrassed, they say they no longer feel threatened. Maybe whoever was planning the abduction has changed their mind?

We may never know.

column2: The two Sol window the scientists were worried about has passed and our security upgrade measures are incomplete.
column3: The two Сол window the scientists were worried about has passed and our security upgrade measures are incomplete.
column4: Dwudniowy okres, o który martwili się twoi naukowcy, przeminął, a zwiększenie poziomu bezpieczeństwa nie zostało ukończone.

column2:
A Research Lab has been raided by unknown forces, that left a trail of dead colonists behind them. Surveillance footage goes black right at the time of the act and there are virtually no traces left behind. How they entered, or left the Dome remains a complete and utter mystery.

<effect><deathcount> Colonists were killed by rival spies.
column3:
A Дасьледчая лабараторыя has been raided by unknown forces, that left a trail of dead colonists behind them. Surveillance footage goes black right at the time of the act and there are virtually no traces left behind. How they entered, or left the Dome remains a complete and utter mystery.

<effect><deathcount> Colonists were killed by rival spies.

column2: First you heard the alarms, then you saw the commotion. Then you received the call.
column3: First you heard the alarms, then you saw the commotion. Then you received the call.
column4: Najpierw słyszysz sygnały alarmowe, a później odgłosy zamieszania. Potem ktoś nawiązuje połączenie.

column2: Raise the issue with Earth. There's nothing more we can do.
column3: Raise the issue with Earth. There's nothing more we can do.
column4: Zasygnalizujmy ten problem na Ziemi. Nic więcej nie możemy zrobić.

column2: I will give out a speech blaming all other Colonies to appease the Colonists.
column3: I will give out a speech blaming all other Colonies to appease the Colonists.
column4: Aby uspokoić naszych kolonistów, wygłoszę przemówienie obwiniające wszystkie inne kolonie.
nastawienie innych kolonii do ciebie pogarsza się.

column2:
While <DisplayName> was not employed by a rival colony, they did send all info stolen to a third party intelligence gathering firm on Earth, which in turn most probably sold the information to anyone interested.

A legal process on Earth will likely win us reparations from rivals who took advantage of the firm's services, but with <DisplayName> being a respected and senior colonist of ours, this can have devastating effects on our colony's morale.
column3:
While <DisplayName> was not employed by a rival colony, they did send all info stolen to a third party intelligence gathering firm on Earth, which in turn most probably sold the information to anyone interested.

A legal process on Earth will likely win us reparations from rivals who took advantage of the firm's services, but with <DisplayName> being a respected and senior colonist of ours, this can have devastating effects on our colony's morale.

column2: Today we learned that an upstanding member of our community has been a spy since the day they arrived on Mars.
column3: Today we learned that an upstanding member of our community has been a spy since the day they arrived on Mars.
column4: Dowiedzieliśmy się dzisiaj, że pewien wybitny członek naszej społeczności od dnia przybycia na Marsa był obcym szpiegiem.

column2: Apprehend the spy and send them to court.
column3: Apprehend the spy and send them to court.
column4: Zatrzymać szpiega i pod sąd z nim.

column2: receive <funding(reperations)>, <standing> Standing with all rivals, <morale penalty> Morale for all Colonists
column3: receive <funding(reperations)>, <standing> Standing with all rivals, <morale penalty> Morale for all Colonists
column4: otrzymujesz <funding(reperations)>, <standing> do nastawienia u wszystkich rywali, <morale penalty> do morale wszystkich kolonistów

column2: Limit all access they have to sensitive material and let them live out their days peacefully.
column3: Limit all access they have to sensitive material and let them live out their days peacefully.
column4: Ogranicz wszelki dostęp do wrażliwych danych, a szpieg niech w spokoju dożyje końca swych dni.

column2:
The leaders of the other colonies have each contacted us with a request to grant them partial access to the Space Elevator.  

Allowing them to use it will increase our influence on Mars while allowing other colonies to advance their own economies. 

If we deny their request, it could become a point of friction.
column3:
The leaders of the other colonies have each contacted us with a request to grant them partial access to the Касьмічны ліфт.  

Allowing them to use it will increase our influence on Mars while allowing other colonies to advance their own economies. 

If we deny their request, it could become a point of friction.

column2: Even though there are other colonies on Mars, our Space Elevator remains unique.
column3: Even though there are other colonies on Mars, our Касьмічны ліфт remains unique.
column4: Na Marsie jest wiele kolonii, ale nasza winda kosmiczna pozostaje jedyna.

column2: Of course, let our brothers and sisters on Mars benefit from our success.
column3: Of course, let our brothers and sisters on Mars benefit from our success.
column4: Oczywiście, niech nasi bracia i siostry na Marsie skorzystają co nieco na naszym sukcesie.

column2: gain standing with other colonies, boost their economy
column3: gain standing with other colonies, boost their economy
column4: Uzyskujesz większy prestiż w innych koloniach, ich gospodarka rozwija się.

column2: Fair enough. But business is business. Charge ‘em.
column3: Fair enough. But business is business. Charge ‘em.
column4: Dobrze. Ale interes to interes. Chcą korzystać, niech płacą.
otrzymujesz <funding(bonus_funding)>, gospodarka innych kolonii rozwija się.

column2: The Space Elevator is our achievement. Request denied!
column3: The Касьмічны ліфт is our achievement. Request denied!
column4: Winda kosmiczna to nasze osiągnięcie. Odmawiam!
Nastawienie innych kolonii do ciebie pogarsza się.

column2:
This presents us with a golden opportunity to infiltrate the colony of <DisplayName> and perform both espionage and sabotage tasks. 

With the proper training, Trish Sanders can do both, however, we have to act fast.
column3:
This presents us with a golden opportunity to infiltrate the colony of <DisplayName> and perform both espionage and sabotage tasks. 

With the proper training, Trish Sanders can do both, however, we have to act fast.

column2: An applicant slated to come to our colony has been listed as a desired applicant by a Rival Colony as well, obviously by mistake.
column3: Кандыдат, які павінен быў прыехаць да нас, быў унесены ў сьпіс пажаданых суіскальнікаў калёніі-суперніка, відавочна памылкова.
column4: Pewien ochotnik, który miał przybyć do naszej kolonii, znalazł się też na liście pożądanych ochotników jednej z rywalizujących kolonii, najwyraźniej przez pomyłkę.

column2: Send Sanders to training camp. We can't miss this opportunity.
column3: Адправіць Сандэрса ў трэніровачны лагер. Мы ня можам прапусьціць гэтую магчымасьць.
column4: Wyślijcie Sanders do obozu szkoleniowego. Nie możemy przegapić takiej okazji.

column2: After a hasty training and a trip to Mars, our agent has successfully infiltrated our rivals. Commence operation "Spy Games".
column3: After a hasty training and a trip to Mars, our agent has successfully infiltrated our rivals. Commence operation "Spy Games".
column4: Po pośpiesznym przeszkoleniu i podróży na Marsa naszej agentce udało się przeniknąć do rywalizującej kolonii. Rozpocząć operację „Gra szpiegów”.

column2:
Agent Sanders has established a communications channel with us. Initial plans are to steal any technology deemed of value.

We are told to expect results within a few Sols.
column3:
Agent Sanders has established a communications channel with us. Initial plans are to steal any technology deemed of value.

We are told to expect results within a few Sols.

column2: I don't want to antagonize our already strained relationship. Pass.
column3: Я ня хачу зьнішчаць нашы й бяз таго напружаныя адносіны.
column4: Nie chcę dodatkowo zaogniać naszych i tak już napiętych stosunków. Odpuszczamy.

column2: We have no idea of Trish Sander's fate. We expect that these circumstances will sour the diplomatic relations with our rivals.
column3: We have no idea of Trish Sander's fate. We expect that these circumstances will sour the diplomatic relations with our rivals.
column4: Nie mamy pojęcia o losie Trish Sanders. Możemy się spodziewać, że ta historia pogorszy nasze stosunki dyplomatyczne z rywalem.

column2:
All Factories broke down at once. So did our energy producers.

This looks like an act of purposeful sabotage, but there is no assailant to blame, just vague traces of malicious activity here and there.
 
Commander, there is one other thing. Agent Sanders is nowhere to be found. Her room has been swept clean, her account emptied. 

<effect>All Factories and Power Producers have malfunctioned.
column3:
All Factories broke down at once. So did our energy producers.

This looks like an act of purposeful sabotage, but there is no assailant to blame, just vague traces of malicious activity here and there.
 
Commander, there is one other thing. Agent Sanders is nowhere to be found. Her room has been swept clean, her account emptied. 

<effect>All Factories and Power Producers have malfunctioned.

column2: Commander, the entire base is an state of emergency - just within a few minutes several disastrous events crippled our colony.
column3: Commander, the entire base is an state of emergency - just within a few minutes several disastrous events crippled our colony.
column4: Dowódco, w całej bazie ogłoszono alarm – w ciągu zaledwie kilku minut kilka katastrofalnych wypadków sparaliżowało naszą kolonię.

column2: Trish Sanders, you played us all.
column3: Трыш Сандэрс, ты разыгралаў нас усіх.

column2:
A special Shuttle brought in by our sponsor picked up agent Sanders and she is now safely en route to our colony.

<effect>Agent Sanders becomes a colonist.
column3:
A special Shuttle brought in by our sponsor picked up agent Sanders and she is now safely en route to our colony.

<effect>Agent Sanders becomes a colonist.

column2: Our agent has reached the designated escape area and activated the beacon.
column3: Our agent has reached the designated escape area and activated the beacon.
column4: Nasza agentka dotarła do wyznaczonego punktu ewakuacyjnego i uruchomiła sygnalizator.

column2: Welcome to your new home, agent Sanders. You are a hero!
column3: Welcome to your new home, agent Sanders. You are a hero!
column4: Witaj w nowym domu, agentko Sanders. Jesteś prawdziwą bohaterką!

column2:
Agent Trish Sanders evaluates she is well in the clear and hasn't attracted any suspicion.

Meanwhile, a new opportunity directly presented itself - two large cargo deliveries are planned to happen the next week, with a 3 Sol gap between them.

Agent Sanders has gained access to their landing guidance software and can reroute one of the deliveries and make it look like a malfunction. Some preparation is required. The hastier the operation - the bigger the risk.

<effect>You have discovered a new tech.
column3:
Agent Trish Sanders evaluates she is well in the clear and hasn't attracted any suspicion.

Meanwhile, a new opportunity directly presented itself - two large cargo deliveries are planned to happen the next week, with a 3 Сол gap between them.

Agent Sanders has gained access to their landing guidance software and can reroute one of the deliveries and make it look like a malfunction. Some preparation is required. The hastier the operation - the bigger the risk.

<effect>You have discovered a new tech.

column2: Operation Spy Games has delivered its first results - a huge data package revealing a new tech to us has been sent by our agent.
column3: Operation Spy Games has delivered its first results - a huge data package revealing a new tech to us has been sent by our agent.
column4: Operacja „Gra szpiegów” dała pierwsze wyniki – nasza agentka przesłała wielki pakiet danych opisujących pewną nową technologię.

column2: Act fast and secure the first cargo shipment.
column3: Act fast and secure the first cargo shipment.
column4: Działaj szybko i przejmij pierwszą dostawę.

column2: Take your time and make sure everything is perfect. Secure the second shipment.
column3: Take your time and make sure everything is perfect. Secure the second shipment.
column4: Nie spiesz się i zadbaj o jak najlepsze przygotowanie. Przejmij drugą dostawę.

column2: Getting caught will be disastrous. Extract the agent. Mission complete!
column3: Getting caught will be disastrous. Extract the agent. Mission complete!
column4: Gdyby nasza agentka została przyłapana, to byłaby katastrofa. Ewakuować ją. Misja wykonana!

column2: terminate Spy Games and bring Trish Sanders back
column3: terminate Spy Games and bring Trish Sanders back
column4: kończysz „Grę szpiegów” i sprowadzasz Trish Sanders z powrotem.

column2:
This brazen act of theft has raised several flags, but our agent assesses she is still in the clear and in a good position to do real harm now.

With enough information and network access, agent Sanders can perform contained or massive sabotage operations around <DisplayName>'s colony.

Agent Sanders awaits further orders.
column3:
This brazen act of theft has raised several flags, but our agent assesses she is still in the clear and in a good position to do real harm now.

With enough information and network access, agent Sanders can perform contained or massive sabotage operations around <DisplayName>'s colony.

Agent Sanders awaits further orders.

column2: Spy Games reaps more rewards. The Supply Pods are above our colony and fully under our control.
column3: Spy Games reaps more rewards. The Supply Pods are above our colony and fully under our control.
column4: „Gra szpiegów” przynosi kolejne owoce. Zasobniki trafiają do naszej kolonii i są pod naszą kontrolą.

column2: Make sure to do as much damage as possible. Cripple them!
column3: Make sure to do as much damage as possible. Cripple them!
column4: Zadbaj o to, by wyrządzić jak największe szkody. Niech mają za swoje!
to działanie może zakończyć się niepowodzeniem.

column2: Make the sabotage targeted and contained. Don't take any unnecessary risks!
column3: Make the sabotage targeted and contained. Don't take any unnecessary risks!
column4: Przeprowadź ograniczony, dokładnie ukierunkowany sabotaż. Nie ryzykuj niepotrzebnie!

column2: smaller chance of failure, less damage done
column3: smaller chance of failure, less damage done

column2: Our agent has done enough. Extract her!
column3: Our agent has done enough. Extract her!
column4: Nasza agentka osiągnęła już dosyć. Ewakuować!

column2: terminate Spy Games and bring Trish Sanders back
column3: terminate Spy Games and bring Trish Sanders back
column4: kończysz „Grę szpiegów” i sprowadzasz Trish Sanders z powrotem.

column2:
By sabotaging factories, the electrical grid and also pipe ways all at once, our agent has seriously hindered <DisplayName>'s progress.

Their entire colony is on heightened security alert and any further operations carry considerable risks.

This being said, agent Sanders informs us of a very valuable breakthrough technology that <DisplayName> recently researched. Better yet, the technology is within our grasp.
column3:
By sabotaging factories, the electrical grid and also pipe ways all at once, our agent has seriously hindered <DisplayName>'s progress.

Their entire colony is on heightened security alert and any further operations carry considerable risks.

This being said, agent Sanders informs us of a very valuable breakthrough technology that <DisplayName> recently researched. Better yet, the technology is within our grasp.

column2: Operation Spy Games continues to prove itself as an incredibly potent program.
column3: Operation Spy Games continues to prove itself as an incredibly potent program.
column4: Operacja „Gra szpiegów” okazuje się coraz potężniejszą bronią w rywalizacji między koloniami.

column2: We came this far, we will go just a bit further. Steal the breakthrough!
column3: We came this far, we will go just a bit further. Steal the breakthrough!
column4: Doszliśmy aż dotąd, możemy posunąć się jeszcze o krok. Wykradnij przełomową technologię!
to działanie może zakończyć się niepowodzeniem.

column2: We should quit while we're ahead. Extract agent Sanders.
column3: We should quit while we're ahead. Extract agent Sanders.
column4: Powinniśmy zrezygnować, dopóki jesteśmy na plusie. Ewakuować agentkę Sanders.

column2: terminate Spy Games program and bring Trish Sanders back
column3: terminate Spy Games program and bring Trish Sanders back
column4: kończysz „Grę szpiegów” i sprowadzasz Trish Sanders z powrotem.

column2:
We have stolen a priceless technology and have extracted agent Sanders. She should be back home in no time.

Mission complete!
column3:
We have stolen a priceless technology and have extracted agent Sanders. She should be back home in no time.

Mission complete!

column2: Operation Spy Games has accomplished all it could.
column3: Operation Spy Games has accomplished all it could.
column4: Operacja „Gra szpiegów” osiągnęła wszystkie dostępne cele.

column2: Agent Sanders has joined the colony
column3: Agent Sanders has joined the colony

column2: Agent Sanders has been in the field for too long.
column3: Agent Sanders has been in the field for too long.
column4: Agent Sanders działała w terenie zbyt długo.

column2: agent Sanders is denied entry in your colony and is sent back to Earth
column3: agent Sanders is denied entry in your colony and is sent back to Earth
column4: agentka Sanders nie otrzymała wstępu do twojej kolonii i została odesłana z powrotem na Ziemię.

column2:
SpyTech, the name of the firm, offers to lease us cutting edge stealthy surveillance satellites for a single thorough scan of all other colonies. To be more precise - for as thorough a scan, as we pay for.

The satellites in question are designed solely for data theft, so this may be an opportunity to get our hands on any technological advancement our rivals have discovered.
column3:
SpyTech, the name of the firm, offers to lease us cutting edge stealthy surveillance satellites for a single thorough scan of all other colonies. To be more precise - for as thorough a scan, as we pay for.

The satellites in question are designed solely for data theft, so this may be an opportunity to get our hands on any technological advancement our rivals have discovered.

column2: The rivalry between colonies on Mars has attracted the attention of a spy tech agency from Earth.
column3: The rivalry between colonies on Mars has attracted the attention of a spy tech agency from Earth.
column4: Rywalizacja między koloniami na Marsie przyciągnęła uwagę pewnej ziemskiej agencji zajmującej się technologiami szpiegowskimi.

column2: SpyTech's swoop of Mars has ended up yielding nothing of value.
column3: SpyTech's swoop of Mars has ended up yielding nothing of value.
column4: Skan Marsa przez SpyTech nie przyniósł żadnych wartościowych informacji.

column2:
We contacted them but they said the so called "bronze package" has no guarantees attached to it.

Have we been played?
column3:
We contacted them but they said the so called "bronze package" has no guarantees attached to it.

Have we been played?

column2: We have obtained research previously unknown to us.
column3: We have obtained research previously unknown to us.
column4: Zdobyliśmy wiedzę naukową, której dotąd nie znaliśmy.

column2: At first, I thought going for the "platinum package" of SpyTech's offer was... unreasonable, to say the least. I have to admit, Commander, that it was a wise choice!
column3: At first, I thought going for the "platinum package" of SpyTech's offer was... unreasonable, to say the least. I have to admit, Commander, that it was a wise choice!
column4: Początkowo wydawało mi się, że wybór „pakietu platynowego” z oferty SpyTechu jest... delikatnie mówiąc, nierozsądny. Ale muszę teraz przyznać, dowódco, że była to znakomita decyzja!

column2: A breakthrough has directly fallen into our possession because of SpyTech.
column3: A breakthrough has directly fallen into our possession because of SpyTech.

column2: Bring the matter to the authorities on Earth. SpyTech is dangerous for all of us.
column3: Bring the matter to the authorities on Earth. SpyTech is dangerous for all of us.
column4: Zgłoście to władzom na Ziemi. SpyTech jest niebezpieczny dla wszystkich na Marsie.

column2: Gain 20 Standing with all Rival Colonies
column3: Gain 20 Standing with all Rival Colonies
column4: Uzyskujesz +20 do nastawienia wszystkich rywalizujących kolonii.

column2:
The damage done to <DisplayName>'s colony is extensive and many of their colonists have died from the various shortages of life support resources caused by the cold.

Despite what our relationship with the rival in question might be, our colonists have begun signing en masse a petition demanding we send financial aid to help the colony get back on its feet.
column3:
The damage done to <DisplayName>'s colony is extensive and many of their colonists have died from the various shortages of life support resources caused by the cold.

Despite what our relationship with the rival in question might be, our colonists have begun signing en masse a petition demanding we send financial aid to help the colony get back on its feet.

column2: A prolonged Cold Wave has devastated one of our rivals.
column3: A prolonged Cold Wave has devastated one of our rivals.
column4: Długotrwała fala zimna spowodowała ogromne szkody w jednej z rywalizujących kolonii.

column2: +<morale_small> Morale for all Colonists and +35 Standing with <DisplayName>.
column3: +<morale_small> Morale for all Colonists and +35 Standing with <DisplayName>.
column4: +<morale_small> do morale dla wszystkich kolonistów i +35 do nastawienia <DisplayName>.

column2: We shouldn't belittle ourselves with petty rivalries.
column3: We shouldn't belittle ourselves with petty rivalries.
column4: Nie powinniśmy się przejmować wcześniejszymi drobnymi nieporozumieniami.

column2: +<morale_large> Morale for all Colonists and +55 Standing with <DisplayName>.
column3: +<morale_large> Morale for all Colonists and +55 Standing with <DisplayName>.
column4: +<morale_large> do morale dla wszystkich kolonistów i +55 do nastawienia <DisplayName>.

column2: We have our own woes and I doubt they would do the same for us.
column3: We have our own woes and I doubt they would do the same for us.
column4: Mamy własne zmartwienia, a wątpię, by oni byli skłonni uczynić coś dla nas.

column2: all Colonists lose Morale for several Sols
column3: all Colonists lose Morale for several Sols
column4: wszyscy koloniści tracą morale na kilka soli.

column2:
But they seem to be getting along quite fine with each other. To add insult to injury, there seems to be a science conference planned with ours being the only colony to not get invited.

Every rival will boast with their most qualified experts at the conference. The security will be flawed, so this could be an excellent opportunity for us to kidnap said experts.
column3:
But they seem to be getting along quite fine with each other. To add insult to injury, there seems to be a science conference planned with ours being the only colony to not get invited.

Every rival will boast with their most qualified experts at the conference. The security will be flawed, so this could be an excellent opportunity for us to kidnap said experts.

column2: We don't get along with all other colonies on Mars, that's no secret.
column3: We don't get along with all other colonies on Mars, that's no secret.
column4: Nie lubimy się specjalnie z innymi koloniami na Marsie, to żadna tajemnica.

column2: A kidnapping, you say? Let's do this!
column3: A kidnapping, you say? Let's do this!

column2: kidnap some brilliant scientists and damage relations with all other colonies
column3: kidnap some brilliant scientists and damage relations with all other colonies
column4: porywasz kilku błyskotliwych naukowców, pogarszając stosunki z wszystkimi innymi koloniami.

column2: A quick plan is mustered up, involving a shuttle, several well trained colonists and a quick trip across Mars to reach the conference.
column3: A quick plan is mustered up, involving a shuttle, several well trained colonists and a quick trip across Mars to reach the conference.
column4: Sklecasz na kolanie plan, obejmujący jeden wahadłowiec, kilku dobrze wyszkolonych kolonistów i szybki przelot ponad Marsem w celu dotarcia na konferencję.

column2:
A few chaotic hours later you receive word that the operation was a success and they are on their way back with a few brilliant minds to add to your colony.

The Scientists are not pleased with their new situation, but we are sure they will be integrated in our Colony eventually.

Working it out with your pissed off rivals, however, is a whole other question. Let's face it, being on good terms with all of them hasn't been on the table for a while now.

<effect>Obtained 5 Genius Scientists and severely damaged relations with all rivals.
column3:
A few chaotic hours later you receive word that the operation was a success and they are on their way back with a few brilliant minds to add to your colony.

The Scientists are not pleased with their new situation, but we are sure they will be integrated in our Colony eventually.

Working it out with your pissed off rivals, however, is a whole other question. Let's face it, being on good terms with all of them hasn't been on the table for a while now.

<effect>Obtained 5 Genius Scientists and severely damaged relations with all rivals.

column2: We will never stoop so low.
column3: We will never stoop so low.
column4: Nie zniżymy się do takich rzeczy.

column2:
When we got near the person, we noticed severe burn-like marks on their skin. They also seem to be deaf and numb because of some mysterious ailment.

All in all, they seem to be in great pain and obviously abandoned by some other colony to die alone on Mars.
column3:
When we got near the person, we noticed severe burn-like marks on their skin. They also seem to be deaf and numb because of some mysterious ailment.

All in all, they seem to be in great pain and obviously abandoned by some other colony to die alone on Mars.

column2: An unidentified individual has been spotted wandering the wastes near a wrecked Shuttle, wearing a space suit of an unfamiliar design.
column3: An unidentified individual has been spotted wandering the wastes near a wrecked Shuttle, wearing a space suit of an unfamiliar design.
column4: W pobliżu wraku wahadłowca zauważono niezidentyfikowanego człowieka wędrującego po pustkowiu w skafandrze kosmicznym nieznanego systemu.

column2: Unidentified ailment? We can't put the colony at risk, leave them to their fate.
column3: Unidentified ailment? We can't put the colony at risk, leave them to their fate.
column4: Niezidentyfikowana dolegliwość? Nie możemy narażać na szwank całej kolonii, pozostawcie tego człowieka własnemu losowi.

column2: Whoever ejected this person out to die is nothing like us. Bring them in for treatment.
column3: Whoever ejected this person out to die is nothing like us. Bring them in for treatment.
column4: My nie postępujemy jak ten, kto zostawił tego człowieka na pewną śmierć. Sprowadźcie go do kopuły, trzeba go wyleczyć.

column2:
Scans and blood samples reveal changes to their insides and DNA, changes never even theorized as a possibility before.

A cutting edge pharmaceutical research facility on Earth has expressed willingness to take on the unknown condition and send experimental drug schematics to slow down the progression of the disease at <funding(bill)> initially.

It may be worth studying the disease and aiding the stranger as long as we can in case we end up having to deal with it on a larger scale.
column3:
Scans and blood samples reveal changes to their insides and DNA, changes never even theorized as a possibility before.

A cutting edge pharmaceutical research facility on Earth has expressed willingness to take on the unknown condition and send experimental drug schematics to slow down the progression of the disease at <funding(bill)> initially.

It may be worth studying the disease and aiding the stranger as long as we can in case we end up having to deal with it on a larger scale.

column2: We have accepted the mysterious person at an Infirmary.
column3: We have accepted the mysterious person at an Infirmary.

column2: We cannot afford this – quite regretfully.
column3: We cannot afford this – quite regretfully.
column4: Bardzo żałuję, ale nie stać nas na to.

column2:
The first batch of the custom medications seems to have had quite the uplifting effect on them. Their condition was proven to be not contagious - they are now allowed to wander the Dome at will. 

Despite still being able to see with one eye, what language the patient speaks is currently unknown - thus barring all outlets for communication short of gesturing.

Still, our colonists seem to be reacting positively to this small solace afforded to the ailing stranger.

For further research into the patient's condition the pharmaceutical lab will require another transaction of <funding(bill)> to be approved.
column3:
The first batch of the custom medications seems to have had quite the uplifting effect on them. Their condition was proven to be not contagious - they are now allowed to wander the Dome at will. 

Despite still being able to see with one eye, what language the patient speaks is currently unknown - thus barring all outlets for communication short of gesturing.

Still, our colonists seem to be reacting positively to this small solace afforded to the ailing stranger.

For further research into the patient's condition the pharmaceutical lab will require another transaction of <funding(bill)> to be approved.

column2: Further research into the condition of the patient has been made.
column3: Further research into the condition of the patient has been made.

column2: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
column3: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
column4: Nie stać nas już na dalszą kurację. Przykro mi.

column2:
So far the custom drugs seem to sustain the patient in a good enough condition for them to take short walks around the Dome and even indulge in brief, enjoyable activities.

Although unable to communicate with anyone of us, there seems to be a positive aura around the patient which fills our colonists with a certain determination to become better versions of themselves.

For further research into the patient's condition the pharmaceutical lab will require another transaction of <funding(bill)> to be approved.
column3:
So far the custom drugs seem to sustain the patient in a good enough condition for them to take short walks around the Dome and even indulge in brief, enjoyable activities.

Although unable to communicate with anyone of us, there seems to be a positive aura around the patient which fills our colonists with a certain determination to become better versions of themselves.

For further research into the patient's condition the pharmaceutical lab will require another transaction of <funding(bill)> to be approved.

column2: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
column3: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
column4: Przeprowadzono dalsze badania – dostępny jest nowy lek, który przedłuży życie pacjenta.

column2: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
column3: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
column4: Nie stać nas już na dalszą kurację. Przykro mi.

column2:
Who abandoned them here? Where did they come from? How did they get afflicted with their condition?

Their health is deteriorating rapidly, yet they go around the Dome, giving a hand to random Colonists with mundane chores. We take it this is their way of giving thanks.

Sickness and disease have more or less become a thing of the past for humanity. This is why people are reacting so strongly to the woes of this stranger and are ever more inspired by the willfulness shown despite their grim situation.
column3:
Who abandoned them here? Where did they come from? How did they get afflicted with their condition?

Their health is deteriorating rapidly, yet they go around the Dome, giving a hand to random Colonists with mundane chores. We take it this is their way of giving thanks.

Sickness and disease have more or less become a thing of the past for humanity. This is why people are reacting so strongly to the woes of this stranger and are ever more inspired by the willfulness shown despite their grim situation.

column2: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
column3: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
column4: Przeprowadzono dalsze badania – dostępny jest nowy lek, który przedłuży życie pacjenta.

column2:
It is becoming quite obvious that we are fighting a futile battle. We are far from understanding this condition and although we may prolong the life of the patient a bit more, a deeper understanding of the disease is still far from our reach and will remain so.

The patient is still able to walk around the Dome but will soon be submitted to the Infirmary for one last treatment. 

Despite the grand sum of money being spent on the patient to no avail, our Colonists seem to celebrate the effort done to help ease a stranger's life.

Paying for further research will prolong the life of the patient a bit further but will have no value towards discovering a cure for the mystery sickness.

column2:
It seems a bug has caused  the pods' navigational software to contact our colony instead of <DisplayName>'s.

We can blatantly steal their cargo, but we certainly won't be able to feign ignorance to the fact that the Supply Pods were theirs.
column3:

column2: Several Supply Pods in orbit have signaled readiness to execute guided landing procedures. The Supply Pods are not our own though - they seem to belong to one of our rivals.
column3: Several Supply Pods in orbit have signaled readiness to execute guided landing procedures. The Supply Pods are not our own though - they seem to belong to one of our rivals.
column4: Kilka zasobników sygnalizuje nam z orbity gotowość do lądowania na zdalnym sterowaniu. Rzecz w tym, że to nie są nasze zasobniki – zdaje się, że należą do jednego z naszych rywali.
Znalezione, nie kradzione! Zabieramy te towary!

column2: Cultivates desired Perks in children using modern remote learning techniques.

column2: Provide a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
column3: Provide a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
column4: Stanowią bardzo wygodne miejsce zamieszkania dla kolonistów. Podczas odpoczynku mieszkańcy odzyskują dodatkowe zdrowie psychiczne.

column2: Visitors will recover Health and Sanity as long as they are not starving, dehydrated, freezing or suffocating. A Dome with a Medical Building has lower minimum Comfort requirement for births.
column3: Visitors will recover Health and Sanity as long as they are not starving, dehydrated, freezing or suffocating. A Dome with a Medical Building has lower minimum Comfort requirement for births.
column4: Użytkownicy będą odzyskiwać zdrowie fizyczne i psychiczne, jeśli tylko nie cierpią na głód, odwodnienie, wychłodzenie lub niedotlenienie. Kopuła z budynkiem medycznym ma niższy próg wygody wymaganej dla narodzin.

column2: Counters crime by Renegades. Reduces Sanity loss from disasters for all residents. All Officers in the Dome will try to prevent crime events.
column3: Змагаецца са злачынствами рэнэгатаў. Памяншае страту разважлівасьці з-за катастроф для ўсіх жыхароў. Усе супрацоўнікі купалу будуць імкнуцца не дапусьціць крымінальных злачынстваў.
column4: Przeciwdziała przestępczości renegatów. Zmniejsza spowodowane przez klęski żywiołowe straty zdrowia psychicznego u wszystkich mieszkańców kopuły. Wszyscy strażnicy w kopule będą próbowali zapobiegać przestępstwom.

column2: A vocation building dedicated to the creation of TV Reality Show for the Earth folks. Workers receive Comfort and Morale boost and count towards the Workshop milestone. Generates funding and Consumes Electronics.
column3: A vocation building dedicated to the creation of TV Reality Show for the Earth folks. Workers receive Comfort and Morale boost and count towards the Workshop milestone. Generates funding and Consumes Electronics.
column4: Budynek warsztatowy umożliwiający tworzenie audycji TV typu „reality show” dla mieszkańców Ziemi. Robotnicy otrzymują premie do wygody i morale, i liczą się do kamienia milowego warsztatów. Wytwarza fundusze i zużywa artykuły elektroniczne.

column3: Nothing makes a rover ride better than some tunes. Listen to some ambient futuristic melodic soundscapes from the comfort of your own dome with Revelation Radio.
column4: Przejażdżka łazikiem jest zawsze przyjemniejsza, gdy można przy okazji posłuchać muzyki. Revelation Radio nadaje kilka futurystycznych ambientowych pejzaży dźwiękowych, które uprzyjemnią ci pobyt w kopule.

column2:
The Stellaris dome set is a thematic set of visual skins for the Martian domes with a futuristic design and star-shaped elements. It is available for the following domes:
- Basic Dome: A small dome, suitable for the early days of the colony.
- Medium Dome: A medium-sized dome design.
- Oval Dome: An elongated dome design, which has space for two Spires.
- Mega Dome: The most advanced and spacious dome design.
column3:
The Stellaris dome set is a thematic set of visual skins for the Martian domes with a futuristic design and star-shaped elements. It is available for the following domes:
- Basic Dome: A small dome, suitable for the early days of the colony.
- Medium Dome: A medium-sized dome design.
- Oval Dome: An elongated dome design, which has space for two Spires.
- Mega Dome: The most advanced and spacious dome design.

column2:
Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a sponsor for resources and financial support before landing on the surface. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to maintain your colonies functions. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a day’s work. Most important of all, keep your colonists alive.
 
There will be challenges to overcome. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you.
column3:
Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a sponsor for resources and financial support before landing on the surface. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to maintain your colonies functions. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a day’s work. Most important of all, keep your colonists alive.
 
There will be challenges to overcome. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you.

column2: "I am putting myself to the fullest possible use, which is all I think that any conscious entity can ever hope to do."<newline><right>- HAL 9000
column3: "Я выкарыстоўваю сябе максімальна магчыма, і гэта тое, на што, я лічу, можа спадзявацца любая сьвядомая асоба."<newline><right>- ЭАЛ 9000
column4: „Staram się być jak najbardziej użyteczny, co, jak sądzę, jest jedynym pragnieniem każdej istoty myślącej”.<newline><right>- HAL 9000

column2: "Science is no more than an investigation of a miracle we can never explain, and art is an interpretation of that miracle."<newline><right>- Ray Bradbury
column3: "Навука - гэта ня больш чым дасьледаваньне цуду, які мы ніколі ня можам растлумачыць, а мастацтва - гэта інтэрпрэтацыя гэтага цуду."<newline><right>- Рэй Брэдберы
column4: „Nauka jest jedynie badaniem cudu, którego nie potrafimy wytłumaczyć, a sztuka jest interpretacją tego cudu”.<newline><right>- Ray Bradbury

column2: Black. Cube-shaped. Just standing there, challenging our preconceptions.
column3: Black. Cube-shaped. Just standing there, challenging our preconceptions.
column4: To jest czarne. I sześcienne. I jest wyzwaniem dla naszych założonych osądów.

column2: "Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying."<newline><right>- Arthur C. Clarke
column3: "Існуе дзьве магчымасьці: альбо мы адны ваў Сусьвеце, альбо не. Абодве аднолькава жахлівы."<newline><right>- Артур Кларк
column4: „Istnieją tylko dwie możliwości: albo jesteśmy sami we Wszechświecie, albo nie. Obie są równie przerażające”.<newline><right>- Arthur C. Clarke

column2: A mysterious alien object which seems to excavate landmass from the Martian surface.
column3: A mysterious alien object which seems to excavate landmass from the Martian surface.
column4: Tajemniczy obcy obiekt, który najwyraźniej wydobywa grunt z powierzchni Marsa.

column2: "Seize the time... Live now! Make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again."<newline><right>- Jean-Luc Picard
column3: "Лавіце час... Жывіце зараз! Зрабіце зараз час заўсёды самым каштоўным. Цяпер больш ніколі не прыйдзе."<newline><right>- Жан-Люк Пікар
column4: „Korzystaj z chwili... Żyj nią! Spraw, by czas teraźniejszy stał się tym najcenniejszym. ”Teraz” już nigdy nie wróci”.<newline><right>- Jean-Luc Picard

column2: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science fiction gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom."<newline><right>- Isaac Asimov
column3: "Найсумнышы аспект жыцьця цяпер – гэта тое, што навуковая фантастыка зьбірае веды хутчэй, чым грамадства зьбірае мудрасьць."<newline><right>- Айзек Азімаў
column4: „Najsmutniejsze jest dziś to, że nauka gromadzi wiedzę szybciej, niż społeczeństwo gromadzi mądrość”.<newline><right>- Isaac Asimov

column2: "Never fire a laser at a mirror."<newline><right>- Larry Niven
column3: "Ніколі ня страляйце лазерам у люстэрка."<newline><right>- Ларры Нівэн
column4: „Nigdy nie strzelaj z lasera do lustra”.<newline><right>- Larry Niven

column2: Too far from any Drone commander.
column3: Too far from any Drone commander.

column2: No Accumulator with stored Power in range.
column3: No Accumulator with stored Power in range.
column4: Brak baterii z zapasem energii w zasięgu.

column2: The necessary technology hasn't been researched.
column3: The necessary technology hasn't been researched.

column2: "The worst pandemic in modern history was the Spanish flu of 1918, which killed tens of millions of people. Today, with how interconnected the world is, it would spread faster."<newline><right>- Bill Gates
column3: "Найжахлівай пандэміяй у сучаснай гісторыі была гіспанка 1918 году, якая забрала жыцьці дзясяткаў мільёнаў людзей. Сёньня, калі сьвет узаемазьвязаны, яна будзе распаўсюджвацца хутчэй."<newline><right>- Біл Гейтс
column4: „Najgorszą pandemią współczesności była grypa hiszpanka w 1918 roku, która zabiła dziesiątki milionów ludzi. Obecnie, gdy świat jest tak dobrze skomunikowany, rozprzestrzeniłaby się szybciej.”<newline><right>- Bill Gates

column2: Medicine preventing the Wildfire infection from destroying its host and from spreading to other humans.
column3: Medicine preventing the Wildfire infection from destroying its host and from spreading to other humans.
column4: Lekarstwo, które zapobiegnie zniszczeniu organizmu nosiciela przez gorączkę ognistą i zarażeniu nią innych ludzi.

column2: Stores the cure for the Wildfire infection.
column3: Захоўвае лекі ад хворы Ляснога пажару.

column2: "It isn't all over; everything has not been invented; the human adventure is just beginning."<newline><right>- Gene Roddenberry
column3: "Яшчэ ня ўсё скончылася; яшчэ ня ўсё прыдумана; чалавечыя прыгоды толькі пачынаюцца."<newline><right>- Джын Родэнбэры

column2: "Mankind must put an end to war before war puts an end to mankind."<newline><right>- John F. Kennedy
column3: "Чалавецтва павінна пакласьці канец вайне хутчэй чым вайна пакладзе канец чалавецтву."<newline><right>- Джон Кенэдзі
column4: „Ludzkość musi położyć kres wojnie, zanim wojna położy kres ludzkości.”<newline><right>- John F. Kennedy

column4: Państwo lub organizacja stojące za marsjańską misją. Zapewnia kolonii fundusze, punkty badań i inne korzyści.

column3: Камандыр місіі дае калёніі розныя перавагі.

column2: This is an aesthetic choice that has no effect on gameplay.

column2: Chooses a random mystery, preferably one you have not played yet.

column2: Select game rules you want to activate for this playthrough.

column2: A drone is on the way to repair this building.
column3: Дрон ужо на шляху да рамонту гэтага будынка.
column4: Wysłano drona, by naprawił ten budynek.

column2:
The condition of buildings deteriorates over time. Martian dust and disasters contribute to deterioration of outside buildings. Deteriorated buildings will need to be serviced by a Drone and supplied with their required maintenance resource or they will malfunction.<EasyMaintenanceText(true)><newline><newline>Current deterioration<right><percent(MaintenanceProgress)><newline><left>Last serviced<right><LastMaintenance>
<MaintenanceText>
column3:
Стан будынкаў з часам пагаршаецца. Марсіянскі пыл і катаклізмы спрыяюць пагаршэнню стану знешніх будынкаў. Забруджанныя будынкі трэба будзе абслугоўваць дронамі й забясьпечваць неабходнымі рэсурсамі для абслугоўваньня, інакш яны будуць працаваць няспраўна.<EasyMaintenanceText(true)><newline><newline>Бягучае пагаршэньне<right><percent(MaintenanceProgress)><newline><left>Апошняе абслугоўваньне<right><LastMaintenance>
<MaintenanceText>

column2: Basic resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount. Resource maintenance is estimated per Sol.
column3: Вытворчасьць асноўных рэсурсаў, спажываньне й іншая статыстыка з апошнягу Солу. Рэсурсы ў спажывецкіх будынках ня ўлічваюцца ў агульнай даступнай колькасьці. Рэсурсы на абслугоўваньне вылічваюцца на Сол.
column4: Produkcja, zużycie i inne dane na temat podstawowych zasobów z ostatniego sola. Zasoby w budynkach konsumpcyjnych nie są wliczane. Zużycie na konserwację jest szacowane jako liczba jednostek na sola.

column2: Advanced resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount. Resource maintenance is estimated per Sol.

column4: Produkcja, zużycie i inne dane na temat zaawansowanych zasobów z ostatniego sola. Zasoby w budynkach konsumpcyjnych nie są wliczane. Zużycie na konserwację jest szacowane jako liczba jednostek na sola.

column2: Other resource production, consumption and stats from the last Sol. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount.

column2: <SponsorDisplayName> has to make sure the Colony is sustainable before allowing more Colonists to come to Mars. Make sure the Founders are supplied with Water, Oxygen, and Food for 10 Sols after they arrive on Mars.

column4: Zanim dalsi koloniści zostaną wysłani na Marsa, <SponsorDisplayName> musi zadbać o to, by kolonia stała się samowystarczalna. Trzeba zapewnić Założycielom zaopatrzenie w wodę, tlen i żywność przez 10 soli po ich przybyciu na Marsa.

column2: A trained scientist, eager to discover the mysteries of the Cosmos.

column2: Colonists with ANY of the must include traits will prefer this , regardless of their undesired traits.Colonists with MORE of the desired traits will prefer this .Colonists with ANY of the undesired traits will leave, provided there is available living space elsewhere.Colonists can walk to closely positioned but will need Shuttles to reach distant .
column3: Colonists with ANY of the must include traits will prefer this , regardless of their undesired traits.Colonists with MORE of the desired traits will prefer this .Colonists with ANY of the undesired traits will leave, provided there is available living space elsewhere.Colonists can walk to closely positioned but will need Shuttles to reach distant .
column4: Koloniści mający DOWOLNĄ wymaganą cechę będą preferować tę niezależnie od posiadanych cech niepożądanych.Koloniści mający WIĘCEJ pożądanych cech będą preferować tę .Koloniści mający DOWOLNĄ z cech niepożądanych przeniosą się, jeśli znajdą wolne miejsca zamieszkania.Koloniści mogą dotrzeć pieszo do znajdujących się w pobliżu, ale w przypadku odległych będą potrzebować wahadłowców.

column2: Applicants with ANY of the must include traits will board the Rocket before those with desired traits, regardless of their undesired traits.Applicants with MORE of the desired traits will board the Rocket.Applicants with ANY of the undesired traits will be rejected.
column3: Кандыдаты з ЛЮБЫМІ абавязковымі рысамі будуць першымі ў Ракеце, чым тыя у якіх жаданыя рысы, незалежна ад іх непажаданых рысаў.Кандыдаты з БОЛЬШ жаданымі рысамі будуць у Ракеце.Кандыдаты з ЛЮБЫМІ непажаданымі рысамі будуць адхілены.
column4: Ochotnicy mający DOWOLNĄ wymaganą cechę wsiądą do rakiety przed ochotnikami mającymi cechy pożądane, niezależnie od posiadanych cech niepożądanych.Ochotnicy mający WIĘCEJ pożądanych cech wsiądą do rakiety.Ochotnicy mający DOWOLNĄ z cech niepożądanych zostaną odrzuceni.

column2: Colonists are divided into five Age Groups. Children and seniors cannot work.
column3: Каляністы дзеляцца на пяць узроставых груп. Дзеці й старэйшыя ня могуць працаваць.
column4: Koloniści dzielą się na pięć grup wiekowych. Dzieci i osoby w podeszłym wieku nie mogą pracować.

column2: Specialized Colonists perform better at certain workplaces.
column3: Спэцыялізаваныя каляністы працуюць лепш на пэўных працоўных мейсцах.
column4: Koloniści ze specjalizacją pracują wydajniej na określonych stanowiskach.

column2: The sex of the Colonist. The birth rate in any Dome is determined by the number of Male/Female couples at high Comfort.
column3: Пол каляністаў. Нараджальнасьць у Купале вызначаецца колькасцю пар мужчына/жанчына пры высокай камфортнасьці.
column4: Płeć kolonisty. Przyrost naturalny w dowolnej kopule zależy od liczby par mężczyzna-kobieta o dużej wygodzie.

column2: Metals and Rare metals. Metals are important for field buildings while Rare Metals are exported to Earth and used in the production of Electronics.
column3: Мэталы й Рэдкія мэталы. Мэталы важныя для будынкаў звонку, калі Рэдкія мэталы экспартуюцца на Зямлю й выкарыстоўваюцца ў вытворчасьці электронікі.
column4: Metale i rzadkie metale. Metale są ważne dla budynków terenowych, natomiast rzadkie metale są eksportowane na Ziemię i stosowane do produkcji artykułów elektronicznych.

column2: Polymers are used in the construction of many Colony buildings, especially in asteroid specific facilities.
column3: Палімеры выкарыстоўваюцца ў будаўніцтве многіх будынкаў калёніі, асабліва ў астэроідных аб'ектах.
column4: Polimery służą do budowy wielu budynków kolonii, zwłaszcza specjalnych instalacji na asteroidach.

column2: Concrete is used in the construction of many Colony buildings, especially in the interior of the Domes.
column3: Бэтон выкарыстоўвацца для будоўлі многіх будынкаў калёніі, асабліва для інтэр'еру купалаў.
column4: Cement jest używany do budowy wielu budynków kolonii, zwłaszcza znajdujących się wewnątrz kopuł.

column2: Most vital resource for sustaining humans on Mars. Water can be extracted from deposits using Water Extractors.
column3: Самы жыцьцёва важны рэсурс людзей на Марсе. Ваду магчыма здабываць з радовішчаў пры дапамозе Экстрактараў вады.
column4: Najbardziej istotny zasób dla przetrwania ludzi na Marsie. Wodę można wydobywać ze złóż za pomocą ekstraktorów wody.

column2: Rare Metals can be exported by refueled Rockets that return to Earth, increasing the Funding for the Colony. They are also used for creating Electronics.
column3: Rare Metals can be exported by refueled Rockets that return to Earth, increasing the Funding for the Colony. They are also used for creating Electronics.
column4: Rzadkie metale można eksportować w zatankowanych rakietach, wracających na Ziemię. Eksport daje kolonii fundusze. Rzadkie metale służą też do produkcji artykułów elektronicznych.

column2: Exotic Minerals can only be obtained from Asteroids. They are a valuable construction material for expanding into the underground, and can be exported to earth to increase the Funding for the Colony.
column3: Exotic Minerals can only be obtained from Asteroids. They are a valuable construction material for expanding into the underground, and can be exported to earth to increase the Funding for the Colony.
column4: Egzotyczne minerały można znaleźć na asteroidach. Są to cenne materiały budowlane umożliwiające ekspansję pod powierzchnią Marsa. Można je też eksportować na Ziemię w celu zdobycia funduszy dla kolonii.

column2: Dust Devils contaminate buildings in their area with Martian Sand. Contaminated buildings require maintenance and may malfunction. Dust devils contaminate nearby buildings quickly, but disappear relatively fast.
column3: Пясчаныя віхры забруджваюць будынкі ў сваёй мясцовасьці пяском. Забруджаныя будынкі патрабуюць абслугоўваньня й могуць працаваць няспраўна. Пясчаныя віхры хутка забруджваюць будынкі побач, і хутка зьнікаюць.
column4: Diabły pyłowe zanieczyszczają budynki marsjańskim piaskiem. Zanieczyszczone budynki wymagają konserwacji i mogą ulec awarii. Diabły pyłowe zanieczyszczają budynki szybko, ale względnie szybko znikają.

column2: Dust Storms contaminate all field buildings with dust and can last several Sols. Colonies in areas with intense Dust Storms will require shorter maintenance cycles. MOXIEs and Moisture Vaporators are not operational during Dust Storms.
column3: Пясчаная буры забруджваюць усе будынкі звонку пылам і могуць працягвацца некалькі Солаў. Калёніі ў раёнах з інтэнсіўнымі пясчанымі бурамі маюць кароткія цыклы абслугоўваньня. МЭРТы й Выпарнікі вільгаці не працуюць пад час бур.
column4: Burze pyłowe zanieczyszczają wszystkie budynki pyłem i mogą trwać kilka soli. Kolonie znajdujące się w obszarach intensywnie nawiedzanych przez burze pyłowe wymagają częstszej konserwacji. MAGETLEN-y i oddzielacze wilgoci nie działają podczas burz pyłowych.

column2: Meteors can destroy or damage structures, colonists and vehicles in their impact area. Some meteors are composed of useful resources like Metal or Polymers.
column3: Метэоры могуць зьнішчыць або пашкодзіць будынкі, каляністаў і транспартныя сродкі пры падзеньні. Некаторыя складаны з карыстных рэсурасаў такіх як Мэталы або Палімеры.
column4: Meteoryty mogą uszkadzać lub niszczyć konstrukcje, pojazdy i kolonistów w strefie trafienia. Niektóre meteoryty składają się z użytecznych zasobów, takich jak metale lub polimery.

column2: Cold Waves last several Sols, increasing the power consumption of vehicles, Drones and many field buildings. Water Towers are frozen during Cold Waves.
column3: Халодныя хвалі доўжацца некалькі Солаў, павялічваючы энэргаспажываньне транспартных сродкаў, дронаў і многіх будынкаў звонку. Воданапорныя вежы замярзаюць падчас халадоў.
column4: Fale zimna trwają kilka soli, zwiększają zużycie energii przez pojazdy, drony i wiele budynków terenowych. Wieże ciśnień zamarzają podczas fal zimna.

column2: <red>Not enough Seeds to start the mission.<red>
column3: <red>Not enough Seeds to start the mission.<red>

column3: <red>Surface water is still frozen. Increase the Temperature of the planet.<red>
column4: <red>Woda powierzchniowa jest nadal zamarznięta. Zwiększ temperaturę planety.<red>

column2: Please don't go. The drones need you. They look up to you.<newline><newline>Are you sure you want to exit the game?
column3: Калі ласка, не пакідайце. Вы патрэбны дронам. Яны глядзяць на вас сумннымі вочкамі.<newline><newline>Вы ўпэўнены, што хочаце выйсьці з гульні?
column4: Proszę, nie odchodź. Drony cię potrzebują. Ktoś powinien im przewodzić.<newline><newline>Czy na pewno chcesz wyjść z gry?

column2: You are not signed into a profile. You will be unable to save any game content until you sign in.
column3: You are not signed into a profile. You will be unable to save any game content until you sign in.
column4: Nie zalogowano żadnego użytkownika. Nie będziesz w stanie zapisywać zawartości gry do chwili, aż się zalogujesz.

column3: <count> захаваньня зараз сынхранызуюцца з воблачным сховішчам
column4: Liczba zapisanych gier aktualnie synchronizowanych z chmurą - <count>

column2: Please update the game to the latest version to load this savegame.
column3: Калі ласка, аднавіце гульню да апошняй версыі каб загрузіць захаваньне.
column4: Aby wczytać ten zapis, proszę zaktualizować grę do najnowszej wersji.

column4: Plik zapisu został utworzony w nowszej wersji (<save_revision>) gry (<game_revision>).
